# language_name:        Iu Mien
# closest ISO 639-3:    ium
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     ฉบับอักษรโรมันโบราณ
# english_title:        The Ancient Roman Bible in Iu Mien (Latin script)
# URL:                  https://www.bible.com/de/bible/232/gen.1.iuminor
# copyright_short:      © Thailand Bible Society
# copyright_long:       The Bible was prepared by Association of Christian theology Thailand. Please contact: tbs@thaibible.or.th<br>พระคัมภีร์ฉบับนี้จัดทำโดย สมาคมพระคริสตธรรมไทย สนใจโปรดติดต่อ: tbs@thaibible.or.th
# notes:                
40001001	ye-su ki-tug zruj Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun . Daa-witq huvb yaag zruj apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun . ib zang fiaq naaiq se ye-su ki-tug txig Jiaj txig Eei trub zov .
40001002	apg-laa-ham zruj i-sakg Eei tia . i-sakg zruj yaa-Kopq Eei tia . yaa-Kopq zruj yu-Daa Bua muab txn txig Eei tia .
40001003	yu-Daa zruj pe-letq Zauj ze-laa Eei tia . ninb Bua Eei maa heug Taa-maa . pe-letq zruj hetq-lon Eei tia . hetq-lon zruj laam Eei tia .
40001004	laam zruj am-mi-naa-Dapg Eei tia . am-mi-naa-Dapg zruj naa-son Eei tia . naa-son zruj sanj-mon Eei tia .
40001005	sanj-mon zruj Bo-aatg Eei tia . Bo-aatg Eei maa heug laa-hapg . Bo-aatg zruj o-Betg Eei tia . o-Betg Eei maa heug lu-Te . o-Betg zruj Jyetg-si Eei tia .
40001006	Jyetg-si zruj Daa-witq huvb Eei tia . Daa-witq huvb zruj saa-lo-mxn Eei tia . saa-lo-mxn Eei maa zinb Daavg zruj u-li-yaa Eei auq .
40001007	saa-lo-mxn zruj le-hoj-Bo-am Eei tia . le-hoj-Bo-am zruj aa-Bi-yaa Eei tia . aa-Bi-yaa zruj aa-saaj Eei tia .
40001008	aa-saaj zruj ye-ho-saa-fatq Eei tia . ye-ho-saa-fatq zruj yo-lam Eei tia . yo-lam zruj utg-si-yaa Eei tia .
40001009	utg-si-yaa zruj yo-Taam Eei tia . yo-Taam zruj aa-hatg Eei tia . aa-hatg zruj he-se-Ki-yaa Eei tia .
40001010	he-se-Ki-yaa zruj maa-natq-sej Eei tia . maa-natq-sej zruj aa-mon Eei tia . aa-mon zruj yo-si-yaa Eei tia .
40001011	yo-si-yaa zruj ye-Ko-ni-yaa Bua muab txig Eei tia . uaq zang txij zu'g i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g Zaavq mivb Baa-Bi-lon teib puv .
40001012	zu'g Zaavq mivb liud , Ga'haaq ye-Ko-ni-yaa zruj se-an-Ti-en Eei tia . se-an-Ti-en zruj sej-lupq-Baa-Ben Eei tia .
40001013	sej-lupq-Baa-Ben zruj aa-Bi-yutq Eei tia . aa-Bi-yutq zruj e-li-yaa-Kim Eei tia . e-li-yaa-Kim zruj aa-sx Eei tia .
40001014	aa-sx zruj saaj-Dokg Eei tia . saaj-Dokg zruj aa-Kim Eei tia . aa-Kim zruj e-li-utg Eei tia .
40001015	e-li-utg zruj e-le-aa-saa Eei tia . e-le-aa-saa zruj matq-Taan Eei tia . matq-Taan zruj yaa-Kopq Eei tia .
40001016	yaa-Kopq zruj yo-sepq Eei tia . yo-sepq se maa-li-yaa Eei Goj . maa-li-yaa zruj ye-su Eei maa . ye-su tovb myenb heug ki-tug uaq taub .
40001017	Navq naaig , yem apg-laa-ham mivb Tauj Daa-witq huvb maaib zyepg feij txig myenb . cvj yem Daa-witq huvb mivb Tauj i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g kwaatq mivb Baa-Bi-lon teib puv maaib zyepg feij txig . cvj yem zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei zyavb hog Tauj ki-tug Zwrtq seij uaq zang , maaib zyepg feij txig .
40001018	ye-su ki-tug Zwrtq seij Eei Jaub lrug se Navq naaiq . ye-su Eei maa , Buaj heug maa-li-yaa . yo-sepq kxvq zyavb ninb mig a'q . ninb Bua maiq kcvb Jwavg txvj pweij Jiaj mq paag maa-li-yaa maaib sin a'q , se yem sivj livb Eei Qa'q taaib .
40001019	ninb Eei Goj , yo-sepq , se Kuq myenb yaag maiq xij pun maa-li-yaa txv zwavj zu'g Eaiq . ninb zyrug yem Hruq Namq xij peig Diaq Twij .
40001020	yo-sepq yem Hruq Navq naaiq nx Namq . maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib poj Beij Buaj ninb , “ Daa-witq Eei zeib fun , yo-sepq aa'b ! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . kunq lovg maa-li-yaa zruj meib Eei auq a'q og . ninb maaib Jyenq uaq nxm sin se sivj livb pun ninb maaib .
40001021	ninb xij tu'q taub txn . meib xij zu'g Tevj uaq taub txn Zwrtq Buaj heug ye-su , weig zu'g ninb xij Fruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj leib Dutq ninb Bua Eei zwid . ”
40001022	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txij Revg zinb Daavg zyruq lovg uaq taub trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag . ninb kxvq ,
40001023	“ maaib taub maiq Ryaaug Jiaj txn Eei sia'q , xij maaib nxm sin , yuvd tu'q taub txn . ninb Bua xij Zwrtq Buaj heug i-maa-nu-en . ” ( eij leid se “ Tinb huvb Zauj Bua yem . ” )
40001024	yo-sepq Eia taaib , ninb ei Jyenq zyruq Eei finb myenb Buaj Eei waag zruj , zyrug txb maa-li-yaa taaib zruj ninb Eei auq a'q .
40001025	mq paag ninb Bua maiq nitq txig Tauj maa-li-yaa tu'q naaiq taub txn taaib . yo-sepq Tevj uaq taub txn Zwrtq Buaj heug ye-su .
40002001	ye-su Zwrtq seij yem yu-Dia scvq , Betg-le-hem muvq uaq zang , txij zu'g he-lotq zruj huvb tiaj . Ga'haaq maaib teij samj Leij Eei tomb finb scv yem tov puv taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb
40002002	naaig kaaj , “ Zwrtq seij taaib zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb uaq taub kub vwaad yem haaij ? yia Bua pwatg ninb Eei Leij yem tov puv Zwrtq zyrug taaib paaij ninb . ”
40002003	he-lotq huvb mwavj haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug Hruq maiq henb yetg teij . yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb yetg zuvq yaag Hruq maiq henb Revg .
40002004	he-lotq zyrug heug yiu-Tai myenb Eei zwavj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv taaib Rxib yem zunq zyrug naaig ninb Bua , “ zruj ki-tug uaq taub xij Zwrtq seij yem haaij ? ”
40002005	ninb Bua tau , “ yem yu-Dia scvq , Betg-le-hem muvq , weig zu'g trug waag myenb Navq naaiq nx fiaq ,
40002006	‘ yu-Daa teib puv , Betg-le-hem muvq aa'b ! yem yu-Daa teib puv Eei tomb zivb , meib maiq zeid kaub faij Jiaj . weig zu'g maaib taub tomb Jyen xij yem meib naaig Zwrtq taaib txb yia Eei pc'g fivj , i-saa-laa-en myenb . ’ ”
40002007	he-lotq zyrug heug uaq teij samj Leij Eei tomb finb scv taaib , pivj Jyenq lovb lovj Eei naaig kaaj , “ uaq nxm Leij zyavb haaij Zwrtq taaib ? ”
40002008	naaig liud , he-lotq zyrug Buaj ninb Bua mivb Betg-le-hem muvq . ninb kxvq , “ meib Bua kunq mivb Betg-le-hem muvq lovb lovj Eei lxd uaq taub fu'Jweiq . lxd pwatg , Rwrnj taaib Buaj yia , yia zyrug haib mivb paaij ninb . ”
40002009	mwavj huvb tiaj kxvq liud , uaq teij tomb finb scv zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q . zinb Daavg yem tov puv pwatg Zwrtq uaq nxm Leij mivb Daavg ninb Bua . mivb Tauj fu'Jweiq yem uaq nxm txvj kub vwaaig zyrug tivb Jyenq uaq .
40002010	tomb finb scv pwatg uaq nxm Leij zyrug Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g haig .
40002011	pia'g pyauq mivb , pwatg uaq taub fu'Jweiq Zauj ninb Eei maa , maa-li-yaa , zyrug kweig Fiag Dau paaij uaq taub fu'Jweiq . ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua txb taaib Eei zivb Eeig Zwrtq taaib fovg hxg pun ninb . maaib Jyem Zauj i Euvg Daav Eei Dyavb zuv heug mu-yxg Zauj faan-ken-sen .
40002012	Tinb huvb poj Beij Buaj uaq teij tomb finb scv maiq tuvq Rwrnj he-lotq uaq . ninb Bua zyrug yavb kanb tiub Jauq Rwrnj ninb Bua Eei teib puv .
40002013	uaq teij tomb finb scv Rwrnj mig a'q . maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb poj Beij Buaj yo-sepq , “ Jiad sin taaib , txb Jyenq fu'Jweiq Zauj ninb Eei maa pyauj mivb i-yipq teib puv . xij zu'g yem uaq zuaq Tauj yia Buaj meib , weig zu'g he-lotq xij lxd naaiq taub fu'Jweiq taij . ”
40002014	yo-sepq zyrug Jiad sin taaib , luvb mwrnd zang txb Jyenq uaq taub fu'Jweiq Zauj fu'Jweiq Eei maa pyauj mivb i-yipq teib puv ,
40002015	yem uaq zuaq Tauj he-lotq taig mivb . Navq naaig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txij Revg zyruq lovg trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag . ninb kxvq , “ yia heug yia Eei txn yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib . ”
40002016	he-lotq huvb hiuq tu'q uaq teij tomb finb scv Duaq ninb , ninb zyrug Qiaj Jiad ! haig . ninb Fiag livg taij Revg Betg-le-hem muvq Zauj Wiv Rwrnj Eei txvj uaq teij i Havj ka'Diaq mcvj Eei kub vwaab txn . he-lotq Navq naaiq nx taij naaiq teij fu'Jweiq ei ninb naaig samj Leij Eei tomb finb scv pwatg Leij Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog funj taaib .
40002017	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib txij Revg uaq taub trug waag myenb , ye-le-mi , Eei waag . ye-le-mi kxvq ,
40002018	“ haid myenb yem uaq laa-maa zivb Byrub Byrub puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq . laa-sen Eyemq ninb Eei fu'Jweiq , ninb yaag maiq lovg haiq taub Tevj ninb Jaiq Raub , weig zu'g ninb Eei fu'Jweiq taig mig a'q . ”
40002019	he-lotq huvb taig mig a'q . yem i-yipq teib puv maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib poj Beij yo-sepq .
40002020	finb myenb kxvq , “ Jiad sin taaib , txb uaq taub fu'Jweiq Zauj Jyenq fu'Jweiq Eei maa Rwrnj i-saa-laa-en teib puv a'q og . weig zu'g xij hxig naaiq taub fu'Jweiq Eei mcvg uaq teij taig Revg mig a'q . ”
40002021	yo-sepq zyrug Jiad sin txb Jyenq fu'Jweiq Zauj fu'Jweiq Eei maa Rwrnj i-saa-laa-en teib puv a'q .
40002022	mq paag haid kxvq aan-Ke-laa-atg Ripg ninb Eei tia , he-lotq , zruj yu-Dia scvq Eei huvb , yo-sepq zyrug kamb Riaj maiq mivb uaq a'q . Tinb huvb yaag poj Beij tonq yo-sepq , yo-sepq Bua zyrug mivb kaa-li-li scvq ,
40002023	yem nxm muvq Buaj heug naa-saa-letq . naaiq teij Jauq Zwrtq taaib txij Revg trug waag myenb Eei waag . uaq teij trug waag myenb kxvq , “ myenb xij heug ninb zruj naa-saa-letq myenb . ”
40003001	zyavb hog Tauj , Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han mivb uaq yu-Dia teib puvb Waav zunb tod .
40003002	ninb kxvq , “ xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid , weig zu'g Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q . ”
40003003	trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , kxvq Eei , se tovb naaiq taub yo-han a'q . i-saa-yaa kxvq , “ maaib laanb myenb yem teib puvb Waav heug Jyenq kxvq , ‘ xij zu'g liug leid zyruq Eei Jauq . ninb Eei Jauq xij zu'g Kxi za'g Eei . ’ ”
40003004	yo-han zu'q Eei lwib hruj lovg lxb Txb pyei Datq taaib , yaag lovg Dopg Laav sai Jyenq Jaaiq . ninb Eang Eei ka'naaiq se Jopg Eeig Zauj lomg Eei mweib txvb .
40003005	myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Zauj kxmj yu-Dia scvq Zauj Jx-Dcn Daaib Len yetg zuvq hxvg zavg Eei txvj , Zwrtq mivb lxd yo-han .
40003006	ninb Bua Eyemg ninb Bua Eei zwid , yo-han zyrug yem uaq Jx-Dcn Daaib Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid .
40003007	yo-han pwatg faa-li-sij myenb Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ninb , xij Jiaj uam Eei leid zyrug kxvq ninb Bua . ninb kxvq , “ meib Bua naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b ! Tinb huvb tivg zwid Eei zyavb hog xij Tauj . haiq taub Kwinj meib Bua pyauj Dutq ?
40003008	meib Bua zruj sig xij zu'g pun Ziv meib Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid .
40003009	yaag maiq tuvq yem Hruq Namq , ‘ yia Bua maaib apg-laa-ham zruj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij . ’ yia Buaj meib Bua , Tinb huvb zuvq haib zx'q naaiq teij la'pyeiq zruj penj apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun . ’
40003010	ib zang Beng zyavj pruq , zuvq an Jyenq Dyavb kxn . haiq tiub Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq Kuq , xij zu'g kxij kwavg puaq trud mivb .
40003011	“ yia lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid , pun Ziv meib Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid . mq paag yia taaib Daavg , cvj maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib . ninb zruj kaub Lo yia . yia zuvq maiq Pwij Tevj ninb Nevj heb . ninb xij lovg sivj livb yaag lovg trud Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid .
40003012	ninb Eei puad nanq Jyenq ka'naaib Zenq , xij fyruj Revg ninb Eei Bx'q Byaub Zyavq yaag syru ninb Eei Byaub tapq lamd . mq paag Zu'g mauj ninb xij lovg yetg liud maiq haib taig Eei trud puaq Jyenq . ”
40003013	uaq zang ye-su yem kaa-li-li mivb Jx-Dcn Daaib , xij yo-han Tevj ninb Jiaj uam Eei leid .
40003014	mq paag yo-han xij ye-su kxiq za'eij , ninb zyrug kxvq , “ hxpg zu'g meib Tevj yia Jiaj leid , mq paag meib taaib lxd yia ? ”
40003015	ye-su tau yo-han , “ meib kunq Tevj yia a'q . Bua Navq naaiq zruj , se zruj tu'q hxpg Revg ei Tinb huvb xij Bua zruj Eei . ” yo-han zyrug Tevj a'q .
40003016	ye-su Jiaj leid yem uam yetq Zwrtq taaib uaq zang , luvb zyrug Gxi . ye-su pwatg Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb Fiag taaib Navq nx'g Go nx , yaag Ropg Jyenq ninb .
40003017	maaib Qiaj yem kub vwaaig luvb kxvq , “ naaiq se yia Eei txnb Namq . yia za'kevb a'Neiq haig ninb . ”
40004001	ye-su Jiaj liud uam Eei leid , sivj livb zyrug txb ninb mivb teib puvb Waav zu'g myenq Eei huvb seij .
40004002	feij zyepg Nxi feij zyepg mwrnd ye-su zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg , Hruq zyrug sia a'q .
40004003	myenq Eei huvb zyrug taaib lxd ninb yaag kxvq , “ meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn nx , heug naaiq teij la'pyeiq penj Fuaq taaib maa'b ! ”
40004004	ye-su tau , “ kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ myenb maiq zeid Kuvj Kauj Eang hopq yuvd mcvg Navq , mq paag xij zu'g Kauj Tinb huvb kxvq Eei Jrub Jruj waag . ’ ”
40004005	myenq Eei huvb zyrug txb ye-su mivb Zivb Revg Eei zivb , ye-lu-saa-lem , pun ninb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Lav Jiaj Eei txvj ,
40004006	kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn nx , piu Fiag kaaj . weig zu'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ Tinb huvb xij Paaiq ninb Eei finb myenb kruj Jyenq meib . ninb Bua zyrug lovg puad prub Jyenq meib , maiq pun meib Eei zauj zov zu'g la'pyeiq . ’ ”
40004007	ye-su tau , “ mq paag kivb sru yaag fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ maiq tuvq seij zyruq , meib Eei Tinb huvb . ’ ”
40004008	myenq Eei huvb cvj txb ye-su faauj nxm Lav haig Eei Bov , pun ninb mavg luvb Diaq maang kua'q yaag mavg maang kua'q Eei Favb laavg .
40004009	myenq Eei huvb kxvq , “ sij kxvq meib kweig Fiag paaij yia , yia zyrug zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq pun meib . ”
40004010	ye-su zyrug tau , “ saa-taan aa'b ! pyauj Gxi maa'b ! kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ xij zu'g paaij zyruq , meib Eei Tinb huvb . Kuvj xij zu'g fub suj ninb Du'g taub Navq . ’ ”
40004011	myenq Eei huvb zyav naaig leib Gxi ye-su mig a'q . finb myenb zyrug taaib liug leid ye-su .
40004012	ye-su haid kxvq yo-han zu'g wrnj lob , ninb zyrug mivb kaa-li-li scvq mig a'q .
40004013	ye-su maiq yem naa-saa-letq muvq , ninb mivb yem Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq , kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len , sej-Bu-lun Zauj napq-Taa-li teig Eei kapg Jaaij txvj .
40004014	Navq naaig Zwrtq taaib se weig pun zinb Daavg Tevj Tinb huvb trug waag uaq taub i-saa-yaa Eei waag txij Revg .
40004015	i-saa-yaa kxvq , “ sej-Bu-lun Zauj napq-Taa-li teig , yem uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib , tovb mivb Kxiq uaq tiub Jauq , se Janj yem Eei teib puv , kaa-li-li .
40004016	yem Mwavj ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj , zuvq tu'q pwatg tomb Fav . yem zu'g taig Eei tovb linb ka'Euad uaq teij , maaib Fav Zwrtq taaib ziuj Jyenq ninb Bua . ”
40004017	yavb naaiq mivb ye-su Jiad kxn zunb tod . ninb kxvq , “ xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid . Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxi Tauj fatq a'q . ”
40004018	ye-su yavb Jauq kan kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len mivb , pwatg maaib i muab txn . ninb Bua zruj zx'q Byaud Eei myenb , yem uaq Kxiq pxvd Byaud . maaib taub heug si-mon , cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug pi-te , Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei yrud , an-Daa-lu .
40004019	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua taaib kan yia og . yia xij Faauj meib Bua lxd myenb , Navq ib zang meib Bua lxd Byaud nx . ”
40004020	ninb Bua lyemb zeib kwavg ninb Bua Eei muvd kan Jyenq ye-su mivb a'q .
40004021	ye-su Jiaj mivb teij cvj pwatg sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han . naaiq teij i muad Zauj ninb Bua Eei tia yem uaq Ravq liug leid muvd . ye-su heug ninb Bua taaib .
40004022	ninb Bua lyemb zeib kwavg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei tia , kwavg Jyenq Ravq , kan ye-su mivb a'q .
40004023	ye-su mivb kxmj kaa-li-li scvq , yem ninb Bua Eei wig txvb Faauj myenb , yaag zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj . ninb yaag zxg lovj zwavj myenb Eei Euvb Euvg pcvg .
40004024	ye-su Eei mevb taub siv pwavq si-lia teib puv . myenb zyrug txb yetg zuvq pcvg myenb taaib lxd ye-su , se txb putq Euvb Euvg pcvg Zauj zu'g tiaq mun Eei , zu'g myenq mua'q Eei , putq tuvb Din Eei , Zauj putq pcvb Bai Eei myenb taaib . ye-su yaag zxg lovj ninb Bua .
40004025	myenb Zamq haig kan Jyenq ye-su mivb . maaib teij yem kaa-li-li scvq , maaib teij yem Totq-Bu-li scvq , maaib teij yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , maaib teij yem yu-Dia scvq , cvj maaib teij yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei tov puv mcvj kan Jyenq ye-su mivb .
40005001	ye-su pwatg myenb Dovg naaig Zamq , ninb zyrug faauj nxm Bov mivb zweid Jyenq . ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yaag taaib yem zunq .
40005002	ye-su zyrug Jiad kxn Faauj ninb Bua . ninb kxvq ,
40005003	“ kanb hiuq tu'q kanb Qyemj zu'g Tinb huvb uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g maaib Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb Bua .
40005004	maaib yrub Raub uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g Tinb huvb xij Tevj Jaiq yrub Raub .
40005005	Hruq swrng uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g Tinb huvb lcvd pun Eei , ninb Bua xij tu'q zipq Revg .
40005006	vxg xij zruj hxpg Tinb huvb Eei Hruq uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g Tinb huvb xij pun ninb Bua tu'q pwavq eij .
40005007	Kxb lyenb myenb uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g Tinb huvb xij Kxb lyenb ninb Bua .
40005008	maaib Zivb Revg Eei Hruq uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g ninb Bua xij tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb .
40005009	Kwinj i puv myenb hxpg Hruq taaib maaib pcvb xn uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g Tinb huvb xij Eyemg ninb Bua zruj ninb Eei naamb Erud .
40005010	weig zruj ei Tinb huvb Eei eij zu'g myenb zruj to'g uaq teij , maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g maaib Tinb huvb zruj ninb Bua Eei zyruq kunq ninb Bua .
40005011	“ meib Bua weig yia zu'g myenb kxvq to'g , zruj to'g , zu'g myenb kxvq Euvb Euvg waaig Eei Jauq , meib Bua zyrug maaib Fyenb yrub a'q .
40005012	xij zu'g Fyenb yrub a'Neiq weig zu'g yem uaq Tinb txvb maaib tomb zivb Eeig xij pun meib Bua . zinb Daavg trug waag myenb fib Navq Eei zu'g myenb zruj to'g .
40005013	“ meib Bua se Navq Rauq weig yem paamb myenb Bu'Dovj . mq paag sij kxvq Rauq Eei mweij Twij zaamq mivb , Navq haiq nx nxig tu'q cvj Raaib taaib ? naaiq teij Rauq maiq lamb lovg a'q . xij zu'g toj kwavg pun myenb Zaaiq Navq .
40005014	“ meib Bua se Navq Fav weig ziuj luvb Diaq myenb . yetg nxm zivb yem uaq Bovb nivq maiq haib pivj maiq Bweid myenb .
40005015	yaag maiq maaib myenb tyemq zia'g tav taaib , zx'q Tovq Gopq Jyenq . tav mtaaib ton tav Eei paaib ziuj Fav yetg pyauq myenb .
40005016	meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq tav nx , ziuj luvb Diaq myenb . Navq naaig , ninb Bua tu'q pwatg meib Bua zruj Eei Kuq sig zyrug Taaib meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj .
40005017	“ maiq tuvq Namq yia taaib kwavg mo-se Eei leib latg Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Faauj Eei waag . yia maiq zeid taaib kwavg . yia taaib weig pun yetg zuvq Zwrtq taaib zyen .
40005018	“ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , maaib luvb Zauj Dau Zxg yem Jyenq Eei zyavb hog , leib latg Eei yetg timq yetg wc'g Ravg zuvq maiq haib Dxtq . zuaq Tauj Euvb Euvg tunb yunb Revg .
40005019	“ Navq naaig , haiq taub paamd lyemb faij Jiaj uaq tiub leid , cvj Faauj myenb fib Navq Eei paamd , uaq taub yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q zu'g zruj kaub faij Jiaj . mq paag haiq taub mwavj Revg leid , cvj Faauj myenb fib Navq Eei zruj , uaq taub yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q tu'q zruj Lo .
40005020	yia zyrug Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua xij zu'g kan Tinb huvb kaub lovj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb . maiq zei c'q , meib Bua zuvq maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q .
40005021	“ lob Nxi Faauj myenb naaiq teij waag meib Bua haid Jiaj Eei , ‘ maiq tuvq taij myenb . haiq taub taij myenb xij zu'g tivg zwid . ’
40005022	mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub Qiaj Jiad ninb Eei kxb yrud , zuvq zu'g syemq zwid a'q . haiq taub hemj ninb Eei kxb yrud , ‘ ka'naaib Vovj aa'b ! ’ uaq taub zu'g txb mivb kunq sig wig syemq zwid . haiq taub hemj ninb Eei kxb yrud , ‘ ka'naaib Bua Pi'q , ’ kamb Riaj uaq taub zig tu'q Dxtq teig Eua'g Eei trud .
40005023	“ Navq naaiq nx , sij kxvq meib txb ka'naaiq mivb ziab txvb xij ziag pun Tinb huvb , mq paag Tauj uaq Javj zu'g meib Eei kxb yrud maaib haiq Euvg Zauj meib maiq hxpg ,
40005024	xij zu'g zx'q meib txb mivb Eei ka'naaiq an Jyenq ziab txvb ka'Len , mivb Zauj meib Eei kxb yrud kxvq hxpg . kxvq suv liud Zivj taaib zx'q meib Eei ka'naaiq ziag pun Tinb huvb .
40005025	“ kxvq Navq maaib myenb koj meib , txb meib mivb uaq sig txvb , meib Zauj ninb mivb maiq kcvb Tauj sig txvb , xij zu'g Zauj ninb kxvq hxpg . zuaq Tauj sig txvb , Riaj ninb xij zx'q meib Jiu pun syemq zwid Jyen . syemq zwid Jyen cvj zx'q meib Jiu pun huvb pcv . meib zyrug zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob a'q .
40005026	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib , meib xij zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob zuaq Tauj meib Jaauq suv Revg , maiq Zaa yetg nxm tovb zinb Eei zc'q Zivj tu'q Zwrtq .
40005027	“ meib Bua haid Jiaj lob Nxi Faauj myenb naaiq teij waag , ‘ maiq tuvq Yenj auq Yenj Goj . ’
40005028	mq paag ib zang yia Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub pwatg taub msia'q txn yaag haid hang , se txvj yem Hruq Yenj liud a'q .
40005029	Navq naaig , sij kxvq meib Eei Byaaug puv mziv Duaq meib paamd zwid , xij zu'g kweij kwavg . meib Eei sin waaig favj Zxg kaub lovj meib Eei zyavb sin zu'g Dxtq teig Eua'g .
40005030	kxvq Navq meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad pun meib paamd zwid , xij zu'g Va'q kwavg . zo'g Jia'q puad Zxg kaub lovj meib Eei zyavb sin zu'g Dxtq teig Eua'g .
40005031	“ cvj maaib Jruj waag kxvq , ‘ haiq taub leib ninb Eei auq xij zu'g fiaq zeiq leib Zai sru pun Jyenq ninb . ’
40005032	mq paag ib zang yia Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub leib ninb Eei auq yaag maiq zeid laaij ninb Eei auq Yenj Goj , uaq taub auq cvj mivb lovg syavb Goj , uaq taub lob Goj zruj pun ninb Eei auq penj Yenj Goj Eei myenb . ninb lovg uaq taub syavb Goj yaag penj Yenj auq Eei myenb a'q .
40005033	“ lob Nxi Faauj myenb naaiq teij waag meib Bua yaag haid mig a'q . waag kxvq , ‘ maiq tuvq puvj Dxtq meib lcvd Eei waag . meib yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen lcvd haiq Euvg waag xij zu'g ei Jyenq zruj . ’
40005034	mq paag ib zang yia Buaj meib Bua , maiq tuvq zyavq haiq Euvg lcvd waag . maiq tuvq zyavq Tinb txvb lcvd waag , weig zu'g Tinb txvb se Tinb huvb Eei weig .
40005035	yaag maiq tuvq zyavq Dau , weig zu'g Dau se ninb lxvj zauj Eei txvj . yaag maiq tuvq zyavq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb lcvd waag , weig zu'g naaiq nxm zivb se tomb huvb tiaj Eei zivb .
40005036	lyemb maiq tuvq zyavq meib Eei mGxvq lcvd waag weig zu'g meib maiq haib zruj yetg tiub meib Eei Ba'pyei pc'g fai Jia'q .
40005037	meib Kuvj xij zu'g kxvq za'g zeid fai maiq zeid kauj a'q . cvj kxvq kaub Zamq naaig se yem Ywav x'q uaq taub taaib .
40005038	“ meib Bua haid Jiaj lob Nxi Faauj myenb naaiq Jruj waag , ‘ mziv Jaauq mziv , Eaab Jaauq Eaab . ’
40005039	mq paag ib zang yia kxvq Buaj meib Bua , myenb zruj txvg pun meib , maiq tuvq Jaauq win . sij kxvq maaib myenb Baij meib Eei Byaaug puv Myen , xij zu'g lyemb zaaij mcvj puv Win mivb pun ninb Baij .
40005040	“ sij kxvq maaib taub myenb txb meib mivb sig txvb xij koj lovg meib Eei lwi , lyemb meib Eei tomb lwi yaag xij zu'g pun ninb .
40005041	“ sij kxvq maaib taub myenb zx'q meib fuvj pru , aapq meib Eiaj ninb Eei ka'naaiq yetg ki-lo Jauq , meib xij zu'g Tevj Eiaj mivb i ki-lo .
40005042	“ maaib myenb Tevj meib Toq haiq Euvg , meib xij zu'g pun a'q . maaib myenb xij kaaq meib Eei ka'naaiq lovg , yaag xij zu'g pun ninb lovg .
40005043	“ meib Bua haid Jiaj lob Nxi myenb Faauj naaiq teij waag , ‘ xij zu'g Namq meib Eei kxb yrud , Rxv meib Eei winb wavq . ’
40005044	mq paag ib zang yia kxvq Buaj meib Bua , xij zu'g Namq meib Bua Eei winb wavq . zruj to'g meib Bua uaq teij , xij zu'g Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj .
40005045	meib Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj , meib Bua zyrug penj meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei txn a'q . “ maiq kunq Kuq myenb fai myenb waaig myenb , Tinb huvb yaag pun Ba'Nxi ziuj fib Navq Eei . ninb yaag pun luvb twib Byuvg Tevj zruj lovj zruj waaig Eei myenb tu'q fib Navq .
40005046	“ sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj Namq tovb Namq meib Bua uaq teij myenb Navq , Tinb huvb weig haiq tiug hxpg zu'g pun zivb Eeig meib Bua ? lyemb Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb uaq teij myenb yaag Navq naaiq nx zruj .
40005047	sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj Zauj meib Bua Namq uaq teij myenb kxvq waag Navq , meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg kaub lovj zwavj myenb ? lyemb maiq kcvb hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb uaq teij myenb yaag Navq naaig nx zruj ni !
40005048	“ meib Bua xij zu'g tunb yunb , Navq meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj nx , tunb yunb .
40006001	“ meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim . Tinb huvb xij meib Bua zruj Eei Kuq sig maiq tuvq txv zwavj zruj weig pun myenb pwatg . sij kxvq meib Bua txv zwavj zruj , meib Bua maiq tu'q zipq Tinb txvb tiaj pun Eei zivb Eeig .
40006002	“ uaq Euvg , meib Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb , maiq tuvq hu hu Yaavq Yaavq Eei zruj , Navq peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb yem wig txvb yaag yem Jaaib hxvg zruj , weig xij pun myenb Zev nx . yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , ninb Bua Eei zivb Eeig ninb Bua tu'q zipq liud a'q .
40006003	Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb uaq zang , lyemb maiq tuvq pun meib zua'g Jiaj Eei lob kcv txig hiuq .
40006004	“ Navq naaig , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q meib zruj naaiq teij Jauq , mq paag meib Eei zavg tiaj , tovb mavg tu'q pwatg meib kem Jyenq zruj Eei sig , zyrug pun zivb Eeig meib a'q .
40006005	“ meib Bua haiq zang tauj kauj , maiq tuvq zruj Navq peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb . ninb Bua a'Neiq sruq Jyenq uaq wig txvb yaag sruq uaq Jaaib hxvg Eei Jaub Zaaj tauj kauj weig pun zwavj myenb pwatg . yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , ninb Bua Eei zivb Eeig ninb Bua tu'q zipq liud a'q .
40006006	meib tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog , xij zu'g pia'g ken mivb , kwrn Jyenq kcvb , Zauj meib mavg maiq pwatg Eei zavg tiaj kxvq waag . Navq naaig , meib Eei zavg tiaj , tovb mavg pwatg meib kem Jyenq zruj Eei sig , zyrug pun zivb Eeig meib a'q .
40006007	“ meib Bua tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog , maiq tuvq Paan mivb Pua'q Rwrnj Eei kxvq Navq maiq kcvb hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb uaq teij myenb nx . ninb Bua laaig kxvq waag Zamq Tinb huvb Zivj taaib mwavj tu'q haid ninb Bua tauj kauj Eei waag .
40006008	maiq tuvq Navq ninb Bua nx zruj . meib Bua maiq kcvb Toq , meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj zuvq Jaab Daavg hiuq tu'q meib Bua Qyemj zu'g Eei Euvb Euvg .
40006009	“ meib Bua hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq nx tauj kauj . ‘ yia Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj aa'b ! Toq pun myenb Taaib meib Eei Zivb Revg Buaj .
40006010	Toq pun meib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxi Tauj . Toq pun yem naaiq paamb ken Euvb Euvg ei meib Eei eij Zwrtq taaib , Navq yem Tinb txvb Euvb Euvg ei meib Eei eij Zwrtq taaib nx .
40006011	yia Bua Nxib Nxi Qyemj zu'g Eei Eang hopq , Toq pun kauj ib Nxi Eang .
40006012	Toq kwavg yia Bua zruj Eei zwid , Navq yia Bua kwavg zruj txvg yia Bua uaq teij myenb Eei zwid nx .
40006013	maiq tuvq pun yia Bua pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig , mq paag Fruj yia Bua leib Dutq Ywav x'q uaq taub . weig zu'g meib yetg liud maaib huvb livg , maaib Qa'q , maaib Favb laavg , Tauj maang kruq maang txig . aa-men . ’
40006014	“ sij kxvq myenb txvg meib Bua , meib Bua yaag kwavg pun ninb Bua nx , meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj yaag kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid .
40006015	mq paag myenb txvg meib Bua , meib Bua yaag maiq kwavg nx , meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj yaag maiq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid .
40006016	“ meib Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg uaq zang , maiq tuvq zruj Myen Mwavj Navq peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb zruj . ninb Bua zruj Myen Mwavj Navq Kruq Kruq uaq , xij zwavj myenb zia'q tu'q ninb Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg . yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , ninb Bua Eei zivb Eeig ninb Bua tu'q zipq liud a'q .
40006017	meib Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Eei zyavb hog , xij zu'g Raauj Revg Myen , zx'q yrub Raatq Jyenq Ba'pyei paig suv
40006018	weig maiq pun myenb hiuq tu'q meib zei . Kuvj meib mavg maiq pwatg Eei zavg tiaj hiuq Navq . meib Eei zavg tiaj , tovb mavg tu'q pwatg meib kem Jyenq zruj Eei sig , zyrug pun zivb Eeig meib a'q .
40006019	“ maiq tuvq weig kanb syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem naaiq paamb ken , weig zu'g haib Jiaj syruj Jiaj Rivj Eei . kcv yaag haib vaatg waaig Revg . Janb za'g yaag haib petq pia'g taaib nimg .
40006020	xij zu'g weig kanb syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem uaq Tinb txvb weig zu'g maiq haib Jiaj syruj Jiaj Rivj . kcv yaag maiq haib vaatg waaig . Janb za'g yaag maiq haib petq pia'g taaib nimg .
40006021	meib syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem haiq nxm txvj , meib Eei Hruq haiq zang yaag Javj Jyenq uaq a'q .
40006022	“ mziv peiq sin Eei tav . sij kxvq meib Eei mziv Fav nx , zyavb sin zyrug Fav Revg .
40006023	meib Eei mziv maiq Fav nx , meib Eei sin zyrug Mwavj a'q . Navq naaig , sij kxvq yem meib ka'Euad Eei Fav Mwavj mivb , zyrug za'kevb Mwavj haig a'q .
40006024	“ maiq maaib haiq taub haib zruj tu'q i taub zyruq Eei pru . Navq naaig , ninb xij Rxv naaiq taub , xij Namq uaq taub . maiq zei c'q , ninb xij Taaib naaiq taub , xij mavg Piaj uaq taub . meib Bua maiq haib tovb tavb zruj Tinb huvb Eei pru yaag zruj Eaanb Eei pru .
40006025	“ weig naaiq yia kxvq Buaj meib Bua , maiq tuvq weig yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq Kwrnj Hruq . yaag maiq tuvq weig sin zavg Eei lwib hruj Kwrnj Hruq . mcvg kaub Jaaij Jiaj Eang hopq maiq zeid ? sin yaag kaub Jaaij Jiaj lwib hruj maiq zeid ?
40006026	mavg kaaj , Daij Daamb luvb Eei nx'g ! ninb Bua maiq zwavj haiq Euvg yaag maiq syru tapq lamd . mq paag meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj wij ninb Bua . meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g maiq zeid ?
40006027	meib Bua haiq taub laaij Kwrnj Hruq haib px'q tu'q mcvg Daauq teij ?
40006028	“ meib Bua weig haiq tiug laaij lwib hruj Kwrnj Hruq ? Namq mavg kaaj , lomg Eei pc'g hx'g pyavb Navq haiq nx zyavb ! pyavb maiq zruj kov , maiq pcv swij Datq Dia .
40006029	mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua , lyemb saa-lo-mxn huvb Dovg naaig putq zxib , yaag maiq maaib zxvb zu'q Dovg yetg txq naaiq teij pyavb Rweig .
40006030	lomg Eei miaq ib Nxi zyavb , Fav Nxi Kru Gaai , zu'g trud puaq , mq paag Tinb huvb zxv miaq Rweig . uaq Euvg , Tinb huvb kaub xij zxv meib Bua maiq zeid ? meib Bua syenj tu'q hei haig wei'b !
40006031	“ Navq naaig , maiq tuvq Kwrnj Hruq kxvq , ‘ yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib lxd tu'q Eang lxd tu'q hopq , lxd tu'q lwib hruj zu'q ? ’
40006032	maiq kcvb syenj Tinb huvb uaq teij myenb haiq zang yaag Kuvj lxd naaiq teij ka'naaiq Navq . meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj hiuq tu'q meib Bua Qyemj zu'g lovg naaiq teij ka'naaiq .
40006033	kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj , meib Bua xij zu'g pun Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq meib Bua Daavg , yaag xij zu'g ei Revg ninb Eei eij , naaiq teij yetg zuvq Eei ka'naaiq ninb zyrug Jaa Tipq pun meib Bua .
40006034	weig naaiq meib Bua maiq tuvq Raub Fav Nxi Eei sig . Fav Nxi Eei sig maaib kauj Fav Nxi Raub . mrud Nxi maaib mrud Nxi Eei sig Raub kauj a'q .
40007001	“ maiq tuvq tivg myenb Eei zwid , Tinb huvb zyrug maiq tivg meib Bua Eei zwid ,
40007002	weig zu'g meib Bua Navq haiq nx tivg myenb Eei zwid , Tinb huvb yaag Navq uaq nx tivg meib Bua Eei zwid a'q . meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg Laau pun myenb , Tinb huvb yaag lovg uaq Euvg Laau pun meib Bua .
40007003	“ meib weig haiq tiug pwatg meib Eei kxb yrud Eei mziv maaib la'fapq yaag maiq Namq Tauj meib kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj ?
40007004	kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj , meib fuvg haib Buaj meib Eei kxb yrud , ‘ kxj aag , yia Tevj kxj pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq og . ’
40007005	peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b ! xij zu'g zx'q Zwrtq kanb Eei mziv uaq Ganj Dyavj Daavg Zivj taaib haib mavg tu'q zyen Tevj kxb yrud pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq .
40007006	“ maiq tuvq zx'q Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq pun Juq . kamb Riaj Juq haib taauj sin taaib vaatg meib Bua . yaag maiq tuvq zx'q Jaaij Eei la'pyeib zru zxi pun tuvd . tuvd Kuvj xij Zaaiq waaig Navq .
40007007	“ xij zu'g Toq zyrug tu'q , xij zu'g lxd zyrug pwatg , xij zu'g vcvq kcvb , kcvb zyrug Gxi .
40007008	weig zu'g haiq taub Toq zyrug tu'q , haiq taub lxd zyrug pwatg . haiq taub vcvq kcvb , kcvb zyrug Gxi .
40007009	“ meib Bua haiq taub myenb , ninb Eei txn Toq Fuaq , meib xij pun la'pyeiq ninb fai ?
40007010	txn Toq Byaud , meib xij pun naav ninb fai ?
40007011	meib Bua Dovg naaig waaig Eei myenb zuvq hiuq tu'q pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq , meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj yetg zei xij pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq Toq ninb uaq teij myenb .
40007012	“ meib Bua xij myenb Navq haiq nx zruj pun meib Bua , meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj pun myenb . mo-se Eei leid Zauj trug waag myenb Faauj Eei waag , Rutq zunq kxvq se tovb naaiq a'q .
40007013	“ xij zu'g pia'g hepg uaq taub kcvb , weig zu'g txb myenb mivb zu'g myetg uaq taub kcvb Javq Eei . Jauq yaag Kub yavb Eei . yavb uaq tiub Jauq Eei myenb Zamq haig .
40007014	mq paag pia'g mivb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg uaq taub kcvb se hepg Eei . Jauq yaag a'g tu'q yavb . lxd pwatg uaq tiub Jauq Eei myenb zo'g .
40007015	“ xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq Jaaq trug waag myenb . ninb Bua taaib lxd meib Bua uaq zang , peib zavg Navq pa'ki yuvb , mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq Zyruq Navq Yiab Juq nx .
40007016	meib Bua samj mavg ninb Bua zruj Eei sig meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb Bua a'q . Dyavb Fimq maiq haib zyavb a'vung pyruq . muvq lov Fimq yaag maiq haib zyavb vovb Exj pyruq .
40007017	Dyavj lovj zyavb lovj Eei pyruq . Dyavj maiq penj zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq .
40007018	Dyavj lovj maiq haib zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq . maiq penj Eei Dyavj maiq haib zyavb lovj Eei pyruq .
40007019	haiq tiub Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq penj , zuvq zu'g kxij kwavg puaq trud .
40007020	Navq naaig , meib Bua pwatg ninb Bua zruj Eei sig meib Bua zyrug zia'q tu'q Jaaq trug waag myenb a'q .
40007021	“ heug Jyenq yia , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! zyruq ! ’ uaq teij myenb , maiq zeid taub taub haib tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . Kuvj tovb ei yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei eij zruj uaq teij tu'q pia'g Navq .
40007022	Tauj syemq zwid uaq Nxi myenb Zamq Eei xij Buaj yia , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! zyruq ! yia Bua tevq meib Eei Buaj trug Tinb huvb Eei waag , yaag zung myenq Zwrtq , yaag zruj Jiaj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Zamq . ’
40007023	uaq zang yia xij kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , ‘ yia lyemb maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua nyaa . meib Bua zruj waaig Eei myenb kaanq pyauj Gxi maa'b ! ’
40007024	“ Navq naaiq , haiq taub haid liud yia naaiq teij waag , yaag ei Jyenq zruj , se Navq yetg taub Zovb mevb Eei myenb komq pyauq la'pyeib pcvb kub vwaaig .
40007025	twib tomb Byuvg , uam Lo kwaatq , pxvd tomb Ryaauj pwrng pyauq , pyauq yaag maiq Baav , weig zu'g komq la'pyeib pcvb kub vwaaig .
40007026	“ mq paag haiq taub haid liud yia naaiq teij waag yaag maiq ei Jyenq zruj , zyrug Navq taub myenb Vovj myenb nx . naaiq taub komq pyauq yem saab zyru kub vwaaig .
40007027	twib tomb Byuvg , uam Lo kwaatq , pxvd tomb Ryaauj pwrng pyauq , pyauq zyrug Baav . lomd ! lomd Eei Baav mig a'q . ”
40007028	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig ninb Faauj Eei waag ,
40007029	weig zu'g ninb Faauj maiq Navq ninb Bua Eei Faauj leid finb scv . ninb Eei waag maaib hatg maad haig .
40008001	ye-su yem Bov Fiag taaib uaq zang , maaib myenb Zamq ! Eei kan Jyenq ninb mivb .
40008002	maaib laanb myenb putq komb huq pcvg taaib kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen . ninb kxvq , “ tomb kxj aag , sij kxvq meib xij nx , meib haib zxg lovj yia Eei pcvg . ”
40008003	ye-su suv puad maan Jyenq uaq laanb myenb yaag kxvq , “ yia xij zxg Eei . meib lovj taaib maa'b ! ” uaq laanb myenb Eei pcvg zyrug lyemb zeib lovj mig a'q .
40008004	ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb , “ maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub og . pcv za'g Eei mivb sai myenb uaq pun ninb zaab mavg . mavg liud , xij zu'g ei mo-se fiaq Eei leid txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag pun Tinb huvb weig saaj meib Eei wij , zruj zxvb zevj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg . ”
40008005	ye-su pia'g Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq uaq zang , maaib taub lo-maa pcvb pyeiq taaib lxd ninb , Toq ninb Tevj .
40008006	pcvb pyeiq kxvq , “ tomb kxj aag , yia Eei pru putq pcvb Bai , pweij uaq pyauq , tiaq tu'q Kruq haig . ”
40008007	ye-su kxvq , “ yia xij mivb zxg ninb lovj . ”
40008008	pcvb pyeiq kxvq , “ tomb kxj kanb maiq zu'g mivb a'q . yia maiq Pwij zipq meib pia'g yia Eei pyauq . meib Kuvj kxvq Zwrtq Navq , yia Eei pru zyrug lovj a'q .
40008009	yia kanb yaag yem tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei puab Diaq , yaag maaib pcv Zamq yem yia Eei ka'Diaq mcvj . yia heug naaiq taub mivb , ninb zyrug mivb , heug uaq taub taaib , ninb zyrug taaib . heug yia Eei nrub zruj naaiq , ninb zyrug zruj a'q . ”
40008010	ye-su haid naaiq teij waag ninb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Buaj kan ninb taaib uaq teij myenb , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yia maiq pwatg Jiaj myenb syenj Dovg naaiq lovj . lyemb i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag maiq maaib yetg taub .
40008011	yia yaag Buaj meib Bua , maaib myenb Zamq Eei yem tov puv Zauj fai puv xij taaib yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Zauj apg-laa-ham , i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj .
40008012	mq paag hxpg zu'g penj Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei myenb uaq teij , taauj Rwrnj zu'g zung Zwrtq ka'Eiag Mwavj Eei txvj , yem uaq puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq , vaatg Jyenq Eaab tiaq . ”
40008013	ye-su cvj Buaj pcvb pyeiq , “ kunq Rwrnj pyauq a'q . ei meib syenj Eei , za'kevb xij Navq naaiq nx Zwrtq taaib a'q . ” txij uaq nxm zyavb hog ninb Eei pru zyrug lovj mig a'q .
40008014	ye-su pia'g pi-te Eei pyauq , pwatg pi-te Eei maab tiaq putq pcvg , sin Jxm Eei , pweij Jyenq uaq Zruj .
40008015	ye-su nanq ninb Eei puad , sin zyrug laavb mig a'q . ninb zyrug Jiad sin taaib fub suj ye-su .
40008016	luvb maanb Mwavj , maaib myenb txb zu'g myenq mua'q Eei myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ye-su . ye-su kxvq Du'g Jruj waag Navq zyrug zung myenq Zwrtq Revg mig a'q . taub taub Eei pcvg yaag zxg lovj Revg .
40008017	ninb Navq naaiq zruj weig pun ninb zruj Eei sig Zwrtq taaib txij trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , kxvq Eei waag . i-saa-yaa kxvq , “ ninb Daam yia Bua Eei pcvg Tovj , yaag Teij yia Bua Eei ze'g naang . ”

40008019	uaq zang maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv taaib lxd ye-su . ninb kxvq , “ finb scv aa'b ! maiq kunq finb scv mivb haaij , yia xij kan meib mivb a'q . ”
40008020	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ Yiab Juq maaib Bcvb Kwrtq yem , nx'g yaag maaib laud , mq paag yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , maiq maaib txvj pweij hitq Kwrnj . ”

40008030	maaib yetg tomb kwanb tuvd leib uaq ko teij Eei lxd Eang .
40008031	naaiq teij myenq zyrug Toq ye-su , “ meib zung yia Bua Zwrtq nx , pun yia Bua mivb pia'g uaq kwanb tuvd maa'b ! ”

40009026	naaiq teij fyenj siv pwavq uaq nxm teib puv .
40009027	ye-su Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj mig a'q . kan Jyenq Jauq mivb kau , maaib i taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb kan Jyenq mivb , heug Jyenq kxvq , “ Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b ! Kxb lyenb yia Bua maa'b ! ”

40010001	ye-su heug ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj taaib zunq , Jiu hatg maad pun ninb Bua haib zung Yiab kwaiq myenq Zwrtq yaag haib zxg Euvb Euvg pcvg lovj .
40010002	naaiq teij zyepg Eeig taub kovb zob Eei Buaj se maaib Navq naaiq . ta'yetq taub heug si-mon , cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug pi-te . cvj maaib ninb Eei yrud , an-Daa-lu . maaib sej-Be-Di Eei txn , yaa-kxpg , Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei yrud , yo-han .

40010010	Zwrtq Jauq , maiq zu'g txb Bua'g tapq ka'naaiq , maiq tuvq txb lwib yeng , fai heb , fai pyaab Byaag . kovb myenb hxpg zu'g tu'q ninb Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq .
40010011	“ meib Bua pia'g haiq nxm laavd , haiq nxm muvq , xij zu'g samj mavg kaaj , yem uaq maaib haiq taub Pwij tu'q meib Bua hitq ninb Eei pyauq . hitq haiq taub Eei pyauq , xij zu'g hitq Tauj cvj Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj .
40010012	pia'g pyauq uaq zang , xij zu'g Toq Tinb huvb pun pcvb xn uaq pwrng myenb .
40010013	sij kxvq uaq pwrng myenb a'Neiq zipq meib Bua nx , pun meib Bua Toq Eei pcvb xn yem uaq nxm pyauq . sij kxvq ninb Bua maiq zipq meib Bua nx , xij zu'g syru meib Bua Toq Eei pcvb xn Rwrnj .
40010014	haiq nxm pyauq fai haiq nxm muvq maiq zipq meib Bua fai maiq mwavj meib Bua Eei waag , xij zu'g Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj yaag fevj kua'q zauj Eei niab Buv kwavg uaq .
40010015	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , Tauj syemq zwid uaq Nxi , soj-Dom zivb Zauj ko-mo-laa zivb xij zu'g tivg zwid zuvq kaub hev uaq nxm muvq .
40010016	“ mwavj lovj og . yia Paaiq meib Bua Zwrtq mivb , se Navq puvj pa'ki yuvb pia'g Yiab Juq kwanb ka'Euad nx . meib Bua xij zu'g Navq naav nx kwai . yaag Navq pc'g kopq nx swrng .
40010017	xij zu'g faij fim . myenb xij zx'q meib Bua txb mivb kunq sig wig . yem ninb Bua Eei wig txvb ninb Bua yaag xij lovg pyaab pin Bx'q meib Bua .
40010018	meib Bua laaij yia xij zu'g myenb txb meib Bua mivb yem zuvj Zauj huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen weig Kuq fyenj zruj zxvb zevj pun ninb Bua Zauj Janj mwavj .
40010019	ninb Bua txb mivb zaab naaig uaq zang , maiq tuvq Raub xij zu'g kxvq haiq Euvg fai xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq . Tauj zyavb hog , tovb meib Bua xij zu'g kxvq Eei waag , Tinb huvb xij pun meib Bua kxvq ,
40010020	weig zu'g maiq zeid meib Bua kanb Namq Zwrtq waag kxvq . meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj Eei sivj livb kanb lovg meib Bua kxvq .
40010021	“ muab txn txig , laanb xij zx'q laanb Jiu pun myenb taij . tia yaag xij zx'q ninb Eei fu'Jweiq Jiu pun myenb taij . fu'Jweiq Zauj tiaj maag yaag xij penj win , zyrug Jiu pun myenb taij .
40010022	weig yia , zwavj myenb xij Rxv meib Bua , mq paag haiq taub tiaq tu'q Tauj taaub zyrug tu'q Fruj a'q .
40010023	meib Bua yem yetg nxm muvq zu'g myenb zruj to'g , xij zu'g pyauj mivb kanb nxm muvq . yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua mivb i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei nxmb nxm laavd zruj meib Bua Eei kov maiq kcvb zyavj , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug Tauj a'q .
40010024	“ hx'g scv maiq kaub Lo ninb Eei finb scv . nrub maiq kaub Lo ninb Eei zyruq .
40010025	sij kxvq hx'g scv haib tu'q Navq ninb Eei finb scv , nrub haib tu'q Navq ninb Eei zyruq , xij zu'g pwavq Hruq a'q . sij kxvq pyaub zyruq zu'g myenb heug zruj Be-en-se-Bun myenq , pyauq zov myenb yetg zei xij zu'g myenb heug kaub waaig Jiaj Eei Buaj .
40010026	“ Navq naaig , maiq tuvq kamb Riaj myenb . maiq maaib haiq Euvg kem Jyenq maiq zu'g Zwrtq yaavb . maiq maaib haiq Euvg pivj Jyenq , myenb maiq haib hiuq .
40010027	yia yem Mwavj zov pivj Jyenq Buaj meib Bua Eei sig , meib Bua xij zu'g yem Fav zov kxvq Zwrtq taaib . meib Bua yem mnxmb kxn haid Eei waab sapq , xij zu'g yem uaq pyaub vxb zunb Buaj myenb .
40010028	maiq tuvq kamb Riaj myenb . ninb Bua haib taij sin mq paag maiq haib taij livb wrnb . taauj Rwrnj xij zu'g kamb Riaj Tinb huvb . Tinb huvb haib pun lyemb sin lyemb livb wrnb Dxtq teig Eua'g zu'g myetg .
40010029	i nxm nx'g meij maaig tu'q yetg nxm tovb zinb Navq . mq paag Zwrtq liud meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj Eei eij , yetg nxm nx'g meij maiq Dxtq Fiag Dau .
40010030	lyemb meib Bua Eei Ba'pyei zuvq saauq Revg mig a'q .
40010031	Navq naaig maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g meij Zamq .
40010032	“ haiq taub txv zwavj Eyemg yia , yia yem yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen yaag xij Eyemg uaq taub .
40010033	mq paag haiq taub txv zwavj maiq Eyemg yia , yia yem yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen yaag maiq Eyemg uaq taub .
40010034	“ maiq tuvq Namq yia taaib weig pun paamb ken Taaib pcvb . yia maiq zeid taaib weig pun paamb ken Taaib pcvb , yia txb Ru'g Daauq taaib .
40010035	yia taaib weig pun “ ‘ txn Zauj tia maiq hxpg , sia'q Zauj maa maiq hxpg , Bwavd Zauj maab puag maiq hxpg .
40010036	pyauq zov myenb zyrug penj kanb Eei winb wavq a'q . ’
40010037	“ haiq taub Namq tiaj maag kaub Zamq ninb Namq yia , se maiq Pwij kan yia zruj saib kxj . haiq taub Namq ninb Eei naamb Erud kaub Zamq ninb Namq yia , uaq taub yaag maiq Pwij zruj yia Eei saib kxj .
40010038	haiq taub maiq Daam Jyenq ninb kanb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj kan Jyenq yia mivb , uaq taub maiq Pwij zruj yia Eei saib kxj .
40010039	haiq taub Kuvj xij kruj ninb kanb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug zu'g kwavg ninb Eei mcvg . mq paag haiq taub weig yia kwavg ninb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug tu'q mcvg zyavb a'q .
40010040	“ haiq taub zipq meib Bua , ninb yaag zipq yia . haiq taub zipq yia , ninb yaag zipq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub .
40010041	haiq taub zipq taub trug waag myenb weig zu'g ninb zruj trug waag myenb , uaq taub zyrug tu'q zipq zivb Eeig Navq trug waag myenb zipq Eei zivb Eeig nx . haiq taub zipq Kuq myenb weig zu'g ninb zruj Kuq myenb , uaq taub zyrug tu'q zipq zivb Eeig Navq Kuq myenb zipq nx .
40010042	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub pun Kx'q uamb namj yetg taub naaiq teij faij Jiaj Eei saib kxj hopq weig zu'g ninb zruj yia Eei saib kxj , uaq taub Eei zivb Eeig za'kevb maiq haib Dxtq . ”
40011001	ye-su Faauj liud ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj , ninb Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj mivb kaa-li-li scvq Eei muvq zunb tod Faauj myenb .
40011002	Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Zxg wrnj Jyenq lob uaq zang , ninb haid kxvq ki-tug zruj Eei kov , zyrug Paaiq teij ninb Eei saib kxj mivb
40011003	naaig ye-su , “ meib tovb yo-han kxvq xij taaib uaq taub saa'b ? fai yia Bua Zxg xij zu'g zuaq kanb taub ? ”
40011004	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ Rwrnj mivb kxvq meib Bua haid Eei Zauj pwatg Eei naaiq teij Jaub lrug pun yo-han mwavj og .
40011005	Buaj ninb , mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg , zauj Bai Eei myenb haib yavb Jauq a'q . putq komb huq pcvg uaq teij zxg lovj Revg . mnxmb Duv Eei yaag haib mwavj tu'q haid . taig mivb Eei myenb cvj navb taaib . myenb Jomg myenb yaag tu'q haid Kuq fyenj .
40011006	haiq taub maiq Gemb yia , uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q . ”
40011007	yo-han Eei saib kxj Rwrnj Eei zyavb hog , ye-su kxvq yo-han Eei Jaub lrug Buaj zwavj myenb . ninb kxvq , “ meib Bua mivb teib puvb Waav uaq zang , meib Bua mivb mavg haiq Euvg ? mivb mavg tiub lua'g ti'g kwcvq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng tovd fai ?
40011008	meib Bua mivb mavg haiq Euvg ? mavg taub mJavg txn zu'q Zyrub zu'q tung fai ? zu'q Zyrub zu'q tung Eei myenb yem huvb ting Navq lx'g .
40011009	uaq Euvg , meib Bua Zwrtq mivb xij pwatg haiq Euvg ? xij pwatg taub trug waag myenb zeid Eei saa'b ? zeid Eei . mq paag meib Bua xij pwatg uaq taub , ninb zuvq kaub Lo trug waag myenb .
40011010	yo-han se tovb kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , “ Tinb huvb kxvq , ‘ yia xij Paaiq yia Eei trug fyenj myenb mivb Daavg meib , liud leid meib Eei Jauq . ’
40011011	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , ta'faanb yem myenb Bu'Dovj Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han , kaub Lo Jiaj . mq paag yem Tinb txvb Eei kua'q zruj kaub faij Jiaj uaq taub , ninb Zxg kaub Lo Jiaj yo-han .
40011012	yem naaiq taub yo-han Jiad kxn zunb tod Tauj ib zang , Tinb huvb Eei kua'q zu'g myenb zruj to'g yaag zu'g myenb to'g myenb xij Zaavq .
40011013	Tauj yo-han Eei luvb Diaq , zwavj trug waag myenb Zauj mo-se Eei leib latg yaag kxvq Tinb huvb xij taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Jauq .
40011014	sij kxvq meib Bua Eung syenj uaq teij myenb Tevj Tinb huvb trug taaib Eei waag , yo-han se tovb ninb Bua kxvq xij taaib uaq taub e-li-yaa .
40011015	haiq taub maaib mnxmb xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj og .
40011016	“ yia xij zu'g lovg haiq Euvg peiq ib Jaaj myenb ? ninb Bua se Navq fu'Jweiq zweid Jyenq heib hxvg , naaiq kwanb heug uaq kwanb . ninb Bua kxvq ,
40011017	“ ‘ yia Bua pyomq Laub Dovb nuj , meib Bua yaag maiq Zavj heij . yia Bua paauj pyopq Janb taig Eei Ruv , meib Bua yaag maiq Eyemq . ’
40011018	Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han taaib uaq zang , ninb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg , yaag maiq hopq a'vung tiuq . zwavj myenb kxvq , ‘ maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin . ’
40011019	yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taaib uaq zang , yia Eang yaag hopq . myenb zyrug kxvq , ‘ mavg kaaj , naaiq taub myenb Kuvj mauq Eang hopq Gwin Navq . ninb yaag Zauj Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb zruj txig . ’ mq paag Zwrtq taaib Eei sig pun Ziv Tinb huvb Eei Zovb mevb za'kevb hxpg Eei . ”
40011020	ye-su zyrug Jiad kxn kxvq uaq teij muvq weig zu'g ninb yem uaq teij muvq zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig kaub Zamq Jiaj mq paag myenb maiq Kavq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid .
40011021	ninb kxvq , “ Ko-laa-sin muvq aa'b ! meib xij zu'g Kruq a'q . Betg-sai-Daa muvq aa'b ! meib yaag xij zu'g Kruq a'q . yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj Jiaj uaq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig , sij kxvq yem Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn muvq zruj Zwrtq taaib nx , uaq teij i nxm muvq Eei myenb zuvq pwij Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru , zweid Jyenq saaib Dwi , pun Ziv ninb Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid laub a'q .
40011022	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , Tauj syemq zwid uaq Nxi , Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn muvq zuvq zu'g tivg zwid kaub hev meib Bua .
40011023	Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq aa'b ! meib kanb xij Taaib meib kanb faauj luvb fai ? meib zuvq xij zu'g txb Fiag yemb ken a'q lo'b ! sij kxvq yem meib naaig zruj Jiaj uaq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig yem uaq soj-Dom zivb zruj nx , soj-Dom zivb Zxg haib yem Tauj ib zang .
40011024	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , Tauj syemq zwid uaq Nxi , soj-Dom zivb zuvq zu'g tivg zwid kaub hev meib a'q . ”
40011025	uaq zang ye-su kxvq , “ aa tia , luvb Dau Eei zyruq aa'b ! yia Zev tia weig zu'g naaiq teij sig tia kem Jyenq maiq pun maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb Zauj ho'g Lav Eei myenb hiuq , mq paag tia pun maiq ho'g Lav Eei myenb hiuq .
40011026	aa tia aa'b ! naaiq se zruj tu'q hxpg tia kanb Eei Hruq .
40011027	“ aa tia zx'q Euvb Euvg Jiu pun yia . Zwrtq liud tia , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q txn . Zwrtq liud txn , Zauj txn pun hiuq uaq teij , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q tia . ”
40011028	“ meib Bua haiq taub Kruq Navq Eiaj ka'naaiq Niaq , kunq taaib yia naaiq . yia xij pun meib Bua hitq Kwrnj .
40011029	zx'q yia Eei Dyavb kaad kaad Jyenq , zwrtg yia Eei Euvg , weig zu'g yia Hruq swrng , hxb nxb , meib Bua zyrug tu'q pcvb xn .
40011030	weig zu'g yia pun meib Bua uaq nxm Dyavb kaad Kub kaad Eei . yia pun meib Bua Eiaj Eei ka'naaiq yaag hev . ”
40012001	Ga'haaq maiq navg laub , maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi , ye-su Jiaj myenb Eei Byaub Deig . ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Hruq sia , zyrug nyetq Byaub txq Eang .
40012002	faa-li-sij myenb pwatg zyrug kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ mavg kaaj , meib Eei saib kxj Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj , ninb Bua zruj txvg tivb kov Nxi Eei leid . ”
40012003	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq teij Jauq fai ? Daa-witq huvb Zauj kan ninb uaq teij myenb Hruq sia Eei zyavb hog , ninb Bua Navq haiq nx zruj ?
40012004	Daa-witq pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub zx'q kevj Tinb huvb uaq teij Fuaq Eang . ninb Zauj ninb Eei myenb yaag maiq maaib leid Eang uaq teij Fuaq . Kuvj maaib sai myenb kanb maaib leid Eang Navq .
40012005	meib Bua yaag maiq to'g Jiaj mo-se Eei leib latg fai ? mrud nxm tivb kov Nxi , sai myenb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zruj txvg tivb kov Nxi Eei leid mq paag ninb Bua maiq maaib zwid .
40012006	yia Buaj meib Bua , yem naaiq maaib taub kaub Lo Jiaj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq .
40012007	kivb sru kxvq , ‘ yia xij myenb maaib Hruq Kxb lyenb myenb , maiq zeid xij myenb txb scvb Kuq taaib ziag yia . ’ sij kxvq meib Bua za'kevb mevb pc'g naaiq Jruj waag Eei eij leid , meib Bua maiq zx'q maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb tivg zwid ,
40012008	weig zu'g yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zruj tivb kov Nxi Eei zyruq . ”
40012009	ye-su Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj cvj mivb pia'g nxm wig txvb .
40012010	yem uaq maaib taub myenb maaib Jia'q puad waaig . maaib teij myenb xij lxd Jauq koj ye-su , ninb Bua zyrug naaig kaaj , “ lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg pcvg se txvg Bua Eei leid fai maiq txvg ? ”
40012011	ye-su tau , “ sij kxvq meib Bua haiq taub maaib taub pa'ki yuvb , tivb kov Nxi uaq taub pa'ki yuvb Dxtq Kwrtq mivb , meib Bua maiq zeid mivb zx'q ninb pcv Zwrtq taaib fai ?
40012012	yetg laanb myenb se kaub Jaaij Jiaj yetg taub pa'ki yuvb . Navq naaig , leib latg pun Bua lovg tivb kov Nxi zruj Kuq sig tu'q Eei . ”
40012013	ye-su zyrug kxvq Buaj puad waaig uaq taub myenb , “ suv meib Eei puad Zwrtq taaib maa'b ! ” ninb zyrug suv puad Zwrtq taaib . ninb Eei puad zyrug lovj Revg Navq lovj uaq Jia'q nx .
40012014	faa-li-sij myenb zyrug Zwrtq mivb Zaavb laavb Navq haiq nx haib taij ye-su .
40012015	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx taaq za'eij , ninb zyrug Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj mig a'q . myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq ninb mivb . ye-su yaag zxg lovj Revg taub taub Eei pcvg ,
40012016	cvj hatg ninb Bua maiq tuvq kxvq Buaj myenb ninb tovb haiq taub .
40012017	ninb Navq naaiq nx zruj weig pun sig Zwrtq taaib txij trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , trug taaib Eei waag .
40012018	i-saa-yaa kxvq , “ mavg maa'b ! naaiq se yia Eei pru , tovb yia kinq taaib uaq taub . yia Namq haig ninb . ninb yaag hxpg yia Eei Hruq haig . yia xij zx'q yia Eei sivj livb Zeij pun ninb . ninb xij zunb yia zruj pcvb fim Eei Jauq pun maang fivj mwavj .
40012019	ninb maiq Rcv Jaaj yaag maiq heug Qiaj Bwi , yaag maiq maaib haiq taub haid ninb yem Jaaib hxvg Eei Qiaj .
40012020	lua'g ti'g kwcvq topq mivb , ninb yaag maiq aauq Dutq , tavb Zoq kanj Eei syruj ninb yaag maiq pyomq taig . ninb xij Navq naaiq zruj Jyenq mivb Tauj pcvb fim Eei Jauq hivb .
40012021	maang fivj myenb yaag xij syenj Kauj ninb zyrug maaib lamb Namq txvj a'q . ”
40012022	uaq zang myenb txb taub myenb taaib lxd ye-su . naaiq taub myenb zu'g myenq mua'q ninb mziv mcvb yaag mua'q ninb Vovj , maiq haib kxvq waag . ye-su zyrug zxg lovj taaib , haib kxvq waag a'q . mziv yaag haib mavg tu'q pwatg a'q .
40012023	zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig ye-su zruj Eei sig . laanb naaig laanb , “ naaiq taub kevb Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun fai ni ? ”
40012024	faa-li-sij myenb haid naaiq teij sig , ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb haib zung myenq Zwrtq se laaij ninb lovg myenq Eei huvb , Be-en-se-Bun , Eei livg zung Navq . ”
40012025	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Navq haiq nx Namq , ninb zyrug kxvq , “ haiq nxm kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj Jauq , kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Zauj kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Bx'q Jaaj , uaq nxm kua'q zyrug paaig Revg a'q . haiq nxm muvq fai haiq pyauq myenb maiq tovb Hruq , pun Gxi , naaiq kwanb Zauj uaq kwanb Bx'q Jaaj , zyrug paaig mig a'q .
40012026	Navq naaig , sij kxvq saa-taan zung saa-taan Zwrtq , naaiq pun Ziv ninb Eei kua'q pun Gxi . ninb Eei kua'q Navq haiq nx haib yem tu'q wrnq ?
40012027	meib Bua kxvq yia lovg Be-en-se-Bun myenq Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq . uaq Euvg meib Bua Eei saib kxj ni ? ninb Bua lovg haiq taub Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq ? meib Bua Eei saib kxj zruj Eei sig pun Ziv meib Bua txvg a'q .
40012028	yia Kauj Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb zung myenq Zwrtq . naaiq pun Ziv Tinb huvb taaib yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zyruq a'q .
40012029	“ Navq haiq nx haib pia'g myenb henq myenb Eei pyauq Zaavq ninb Eei ka'naaiq ? xij zu'g Dob Jyenq uaq taub myenb henq myenb Daavg Zivj taaib haib Zaavq tu'q ninb Eei ka'naaiq .
40012030	“ haiq taub maiq kan yia se Zauj yia txib tekg . haiq taub maiq Tevj yia syru zunq , uaq taub zruj pun Raanj Revg mig a'q .
40012031	weig naaiq yia Buaj meib Bua , myenb paamd Eei yetg zuvq zwid , Zauj kxvq Ki Eei yetg zuvq waag , Tinb huvb haib kwavg Revg . mq paag haiq taub kxvq Ki sivj livb , Tinb huvb maiq kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid a'q .
40012032	haiq taub kxvq to'g yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid . mq paag haiq taub kxvq to'g sivj livb , Tinb huvb maiq kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid maiq kunq yem naaiq kitq luvb Diaq fai Ga'haaq uaq kitq luvb Diaq .
40012033	“ sij kxvq Dyavj lovj zyrug zyavb pyruq lovj . maiq penj Eei Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq penj . pwatg haiq Euvg pyruq zyrug hiuq tu'q penj haiq Euvg Dyavj .
40012034	meib Bua naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b ! meib Bua Hruq waaig Eei myenb Navq haiq nx haib kxvq Kuq waag ? weig zu'g Hruq zaavb pwavq haiq Euvg , Rwib zyrug kxvq Zwrtq uaq Euvg a'q .

40012036	“ yia Buaj meib Bua , Tauj syemq zwid uaq Nxi , mrud laanb myenb kxvq Eei Jrub Jruj henb waag , kx'g myenb kanb xij zu'g Daamb txv .

40012040	yo-naa yem tomb Byaud Eei ka'sia pua Nxi pua mwrnd , paamb myenb Eei txn fib Navq Eei xij zu'g yem Daub Diaq pua Nxi pua mwrnd .
40012041	Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi , ni-naa-we myenb xij sruq Jiad taaib koj ib Jaaj myenb , weig zu'g yo-naa mivb zunb tod uaq zang , ninb Bua zuvq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid mig a'q . mavg maa'b ! ib zang yem naaiq Zxg maaib taub kaub Lo Jiaj yo-naa .

40012043	“ Yiab kwaiq myenq yem myenb Eei sin Zwrtq taaib uaq zang ninb yrub Jyenq teib puvb haand mivb lxd txvj hitq . mivb kau , lxd maiq tu'q txvj hitq .
40012044	myenq zyrug kxvq , ‘ aa , yia xij Rwrnj yia Eei lob pyauq yem a'q . ’ ninb zyrug Rwrnj mivb pwatg ninb Eei lob pyauq Pwrtq Fav Revg , Beng suv , henb henb uaq .
40012045	ninb zyrug cvj mivb lxd siag taub myenq kaub Zyruq Jiaj ninb taaib . ninb Bua zyrug pia'g uaq taub myenb Eei sin yem . uaq taub myenb zyrug kaub Kruq zinb Daavg a'q . meib Bua naaiq txig Hruq waaig Eei myenb yaag xij zu'g Navq naaig . ”
40012046	ye-su Zxg Zauj zwavj myenb kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang , ye-su Eei maa Zauj ninb Eei yrud Bua Tauj a'q , sruq ka'Eiag mcvj xij Zauj ye-su kxvq waag .
40012047	maaib taub yem uaq Eei myenb zyrug Buaj ye-su , “ meib Eei maa Zauj meib Eei yrud Bua sruq Jyenq ka'Eiag mcvj , xij Zauj meib kxvq waag . ”
