40014024	txij uaq nxm zyavb hog saib kxj Bua Eei Ravq leib Byenj ko haig a'q . Ravq zu'g uamb laavg myetq mivb myetq taaib Eei , laaij Ryaauj Duvg Jyenq .
40014025	luvb aaq lamb Fav , pua nxm Tauj Ju'q nxm zyavb hog Bu'Dovj , ye-su yavb uamb ming mivb saib kxj Bua uaq .
40014026	saib kxj Bua pwatg ninb yavb uamb ming taaib , ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj ! haig . ninb Bua kxvq , “ aaq , naaiq Janb taig Fxid saa'b ! ” zyrug hc'q ninb Bua waib waid Eei heug .
40014027	ye-su lyemb zeib kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ kunq puvj Hruq maa'b ! se tovb yia , maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . ”
40014028	pi-te zyrug kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! sij kxvq zeid meib nx , heug yia yavb uamb ming mivb meib naaig . ”
40014029	ye-su kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ” pi-te zyrug Zwrtq Ravq yavb uamb ming huvj Jyenq ye-su mivb .
40014030	mq paag pi-te pwatg Ryaauj Lo , hc'q ninb kamb Riaj haig zyrug zemb Jyenq Fiag . ninb heug , “ zyruq aa'b ! zyruq ! Fruj yia maa'b ! ”
40014031	ye-su lyemb zeib suv puad nanq Jyenq ninb yaag kxvq , “ meib syenj tu'q hei haig . meib Eei Hruq weig haiq tiug Buvb Byenq ? ”
40014032	ninb Bua i taub pia'g Ravq . Ryaauj zyav naaig tivb mig a'q .
40014033	yem Ravq uaq teij zyrug paaij ye-su . ninb Bua kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn a'q . ”
40014034	ninb Bua Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn zyrug Tauj ken-ne-saa-letq teig .
40014035	yem uaq nxm txvj myenb zia'q tu'q ye-su zyrug pun waag mivb kxmj uaq nxm hxvg zavg . myenb zyrug txb yetg zuvq pcvg myenb Tauj ye-su uaq
40014036	Toq ye-su pun pcvg myenb Kuvj Lua zu'g ninb Eei lwib Jua'q . haiq taub Lua zu'g , pcvg zyrug lovj mig a'q .
40015001	uaq zang , maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib lxd ye-su zyrug naaig ,
40015002	“ meib Eei saib kxj Bua weig haiq tiug maiq kan Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei eib trub ? ninb Bua maiq ei Jyenq leid Raauj puad Daavg Zivj taaib Eang Naavj . ”
40015003	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug paamd Tinb huvb Eei leib latg , weig kan meib Bua kanb Eei eib trub Navq ?
40015004	Tinb huvb kxvq , ‘ xij zu'g Tovj nimg meib Bua Eei tiaj maag . ’ yaag kxvq , ‘ haiq taub zyruj ninb Eei tia fai maa , xij zu'g taij uaq taub kwavg . ’
40015005	mq paag meib Bua kxvq , ‘ sij kxvq haiq taub myenb kxvq Buaj ninb Eei tia fai ninb Eei maa , “ yia maaib haib Tevj tu'q meib Bua Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq yia fuvj pun Tinb huvb mig a'q , ”
40015006	ninb zyrug maiq zu'g Tovj nimg ninb Eei tiaj maag . meib Bua Navq naaig kan meib Bua Eei eib trub zruj se zruj pun Tinb huvb Eei waag maiq lamb lovg .
40015007	peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b ! i-saa-yaa trug Tinb huvb Eei waag uaq zang ninb kxvq tu'q meib Bua zyen haig a'q . ninb kxvq ,
40015008	‘ naaiq teij myenb lovg Rwib Taaib yia , mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq leib tu'q yia ko haig .
40015009	ninb Bua zavg yia se maiq lamb lovg . ninb Bua zx'q myenb kanb lyepg taaib Eei leid txvj yia Eei leid Faauj . ’ ”
40015010	ye-su heug zwavj myenb taaib zunq zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua mwavj lovj , yaag xij zu'g pia'g Hruq .
40015011	Eang pia'g Rwib Eei ka'naaiq maiq haib pun myenb maaib wij . se tovb yem Rwib Zwrtq Eei pun myenb maaib wij Navq . ”
40015012	saib kxj Bua zyrug taaib Buaj ye-su , “ saib tiaj hiuq Eei fai ? saib tiaj kxvq uaq Jruj waag faa-li-sij myenb Bua'g maiq tu'q . ”
40015013	ye-su tau , “ mrud Euvg ka'naaiq maiq zeid yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj zwavj Eei nx , zuvq xij zu'g pcv Zwrtq Revg .
40015014	sweib ping ninb Bua a'q . ninb Bua zruj txb Jauq Eei myenb mq paag mziv mcvb Eei . sij kxvq mziv mcvb Eei myenb Ken mziv mcvb Eei myenb , i taub zuvq zu'g Dxtq Kwrtq a'q . ”
40015015	pi-te kxvq , “ Toq saib tiaj Pxq mevb naaiq tiub waab peiq pun yia Bua hiuq og . ”
40015016	ye-su kxvq , “ meib Bua Tauj ib zang Zxg Navq uaq teij myenb nx maiq mevb pc'g ?
40015017	meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q fai ? myenb Eang haiq Euvg pia'g Rwib zyrug Fiag ka'sia . Ga'haaq zyrug puvj Zwrtq mig a'q .
40015018	mq paag yem Rwib Zwrtq Eei , se yem Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib . tovb naaiq Euvg a'q , pun myenb maaib wij .
40015019	weig zu'g yem myenb Eei Hruq haib Namq Zwrtq waaig Eei sig , taij myenb , Yenj auq Yenj Goj , Yenj sia'q Yenj txn , zruj za'g , zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj , kxvq to'g myenb .
40015020	tovb naaiq teij sig pun myenb maaib wij . maiq zeid laaij Eang Naavj maiq Raauj puad Daavg myenb Zivj taaib maaib wij . ”
40015021	ye-su Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj cvj mivb Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn zivb Eei teig .
40015022	yem uaq maaib taub Kaa-naa-an msia'q txn taaib heug Jyenq kxvq , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b ! Kxb lyenb yia maa'b ! yia Eei sia'q zu'g myenq mua'q Kruq haig . ”
40015023	mq paag ye-su maiq tau yetg Jruj ninb . saib kxj Bua zyrug taaib Toq ye-su , “ zung ninb pyauj Gxi maa'b ! ninb heug Jyenq kan Jyenq Bua taaib . ”
40015024	ye-su tau , “ Tinb huvb Paaiq yia taaib lxd i-saa-laa-en myenb Navq . ninb Bua se Navq tivj laaib Eei pa'ki yuvb nx . ”
40015025	naaiq taub msia'q txn zyrug kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen yaag kxvq , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! Toq Tevj yia maa'b ! ”
40015026	ye-su tau , “ zx'q fu'Jweiq Eei Naavj zxi pun Juq Eang se maiq hxpg . ”
40015027	uaq taub Janb mwavd tau , “ tomb kxj aag , zeid Eei . mq paag lyemb Juq mtaaib yem ninb Bua Eei zyruq Eei tiab Diaq Raud Naavb Meib Dxtq Eang . ”
40015028	ye-su zyrug tau ninb , “ meib naaiq taub txg za'kevb syenj tu'q lovj haig . ei meib xij lovg Eei , meib zyrug tu'q a'q . ” uaq taub Janb mwavd Eei sia'q txij uaq nxm zyavb hog zyrug lovj mig a'q .
40015029	ye-su Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj , mivb Tauj kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len cvj faauj Bovb aiq zweid Jyenq .
40015030	maaib myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ninb yaag txb Jyenq zauj Bai Eei , mziv mcvb Eei , puab zauj waaig Eei , ka'naaib Vovj maiq haib kxvq waag Eei , cvj Zauj putg pcvg myenb Zamq Eei taaib Tauj ye-su uaq , an Jyenq ye-su Eei zaub Len . ye-su yaag zxg lovj Revg .
40015031	zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig , pwatg ka'naaib Vovj haib kxvq waag . puab zauj waaig Eei myenb yaag lovj mig a'q . zauj Bai Eei myenb haib yavb Jauq a'q . mziv mcvb Eei haib mavg tu'q pwatg . zwavj myenb zyrug Zev i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb .
40015032	ye-su heug ninb Eei saib kxj Bua taaib ninb uaq yaag Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia haid Kxb lyenb haig naaiq teij myenb . ninb Bua taaib Zauj yia yem tu'q pua Nxi a'q . ib zang yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eang . yia maiq xij pun ninb Bua Hruq sia Jyenq Rwrnj . Raub heij Tauj Daamb Jauq mau haig , haib Kiv mq pei . ”
40015033	saib kxj Bua kxvq , “ yem naaiq teib puvb Waav yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib lxd tu'q ka'naaiq kauj wij Dovg naaig Zamq Eei myenb peuq ? ”
40015034	ye-su naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua maaib Bu'ziaj nxm Fuaq ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ maaib siag nxm Fuaq Zauj i ziaj taub Byaub txn Navq . ”
40015035	ye-su zyrug heug zwavj myenb zweid Jyenq uaq Dau .
40015036	ninb zx'q uaq teij siag nxm Fuaq Zauj uaq teij Byaud taaib lcvd zivb Tinb huvb . lcvd zivb liud zyrug mc'q Gxi pun ninb Eei saib kxj . saib kxj Bua cvj txb mivb pun zwavj myenb Eang .
40015037	zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg . Eang liud , saib kxj Bua mivb syru zevg uaq teij tapq pwavq siag nxm Daan .
40015038	Eang Eei myenb , taan mJavg txn Navq , maaib pyei Zin laanb . msia'q txn Zauj fu'Jweiq maiq funj .
40015039	ye-su heug zwavj myenb Rwrnj Revg . ninb zyrug pia'g Ravq mivb maa-kaa-Daan teib puv .
40016001	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb taaib seij ye-su . ninb Bua zyrug Toq ninb zruj nxm Javb hog pun Ziv ninb hxpg Tinb huvb Eei Hruq .
40016002	mq paag ye-su tau , “ Ba'Nxi aaq lamb mwrtq Eei zyavb hog , meib Bua pwatg yavb hxb si'q Zwrtq zyrug kxvq , ‘ Fav Nxi luvb Lxvj aaq lo'b ! ’
40016003	luvb Dxmb Ryruq meib Bua pwatg yavb hxb si'q Zauj Bwrnb Jia'q Zwrtq zyrug kxvq , ‘ ib Nxi haib maaib Byuvb Ryaauj a'q . ’ meib Bua haib samj tu'q Zwrtq luvb Eei setq zeiq mq paag ib Jaaj Eei Javb hog meib Bua samj maiq haib Zwrtq .
40016004	ib Jaaj Eei myenb waaig haig , maaib Yiab Hruq . meib Bua Toq Javb hog mq paag Zwrtq liud yo-naa Eei Javb hog , maiq pun kanb nxm meib Bua mavg a'q . ” ye-su zyrug leib ninb Bua mivb kanb nxm txvj mig a'q .
40016005	saib kxj Bua Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn ninb Bua la'Ku'q , maiq txb Fuaq mivb .
40016006	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ xij zu'g faij fim , Buvb Jyenq faa-li-sij myenb Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Eei pivq . ”
40016007	saib kxj Bua laanb Zauj laanb kxvq , “ saib tiaj Navq naaiq nx kxvq se laaij Bua maiq txb Fuaq taaib . ”
40016008	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Navq haiq nx kxvq zyrug naaig , “ meib Bua syenj tu'q hei haig . weig haiq tiug laanb Zauj laanb kxvq maiq maaib Fuaq ?
40016009	meib Bua Zxg maiq kcvb mevb pc'g ? meib Bua maiq Javj yia zx'q pyaa nxm Fuaq pun pyaa Zin myenb Eang , meib Bua cvj syru zevg Fiag Eei Bu'ziaj Daan ?
40016010	cvj maaib uaq Rung yia lovg siag nxm Fuaq wij pyei Zin taub . zevg Fiag Eei meib Bua syru tu'q Bu'ziaj Daan ?
40016011	meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq mevb pc'g yia maiq zeid kxvq Fuaq . yia kxvq xij zu'g Buvb faa-li-sij Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Eei pivq Navq . ”
40016012	saib kxj Bua zyrug mevb pc'g ye-su maiq zeid kxvq xij zu'g Buvb Yetq Fuaq Eei pivq . xij zu'g Buvb faa-li-sij Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Faauj Eei waag .
40016013	ye-su cvj mivb si-saa-li-yaa fi-lipq-Pxi zivb Eei teib Jaaij . yem uaq ye-su naaig ninb Eei saib kxj , “ myenb kxvq yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , tovb haiq taub ? ”
40016014	ninb Bua tau , “ maaib teij kxvq meib tovb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han . maaib teij kxvq , e-li-yaa . cvj maaib teij kxvq ye-le-mi fai yetg taub trug waag myenb . ”
40016015	ye-su cvj naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua ni ? meib Bua kxvq yia tovb haiq taub ? ”
40016016	si-mon pi-te tau , “ meib tovb ki-tug , zyavb Jyenq uaq taub Tinb huvb Eei txn . ”
40016017	ye-su tau , “ yo-han Eei txn , si-mon , aa'b ! meib kevb xnb lx'g a'q . naaiq maiq zeid haiq taub paamb myenb Buaj meib . se yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj kanb pun meib hiuq Navq .
40016018	yia zyrug Buaj meib , meib se pi-te . yia xij lyepg yia Eei Jiub paav yem naaiq nxm la'pyeiq kub vwaaig . taig Eei Qa'q yetg liud maiq haib hivb Jiub paav .
40016019	yia xij Jiu Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei fxb zeib pun meib . meib yem naaiq luvb Diaq Dob haiq Euvg , yem uaq Tinb txvb uaq Euvg yaag zu'g Dob a'q . meib yem naaiq luvb Diaq puvj haiq Euvg , yem uaq Tinb txvb zyrug puvj uaq Euvg a'q . ”
40016020	ye-su cvj hatg saib kxj Bua maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub ninb zruj ki-tug .
40016021	yem naaig taaib , ye-su Jiad kxn kxvq mevb Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ yia xij zu'g mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , yem myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Eei puab Diaq zu'g syrug Zamb Euvg Kruq . yia zyrug zu'g taij taig mq paag ta'faam Nxi Tinb huvb xij pun yia navb taaib . ”
40016022	pi-te zyrug Ken ye-su mivb Pyen teij Kwinj ninb , “ zyruq aa'b ! Toq Tinb huvb Zinb maang maiq tuvq pun naaiq teij sig Zwrtq . meib yetg liud maiq zu'g pwavb naaiq teij sig . ”
40016023	ye-su Win Rwrnj kxvq pi-te , “ saa-taan aa'b ! pyauj Gxi maa'b ! meib Kuvj laanb Jyenq yia Navq . meib Namq Eei sig se maiq zeid Navq Tinb huvb Namq . se Navq paamb myenb Namq Navq . ”
40016024	ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ haiq taub xij kan yia mivb xij zu'g siaq Jyenq ninb kanb , Daam Jyenq ninb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj kan yia mivb .
40016025	haiq taub Kuvj Namq Fruj ninb kanb Eei mcvg Navq , uaq taub Eei mcvg zyrug zu'g kwavg . mq paag haiq taub weig yia kwavg ninb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug tu'q mcvg zyavb a'q .
40016026	haiq taub tu'q Revg luvb Diaq Eei ka'naaiq , mq paag zu'g kwavg ninb Eei mcvg , ninb tu'q uaq teij ka'naaiq zruj Zwrtq haiq Euvg ? maiq lamb lovg yetg teij . ninb maaib haiq Euvg haib Tiuq tu'q ninb Eei mcvg Rwrnj ?
40016027	weig zu'g yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij yem yia Eei tia Eei Favb laavg ka'Euad yaag Zauj Jyenq yia Eei finb myenb taaib . taaib uaq zang yia ziuj kx'g myenb zruj Eei sig pun zivb Eeig ninb Bua .
40016028	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , sruq Jyenq naaiq Eei myenb maaib teij zuvq maiq kcvb taig zyrug tu'q pwatg yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taaib zruj huvb . ”
40017001	Jiaj liud Ju'q Nxi , ye-su txb Jyenq pi-te , yaa-kxpg Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei yrud , yo-han , faauj nxm Bovb Lav , levb Eei txvj .
40017002	saib kxj Bua mavg Jyenq ye-su uaq zang , pwatg ye-su Tiuq Revg favj zeiq mig a'q . ninb Eei Myen Navq Ba'Nxi nx Fav . ninb Eei lwib hruj yaag Fav haig , Bopq pc'g Eei , zcvb zcvb uaq .
40017003	naaiq teij pua taub saib kxj cvj pwatg mo-se Zauj e-li-yaa hing Zwrtq taaib Zauj ye-su kxvq waag .
40017004	pi-te zyrug kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia Bua yem naaiq kevb lovj haig . sij kxvq zyruq xij nx , yia zruj pua nxm liub . zruj nxm pun meib , zruj nxm pun mo-se , cvj zruj nxm pun e-li-yaa . ”
40017005	pi-te Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang , maaib txq Bwrnj Fav Eei taaib om Jyenq ninb Bua . cvj maaib Qiaj yem uaq Bwrnj kxvq , “ naaiq se yia Eei txnb Namq . yia a'Neiq haig ninb . mwavj ninb maa'b ! ”
40017006	saib kxj Bua haid naaiq teij Qiaj , ninb Bua za'kevb ! kamb Riaj haig , zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau mivb .
40017007	ye-su mivb Lua ninb Bua yaag kxvq , “ Jiad sin taaib , maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . ”
40017008	ninb Bua zyrug Zau Myen mavg , maiq pwatg haiq taub . Kuvj pwatg ye-su yem uaq Navq .
40017009	yem Bov Fiag uaq zang , ye-su nc'g waag saib kxj Bua . ninb kxvq , “ Zinb maang maiq tuvq kxvq naaiq teij hing yaavb Eei sig . zuaq yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taig mivb , Tinb huvb cvj pun yia navb taaib Zivj taaib kxvq . ”
40017010	saib kxj Bua naaig ye-su , “ Faauj leid Eei finb scv weig haiq tiug kxvq e-li-yaa xij zu'g taaib Daavg ? ”
40017011	ye-su tau , “ e-li-yaa za'kevb xij taaib liug leid zyavj Euvb Euvg Navq lod uaq nx .
40017012	mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua , e-li-yaa zuvq taaib liud a'q . myenb yaag zia'q maiq tu'q ninb , sweib eij zruj pun ninb . yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yaag fib Navq Eei xij zu'g myenb zruj to'g hxig . ”
40017013	tovb uaq zang saib kxj Bua Zivj taaib mevb pc'g ye-su kxvq Eei waag kxvq zu'g Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han .
40017014	ninb Bua Rwrnj Tauj zwavj myenb uaq , maaib laanb myenb taaib lxd ye-su , kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen
40017015	yaag kxvq , “ tomb kxj aag , Toq Kxb lyenb yia Eei txn . ninb putq tuvb Din , Zyru tu'q Kruq haig , zanb zang Kiv pia'g trub Raug yaag Dxtq uam .
40017016	yia txb ninb taaib lxd meib Eei saib kxj mq paag ninb Bua maiq haib zxg maiq lovj . ”
40017017	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua ib Jaaj Eei myenb aa'b ! meib Bua za'kevb maiq syenj , mnxmb yaag hod haig . yia xij zu'g Zauj meib Bua yem Dovg haaij laub ? yia xij zu'g Eyend tu'q meib Bua Tauj haiq zang ? txb uaq taub txn taaib yia naaiq maa'b ! ”
40017018	ye-su hatg myenq , myenq zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q . uaq taub txn lyemb zeib lovj Revg mig a'q .
40017019	Ga'haaq saib kxj Bua taaib pivj Jyenq naaig ye-su , “ yia Bua weig haiq tiug zung uaq taub myenq maiq Zwrtq ? ”
40017020	ye-su tau , “ se weig zu'g meib Bua Eei syenj fim faij haig . yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , sij kxvq meib Bua Eei syenj fim lomb yetg nxm laib Jaaij Eim nx , meib Bua haib Buaj naaiq nxm Bov , ‘ yem naaiq swiq mivb yem uaq maa'b ! ’ Bov zyrug swiq a'q . maiq maaib haiq Euvg meib Bua maiq haib zruj .
40017021	mq paag Kuvj maaib Du'g Euvg za'eij Navq haib zung naaiq Euvg myenq Zwrtq . xij zu'g tauj kauj , yaag zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Zivj taaib haib zung tu'q Zwrtq . ”
40017022	saib kxj Bua yetg zuvq taaib kapq zunq yem kaa-li-li scvq uaq zang , ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zuvq xij zu'g Jiu pun myenb .
40017023	ninb Bua xij taij yia , mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi Tinb huvb cvj pun yia navb taaib . ” saib kxj Bua haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug Raub haig .
40017024	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb Tauj Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq uaq zang , syru zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Rrub zinb uaq teij myenb taaib naaig pi-te , “ meib Eei saib tiaj maiq Zwrtq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Rrub zinb fai ? ”
40017025	pi-te tau , “ Zwrtq Eei . ” pi-te pia'g pyauq mivb uaq zang , ye-su zuvq kxvq Daavg mig a'q . ninb naaig , “ si-mon aag , meib Navq haiq nx Namq ? haiq taub xij zu'g Zwrtq laavb zinb Zauj Rrub zinb pun naaiq paamb ken Eei huvb tiaj ? se kanb Eei txn fai pc'g fivj ? ”
40017026	pi-te tau , “ pc'g fivj Zwrtq . ” ye-su kxvq , “ uaq Euvg , ninb kanb Eei txn maiq zu'g Zwrtq .
40017027	mq paag Bua maiq xij zi'g zwid naaiq teij myenb . meib mivb uaq Kxib txn Batg Byaud . Batg tu'q taaub taub Byaud , zyrug mc'q Gxi Byaud Eei Rwib , pwatg nxm zinb , txb mivb pun ninb Bua kauj meib Zauj yia Zwrtq Eei Rrub zinb . ”
40018001	uaq zang saib kxj Bua taaib naaig ye-su , “ yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q , haiq taub tu'q zruj kaub Lo Jiaj ? ”
40018002	ye-su zyrug heug taub fu'Jweiq taaib pun ninb sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Bu'Dovj
40018003	yaag kxvq , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , Zwrtq liud meib Bua kxiq Hruq zyrug Navq fu'Jweiq nx , meib Bua yetg liud maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q .
40018004	haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij Navq naaiq taub fu'Jweiq , yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q tovb naaiq taub zruj Lo Jiaj .
40018005	haiq taub tevq yia Eei Buaj zipq taub fu'Jweiq Navq naaiq taub fu'Jweiq nx , uaq taub yaag zipq yia .
40018006	“ mq paag sij kxvq haiq taub Duaq yetg taub naaiq teij syenj yia Eei fu'Jweib faij paamd zwid , xij zu'g zx'q tomb mxg Diuj Jyenq uaq taub Eei Jaav puvj Fiag Kxiq , Do Eei txvj , zyemj taig kaub lovj .
40018007	laaij Duaq myenb paamd zwid Eei sig , paamb ken zyrug zu'g Kruq a'q . Duaq myenb Eei sig zanb zang xij Zwrtq , mq paag zruj kxn Duaq myenb uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g Kruq a'q .
40018008	“ sij kxvq meib Eei puad fai zauj Duaq meib paamd zwid , xij zu'g Va'q kwavg . waaig teij favj fai zo'g Jia'q puab zauj mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg Zxg kaub lovj maaib i Jia'q puad i Jia'q zauj mq paag zu'g zxi pia'g yetg liud zia'g Jyenq Eei trud .
40018009	sij kxvq meib Eei mziv Duaq meib paamd zwid , xij zu'g kweij kwavg mivb . zo'g nxm mziv mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg Zxg kaub lovj maaib i nxm mziv yaag zu'g zxi pia'g teig Eua'g Eei trud .
40018010	“ xij zu'g faij fim , maiq tuvq mavg Piaj yetg taub naaiq teij faij Eei fu'Jweiq . yia Buaj meib Bua , naaiq teij fu'Jweiq Eei finb myenb yem Tinb txvb , zanb zang yem yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen .
40018011	weig zu'g yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taaib Fruj tivj laaib Eei myenb .
40018012	“ meib Bua Navq haiq nx Namq ? sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb maaib yetg pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb , tivj laaib taub , ninb Navq haiq nx zruj ? ninb maiq zeid kwavg Jyenq uaq teij Juaq zyepg Juaq taub yem uaq Bov Eang miaq , cvj mivb lxd tivj laaib uaq taub fai ?
40018013	yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , lxd pwatg naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb , ninb a'Neiq haig . kaub a'Neiq Jiaj uaq teij Juaq zyepg Juaq taub maiq tivj laaib Eei pa'ki yuvb .
40018014	fib Navq Eei , meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj maiq xij yetg taub naaiq teij faij Eei fu'Jweiq tivj laaib .
40018015	“ sij kxvq meib Eei kxb yrud zruj txvg meib , meib kanb xij zu'g mivb lxd ninb , pivj Jyenq Buaj ninb , ninb zruj txvg Eei sig . sij kxvq ninb mwavj meib Eei waag nx , meib zyrug tu'q ninb cvj zruj kxb yrud .
40018016	sij kxvq ninb maiq mwavj , meib zyrug xij zu'g lxd Jyenq yetg taub fai i taub Zauj meib mivb Tevj mwavj waag zyrug haib zx'q Jrub Jruj waag zruj zxvb zevj .
40018017	sij kxvq uaq taub Zxg maiq mwavj ninb Bua nx , xij zu'g zx'q naaiq teij sig Buaj Revg Jiub paav . ninb Zxg maiq Kavq mwavj Jiub paav nx , xij zu'g funj ninb se Navq maiq syenj Eei myenb fai Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb .
40018018	“ yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , meib Bua yem paamb ken Dob haiq Euvg , yem uaq Tinb txvb uaq Euvg yaag zu'g Dob a'q . meib Bua yem paamb ken puvj haiq Euvg , yem uaq Tinb txvb yaag puvj uaq Euvg a'q .
40018019	“ yia cvj Buaj meib Bua , sij kxvq meib Bua yem naaiq paamb ken maaib i laanb myenb tovb Hruq kapq eij tauj kauj Toq haiq Euvg , yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj zuvq weig meib Bua zruj zyavj Revg .
40018020	weig zu'g maiq kunq yem haiq nxm txvj , maaib i pua laanb myenb tevq yia Eei Buaj kapq zunq , yia zyrug yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj . ”
40018021	pi-te cvj taaib naaig kaaj ye-su , “ zyruq aag , sij kxvq yia Eei kxb yrud zanb zang txvg yia , yia xij zu'g kwavg Bu'ziaj Rung pun ninb ? Tauj siag Rung a'q fai ? ”
40018022	ye-su tau , “ yia maiq zeid kxvq kwavg siag Rung Navq . xij zu'g kwavg Zyetq zyepg Eei siag Rung .
40018023	“ weig zu'g Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb se Navq naaiq . maaib taub huvb tiaj xij Zauj ninb Eei pru funj zc'q .
40018024	funj Jyenq zc'q uaq zang , myenb txb taub pru pia'g taaib . uaq taub pru Qyemj huvb tiaj ziaj pc'q waang nxm zinb ,
40018025	yaag maiq maaib Eaanb Jaauq . huvb tiaj zyrug heug myenb txb uaq taub pru mivb maaig pun myenb zruj nrub . lyemb ninb Eei aub Jweiq Zauj ninb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq txb mivb maaig Revg , taaib Jaauq suv zc'q .
40018026	“ uaq taub pru zyrug kweig Fiag Qa'q Toq ninb , ‘ Toq zyruq sia yia , zuaq yia lxd tu'q taaib , yia kevb xij zu'g Jaauq Tauj suv Revg . ’
40018027	uaq taub pru Eei zyruq Kxb lyenb haig ninb zyrug kwavg ninb Eei zc'q , puvj ninb Rwrnj mig a'q .
40018028	“ naaig taub pru Zwrtq mivb yaag pwavb zu'g taub zruj pru txig . naaiq taub pru Qyemj ninb i ziaj nxm zinb Navq , mq paag ninb lyemb zeib kob Jyenq naaiq taub Eei Jaav yaag kxvq , ‘ kaanq Jaauq meib Qyemj yia Eei zc'q maa'b ! ’
40018029	uaq taub zruj pru txig zyrug kweig Fiag Qa'q Toq ninb , ‘ Toq meib sia yia , yia kevb Jaauq Eei lx'g . ’
40018030	mq paag ninb maiq Kavq , yaag txb uaq taub pru mivb wrnj Jyenq lob zuaq ninb Jaauq suv zc'q .
40018031	“ cvj maaib teij lomb Rxib zruj pru txig pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq , haid Hruq maiq lovj yetg teij , zyrug mivb Buaj ninb Bua Eei zyruq .
40018032	uaq taub pru Eei zyruq zyrug heug ninb taaib yaag kxvq , ‘ meib naaig taub waaig haig Eei nrub kauq aa'b ! meib Qa'q Toq yia , yia zyrug kwavg Revg meib Qyemj yia Eei zc'q .
40018033	meib hxpg zu'g Kxb lyenb meib Eei zruj pru txig Navq yia Kxb lyenb meib nx saa . ’
40018034	ninb Eei zyruq Qiaj Jiad ! haig zyrug heug kunq lob Jyen txb naaiq taub pru mivb zeij Tauj ninb Jaauq suv zc'q . ”
40018035	ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag . “ sij kxvq meib Bua mrud laanb myenb maiq lovg Hruq kwavg kxb yrud zruj txvg meib Bua Eei sig , yia Eei Tinb txvb tiaj yaag fib Navq Eei maiq kwavg pun meib Bua . ”
40019001	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag zyrug Zwrtq kaa-li-li scvq mivb yu-Dia scvq Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib .
40019002	myenb Zamq haig kan Jyenq ye-su mivb , ninb zyrug yem uaq zxg lovj ninb Bua Eei pcvg .
40019003	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb taaib seij ye-su zyrug naaig , “ maiq kunq Goj weig haiq Euvg kxnb pcvj leib ninb Eei auq , se hxpg Bua Eei leid fai ? ”
40019004	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq trug kivb sru fai ? ‘ zinb Daavg Tinb huvb zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang , ninb zeij Zwrtq myenb taaib penj mJavg msia'q . ’
40019005	Tinb huvb yaag kxvq , ‘ weig naaiq mJavg txn txv Jaa , leib ninb Eei tiaj maag , Zauj ninb Eei auq kapq Jyenq . i taub zyrug penj yetg nxm sin mig a'q .
40019006	Navq naaig ninb Bua maiq zeid i taub a'q . penj yetg taub Navq . weig naaiq , Tinb huvb kapq taaib Eei Zaib txij , myenb maiq tuvq Zc'q Gxi . ”
40019007	faa-li-sij myenb cvj naaig ye-su , “ uaq Euvg , mo-se weig haiq tiug Buaj Goj pun zeiq leib Zai sru ninb Eei auq zyrug heug auq mivb a'q ? ”
40019008	ye-su tau , “ se laaij meib Bua Hruq vcvg haig mo-se Zivj taaib pun meib Bua haib leib tu'q meib Bua Eei auq . mq paag zinb Daavg , zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang , maiq zeid Navq naaig .
40019009	yia Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub leib ninb Eei auq , yaag maiq zeid laaij ninb Eei auq Yenj Goj nx , cvj mivb lovg syavb auq , ninb se Yenj auq Navq . ”
40019010	saib kxj Bua kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ sij kxvq lovg auq lovg Goj Eei Jauq Navq naaig nx , yetg liud maiq tuvq lovg kaub lovj . ”
40019011	ye-su tau , “ naaiq teij Faauj Eei waag , maiq zeid taub taub haib ei Jyenq zruj . Kuvj tovb tu'q Tinb huvb Eei en Eei myenb haib ei Jyenq zruj Navq .
40019012	weig zu'g maaib Zamb tiug Jauq pun myenb maiq haib txv Jaa . maaib teij Zwrtq seij zyavb zyrug maiq haib txv Jaa . maaib teij zu'g myenb im toq mivb . maaib teij weig zruj Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei kov maiq txv Jaa . haiq taub haib ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag , xij zu'g ei Jyenq zruj a'q . ”
40019013	maaib teij myenb txb fu'Jweiq taaib lxd ye-su , xij ye-su maan Jyenq ninb Bua , Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj . mq paag saib kxj Bua kxvb hemj naaiq teij myenb .
40019014	ye-su kxvq , “ kunq pun fu'Jweiq taaib lxd yia , maiq tuvq laanb ninb Bua saa . weig zu'g haiq taub lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb , uaq taub se Navq naaiq teij fu'Jweiq nx . ”
40019015	ye-su maan liud naaiq teij fu'Jweiq ninb zyrug mivb mig a'q .
40019016	maaib Rung maaib taub myenb taaib naaig ye-su , “ finb scv aag , yia hxpg zu'g zruj haiq Euvg lovj Eei sig Zivj tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg ? ”
40019017	ye-su tau , “ meib weig haiq tiug naaig yia Tauj lovj Eei sig ? Kuvj maaib Du'g taub lovj Navq . sij kxvq meib xij tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg , xij zu'g ei Jyenq leib latg zruj . ”
40019018	uaq taub naaig , “ haiq teij leib latg ? ” ye-su tau , “ maiq tuvq taij myenb , maiq tuvq Yenj auq , maiq tuvq zruj za'g yaag maiq tuvq zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj .
40019019	xij zu'g Tovj nimg meib Eei tiaj maag , yaag Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx . ”
40019020	uaq taub myenb lunj myenb kxvq , “ naaiq teij yetg zuvq Eei leid yia mwavj Revg a'q . cvj Zaa haiq Euvg xij zu'g zruj fai ? ”
40019021	ye-su Buaj ninb , “ sij kxvq meib xij zruj tunb yunb Eei myenb , xij zu'g mivb maaig Revg meib maaib Eei ka'naaiq , zx'q uaq teij Eaanb pun myenb Jomg myenb . Navq naaiq meib zyrug maaib Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq syru Jyenq uaq Tinb txvb . zruj liud , taaib kan yia og . ”
40019022	uaq taub myenb lunj myenb haid naaiq teij waag , ninb zyav naaig Raub Raub Eei mivb mig a'q , weig zu'g ninb maaib Jaab tivb hod haig .
40019023	ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , putg zxib myenb a'g tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q .
40019024	yia cvj kxvq Rung Buaj meib Bua , lxb Txb Zunj Jiaj simb Bywig Zxg kaub huvb heg putg zxib myenb pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
40019025	saib kxj Bua haid liud naaiq teij waag ninb Bua Bua'g hxvb haig a'q . ninb Bua naaig kaaj , “ uaq Euvg , haiq taub haib tu'q Fruj ? ”
40019026	ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Bua yaag kxvq , “ myenb maiq haib Fruj kanb mq paag maang sig Tinb huvb haib zruj tu'q Eei . ”
40019027	pi-te zyrug kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! yia Bua kwavg Revg Euvb Euvg taaib kan meib . uaq Euvg , yia Bua haib tu'q haiq Euvg ? ”
40019028	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , maaib syavb luvb syavb Dau uaq zang , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zweid Jyenq yia Favb laavg Eei weig Eei zyavb hog , meib Bua kan yia Eei myenb zyrug tu'q zweid Jyenq zyepg Eeig nxm weig syemq uaq teij zyepg Eeig fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb .
40019029	haiq taub weig yia kwavg ninb Eei pyauq , muab txig , tiaj maag , fu'Jweiq fai livb teig , uaq taub kwavg yetg kruq zyrug tu'q yetg pc'q kruq yaag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
40019030	mq paag maaib zruj Lo Eei myenb Zamq xij zu'g zruj faij . zruj faij Eei maaib Zamq yaag tu'q zruj Lo .
40020001	“ Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb se Navq taub a'vung Wivj Eei zyruq nx . luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei , ninb Zwrtq mivb lxd myenb Tevj ninb zruj a'vung Wivj Eei kov .
40020002	Zauj kovb myenb tivg zyavj pun hxpg myenb Prub Tov Zivq yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb , Wivb zyruq zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb uaq Wivj zruj kov .
40020003	“ luvb tomb Dxm Duab nxm zyavb hog , Wivb zyruq cvj mivb uaq hei pwatg teij myenb sruq Jyenq uaq , maiq zruj haiq Euvg .
40020004	ninb zyrug kxvq , ‘ meib Bua yaag mivb yia Eei Wivj zruj kov maa'b ! kovb zinb hxpg zu'g Bu'ziaj yia zyrug pun Bua'g uaq meib Bua . ’ ninb Bua zyrug mivb a'q .
40020005	“ luvb zyavj aanj zyepg Eeig nxm zyavb hog , cvj Zauj Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog , ninb fib Navq Eei lxd myenb zruj kov .
40020006	luvb maanb Mwavj teij , aaq lamb pyaa nxm zyavb hog , Wivb zyruq cvj mivb uaq hei pwatg teij myenb sruq Jyenq uaq . ninb zyrug kxvq , ‘ meib Bua weig haiq tiug zyavb Nxi sruq Jyenq naaig henb henb Eei , maiq zruj haiq Euvg ? ’
40020007	“ ninb Bua tau , ‘ weig zu'g maiq maaib myenb Zivq yia Bua zruj kov . ’ “ Wivb zyruq zyrug kxvq , ‘ uaq Euvg , meib Bua yaag mivb uaq Wivj zruj kov maa'b ! ’
40020008	“ aaq lamb Mwavj , Wivb zyruq Buaj ninb Eei kunq kov myenb , ‘ heug kovb myenb taaib Kxi kovb zinb pun ninb Bua a'q . tovb taaib zruj Ga'haaq uaq teij xij zu'g pun Daavg . taaib Daavg uaq teij xij zu'g pun Ga'haaq . ’
40020009	“ tovb pyaa nxm zyavb hog Zivj tu'q Jiad kxn zruj kov uaq teij tu'q pwavq yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb .
40020010	Navq naaig , Zivq Daavg uaq teij laaig xij tu'q kaub Zamq . mq paag ninb Bua fib Navq Eei tu'q pwavq yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb Navq .
40020011	ninb Bua zipq kovb zinb mivb yaag vopq Wivb zyruq .
40020012	ninb Bua kxvq , ‘ Ga'haaq taaib uaq teij Kuvj zruj Du'g nxm zyavb hog Eei kov Navq nyaa . Eaanb meib Zxg pun Zauj yia Bua fib Bua'g Eei . yia Bua zyavb Nxi zu'g Eutg Pwi yaag zruj kov kaub Kruq ninb Bua . ’
40020013	“ Wivb zyruq zyrug tau taub uaq teij kovb myenb . ‘ yrud aag , yia maiq zeid Pyenj meib lx'g . meib maiq zeid Zauj yia kxvq tivg ziuj kovb Nxi Eei kovb zinb fai ?
40020014	txb Jyenq meib Eei kovb zinb Rwrnj a'q og . Ga'haaq Zivq naaiq taub yia xij pun Zauj meib fib Bua'g .
40020015	yia kanb Eei Eaanb maiq zeid sweib yia kanb lovg ? pwatg yia zruj Hruq lovj meib mweig Jia'q fai ? ’ ”
40020016	ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag . “ Navq naaig , Ga'haaq uaq teij xij tu'q yem uaq Daavg . yem uaq Daavg Eei xij zu'g yem Ga'haaq . ”
40020017	ye-su yavb Jauq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq zang , ninb txb ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj mivb Pyen teij kxvq Buaj ninb Bua ,
40020018	“ mwavj og . Bua mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . Tauj uaq , paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug zu'g Jiu pun sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv . ninb Bua xij tivg taij ninb ,
40020019	Ga'haaq zx'q ninb Jiu pun Janj . Janj zyrug kwatg to'g Jyetq , lovg pyaab pin Bx'q , cvj zx'q ninb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj . mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi , Tinb huvb xij pun ninb navb taaib . ”
40020020	uaq zang sej-Be-Di Eei auq txb ninb Eei i taub txn taaib ye-su uaq , kweig Fiag paaij , Toq yetg Euvg .
40020021	ye-su naaig , “ meib xij lovg haiq Euvg ? ” ninb tau , “ zyruq aag , Toq meib lcvd meib tu'q zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g pun yia Eei i taub txn , yetg taub zweid meib Eei Byaaug mcvj , yetg taub zweid zaaij mcvj . ”
40020022	ye-su tau uaq teij i taub txn , “ meib Bua Toq Eei meib Bua maiq hiuq . meib Bua haib hopq tovb yia xij zu'g hopq uaq nxm zaanq Eei fai ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua haib hopq Eei . ”
40020023	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia hopq Eei zaanq meib Bua za'kevb xij zu'g hopq . mq paag yia maiq maaib leid Paaiq haiq taub zweid yia Eei Byaaug mcvj fai zaaij mcvj . yia Eei tia liug leid zyavj pun haiq taub zweid , uaq teij zyrug tu'q zweid a'q . ”
40020024	uaq teij zyepg taub saib kxj haid liud naaiq teij sig zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig naaiq teij i muad .
40020025	ye-su heug ninb Bua yetg zuvq taaib Rxib yaag kxvq , “ meib Bua hiuq tu'q Janj maaib tomb Jyen kunq ninb Bua . zruj Lo Eei uaq teij maaib livg hatg ninb Bua .
40020026	mq paag meib Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaig . haiq taub xij tu'q zruj Lo , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei pru .
40020027	haiq taub xij zruj Lo Jiaj , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei nrub .
40020028	Navq yia , paamb myenb Eei txn nx , yia maiq zeid taaib xij myenb fub suj yia . yia taaib fub suj myenb yaag siaq yia Eei mcvg weig zua'g myenb Zamq Rwrnj . ”

40023001	Jiaj taaib , ye-su Buaj zwavj myenb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj ,
40023002	“ Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb maaib leid Pxq mevb mo-se Eei leid .
40023003	weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj yaag ei Jyenq ninb Bua Faauj Eei waag zruj . mq paag ninb Bua zruj Eei sig meib Bua maiq tuvq zwrtg , weig zu'g ninb Bua Faauj mq paag maiq ei ninb Bua Faauj Eei waag zruj .
40023004	ninb Bua zx'q Niaq Eei , a'g tu'q Eiaj Eei ka'naaiq Paanj pun myenb Eiaj , mq paag ninb Bua kanb lyemb maiq Kavq lovg yetg nxm puab Do'q Tevj myenb prub .
40023005	“ ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq se weig pun myenb mavg Navq . mavg kaaj , ninb Bua Eei pyxvb Zauj puad tavb Jyenq tapq kivb sru Eei waag uaq Euvg Lapq Dovg haaij Lo ! tivj lwib Jua'q uaq teij Givb Gru Dovg haaij Daauq !
40023006	mivb yinb wig , ninb Bua Kuvj xij zweid Jiaj mcvj puv tiab kxn Navq . pia'g wig txvb yaag xij zweid lovj Jiaj Eei txvj .
40023007	mivb uaq heib hxvg xij myenb zx'q yia'q Taaib ninb Bua , yaag heug ninb Bua zruj ‘ saib tiaj . ’
40023008	“ maiq tuvq pun myenb heug meib Bua zruj ‘ saib tiaj ’ weig zu'g meib Bua yetg zuvq zruj kxb yrud . meib Bua Kuvj maaib Du'g taub saib tiaj Navq .
40023009	maiq tuvq heug yem naaiq paamb ken Eei haiq taub zruj ‘ tia , ’ weig zu'g meib Bua maaib Du'g taub tia Navq . se yem Tinb txvb uaq taub tia .
40023010	yaag maiq tuvq pun myenb heug meib Bua zruj ‘ pyeiq zeiq , ’ weig zu'g meib Bua maaib Du'g taub pyeiq zeiq Navq , tovb yia , ki-tug .
40023011	“ meib Bua haiq taub zruj Lo Jiaj , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei pru .
40023012	haiq taub Taaib kanb zruj Lo , Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj faij . haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij , Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj Lo .
40023013	“ meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua txv Jyenq myenb Eei Myen kwrn pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q uaq taub kcvb . meib Bua kanb maiq pia'g . myenb xij pia'g meib Bua yaag tavq Jyenq maiq pun pia'g .
40023014	meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua Duaq aub kwaaq Eei Jaab tivb Eang , yaag tu'g eij tauj kauj Daauq Eei Duaq myenb . weig naaiq meib Bua zuvq zu'g tivg zwid kaub Niaq Jiaj .
40023015	“ meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua Jiaj Kxiq Jiaj kua'q weig lxd tu'q Du'g laanb myenb taaib pia'g meib Bua . pia'g liud , meib Bua zruj pun ninb xij zu'g Dxtq teig Eua'g kaub Zamq meib Bua i kruq .
40023016	“ meib Bua txb Jauq Eei mziv mcvb myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua kxvq , ‘ haiq taub zyavq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq lcvd waag , maiq ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj , maiq penj haiq Euvg . mq paag haiq taub zyavq Jyenq zxv zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq teij Jyem , zuvq xij zu'g ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj . ’
40023017	“ mziv mcvb Eei ka'naaib Vovj aa'b ! haiq Euvg kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj ? Jyem fai pun Jyem Zivb Revg uaq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ?
40023018	meib Bua yaag kxvq , ‘ haiq taub zyavq Jyenq ziab txvb lcvd waag yaag maiq ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj , maiq penj haiq Euvg . mq paag haiq taub zyavq an ziab txvb kub vwaaig uaq teij ziag Eei ka'naaiq lcvd nx , zuvq xij zu'g ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj . ’
40023019	mziv mcvb Eei myenb aa'b ! haiq Euvg kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj ? ziag Eei ka'naaiq fai ziab txvb ? se ziab txvb pun ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zivb Revg .
40023020	Navq naaig , haiq taub zyavq Jyenq ziab txvb lcvd waag , ninb zuvq zyavq Jyenq ziab txvb Zauj an ziab txvb kub vwaaig uaq teij ziag Eei ka'naaiq yetg zuvq .
40023021	haiq taub zyavq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq lcvd waag , ninb zuvq zyavq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj yem pyauq ka'Euad uaq taub Tinb huvb lcvd waag .
40023022	haiq taub zyavq Jyenq Tinb txvb lcvd waag , ninb zuvq zyavq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei weig yaag zyavq Jyenq zweid weig uaq taub Tinb huvb lcvd waag .
40023023	“ meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua txb pc'g Zitq , Tovb hau Zauj yenb si zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq fovg hxg Tinb huvb . leib latg Faauj kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj Eei leid se xij zu'g zruj pcvb fim , xij zu'g Kxb lyenb myenb , xij zu'g zruj Hruq zivj , mq paag meib Bua maiq zruj . meib Bua hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq zruj , yaag xij zu'g maiq tuvq la'Ku'q zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq ka'naaiq fovg hxg Tinb huvb .
40023024	meib Bua txb Jauq Eei mziv mcvb myenb aa'b ! yem meib Bua hopq Eei ka'naaiq , faij Jiaj Eei kcv meib Bua lrug Zwrtq mig a'q . mq paag lxb Txb meib Bua na'q tu'q Fiag Eei .
40023025	“ meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua Raauj meib Bua Eei Rxmg yenq , Kuvj Raauj ka'Eiag Revg Navq . mq paag ka'Euad zaavb pwavq Revg meib Bua Zaavq taaib mauq taaib Eei ka'naaiq .
40023026	“ mziv mcvb Eei faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! Raauj Rxmg yenq xij zu'g Raauj Revg ka'Euad Daavg . lyemb ka'Eiag zyrug Revg mig a'q .
40023027	“ meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua se Navq Raatq Jyenq Wib pc'g Eei Janb taig zruq nx . pwatg ka'Eiag Rweig Eei , mq paag ka'Euad maaib Janb taig Eei Buvq Zauj Euvb Euvg laib Lopq Eei ka'naaiq pwavq Revg .
40023028	meib Bua fib Navq Eei . myenb pwatg meib Bua se Navq Kuq myenb mq paag meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq , maaib zwid pwavq Revg .
40023029	“ peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . trug waag myenb taig mivb , meib Bua Zeij tu'q ninb Bua Eei zruq lovj haig . Kuq myenb Eei zruq meib Bua yaag zxv tu'q Rweig .
40023030	meib Bua yaag kxvq , ‘ sij kxvq yia Bua yem yia Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q uaq Jaaj luvb Diaq , yia Bua zuvq maiq Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q taij trug waag myenb . ’
40023031	Navq naaig , meib Bua lcvd meib Bua zruj taij trug waag myenb uaq teij myenb Eei zeib fun .
40023032	uaq Euvg , kunq zruj Jyenq mivb Tauj zruj zyavj Navq meib Eei ovb Taaij zruj nx .
40023033	“ meib Bua naaig teij naav , naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b ! meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib pyauj tu'q Dutq , maiq zu'g tivg zwid Dxtq teig Eua'g ?
40023034	weig naaiq yia xij Paaiq teij trug waag myenb Zauj Zovb mevb Eei myenb Zauj finb scv taaib lxd meib Bua . maaib teij meib Bua xij taij taig . maaib teij meib Bua xij tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj . maaib teij meib Bua xij yem wig txvb ka'Euad lovg pyaab pin Bx'q , cvj zruj to'g pun ninb Bua yetg nxm muvq zung Zwrtq Jiaj yetg nxm muvq .
40023035	Navq naaig , yetg zuvq Kuq myenb zu'g taij taig , naaiq Euvg zwid Dxtq zu'g meib Bua , yem aa-Bcn zu'g taij Tauj Be-le-Ki-yaa Eei txn , sej-Kaa-li-yaa , yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Zivb Revg txvj Zauj ziab txvb Bu'Dovj zu'g meib Bua taij .
40023036	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , ib Jaaj myenb xij zu'g laaij naaiq teij taij myenb Eei sig zu'g tivg zwid .
40023037	“ ye-lu-saa-lem zivb aa'b ! ye-lu-saa-lem zivb ! meib taij trug waag myenb yaag zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig Tinb huvb Paaiq mivb meib naaig Eei myenb . Bu'ziaj Rung yia xij Lxq zunq meib Eei myenb , Navq Jaib Eeid puag txn yem Daatg Diaq nx . mq paag meib maiq Kavq pun yia zruj .
40023038	mavg maa'b ! meib Eei pyauq zuvq zu'g kwavg penj pyaub Waav .
40023039	yia Buaj meib Bua , yem naaiq mivb meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia . zuaq meib Bua kxvq , ‘ Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub ’
40024001	ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zwrtq taaib , yavb Jyenq Jauq mivb uaq zang , saib kxj Bua taaib nu'q Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyaub Len uaq teij pyauq heug ninb mavg .
40024002	ye-su kxvq , “ meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij pyauq Eei saa'b ? yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , maaib nxm Nxi yetg zuvq xij zu'g Zc'q Revg . maiq maaib yetg Kwaaiq la'pyeiq lapq Jyenq a'q . ”
40024003	ye-su zweid Jyenq ka'lanq Bov uaq zang , saib kxj Bua kanb levg Jeiq taaib naaig ninb , “ Toq Buaj yia Bua og . naaiq teij sig haiq zang xij Zwrtq ? maaib haiq Euvg Javb hog xij pun Ziv meib cvj xij taaib yaag pun Ziv paamb ken Eei setq mweid xij Tauj ? ”
40024004	ye-su tau , “ xij zu'g faij fim , maiq tuvq mwavj haiq taub Duaq meib Bua .
40024005	maaib myenb Zamq Eei xij lovg yia Eei Buaj taaib kxvq , ‘ yia se tovb ki-tug uaq taub a'q . ’ ninb Bua zyrug Duaq myenb Zamq .
40024006	Tauj uaq zang meib Bua tu'q haid myenb Bx'q tomb Jaaj yaag haid Bx'q tomb Jaaj Eei fyenj , mq paag meib Bua maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . naaiq teij sig Dovg haaij xij zu'g Zwrtq , mq paag setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g maiq kcvb Tauj .
40024007	naaiq fivj xij Zauj uaq fivj Bx'q Jaaj . naaiq nxm kua'q xij Zauj uaq nxm kua'q Bx'q tomb Jaaj . maaib teij txvj xij zu'g vxg Naavj , maaib teij txvj Dau tovd .
40024008	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib pun Ziv setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g Jiad kxn Zwrtq .
40024009	“ Tauj uaq zang meib Bua zyrug zu'g zx'q Jiu pun myenb zruj to'g yaag taij kwavg . laaij yia , maang fivj xij Rxv meib Bua .
40024010	uaq zang myenb Zamq xij Zwrtq , maiq syenj yia . laanb xij zx'q laanb Jiu pun winb wavq . laanb yaag xij Rxv laanb .
40024011	cvj maaib Jaaq trug waag myenb Zamq Eei Zwrtq taaib Duaq myenb Zamq .
40024012	Ywav x'q Eei sig xij faanq , myenb Zamq Eei Hruq zyrug namj Jyenq Fiag , maiq Namq myenb yaag maiq Namq Tinb huvb .
40024013	mq paag haiq taub tiaq tu'q Tauj taaub Tauj mweid , uaq taub zyrug tu'q Fruj a'q .
40024014	Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj zuvq xij zunb pwavq luvb Diaq weig zruj zxvb zevj pun maang fivj hiuq . Ga'haaq , setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g zyrug Tauj a'q .
40024015	“ meib Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg trug waag myenb , Daa-ni-en , kxvq Jiaj Eei sig Zwrtq . maaib zruj pun Euvb Euvg waaig uaq taub tomb Yiab yruj yem Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei txvj , ( to'g sru Eei myenb xij zu'g mevb pc'g naaiq teij waag ) .
40024016	uaq zang , yem yu-Dia scvq uaq teij xij zu'g pyauj faauj Bov .
40024017	myenb yem pyaub vxb xij zu'g kaanq Fiag , lyemb maiq tuvq pia'g pyauq zx'q haiq Euvg txb mivb .
40024018	yem Deig Eei myenb maiq tuvq Rwrnj pyauq zx'q kanb Eei tomb lwi .
40024019	yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g maaib Jyenq sin Eei , Zauj maaib kub vwaad hopq Exj Eei msia'q txn za'kevb zu'g Kruq a'q .
40024020	meib Bua xij zu'g Toq Tinb huvb , Tauj pyauj Eei zyavb hog maiq tuvq pun txij zu'g tovb ken Nxi fai txij zu'g tivb kov Nxi .
40024021	weig zu'g Tauj uaq zang maaib tomb ze'g naang . yem zeij luvb zeij Dau taaib maiq maaib Jiaj Dovg naaiq Rung syem . yavb naaiq Jiaj yetg liud yaag maiq maaib a'q .
40024022	sij kxvq Tinb huvb maiq pun uaq teij Nxib Eia'g zo'g Fiag teij , maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q mcvg Zwrtq . se weig Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei myenb ninb Zivj taaib xij pun uaq teij Nxib Eia'g zo'g Fiag .
40024023	“ uaq zang , sij kxvq haiq taub Buaj meib Bua , ‘ mavg kaaj , ki-tug yem naaiq ! ’ fai ‘ ki-tug yem uaq ! ’ maiq tuvq syenj .
40024024	weig zu'g maaib myenb kxvq ninb Bua zruj ki-tug mq paag Jaaq Eei , cvj maaib Jaaq trug waag myenb xij Zwrtq taaib . ninb Bua xij zruj tomb Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Duaq myenb . sij kxvq haib Duaq tu'q zu'g nx , ninb Bua xij lyemb Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei myenb Duaq .
40024025	mwavj og . naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia Jaab Daavg Buaj zyavj meib Bua .
40024026	“ Navq naaig , sij kxvq maaib myenb Buaj meib Bua , ‘ mavg maa'b ! ninb yem uaq teib puvb Waav , ’ maiq tuvq Zwrtq mivb lxd . myenb cvj kxvq , ‘ mavg maa'b ! ninb yem pyauq ka'Euad , ’ maiq tuvq syenj .
40024027	weig zu'g pxvd Ba'livg yem tov puv Fapg tavb , Fav mivb Tauj fai puv Navq haiq nx , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , cvj taaib uaq zang yaag xij Navq uaq nx .
40024028	ka'naaib taig yem haaij , tomb Jaavb vovb yaag yem uaq a'q .
40024029	“ uaq teij Nxi Eei ze'g naang yetq Jiaj liud , ‘ Ba'Nxi zyrug Jia'q mivb , Laaj yaag maiq ziuj Fav a'q . zwavj Leij yem uaq luvb xij Dxtq Fiag taaib . yem luvb maaib Qa'q Eei ka'naaiq zuvq zu'g Dang tovd . ’
40024030	“ uaq zang yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , Eei Javb hog xij yem uaq luvb Zwrtq taaib . luvb Diaq maang fivj myenb zyrug puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq . ninb Bua tu'q pwatg yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , maaib Qa'q Zauj tomb Favb laavg yem uaq Bwrnj Fiag taaib .
40024031	maaib Ratg Eei Qiaj Bwi , yia zyrug Paaiq yia Eei finb myenb mivb Tauj pyei puv Ryaauj , yem naaiq puv luvb kxn mivb Tauj uaq puv luvb kxn , syru zunq yia kinq taaib Eei myenb .
40024032	“ meib Bua xij zu'g lovg vovb Exj Dyavj ho'g yetg tiug . pwatg Dyavj Zwrtq Zunj , Gxi nxmb lunj , meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q aaq lamb teij pia'g haag kweij mig a'q .
40024033	fib Navq Eei , meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Zwrtq uaq zang , meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , Tauj fatq a'q , zuvq yem Jyenq kcvb Daavg a'q .
40024034	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , naaiq txig myenb kwei seij maiq kcvb Revg , naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q .
40024035	luvb Dau xij Jiaj Revg , mq paag yia Eei waag yetg liud maiq Jiaj .
40024036	“ uaq nxm Nxi , uaq nxm zyavb hog , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq . lyemb Tinb txvb Eei finb myenb maiq hiuq . txn yaag maiq hiuq . Kuvj zavg tiaj kanb hiuq Navq .
40024037	no-yaa Eei luvb Diaq Navq haiq nx , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , cvj taaib uaq zang yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx .
40024038	Byuvb swib imj maiq kcvb yemj luvb Diaq uaq zang , myenb Eang yaag hopq , puvj sia'q , kxvq auq zruj Zivb Jaa , Tauj no-yaa pia'g Ravq uaq Nxi .
40024039	ninb Bua lyemb maiq hiuq Byuvb swib imj xij yemj Tauj uam kwaatq ninb Bua mivb Revg . yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , cvj taaib uaq zang yaag xij Navq naaig nx .
40024040	uaq zang maaib i laanb myenb yem uaq Deig zruj kov . xij zipq laanb mivb , kwavg laanb yem uaq .
40024041	maaib i taub msia'q txn mxg mc'g . xij zipq taub mivb , kwavg taub yem uaq .
40024042	“ weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g kiv Hruq Buvb Jyenq , weig zu'g meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua Eei zyruq haiq Nxi taaib .
40024043	naaiq meib Bua hiuq tu'q Eei . sij kxvq pyaub zyruq hiuq tu'q luvb mwrnd zang Janb za'g haiq nxm zyavb hog taaib , ninb zyrug kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq , maiq pun Janb za'g pia'g pyauq .
40024044	Navq naaig , meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj , zanb zang zuaq Jyenq , weig zu'g meib Bua lyemb Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug Tauj a'q .
40024045	“ uaq Euvg , haiq taub zruj Hruq zivj , Zovb mevb Eei pru ? uaq taub c'q , zyruq Paaiq kruj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb yaag ziuj zyavb hog zx'q yetg zwavj pru Eei pwrng Eang hopq pun ninb Bua .
40024046	zyruq Rwrnj taaib pwatg naaiq taub pru zruj tu'q zivj , pru zyrug Fyenb yrub a'q .
40024047	yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , zyruq xij pun naaiq taub pru kruj Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq Jaab tivb .
40024048	mq paag sij kxvq uaq taub pru maiq penj , ninb yem Hruq Namq , ‘ aa , yia Eei zyruq maiq kcvb Rwrnj syepq . ’
40024049	ninb zyrug tovd sin Bx'q ninb Eei zruj pru txig yaag Zauj hopq tiuq Gwin Eei myenb Jwavg Eang Jwavg hopq .
40024050	pru Javj maiq zaaig Eei Nxi , Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog , ninb Eei zyruq zyrug Rwrnj taaib a'q .
40024051	zyruq xij tivg ninb Eei zwid Niaq Eei , zung ninb mivb Zauj peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb yem , puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq , vaatg Jyenq Eaab tiaq . ”
40025001	“ Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb uaq zang , peiq zyepg taub sia'g txn prub Jyenq yrub tav Zwrtq mivb zipq syavb laavb nx .
40025002	uaq teij sia'g txn , maaib pyaa taub Vovj , maaib pyaa taub kwai .
40025003	Vovj uaq teij , prub Jyenq tav mivb mq paag maiq txb yrub mivb Buvb .
40025004	kwai uaq teij , prub Jyenq tav cvj zx'q yrub tapq pcvb txb Jyenq mivb .
40025005	uaq teij sia'g txn zuaq laub Eei , maiq pwatg syavb laavb taaib zyrug mFxmb ta'Vatq , zyav naaig mFxmb Revg .
40025006	“ Tauj Daamq mwrnd , maaib Qiaj heug Jyenq kxvq , ‘ syavb laavb Tauj aaq lo'b ! taaib zipq ninb a'q . ’
40025007	“ uaq teij zyepg taub sia'g txn Eia taaib liug leid ninb Bua Eei tav .
40025008	Vovj uaq teij Buaj kwai uaq teij , ‘ Toq pun teij yrub yia Bua . yia Bua Eei tav aaq lamb taig a'q . ’
40025009	“ kwai uaq teij tau , ‘ kamb Riaj yrub maiq kauj pun meib Bua Zauj yia Bua lomb Rxib lovg . meib Bua xij zu'g mivb uaq maaig yrub Eei txvj maaid . ’
40025010	“ Vovj uaq teij sia'g txn zyrug mivb maaid yrub maiq kcvb Rwrnj , syavb laavb Tauj taaib a'q . liug leid zyavj uaq teij pyaa taub zyrug kan Jyenq syavb laavb pia'g mivb Eang Zivb Jaab Naavj . kcvb zyrug kwrn Jyenq a'q .
40025011	“ Ga'haaq Vovj uaq teij sia'g txn Tauj taaib zyrug heug , ‘ tomb kxj aag , tomb kxj ! Kxi kcvb pun yia Bua pia'g og . ’
40025012	“ syavb laavb tau , ‘ yia kxvq zyen Eei , yia maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua . ’ ”
40025013	ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag , “ Navq naaig , meib Bua xij zu'g kiv Hruq Buvb Jyenq , weig zu'g meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q uaq nxm Nxi , uaq nxm zyavb hog .
40025014	“ Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb yaag Navq taub myenb xij Zwrtq Jauq mivb ko Eei . ninb zyrug heug ninb Eei pru taaib yaag zx'q ninb Eei Jaab tivb Jiu pun ninb Bua kruj .
40025015	ninb ei kx'g myenb Eei panb zeig pun . maaib taub ninb pun pyaa waang zinb . maaib taub pun i waang zinb . maaib taub pun yetg waang zinb . pun liud , ninb zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb mig a'q .
40025016	tu'q zipq pyaa waang zinb uaq taub lyemb zeib Zwrtq mivb zruj scvb eij cvj zxng tu'q pyaa waang .
40025017	tu'q zipq i waang uaq taub yaag fib Navq Eei zruj , cvj zxng tu'q i waang .
40025018	mq paag tu'q yetg waang uaq taub Zwrtq mivb wetq Kwrtq pyopq Jyenq pivj ninb Eei zyruq Eei Eaanb .
40025019	“ Ga'haaq laub Eei , uaq teij pru Eei zyruq Rwrnj taaib timq mavg ninb Bua Eei zc'g taan .
40025020	tu'q pyaa waang zinb uaq taub cvj txb Jyenq pyaa waang Daaub taaub pun ninb Eei zyruq . ninb kxvq , ‘ zyruq aag , meib pun pyaa waang zinb . mavg kaaj naaiq ! yia cvj zxng tu'q pyaa waang . ’
40025021	“ ninb Eei zyruq kxvq , ‘ lovj a'q . meib se lovj haig , Hruq zivj Eei pru . teij paaq Eaanb Navq meib kruj tu'q Dovg naaig lovj , yia xij pun meib kruj Zamq Eei . kunq pia'g taaib Zauj yia Fyenb yrub maa'b ! ’
40025022	“ tu'q i waang zinb uaq taub pru cvj pia'g taaib kxvq , ‘ zyruq aag , meib pun i waang zinb yia . mavg kaaj naaiq ! yia cvj zxng tu'q i waang . ’
40025023	ninb Eei zyruq kxvq , ‘ lovj haig a'q . meib se lovj haig , Hruq zivj Eei pru . teij paaq Eaanb Navq meib kruj tu'q Dovg naaiq lovj , yia xij pun meib kruj Zamq . kunq pia'g taaib Zauj yia Fyenb yrub a'q . ’
40025024	“ tu'q yetg waang zinb uaq taub pru pia'g taaib kxvq , ‘ zyruq aag , yia hiuq tu'q meib maiq sia haiq taub . meib maiq Dxtq Qa'q zwavj Eei txvj meib yaag tu'q kaatq . tovb meib maiq haad Eim Eei txvj meib yaag tu'q syru .
40025025	yia kamb Riaj haig zyrug mivb wetq Kwrtq pyopq Jyenq meib Eei Eaanb . naaiq ! meib Eei Eaanb a'q . ’
40025026	“ ninb Eei zyruq kxvq , ‘ meib naaig taub waaig haig , lweig haig Eei pru aa'b ! meib hiuq yia maiq Dxtq Qa'q zwavj Eei txvj yia tu'q kaatq ? yia maiq haad Eim Eei txvj yaag tu'q syru ?
40025027	uaq Euvg , meib hxpg zu'g txb yia Eei Eaanb mivb tapq uaq Eaanb lamd . Navq naaig , yia Rwrnj taaib yia tu'q pwrnb zinb yaag tu'q leig zinb Zauj Jyenq nyaa . ’
40025028	“ ‘ zx'q ninb Eei uaq teij Eaanb a'q . cvj pun maaib zyepg nxm uaq taub ,
40025029	weig zu'g haiq taub maaib teij Eei , xij Tipq pun ninb maaib kaub Zamq , ninb zyrug maaib zevg . haiq taub maiq maaib , lyemb ninb maaib teij paaq Eei , zuvq zu'g zx'q mig a'q .
40025030	zx'q naaiq taub maiq lamb lovg Eei pru zxi kwavg ka'Eiag Mwavj Eei txvj mivb . ninb xij zu'g puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq , vaatg Jyenq Eaab tiaq . ’
40025031	“ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn taaib zruj huvb uaq zang , maaib zwavj finb myenb yaag xij Zauj Jyenq taaib . yia yaag xij zweid Jyenq yia Favb laavg Eei weig .
40025032	maang fivj myenb cvj taaib kapq zunq yem yia Eei Ra'Myen . yia zyrug pun Gxi zruj i kwanb , Navq yuvb zyruq pun Gxi ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb nx .
40025033	pa'ki yuvb yem yia Eei Byaaug mcvj , yuvb yem zaaij mcvj .
40025034	“ huvb tiaj zyrug Buaj yem Byaaug mcvj uaq teij myenb , ‘ meib Bua naaiq teij yia Eei tia Zeij fu'q Eei myenb aa'b ! kunq taaib a'q . taaib zipq tovb zinb Daavg zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang Tinb huvb liug leid zyavj pun meib Bua uaq nxm kua'q ,
40025035	weig zu'g yia vxg , meib Bua pun yia Eang . Jaav Gaatq , meib Bua yaag pun uam yia hopq . yia zruj kanb fivj myenb , meib Bua yaag zipq yia yem meib Bua Eei pyauq .
40025036	maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q , meib Bua yaag pun yia maaib zu'q . putq pcvg , meib Bua yaag kruj yia . yia zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob , meib Bua yaag taaib mavg yia . ’
40025037	“ uaq teij Kuq myenb zyrug tau huvb tiaj , ‘ zyruq aag , yia Bua zyavb haaij pwatg meib vxg yaag pun meib Eang ? pwatg meib Jaav Gaatq yaag pun meib hopq ?
40025038	zyavb haaij pwatg meib zruj kanb fivj myenb zyrug zipq meib yem yia Bua Eei pyauq ? fai pwatg meib maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q zyrug pun meib maaib zu'q ?
40025039	yia Bua zyavb haaij pwatg meib putq pcvg fai zu'g wrnj uaq lob yaag mivb mavg meib ? ’
40025040	“ huvb tiaj zyrug tau ninb Bua , ‘ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua zruj pun yetg taub yia Eei kxb yrud , maiq kunq ninb zruj kaub faij Jiaj uaq taub , meib Bua zyrug zruj pun yia a'q . ’
40025041	“ huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj yem zaaij mcvj uaq teij myenb , ‘ zu'g Tinb huvb zyruj Eei myenb aa'b ! simq Gxi yia ! mivb pia'g liug leid zyavj pun myenq Eei huvb Zauj ninb Eei pru yem uaq kwaaj yetg liud maiq taig Eei trud .
40025042	weig zu'g yia vxg , meib Bua maiq pun yia Eang . Jaav Gaatq , meib Bua maiq pun uam yia hopq .
40025043	yia zruj kanb fivj myenb , meib Bua yaag maiq zipq yia pia'g pyauq . yia maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q , meib Bua maiq pun lwib hruj yia zu'q . yia putq pcvg fai zu'g wrnj lob , meib Bua yaag maiq mavg yia . ’
40025044	“ ninb Bua zyrug tau ninb , ‘ zyruq aag , yia Bua zyavb haaij pwatg meib vxg fai Jaav Gaatq , fai zruj kanb fivj myenb fai maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q , fai putq pcvg fai zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob yaag maiq Tevj meib ? ’
40025045	“ huvb tiaj zyrug tau , ‘ yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , meib Bua maiq Tevj yetg taub naaiq teij zruj faij Jiaj Eei myenb , meib Bua yaag maiq Tevj yia . ’ ”
40025046	ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag , “ Navq naaig , naaiq teij xij zu'g Zwrtq mivb yetg liud syrug zwid . mq paag Kuq myenb uaq teij zyrug tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg . ”

40026002	“ meib Bua hiuq tu'q maaib i Nxi Navq Tauj siaj mcvg zipq a'q . yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug zu'g zx'q Jiu pun myenb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj . ”
40026003	uaq zang sai myenb pyeiq Zauj pc'g fivj Eei myenb koj kapq zunq yem Kaa-yaa-faatq tomb sai myenb Eei ting ,

40026015	naaig ninb Bua , “ sij kxvq yia zx'q ye-su Jiu pun meib Bua , meib Bua pun haiq Euvg yia ? ” sai myenb pyeiq zyrug saauq faab zyepg nxm lob Nxi Eei zinb pun yu-Daatg .
40026016	yem naaig taaib , yu-Daatg lxd Qavj zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb Bua .
40026017	Jiaj tovb maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq taaub Nxi , saib kxj Bua taaib naaig ye-su , “ saib tiaj xij yia Bua yem haaij Beng siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj pun saib tiaj Eang ? ”
40026018	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua pia'g zivb mivb lxd yetg laanb myenb , yaag Buaj ninb , ‘ saib tiaj kxvq , yia Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q . yia Zauj yia Eei saib kxj xij yem meib Eei pyauq Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq . ’ ”
40026019	saib kxj Bua zyrug ei ye-su Eei waag zruj , mivb Beng siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj .

40026035	pi-te kxvq , “ maiq kunq yia zu'g Zauj saib tiaj taig , yia yetg liud Eyemg , maiq kwavg meib . ” uaq teij saib kxj yetg zuvq yaag fib Navq Eei kxvq .

40026041	xij zu'g kiv Jyenq Hruq tauj kauj , Toq Tinb huvb maiq tuvq pun meib Bua pwavb zu'g seij Hruq Eei sig . meib Bua Eei Hruq xij zruj hxpg , mq paag sin zavg mau haig . ”
40026042	ye-su cvj mivb tauj kauj ta'Eeig Rung . ninb kxvq , “ yia Eei tia aa'b ! sij kxvq naaiq nxm zaanq yia simq maiq Dutq , za'kevb xij zu'g hopq nx , Toq ei tia Eei eij zruj zyavj . ”
40026043	ye-su cvj Rwrnj Tauj saib kxj Bua uaq , pwatg ninb Bua mFxmb mig a'q , weig zu'g mziv Ewij haig , nuvj maiq Gxi .
40026044	ye-su cvj leib ninb Bua , mivb tauj kauj ta'faam Rung , yaag Navq zinb Daavg uaq Rung nx tauj kauj .

40026046	Jiad sin taaib , Bua mivb a'q . mavg kaaj uaq ! maaig yia uaq taub myenb taaib Tauj a'q . ”
40026047	ye-su kxvq waag zuvq maiq kcvb setq , zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub , Buaj heug yu-Daatg , taaib Tauj . cvj maaib sai myenb pyeiq Zauj pc'g fivj Eei myenb koj Paaiq taaib Eei myenb Zamq txb Jyenq Ru'g Daauq , nanq Jyenq Dyavb Donj , kan Jyenq taaib .
40026048	maaig ye-su uaq taub Jaab Daavg Buaj zyavj uaq teij , ninb xij zruj nxm Javb hog pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ye-su . ninb kxvq , “ yia zom haiq taub , se tovb meib Bua xij zx'q uaq taub a'q . kunq zx'q a'q . ”
40026049	yu-Daatg pcv za'g Eei mivb Tauj ye-su uaq yaag kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! pcvb xn Eei saa'b ? ” zyrug zom ninb Eei Myen .
40026050	ye-su kxvq , “ yrud aag , meib xij zruj haiq Euvg kaanq zruj syepq a'q . ” uaq teij myenb zyrug taaib Fiag puad zx'q Jyenq ye-su .
40026051	maaib taub Zauj ye-su yem uaq Eei myenb pcv ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq , Va'q tomb sai myenb Eei nrub , Pai zu'g nrub Eei yetg puv mnxmb Dutq mivb .
40026052	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ zx'q meib Eei Ru'g Daauq Tapq Jyenq Paiq maa'b ! haiq taub lovg Ru'g Daauq , zuvq xij zu'g laaij Ru'g Daauq taig .
40026053	meib maiq hiuq fai ? yia haib Toq yia Eei tia , Du'g tavb Navq ninb zyrug Paaiq finb myenb pcv kaub Zamq zyepg Eeig kwanb taaib Tevj yia .
40026054	mq paag , sij kxvq yia Navq naaig zruj , sig Navq haiq nx haib Zwrtq taaib txij kivb sru fiaq hxpg zu'g Zwrtq Eei waag ? ”

40026057	zx'q ye-su uaq teij myenb txb ninb mivb Tauj Kaa-yaa-faatq tomb sai myenb uaq . maaib Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj myenb koj kapq zunq yem uaq .
40026058	pi-te kan Jyenq mivb mq paag leib ko teij Eei , Tauj tomb sai myenb Eei pyaub Len pia'g laatg ka'Euad . ninb Zauj zuaq pyauq Eei pcv zweid Jyenq uaq , xij mwavj kaaj , naaiq teij sig Navq haiq nx .
40026059	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb lxd Jaaq zxvb zevj koj ye-su weig pun ninb zu'g taij .
40026060	mq paag maiq kunq maaib myenb Zamq taaib zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj , yaag lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg kxnb pcvj koj ninb . zruj kau , maaib i taub Zwrtq taaib
40026061	kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb kxvq , ‘ yia haib Zc'q Revg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq . pua Nxi ka'Euad cvj kanb Zeij Jiad taaib . ’ ”
40026062	tomb sai myenb zyrug sruq Jiad taaib naaig ye-su , “ naaiq teij myenb Navq naaiq nx koj meib , meib maiq tau fai ? ”
40026063	mq paag ye-su maiq Ko lo . tomb sai myenb cvj Buaj ye-su , “ yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei Tinb huvb hatg meib kxvq za'g Buaj yia Bua , meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn , ki-tug , zeid fai maiq zeid ? ”
40026064	ye-su tau , “ se Navq meib kxvq nx . ” mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua , Ga'haaq hivq meib Bua xij pwatg yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zweid Jyenq nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj , yaag yem uaq Bwrnj Fiag taaib . ”
40026065	tomb sai myenb haid naaiq teij waag , zyrug petq ninb kanb Eei lwi yaag kxvq , “ ninb Ki Tinb huvb ! Bua maiq zu'g lxd haiq taub zruj zxvb zevj a'q . meib Bua ib zang zuvq haid ninb Ki Tinb huvb .
40026066	meib Bua Navq haiq nx Namq ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ ninb txvg a'q . zig tu'q taig a'q . ”
40026067	ninb Bua zyrug Twiq uamb Rwib nctq ye-su Eei Myen yaag lovg puab Jwrnb Bx'q . maaib teij lovg puab zaavq Baij ,
40026068	yaag kxvq , “ meib naaig taub ki-tug aa'b ! Zai kaaj ! Buaj yia Bua maa'b ! haiq taub Bx'q meib ? ”
40026069	pi-te zweid Jyenq pyaub Len laatg ka'Euad uaq zang , maaib taub msia'q pru taaib kxvq , “ meib yaag kan uaq taub kaa-li-li myenb , ye-su , maiq zeid ? ”
40026070	mq paag pi-te txv Jyenq zwavj myenb maiq Eyemg . ninb kxvq , “ yia maiq hiuq tu'q meib kxvq haiq Euvg . ”
40026071	kxvq liud , pi-te zyrug mivb Tauj uaq laatg kcvb . cvj maaib taub msia'q pru pwatg ninb zyrug Buaj yem uaq ka'Len Eei myenb , “ naaiq taub myenb yaag kan naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su cj . ”
40026072	pi-te cvj maiq Eyemg . ninb kxvq , “ Druq haiq Euvg yaag Druq tu'q , yia maiq hiuq uaq laanb myenb . ”
40026073	yetg zang Jiaj , sruq Jyenq uaq ka'Len Eei myenb taaib kxvq pi-te , “ zeid Eei . meib kevb yetg taub uaq teij myenb a'q . meib kxvq waag Eei Qiaj pun meib kanb pivj maiq Bweid a'q . ”
40026074	pi-te zyrug cvj Druq Jiad zyruj kxvq , “ yia za'kevb ! maiq hiuq tu'q uaq laanb myenb . ” lyemb zeib Jai Gaaij a'q .
40026075	pi-te Javj zu'g ye-su kxvq Eei waag , “ Jai zuvq maiq kcvb Gaaij , meib maiq Eyemg yia pua Rung . ” pi-te zyrug Zwrtq mivb Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig .
40027001	luvb Dxm Ryruq , zwavj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj kapq zunq Zaavb laavb zyavj Navq haiq nx haib taij ye-su .
40027002	ninb Bua zyrug Dob ye-su , Ken mivb Jiu pun lo-maa zuvj , pi-laatq .
40027003	maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg pwatg ye-su zu'g tivg zwid uaq zang , ninb Hruq mun haig cvj txb uaq teij faab zyepg nxm zinb taaib Twij pun sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj .
40027004	ninb kxvq , “ yia zruj txvg zwid a'q , weig zu'g yia maaig maiq maaib zwid Eei myenb pun ninb zu'g taig . ” uaq teij myenb tau , “ naaig maaib haiq Euvg Paanj Tauj yia Bua ? naaiq meib kanb Eei sig a'q . ”
40027005	yu-Daatg zyrug zxi uaq teij Eaanb kwavg uaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Zwrtq mivb , zyrug mivb Diuj Jaav taig mig a'q .
40027006	sai myenb pyeiq Raud naaiq teij Eaanb taaib kxvq , “ naaiq teij Eaanb se maaid mcvg Eaanb zyrug Navq kua'q Jyenq Ryaamq nx . Zauj Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq teij Eaanb tapq se txvg leid . ”
40027007	ninb Bua zyrug Zaavb laavb taaib lovg naaiq teij Eaanb maaid Rov uaq taub nanq nia zavg Eei Dau , zruj kanb fivj myenb Eei zrub kemb .
40027008	weig naaiq uaq Rov Dau maaib Buaj heug “ maaib Ryaamq Eei Dau ” taaib Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi .
40027009	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib txib tiug trug waag myenb , ye-le-mi , kxvq Eei waag . ye-le-mi kxvq , “ ninb Bua zx'q faab zyepg nxm zinb , tovb i-saa-laa-en myenb weig ninb tivg Eei Jaab zinb ,
40027010	lovg maaid nanq nia zavg Eei Dau , Navq zyruq Buaj yia zruj nx . ”
40027011	uaq zang , ye-su yem pi-laatq zuvj Eei Ra'Myen . pi-laatq naaig ninb , “ meib zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb ? ” ye-su tau , “ zeid Eei . se Navq meib kxvq nx . ”
40027012	mq paag myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq koj ninb uaq zang , ninb maiq tau haiq Euvg .
40027013	pi-laatq zyrug naaig ninb , “ ninb Bua koj meib naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig meib maiq haid fai ? ”
40027014	mq paag ye-su yetg Jruj waag maiq tau ninb . pi-laatq za'kevb Bua'g hxvb haig .
40027015	Havb Havj Tauj siaj mcvg zipq , lo-maa zuvj maaib leid puvj taub wrnj lob Eei myenb ziuj zwavj myenb Toq puvj haiq taub .
40027016	uaq zang maaib taub zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob Eei zwib myenb Buaj heug Baa-lapq-Batg . haiq taub yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Eei .
40027017	zwavj myenb kapq zunq uaq zang , pi-laatq naaig kaaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua xij yia puvj haiq taub ? puvj Baa-lapq-Batg fai puvj ye-su , tovb myenb heug ki-tug uaq taub ? ”
40027018	pi-laatq hiuq tu'q zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb mweig Jia'q ye-su Zivj taaib zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb .
40027019	pi-laatq zweid Jyenq syemq zwid weig uaq zang , ninb Eei auq pun waag mivb Buaj ninb , “ maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg pun uaq laanb Kuq myenb weig zu'g a'Mwavj yia Beij Beij Tauj naaiq laanb myenb zyrug haid Hruq maiq lovj yetg teij . ”
40027020	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Duaq zwavj myenb Toq pi-laatq puvj Baa-lapq-Batg , taij ye-su kwavg .
40027021	pi-laatq zyrug naaig zwavj myenb , “ naaiq teij i taub , meib Bua xij yia puvj haiq taub ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ puvj Baa-lapq-Batg . ”
40027022	pi-laatq zyrug naaig , “ uaq Euvg , ye-su , tovb myenb heug ki-tug uaq taub , meib Bua xij yia Navq haiq nx zruj ? ” ninb Bua yetg zuvq tau , “ zx'q ninb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj ! ”
40027023	pi-laatq cvj naaig ninb Bua , “ uaq Euvg , ninb zruj txvg haiq Euvg zwid ? ” zwavj myenb Jaa heug kaub Bwi , “ zx'q ninb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj maa'b ! ”
40027024	pi-laatq pwatg ninb kxvq Jyenq mivb yaag maiq lamb lovg , zuvq kamb Riaj zwavj myenb xij lung Revg . ninb zyrug zx'q uam txv Jyenq zwavj myenb Raauj puad yaag kxvq , “ naaiq taub myenb zu'g taig se maiq Paanj Tauj yia . naaiq yetg zuvq Dxtq zu'g meib Bua kanb a'q . ”
40027025	zwavj myenb tovb Jruj waag tau , “ naaiq taub myenb taig , lyrug Zwrtq ninb Eei Ryaamq , yrub yia Bua Zauj yia Bua kanb Eei funb fa'q Daamb txv . ”
40027026	pi-laatq zyrug puvj Baa-lapq-Batg pun ninb Bua . mq paag ye-su , ninb pun zu'g pyaab pin Bx'q liud , Jiu pun pcv txb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj .
40027027	pi-laatq zuvj Eei pcv cvj txb ye-su pia'g zuvj Eei ting ka'Euad . uaq kwanb pcv yetg zuvq zyrug mivb weib Jyenq ninb .
40027028	ninb Bua Jaiq Gxi ye-su Eei lwib hruj cvj zx'q teij lwib Daaub si'q Tevj ninb pwij Jyenq ,
40027029	yaag lovg Fimq Zi'q nxm huvb nivq Dovj Jyenq ninb Eei mGxvq . ninb Bua cvj zx'q lua'g ti'g kwcvq pun ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad nanq Jyenq , cvj kweig Fiag ninb Eei Ra'Myen kwatg to'g Jyetq ninb , yaag kxvq , “ yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb aa'b ! zyavb tu'q maang fwij a'q ! ”
40027030	ninb Bua cvj Twiq uamb Rwib nctq ninb , zx'q uaq tiub lua'g ti'g kwcvq Bx'q ninb Eei mGxvq .
40027031	kwatg to'g Jyetq liud , ninb Bua zyrug Jaiq Gxi lwib Daaub si'q , cvj zx'q ninb kanb Eei lwi Tevj ninb zu'q Jyenq zyrug txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj .
40027032	ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb uaq zang , pwavb zu'g taub sai-lin myenb , Buaj heug si-mon . pcv zyrug aapq si-mon Daam ye-su Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj .
40027033	ninb Bua mivb Tauj nxm txvj , Buaj heug kon-ko-Taa , eij leid se mGxvb Kx'q txvj .
40027034	Tauj uaq ninb Bua zx'q a'vung tiuq Peuj Jyenq im Eei ka'naaiq pun ye-su hopq . mq paag ye-su seij liud , zyrug maiq hopq .
40027035	ninb Bua zx'q ye-su tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj , cvj zx'q ninb Eei lwib hruj taaib Druq mavg weig pun Gxi .
40027036	Ga'haaq ninb Bua zweid Jyenq uaq zuaq mavg Jyenq ninb .
40027037	yem ye-su Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig ninb Bua fiaq Jyenq koj ninb uaq teij waag . waag kxvq , “ naaiq se yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb , ye-su . ”
40027038	ninb Bua cvj tiv i taub za'g pcv yem ye-su Eei ka'Len . maaib taub yem Byaaug mcvj . maaib taub yem zaaij mcvj .
40027039	Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb Ki ninb , Wavj Jyenq mGxvq kxvq ,
40027040	“ aaq , meib xij Zc'q zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq , Ga'haaq pua Nxi cvj kanb Zeij Jiad taaib ni ! Fruj meib kanb a'q . sij kxvq meib zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn , Fiag zyepg Ravg Jaaj taaib maa'b ! ”
40027041	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj myenb koj fib Navq Eei Jyetq ninb .
40027042	ninb Bua kxvq , “ ninb Fruj tu'q myenb mq paag maiq haib Fruj ninb kanb x'g ! ninb zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb ! sij kxvq ninb ib zang yem zyepg Ravg Jaaj Fiag taaib , yia Bua zyrug syenj ninb a'q .
40027043	ninb Kauj Tinb huvb yaag kxvq ninb zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn . uaq Euvg , Bua mavg kaaj Tinb huvb ib zang za'kevb xij Fruj ninb fai maiq Fruj . ”
40027044	lyemb tiv ninb Eei ka'Len uaq teij za'g pcv fib Navq Eei kxvq Ki ninb .
40027045	luvb zyavj aanj Eei zyavb hog , uaq nxm teib puv Mwavj Revg Tauj Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog .
40027046	leib maiq ko Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog , ye-su heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ e-li , e-li , laa-maa-saa-Bakg-Taa-ni ! ” eij leid se , “ yia Eei Tinb huvb aa'b ! yia Eei Tinb huvb ! meib weig haiq tiug kwavg yia ? ”
40027047	maaib teij sruq Jyenq uaq Eei myenb haid ninb kxvq naaiq teij waag zyrug kxvq , “ oq , ninb heug e-li-yaa . ”
40027048	maaib taub yem uaq Eei myenb lyemb zeib Tiuj mivb zx'q laib Reib sxtq zyemj a'vung tiub swi taaib , lovg lua'g ti'g kwcvq pa'q Jyenq Zunq pun ye-su hopq .
40027049	mq paag maaib teij yem uaq Eei myenb kxvq , “ Bua zuaq mavg kaaj , e-li-yaa kevb taaib Fruj ninb Eei fai ? ”
40027050	ye-su cvj heug Rung Bwi Eei liud , zyrug tavj Qiaj mig a'q .
40027051	yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad uaq Kwaaiq Bc'g kcvb Dia yem kub vwaaig Baaij txv ka'Diaq , zruj i mcvj mig a'q . Dau yaag tovd , la'pyeiq yaag Baaij Revg .
40027052	Janb taig zruq yaag Gxi mig a'q . Tinb huvb Eei Zivb Revg pc'g fivj , tovb taig mivb uaq teij , maaib Zamq Eei navb taaib
40027053	Zwrtq zruq mivb . ye-su navb taaib uaq zang , uaq teij myenb pia'g uaq nxm Zivb Revg Eei zivb , ye-lu-saa-lem . maaib myenb Zamq Eei tu'q pwatg ninb Bua .
40027054	zuaq ye-su uaq taub pcvb pyeiq Zauj ninb Eei pcv pwatg Dau tovd yaag pwatg Euvb Euvg sig Zwrtq , hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig . ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq taub za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn a'q . ”
40027055	yem kaa-li-li kan Jyenq ye-su taaib fub suj ninb uaq teij msia'q txn Zamq Eei yaag yem uaq ko teij Eei mavg .
40027056	uaq teij msia'q txn maaib taub makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa , maaib yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-sepq Eei maa maa-li-yaa , yaag maaib sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn Eei maa .
40027057	luvb maanb Mwavj a'q , maaib taub yem aa-li-maa-Tia muvq Eei putg zxib myenb , Buaj heug yo-sepq , taaib Tauj . ninb yaag zruj ye-su Eei saib kxj .
40027058	yo-sepq mivb lxd pi-laatq , Toq ye-su Eei sei . pi-laatq zyrug Gxi Rwib Jiu ye-su Eei sei pun yo-sepq .
40027059	yo-sepq zyrug lovg syavb la'maab Dia peu Jyenq ye-su Eei sei ,
40027060	txb mivb zavj syavb la'pyeib zruq . naaiq nxm zruq yo-sepq Zo'q ho'g zu'g taaib lyrub ninb kanb lovg . zavj liud , ninb Twi Kwaaiq tomb la'pyeiq Bc'g Jyenq zrub kcvb , zyrug mivb mig a'q .
40027061	makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa cvj Zauj kanb taub maa-li-yaa zweid uaq , Myen Win mivb zruq uaq puv .
40027062	ta'Eeig Nxi , se Tauj tivb kov Nxi , sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb mivb lxd pi-laatq ,
40027063	yaag kxvq , “ tomb kxj aag , yia Bua Javj zu'g zinb Daavg Duaq myenb uaq taub loq maiq kcvb taig uaq zang ninb kxvq , ‘ Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia cvj navb taaib . ’
40027064	Navq naaig , Toq tomb kxj Fiag livg Paaiq pcv mivb lovb lovj zuaq Jyenq zruq Tauj ta'faam Nxi . Riaj ninb Eei saib kxj haib mivb nimg sei .
