40027065	pi-laatq Buaj ninb Bua , “ uaq Euvg , kunq txb pcv mivb ei meib Bua haib zruj Eei lovb lovj Eei zuaq Jyenq zruq maa'b ! ”
40027066	ninb Bua zyrug mivb Gaapq Jyenq yenj zrub kcvb , yaag pun pcv lovb lovj Eei zuaq Jyenq .
40028001	Jiaj liud tivb kov Nxi , pia'g uaq nxm leib paaij Eei ta'yetq Nxi , luvb aaq lamb teij Fav , makq-Daa-laa muvq uaq taub maa-li-yaa , cvj Zauj kanb taub maa-li-yaa mivb mavg zruq .
40028002	lyemb zeib Dau tovd seij Eei . maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb Fiag taaib Twi Gxi Bc'g zrub kcvb uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq , zyrug zweid Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq kub vwaaig .
40028003	pwatg ninb Eei favj zeiq Navq Ba'livg nx Fav . lwib hruj Bopq pc'g Eei , Navq sxv nx .
40028004	zuaq zruq Eei pcv kevb ! kamb Riaj haig , sin zinj Revg zyrug Kiv uaq Dau mivb , Navq taig mig a'q nx .
40028005	finb myenb kxvq Buaj uaq teij msia'q txn , “ maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og . yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua lxd tovb zu'g tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig uaq taub ye-su .
40028006	mq paag ninb maiq yem naaiq . ninb ei ninb kanb kxvq Eei waag navb taaib a'q . taaib mavg myenb an ninb uaq nxm txvj maa'b !
40028007	mavg liud , kaanq mivb Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , ‘ ninb navb taaib a'q . ninb mivb kaa-li-li Daavg meib Bua . mivb Tauj uaq meib Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg ninb a'q . ’ Javj Jyenq yia Buaj liud meib Bua naaiq teij waag og . ”
40028008	uaq teij msia'q txn yem uaq zruq zyrug Waavb Waav zaavb zaav Eei Tiuj mivb Buaj saib kxj . ninb Bua haid kamb Riaj Eei yrug haid Fyenb yrub haig .
40028009	Tiuj Jyenq mivb kau , ye-su lyemb zeib taaib pwavb ninb Bua yaag kxvq , “ pcvb xn Eei saa'b ? ” uaq teij msia'q txn zyrug mivb nanq Jyenq ye-su Eei zauj yaag paaij ninb .
40028010	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . mivb Buaj yia Eei kxb yrud mivb kaa-li-li scvq og . yem uaq ninb Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg yia . ”
40028011	uaq teij msia'q txn kan Jyenq Jauq mivb uaq zang , maaib teij zuaq zruq Eei pcv cvj Rwrnj uaq zivb Buaj sai myenb pyeiq ninb Bua pwatg Zwrtq taaib Eei Euvb Euvg sig .
40028012	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj kapq zunq Zaavb laavb . Zaavb laavb liud , zyrug zx'q Eaanb Zamq Eei Rwid pun pcv
40028013	yaag kxvq , “ meib Bua xij zu'g kxvq , ‘ luvb mwrnd zang meib Bua mFxmb mivb , ninb Eei saib kxj taaib nimg ye-su Eei sei mig a'q . ’
40028014	sij kxvq naaiq teij sig siv Tauj pi-laatq zuvj Eei mnxmb yia Bua zyrug Tevj meib Bua Jaiq . meib Bua kunq puvj Hruq . ”
40028015	pcv zipq uaq teij Eaanb yaag ei Jyenq sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Eei waag zruj . naaiq teij Jaub lrug Tauj ib zang yiu-Tai myenb Zxg kxvq Jyenq yem Eei .
40028016	uaq teij zyepg yetq taub saib kxj mivb kaa-li-li scvq , Tauj ye-su heug ninb Bua mivb uaq nxm Bov .
40028017	yetq pwatg ye-su ninb Bua zyrug kweig Fiag paaij ninb . mq paag maaib teij Zxg Hruq maiq tivg .
40028018	ye-su taaib fatq teij Buaj ninb Bua , “ yem luvb yem Dau Eei yetg zuvq hatg maad Tinb huvb Jiu pun yia mig a'q .
40028019	weig naaiq , meib Bua xij zu'g mivb Faauj maang fivj myenb zruj yia Eei saib kxj . xij zu'g tevq tia , txn Zauj sivj livb Eei Buaj Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid ,
40028020	yaag Faauj ninb Bua ei Revg yia Buaj meib Bua zruj Eei Euvb Euvg . Javj Jyenq og . yia yetg liud Zauj meib Bua yem Tauj paamb ken Eei setq mweid . ”
41001001	Tinb huvb Eei txn , ye-su ki-tug , Eei Kuq fyenj Navq naaiq Jiad kxn .
41001002	trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , fiaq Jyenq , “ Tinb huvb kxvq , ‘ mavg maa'b ! yia xij Paaiq yia Eei trug fyenj myenb mivb Daavg liug leid meib Eei Jauq . ’ ”
41001003	“ maaib laanb myenb yem teib puvb Waav heug Jyenq kxvq , ‘ xij zu'g liug leid zyruq Eei Jauq . ninb Eei Jauq xij zu'g Kxi za'g Eei . ’ ”
41001004	yo-han taaib yem teib puvb Waav Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid yaag zunb tod kxvq , “ xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid , Jiaj uam Eei leid , Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid . ”
41001005	yem yu-Dia teig Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei myenb Zamq Zwrtq mivb mwavj yo-han . ninb Bua Eyemg ninb Bua Eei zwid , yo-han zyrug yem uaq Jx-Dcn Daaib Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid .
41001006	yo-han zu'q Eei lwib hruj lovg lxb Txb pyei Datq taaib , yaag lovg Dopg Laav sai Jyenq Jaaiq . ninb Eang Eei ka'naaiq se Jopg Eeig Zauj lomg Eei mweib txvb .
41001007	ninb zunb Buaj myenb , “ yia taaib Daavg , maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib . uaq taub kaub Lo yia . yia lyemb maiq Pwij Do'q Fiag Tevj ninb Jaiq heb Laav .
41001008	yia lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid , mq paag ninb xij lovg sivj livb Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid . ”
41001009	txij uaq teij Nxib Eia'g , ye-su yem kaa-li-li scvq Eei naa-saa-letq muvq mivb yo-han uaq . yo-han zyrug yem uaq Jx-Dcn Daaib Tevj ninb Jiaj uam Eei leid .
41001010	ye-su yem uam yetq Zwrtq taaib uaq zang , ninb pwatg luvb Gxi yaag pwatg sivj livb Navq nx'g Go nx Fiag taaib Ropg Jyenq ninb .
41001011	maaib Qiaj yem kub vwaaig luvb kxvq , “ meib se yia Eei txnb Namq . yia za'kevb a'Neiq haig meib . ”
41001012	sivj livb lyemb zeib Paaiq ye-su mivb uaq teib puvb Waav .
41001013	ninb zyrug yem uaq feij zyepg Nxi zu'g saa-taan seij . ninb Zauj Yiab zxib yem uaq , yaag maaib finb myenb taaib liug leid ninb .
41001014	yo-han zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob , Ga'haaq ye-su mivb kaa-li-li scvq zunb Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj .
41001015	ninb kxvq , “ zyavb hog Tauj a'q . Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxi fatq a'q . meib Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid syenj Kuq fyenj . ”
41001016	ye-su yavb Jauq kan Jyenq kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len mivb uaq zang , pwatg i taub zx'q Byaud Eei myenb , si-mon Zauj ninb Eei yrud an-Daa-lu , yem uaq Kxiq pxvd Byaud .
41001017	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua taaib kan yia og . yia xij Faauj meib Bua lxd myenb Navq ib zang meib Bua lxd Byaud nx . ”
41001018	ninb Bua lyemb zeib kwavg ninb Bua Eei muvd , kan Jyenq ye-su mivb a'q .
41001019	ye-su Jiaj mivb teij cvj pwatg sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han . naaiq teij i muad Zauj ninb Bua Eei tia yem uaq Ravq liug leid muvd .
41001020	ye-su lyemb zeib heug ninb Bua taaib , ninb Bua zyrug kwavg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei tia Zauj kovb myenb yem uaq Ravq , kan ye-su mivb mig a'q .
41001021	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj mivb Tauj Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq . Tauj tivb kov Nxi , ye-su mivb uaq wig txvb Faauj myenb .
41001022	zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig , weig zu'g ninb Faauj Eei waag maaib hatg maad . ninb Faauj maiq Navq Faauj leid Eei finb scv .
41001023	uaq zang , lyemb zeib maaib taub zu'g Yiab kwaiq myenq mua'q Eei myenb pia'g ninb Bua Eei wig txvb naub naug Eei kxvq ,
41001024	“ naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su aa'b ! meib maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g yia Bua ? meib taaib naaiq xij myetg Revg yia Bua ? meib haiq taub yia hiuq Eei . meib se Tinb huvb Eei uaq taub Zivb Revg myenb . ”
41001025	ye-su hatg uaq taub myenq , “ maiq tuvq Ko lo . Zwrtq naaiq taub myenb Eei sin taaib maa'b ! ”
41001026	uaq taub Yiab kwaiq myenq pun uaq taub myenb Datg Datg Eei Zyru , vaaub vaauq Eei heug Jyenq Zwrtq mig a'q .
41001027	zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig , laanb zyrug naaig laanb , “ naaiq haiq Euvg x'b ? syavb Faauj Eei leid fai ni ? naaiq laanb myenb maaib hatg maad hatg Yiab kwaiq myenq , myenq yaag mwavj ninb Eei waag . ”
41001028	ye-su Eei mevb taub zyrug syepg syepq Eei siv kxmj kaa-li-li scvq .
41001029	ye-su Bua Zwrtq wig txvb uaq zang , pcv za'g Eei mivb si-mon Zauj an-Daa-lu Eei pyauq . yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han yaag mivb Eei .
41001030	si-mon Eei maab tiaq putq pcvg , sin Jxm Eei , pweij Jyenq Zruj . ye-su yetq Tauj , myenb zyrug kxvq pcvg Buaj ninb .
41001031	ye-su zyrug pia'g mivb nanq Jyenq pcvg myenb Eei puad , Ken Jiad sin taaib . sin zyav naaig laavb mig a'q . ninb yaag fub suj ye-su Bua .
41001032	tovb naaig Nxi Ba'Nxi mwrtq , Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog , myenb txb yetg zuvq putq pcvg Zauj zu'g myenq mua'q Eei myenb mivb ye-su uaq .
41001033	muvq Eei zwavj myenb taaib kapq zunq uaq kcvb Daavg .
41001034	ye-su zyrug zxg lovj myenb Zamq Eei Euvb Euvg pcvg , yaag zung Zwrtq Zamb taub myenq . ninb yaag maiq pun myenq kxvq haiq Euvg weig zu'g myenq hiuq tu'q ninb tovb haiq taub .
41001035	ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei , luvb zuvq maiq kcvb Fav , ye-su Jiad sin Zwrtq mivb levb Eei txvj , yem uaq tauj kauj .
41001036	si-mon Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei txig Zwrtq mivb lxd .
41001037	lxd pwatg , ninb Bua kxvq , “ zwavj myenb haiq taub yaag lxd meib . ”
41001038	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Bua xij zu'g mivb Wiv Rwrnj naaiq teij laavd weig zu'g yia yaag xij zu'g yem uaq teij txvj zunb tod . yia taaib se weig Navq naaiq nx zruj . ”
41001039	ye-su zyrug mivb kxmj kaa-li-li scvq , yem ninb Bua Eei wig txvb zunb tod , yaag zung myenq Zwrtq myenb Eei sin .
41001040	maaib taub putq komb huq pcvg Eei myenb taaib kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen Toq ninb Tevj . ninb kxvq , “ sij kxvq meib xij nx , meib haib zxg lovj yia Eei pcvg . ”
41001041	ye-su haid Kxb lyenb haig zyrug suv puad maan Jyenq ninb yaag kxvq , “ yia xij zxg Eei . meib lovj taaib maa'b ! ”
41001042	uaq taub myenb Eei pcvg lyemb zeib Twij , ninb zyrug lovj Revg mig a'q .
41001043	ye-su Jaa waag Niaq Eei , heug ninb Rwrnj a'q .
41001044	ninb kxvq , “ naaiq teij sig Zinb maang maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub og . pcv za'g Eei mivb sai myenb uaq pun ninb zaab mavg . mavg liud , xij zu'g ei mo-se fiaq Eei leid txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag pun Tinb huvb weig saaj meib Eei wij , zruj zxvb zevj pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg . ”
41001045	mq paag uaq taub myenb mivb Tauj haaij , Qa'q kxvq naaiq teij Jaub lrug . ninb kxvq Zamq haig , ye-su Zivj taaib maiq haib txv zwavj pia'g haiq nxm muvq . ninb xij zu'g yem zivb ka'Eiag levb Eei txvj , mq paag Zxg maaib faamb puv feij lrug Eei myenb taaib lxd ninb .
41002001	Jiaj liud i ziaj Nxi , ye-su cvj Rwrnj Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq . zwavj myenb haid kxvq ye-su yem pyauq Eei .
41002002	myenb Zamq ! haig kapq zunq taaib zyrug pwavq pyauq Revg . lyemb kcvb Daavg yaag maiq maaib txvj Kuvj . ye-su zunb tod pun zwavj myenb mwavj uaq zang ,
41002003	maaib pyei taub myenb kcv taub putq pcvb Bai myenb taaib lxd ye-su .
41002004	mq paag myenb Zamq haig , maiq nxig tu'q pcvg myenb Tauj ye-su Eei Ra'Myen . ninb Bua zyrug Zc'q Tov pyaub vxb txij zyavj ye-su yem uaq nxm txvj kub vwaaig . Zc'q Tov mivb , ninb Bua zyrug zx'q pcvg myenb pweij Jyenq Jiug puvj Fiag .
41002005	ye-su pwatg naaiq teij myenb syenj tu'q lovj , ninb zyrug Buaj putq pcvb Bai myenb , “ txn aag , meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q . ”
41002006	maaib teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv zweid Jyenq uaq , yem Hruq Namq ,
41002007	“ naaiq taub myenb fuvg Navq naaiq nx kxvq lcb ? ninb Kuvj kxvq Ki Tinb huvb Navq . Zwrtq liud Tinb huvb , maiq maaib haiq taub kwavg tu'q myenb Eei zwid . ”
41002008	ye-su lyemb zeib hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Navq haiq nx Namq , ninb zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua Eei Hruq weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx Namq ?
41002009	Buaj pcvb Bai myenb , ‘ meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q . ’ fai ‘ Jiad sin taaib , txb Jyenq meib Eei Jiug mivb a'q . ’ naaiq teij i Jruj waag , haiq Jruj kaub heg tu'q kxvq ?
41002010	mq paag yia xij pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yem naaiq paamb ken maaib hatg maad kwavg zwid . ” ninb zyrug Buaj naaig taub putq pcvb Bai Eei myenb ,
41002011	“ yia Buaj meib , Jiad sin taaib , txb Jyenq meib Eei Jiug Rwrnj pyauq a'q . ”
41002012	zwavj myenb mavg Jyenq uaq zang , naaiq taub myenb lyemb zeib Jiad sin taaib txb Jyenq ninb Eei Jiug Zwrtq mig a'q . ninb Bua yetg zuvq Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb . ninb Bua kxvq , “ yia Bua kevb ! maiq pwatg Jiaj naaiq Euvg sig . ”
41002013	ye-su cvj Zwrtq mivb uaq kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len . maaib myenb Zamq Eei mivb ninb uaq , ye-su zyrug Faauj ninb Bua .
41002014	ye-su cvj Jiaj mivb teij , pwatg taub syru Rru myenb , se an-fe-atg Eei txn , le-wi , zweid Jyenq uaq syru Rru zaamg zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ taaib kan yia og . ” le-wi zyrug Jiad sin kan Jyenq ye-su mivb a'q .
41002015	ye-su yem le-wi Eei pyauq Eang Naavj uaq zang , maaib Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb Zamq Eei kan ye-su . maaib teij naaiq teij myenb yaag taaib Zauj ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj .
41002016	maaib teij finb scv , tovb faa-li-sij uaq Jauq myenb , pwatg ye-su Zauj mevb taub waaig Zauj syru Rru Eei myenb Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj . ninb Bua zyrug naaig ninb Eei saib kxj , “ ninb weig haiq tiug Zauj syru Rru Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb Eang Naavj ? ”
41002017	ye-su haid ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ninb zyrug tau , “ wavg syavj Eei myenb maiq Qyemj zu'g Diab sai . Kuvj putg pcvg myenb Navq Qyemj zu'g Diab sai . yia maiq zeid taaib heug Kuq myenb . yia taaib heug mevb taub waaig Eei myenb . ”
41002018	maaib Rung Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Eei saib kxj Zauj faa-li-sij myenb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg . maaib teij myenb taaib naaig ye-su , “ Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Zauj faa-li-sij myenb Eei saib kxj zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg . meib Eei saib kxj weig haiq tiug maiq zei ? ”
41002019	ye-su tau , “ syavb laavb Zxg yem Jyenq Zivb Jaab yinb Eei zyavb hog , syavb laavb Eei Kc'q myenb haib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg fai ? ta'faanb syavb laavb Zxg Zauj ninb Bua yem , Kc'q myenb zyrug maiq zei a'q .
41002020	mq paag Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj , syavb laavb zu'g txb mivb mig a'q . Tauj uaq zang Kc'q myenb Zivj taaib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg .
41002021	“ maiq maaib haiq taub lovg syavb Dia Biaq lob lwi . lovg syavb Dia nx , syavb Dia haib so'q , petq lob Dia pun Biaq Eei txvj Jaa huq Lo .
41002022	yaag maiq maaib haiq taub zx'q syavb a'vung tiuq tapq lob Dopg Bua'g . tapq lob Bua'g nx , tiuq haib zuvj Dopg Bua'g Baaij , zyav naaig Zwrtq Revg . Bua'g yaag huq mig a'q . syavb a'vung tiuq xij zu'g tapq syavb Dopg Bua'g . ”
41002023	maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi , ye-su Jiaj myenb Eei Byaub Deig . kan Jauq mivb uaq zang , ninb Eei saib kxj nyetq Byaub txq .
41002024	faa-li-sij myenb zyrug Buaj ye-su , “ mavg kaaj , ei Bua Eei leid , tivb kov Nxi maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj . meib Eei saib kxj weig haiq tiug zruj ? ”
41002025	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq teij Jauq fai ? Daa-witq huvb Zauj kan ninb uaq teij myenb Hruq sia , Qyemj zu'g Eang Eei zyavb hog , ninb Bua Navq haiq nx zruj ?
41002026	tovb aa-Bi-yaa-Taa zruj tomb sai myenb Eei zyavb hog , Daa-witq pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub zx'q kevj Tinb huvb Eei Fuaq Eang . Kuvj sai myenb kanb maaib leid Eang Navq . mq paag Daa-witq Eang yaag pun kan ninb uaq teij myenb Zauj Jyenq Eang . ”
41002027	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Tinb huvb lyepg tivb kov Nxi taaib Tevj myenb , maiq zeid zeij myenb taaib weig tivb kov Nxi .
41002028	weig naaiq , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zruj tivb kov Nxi Eei zyruq . ”
41003001	maaib Rung ye-su cvj pia'g wig txvb . yem uaq maaib taub mJavg txn maaib Jia'q puad waaig Eei .
41003002	maaib teij myenb xij lxd Jauq koj ye-su , ninb Bua zyrug Zyenb mavg Jyenq mavg kaaj , ninb lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg uaq taub myenb Eei puad fai ?
41003003	ye-su Buaj puad waaig uaq taub myenb , “ meib taaib naaiq Ra'Myen mcvj og . ”
41003004	ninb zyrug naaig zwavj myenb , “ ei Bua Eei leid , tivb kov Nxi Bua haib zruj haiq Euvg ? haib zruj lovj fai zruj waaig , Fruj mcvg fai hxig mcvg ? ” mq paag ninb Bua maiq Ko lo .
41003005	ye-su Qiaj Jiad haig , Win naaiq puv , Win uaq puv , mavg ninb Bua . ninb yaag Raub haig weig zu'g pwatg ninb Bua Hruq pa'la'g vcvg haig . ninb cvj Buaj puad waaig uaq taub myenb , “ suv meib Eei puad Zwrtq taaib maa'b ! ” suv Zwrtq taaib , puad zyrug lovj Revg mig a'q .
41003006	faa-li-sij myenb zyrug yem wig txvb Zwrtq mivb Zauj teij kan he-lotq huvb uaq Jauq myenb Zaavb laavb Navq haiq nx haib taij ye-su .
41003007	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj yem uaq nxm txvj cvj Zwrtq mivb Tauj kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len . myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq mivb . maaib teij yem kaa-li-li scvq taaib . maaib teij yem yu-Dia scvq ,
41003008	maaib teij yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , maaib teij yem i-Du-me-aa scvq , maaib teij yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei tov puv mcvj , maaib teij yem Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn zivb taaib . naaiq teij myenb taaib lxd ye-su weig zu'g ninb Bua haid kxvq ninb zruj Eei sig .
41003009	myenb za'kevb ! Zamq haig , ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj liug leid zyavj yetg Pruj Ravb txn taaib Buvb Jyenq zipq ninb . Raub heij zwavj myenb haib Bevj zu'g ninb .
41003010	weig zu'g ninb zxg myenb Zamq Eei pcvg lovj , maaib pcvg Eei myenb haiq taub yaag xij Bevj Jyenq mivb Lua ye-su .
41003011	zu'g myenq mua'q Eei myenb haiq zang pwatg ye-su zyrug Baapq Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen heug Jyenq kxvq , “ meib tovb Tinb huvb Eei txn a'q . ”
41003012	ye-su hatg myenq Zinb maang maiq tuvq kxvq ninb tovb haiq taub .
41003013	Jiaj taaib ye-su faauj uaq Jiaj Bov , yaag heug tovb ninb xij lovg Eei myenb taaib lxd ninb . ninb Bua zyrug taaib Tauj ninb uaq .
41003014	ye-su kinq Zwrtq zyepg Eeig laanb myenb yaag heug ninb Bua zruj kovb zob . ninb Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kinq meib Bua taaib Zauj yia yem yaag xij Paaiq meib Bua mivb zunb tod ,
41003015	yaag pun meib Bua maaib hatg maad zung myenq Zwrtq . ”
41003016	ye-su kinq uaq teij zyepg Eeig laanb se si-mon , ( ye-su cvj Tevj ninb Zwrtq nxm Buaj heug pi-te ) ,
41003017	cvj maaib sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han , ( ye-su Tevj naaiq teij i muad Zwrtq Buaj heug Bo-aa-ne-ye , eij leid se Ba'ov Eei txn . )
41003018	cvj maaib an-Daa-lu , fi-lipq , Baa-To-lo-miu , matq-Taai , To-matq , an-fe-atg Eei txn , yaa-kxpg , Tatq-De-atg , Namq kua'q zavg uaq taub si-mon ,
41003019	Zauj maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg .
41003020	ye-su zyrug pia'g nxm pyauq mig a'q . myenb Zamq haig cvj kapq zunq taaib . ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj lyemb maiq maaib zyavb hog Eang Naavj .
41003021	ye-su Eei pyauq zov myenb haid naaiq teij sig , ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mivb xij zx'q ninb , weig zu'g myenb kxvq , “ ninb maiq Rav a'q . ”
41003022	maaib teij yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib Eei Faauj leid Eei finb scv kxvq , “ ninb zu'g Be-en-se-Bun myenq mua'q Navq . naaiq taub myenq Eei huvb pun ninb maaib livg zung myenq Zwrtq . ”
41003023	ye-su zyrug heug ninb Bua taaib ninb uaq yaag lovg waab peiq Zauj ninb Bua kxvq . ninb kxvq , “ saa-taan Navq haiq nx haib zung saa-taan kanb Zwrtq ?
41003024	sij kxvq maaib nxm kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj Jauq , kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Zauj kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Bx'q Jaaj , uaq nxm kua'q zyrug paaig mig a'q .
41003025	sij kxvq yetg pyauq myenb pun Gxi , maiq tovb Hruq , naaiq taub Zauj uaq taub Bx'q Jaaj , Jaab tivb zyrug paaig Revg .
41003026	Navq naaig , sij kxvq saa-taan Eei kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj kwanb , naaiq kwanb Zauj uaq kwanb Bx'q Jaaj , ninb Eei kua'q zyrug paaig mig a'q .
41003027	“ maiq maaib haiq taub haib pia'g myenb henq myenb Eei pyauq Zaavq ninb Eei ka'naaiq . xij zu'g Dob Jyenq uaq taub myenb henq myenb Daavg Zivj taaib haib Zaavq tu'q ninb Eei ka'naaiq .
41003028	“ yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , paamb myenb paamd Eei yetg zuvq zwid Zauj kxvq Ki Eei yetg zuvq waag , Tinb huvb haib kwavg Revg .
41003029	mq paag haiq taub kxvq Ki sivj livb , Tinb huvb yetg liud maiq kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid , weig zu'g ninb paamd Eei zwid se ninb kanb xij zu'g yetg liud Daamb txv . ”
41003030	( ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g maaib teij myenb kxvq , “ ninb zu'g Yiab kwaiq myenq mua'q ninb . ” )
41003031	ye-su Eei maa Zauj ninb Eei yrud Bua taaib Tauj , sruq Jyenq ka'Eiag mcvj Buaj myenb pia'g mivb heug ye-su .
41003032	myenb Zamq Eei zweid Wiv kxmj ye-su , ninb Bua zyrug Buaj ninb , “ finb scv aag , meib Eei maa Zauj meib Eei yrud Bua yem ka'Eiag lxd meib . ”
41003033	ye-su tau , “ haiq taub zruj yia Eei maa , zruj yia Eei muab txig ? ”
41003034	ninb mavg zweid Wiv kxmj ninb uaq teij myenb yaag kxvq , “ mavg maa'b ! naaiq teij myenb se yia Eei maa Zauj yia Eei muab txig .
41003035	haiq taub zruj ei Tinb huvb Eei eij , uaq taub zruj yia Eei muab txig yaag zruj yia Eei maa . ”
41004001	cvj maaib Rung ye-su yem kaa-li-li Kxib txn Len Jiad kxn Faauj myenb . myenb Zamq ! haig weib Jyenq ninb , ninb zyrug pia'g Pruj Ravq zweid Jyenq , Rcv Jiaj mivb teij . zwavj myenb yem uaq Byenj .
41004002	ninb lovg waab peiq Faauj Zamb Euvg ninb Bua . Faauj uaq zang ninb kxvq ,
41004003	“ mwavj og , maaib laanb myenb Zwrtq mivb haad Eim .
41004004	haad Eei zyavb hog , maaib teij Eim Dxtq zu'g Jauq . nx'g taaib Eang Revg mig a'q .
41004005	maaib teij Eim Dxtq zu'g la'pyeib lomg , maiq maaib nia Zamq Eei txvj . nia maiq hod , Eim zyrug ku'g Eaab syepq .

41004007	maaib teij Eim Dxtq zu'g Fimb lomg . Fimq Lo taaib Byxvd Jyenq , maiq haib zyavb Eim .
41004008	maaib teij Eim Dxtq zu'g Daub lovj , Zwrtq taaib zyavb tu'q kitq . maaib teij yetg kruq tu'q faab zyepg kruq , maaib teij tu'q lua'g zyepg kruq , maaib teij tu'q yetg pc'q kruq . ”

41004010	zwavj myenb Rwrnj Revg , uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Zauj teij kan ye-su Eei myenb Toq ye-su Pxq mevb uaq tiub waab peiq Eei eij leid .
41004011	ye-su tau , “ Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb uaq teij kem Jyenq Eei sig Tinb huvb pun meib Bua hiuq mig a'q . mq paag ka'Eiag Eei myenb Kuvj haid naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig penj waab peiq Navq .
41004012	weig naaiq , ‘ ninb Bua Dovg haaij mavg yaag mavg maiq pwatg , Dovg haaij mwavj yaag mwavj maiq pia'g Hruq . sij kxvq ninb Bua mevb pc'g nx , Riaj ninb Bua haib kxiq Hruq lxd Tinb huvb . Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid . ’ ”
41004013	ye-su cvj naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua maiq mevb pc'g naaiq tiub waab peiq fai ? uaq Euvg , meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib mevb pc'g kanb tiub ?
41004014	haad Eim Eei myenb haad Eei Eim se Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj .
41004015	maaib teij myenb se Navq Dxtq zu'g Jauq uaq teij Eim nx . myenb haid liud Kuq fyenj , saa-taan lyemb zeib taaib zx'q yem Hruq uaq teij Kuq fyenj Zwrtq mig a'q .
41004016	cvj maaib teij myenb se Navq Dxtq zu'g la'pyeib lomg Eei Eim . yetq haid Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj zyrug a'Neiq zipq .
41004017	mq paag se Navq Kuq fyenj Fiag Ruvb maiq Do , syenj maiq laub . ninb Bua laaij Kuq fyenj pwavb zu'g sig fai zu'g myenb zruj to'g , ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q .
41004018	maaib teij myenb yaag Navq haad Dxtq zu'g Fimb lomg uaq teij Eim . ninb Bua haid Tinb huvb Eei waag ,
41004019	mq paag laaij seij zavg Eei Jauq Kwrnj Hruq fai laaij Namq zinb Eaanb , fai laaij mauq xij tu'q Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq , Byxvd Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei waag , Eim zyrug maiq haib Jaub a'q .
41004020	mq paag maaib teij myenb Navq Dxtq zu'g Daub lovj uaq teij Eim . ninb Bua haid Tinb huvb Eei waag zyrug zipq taaib , yaag zyavb tu'q kitq . maaib teij yetg kruq tu'q faab zyepg kruq , maaib teij tu'q lua'g zyepg kruq , maaib teij tu'q yetg pc'q kruq . ”
41004021	ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Bua , “ maaib haiq taub tyemq zia'g tav zx'q Tovq Gopq Jyenq fai ton Zrub Diaq ? ninb maiq zeid zx'q tav ton Jyenq tav Eei paaib fai ?
41004022	maiq kunq maaib haiq Euvg pivj Jyenq mq paag xij Zwrtq taaib . maiq kunq maaib haiq Euvg kem Jyenq mq paag xij Byaavj yaavb Zwrtq taaib .
41004023	haiq taub maaib mnxmb xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj og . ”
41004024	ninb yaag Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua xij zu'g lovg Hruq mwavj lovj . meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg Laau pun myenb , Tinb huvb yaag lovg uaq Euvg Laau pun meib Bua , zuvq Jaa kaub Zamq teij .
41004025	weig zu'g haiq taub maaib Eei , ninb xij Jaa tu'q kaub Zamq . haiq taub maiq maaib , lyemb ninb maaib ti'q tyen , zuvq xij zu'g zx'q mivb . ”
41004026	ye-su kxvq Jyenq mivb . “ Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb se Navq laanb myenb mivb haad Eim uaq Deig .

41004028	Dau kanb pun Eim Zwrtq , pun ka'naaiq Lo taaib zyavb Eim . ta'yetq pwatg Zwrtq miub , Lo taaib zyrug pau , cvj Zwrtq Byaub txq Jaub Eei .
41004029	Byaub zua'g Eei zyavb hog , uaq laanb myenb zyrug lovg ninb Eei limb vau mivb kaatq , weig zu'g syru Byaub Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q . ”
41004030	ye-su naaig , “ Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb se Navq haiq nx ? Bua xij zu'g lovg haiq Euvg waab peiq Zivj taaib peiq tu'q zu'g ?
41004031	se peiq nxm laib Jaaij Eim zwavj Fiag Dau . yem luvb Diaq , laib Jaaij Eim kaub faij Jiaj .
41004032	zwavj Fiag Dau zunj Zwrtq Lo taaib , kaub Lo Jiaj Euvb Euvg lai . Gwaab yaag Lo , nx'g zuvq taaib zruj laud pivj laavb . ”
41004033	ye-su cvj lovg naaiq Euvg waab peiq zunb tod pun zwavj myenb mwavj . ziuj myenb haib mevb pc'g Eei , ninb kxvq pun ninb Bua mwavj .

41005001	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g kaa-li-li Kxib txn , Tauj ke-laa-saa teig .
41005002	ye-su Zwrtq Ravq uaq zang , maaib laanb myenb yem uaq zrub kemb Zwrtq taaib pwavb zu'g ninb . naaiq laanb myenb maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq yem ninb Eei sin .

41006012	saib kxj Bua zyrug Zwrtq mivb Faauj myenb xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid .

41006016	he-lotq haid liud naaiq teij waag , ninb kxvq , “ tovb yia heug pcv Va'q Dutq mGxvq uaq taub yo-han taig mivb cvj navb taaib . ”
41006017	zinb Daavg , he-lotq Paaiq myenb mivb zx'q yo-han Dob Jyenq txb mivb wrnj lob . he-lotq Navq naaiq nx zruj se laaij he-lo-Dyetg . he-lo-Dyetg zruj he-lotq Eei yrud , fi-lipq , Eei auq mq paag he-lotq kanb lovg zruj auq .
41006018	yo-han zanb zang Buaj he-lotq , “ meib maiq maaib leid lovg meib Eei yrud Eei auq penj meib Eei auq . ”
41006019	weig naaiq he-lo-Dyetg nipg win xij taij yo-han . mq paag maiq haib taij ,
41006020	weig zu'g he-lotq kamb Riaj yo-han , hiuq tu'q yo-han se Kuq myenb , Zivb Revg myenb , zyrug peu Jyenq ninb Eei mcvg a'q . he-lotq haiq zang haid yo-han kxvq , ninb haid Hruq maiq henb , mq paag Zxg a'Neiq mwavj Eei .
41006021	zruj kau , he-lo-Dyetg tu'q Qavj Jaauq win . Tauj he-lotq Eei sib Eyetg Nxi , he-lotq Beng Naavj Zivq ninb Eei tomb Jyen Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq Zauj yem kaa-li-li scvq zruj Lo Eei myenb taaib zruj Kc'q .
41006022	uaq zang , he-lo-Dyetg Eei sia'q pia'g taaib Zavj heij , zruj pun he-lotq Zauj ninb Eei Kc'q myenb hxpg Hruq haig . he-lotq zyrug kxvq Buaj uaq taub sia'q , “ xij lovg haiq Euvg kunq Toq a'q . Toq haiq Euvg yia zyrug pun uaq Euvg meib a'q . ”
41006023	he-lotq huvb zyrug lcvd vcvg waag kxvq , “ maiq kunq meib Toq haiq Euvg , lyemb Toq pwrng yia kunq Eei teib puv , yia zyrug pun meib a'q . ”
41006024	uaq taub sia'q zyrug Zwrtq mivb naaig ninb Eei maa , “ yia xij zu'g Toq haiq Euvg ? ” ninb Eei maa tau , “ xij zu'g Toq tovb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Eei mGxvq . ”
41006025	uaq taub sia'q lyemb zeib syepg syepq Eei Rwrnj mivb Buaj he-lotq huvb , “ yia Toq huvb tiaj ib zang zx'q Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han Eei mGxvq an Jyenq Tx'g syenj txb taaib pun yia . ”
41006026	huvb tiaj haid naaiq teij waag ninb Raub haig . mq paag laaij ninb txv Jyenq Kc'q myenb lcvd liud vcvg waag , ninb maiq haib vcvg uaq taub sia'q Toq Eei waag .
41006027	ninb zyrug lyemb zeib Paaiq taub pcv mivb zx'q yo-han Eei mGxvq txb taaib . pcv zyrug mivb uaq lob Va'q Dutq yo-han Eei mGxvq
41006028	an Jyenq Tx'g syenj txb taaib pun uaq taub sia'q . sia'q yaag pun ninb Eei maa .
41006029	yo-han Eei saib kxj Bua haid liud naaiq teij sig , ninb Bua zyrug mivb zx'q yo-han Eei sei txb mivb zavj .
41006030	kovb zob Bua Rwrnj Tauj ye-su uaq , zx'q ninb Bua zruj Eei Zauj Faauj Eei yetg zuvq kxvq pun ye-su mwavj .
41006031	weig zu'g myenb Zamq haig mivb mivb taaib taaib , ye-su Bua lyemb maiq maaib zyavb hog Eang Naavj . ye-su zyrug Buaj saib kxj , “ Bua kanb mivb levb Eei txvj , zyrug tu'q hitq teij Kwrnj a'q . ”
41006032	ninb Bua zyrug pia'g Ravq Rcv Jyenq mivb levb Eei txvj .
41006033	mq paag myenb Zamq pwatg ninb Bua mivb yaag zia'q tu'q ninb Bua . nxmb nxm muvq Eei myenb zyrug Tiuj Jyenq kan Byenj mivb , zuvq Tauj Daavg ye-su Bua xij mivb uaq nxm txvj .
41006034	ye-su Zwrtq Ravq faauj Byenj mivb , pwatg myenb Zamq haig . ninb haid Kxb lyenb haig ninb Bua , pwatg ninb Bua Navq pa'ki yuvb maiq maaib zyruq kruj nx . ninb zyrug Jiad kxn Faauj Zamb Euvg ninb Bua .
41006035	luvb maanb Mwavj , ye-su Eei saib kxj taaib Buaj ninb , “ luvb aaq lamb Mwavj a'q . naaiq yaag levb Eei txvj .
41006036	Toq Buaj zwavj myenb mivb a'q , Buaj ninb Bua mivb naaiq teij txvj Eei Deib liub Jxm Zauj laavd pun ninb Bua kanb maaid Eang . ”
41006037	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua kanb lxd pun ninb Bua Eang maa'b ! ” ninb Bua naaig , “ saib tiaj xij yia Bua lovg Eig pc'q Nxi Eei kovb zinb maaid pun ninb Bua Eang fai ? ”
41006038	ye-su zyrug naaig ninb Bua , “ mivb mavg kaaj , meib Bua maaib Bu'ziaj nxm Fuaq ? ” ninb Bua mavg liud zyrug kxvq , “ maaib pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud . ”
41006039	ye-su heug saib kxj Bua Buaj zwavj myenb zweid Jyenq maaib miaq Eei txvj penj yetg Bomd yetg Bomd Eei .
41006040	maaib teij , yetg Bomd maaib yetg pc'q laanb . maaib teij Mmd zyepg laanb .
41006041	ye-su zyrug zx'q uaq teij pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud , Zau Myen mavg luvb , lcvd zivb Tinb huvb liud , zyrug mc'q Gxi Fuaq pun saib kxj pun Gxi zwavj myenb . uaq teij Byaud ninb yaag pun Gxi zwavj myenb .
41006042	zwavj myenb tu'q Eang peuq Revg .
41006043	Eang zevg uaq teij Fuaq Zauj Byaud , saib kxj Bua syru taaib tu'q zyepg Eeig Daan pwavq .
41006044	Eang Fuaq Eei myenb , mJavg txn maaib pyaa Zin taub .
41006045	ye-su lyemb zeib pe'q saib kxj Bua pia'g Ravq mivb Daavg , Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn , mivb Betg-sai-Daa muvq . ninb kanb yem uaq heug myenb pun Raanj Rwrnj Revg .
41006046	ye-su leib Gxi ninb Bua , zyrug faauj Bovb aiq mivb yem uaq tauj kauj .
41006047	luvb maanb Mwavj , saib kxj Bua Eei Ravq yem uaq Kxib txn Bu'Dovj , ye-su kanb yem uaq Byenj .
41006048	ninb pwatg saib kxj Bua Rcv Ravq Kruq haig , weig zu'g Ryaauj maiq sunj . luvb aaq lamb Fav , pua nxm Tauj Ju'q nxm zyavb hog Eei txvj , ye-su yavb uamb ming mivb saib kxj Bua uaq . ye-su Javb Jav xij yavb ninb Bua ka'Len Jiaj ,
41006049	mq paag saib kxj Bua pwatg ninb yavb uamb ming taaib , laaig Janb taig Fxid zyrug waib waid Eei naug ,
41006050	weig zu'g ninb Bua yetg zuvq pwatg ninb zyrug hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig . ye-su lyemb zeib kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ puvj Hruq maa'b ! se yia . maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . ”
41006051	ninb zyrug Zauj ninb Bua pia'g Ravq . Ryaauj yaag tivb mig a'q . saib kxj Bua kevb ! Bua'g hxvb haig a'q ,
41006052	weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq pia'g Hruq ye-su mc'q Fuaq wij pyaa Zin laanb myenb Eei eij leid . ninb Bua Eei Hruq vcvg haig .
41006053	ye-su Bua Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn zyrug Tauj ken-ne-saa-letq teig , tivb Jyenq Ravq uaq .
41006054	Zwrtq Ravq uaq zang , myenb zia'q tu'q ye-su ,
41006055	zyrug Tiuj mivb kxmj uaq nxm teib puv . ninb Bua haid kxvq ye-su yem haaij zyrug zx'q Jiug kcv putg pcvg myenb mivb Tauj uaq .
41006056	maiq kunq ye-su mivb Tauj haiq nxm tomb muvq fiub laavd fai Deib liub Jxm , myenb txb putg pcvg myenb mivb pweij uaq heib hxvg Toq ye-su pun pcvg myenb Kuvj Lua zu'g ninb Eei lwib Jua'q . haiq taub Lua zu'g , pcvg zyrug lovj mig a'q .
41007001	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib kapq zunq ye-su uaq .
41007002	ninb Bua pwatg maaib teij ye-su Eei saib kxj Eang Naavj Eei zyavb hog , maiq ei faa-li-sij myenb Eei leib Eeig Raauj puad Daavg , zyrug maaib wij .
41007003	( faa-li-sij myenb Zauj yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb ei ninb Bua ovb Taaij Eei eib trub zruj . maiq ei leib Eeig Raauj puad , ninb Bua zuvq maiq Eang Naavj .
41007004	mivb hei Rwrnj taaib , sij kxvq maiq ei leib Eeig Raauj puad Daavg , ninb Bua maiq Eang Naavj . cvj maaib Zamb Euvg leid ninb Bua xij zu'g kan . xij zu'g ei leib Eeig Raauj Zcvb yenq Zauj tovb si'q Jaab sig . )
41007005	faa-li-sij myenb Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv zyrug naaig ye-su , “ meib Eei saib kxj Bua weig haiq tiug maiq kan ovb Taaij Bua Eei eib trub zruj ? Eang Naavj Eei zyavb hog , ninb Bua Eei puad maaib wij yaag maiq Raauj ? ”
41007006	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , kxvq tu'q hxpg meib Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb . ninb fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ naaiq teij myenb lovg Rwib Taaib yia , mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq leib tu'q yia ko haig .
41007007	ninb Bua zavg yia se maiq lamb lovg . ninb Bua zx'q myenb kanb lyepg taaib Eei leid txvj yia Eei leid Faauj .
41007008	mivb hei Rwrnj taaib , sij kxvq maiq ei leib Eeig Raauj puad Daavg , ninb Bua maiq Eang Naavj . cvj maaib Zamb Euvg leid ninb Bua xij zu'g kan . xij zu'g ei leib Eeig Raauj Zcvb yenq Zauj tovb si'q Jaab sig . )
41007009	ye-su cvj kxvq , “ meib Bua kwai Byavb Ryaauj Zivj taaib kwavg Tinb huvb Eei leib latg weig ei Jyenq meib Bua kanb Eei eib trub zruj .
41007010	weig zu'g mo-se kxvq , ‘ xij zu'g Tovj nimg meib Bua Eei tiaj maag . ’ ‘ haiq taub zyruj ninb Eei tia fai maa , xij zu'g taij uaq taub kwavg . ’
41007011	mq paag meib Bua kxvq , sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb maaib haiq Euvg ka'naaiq haib lovg Tevj ninb Eei tia fai maa mq paag ninb kxvq , ‘ naaiq se ko-laa-Baan , ’ ( eij leid se fuvj pun Tinb huvb mig a'q ) ,
41007012	meib Bua zyrug maiq pun ninb zruj haiq Euvg Tevj ninb Eei tia fai maa .
41007013	meib Bua Navq naaig kan meib Bua Eei eib trub zruj zyrug pun Tinb huvb Eei waag maiq lamb lovg . cvj maaib Zamb tiug Jauq meib Bua yaag fib Navq Eei zruj . ”
41007014	ye-su cvj heug zwavj myenb taaib zunq zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua yetg zuvq mwavj yia og , yaag xij zu'g mevb pc'g .
41007015	maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eang pia'g Rwib Eei ka'naaiq haib pun myenb maaib wij . Kuvj yem myenb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib Eei , haib pun myenb maaib wij Navq .
41007016	haiq taub maaib mnxmb xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj og . ”
41007017	ye-su leib zwavj myenb pia'g pyauq uaq zang , ninb Eei saib kxj Toq ninb Pxq mevb naaiq Jruj waab peiq , peiq haiq Euvg .
41007018	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua za'kevb Navq ninb Bua nx , maiq pia'g Hruq fai ? meib Bua maiq hiuq fai ? maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eang pia'g Rwib Eei ka'naaiq haib pun myenb maaib wij .
41007019	Eang Eei ka'naaiq maiq zeid pia'g Hruq , Kuvj pia'g ka'siab Bua'g Navq zyrug puvj Zwrtq mig a'q . ” ( ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq ninb pun Ziv Euvb Euvg Eang Eei ka'naaiq maiq maaib wij ) .
41007020	ye-su cvj kxvq , “ se yem myenb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq Eei Jauq pun myenb maaib wij .
41007021	weig zu'g myenb yem Hruq ka'Euad Namq Zwrtq waaig sig , Yenj sia'q Yenj txn , zruj za'g , taij myenb , Yenj auq Yenj Goj ,
41007022	mauq ka'naaiq , zruj waaig sig , Duaq myenb , zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg , mweig Jia'q , kxvq waab huq , Zevb Lo , maiq kunq zinb hod .
41007023	naaiq teij yetg zuvq waaig sig se yem myenb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib pun myenb maaib wij . ”
41007024	ye-su leib uaq nxm txvj cvj mivb Tauj Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn zivb Eei teig , pia'g nxm pyauq . ninb maiq xij myenb hiuq tu'q ninb yem naaig mq paag pivj maiq Bweid a'q .
41007025	maaib taub Janb mwavd , ninb Eei sia'q zu'g Yiab kwaiq myenq mua'q . uaq taub Janb mwavd haid myenb kxvq ye-su zruj Eei sig , zyrug lyemb zeib taaib Tauj , Baapq Fiag ye-su Eei zaub Len .
41007026	naaiq taub msia'q txn se Janj , yem si-lia scvq Eei fi-ni-sia teig Zwrtq seij . ninb Toq ye-su zung mua'q ninb Eei sia'q uaq taub myenq Zwrtq .
41007027	mq paag ye-su tau , “ xij zu'g pun fu'Jweiq Eang peuq Daavg . maiq hxpg zu'g zx'q fu'Jweiq Eei Naavj zxi pun Juq Eang . ”
41007028	naaiq taub Janb mwavd kxvq , “ tomb kxj aag , Juq mtaaib yem tiab Diaq Raud fu'Jweiq Eei Naavb Meib Dxtq Eang . ”
41007029	ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb , “ weig zu'g meib tau uaq Jruj waag , kunq Rwrnj pyauq a'q . myenq zuvq Zwrtq meib Eei sia'q Eei sin mig a'q . ”
41007030	uaq taub Janb mwavd zyrug Rwrnj pyauq , pwatg ninb Eei fu'Jweiq pweij Jyenq uaq Zruj . myenq za'kevb Zwrtq mig a'q .
41007031	ye-su zyrug leib Gxi Tai-la'q teig Jiaj sai-Dxn zivb , yavb Totq-Bu-li scvq mivb kaa-li-li Kxib txn .
41007032	maaib teij myenb txb taub mnxmb Duv , Byetg lrug Eei myenb taaib Toq ye-su maan Jyenq ninb .
41007033	ye-su zyrug txb uaq taub myenb Zwrtq mivb levb Eei txvj , leib Gxi zwavj myenb . ninb lovg puab Do'q Zo'q Jyenq uaq taub Eei i puv mnxmb Kwrtq . cvj Twiq uamb Rwib taaib zaab Jyenq uaq taub Eei Byetg .
41007034	ye-su zyrug Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig luvb , Tauq tomb Qiaj , cvj kxvq Buaj uaq taub myenb , “ e-faa-Taa ! ” ( eij leid se , “ Kxi Gxi maa'b ! ” )
41007035	uaq taub myenb lyemb zeib haib mwavj tu'q haid . Byetg yaag lovj mig a'q . kxvq tu'q waag Junb a'q .
41007036	ye-su hatg zwavj myenb maiq tuvq kxvq Buaj haiq taub . mq paag ninb yetg zei hatg , ninb Bua yetg zei kxvq Buaj myenb Zamq .
41007037	tu'q haid Eei myenb za'kevb ! Bua'g hxvb haig . ninb Bua kxvq , “ ye-su zruj haiq Euvg za'kevb zruj tu'q lovj haig ! lyemb mnxmb Duv Eei myenb ninb zxg lovj , haib mwavj tu'q haid . ka'naaib Vovj yaag haib kxvq waag . ”
41008001	yem uaq teij Nxi myenb Zamq haig cvj kapq zunq . zruj kau , ninb Bua maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eang a'q . ye-su zyrug heug ninb Eei saib kxj Bua taaib yaag Buaj ninb Bua ,
41008002	“ yia Kxb lyenb haig naaiq teij myenb . ninb Bua taaib Zauj yia yem tu'q pua Nxi a'q . ib zang yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eang .
41008003	sij kxvq yia pun ninb Bua Hruq sia Jyenq Rwrnj pyauq , Raub heij Tauj Daamb Jauq mau haig , haib Kiv mq pei . maaib teij yaag yem ko Eei taaib . ”
41008004	ninb Eei saib kxj Bua tau , “ yem naaiq teib puvb Waav , haiq taub haib lxd tu'q ka'naaiq kauj pun Dovg naaig Zamq Eei myenb Eang ? ”
41008005	ye-su naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua maaib Bu'ziaj nxm Fuaq ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ maaib siag nxm . ”
41008006	ye-su zyrug heug zwavj myenb zweid Jyenq uaq Dau . ninb zx'q uaq teij siag nxm Fuaq taaib lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb , cvj mc'q Gxi Zunq pun saib kxj txb mivb pun Gxi zwavj myenb . saib kxj Bua zyrug txb mivb pun Gxi zwavj myenb a'q .
41008007	ninb Bua cvj maaib i ziaj taub Byaub txn . ye-su zyrug weig naaiq teij Byaud lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb , zyrug Buaj saib kxj Bua pun Gxi zwavj myenb .
41008008	zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg . saib kxj Bua zyrug mivb syru Eang zevg uaq teij taaib tapq pwavq siag nxm Daan .
41008009	Eang Eei myenb leib maiq ko pyei Zin laanb . ye-su heug zwavj myenb pun Raanj liud ,
41008010	zyrug Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj lyemb zeib pia'g Ravq mivb Daan-maa-nu-Taa teig .
41008011	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb taaib lxd ye-su , zyrug Jiad kxn Zauj ye-su Rcv . ninb Bua xij seij ninb Zivj taaib Toq ninb pun nxm yem Tinb txvb taaib Eei Javb hog .
41008012	ye-su Tauq Jyenq tomb Qiaj kxvq , “ naaiq txig myenb weig haiq tiug Toq nxm Javb hog ? yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yia maiq pun Javb hog meib Bua ib Jaaj Eei myenb mavg . ”
41008013	ye-su zyrug leib Gxi ninb Bua mig a'q . cvj pia'g Ravq Rcv Jyenq mivb uaq vaang zi'g Kxib txn .
41008014	saib kxj Bua la'Ku'q maiq txb Fuaq mivb . ninb Bua yem uaq Ravq Kuvj maaib Du'g nxm Fuaq Navq .
41008015	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ xij zu'g faij fim , Buvb Jyenq faa-li-sij myenb Eei pivq Zauj he-lotq huvb Eei pivq . ”
41008016	saib kxj Bua , laanb Zauj laanb kxvq , “ saib tiaj Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g Bua maiq maaib Fuaq mq pei ? ”
41008017	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Navq haiq nx kxvq , ninb zyrug naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug Zaavb laavb kxvq maiq maaib Fuaq ? meib Bua Zxg maiq mevb pc'g , maiq pia'g Hruq fai ? meib Bua za'kevb Dovg naaig Vovj ?
41008018	meib Bua maaib mziv yaag mavg maiq pwatg ? maaib mnxmb yaag mwavj maiq haid ? meib Bua maiq Javj fai ?
41008019	yia mc'q Gxi pyaa nxm Fuaq pun pyaa Zin laanb myenb Eang uaq zang , meib Bua syru Eang zevg Eei , tu'q Bu'ziaj Daan pwavq ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ tu'q zyepg Eeig Daan . ”
41008020	ye-su cvj naaig , “ yia mc'q Gxi siag nxm Fuaq pun pyei Zin laanb myenb Eang uaq Rung , meib Bua syru Eang zevg uaq teij tu'q Bu'ziaj Daan ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ tu'q siag Daan . ”
41008021	ye-su cvj naaig , “ Navq naaig , meib Bua Zxg maiq kcvb mevb pc'g fai ? ”
41008022	ye-su Bua taaib Tauj Betg-sai-Daa laavd , maaib teij myenb Ken taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb taaib lxd ye-su , Toq ye-su maan ninb .
41008023	ye-su Ken Jyenq uaq taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g laavd zyrug Twiq uamb Rwib zaab Jyenq ninb Eei mziv , yaag lovg puad maan Jyenq naaig ninb , “ meib mavg tu'q pwatg teij haiq Euvg fai ? ”
41008024	uaq taub myenb Zau Myen taaib mavg yaag kxvq , “ yia pwatg myenb mq paag pwatg ninb Bua Navq Dyavj nx , yavb mivb yavb taaib . ”
41008025	ye-su cvj maan Rung ninb Eei mziv . ninb zyrug Qa'q mavg . naaiq Rung zyrug mavg tu'q pwatg a'q . haiq Euvg yaag pwatg tu'q zyen .
41008026	ye-su heug ninb Rwrnj pyauq cvj hatg ninb , “ maiq tuvq cvj pia'g laavd a'q og . ”
41008027	Jiaj mivb , ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb si-saa-li-yaa fi-lipq-Pxi zivb Eei fiub laavd . kan Jauq mivb uaq zang , ye-su naaig saib kxj Bua , “ myenb kxvq yia tovb haiq taub ? ”
41008028	ninb Bua tau , “ maaib teij kxvq meib tovb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han . maaib teij kxvq , e-li-yaa . cvj maaib teij kxvq , penj taub trug waag myenb . ”
41008029	ye-su cvj naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua ni ? meib Bua kxvq yia tovb haiq taub ? ” pi-te tau , “ meib tovb ki-tug uaq taub . ”
41008030	ye-su zyrug hatg ninb Bua , “ Zinb maang maiq tuvq Buaj myenb yia tovb haiq taub . ”
41008031	yem naaig taaib ye-su Jiad kxn Faauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij zu'g syrug Zamb Euvg Kruq . myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv xij Gemb yia . yia yaag xij zu'g myenb taij taig mq paag ta'faam Nxi yia cvj navb taaib . ”
41008032	ninb kxvq naaiq teij sig mevb Eei . pi-te zyrug Ken ye-su mivb Pyen teij Kwinj ninb .
41008033	mq paag ye-su Win Rwrnj mavg Jyenq saib kxj Bua , yaag kxvq pi-te , “ saa-taan aa'b ! pyauj Gxi maa'b ! meib Namq Eei sig se maiq zeid Navq Tinb huvb Namq . se Navq paamb myenb Namq Zwrtq Eei sig Navq . ”
41008034	ye-su zyrug heug zwavj myenb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua taaib zunq yaag Buaj ninb Bua , “ haiq taub xij kan yia mivb xij zu'g siaq Jyenq ninb kanb , Daam Jyenq ninb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj , kan yia mivb .
41008035	haiq taub Kuvj Namq Fruj ninb kanb Eei mcvg Navq , uaq taub Eei mcvg zyrug zu'g kwavg . mq paag haiq taub weig yia yaag weig Kuq fyenj kwavg ninb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug Fruj tu'q ninb Eei mcvg .
41008036	haiq taub tu'q Revg luvb Diaq Eei ka'naaiq mq paag zu'g kwavg ninb Eei mcvg , uaq taub tu'q haiq Euvg maaib lamb lovg ?
41008037	ninb maaib haiq Euvg haib Tiuq tu'q ninb Eei mcvg Rwrnj ?
41008038	yem naaiq txig x'q haig , Yiab Hruq Eei myenb , sij kxvq haiq taub Eaiq yia yaag Eaiq yia Faauj Eei waag , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yem yia Eei tia Eei Favb laavg , yaag Zauj Zivb Revg Eei finb myenb taaib uaq zang , zyrug Eaiq uaq taub a'q . ”
41009001	ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , sruq Jyenq naaiq Eei myenb maaib teij zuvq maiq kcvb taig zyrug tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb maaib Jyenq nrnb Eei Qa'q taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb . ”
41009002	Ga'haaq Ju'q Nxi , ye-su txb Jyenq pi-te , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han faauj nxm Bovb Lav , levb Eei txvj . saib kxj Bua mavg Jyenq uaq zang , pwatg ye-su Tiuq Revg mig a'q .
41009003	ninb Eei lwib hruj Bopq pc'g Eei , zcvb zcvb uaq . luvb Diaq maiq maaib haiq taub haib Roj tu'q ninb Eei lwib hruj Dovg naaig pc'g .
41009004	uaq teij pua taub saib kxj cvj pwatg e-li-yaa Zauj mo-se hing Zwrtq yem uaq Zauj ye-su kxvq waag .
41009005	pi-te zyrug kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! yia Bua yem naaiq kevb lovj haig . Toq pun yia Bua zruj pua nxm liub , zruj nxm pun meib , zruj nxm pun mo-se , cvj zruj nxm pun e-li-yaa . ”
41009006	pi-te Zauj uaq teij saib kxj kamb Riaj haig , zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q xij zu'g kxvq haiq Euvg .
41009007	maaib txq Bwrnj taaib om Jyenq ninb Bua . cvj maaib Qiaj yem uaq Bwrnj kxvq , “ naaiq se yia Eei txnb Namq . mwavj ninb maa'b ! ”
41009008	saib kxj Bua lyemb zeib mavg naaiq mavg uaq , maiq pwatg haiq taub Zauj ninb Bua yem . Kuvj pwatg ye-su kanb Navq .
41009009	yem Bov Fiag taaib uaq zang ye-su hatg ninb Bua , “ maiq tuvq kxvq meib Bua pwatg liud naaiq teij sig Buaj haiq taub . zuaq yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taig mivb cvj navb taaib Zivj taaib kxvq og . ”
41009010	saib kxj Bua haid liud naaiq teij waag zyrug yem Hruq Javj Jyenq , laanb Zauj laanb kxvq , “ ‘ taig mivb cvj navb taaib ’ uaq Jruj waag maaib haiq Euvg eij leid ? ”
41009011	saib kxj Bua zyrug naaig ye-su , “ Faauj leid Eei finb scv weig haiq tiug kxvq e-li-yaa xij zu'g taaib Daavg ? ”
41009012	ye-su tau , “ e-li-yaa za'kevb taaib Daavg , pun Euvb Euvg Rwrnj taaib Navq lod uaq nx . mq paag kivb sru weig haiq tiug fiaq paamb myenb Eei txn xij zu'g syrug ziaj Euvg Kruq , yaag zu'g myenb Gemb ?
41009013	yia Buaj meib Bua , e-li-yaa zuvq Tauj taaib a'q . myenb yaag sweib eij zruj pun ninb mig a'q , Navq kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq nx . ”
41009014	ye-su Bua cvj Rwrnj Tauj uaq teij saib kxj Bua uaq , pwatg myenb Zamq haig weib kxmj ninb Bua . cvj maaib teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv yem uaq Zauj ninb Bua Rcv .
41009015	zwavj myenb yetq pwatg ye-su , ninb Bua kevb Bua'g hxvb haig yaag Tiuj Jyenq mivb zipq .
41009016	ye-su naaig ninb Eei saib kxj , “ meib Bua Zauj ninb Bua Rcv haiq Euvg ? ”
41009017	yem zwavj myenb ka'Euad , maaib laanb myenb tau , “ finb scv aag , yia txb yia Eei txn taaib lxd meib weig zu'g maaib taub Yiab kwaiq myenq mua'q ninb maiq haib kxvq waag .
41009018	maiq kunq yem haaij , myenq yaag mua'q ninb , zx'q ninb zov Fiag Dau . maaib uamb Rwib Byaaud Zwrtq , ninb yaag vaatg Jyenq Eaab , Zyru vcvg Revg . yia Toq meib Eei saib kxj zung myenq Zwrtq , mq paag ninb Bua maiq haib zung maiq Zwrtq . ”
41009019	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua naaiq txig myenb aa'b ! meib Bua za'kevb maiq syenj ! yia xij zu'g Zauj meib Bua yem Dovg haaij laub ? yia xij zu'g Eyend meib Bua Tauj haiq zang ? txb uaq taub txn taaib yia naaiq maa'b ! ”
41009020	ninb Bua zyrug txb uaq taub txn taaib . myenq yetq pwatg ye-su , zyrug lyemb zeib mua'q uaq taub txn Zyru Kiv Fiag Dau mivb , Favj Tin Favj teig Eei , yaag Zwrtq uamb Rwib Byaaud .
41009021	ye-su naaig uaq taub txn Eei tia , “ ninb Navq naaiq nx penj taaib Dovg haaij laub ? ” uaq taub tia tau , “ yem faij Eei zyavb hog penj taaib a'q .
41009022	ziaj Rung uaq taub Yiab kwaiq myenq mua'q ninb Kiv pia'g trub Raug fai Dxtq uam , xij pun ninb taig . sij kxvq finb scv haib nx , Toq Kxb lyenb yia Bua , Tevj yia Bua maa'b ! ”
41009023	ye-su kxvq , “ meib naaig , ‘ sij kxvq meib haib ? ’ ta'faanb haiq taub syenj , ninb Euvb Euvg zruj tu'q Eei . ”
41009024	uaq taub txn Eei tia lyemb zeib heug Jyenq kxvq , “ yia syenj Eei , mq paag tovb yia syenj maiq Tauj Eei , Toq meib Tevj yia haib syenj . ”
41009025	ye-su pwatg zwavj myenb Bevj Jyenq taaib fatq haig zyrug hatg uaq taub Yiab kwaiq myenq . ninb kxvq , “ meib naaig taub mnxmb Duv , ka'naaib Vovj myenq aa'b ! yia hatg meib Zwrtq naaiq taub txn taaib , yetg liud maiq tuvq mua'q ninb a'q . ”
41009026	myenq waib waid Eei heug , cvj mua'q uaq taub txn Zyru Kruq haig , zyav naaig Zwrtq mig a'q . pwatg uaq taub txn Navq Janb taig nx . myenb Zamq zyrug kxvq , “ ninb taig mig a'q lo'b ! ”
41009027	mq paag ye-su nanq Jyenq ninb Eei puad , Ken Jiad sin taaib . ninb zyrug sruq Jyenq a'q .
41009028	Ga'haaq ye-su pia'g pyauq , saib kxj Bua pivj Jyenq naaig ninb , “ yia Bua weig haiq tiug zung uaq taub myenq maiq Zwrtq ? ”
41009029	ye-su tau , “ xij zu'g tauj kauj Zivj taaib haib zung tu'q naaiq Euvg myenq Zwrtq . maiq maaib kanb Euvg za'eij a'q . ”
41009030	ye-su Bua leib Gxi uaq nxm txvj cvj Jiaj kaa-li-li scvq . ye-su maiq xij haiq taub hiuq tu'q ninb yem haaij ,
41009031	weig zu'g ninb Faauj Jyenq ninb Eei saib kxj . ninb kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua , “ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zuvq xij zu'g Jiu pun myenb . ninb Bua xij taij yia mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia xij navb taaib . ”
41009032	mq paag saib kxj Bua maiq mevb pc'g naaiq Jruj waag Eei eij leid yaag kamb Riaj maiq naaig ye-su .
41009033	ninb Bua mivb Tauj Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq . pia'g pyauq mivb , ye-su zyrug naaig ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ kan Jauq taaib uaq zang , meib Bua Rcv haiq Euvg ? ”
41009034	mq paag ninb Bua maiq Ko lo weig zu'g kan Jauq taaib uaq zang ninb Bua Rcv haiq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj .
41009035	ye-su zyrug zweid Fiag , heug ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj taaib zunq zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ haiq taub xij zruj Lo Jiaj , uaq taub xij zu'g pun kanb zruj faij Jiaj yaag zruj zwavj myenb Eei pru . ”
41009036	ye-su cvj Ken taub fu'Jweiq taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Bu'Dovj yaag Lxpq Jyenq Buaj saib kxj Bua ,
41009037	“ haiq taub tevq yia Eei Buaj zipq taub naaiq teij faij Eei fu'Jweiq , uaq taub yaag zipq yia . haiq taub zipq yia , maiq taan zipq yia , ninb yaag zipq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub . ”
41009038	yo-han Buaj ye-su , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! yia Bua pwatg taub myenb lovg meib Eei Buaj zung myenq Zwrtq . yia Bua zyrug laanb ninb , maiq pun zruj , weig zu'g ninb maiq zeid zruj Bua Eei kwanb . ”
41009039	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ maiq tuvq laanb ninb , weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq taub haib lovg yia Eei Buaj zruj liud Bua'g hxvb Eei sig , Du'g tavb Navq taauj Rwrnj taaib kxvq to'g yia .
41009040	weig zu'g haiq taub maiq Zauj Bua txib tekg , uaq taub se Tevj Bua a'q .
41009041	yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , haiq taub pun zaanq uam meib Bua hopq weig zu'g meib Bua kwei ki-tug , uaq taub Eei zivb Eeig maiq haib Dxtq . ”
41009042	“ sij kxvq haiq taub Duaq yetg taub naaiq teij syenj yia Eei fu'Jweib faij paamd zwid , zx'q tomb mxg Diuj Jyenq uaq taub Eei Jaav , puvj Fiag Kxiq kaub lovj .
41009043	“ sij kxvq meib Eei puad Duaq meib paamd zwid , xij zu'g Va'q kwavg . zo'g Jia'q puad mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg Zxg kaub lovj maaib i Jia'q puad mq paag Dxtq teig Eua'g , pia'g yetg liud zia'g Jyenq Eei trud .
41009044	yem uaq Eang ninb Bua uaq teij kcvb mau yetg liud maiq taig . puaq ninb Bua uaq Euvg trud yaag yetg liud zia'g Jyenq Eei .
41009045	“ sij kxvq meib Eei zauj Duaq meib paamd zwid , xij zu'g Va'q kwavg . zo'g Jia'q zauj mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg Zxg kaub lovj maaib i Jia'q zauj mq paag zu'g zxi Fiag teig Eua'g .
41009046	yem uaq Eang ninb Bua uaq teij kcvb mau yetg liud maiq taig . puaq ninb Bua uaq Euvg trud yaag yetg liud zia'g Jyenq Eei .
41009047	“ sij kxvq meib Eei mziv Duaq meib paamd zwid xij zu'g kweij kwavg mivb . zo'g nxm mziv mq paag tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Zxg kaub lovj maaib i nxm mziv yaag zu'g zxi Fiag teig Eua'g .
41009048	yem uaq Eang ninb Bua uaq teij kcvb mau yetg liud maiq taig . puaq ninb Bua uaq Euvg trud yaag yetg liud zia'g Jyenq Eei .
41009049	“ Tinb huvb xij lovg trud pun taub taub myenb Zivb Revg , Navq myenb zx'q Rauq an ziag Eei ka'naaiq weig pun uaq Euvg ka'naaiq Zivb Revg , maiq maaib wij nx .
41009050	“ Rauq se lovj Eei . mq paag sij kxvq Rauq Eei mweij Twij zaamq mivb , Navq haiq nx nxig tu'q Raaib taaib ? Rauq Navq haiq nx pun Eang hopq maaib mweij , meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx laanb Zauj laanb zruj hxpg , laanb Zauj laanb hxpg fim tovb eij Eei yem . ”
41010001	ye-su Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj mivb yu-Dia scvq cvj Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib . myenb Zamq haig cvj taaib kapq zunq ninb uaq . ninb zyrug Navq yetg kau nx , Faauj ninb Bua .
41010002	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb taaib xij seij ye-su zyrug naaig , “ Goj leib ninb Eei auq se hxpg Bua Eei leid Eei fai ? ”
41010003	ye-su tau , “ mo-se Navq haiq nx Buaj meib Bua ? ”
41010004	ninb Bua tau , “ mo-se pun Goj fiaq zeiq leib Zai sru pun auq zyrug heug auq mivb mig a'q . ”
41010005	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ se laaij meib Bua Hruq vcvg mo-se Zivj taaib fiaq naaiq tiub leid .
41010006	mq paag zinb Daavg Tinb huvb zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang , ‘ Tinb huvb zeij myenb taaib penj mJavg msia'q . ’
41010007	‘ weig naaiq mJavg txn txv Jaa , leib ninb Eei tiaj maag , Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei auq kapq taaib .
41010008	ninb Bua i taub zyrug penj yetg taub mig a'q . ’ Navq naaig , ninb Bua maiq zeid i taub a'q . penj yetg taub Navq .
41010009	weig naaiq , Tinb huvb kapq taaib Eei Zaib txij , maiq tuvq pun myenb Zc'q Gxi . ”
41010010	pia'g pyauq mivb uaq zang , saib kxj Bua Toq ye-su kxvq mevb naaiq tiug Jauq .
41010011	ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ haiq taub leib ninb Eei auq , cvj mivb lovg syavb auq , ninb se Yenj auq Navq , yaag txvg ninb Eei lob auq .
41010012	auq yaag fib Navq Eei . sij kxvq leib ninb Eei Goj cvj lovg syavb Goj , ninb se Yenj Goj Navq . ”
41010013	maaib teij myenb txb fu'Jweiq taaib lxd ye-su , xij ye-su maan ninb Bua , mq paag saib kxj Bua kxvq uaq teij myenb .
41010014	ye-su pwatg zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig , kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua , “ kunq pun fu'Jweiq taaib lxd yia . maiq tuvq laanb ninb Bua saa . weig zu'g haiq taub lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb , se Navq naaiq teij fu'Jweiq nx .
41010015	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub maiq Navq taub fu'Jweiq lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb , uaq taub yetg liud maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
41010016	kxvq liud , ye-su zyrug Lxpq fu'Jweiq , yetg taub yetg taub maan Jyenq pwav waag ninb Bua .
41010017	ye-su cvj Zwrtq Jauq uaq zang , maaib laanb myenb Tiuj taaib , kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Ra'Myen naaig ninb , “ pcvb fim Eei finb scv aa'b ! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg ? ”
41010018	ye-su naaig ninb , “ meib weig haiq tiug heug yia zruj pcvb fim Eei myenb ? Zwrtq liud Tinb huvb , maiq maaib haiq taub pcvb fim .
41010019	meib yaag hiuq tu'q leib latg . leib latg kxvq , ‘ maiq tuvq taij myenb , maiq tuvq Yenj auq Yenj Goj , maiq tuvq zruj za'g , maiq tuvq zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj , maiq tuvq Pyenj myenb , xij zu'g Tovj nimg tiaj maag . ’ ”
41010020	uaq taub myenb kxvq , “ finb scv aag , naaiq teij leid yia faib faij Eei fyru Tauj ib zang a'q . ”
41010021	ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb , yaag Namq ninb , zyrug kxvq , “ meib Zxg Zaa yetg Euvg maiq kcvb tu'q zruj . xij zu'g mivb maaig Revg meib maaib Eei ka'naaiq , cvj zx'q uaq teij Eaanb pun myenb Jomg myenb . Navq naaiq meib zyrug maaib Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq syru Jyenq uaq Tinb txvb . zruj liud , taaib kan yia og . ”
41010022	uaq taub myenb yetq haid naaiq Jruj waag , Myen Byeng Revg , zyav naaig Raub Raub Eei mivb mig a'q , weig zu'g ninb maaib Jaab tivb hod haig .
41010023	ye-su Win mavg ninb Eei saib kxj , Buaj ninb Bua , “ putg zxib myenb a'g tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
41010024	saib kxj Bua'g hxvb naaiq Jruj waag mq paag ye-su Ripg Jyenq kxvq , “ fu'Jweiq aag , weig Kauj zinb zxib uaq teij , za'kevb a'g tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q .
41010025	lxb Txb Zunj Jiaj simb Bywig Zxg kaub huvb heg putg zxib myenb pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
41010026	saib kxj Bua kevb ! Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug naaig , “ uaq Euvg , haiq taub haib tu'q Fruj ? ”
41010027	ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Bua cvj kxvq , “ paamb myenb maiq haib Fruj kanb mq paag Tinb huvb haib Eei . maang sig Tinb huvb haib zruj tu'q Eei . ”
41010028	pi-te zyrug Buaj ninb , “ mavg kaaj , yia Bua kwavg Revg Euvb Euvg taaib kan saib tiaj . ”
41010029	ye-su kxvq , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub weig yia yaag weig Kuq fyenj kwavg pyauq fai muab txig fai tiaj maag fai fu'Jweiq fai livb teig ,
41010030	uaq taub kwavg naaiq teij yetg kruq , yem naaiq seij ninb xij tu'q yetg pc'q kruq . xij tu'q pyauq , muab txig , maa , fu'Jweiq , livb teig , yaag zu'g myenb zruj to'g . Ga'haaq hivq ninb yaag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
41010031	mq paag yem uaq Daavg maaib myenb Zamq xij zu'g Rwrnj Ga'haaq , yem Ga'haaq maaib myenb Zamq tu'q yem uaq Daavg . ”
41010032	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . mivb uaq zang , ye-su mivb Daavg . saib kxj Bua kan ninb mivb yaag Bua'g hxvb haig . kan ninb Bua mivb uaq teij myenb yaag kamb Riaj Eei . ye-su cvj txb uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj mivb Pyen teij , kxvq Ga'haaq hivq ninb kanb xij zu'g pwavb Eei sig Buaj ninb Bua .
41010033	ninb kxvq , “ mwavj og . Bua mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . Tauj uaq , paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug zu'g Jiu pun sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv . ninb Bua xij tivg taij ninb , yaag zx'q ninb Jiu pun Janj .
41010034	Janj zyrug kwatg to'g Jyetq ninb , Twiq uamb Rwib nctq ninb , lovg pyaab pin Bx'q , yaag taij ninb . mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi ninb zyrug cvj navb taaib . ”
41010035	sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han , taaib lxd ye-su yaag kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! yia Bua xij meib ei Jyenq yia Bua Toq Eei waag zruj . ”
41010036	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua xij yia Tevj meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg ? ”
41010037	ninb Bua tau , “ meib faauj weig zruj huvb tu'q Favb laavg uaq zang , Toq pun yia Bua zweid taub meib Eei Byaaug mcvj , zweid taub meib Eei zaaij mcvj og . ”
41010038	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua Toq Eei meib Bua maiq hiuq . meib Bua haib hopq tovb yia xij zu'g hopq uaq nxm zaanq fai ? meib Bua haib Jiaj tovb yia xij zu'g Jiaj uaq Euvg leid fai ? ”
41010039	ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua haib Eei . ” ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia hopq Eei zaanq meib Bua za'kevb xij zu'g hopq . yia Jiaj Eei leid meib Bua za'kevb xij zu'g Jiaj .
41010040	mq paag yia maiq maaib leid Paaiq haiq taub zweid yia Eei Byaaug mcvj fai zaaij mcvj . Tinb huvb liug leid zyavj pun haiq taub zweid , uaq teij tu'q zweid a'q . ”
41010041	uaq teij zyepg taub saib kxj haid liud naaiq teij sig , zyrug Qiaj Jiad yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han .
41010042	ye-su heug ninb Bua yetg zuvq taaib Rxib yaag kxvq , “ meib Bua hiuq tu'q Janj funj zruj ninb Bua Eei tomb Jyen uaq teij lovg hatg maad kunq ninb Bua . zruj Lo uaq teij lovg hatg maad hatg ninb Bua .
41010043	mq paag , meib Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaig . haiq taub xij tu'q zruj Lo , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj meib Bua Eei pru .
41010044	haiq taub xij zruj Lo Jiaj , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj zwavj myenb Eei nrub .
41010045	weig zu'g lyemb yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , maiq zeid taaib xij myenb fub suj yia . yia taaib fub suj myenb yaag siaq yia Eei mcvg weig zua'g myenb Zamq Rwrnj . ”
41010046	ninb Bua mivb Tauj ye-li-Ko zivb . ye-su Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei saib kxj , cvj Zauj Jyenq myenb Zamq Zwrtq zivb uaq zang , maaib taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb zweid Jyenq Jaub Len Toq Eaanb . tovb Ti-me-atg Eei txn uaq taub Baa-Ti-me-atg .
41010047	ninb haid kxvq , Jiaj Jauq uaq taub se naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su , ninb zyrug heug Jyenq kxvq , “ Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun , ye-su aa'b ! Kxb lyenb yia maa'b ! ”
41010048	myenb Zamq Eei hemj ninb , Buaj ninb maiq tuvq Ko lo . mq paag ninb Jaa heug kaub Bwi teij , “ Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b ! Kxb lyenb yia maa'b ! ”
41010049	ye-su zyrug tivb Jyenq yaag kxvq , “ heug ninb taaib naaiq maa'b ! ” ninb Bua zyrug heug uaq taub mziv mcvb Eei myenb . ninb Bua kxvq , “ kunq puvj Hruq a'q . Jiad sin taaib . ninb heug meib a'q . ”
41010050	Baa-Ti-me-atg zyrug Jaiq kwavg ninb Eei tomb lwi , Gwa'q sin taaib , mivb Tauj ye-su uaq .
41010051	ye-su naaig ninb , “ meib xij yia Tevj haiq Euvg meib ? ” mziv mcvb myenb tau , “ finb scv aag , yia xij haib mavg tu'q pwatg . ”
41010052	ye-su Buaj ninb , “ kunq mivb a'q . laaij meib syenj yia , meib Eei mziv zyrug lovj . ” ninb lyemb zeib haib mavg tu'q pwatg zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb mig a'q .
41011001	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Tauj fatq teij ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , yem ka'lanq Bov , nitq Betg-faa-yi Zauj Be-Taa-ni laavd . ye-su zyrug Paaiq i taub ninb Eei saib kxj mivb Daavg ,
41011002	Buaj zyavj ninb Bua , “ xij zu'g mivb Ra'Myen mcvj uaq nxm laavd . yetq pia'g laavd zyrug pwatg taub maa-li txn , myenb maiq kcvb keb Jiaj , Dob Jyenq uaq . xij zu'g Jaiq Ken taaib naaiq .
41011003	sij kxvq haiq taub naaig meib Bua , ‘ meib Bua fuvg Navq naaiq nx zruj ? ’ xij zu'g tau ninb , ‘ zyruq Qyemj zu'g lovg . aaq tavb zyrug fuvj Rwrnj a'q . ’ ”
41011004	ninb Bua zyrug mivb , yaag pwatg taub maa-li txn Dob Jyenq kcvb Daavg , yem uaq Jaub Len .
41011005	saib kxj Bua Jaiq uaq zang , sruq ka'Len Eei myenb naaig , “ meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg Jaiq maa-li txn ? ”
41011006	ninb Bua zyrug ei ye-su Eei waag tau . uaq teij myenb zyrug pun ninb Bua Ken Jyenq mivb a'q .
41011007	Ken Tauj ye-su uaq , ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi timg Jyenq maa-li Eei ti'g taand . ye-su zyrug keb Jyenq a'q .
41011008	myenb Zamq Eei lovg kanb Eei tomb lwi timg uaq Jauq . maaib teij yaag mivb Deig kc'q Dyavb nxmb yetg txq yetg txq Eei , timg Jyenq Jauq .
41011009	mivb Daavg uaq teij , Zauj Ga'haaq kan Jyenq mivb uaq teij , lomb Rxib heug , “ ho-saa-naa ! Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub .
41011010	Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q pun meib xij lyepg Eei kua'q , se Bua Eei ovb Taaij , Daa-witq huvb , Eei kua'q . ho-saa-naa ! Zev yem Lav Jiaj uaq taub Tinb huvb . ”
41011011	ye-su Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem yaag pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq mavg Revg Euvb Euvg . mq paag luvb aaq lamb teij Mwavj a'q . ninb cvj Zauj ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj zyrug Zwrtq zivb mivb Be-Taa-ni laavd .
41011012	ta'Eeig Dxm , ye-su Bua Zwrtq Be-Taa-ni laavd uaq zang , ye-su Hruq sia .
41011013	ninb pwatg maaib zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj yem ko teij Eei , maaib nxmb Eyemd Eei . ninb zyrug mivb Tauj Dyavb kxn mavg kaaj , maaib pyruq fai maiq maaib . mq paag Kuvj pwatg nxmb Navq , maiq maaib pyruq , weig zu'g maiq kcvb Tauj zyavb pyruq Eei zyavb hog .
41011014	ye-su Buaj uaq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj , “ yavb naaiq Jiaj , maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q Eang meib Eei pyruq a'q . ” ye-su kxvq naaiq Jruj waag , ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yaag haid Eei .
41011015	mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , ye-su pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zyrug zung maaid maaig uaq teij myenb Zwrtq mivb . ninb puvj Kiv Tiuq Eaanb uaq teij myenb Eei tiab Zauj maaig pc'g kopq uaq teij myenb Eei tavj .
41011016	ninb yaag maiq pun haiq taub pyenb haiq Euvg yavb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad Jiaj .
41011017	ye-su Faauj zwavj myenb , “ kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei waag kxvq , ‘ yia Eei pyauq , myenb xij heug zruj tauj kauj Eei pyauq , weig pun maang fivj mivb uaq tauj kauj . ’ ‘ Janb za'g pivj Eei Kwrtq . ’ ”
41011018	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv haid liud naaiq teij sig , ninb Bua zyrug Namq xij taaq haiq tiug za'eij haib taij ye-su , yrug haid kamb Riaj ninb , weig zu'g zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb ninb Faauj Eei waag .
41011019	luvb maanb Mwavj teij , ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Zwrtq zivb mig a'q .
41011020	ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei , ye-su Zauj saib kxj Bua Jiaj Jauq pwatg uaq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj Gaai Tauj ka'Diaq kxn , taig mig a'q .
41011021	pi-te Javj zu'g ye-su Eei waag zyrug Buaj ninb , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! mavg kaaj ! meib hruq naaiq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj ib zang Kru Gaai Revg mig a'q ! ”
41011022	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ xij zu'g syenj Kauj Tinb huvb .
41011023	yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , haiq taub Buaj naaiq nxm Bov , ‘ swiq Zwrtq , Fiag Kxiq maa'b ! ’ uaq taub Eei Hruq yaag maiq Buvb Byenq , za'kevb syenj xij Zwrtq taaib ei ninb kxvq Eei waag nx , zyrug za'kevb xij Zwrtq taaib Navq uaq nx .
41011024	weig naaiq , yia Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua tauj kauj Toq haiq Euvg , xij zu'g syenj meib Bua tu'q uaq Euvg , zyrug za'kevb tu'q a'q .
41011025	meib Bua sruq Jyenq tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog , sij kxvq meib Javj zu'g maaib haiq taub zruj txvg meib , xij zu'g kwavg pun ninb , meib Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Zivj taaib kwavg meib zruj txvg Eei zwid .
41011026	sij kxvq myenb zruj txvg meib Bua , meib Bua yaag maiq kwavg , meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj fib Navq Eei maiq kwavg meib Bua zruj Eei zwid . ”
41011027	ye-su Bua cvj Rwrnj Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad yavb Jauq uaq zang , sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv , cvj Zauj myenb koj taaib
41011028	naaig ninb , “ meib maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig ? naaiq Euvg leid haiq taub pun meib ? ”
41011029	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ yia mq paag xij naaig Jruj waag meib Bua . meib Bua tau yia nx , yia zyrug Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig .
41011030	tau yia og . haiq taub pun yo-han maaib leid Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid , Tinb huvb fai paamb myenb ? ”
41011031	ninb Bua zyrug laanb Zauj laanb Zaavb laavb , “ Bua hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq ? sij kxvq Bua kxvq , ‘ Tinb huvb pun taaib , ’ ninb xij kxvq , ‘ uaq Euvg , meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq syenj yo-han ? ’
41011032	mq paag , sij kxvq Bua kxvq , ‘ myenb pun taaib , ’ ” ( ninb Bua kamb Riaj zwavj myenb weig zu'g zwavj myenb funj tivg yo-han se za'kevb penj taub trug waag myenb . )
41011033	ninb Bua zyrug tau ye-su , “ yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q . ” ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Navq naaig , yia yaag maiq Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig . ”
41012001	ye-su zyrug lovg waab peiq Buaj ninb Bua , “ maaib laanb myenb zwavj Rov a'vung pyruq , zruj laatg laatg Jyenq . yem Wivj ka'Euad ninb wetq nxm Kwrtq zruj zxvb Eweib a'vung pyruq Eei uam , cvj zruj nxm laaub zuaq Wivj . zruj zyavj , ninb kruq pun myenb . ninb kanb c'q , Zwrtq teib puv mig a'q .
41012002	Tauj pyruq zua'g Eei zyavb hog , ninb Paaiq taub pru mivb lxd kruq Wivj Eei myenb , zx'q ninb Eei pwrng pyruq .
41012003	kruq Wivj Eei myenb zx'q uaq taub pru Bx'q , zyrug zung ninb Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei Rwrnj .

41012005	Wivb zyruq cvj Paaiq taub pru mivb . uaq taub yaag zu'g ninb Bua taij . cvj maaib pru Zamq Eei zu'g kruq Wivj Eei myenb zruj to'g . maaib teij ninb Bua Bx'q , maaib teij ninb Bua taij .

41012009	ye-su naaig , “ uaq Euvg , Wivb zyruq xij Navq haiq nx zruj ? ninb zuvq xij mivb taij kwavg ninb Bua , cvj pun kanb teij myenb kruq uaq nxm Wivj .
41012010	kivb sru fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij waag meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj fai ? ‘ komq pyauq zavg Gemb Zwrtq uaq nxm la'pyeiq , zuvq penj an pyaub kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm .
41012011	naaiq se zyruq zruj Eei sig . ziuj yia Bua Eei mziv mavg , pwatg Bua'g hxvb haig . ’ ”
41012012	zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb hiuq tu'q ye-su kxvq uaq tiub waab peiq zi'q zu'g ninb Bua zyrug xij zx'q ninb haig a'q . mq paag ninb Bua kamb Riaj zwavj myenb zyrug zyav naaig mivb mig a'q .
41012013	Ga'haaq ninb Bua Paaiq teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj teij he-lotq huvb uaq Jauq myenb mivb lxd ye-su , xij Duaq ninb kxvq txvg waag .
41012014	mivb Tauj ye-su uaq ninb Bua kxvq , “ finb scv aag , yia Bua hiuq tu'q meib Hruq za'g . meib yaag maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen , weig zu'g meib maiq mavg haiq taub zruj Lo fai zruj faij . 41012015	mq paag ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq zyrug kxvq , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij Duaq yia kxvq txvg ? zx'q nxm Eaanb taaib pun yia mavg kaaj . ”
41012016	ninb Bua zyrug zx'q nxm Eaanb pun ye-su . ninb zyrug naaig kaaj , “ naaiq haiq taub Eei favj Zauj haiq taub Eei Buaj ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ lo-maa huvb Eei . ”
41012017	ye-su kxvq , “ Navq naaig , haiq Euvg lo-maa huvb Eei , xij zu'g pun lo-maa huvb . haiq Euvg Tinb huvb Eei , xij zu'g pun Tinb huvb . ” ninb Bua kevb Bua'g hxvb haig ye-su .
41012018	cvj maaib teij saa-Du-sij myenb taaib lxd ye-su . saa-Du-sij uaq Jauq myenb kxvq myenb taig mivb maiq haib navb a'q .
41012019	ninb Bua naaig ye-su , “ finb scv aag , mo-se fiaq Jyenq kxvq Buaj Bua , ‘ sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb lovg Jyenq auq , maiq kcvb maaib fu'Jweiq mq paag ninb taig mig a'q , ninb Eei yrud xij zu'g lovg Eaam zruj auq weig tu'q fu'Jweiq funj kxj Eei pwrng . ’
41012020	zinb Daavg maaib siag muab txn . txnb Lo txv Jyenq Jaa , maiq kcvb maaib fu'Jweiq ninb taig mig a'q .
41012021	ta'naij lovg Eaamb kwaaq , maiq kcvb maaib fu'Jweiq ninb yaag taig mig a'q . lauq saan fib Navq Eei .
41012022	zruj kau , ninb Bua siag muad yetg zuvq lovg Jiaj naaiq taub Eaamb kwaaq zruj auq , maiq maaib fu'Jweiq , taig mig a'q . Ga'haaq uaq taub auq yaag taig mig a'q .
41012023	Navq naaig , myenb taig mivb , Tauj navb taaib uaq Nxi , uaq taub auq funj haiq taub Eei auq ? weig zu'g ninb Bua siag muad yetg zuvq lovg Jiaj ninb . ”
41012024	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ meib Bua za'kevb txvg a'q . se weig zu'g meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q kivb sru , yaag maiq hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q .
41012025	taig mivb Eei myenb navb taaib uaq zang , ninb Bua zyrug Navq yem Tinb txvb Eei finb myenb nx , maiq lovg auq , maiq lovg Goj .
41012026	kxvq myenb taig mivb cvj navb taaib uaq tiug Jauq . meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj mo-se fiaq Jyenq kxvq , trud zia'g Dyavb txnb fomq uaq trug kivb sru fai ? Tinb huvb Buaj mo-se , ‘ yia se apg-laa-ham Eei Tinb huvb , i-sakg Eei Tinb huvb , yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb . ’
41012027	ninb maiq zeid taig mivb Eei myenb Eei Tinb huvb , ninb se myenb navb myenb Eei Tinb huvb . meib Bua za'kevb txvg Revg a'q . ”
41012028	maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv taaib Tauj yaag haid ninb Bua Rcv leid . ninb haid ye-su tau tu'q uaq teij myenb hxpg haig , ninb zyrug naaig ye-su , “ yetg zuvq leib latg , haiq tiub kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj ? ”
41012029	ye-su tau , “ kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj Eei leid se tovb naaiq . ‘ i-saa-laa-en myenb aag , mwavj lovj og . Bua Eei zyruq , Tinb huvb , se Du'g taub zyruq Navq .
41012030	xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq , lovg Revg za'eij , lovg Revg Zovb mevb , yaag lovg Revg Qa'q Namq zyruq , meib Eei Tinb huvb . ’ ‘ xij zu'g Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx . ’
41012031	ta'Eeig tiub leid se tovb naaiq , ‘ xij zu'g Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx . ’ maiq maaib haiq tiub leid kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj naaiq teij i tiub a'q . ”
41012032	uaq taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv tau ye-su , “ finb scv aag , meib kxvq tu'q hxpg haig . Navq meib kxvq nx , Kuvj zyruq kanb zruj Tinb huvb Navq . Zwrtq liud ninb , maiq maaib kanb taub a'q .
41012033	myenb xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq , lovg Revg Zovb mevb , lovg Revg Qa'q Namq Tinb huvb , yaag xij zu'g Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx . ei Jyenq naaiq teij i tiub leid zruj se kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj yetg zuvq puaq ziag Eei Zauj fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq . ”
41012034	ye-su pwatg naaiq taub myenb lovg Hruq tau , zyrug Buaj ninb , “ meib leib Tinb huvb Eei kua'q maiq ko . ” yem naaiq mivb , maiq maaib haiq taub kaamq naaig haiq Euvg ye-su .
41012035	ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb uaq zang , ninb naaig Jruj waag . “ Faauj leid Eei finb scv Navq haiq nx haib kxvq ki-tug zruj Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun ?
