41012037	Daa-witq kanb heug ninb zruj ‘ zyruq . ’ uaq Euvg , ki-tug Navq haiq nx haib zruj Daa-witq Eei zeib fun ? ” myenb Zamq Eei a'Neiq mwavj ye-su Faauj .
41012038	Faauj ninb Bua uaq zang ye-su kxvq , “ xij zu'g faij fim Faauj leid Eei finb scv . ninb Bua a'Neiq zu'q lwib Daauq mivb mivb taaib taaib , mivb uaq heib hxvg xij myenb Taaib , zx'q yia'q pun ninb Bua .
41012039	mivb wig txvb ninb Bua kinq lovj Jiaj Eei txvj zweid . pia'g yinb ninb Bua Kuvj xij zweid tiab kxn Navq .
41012040	ninb Bua Duaq aub kwaaq Eei Jaab tivb Eang , yaag tu'g eij tauj kauj Daauq Eei Duaq myenb . tovb naaiq Euvg myenb xij zu'g tivg zwid kaub Niaq Jiaj . ”
41012041	ye-su zweid Jyenq nitq syru Eaanb Eei faav mavg myenb fovg hxg Eaanb . putg zxib myenb Zamq Eei tapq Eaanb Zamq .
41012042	cvj maaib taub aub kwaab Jomg taaib tapq i nxm tovb zinb si'q . tovb zinb si'q se Jaab zinb aiq Jiaj Eei Eaanb .
41012043	ye-su heug ninb Eei saib kxj Bua taaib kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia Buaj meib Bua , naaiq taub aub kwaab Jomg fovg hxg Eei Eaanb kaub Zamq Jiaj taub taub fovg hxg Eei .
41012044	weig zu'g uaq teij myenb maaib Eaanb Zamq . ninb Bua fovg hxg teij paaq Navq . naaiq taub aub kwaaq Dovg naaig Jomg , mq paag lyemb ninb yuvd mcvg Eaanb yaag txb taaib fovg hxg Revg . ”
41013001	ye-su Zwrtq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq zang , maaib taub ninb Eei saib kxj kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! mavg kaaj ! naaiq teij la'pyeiq Lo ! haig . pyauq yaag kevb ! Rweig haig . ”
41013002	ye-su tau , “ meib pwatg naaiq teij tomb pyauq Eei fai ? maaib nxm Nxi yetg zuvq xij zu'g Zc'q Revg . maiq maaib yetg Kwaaiq la'pyeiq lapq Jyenq a'q . ”
41013003	ye-su zweid Jyenq ka'lanq Bov , zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei txib vaang uaq zang , pi-te , yaa-kxpg , yo-han Zauj an-Daa-lu taaib pivj Jyenq naaig ninb ,
41013004	“ Toq Buaj yia Bua og . naaiq teij sig haiq zang xij Zwrtq ? naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Zwrtq uaq zang , maaib haiq Euvg Javb hog pun Ziv zyavb hog Tauj ? ”
41013005	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ xij zu'g faij fim . maiq tuvq mwavj haiq taub Duaq meib Bua .
41013006	maaib myenb Zamq Eei xij lovg yia Eei Buaj taaib kxvq , ‘ yia tovb ki-tug a'q . ’ ninb Bua zyrug Duaq myenb Zamq .
41013007	meib Bua haid myenb Bx'q tomb Jaaj yaag haid Bx'q tomb Jaaj Eei fyenj uaq zang , maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . naaiq teij sig Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g Zwrtq mq paag setq mweid Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj .
41013008	naaiq fivj Zauj uaq fivj xij Bx'q Jaaj . naaiq nxm kua'q Zauj uaq nxm kua'q yaag Bx'q tomb Jaaj . maaib teij txvj Dau tovd , cvj maaib tomb Waav tomb vxg . naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib pun Ziv setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g Jiad kxn Zwrtq .
41013009	“ mq paag meib Bua kanb xij zu'g faij fim . myenb xij zx'q meib Bua mivb sig txvb . yem wig txvb ninb Bua xij lovg pyaab pin Bx'q meib Bua . meib Bua laaij yia yaag xij zu'g sruq Jyenq zuvj Zauj huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen txv Jyenq ninb Bua zruj zxvb zevj .
41013010	Kuq fyenj xij zu'g zunb pun fivb fivj myenb mwavj , setq mweid Eei zyavb hog Zivj taaib Tauj .
41013011	myenb zx'q meib Bua txb mivb sig txvb uaq zang , maiq tuvq Jaab Daavg Raub xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq . Tauj uaq zang , Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx pun meib Bua kxvq zyrug xij zu'g Navq uaq nx kxvq , weig zu'g maiq zeid meib Bua kanb Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq , se sivj livb pun meib Bua kxvq .
41013012	“ muab txig xij zx'q muab txig Jiu pun myenb taij , tia xij zx'q ninb Eei fu'Jweiq Jiu pun myenb taij . fu'Jweiq Zauj tiaj maag yaag penj win , Jiu pun myenb taij .
41013013	weig yia , zwavj myenb xij Rxv meib Bua . mq paag , haiq taub tiaq tu'q Tauj taaub zyrug tu'q Fruj a'q .
41013014	“ meib Bua pwatg zruj pun Euvb Euvg waaig uaq taub tomb Yiab yruj yem Jyenq maiq hxpg zu'g yem Eei txvj uaq zang , ( to'g sru Eei myenb xij zu'g mevb pc'g naaiq teij waag . ) yem yu-Dia scvq uaq teij xij zu'g pyauj faauj Bov .
41013015	yem pyaub vxb uaq teij Fiag taaib , maiq tuvq pia'g pyauq zx'q haiq Euvg txb mivb .
41013016	yem Deig Eei myenb , maiq tuvq Rwrnj pyauq zx'q kanb Eei tomb lwi .
41013017	yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g , maaib Jyenq sin Eei , Zauj maaib kub vwaad hopq Exj Eei msia'q txn za'kevb pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q .
41013018	xij zu'g tauj kauj Toq Tinb huvb maiq tuvq pun naaiq teij sig Zwrtq txij zu'g tovb ken Nxi ,
41013019	weig zu'g Tauj uaq teij Nxib Eia'g maaib tomb ze'g naang . yem Tinb huvb zeij luvb zeij Dau Tauj ib zang , maiq maaib Jiaj Dovg naaiq Rung syem . Jiaj mivb yetg liud yaag maiq maaib a'q .
41013020	sij kxvq zyruq maiq pun uaq teij Nxib Eia'g navq , maiq maaib haiq taub haib tu'q mcvg Zwrtq . se weig Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei myenb ninb Zivj taaib pun uaq teij Nxib Eia'g navq mig a'q .
41013021	“ uaq zang , sij kxvq maaib haiq taub Buaj meib Bua , ‘ mavg kaaj , ki-tug yem naaiq ! ’ fai ‘ mavg kaaj , ninb yem uaq ! ’ maiq tuvq syenj .
41013022	weig zu'g maaib myenb kxvq ninb Bua zruj ki-tug mq paag Jaaq Eei , cvj maaib Jaaq trug waag myenb xij Zwrtq taaib zruj Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Duaq myenb . sij kxvq haib Duaq tu'q zu'g nx , ninb Bua xij lyemb Tinb huvb kinq taaib Eei myenb Duaq .
41013023	meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim og . naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia Jaab Daavg Buaj meib Bua .
41013024	“ ze'g naang Jiaj liud uaq teij Nxib Eia'g , ‘ Ba'Nxi zyrug Jia'q mivb , Laaj yaag maiq ziuj Fav a'q .
41013025	zwavj Leij yem uaq luvb xij Dxtq Fiag taaib , yem luvb maaib Qa'q Eei ka'naaiq zuvq zu'g Dang tovd . ’
41013026	“ myenb zyrug pwatg yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , maaib tomb Qa'q yaag maaib Favb laavg yem uaq Bwrnj Fiag taaib .
41013027	yia zyrug Paaiq finb myenb mivb pyei puv Ryaauj , yem naaiq puv luvb kxn mivb Tauj uaq puv luvb kxn syru zunq yia kinq taaib Eei myenb .
41013028	“ xij zu'g lovg vovb Exj Dyavj ho'g yetg Euvg . pwatg Dyavb Gwaab Zwrtq Zunj , Gxi nxmb lunj , meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q aaq lamb pia'g haag kweij a'q .
41013029	fib Navq Eei , meib Bua pwatg naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Zwrtq uaq zang , meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , Tauj fatq , zuvq yem Jyenq kcvb Daavg a'q .
41013030	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , naaiq txig myenb kwei seij maiq kcvb Revg , naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q .
41013031	luvb Dau xij Jiaj Revg , mq paag yia Eei waag yetg liud maiq Jiaj .
41013032	“ uaq nxm Nxi , uaq nxm zyavb hog , haiq zang xij Tauj , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq . lyemb Tinb txvb Eei finb myenb maiq hiuq , txn yaag maiq hiuq . Kuvj zavg tiaj kanb hiuq Navq .
41013033	meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim , kiv Jyenq Hruq , weig zu'g meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q uaq nxm zyavb hog haiq zang Tauj .
41013034	“ se Navq laanb myenb xij Zwrtq Jauq mivb ko Eei , zyrug zx'q ninb Eei Jaab tivb pun ninb Eei pru Bua kruj , pun kx'g myenb maaib kx'g myenb Eei kov zruj . Buaj zuaq kcvb myenb lovb lovj zuaq Jyenq kcvb , ninb zyrug mivb mig a'q .
41013035	Navq naaig , meib Bua xij zu'g kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq , weig zu'g meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q pyaub zyruq haiq nxm zyavb hog Rwrnj , luvb maanb Mwavj , fai Daamq mwrnd , fai Jai Gaaij taaub , fai luvb Fav .
41013036	Riaj ninb lyemb zeib Rwrnj taaib yaag pwatg meib Bua mFxmb Revg mig a'q .
41013037	naaiq Jruj waag yia Buaj meib Bua , yia yaag Buaj zwavj myenb , xij zu'g kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq og . ”
41014001	cvj maaib i Nxi Navq zyrug Tauj siaj mcvg zipq Zauj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq . sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv taaq za'eij Navq haiq nx haib pivj Jyenq zx'q ye-su taij kwavg .
41014002	ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq teij Jiaj zipq Eei Nxi ka'Euad , Bua maiq tuvq kcvb zx'q . kamb Riaj zwavj myenb haib lung Revg mq pei . ”
41014003	ye-su yem Be-Taa-ni laavd , putq Jiaj komb huq pcvg uaq taub si-mon Eei pyauq . Eang Jyenq Naavj uaq zang , maaib taub msia'q txn txb nxm pcvb tapq pwavq Jaaij haig Eei naa-Daa yrub taaib . ninb Bx'q huq pcvb yaag toj naaiq teij yrub Daav Yetq ye-su Eei mGxvq .
41014004	maaib teij yem uaq Eei myenb Qiaj Jiad haig . laanb zyrug Buaj laanb , “ pc'g pc'g zaauj yrub Daav kwavg zruj haiq Euvg ?
41014005	naaiq teij yrub Daav maaig tu'q faamb pc'q Nxi kovb zinb Eei Eaanb pun myenb Jomg myenb nyaa . ” ninb Bua zyrug kxvq Niaq Eei pun uaq taub msia'q txn .
41014006	mq paag ye-su kxvq , “ maiq tuvq kxvq ninb maa'b ! meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg la'Eauq ninb ? ninb Navq naaiq nx zruj pun yia se lovj haig a'q .
41014007	meib Bua zanb zang maaib myenb Jomg myenb Zauj meib Bua yem . haiq zang xij zruj lovj pun ninb Bua se zruj tu'q Eei . mq paag meib Bua maiq tu'q yia yetg liud Zauj meib Bua yem .
41014008	naaiq taub msia'q txn , ei ninb haib zruj Eei , ninb zyrug zruj a'q . ninb toj yrub Daav Yetq yia Eei sin , ninb Jaab Daavg zruj weig liug leid zavj yia .
41014009	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , maiq kunq yem luvb Diaq haiq nxm txvj zunb Kuq fyenj , myenb xij kxvq naaiq taub msia'q txn zruj Eei Jaub lrug weig Javj Tauj ninb . ”
41014010	ye-su Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj maaib taub , Buaj heug yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg . yu-Daatg mivb lxd sai myenb pyeiq , xij zx'q ye-su maaig pun ninb Bua .
41014011	sai myenb pyeiq haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ninb Bua a'Neiq haig yaag lcvd pun Eaanb ninb . yem naaig taaib , yu-Daatg zyrug lxd Qavj zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb Bua .
41014012	Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq taaub Nxi , tovb taij pa'ki yuvb txn Eang siaj mcvg zipq uaq Nxi , saib kxj Bua naaig ye-su , “ saib tiaj xij yia Bua yem haaij Beng siaj mcvg zipq Eei Eang hopq pun saib tiaj Eang ? ”
41014013	ye-su zyrug Paaiq i taub saib kxj mivb yaag Buaj zyavj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua xij zu'g pia'g zivb zyrug maaib taub myenb Daam Jyenq niab ha'lrub zaavb Jyenq uam Eei , taaib pwavb meib Bua . xij zu'g kan ninb mivb a'q .
41014014	ninb pia'g haiq nxm pyauq , xij zu'g naaig kaaj pyaub zyruq , ‘ saib tiaj naaig , ninb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj xij zu'g yem haiq Qovj pyauq Eang siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj ? ’
41014015	pyaub zyruq zyrug txb meib Bua faauj mivb mavg kub vwaaig uaq Ravb pyauq , maaib Qovj Javq Eei . Euvb Euvg maaib Rxib . meib Bua yem naaig weig Bua Beng a'q . ”
41014016	saib kxj Bua zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q . pia'g zivb mivb , pwatg Euvb Euvg txib tiug ye-su kxvq Eei waag . ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq Beng siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj .
41014017	luvb maanb Mwavj , ye-su Zauj ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj taaib .
41014018	Eang Jyenq Naavj uaq zang , ye-su kxvq , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj maaib taub xij maaig yia , tovb yetg taub Zauj yia Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj Eei myenb . ”
41014019	saib kxj Bua Raub haig zyrug yetg taub yetg taub Eei naaig ye-su , “ maiq zeid yia saa'b ? ”
41014020	ye-su tau , “ se meib Bua zyepg Eeig taub Eei yetg taub , tovb Zauj yia Jwavg Rxmg kua'q Fuaq Eei yetg taub .
41014021	yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij zu'g kwei seij , Navq kivb sru kxvq nx . mq paag maaig yia uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g Kruq a'q . ninb maiq tuvq Zwrtq seij kaub lovj . ”
41014022	Eang Jyenq Naavj uaq zang , ye-su zx'q Fuaq taaib , lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb , zyrug mc'q Gxi pun ninb Eei saib kxj yaag kxvq , “ zipq Jyenq a'q . naaiq se yia Eei sin . ”
41014023	ye-su cvj zx'q zaanq a'vung tiuq taaib , lcvd zivb Tinb huvb yaag Zunq pun ninb Bua hopq . ninb Bua yetg zuvq zyrug Jwavg uaq nxm zaanq hopq .
41014024	ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Bua , “ naaiq se yia Eei Ryaamq weig lyepg Jiad Tinb huvb Eei vcvg waag . se weig myenb Zamq lyrug Zwrtq taaib .
41014025	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yem naaiq mivb , yia maiq hopq naaiq a'vung tiuq . zuaq Tauj yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q uaq nxm Nxi yia Zauj meib Bua syavb hopq Jiaj . ”
41014026	ninb Bua paauj liud Ruv zyrug Zwrtq taaib , mivb uaq ka'lanq Bov .
41014027	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ meib Bua yetg zuvq xij kwavg Jyenq yia pyauj , weig zu'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ Tinb huvb xij taij pa'ki yuvb Eei zyruq , pa'ki yuvb zyrug Raanj Revg mig a'q . ’
41014028	mq paag yia taig mivb Tinb huvb cvj pun yia navb taaib , yia zyrug mivb kaa-li-li scvq Daavg meib Bua . ”
41014029	pi-te Buaj ye-su , “ saib tiaj aag , maiq kunq ninb Bua yetg zuvq kwavg meib , yia maiq kwavg . ”
41014030	ye-su Buaj pi-te , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib , ib mwrnd , Jai maiq kcvb Gaaij i Rung , meib zuvq maiq Eyemg yia pua Rung . ”
41014031	pi-te cvj kxvq kaub vcvg , “ maiq kunq yia zu'g Zauj saib tiaj taig , yia yetg liud Eyemg , maiq kwavg meib . ” uaq teij saib kxj yetg zuvq yaag fib Navq Eei kxvq .
41014032	ninb Bua zyrug mivb Tauj nxm txvj , Buaj heug ketg-sej-maa-ni . ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ meib Bua zweid Jyenq naaiq zuaq yia tauj kauj og . ”
41014033	ninb zyrug txb pi-te , yaa-kxpg , yo-han Zauj Jyenq ninb mivb . uaq zang ye-su haid Hruq mun , Raub tu'q Kruq haig .
41014034	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia haid za'kevb ! Raub haig , Navq haib taig Eei nx . meib Bua yem naaiq kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq og . ”
41014035	ye-su cvj Jiaj mivb teij zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau tauj kauj Toq Tinb huvb sij kxvq haib nx , pun ninb haib simq Dutq uaq nxm syrug Kruq Eei zyavb hog .
41014036	ninb kxvq , “ aa tia aa'b ! aa tia ! maang sig tia haib zruj Eei . Toq zx'q Gxi yia xij zu'g hopq naaiq nxm zaanq . mq paag maiq tuvq ei yia Eei eij . xij zu'g ei tia Eei eij Navq . ”
41014037	ye-su tauj kauj liud , zyrug Rwrnj taaib pwatg uaq teij pua taub saib kxj mFxmb Revg mig a'q . ninb Buaj pi-te , “ si-mon aa'b ! meib mFxmb mig a'q ? meib maiq haib kiv Jyenq zuaq yetg nxm zyavb hog fai ?
41014038	xij zu'g kiv Jyenq Hruq tauj kauj , Toq Tinb huvb maiq tuvq pun meib Bua pwavb zu'g seij Hruq Eei sig . meib Bua Eei Hruq xij zruj hxpg , mq paag sin zavg mau haig . ”
41014039	ye-su cvj mivb tauj kauj Rung , yaag Navq zinb Daavg uaq Rung nx kxvq .
41014040	ninb cvj Rwrnj Tauj saib kxj uaq , pwatg ninb Bua mFxmb mig a'q , weig zu'g mziv Ewij ! haig , nuvj maiq Gxi . ninb Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau ye-su .
41014041	ye-su cvj Rwrnj ta'faam Rung , Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua Zxg yem naaig pweij mFxmb hitq Kwrnj ? kauj a'q . zyavb hog Tauj a'q . yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zu'g Jiu pun yem zwib myenb Eei puab Diaq .
41014042	Jiad sin taaib , Bua mivb a'q . mavg kaaj uaq ! maaig yia uaq taub myenb taaib Tauj a'q . ”
41014043	ye-su kxvq waag zuvq maiq kcvb setq , zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub , Buaj heug yu-Daatg , lyemb zeib taaib Tauj a'q . cvj maaib sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj myenb koj Paaiq taaib Eei myenb Zamq , txb Jyenq Ru'g Daauq , nanq Jyenq Dyavb Donj , kan Jyenq taaib .
41014044	maaig ye-su uaq taub Jaab Daavg Buaj zyavj uaq teij , ninb xij zruj nxm Javb hog pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ye-su . ninb kxvq , “ yia zom haiq taub , se tovb meib Bua xij zx'q uaq taub a'q . zx'q ninb , kruj lovj , Ken Jyenq mivb a'q . ”
41014045	yu-Daatg yetq Tauj zyrug pcv za'g Eei mivb ye-su uaq yaag kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! ” cvj zom ninb Eei Myen .
41014046	uaq teij myenb zyrug Fiag puad zx'q ye-su Qam Jyenq a'q .
41014047	mq paag maaib taub sruq ka'Len Eei myenb pcv ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq , Va'q tomb sai myenb Eei nrub , Pai zu'g nrub Eei yetg puv mnxmb Dutq mivb .
41014048	ye-su txij ninb Bua kxvq , “ meib Bua pwatg yia Navq za'g pcv Zivj taaib txb Jyenq Ru'g Daauq Zauj Dyavb Donj taaib zx'q yia ?
41014049	yia Nxib Nxi Zauj meib Bua yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb , meib Bua yaag maiq zx'q yia . mq paag fiaq Jyenq kivb sru Eei waag xij zu'g Zwrtq taaib txib tiug . ”
41014050	saib kxj Bua yetg zuvq zyav naaig kwavg Jyenq ninb pyauj Revg mig a'q .
41014051	maaib taub hrub scv , Kuvj Povj Kwaaiq la'maab Dia , kan Jyenq ye-su mivb . uaq teij myenb zyrug xij zx'q ninb ,
41014052	mq paag ninb kwavg Jyenq la'maab Dia uaq , lcvb kcvq Eei pyauj .
41014053	zx'q ye-su uaq teij txb ye-su mivb tomb sai myenb Eei pyauq . zwavj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv yaag kapq zunq uaq .
41014054	pi-te kan Jyenq mivb mq paag leib ko teij Eei , zyrug Tauj tomb sai myenb Eei pyauq . ninb pia'g laatg ka'Euad , Zauj zuaq pyauq Eei pcv zweid Jyenq Raauj trud .
41014055	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb xij lxd zxvb zevj koj ye-su weig taij ninb , mq paag lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg zxvb zevj .
41014056	maaib myenb Zamq Eei zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj koj ninb , mq paag ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag maiq txij .
41014057	cvj maaib teij myenb sruq Jiad taaib zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj koj ye-su . ninb Bua kxvq ,
41014058	“ yia Bua haid ninb kxvq , ‘ yia xij zx'q myenb Eei puad zruj taaib naaiq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zc'q Revg . Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia cvj kanb Zeij nxm , tovb maiq zeid myenb Eei puad zruj Eei . ’ ”
41014059	mq paag lyemb ninb Bua kxvq naaiq teij zxvb zevj Eei waag maiq txij .
41014060	tomb sai myenb yem zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen sruq Jiad taaib naaig ye-su , “ naaiq teij myenb Navq naaiq nx koj meib , meib maiq tau fai ? ”
41014061	mq paag ye-su maiq Ko lo . yetg Jruj yaag maiq tau . tomb sai myenb cvj naaig ye-su , “ uaq Euvg , meib zruj ki-tug , tovb myenb Zev uaq taub Tinb huvb Eei txn fai ? ”

41014064	meib Bua haid ninb Ki Tinb huvb . meib Bua xij Navq haiq nx tivg ninb ? ” ninb Bua yetg zuvq tivg ninb txvg . zig tu'q taig a'q .

41014068	mq paag pi-te maiq Eyemg . ninb tau , “ yia maiq hiuq yaag maiq mevb pc'g meib kxvq haiq Euvg . ” pi-te zyrug Zwrtq Tauj laatg kcvb . uaq zang Jai zyrug Gaaij a'q .

41014070	mq paag pi-te cvj maiq Eyemg . yetg zang Jiaj , sruq ka'Len uaq teij myenb cvj koj pi-te kxvq , “ meib za'kevb penj uaq kwanb myenb Eei yetg taub a'q , weig zu'g meib se kaa-li-li myenb . ”
41014071	pi-te zyrug Druq Jiad zyruj kxvq , “ sij kxvq yia kxvq maiq zyen nx , lcvd pun Tinb huvb tivg yia Eei zwid a'q . yia za'kevb ! maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua kxvq uaq laanb myenb . ”
41014072	lyemb zeib Jai zyrug Gaaij ta'Eeig Rung . pi-te Javj zu'g ye-su Buaj Jiaj ninb , “ Jai maiq kcvb Gaaij i Rung , meib maiq Eyemg yia pua Rung . ” pi-te Javj zu'g uaq teij waag zyrug Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig .
41015001	ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei , sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv , cvj Zauj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb kapq zunq Zaavb laavb hxpg , zyrug Dob ye-su , Ken mivb Jiu pun pi-laatq .

41015016	pcv zyrug txb ye-su pia'g zuvj Eei ting ka'Euad , cvj heug uaq kwanb pcv yetg zuvq taaib Rxib .

41015018	pcv zx'q yia'q pun ye-su yaag kxvq , “ yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb aa'b ! zyavb tu'q maang fwij a'q . ”

42001020	meib maiq syenj yia Eei waag , mq paag Tauj hxpg zu'g Zwrtq uaq zang za'kevb xij ei Jyenq yia Eei waag Zwrtq taaib a'q lx'g . laaij meib maiq syenj yia Eei waag , meib xij zu'g Vovj mivb . zuaq Tauj naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud , Zivj taaib haib kxvq waag . ”
42001021	zwavj myenb Zxg yem ka'Eiag mcvj zuaq Jyenq sej-Kaa-li-yaa . ninb Bua maiq mevb pc'g ninb weig haiq tiug yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Dovg naaig laub .
42001022	zruj kau , sej-Kaa-li-yaa Zwrtq taaib maiq haib Zauj ninb Bua kxvq waag . zwavj myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig . ninb Kuvj lovg puad uq Navq . yetg Jruj waag yaag maiq haib kxvq a'q .

42001024	Ga'haaq e-li-saa-Betg maaib Jyenq sin . ninb zyrug yem pyaa Laaj Eia'g pyauq , maiq mivb haiq Dau .
42001025	ninb kxvq , “ ib zang zyruq a'Neiq yia , Tevj yia haib maaib fu'Jweiq , yia zyrug maiq zu'g Eaiq myenb a'q . ”
42001026	e-li-saa-Betg maaib Jyenq sin tu'q Ju'q Laaj Eia'g , Tinb huvb Paaiq kaa-Be-lyen uaq taub finb myenb mivb Tauj kaa-li-li scvq , naa-saa-letq muvq ,
42001027	trug fyenj Buaj taub sia'q , Buaj heug maa-li-yaa . maaib taub Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun , Buaj heug yo-sepq , taaib kxvq zyavb ninb mig a'q .
42001028	finb myenb mivb Tauj maa-li-yaa uaq Buaj ninb , “ maa-li-yaa aag , pcvb xn Eei saa'b ? zyruq Zauj meib yem yaag Zeij en pun meib . ”
42001029	maa-li-yaa haid naaiq teij waag , lyemb zeib Hruq Waav Revg , Namq maiq hiuq finb myenb weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx kxvq mq pei .
42001030	finb myenb cvj kxvq Buaj ninb , “ maa-li-yaa aag , meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og . Tinb huvb Zeij en pun meib .

42001033	ninb xij yetg liud kunq yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun . ninb Eei huvb hog yetg liud maiq haib Jiaj . ”
42001034	maa-li-yaa naaig kaaj finb myenb , “ yia lyemb maiq Zauj haiq taub mJavg txn pweij Jiaj . Navq haiq nx haib maaib sin ? ”
42001035	finb myenb cvj tau , “ sivj livb xij Fiag taaib yem meib . yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q xij Ria Jyenq meib . Navq naaiq meib zyrug tu'q taub maiq maaib zwid , Zivb Revg Eei fu'Jweiq , heug Tinb huvb Eei txn .
42001036	meib Namq mavg kaaj meib Eei Zyenb Ze'q , e-li-saa-Betg . myenb kxvq ninb maiq haib maaib kub vwaad . ib zang ninb Dovg naaig koj mq paag ninb zuvq maaib Jyenq sin tu'q Ju'q Laaj Eia'g a'q lo'b !
42001037	maiq maaib haiq Euvg Tinb huvb maiq haib zruj . ”
42001038	maa-li-yaa tau , “ yia zruj zyruq Eei pru . mtaaib xij zu'g Navq meib kxvq nx a'q . ” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , finb myenb mivb mig a'q .
42001039	Ga'haaq maiq laub maa-li-yaa zyrug Beng ka'naaiq kaanq Jyenq Zwrtq Jauq mivb yu-Dia scvq , Bov zavg Eei yetg nxm muvq .
42001040	mivb Tauj , ninb zyrug pia'g sej-Kaa-li-yaa Eei pyauq Zauj e-li-saa-Betg kxvq wig pwavb waag .
42001041	e-li-saa-Betg yetq haid maa-li-yaa Eei Qiaj , kub vwaad yem ka'sia tovd tu'q seij haig . e-li-saa-Betg yaag tu'q sivj livb pwavq Revg Hruq
42001042	zyrug heug Qiaj Bwi Eei kxvq , “ yem zwavj msia'q txn Bu'Dovj , Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q pun meib kaub Zamq Jiaj . Tinb huvb yaag Zeij fu'q pun meib maaib Jyenq naaiq taub kub vwaad .
42001043	yia weig haiq tiug tu'q Dovg naaiq lovj ? tu'q yia Eei zyruq Eei maa taaib Zauj yia Ryaaug ni ?

42001045	meib syenj zyruq kxvq liud uaq teij waag za'kevb xij Zwrtq taaib zyen Eei , meib zyrug maaib xnb lx'g haig . ”
42001046	maa-li-yaa kxvq , “ yia Eei Hruq Zev zyruq weib Lo ,

42001048	yia zruj ninb Eei pru , maiq maaib haiq Euvg mevb hog mq paag ninb Zxg Javj Tauj yia . yem naaiq mivb Ga'haaq hivq , txib txig myenb zuvq xij kxvq yia tu'q fu'q ,
42001049	weig zu'g maaib tomb Qa'q Eei Tinb huvb ninb Eei Buaj se Zivb Revg haig .
42001050	ninb Kxb lyenb Taaib ninb Eei myenb , yetg txig Jiaj yetg txig .
42001051	ninb suv ninb Eei puad zruj Zwrtq tomb sig , pun mauj Eei myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei Euvb Euvg za'eij faatq Raanj Revg mivb .

42001066	haid liud Eei myenb zx'q naaiq teij sig an Jyenq Hruq Namq , “ aa , naaiq taub fu'Jweiq Lo taaib penj haiq Euvg myenb ni ? ” weig zu'g mevb mevb pc'g pc'g Eei pwatg Jyenq zyruq Zauj ninb yem .

42001080	naaiq taub fu'Jweiq kunq Lo , ninb Eei Hruq kunq henq . ninb yem teib puvb Waav zuaq Tauj zyavb hog ninb Zwrtq taaib pun i-saa-laa-en myenb hiuq tu'q ninb .

42002004	yo-sepq zyrug yem kaa-li-li scvq , naa-saa-letq muvq , mivb yu-Dia scvq , Betg-le-hem muvq uaq . naaiq nxm muvq se lob Nxi Daa-witq huvb Zwrtq seij Eei muvq . yo-sepq se Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun Zivj taaib xij zu'g mivb uaq nxm muvq faauj myenb hrud .

42002040	naaiq taub kub vwaad kunq Lo kunq henq , kunq maaib Zovb mevb , Tinb huvb yaag Zeij en pun ninb .

42002045	lxd yaag lxd maiq pwatg , ninb Bua zyrug taauj sin Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb lxd .
42002046	cvj lxd kau , Tauj ta'faam Nxi uaq Nxi , pwatg ninb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zweid Jyenq finb scv Eei Bu'Dovj , yetg ping mwavj ninb Bua kxvq , yetg ping naaig ninb Bua .
42002047	myenb haid ninb kxvq Eei waag , haiq taub yaag Bua'g hxvb haig ninb Dovg naaig kwai , tau tu'q Dovg naaig hxpg .
42002048	ninb Eei tiaj maag pwatg ninb uaq zang , ninb Bua lyemb Namq maiq hiuq . ninb Eei maa zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ aa txn aa'b ! meib fuvg Navq naaiq nx zruj pun yia Bua ? meib Eei tia Zauj yia lxd maiq pwatg meib , Raub tu'q Kruq haig a'q nyaa . ”
42002049	ye-su tau , “ aa maa Bua weig haiq tiug lxd yia ? meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q yia xij zu'g yem yia Eei tia Eei pyauq ? ”
42002050	ye-su Navq naaig nx kxvq mq paag ninb Bua Zxg Namq maiq mevb pc'g .
42002051	ye-su zyrug kan Jyenq ninb Bua Rwrnj naa-saa-letq muvq , yaag mwavj Revg tiaj maag Eei waag . naaiq teij Jaub lrug Zwrtq liud , ninb Eei maa haiq zang yaag Javj Jyenq .
42002052	ye-su kunq Lo kunq maaib Zovb mevb . Tinb huvb a'Neiq haig ninb . myenb yaag fib Navq Eei a'Neiq haig ninb .
42003001	Ti-Be-li-atg si-saa zruj huvb tiaj zyepg Mmd Havj uaq Havj , pxn-Ti-atg pi-laatq zruj zuvj kunq yu-Dia scvq , he-lotq kunq kaa-li-li scvq . ninb Eei yrud , fi-lipq , kunq i-Tu-lia Zauj taa-Ko-ni-titg teig . li-saa-nyetq kunq aa-Bi-len ,

42003006	luvb Diaq myenb xij tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb Eei Fruj en . ’ ”
42003007	myenb Zamq kwanb kwanb Eei mivb lxd yo-han , xij yo-han Tevj ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid . yo-han Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua naaig Dwi naavb to'g Eei pwrnq aa'b ! haiq taub Kwinj meib Bua pyauj , weig Ga'haaq maiq zu'g Tinb huvb nrud meib Bua ?
42003008	meib Bua zruj sig xij zu'g pun Ziv meib Bua za'kevb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid . yaag maiq tuvq yem Hruq Namq , ‘ yia Bua maaib apg-laa-ham zruj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij . ’ yia Buaj meib Bua , Tinb huvb zuvq haib zx'q naaiq teij la'pyeiq zruj penj apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun .
42003009	ib zang Beng zyavj pruq , zuvq an Jyenq Dyavb kxn . haiq tiub Dyavj zyavb pyruq maiq Kuq , xij zu'g kxij kwavg puaq trud mivb . ”
42003010	zwavj myenb naaig kaaj yo-han , “ Navq naaig , yia Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj ? ”
42003011	ninb tau , “ haiq taub maaib i teij lwi xij zu'g pun teij maiq maaib uaq taub . haiq taub maaib Naavj Eang yaag xij zu'g pun teij vxg Eei myenb Eang . ”
42003012	maaib teij Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb taaib lxd yo-han , xij Jiaj uam Eei leid . ninb Bua naaig kaaj , “ finb scv aa'b ! yia Bua ni ? xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj ? ”

42004042	luvb Fav ye-su Zwrtq zi'g muvq mivb levb Eei txvj . zwavj myenb Zwrtq mivb lxd . lxd pwatg , ninb Bua xij lyrub ninb yem uaq , maiq pun ninb leib Gxi ninb Bua .
42004043	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Tinb huvb Paaiq yia , yia zyrug xij zu'g mivb uaq teij kanb nxm muvq zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj . Tinb huvb Paaiq yia taaib se weig Navq naaiq nx zruj . ”
42004044	ye-su zyrug mivb kxmj yu-Dia teig Eei wig txvb zunb tod .
42005001	maaib Nxi nx , ye-su sruq Jyenq ken-ne-saa-letq Kxib txn Len . myenb Zamq Eei Bevj Jyenq mivb ye-su uaq , xij mwavj ninb kxvq Tinb huvb Eei waag .
42005002	ye-su pwatg i Pruj Ravq tivb Jyenq uaq Kxib Len , mq paag zx'q Byaud myenb Zwrtq Ravq mivb Roj ninb Bua Eei muvd mig a'q .

42005004	ye-su Faauj paag waag , ninb Buaj si-mon , “ cvj Rcv Ravq Jiaj mivb teij uaq mcvj uam Do Eei txvj pxvd muvd Fiag zx'q Byaud maa'b ! ”

42005006	ninb Bua zyrug pxvd muvd Fiag , tu'q Byaud Zamq ! haig . muvd Kaaq teij huq mig a'q .
42005007	si-mon Bua zyrug yaapq ninb Bua Eei zx'q Byaud txig txb uaq Pruj Ravq taaib Tevj . i Pruj Ravq maaib Byaud pwavq Revg . Ravq Kaaq teij zemb a'q .
42005008	si-mon pi-te pwatg Navq naaiq nx ninb zyrug kweig Fiag ye-su Eei Zivb Bx'g ka'Len kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! Toq leib ko teij yia maa'b ! weig zu'g yia se zwib myenb . ”
42005009	ninb Zauj ninb Eei txig Bua'g hxvb haig , zx'q tu'q Byaud Dovg naaig Zamq .
42005010	Zauj si-mon Jwavg kov uaq teij zx'q Byaud txig , sej-Be-Di Eei txn , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han , yaag Bua'g hxvb . ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj si-mon , “ meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og . yavb naaiq Jiaj meib xij lxd myenb . ”
42005011	ninb Bua zyrug Tx Ravq Zwrtq uamb Len , yetg zuvq ka'naaiq kwavg Revg kan Jyenq ye-su mivb a'q .
42005012	maaib Rung ye-su yem nxm muvq , maaib laanb myenb putq komb huq pcvg pwavq Revg sin . ninb pwatg ye-su zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau Toq , “ tomb kxj aag , sij kxvq meib xij nx , meib haib zxg lovj yia Eei pcvg . ”
42005013	ye-su suv puad maan Jyenq uaq laanb myenb yaag kxvq , “ yia xij zxg Eei . meib lovj taaib maa'b ! ” uaq laanb myenb Eei pcvg lyemb zeib lovj mig a'q .
42005014	ye-su kxvq , “ Zinb maang maiq tuvq Buaj haiq taub og . pcv za'g Eei mivb sai myenb uaq pun ninb zaab mavg . mavg liud , xij zu'g ziuj mo-se Paaiq Eei waag txb scvb Kuq mivb ziag pun Tinb huvb weig saaj meib Eei wij , zruj zxvb zevj pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei pcvg lovj Revg mig a'q . ”
42005015	mq paag ye-su Eei mevb taub Jaa siv Javq Jyenq mivb . maaib myenb Zamq ! Eei taaib mwavj ninb , yaag xij ninb zxg ninb Bua Eei pcvg ,
42005016	mq paag ye-su aab log mivb levb Eei txvj tauj kauj .
42005017	maaib Nxi ye-su Faauj Jyenq myenb , maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv yaag zweid Jyenq uaq . ninb Bua yem kaa-li-li teig Eei nxmb nxm laavd , yaag yem yu-Dia teig , yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib . zyruq Eei Qa'q Zauj ye-su yem , pun ninb haib zxg tu'q pcvg lovj .
42005018	maaib teij myenb lovg Jiug kcv taub putq pcvb Bai myenb , xij txb pia'g pyauq mivb an ye-su Eei Ra'Myen .
42005019	mq paag myenb Zamq haig , pia'g maiq Tauj ye-su uaq . ninb Bua zyrug faauj pyaub vxb , Zc'q Tov vwaad , zx'q pcvg myenb pweij Jyenq Jiug puvj Fiag zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj , ye-su Eei Ra'Myen .
42005020	ye-su pwatg ninb Bua syenj Dovg naaig lovj , ninb zyrug kxvq , “ yrud aa'b ! meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q . ”
42005021	Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb yem Hruq Namq , “ naaiq haiq taub myenb lcb ? fuvg Navq naaig kxvq waag Ki Tinb huvb ? Kuvj Tinb huvb kanb haib kwavg tu'q myenb Eei zwid Navq nyaa . ”
42005022	uaq teij myenb Navq haiq nx Namq , ye-su hiuq Eei . ninb zyrug naaig kaaj , “ meib Bua Eei Hruq weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx Namq ?
42005023	kxvq , ‘ meib Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q , ’ fai kxvq , ‘ Jiad sin taaib yavb Jauq a'q , ’ naaiq teij i Jruj waag , haiq Jruj kaub heg tu'q kxvq ?
42005024	mq paag yia xij pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yem naaiq luvb Diaq maaib hatg maad kwavg myenb Eei zwid . ” ye-su Buaj uaq taub putq pcvb Bai Eei myenb , “ yia Buaj meib , Jiad sin taaib txb Jyenq meib Eei Jiug Rwrnj a'q . ”
42005025	uaq laanb myenb zyrug yem zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen lyemb zeib Jiad sin , txb Jyenq ninb pweij uaq nxm Jiug , Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb Rwrnj .
42005026	zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb . ninb Bua kamb Riaj Eei , yaag kxvq , “ ib Nxi Bua za'kevb pwatg Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig a'q . ”
42005027	Ga'haaq ye-su cvj Zwrtq Jauq mivb kau , pwatg taub Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb , Buaj heug le-wi , zweid Jyenq syru Rru Eei zaamg . ye-su Buaj ninb , “ taaib kan yia og . ”
42005028	le-wi zyrug Jiad sin , kwavg Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq , kan Jyenq ye-su mivb mig a'q .
42005029	le-wi zyrug yem ninb Eei pyauq Beng tonj Naavj Lo Eei hrug ye-su . Eang uaq tonj Naavj Eei Kc'q myenb maaib Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rru Eei myenb cvj Zauj myenb Zamq Eei .
42005030	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei Faauj leid Eei finb scv vopq pun ye-su Eei saib kxj Bua mwavj . ninb Bua kxvq , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug Zauj syru Rru Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb Jwavg tiab Eang , Jwavg tiab hopq ? ”
42005031	ye-su tau , “ wavg syavj Eei myenb maiq Qyemj zu'g Diab sai . Kuvj putg pcvg myenb Navq , Qyemj zu'g Diab sai .
42005032	yia maiq zeid taaib heug Kuq myenb . yia taaib heug mevb taub waaig Eei myenb , xij ninb Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid . ”
42005033	maaib teij myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ yo-han Eei saib kxj Bua zanb zang zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag tauj kauj . faa-li-sij myenb Eei saib kxj yaag fib Navq Eei , mq paag meib Eei saib kxj Kuvj Eang Kuvj hopq Navq . ”
42005034	ye-su tau , “ syavb laavb Zxg yem Jyenq Zivb Jaab yinb Eei zyavb hog , haib heug syavb laavb Eei Kc'q myenb zei Jyenq maiq pun Eang , maiq pun hopq fai ?
42005035	mq paag Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj , syavb laavb zu'g txb mivb mig a'q . Tauj uaq zang Kc'q myenb Zivj taaib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg . ”
42005036	ninb cvj kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq , “ maiq maaib haiq taub petq syavb lwi taaib Biaq lob lwi . Navq naaig nx Kuvj petq waaig syavb lwi Navq . syavb Dia yaag maiq Pwij lob Dia .
42005037	yaag maiq maaib haiq taub toj syavb a'vung tiuq tapq lob Dopg Bua'g . Navq naaiq nx zruj , syavb tiuq haib zuvj Dopg Bua'g Baaij . a'vung tiuq zyrug Zwrtq Revg . Dopg Bua'g yaag huq mig a'q .
42005038	syavb a'vung tiuq xij zu'g tapq syavb Dopg Bua'g Navq .
42005039	haiq taub hopq liud lob a'vung tiuq maiq xij hopq syavb a'vung tiuq . ninb kxvq , ‘ lob tiuq kaub Kuq . ’ ”
42006001	maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi , ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Jiaj myenb Eei Byaub Deig . ninb Eei saib kxj nyetq Byaub txq nomq Eang .
42006002	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb naaig kaaj , “ ei Bua Eei leid , tivb kov Nxi maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj , meib Bua weig haiq tiug zruj ? ”
42006003	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ meib Bua maiq to'g Jiaj naaiq teij Jauq fai ? Daa-witq huvb Zauj kan ninb uaq teij myenb Hruq sia Eei zyavb hog , ninb Bua Navq haiq nx zruj ?
42006004	Daa-witq huvb pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub zx'q kevj Tinb huvb uaq teij Fuaq Eang . naaiq teij Fuaq Kuvj sai myenb kanb maaib leid Eang Navq . mq paag Daa-witq Eang yaag pun kan ninb uaq teij myenb Zauj Jyenq Eang . ”
42006005	ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zruj tivb kov Nxi Eei zyruq . ”
42006006	cvj maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi , ye-su pia'g nxm wig txvb Faauj myenb . yem uaq maaib laanb myenb Byaaug Jia'q puad waaig mig a'q .
42006007	maaib teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb xij lxd Jauq koj ye-su zyrug Zyenb mavg Jyenq , mavg kaaj , ye-su lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg pcvg fai ?
42006008	mq paag ninb Bua Navq haiq nx Namq , ye-su hiuq Eei . ninb Buaj puad waaig uaq laanb myenb , “ taaib sruq naaiq zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen og . ” uaq laanb myenb zyrug Jiad sin sruq Jyenq uaq a'q .
42006009	ye-su kxvq , “ yia naaig kaaj meib Bua , ei Bua Eei leid , tivb kov Nxi Bua haib zruj haiq Euvg ? haib zruj lovj fai zruj waaig ? Fruj mcvg fai hxig mcvg ? ”
42006010	ye-su Win mivb mavg ninb Bua taub taub cvj kxvq Buaj puad waaig uaq laanb myenb , “ suv meib Eei puad Zwrtq taaib maa'b ! ” ninb suv puad Zwrtq taaib , puad zyrug lovj Revg mig a'q .
42006011	uaq teij myenb Qiaj Jiad ! haig . ninb Bua Zaavb laavb xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun ye-su .
42006012	uaq teij zyavb hog ye-su faauj Bovb aiq mivb tauj kauj , yem uaq zyavb mwrnd Zauj Tinb huvb kxvq waag .
42006013	luvb Fav Eei zyavb hog , ninb heug ninb Eei saib kxj Bua taaib , zyrug kinq Zwrtq zyepg Eeig taub , cvj heug ninb Bua penj kovb zob .
42006014	ninb kinq si-mon , ( cvj Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug pi-te ) Zauj pi-te Eei yrud , an-Daa-lu , cvj maaib yaa-kxpg , yo-han , fi-lipq , Baa-To-lo-miu ,
42006015	matq-Taai , To-matq , an-fe-atg Eei txn , yaa-kxpg , si-mon ( tovb myenb heug , “ Namq kua'q zavg ” uaq taub ) .
42006016	cvj maaib yaa-kxpg Eei txn , yu-Daatg , Zauj maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg .
42006017	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei kovb zob Bua Fiag Tauj Daub pcvb sruq Jyenq uaq . yem uaq cvj maaib ninb Eei saib kxj Zamq Eei , yaag maaib myenb Zamq yem yu-Dia scvq nxmb nxm txvj , Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , cvj Zauj yem Kxib Len uaq teij i nxm zivb , Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn ,
42006018	taaib mwavj ye-su yaag Toq ninb zxg ninb Bua Eei pcvg . zu'g myenq mua'q uaq teij yaag taaib . ye-su zxg lovj Revg .
42006019	zwavj myenb Bevj Jyenq mivb xij Lua ye-su , weig zu'g ninb maaib zxg pcvg Eei Qa'q Zwrtq mivb Tevj ninb Bua yetg zuvq zxg pcvg .
42006020	ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Eei saib kxj Bua zyrug kxvq , “ meib Bua myenb Jomg myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g maaib Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq meib Bua .
42006021	meib Bua ib zang vxg Jyenq yem Eei myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g meib Bua xij tu'q Eang peuq . meib Bua ib zang Eyemq Jyenq Eei myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g meib Bua xij tu'q Jyetq .
42006022	meib Bua weig yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zu'g myenb Rxv , zu'g myenb Gemb , zu'g myenb Wrtq , yaag zu'g myenb taanb meib Bua Eei Buaj se x'q haig Eei Buaj , meib Bua maaib Fyenb yrub a'q .
42006023	ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj , meib Bua xij zu'g a'Neiq , Fyenb yrub Eei Zavj heij , weig zu'g yem Tinb txvb maaib meib Bua Eei tomb zivb Eeig . zruj hxig meib Bua uaq teij myenb Eei ovb Taaij yaag fib Navq Eei zruj pun trug waag myenb .
42006024	meib Bua ib zang putq zxib Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q , weig zu'g meib Bua Eei Fyenb yrub meib Bua tu'q liud a'q .
42006025	meib Bua ib zang tu'q Eang peuq Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q , weig zu'g meib Bua xij zu'g vxg . meib Bua ib zang Jyetq Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q , weig zu'g meib Bua xij zu'g Raub , Eyemq Jyenq yem .
42006026	meib Bua tu'q zwavj myenb Zev meib Bua lovj Eei zyavb hog , meib Bua xij zu'g Kruq a'q . Zev meib Bua uaq teij myenb Eei ovb Taaij fib Navq Eei Zev Jaaq trug waag myenb .
42006027	“ yia Buaj meib Bua ib zang mwavj Jyenq Eei myenb , xij zu'g Namq meib Bua Eei winb wavq , zruj lovj pun Rxv meib Bua uaq teij .
42006028	myenb zyruj meib Bua , xij zu'g pwav waag pun ninb Bua . zruj to'g meib Bua uaq teij , xij zu'g Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj .
42006029	myenb Bx'q meib Eei naaiq puv Myen , lyemb uaq puv Myen yaag Win pun ninb . myenb zx'q meib Eei tomb lwi mivb , lyemb ka'Euad uaq teij sweib ninb zx'q .
42006030	haiq taub Toq meib Eei haiq Euvg , xij zu'g pun ninb . haiq taub zx'q meib Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq mivb yaag maiq tuvq lxd Rwrnj .
42006031	meib Bua xij myenb Navq haiq nx zruj pun meib Bua , meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj pun myenb .
42006032	“ sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj Namq tovb Namq meib Bua uaq teij myenb , naaiq maaib haiq Euvg faauj tu'q Zev ? lyemb zwib myenb yaag Namq tovb Namq ninb Bua uaq teij .
42006033	sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj zruj lovj pun tovb zruj lovj pun meib Bua uaq teij Navq , Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx haib Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua ? Navq naaig lyemb zwib myenb yaag haib zruj Eei .
42006034	sij kxvq meib Bua Kuvj kaaq ka'naaiq pun haib Jaauq meib Bua uaq teij Navq , Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx haib Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua ? lyemb zwib myenb yaag kaaq ka'naaiq pun zwib myenb , weig zu'g ninb Bua Namq taaib haib tu'q ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq Rwrnj Revg .
42006035	taauj Rwrnj xij zu'g Namq meib Bua Eei winb wavq , zruj lovj pun ninb Bua . kaaq ka'naaiq xij zu'g pun ninb Bua yaag maiq tuvq Namq cvj tu'q Rwrnj . Navq naaiq , meib Bua xij tu'q tomb zivb Eeig yaag penj yem Lav Jiaj uaq taub Eei txn , weig zu'g ninb zruj lovj pun maiq maaib enb zivb Eei myenb Zauj myenb waaig myenb .
42006036	meib Bua xij zu'g Kxb lyenb myenb Navq meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj Kxb lyenb myenb uaq nx .
42006037	“ maiq tuvq taanb myenb , Tinb huvb zyrug maiq taanb meib Bua . maiq tuvq tivg myenb Eei zwid , Tinb huvb zyrug maiq tivg meib Bua Eei zwid . xij zu'g kwavg myenb Eei zwid , Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid .
42006038	meib Bua pun haiq Euvg myenb , Tinb huvb yaag xij winb pun meib Bua , zuvq xij toj pun meib Bua kaub Zamq , zatq ywrnb , Gamq zyetg , Laau nivj Tauj yem maiq Jyenq . meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg Laau pun myenb , Tinb huvb yaag xij lovg uaq Euvg Laau pun meib Bua . ”
42006039	ye-su cvj kxvq waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj . ninb kxvq , “ mziv mcvb myenb haib Ken mziv mcvb myenb fai ? Navq naaig i taub zuvq haib Dxtq Kwrtq maiq zeid ?
42006040	hx'g scv maiq haib kaub Lo ninb Eei finb scv . hx'g scv ho'g liud Euvb Euvg zyrug Zauj finb scv fib Navq Eei .
42006041	“ meib weig haiq tiug pwatg meib Eei kxb yrud Eei mziv maaib la'fapq , yaag maiq Namq Tauj meib kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj ?
42006042	kanb Eei mziv maaib Ganj Dyavj meib yaag maiq pwatg , fuvg haib Buaj kxb yrud , ‘ kxj aag , yia Tevj kxj pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq og . ’ peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b ! xij zu'g zx'q Zwrtq kanb Eei mziv uaq Ganj Dyavj Daavg , meib zyrug haib mavg tu'q zyen Tevj kxb yrud pan Zwrtq mziv Eei la'fapq .
42006043	“ Dyavj lovj maiq zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq . maiq penj Eei Dyavj yaag maiq zyavb lovj Eei pyruq .
42006044	pwatg pyruq zyrug hiuq tu'q pyrub Dyavj se haiq Euvg Dyavj . myenb maiq mivb Dyavb Fimq kc'q vovb Exj pyruq , yaag maiq mivb Fimb Byx'g kc'q a'vung pyruq .
42006045	Kuq myenb Eei Hruq syru lovj Eei ka'naaiq , zx'q Zwrtq taaib Eei se lovj Eei . myenb waaig myenb Eei Hruq syru waaig Eei ka'naaiq , zx'q Zwrtq taaib se waaig Eei . Hruq zaavb pwavq haiq Euvg , Rwib zyrug kxvq Zwrtq uaq Euvg .
42006046	“ meib Bua weig haiq tiug heug yia , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! zyruq ! ’ yaag maiq ei Jyenq yia Buaj Eei waag zruj ?
42006047	haiq taub taaib lxd yia , haid yia Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj , yia xij pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q uaq taub Navq haiq nx .
42006048	ninb se Navq laanb myenb komq pyauq , wetq tu'q Do , pavg la'pyeib pcvb kub vwaaig Zeij Jiad . uam yemj , uam kwaatq , pyauq yaag maiq Baav , weig zu'g Zeij tu'q wrnq .
42006049	mq paag haiq taub haid yia Eei waag yaag maiq mwavj , maiq ei Jyenq zruj nx , se Navq laanb myenb komq pyauq yem Dau yaag maiq maaib kxnb Do'q . uam yemj , uam kwaatq , pyauq zyrug lomd ! lomd Eei Baav waaig Revg mig a'q . ”
42007001	ye-su kxvq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Buaj liud zwavj myenb , ninb zyrug mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq .
42007002	yem uaq nxm muvq maaib taub lo-maa pcvb pyeiq . ninb maaib taub pru maiq lovj Kruq Eei , xij taig haig a'q . pcvb pyeiq yaag Namq haig naaiq taub pru .
42007003	ninb haid myenb kxvq ye-su Eei Jaub lrug , zyrug heug yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj mivb Toq ye-su taaib Tevj zxg ninb Eei pru Eei pcvg .
42007004	mivb Tauj ye-su uaq , naaiq teij myenb koj Qa'q Toq ye-su . ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq taub pcvb pyeiq Pwij tu'q meib Tevj ninb .
42007005	ninb Namq haig Bua yiu-Tai myenb , zuvq zruj nxm wig txvb pun yia Bua . ”
42007006	ye-su zyrug kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb a'q . mivb kau , leib pyauq maiq navg ko , naaiq taub pcvb pyeiq Buaj ninb Eei txig mivb Buaj ye-su , “ tomb kxj aag , maiq zu'g la'Eauq meib kanb a'q . yia maiq Pwij zipq meib pia'g yia Eei pyauq .
42007007	weig naaiq yia zuvq haid lyemb maiq Pwij mivb pwavb meib . tomb kxj Kuvj kxvq Zwrtq Navq , yia Eei pru zyrug lovj a'q .
42007008	yia kanb yaag yem tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei puab Diaq , yaag maaib pcv Zamq yem yia Eei ka'Diaq mcvj . yia heug naaiq taub mivb , ninb zyrug mivb . heug uaq taub taaib , ninb zyrug taaib . heug yia Eei nrub zruj naaiq , ninb zyrug zruj a'q . ”
42007009	ye-su haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig . ninb Win Myen mavg yaag kxvq Buaj kan ninb taaib uaq teij zwavj myenb , “ yia Buaj meib Bua , yia maiq kcvb pwatg Jiaj myenb syenj Dovg naaig lovj . lyemb i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag maiq maaib yetg taub . ”
42007010	pcvb pyeiq Paaiq mivb lxd ye-su uaq teij myenb Rwrnj Tauj pyauq zyrug pwatg uaq taub pru lovj mig a'q .
42007011	Ga'haaq maiq laub , ye-su cvj mivb Tauj nxm muvq , Buaj heug naa-in . ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Zauj myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq mivb .
42007012	ye-su mivb Tauj muvq Eei zivb laatg kcvb Daavg , pwavb zu'g myenb kcv Jyenq Janb taig Zwrtq . uaq taub Janb taig se aub kwaaq Eei Do'g txn , yaag maaib uaq nxm muvq Eei myenb Zamq Tevj aub kwaaq fuvj Janb taig mivb .
42007013	zyruq pwatg uaq taub aub kwaaq , ninb kevb ! Kxb lyenb haig zyrug Buaj ninb , “ maiq tuvq Eyemq a'q og . ”
42007014	kxvq liud , ye-su mivb maan penq . kcv Niaq myenb zyrug tivb Jyenq uaq . ye-su kxvq , “ yrud aa'b ! yia Buaj meib , Jiad sin taaib maa'b ! ”
42007015	taig mivb uaq taub myenb zyrug navb taaib Jiad sin zweid Jyenq uaq kxvq waag . ye-su yaag Jiu pun ninb Eei maa mig a'q .
42007016	zwavj myenb kamb Riaj haig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb kxvq , “ maaib taub zruj Lo Eei trug waag myenb Zwrtq taaib yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj , ” yaag kxvq , “ Tinb huvb taaib Tevj ninb Eei pc'g fivj a'q . ”
42007017	ye-su zruj naaiq teij sig Eei fyenj siv pwavq yu-Dia teig Zauj Wiv Rwrnj Eei txvj .

42007023	“ haiq taub maiq Gemb yia , uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q . ”

42008053	zwavj myenb zyrug Jyetq ye-su , weig zu'g ninb Bua hiuq tu'q uaq taub fu'Jweiq za'kevb taig mig a'q .
42008054	mq paag ye-su nanq Jyenq uaq taub sia'q Eei puad heug , “ sia'q aa'b ! Jiad sin taaib maa'b ! ”
42008055	uaq taub sia'q zyrug navb taaib , lyemb zeib Jiad sin taaib a'q . ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua lxd ka'naaiq pun uaq taub fu'Jweiq Eang .
42008056	sia'q Eei tiaj maag Bua'g hxvb haig mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , naaiq teij sig maiq tuvq kxvq Buaj haiq taub .
42009001	ye-su heug ninb Eei zyepg Eeig taub kovb zob taaib zunq zyrug Jiu livg Jiu hatg maad pun ninb Bua haib zung tu'q Euvb Euvg myenq Zwrtq yaag haib zxg tu'q pcvg lovj .
42009002	ninb Paaiq ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj yaag zxg pcvg .
42009003	ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ Zwrtq Jauq maiq tuvq txb haiq Euvg mivb . pyaab Byaag , Bua'g Jxvj , pyenb fwij , zinb Eaanb , lyemb lwib hruj yeng yaag maiq tuvq txb .
42009004	meib Bua hitq haiq taub Eei pyauq , xij zu'g hitq Tauj Zwrtq mivb kanb nxm muvq .
42009005	myenb maiq zipq nx , xij zu'g Zwrtq uaq nxm laavd yaag fevj kua'q zauj Eei niab Buv kwavg uaq , weig zruj zxvb zevj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj txvg . ”
42009006	kovb zob Bua zyrug mivb laavd Jiaj laavd , yem nxmb nxm txvj zunb Kuq fyenj yaag zxg pcvg .
42009007	kunq kaa-li-li teib puv uaq taub he-lotq huvb haid naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Zwrtq , ninb Namq maiq mevb pc'g . maaib teij kxvq Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han cvj navb taaib .
42009008	maaib teij kxvq e-li-yaa hing Zwrtq taaib . cvj maaib teij kxvq maaib yetg taub lob Nxi Eei trug waag myenb navb taaib .
42009009	he-lotq kxvq , “ yo-han Eei mGxvq yia zuvq Buaj myenb Va'q Dutq mig a'q . uaq Euvg , tovb yia haid kxvq zruj naaiq teij sig uaq laanb myenb se haiq taub ? ” he-lotq zyrug lxd Qavj pwatg ye-su .
42009010	kovb zob Bua Rwrnj taaib kxvq ninb Bua zruj liud Eei yetg zuvq Jaub lrug pun ye-su mwavj . ye-su txb Jyenq kovb zob Bua kanb mivb nxm muvq , Buaj heug Betg-sai-Daa .
42009011	myenb Zamq hiuq tu'q , zyrug kan Jyenq mivb . ye-su zipq ninb Bua yaag kxvq Tinb huvb zruj zyruq Eei Kuq fyenj Buaj ninb Bua . haiq taub Qyemj zu'g zxg pcvg , ninb yaag zxg lovj .
42009012	Ba'Nxi aaq lamb teij mwrtq a'q . uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj taaib Buaj ye-su , “ xij zu'g pun naaiq teij myenb mivb a'q . Buaj ninb Bua mivb naaiq teij txvj Eei laavd Zauj Deib liub Jxm lxd ka'naaiq Eang , lxd txvj hitq , weig zu'g naaiq se levb Eei txvj . ”
42009013	mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua kanb lxd pun ninb Bua Eang maa'b ! ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua Kuvj maaib Du'g pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud Navq . saib tiaj xij yia Bua mivb maaid ka'naaiq pun Dovg naaiq Zamq Eei myenb Eang ? ”
42009014	( yem uaq Eei mJavg txn maaib leib maiq ko pyaa Zin laanb Eei txvj . ) ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ heug zwavj myenb zweid Jyenq yetg Bomd yetg Bomd Eei . yetg Bomd leib maiq ko Mmd zyepg laanb Eei txvj . ”
42009015	saib kxj Bua ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag zruj . zwavj myenb zyrug zweid Fiag .
42009016	ye-su zx'q uaq teij pyaa nxm Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud Zau Myen mavg luvb , lcvd zivb Tinb huvb liud zyrug mc'q Gxi pun saib kxj Bua txb mivb pun Gxi zwavj myenb Eang .
42009017	zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg . zevg Fiag mwrng uaq teij ka'naaiq , saib kxj Bua syru taaib tu'q zyepg Eeig Daan pwavq .
42009018	maaib Nxi ye-su yem levb Eei txvj , ninb kanb tauj kauj . saib kxj Bua yaag Zauj ninb yem Eei . ye-su naaig kaaj ninb Bua , “ zwavj myenb kxvq yia se haiq taub ? ”
42009019	saib kxj Bua tau , “ maaib teij kxvq meib tovb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq taub yo-han . maaib teij kxvq e-li-yaa . cvj maaib teij kxvq meib yetg taub lob Nxi Eei trug waag myenb cvj navb taaib . ”
42009020	ye-su cvj kxvq , “ meib Bua ni ? meib Bua kxvq yia tovb haiq taub ? ” pi-te tau , “ meib tovb Tinb huvb Paaiq taaib Eei ki-tug . ”
42009021	ye-su hatg ninb Eei saib kxj , heug ninb Bua maiq tuvq kxvq naaiq teij sig Buaj haiq taub .
42009022	ninb yaag kxvq , “ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij zu'g syrug Zamb Euvg Kruq . myenb koj Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv xij Gemb yia , txb yia mivb taij kwavg , mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi yia cvj navb taaib . ”
42009023	ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua yetg zuvq , “ haiq taub xij kan yia mivb xij zu'g siaq Jyenq ninb kanb . Nxib Nxi xij zu'g Daam Jyenq ninb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj kan yia mivb .
42009024	haiq taub Kuvj Namq Fruj ninb kanb Eei mcvg Navq , uaq taub Eei mcvg zyrug zu'g kwavg . mq paag haiq taub weig yia kwavg ninb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug Fruj tu'q ninb Eei mcvg .
42009025	haiq taub tu'q Revg luvb Diaq Eei ka'naaiq mq paag ninb kanb zu'g myetg , uaq taub tu'q haiq Euvg maaib lamb lovg ?
42009026	haiq taub Eaiq yia yaag Eaiq yia Faauj Eei waag , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , Zauj yia kanb Eei Favb laavg yaag Zauj zavg tiaj Zauj Zivb Revg finb myenb Eei Favb laavg taaib uaq zang , yia zyrug Eaiq uaq taub .
42009027	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yem naaiq Eei myenb maaib teij zuvq maiq kcvb taig zyrug tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb . ”
42009028	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , Ga'haaq siag Yetg Nxi Eei txvj , ninb txb Jyenq pi-te , yo-han , Zauj yaa-kxpg mivb uaq Jiaj Bov tauj kauj .
42009029	ye-su tauj kauj uaq zang , ninb Eei Myen Tiuq Revg mig a'q . ninb Eei lwib hruj yaag Tiuq mig a'q , Bopq pc'g Eei , zcvb zcvb uaq .
42009030	lyemb zeib maaib i laanb myenb yem uaq Zauj ye-su kxvq waag , se mo-se Zauj e-li-yaa .
42009031	ninb Bua yem Favb laavg hing Zwrtq yaag yem uaq Zauj ye-su kxvq Tauj ninb taig Eei Jauq maiq laub xij yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zyavb sig .
42009032	uaq zang pi-te Zauj ninb Eei i taub txig mziv Ewij , xij mFxmb haig a'q . ninb Bua yetq Eia taaib , pwatg ye-su Eei Favb laavg yaag pwatg uaq teij i laanb myenb Zauj ye-su sruq Jyenq uaq .
42009033	uaq teij i laanb Zauj ye-su xij leib txig uaq zang pi-te kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia Bua yem naaiq kevb lovj haig . Toq pun yia Bua zruj pua nxm liub , zruj nxm pun meib , zruj nxm pun mo-se , cvj zruj nxm pun e-li-yaa . ” ( pi-te zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q ninb kxvq haiq Euvg . )
42009034	ninb kxvq waag zuvq maiq kcvb setq , maaib txq Bwrnj taaib Ria Jyenq ninb Bua . saib kxj Bua pia'g Bwrnj ka'Euad ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig .
42009035	haid waag yem Bwrnj ka'Euad Zwrtq taaib kxvq , “ naaiq se yia Eei txn , tovb yia kinq taaib uaq taub . mwavj ninb maa'b ! ”
42009036	naaiq teij Qiaj sekq mig a'q , Kuvj maaib ye-su kanb yem uaq Navq . saib kxj Bua yaag mwavb Jyenq naaiq teij Jaub lrug , maiq kcvb kxvq ninb Bua tu'q pwatg liud Eei Jauq Buaj haiq taub .
42009037	ta'Eeig Nxi , ye-su Bua yem Bov Fiag taaib , maaib kwanb myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ye-su .
42009038	uaq kwanb myenb maaib taub mJavg txn heug Jyenq kxvq , “ finb scv aa'b ! Toq meib Tevj mavg yia Eei txn . yia Kuvj maaib naaiq taub txnb Do'g Navq .
42009039	ninb zu'g myenq mua'q . yetq zu'g yetg Rung , zyrug naub naug Eei heug cvj Zyru a'q . uamb Rwib Byaaud pomb pomb Eei Zwrtq . myenq zanb zang hxig ninb Kruq haig , maiq Kavq puvj kwavg .
42009040	yia Toq meib Eei saib kxj Bua zung myenq Zwrtq mq paag ninb Bua zung maiq haib Zwrtq . ”
42009041	ye-su Buaj zwavj myenb , “ meib Bua ib Jaaj Eei myenb aa'b ! meib Bua za'kevb maiq syenj , mnxmb yaag hod haig . yia xij zu'g Zauj meib Bua yem , xij zu'g Eyend meib Bua Dovg haaij laub ? ” ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj uaq laanb myenb , “ txb meib Eei txn taaib naaiq maa'b ! ”
42009042	naaiq taub txn taaib Jyenq uaq zang , myenq cvj mua'q ninb Kiv Fiag Dau Zyru tu'q Kruq haig . ye-su zyrug hatg Yiab kwaiq myenq yaag zxg lovj uaq taub txn , Jiu pun ninb Eei tia mig a'q .
42009043	zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig Tinb huvb Eei tomb Qa'q . zwavj myenb Zxg Bua'g hxvb haig ye-su zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig uaq zang , ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj ,
42009044	“ meib Bua lovb lovj Eei mwavj yia ib zang Buaj meib Bua naaiq teij waag . yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij zu'g Jiu pun yem myenb Eei puab Diaq . ”
42009045	mq paag saib kxj Bua maiq mevb pc'g naaiq Jruj waag Eei eij leid . se Navq xmq Jyenq nx , ninb Bua Zivj taaib maiq haib mevb pc'g . ninb Bua yaag kamb Riaj maiq naaig ye-su .
42009046	saib kxj Bua yem ninb Bua kanb Bu'Dovj Rcv haiq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj .
42009047	mq paag ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua yem Hruq Navq haiq nx Namq , ninb zyrug Ken taub fu'Jweiq taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Eei ka'Len ,
42009048	yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ haiq taub tevq yia Eei Buaj zipq naaiq taub faij Eei fu'Jweiq , uaq taub yaag zipq yia . haiq taub zipq yia yaag zipq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub . Navq naaig , yem meib Bua Eei Bu'Dovj , haiq taub zruj kaub faij Jiaj , uaq taub tu'q zruj kaub Lo Jiaj . ’
42009049	yo-han kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! yia Bua pwatg taub myenb lovg meib Eei Buaj zung myenq Zwrtq . yia Bua maiq pun ninb zruj , weig zu'g ninb maiq zeid zruj Bua Eei kwanb . ”
42009050	ye-su Buaj ninb , “ maiq tuvq laanb ninb , weig zu'g haiq taub maiq Zauj Bua txib tekg , uaq taub se Tevj Bua a'q . ”
42009051	Tinb huvb xij zipq ye-su faauj Tinb txvb Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq a'q . ye-su zyrug lyepg tivg Hruq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
42009052	ninb Paaiq teij myenb mivb Daavg . ninb Bua pia'g nxm saa-maa-lia laavd , xij Tevj ye-su liug leid txvj ,
42009053	mq paag laavd zavg myenb maiq Kavq zipq weig zu'g pwatg ye-su xij mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
42009054	ye-su Eei saib kxj , yaa-kxpg Zauj yo-han , pwatg Navq naaiq , ninb Bua kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib xij yia Bua heug luvb trud Fiag taaib puaq myetg Revg ninb Bua fai ? ”
42009055	ye-su Win Rwrnj kxvq ninb Bua .
42009056	ye-su Bua cvj mivb kanb nxm laavd mig a'q .
42009057	ninb Bua kan Jyenq Jauq mivb kau , maaib laanb myenb Buaj ye-su , “ maiq kunq meib mivb haaij , yia xij kan meib mivb . ”
42009058	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ Yiab Juq maaib Kwrtq yem , nx'g yaag maaib laud , mq paag yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , maiq maaib txvj pweij hitq Kwrnj . ”
42009059	ye-su cvj Buaj laanb myenb , “ kan yia mivb maa'b ! ” uaq laanb myenb tau , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! yia Toq Rwrnj mivb pyopq yia Eei tia Daavg . ”
42009060	ye-su tau , “ sweib taig mivb Eei myenb kanb pyopq ninb Bua Eei taig mivb Eei myenb a'q . meib kunq mivb zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj . ”
42009061	cvj maaib laanb kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! yia xij kan meib mivb mq paag yia Toq Rwrnj Buaj tavb yia Eei Mwavq txig . ”
42009062	ye-su kxvq , “ haiq taub nanq Jyenq laib pyeiq laib livb mq paag ninb Win Rwrnj mavg Ga'haaq , uaq taub maiq Pwij yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
42010001	naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud , Ga'haaq zyruq cvj kinq Zwrtq Zyetq zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Paaiq ninb Bua yetg txij yetg txij Eei mivb . ye-su xij mivb haiq nxm muvq haiq nxm txvj , ninb zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb Daavg .
42010002	ninb kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua , “ kcvb zwavj Zamq mq paag kovb myenb zo'g . weig naaiq xij zu'g Toq kcvb zwavj Eei zyruq Paaiq kovb myenb Zwrtq mivb syru ninb Eei kcvb zwavj .
42010003	mivb maa'b ! yia Paaiq meib Bua Zwrtq mivb Navq puvj pa'ki yuvb txn pia'g Yiab Juq kwanb ka'Euad nx .
42010004	maiq tuvq txb Eaanb Bua'g yaag maiq tuvq txb Bua'g tapq ka'naaiq . heb yaag maiq tuvq txb . Jauq zavg pwavb zu'g myenb , lyemb maiq tuvq kxvq wig pwavb waag .
42010005	“ pia'g haiq nxm pyauq , xij zu'g kxvq naaiq teij waag Daavg , ‘ Toq pun naaiq nxm pyauq pcvb xn . ’
42010006	sij kxvq yem naaig maaib taub xij tu'q pcvb xn Eei myenb nx , meib Bua Toq Eei pcvb xn ninb zyrug tu'q mig a'q . maiq maaib xij tu'q pcvb xn Eei myenb nx , cvj syru meib Bua Toq Eei pcvb xn Rwrnj taaib .
42010007	tivg hitq haiq nxm pyauq , ninb Bua Beng haiq Euvg Eang hopq kunq Eang kunq hopq , weig zu'g kovb myenb Pwij tu'q zipq ninb Eei kovb zinb . yaag maiq tuvq yem naaiq nxm pyauq swiq Jiaj uaq nxm pyauq .
42010008	“ meib Bua pia'g haiq nxm muvq pwatg myenb zipq meib Bua nx , myenb Beng haiq Euvg Eang hopq , kunq Eang a'q .
42010009	xij zu'g zxg lovj uaq nxm muvq Eei pcvg myenb yaag Buaj ninb Bua , ‘ Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj meib Bua fatq a'q . ’
42010010	sij kxvq meib Bua pia'g haiq nxm muvq , myenb yaag maiq zipq meib Bua nx , xij zu'g mivb uaq tomb Jauq kxvq ,
42010011	‘ lyemb meib Bua naaiq nxm muvq Eei niab Buv nitq yia Bua Eei zauj yia Bua Laatq kwavg Revg pun Ziv meib Bua txvg . mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq , Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq a'q . ’
42010012	yia Buaj meib Bua , Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq nxm Nxi , soj-Dom zivb zu'g tivg zwid zuvq kaub hev uaq nxm muvq .
42010013	“ Ko-laa-sin muvq aa'b ! meib xij zu'g Kruq a'q . Betg-sai-Daa muvq aa'b ! meib yaag xij zu'g Kruq a'q . yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj Jiaj uaq teij Bua'g hxvb Eei sig , sij kxvq yem Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn muvq zruj Zwrtq taaib nx , uaq teij i nxm muvq Eei myenb zuvq pwij Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru , zweid Jyenq saaib Dwi , pun Ziv ninb Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid laub a'q .
42010014	Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi , Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn muvq zuvq zu'g tivg zwid kaub hev meib Bua .
42010015	Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq aa'b ! meib kanb xij Taaib meib kanb faauj luvb fai ? meib zuvq zu'g zxi Fiag yemb ken a'q lo'b ! ”
42010016	ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ haiq taub mwavj meib Bua , ninb yaag mwavj yia . haiq taub Gemb meib Bua , yaag Gemb yia . haiq taub Gemb yia yaag Gemb Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub . ”
42010017	uaq teij Zyetq zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj a'Neiq Eei Rwrnj taaib Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia Bua lovg meib Eei Buaj hatg myenq , myenq yaag mwavj yia Bua . ”
42010018	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia pwatg saa-taan yem Tinb txvb Dxtq Fiag Navq Ba'livg nx .
42010019	mwavj maa'b ! yia pun meib Bua maaib hatg maad Zaaiq tu'q naav , Zaaiq tu'q zyepg Eeig Daavb , yaag hivb Jiaj uaq taub winb wavq Eei yetg zuvq Qa'q , yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg hxig meib Bua .
42010020	mq paag maiq tuvq a'Neiq myenq mwavj meib Bua Eei waag . xij zu'g a'Neiq meib Bua Eei Buaj tu'q fiaq Jyenq yem Tinb txvb . ”
42010021	uaq zang sivj livb pun ye-su Fyenb yrub haig , ninb zyrug kxvq , “ aa tia , luvb Dau Eei zyruq aa'b ! yia Zev tia weig zu'g naaiq teij sig tia kem Jyenq maiq pun maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb Zauj ho'g Lav Eei myenb hiuq , mq paag tia pun maiq ho'g Lav Eei myenb hiuq . aa tia aa'b ! naaiq se zruj tu'q hxpg tia kanb Eei Hruq .
42010022	“ aa tia zx'q Euvb Euvg Jiu pun yia . Zwrtq liud tia , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q txn . Zwrtq liud txn Zauj txn pun hiuq uaq teij , maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q tia . ”
42010023	ye-su cvj Win Rwrnj Zauj saib kxj Bua kanb kxvq , “ meib Bua tu'q pwatg naaiq teij sig , meib Bua za'kevb Fyenb yrub a'q .
42010024	yia Buaj meib Bua , maaib trug waag myenb Zauj huvb tiaj Zamq Eei xij pwatg tovb meib Bua pwatg Eei , mq paag ninb Bua maiq tu'q pwatg . xij haid tovb meib Bua haid Eei , mq paag ninb Bua maiq tu'q haid . ”
42010025	maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv sruq Jiad taaib xij seij ye-su . ninb zyrug naaig , “ finb scv aa'b ! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg ? ”
42010026	ye-su kxvq , “ leib latg fiaq Jyenq Navq haiq nx kxvq ? meib to'g liud , eij leid Navq haiq nx ? ”
42010027	uaq taub finb scv tau , “ xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq , lovg Revg za'eij , lovg Revg Qa'q , lovg Revg Zovb mevb Namq zyruq , meib Eei Tinb huvb . yaag xij zu'g Namq myenb Navq Namq kanb nx . ”
42010028	ye-su kxvq , “ meib tau tu'q hxpg Eei . xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj meib zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq . ”
42010029	uaq taub finb scv zyrug maiq maaib ib feij a'q . cvj lxd Jauq naaig ye-su , “ uaq Euvg , yia hxpg zu'g Namq Eei se haiq taub ? ”
42010030	ye-su tau , “ maaib taub myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Fiag ye-li-Ko zivb . ninb mivb kau , zu'g Janb za'g Zaavq . lyemb lwib hruj Ziaq Fav Revg , zx'q ninb Bx'q tu'q maiq navb maiq taig Eei , kwavg Jyenq uaq , zyav naaig mivb mig a'q .
42010031	“ txij zu'g uaq nxm zyavb hog , maaib taub sai myenb yavb uaq tiub Jauq Jiaj , pwatg naaiq taub zu'g mun Eei myenb yem uaq Jaub Len . ninb zyrug wivg Jiaj uaq puv Jaub Len mivb mig a'q .
42010032	“ cvj maaib taub le-wi myenb yaag fib Navq Eei Tauj uaq pwatg zyrug mivb mavg . mavg liud , cvj wivg Jiaj uaq puv Jaub Len , zyav naaig mivb mig a'q .
42010033	“ mq paag maaib taub saa-maa-lia Janj Jiaj Tauj uaq , pwatg naaig taub zu'g Janb za'g Bx'q mun Eei myenb zyrug Kxb lyenb haig ,
42010034	mivb Tauj uaq mavg . mavg liud , ninb zyrug zx'q yrub Zauj a'vung tiuq Yetq Jyenq zu'g mun Eei txvj , yaag zx'q Dia peu Jyenq , cvj Lxpq ninb faauj naaiq taub saa-maa-lia Janj Eei lxb , Ken mivb Tauj nxm Kc'q pyauq , Zxg yem uaq kruj ninb .
42010035	“ ta'Eeig Dxm saa-maa-lia Janj zx'q tu'q i nxm Tcpq taaib pun pyaub zyruq yaag kxvq Buaj ninb , ‘ Tevj yia kruj lovj ninb og . zuaq yia cvj taaib Tauj naaiq mavg kaaj , meib lovg zu'g Bu'ziaj yia mtaaib Jaauq meib . ’ ”
42010036	setq mweid ye-su kxvq , “ meib Bua Namq kaaj , naaiq teij pua taub , tovb haiq taub Namq Janb za'g Zaavq uaq taub myenb ? ”
42010037	Faauj leid Eei finb scv kxvq , “ tovb Kxb lyenb ninb uaq taub . ” ye-su kxvq , “ uaq Euvg , kunq mivb Navq naaig nx zruj og . ”
42010038	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yavb Jauq mivb uaq zang , ninb Tauj nxm laavd . uaq nxm laavd maaib taub msia'q txn , Buaj heug maa-Taa , a'Neiq zipq ye-su hitq ninb Eei pyauq .
42010039	maa-Taa maaib taub Riad , Buaj heug , maa-li-yaa , zweid Jyenq zyruq Eei zaub Len mwavj ninb Faauj leid .
42010040	maa-Taa Beng Kc'q , kov Zamq , la'Eauq haig , ninb zyrug taaib kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib Namq tu'q Jiaj eij Eei ? yia Eei Riad kwavg pun yia kanb zruj kov Navq . Toq Buaj ninb taaib Tevj teij yia maa'b ! ”
42010041	zyruq tau , “ maa-Taa aa'b ! maa-Taa ! meib maaib Zamb Euvg hxig meib Hruq Raub Hruq Waav nyaa .
42010042	mq paag hxpg zu'g zruj Eei maaib Du'g Euvg Navq . kaub lovj uaq Euvg maa-li-yaa kinq liud a'q , yaag maiq maaib haiq taub zx'q tu'q ninb Eei Zwrtq . ”
42011001	maaib Nxi ye-su yem nxm txvj tauj kauj . tauj kauj liud , maaib taub ninb Eei saib kxj kxvq Buaj ninb , “ zyruq aag , Toq Faauj yia Bua tauj kauj Navq yo-han Faauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua nx . ”
42011002	ye-su zyrug Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua haiq zang tauj kauj xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ‘ zavg tiaj aa'b ! Toq pun myenb Taaib meib Eei Zivb Revg Buaj . Toq pun meib zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Nxi Tauj .
42011003	yia Bua Nxib Nxi Qyemj Eei Eang hopq , Toq pun yia Bua yetg Nxi maaib kauj yetg Nxi Eang .
42011004	Toq kwavg yia Bua zruj Eei zwid , weig zu'g haiq taub txvg yia Bua , yia Bua yaag kwavg pun ninb Bua . maiq tuvq pun yia Bua pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig . ’ ”
42011005	ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ sij kxvq meib Bua maaib taub Daamq mwrnd pyenj seij mivb Tauj lob kcv txig Eei pyauq Buaj ninb , ‘ lob kcv aa'b ! Toq kaaq pua nxm Fuaq pun yia og .
42011006	yia maaib taub lob piuq txig Jiaj Jauq Ko'q ho'g Tauj taaib hitq yia uaq , yia yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg pun ninb Eang . ’
42011007	“ yem pyauq ka'Euad uaq taub lob kcv zyrug tau , ‘ maiq tuvq taaib kivb Zeuq yia a'q . yia Bua kwrn Jyenq kcvb . Mwavq txig yetg zuvq pweij Revg . yia maiq haib Jiad sin zx'q haiq Euvg pun meib a'q lx'g . ’
42011008	yia Buaj meib Bua , maiq zeid laaij taaq lob kcv xij Jiad sin zx'q haiq Euvg pun ninb , mq paag weig ninb Toq tu'q Erub haig Zivj taaib Jiad sin zx'q ninb Qyemj zu'g Eei ka'naaiq pun .
42011009	“ Navq naaig yia Buaj meib Bua , xij zu'g Toq zyrug tu'q . xij zu'g lxd zyrug pwatg . xij zu'g vcvq kcvb , kcvb zyrug Gxi .
42011010	weig zu'g haiq taub Toq zyrug tu'q . haiq taub lxd zyrug pwatg . haiq taub vcvq kcvb , kcvb zyrug Gxi .
42011011	“ meib Bua haiq taub zruj tia Eei myenb , txn Toq Byaud meib xij pun naav ninb fai ?
42011012	txn Toq Jauj , meib xij pun zyepg Eeig Daavb ninb fai ?
42011013	meib Bua Dovg naaig waaig Eei myenb zuvq hiuq tu'q pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq , meib Bua Eei Tinb txvb tiaj Zxg kaub xij Zeij sivj livb pun Toq ninb uaq teij myenb . ”
42011014	ye-su zung ka'naaib Vovj myenq Zwrtq myenb Eei sin . myenq Zwrtq mivb , uaq laanb myenb zyrug haib kxvq waag a'q . zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig .
42011015	mq paag maaib teij kxvq , “ ninb lovg myenq Eei huvb , Be-en-se-Bun , Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq . ”
42011016	cvj maaib teij myenb xij seij ye-su zyrug Toq ninb pun nxm yem Tinb txvb taaib Eei Javb hog .
42011017	mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq Navq haiq nx Namq , ye-su hiuq Eei . ninb zyrug kxvq , “ haiq nxm kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj Jauq , kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Zauj kanb Eei kua'q zavg myenb Bx'q Jaaj , uaq nxm kua'q zyrug paaig Revg a'q . sij kxvq yetg pyauq myenb Bx'q Jaaj pun Gxi , Jaab tivb zyrug paaig Revg a'q .
42011018	Navq naaig , sij kxvq saa-taan Eei kua'q pun Gxi zruj ziaj kwanb , naaiq kwanb Zauj uaq kwanb Bx'q Jaaj , ninb Eei kua'q Navq haiq nx haib yem tu'q wrnq ? meib Bua kxvq yia lovg Be-en-se-Bun myenq Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq .
42011019	sij kxvq yia Kauj Be-en-se-Bun myenq zung myenq Zwrtq , uaq Euvg meib Bua Eei saib kxj Kauj haiq taub Eei livg zung myenq Zwrtq ? meib Bua Eei saib kxj zruj Eei sig pun Ziv meib Bua txvg a'q .
42011020	mq paag sij kxvq yia Kauj Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q zung myenq Zwrtq , naaiq pun Ziv Tinb huvb yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zyruq a'q .
42011021	“ sij kxvq maaib taub myenb henq myenb Beng Rxib ua'g king zuaq Jyenq kanb Eei pyauq , ninb Eei Jaab tivb zyrug pcvb xn a'q .
42011022	mq paag sij kxvq maaib taub kaub henq taaib Bx'q hivb , ninb zyrug zx'q Revg tovb uaq taub pavg weig kruj Jaab tivb Eei ua'g king . Zaavq tu'q taaib Eei ka'naaiq yaag txb mivb pun Gxi .
42011023	“ haiq taub maiq kan yia , se Zauj yia txib tekg . haiq taub maiq Tevj yia syru zunq , uaq taub zruj pun Raanj Revg mig a'q .
42011024	“ maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq yem myenb Eei sin Zwrtq taaib uaq zang , ninb yrub Jyenq teib puvb haand mivb lxd txvj hitq . mivb kau , lxd maiq tu'q txvj hitq . myenq zyrug kxvq , ‘ aa , yia xij Rwrnj yia Eei lob pyauq yem a'q . ’
42011025	ninb zyrug Rwrnj mivb pwatg ninb Eei lob pyauq Pwrtq Fav Revg , Beng suv Eei .
42011026	ninb zyrug cvj mivb lxd siag taub myenq kaub Zyruq Jiaj ninb , taaib Zauj Jyenq ninb pia'g uaq laanb myenb Eei sin yem . uaq laanb myenb zyrug kaub Kruq Jiaj zinb Daavg a'q . ”
42011027	ye-su kxvq Jyenq naaiq teij waag uaq zang , uaq kwanb myenb maaib taub msia'q txn heug Jyenq Bwi Eei kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ yuvd meib taaib cvj pun Exj meib hopq uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q . ”
42011028	ye-su tau , “ tovb haid Tinb huvb Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj uaq teij , kaub maaib Fyenb yrub . ”
42011029	myenb kunq zruj kunq Zamq taaib kapq zunq uaq zang , ye-su kxvq , “ ib Jaaj Nxi Eei myenb kevb waaig haig . ninb Bua Kuvj Toq Javb hog mavg mq paag Zwrtq liud yo-naa uaq Euvg Javb hog , yia maiq pun haiq Euvg Javb hog ninb Bua mavg .
42011030	yo-naa Navq haiq nx penj Javb hog pun ni-naa-we myenb mavg , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yaag xij Navq uaq nx penj Javb hog pun ib Jaaj Nxi Eei myenb mavg .
42011031	Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi , yem naamb puv mcvj uaq taub huvb maag xij sruq Jiad taaib koj ib Jaaj myenb , weig zu'g uaq taub huvb maag yem luvb kxn taaib mwavj saa-lo-mxn huvb Zovb mevb Eei waag . mavg maa'b ! yem naaiq maaib taub kaub Lo Jiaj saa-lo-mxn .
42011032	Tauj Tinb huvb syemq zwid uaq Nxi , ni-naa-we myenb xij sruq Jiad taaib koj ib Jaaj myenb , weig zu'g yo-naa mivb zunb tod uaq zang ninb Bua zuvq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid mig a'q . mavg maa'b ! ib zang yem naaiq Zxg maaib taub kaub Lo Jiaj yo-naa .
42011033	“ maiq maaib haiq taub tyemq zia'g tav taaib txb mivb pivj Jyenq , fai zx'q Tovq Gopq Jyenq . tav mtaaib xij zu'g ton tav Eei paaib pun pia'g pyauq Eei myenb mavg tu'q pwatg Fav .
42011034	meib Eei mziv peiq sin Eei tav . meib Eei mziv Fav nx , zyavb sin zyrug Fav Revg . mq paag mziv maiq Fav , meib Eei sin zyrug Mwavj Revg mig a'q .
42011035	Navq naaiq meib xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq maiq tuvq pun meib Eei sin Eei Fav Mwavj .
42011036	sij kxvq meib Eei sin maaib Fav pwavq Revg , maiq maaib yetg nxm txvj Mwavj , yetg zuvq zyrug Fav , Navq maaib tav Eei Fav ziuj Jyenq meib nx . ”
42011037	ye-su kxvq paag waag , maaib taub faa-li-sij myenb heug ye-su mivb Zauj ninb Eang Naavj . ye-su zyrug pia'g pyauq zweid Jyenq Eang Naavj .
42011038	uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb pwatg ye-su Eang Naavj , maiq ei Jyenq leid Raauj puad Daavg , ninb Bua'g hxvb haig a'q .
42011039	zyruq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib Bua faa-li-sij myenb Raauj Rxmg yenq Kuvj Raauj ka'Eiag Revg Navq . mq paag meib Bua ka'Euad zaavb pwavq meib Bua mauq taaib Eei ka'naaiq Zauj Ywav x'q .
42011040	ka'naaib Vovj aa'b ! Tinb huvb zeij Zwrtq ka'Eiag mcvj yaag maiq zeid cvj zeij Zwrtq ka'Euad mcvj ?
42011041	xij zu'g zx'q yem meib Bua Eei Rxmg yenq ka'Euad uaq teij ka'naaiq fuvj myenb Jomg myenb , meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq zyrug Zivb Revg mig a'q .
42011042	“ meib Bua faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua txb pc'g Zitq Zauj yenb si Zauj Euvb Euvg ka'naaib Daav zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq fovg hxg Tinb huvb . mq paag zruj pcvb fim Eei Jauq Zauj Namq Tinb huvb Eei Jauq meib Bua la'Ku'q maiq zruj . meib Bua hxpg zu'g zruj naaiq teij Jauq mq paag maiq tuvq la'Ku'q zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq ka'naaiq fovg hxg Tinb huvb .
42011043	“ meib Bua faa-li-sij myenb aa'b ! meib Bua xij pwavb zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua yem wig txvb xij zweid lovj Jiaj Eei txvj . yem heib hxvg yaag xij myenb zx'q yia'q Taaib meib Bua .
42011044	meib Bua xij zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua se Navq maiq maaib Javb hog Eei Janb taig zruq . myenb Zaaiq zu'g yaag lyemb maiq hiuq Zaaiq zu'g Janb taig zruq . ”
42011045	maaib taub Faauj leid Eei finb scv kxvq , “ finb scv aa'b ! meib Navq naaiq nx kxvq , meib lyemb yia Bua yaag kxvq to'g nyaa . ”
42011046	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua Faauj leid Eei finb scv yaag xij zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua zx'q Niaq Eei , a'g tu'q Eiaj Eei ka'naaiq Paanj pun myenb Eiaj . mq paag meib Bua kanb lyemb maiq lovg yetg nxm puab Do'q Tevj ninb Bua prub .
42011047	meib Bua kevb xij zu'g Kruq a'q . meib Bua Zeij trug waag myenb Eei zruq mq paag naaiq teij trug waag myenb meib Bua kanb Eei ovb Taaij taij taig .
42011048	Navq naaig meib Bua piuj mevb meib Bua a'Neiq meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj Eei sig , weig zu'g ninb Bua taij naaiq teij trug waag myenb , meib Bua yaag Tevj Zeij zruq .
42011049	weig naaiq Tinb huvb lovg ninb Eei Zovb mevb kxvq , ‘ yia xij Paaiq trug waag myenb yaag Paaiq kovb zob mivb Tauj ninb Bua naaig . maaib teij ninb Bua xij taij taig . maaib teij ninb Bua xij zruj to'g . ’
42011050	Navq naaiq , ib Jaaj myenb zu'g tivg zwid se laaij ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij taij zwavj trug waag myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq , yem zeij luvb zeij Dau Tauj ib zang ,
42011051	tovb yem taij aa-Bcn uaq txig myenb cvj Tauj taij sej-Kaa-li-yaa yem ziab txvb Zauj Zivb Revg Eei txvj Bu'Dovj . yia Buaj meib Bua , ib Jaaj myenb xij zu'g laaij naaiq teij yetg zuvq zu'g tivg zwid .
42011052	“ meib Bua Faauj leid Eei finb scv xij zu'g Kruq a'q , weig zu'g meib Bua zx'q Kxi wrnb zaav uaq nxm pyauq Eei fxb zeib syru Jyenq . meib Bua kanb maiq pia'g . myenb xij pia'g meib Bua yaag laanb Jyenq maiq pun pia'g . ”
42011053	ye-su yem uaq Zwrtq taaib , Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj faa-li-sij myenb Zauj ninb txib tekg Rcv , Qa'q lxd Jauq naaig ,
42011054	xij Duaq ninb kxvq txvg waag weig lovg ninb Eei waag koj ninb .
42012001	naaiq teij zyavb hog , maaib ziaj Zin laanb myenb taaib zunq mwavj ye-su , laanb yaag Zaaiq zu'g laanb . ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua kxvq Daavg , “ xij zu'g faij fim faa-li-sij myenb Eei pivq . eij leid se ninb Bua peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq .
42012002	maiq maaib haiq Euvg kem Jyenq maiq zu'g Zwrtq yaavb . maiq maaib haiq Euvg pivj Jyenq myenb maiq haib hiuq .
42012003	meib Bua yem Mwavj zov kxvq Eei waag , myenb yem Fav zov haib mwavj tu'q haid . yem uaq ken ka'Euad pivj Jyenq kxvq Eei waab sapq yaag xij maaib myenb yem pyaub vxb zunb Buaj myenb .
42012004	“ yia Eei kxb yrud aag , yia Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua maiq tuvq kamb Riaj Kuvj haib taij Bua Eei sin uaq teij , Ga'haaq maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg hxig .
42012005	yia xij tonq meib Bua , pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q xij zu'g kamb Riaj haiq taub . xij zu'g kamb Riaj Tinb huvb . ninb taij liud myenb , Zxg maaib livg zxi Fiag teig Eua'g . yia Buaj meib Bua , za'kevb xij zu'g kamb Riaj Tinb huvb .
42012006	pyaa nxm nx'g meij maaig tu'q i nxm tovb zinb Navq maiq zeid ? mq paag Tinb huvb Zxg maiq la'Ku'q yetg nxm naaiq teij nx'g meij .
42012007	lyemb meib Bua Eei Ba'pyei zuvq saauq Revg mig a'q . Navq naaig maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g meij Zamq .
42012008	“ yia Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub txv zwavj Eyemg yia , yia paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug yem Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb Eei Ra'Myen Eyemg uaq taub .
42012009	mq paag haiq taub maiq txv zwavj Eyemg yia , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yem Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb Eei Ra'Myen maiq Eyemg uaq taub a'q .
42012010	“ haiq taub kxvq to'g yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , Tinb huvb haib kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid . mq paag haiq taub kxvq to'g sivj livb , Tinb huvb maiq kwavg uaq taub Eei zwid .
42012011	“ ninb Bua txb meib Bua mivb Tauj wig txvb , fai Jyenb fruq , fai maaib livg Eei myenb , meib Bua maiq tuvq Raub xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau , Navq haiq nx kxvq .
42012012	Tauj uaq nxm zyavb hog sivj livb xij Faauj meib Bua hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx kxvq . ”
42012013	yem uaq kwanb myenb maaib laanb myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ finb scv aag , Toq Buaj yia Eei kxj zx'q yia Eei tia Paaiq pun yia Eei pwrng Jaab tivb pun yia og . ”
42012014	ye-su tau ninb , “ yrud aa'b ! haiq taub xn yia zruj punb zxv myenb , zx'q meib Bua Eei Jaab tivb ka'naaiq pun Gxi ? ”
42012015	ye-su kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb , “ xij zu'g faij fim . maiq tuvq zruj Hruq Lo mauq haiq Euvg . maiq kunq Dovg haaij putq zxib , zyen mcvg maiq zeid yem naaiq teij ka'naaiq . ”
42012016	ye-su zyrug kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq Buaj ninb Bua . “ maaib taub putg zxib myenb maaib livb teig lovj haig , zwavj tu'q ka'naaiq Zamq .
42012017	naaiq taub putg zxib myenb Namq taaib , ‘ xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj mq pei ? yia syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq yia maiq maaib txvj tapq tu'q Fiag . ’
42012018	ninb cvj Namq Zwrtq , ‘ aa , yia xij zu'g Zc'q Gxi yia Eei lob lamd , cvj kanb zruj kaub Lo , zyrug zx'q yia Eei laavb zi'g Zauj yetg zuvq syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq tapq Jyenq . ’
42012019	ninb cvj Namq taaib , ‘ aa , yia mcvg lovj haig a'q . Euvb Euvg lovj Eei ka'naaiq yia maaib kauj Eang kauj hopq ziaj Havj . yia Kuvj pweij Jyenq Eang , pweij Jyenq hopq , Fyenb yrub a'Ryaaug Navq . ’
42012020	“ mq paag Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj ninb , ‘ ka'naaib Vovj aa'b ! ib mwrnd meib xij zu'g taig a'q . meib syru taaib lyrub meib kanb lovg Eei ka'naaiq , naaiq Rung xij penj haiq taub Eei ? ’ ”
42012021	ye-su cvj kxvq setq mweid waag , “ haiq taub Kuvj xij syru Jyenq ka'naaiq Zamq lyrub ninb kanb lovg , se Navq uaq taub putq zxib Eei myenb Vovj myenb nx . ei Tinb huvb mavg , ninb se myenb Jomg myenb . ”
42012022	ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ Navq naaig yia Buaj meib Bua , maiq tuvq weig yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq Kwrnj Hruq . yaag maiq tuvq weig sin zavg Eei lwib hruj Kwrnj Hruq .
42012023	mcvg kaub Jaaij Jiaj Eang hopq . sin yaag kaub Jaaij Jiaj lwib hruj .
42012024	Namq mavg kaaj , nx'g aa ! ninb Bua maiq zwavj yaag maiq syru . ninb Bua maiq maaib Baatg yaag maiq maaib lamd . mq paag Tinb huvb wij ninb Bua . meib Bua zuvq kaub Jaaij Jiaj nx'g .
42012025	meib Bua haiq taub laaij Kwrnj Hruq haib px'q tu'q mcvg Daauq teij ?
42012026	Dovg naaiq faij Eei sig meib Bua zuvq maiq haib zruj , meib Bua Zxg Kwrnj Hruq ta'Eeig Euvg zruj haiq Euvg ? ”
42012027	Namq mavg kaaj , pc'g hx'g pyavb Navq haiq nx zyavb ! pyavb maiq zruj kov yaag maiq pcv swij Datq Dia , mq paag yia Buaj meib Bua , lyemb saa-lo-mxn huvb Dovg naaig putq zxib yaag maiq maaib zxvb zu'q Dovg yetg txq naaiq teij pyavb Rweig .
42012028	lomg Eei miaq ib Nxi zyavb , Fav Nxi Kru Gaai zu'g trud puaq , mq paag Tinb huvb zxv miaq Rweig . Navq naaig , Tinb huvb zuvq kaub xij zxv meib Bua . meib Bua syenj tu'q hei haig wei'b !
42012029	“ meib Bua maiq tuvq zanb zang Raub Jyenq xij zu'g Eang xij zu'g hopq haiq Euvg , yaag maiq tuvq Kwrnj Hruq .
42012030	luvb Diaq maang fivj , maiq syenj Tinb huvb Eei myenb , zanb zang lxd naaiq teij ka'naaiq . meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj hiuq tu'q meib Bua Qyemj zu'g lovg naaiq teij ka'naaiq .
42012031	xij zu'g pun Tinb huvb zruj meib Bua Eei zyruq kunq meib Bua , naaiq teij yetg zuvq ka'naaiq ninb zyrug Jaa Tipq pun meib Bua .
42012032	“ meib Bua naaiq kwanb zo'g Eei myenb aa'b ! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og . meib Bua Eei zavg tiaj a'Neiq zx'q ninb Eei kua'q pun meib Bua .
42012033	xij zu'g maaig Revg meib Bua Eei Jaab tivb cvj Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb . xij zu'g lxd yetg liud maiq haib waaig Eei Eaanb Bua'g tapq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq syru uaq Tinb txvb . yem uaq , naaiq teij ka'naaiq maiq haib zitg , Janb za'g maiq haib petq pia'g mivb nimg , kcv yaag maiq haib vaatg waaig .
42012034	meib Bua syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yem haiq nxm txvj , meib Bua Eei Hruq haiq zang yaag Javj Jyenq uaq a'q .
42012035	“ meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj zxv Jyenq yaag tyemq zia'g tav zuaq Jyenq ,
42012036	Navq pru zuaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei zyruq mivb Zivb Jaab yinb Rwrnj nx . Tauj pyaub zyruq heug , pru Bua zyrug lyemb zeib Kxi kcvb .
42012037	zyruq Rwrnj taaib pwatg pru Navq naaiq kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq , pru zyrug maaib Fyenb yrub a'q . yia Buaj meib Bua , zyruq xij heug ninb Eei pru Bua zweid Jyenq Eang Naavj , ninb kanb zyrug Fung Jyenq lwib mweid liug leid pru Bua .
42012038	maiq kunq uaq taub zyruq Daamq mwrnd fai Daamq mwrnd Jiaj Rwrnj taaib , sij kxvq pwatg pru Bua Zxg kiv Hruq zuaq Jyenq Eei , uaq teij pru zyrug tu'q Fyenb yrub a'q .
42012039	“ naaiq meib Bua hiuq tu'q Eei . sij kxvq pyaub zyruq hiuq tu'q Janb za'g haiq nxm zyavb hog xij taaib , ninb zyrug zuaq Jyenq maiq pun Janb za'g pia'g pyauq .
42012040	meib Bua yaag xij zu'g liug leid zyavj zanb zang zuaq Jyenq , weig zu'g meib Bua Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , zyrug Tauj a'q . ”
42012041	pi-te naaig kaaj , “ zyruq aa'b ! naaiq tiub waab peiq kxvq pun yia Bua fai kxvq pun zwavj myenb ? ”
42012042	zyruq tau , “ haiq taub zruj Hruq zivj , Zovb mevb Eei pru , tovb pyaub zyruq xij Paaiq kruj ninb Eei pyauq yaag ziuj zyavb hog zx'q hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei pwrng Eang hopq pun pru Bua ?
42012043	zyruq Rwrnj taaib pwatg naaiq taub pru zruj tu'q zivj , pru zyrug Fyenb yrub a'q .

42012046	pru Javj maiq zaaig Eei Nxi , Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog , ninb Eei zyruq zyrug Rwrnj taaib a'q . zyruq xij tivg ninb Eei zwid Niaq Eei . yaag zung ninb mivb Zauj maiq syenj Eei myenb yem .
42012047	“ haiq taub pru hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zyruq xij ninb Navq haiq nx zruj , ninb yaag maiq liug leid yaag maiq ei Jyenq zruj , uaq taub zu'g Bx'q kaub Zamq .
42012048	haiq taub pru maiq hiuq tu'q zyruq xij ninb Navq haiq nx zruj , ninb zruj liud Eei sig hxpg zu'g Bx'q Eei mq paag zu'g Bx'q zo'g . haiq taub tu'q Zamq , uaq taub xij zu'g Zwrtq Zamq . Jiu pun haiq taub zipq Zamq , uaq taub xij zu'g Zwrtq kaub Zamq . ”
42012049	“ yia taaib weig xij pun trud zia'g paamb ken . feij tu'q ib zang zia'g Jyenq a'q maiq zei !
42012050	mq paag yia feib Euvg zuvq xij zu'g syrug Kruq Daavg . maiq kcvb Jiaj uaq teij syrug Kruq Eei Nxi yia haid Hruq maiq henb yetg teij .
42012051	meib Bua Namq yia taaib pun paamb ken Taaib pcvb fai ? maiq zeid . yia Buaj meib Bua , yia taaib zruj pun myenb pun Gxi .
42012052	yem naaiq mivb , yetg pwrng myenb maaib pyaa laanb mq paag xij zu'g pun Gxi . pua laanb Zauj i laanb pun Gxi . i laanb Zauj pua laanb pun Gxi .
42012053	tia Zauj txn , txn Zauj tia yaag pun Gxi . maa Zauj sia'q , sia'q Zauj maa pun Gxi . maab puag Zauj Bwavd , Bwavd Zauj maab puag yaag pun Gxi . ”
42012054	ye-su yaag kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb , “ meib Bua pwatg fai puv mcvj faauj txq Bwrnj meib Bua zyrug kxvq , ‘ xij twib Byuvg a'q , ’ yaag za'kevb Navq naaig .
42012055	meib Bua haid Ryaauj yem naamb puv mcvj pwrng taaib , meib Bua kxvq , ‘ xij yua'q a'q , ’ yaag za'kevb yua'q .
42012056	peib za'g Hruq Fwrtq Eei myenb aa'b ! meib Bua haib samj luvb samj Dau Eei setq zeiq . weig haiq tiug samj maiq Zwrtq ib Jaaj Eei sig ?
42012057	“ meib Bua kanb weig haiq tiug maiq haib tivg haiq Euvg se hxpg fai maiq hxpg ?
42012058	sij kxvq maaib taub myenb koj meib , xij txb meib mivb Beng sig myenb uaq , yem Daamb Jauq meib xij zu'g Zauj ninb kxvq suv . maiq zei nx , ninb xij Tx meib mivb syemq zwid Jyen uaq . syemq zwid Jyen xij zx'q meib Jiu pun huvb pcv . huvb pcv zyrug txb meib mivb wrnj Jyenq lob .
42012059	yia Buaj meib Bua , meib xij zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob Tauj funj suv Revg , maiq Zaa yetg nxm tovb zinb Eei zc'q Zivj taaib tu'q Zwrtq . ”
42013001	uaq zang maaib teij yem uaq Eei myenb kxvq Buaj ye-su maaib teij kaa-li-li myenb taij scvb Kuq ziag pun Tinb huvb uaq zang , zu'g pi-laatq taij ninb Bua . Ryaamq Zwrtq taaib zxpg zu'g uaq teij scvb Kuq Eei Ryaamq .
42013002	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ naaiq teij kaa-li-li myenb Navq naaiq nx zu'g taij , meib Bua laaig ninb Bua Eei zwid kaub Lo kaa-li-li Eei uaq teij zwavj myenb Eei zwid fai ?
42013003	maiq zeid lx'g . yia Buaj meib Bua , sij kxvq meib Bua maiq kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid , meib Bua yaag fib Navq Eei xij zu'g myetg .
42013004	Zauj sij-lo-am fanb Taapq Baav , Dapq taig uaq teij zyepg petq laanb ni ? meib Bua laaig ninb Bua txvg kaub Do ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb fai ?
