42013006	ye-su kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun ninb Bua mwavj . “ maaib laanb myenb maaib zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj yem ninb Eei a'vung Wivj . ninb mivb Tauj uaq lxd pyruq yaag lxd maiq tu'q yetg nxm .
42013007	ninb zyrug Buaj Tevj ninb kruj Wivj Eei myenb , ‘ mavg kaaj ! tu'q pua Havj yia taaib lxd naaiq zuvb vovb Exj Dyavj Eei pyruq yaag maiq tu'q yetg nxm . kunq kxij kwavg a'q . Kuvj yem naaiq Txvq Dau Navq . ’
42013008	kruj Wivj Eei myenb kxvq , ‘ tomb kxj aa'b ! Toq meib cvj lyrub Havj . yia xij wetq nia ywav Jyenq kxn , an Jyenq pwrnj .
42013009	ta'Eeig Havj zyavb pyruq nx , lovj a'q . maiq zyavb nx , kunq kxij kwavg a'q . ’ ”
42013010	maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi , ye-su yem nxm wig txvb Faauj myenb .
42013011	yem uaq maaib taub msia'q txn maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin pun ninb putq zyepg petq Havj pcvg , mua'q ninb Eei Jaaiq Jutq mivb , sruq maiq za'g .
42013012	ye-su pwatg zyrug heug ninb taaib fatq teij Buaj ninb , “ Eaam aag , meib Eei pcvg lovj tavj kxn a'q . ”

42013017	ye-su Navq naaiq nx tau , Zauj ninb zruj winb wavq uaq teij zyrug haid Eaiq haig . mq paag zwavj myenb a'Neiq haig ye-su zruj Eei yetg zuvq Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig .

42013020	ye-su cvj naaig kaaj , “ xij zu'g lovg haiq Euvg peiq Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb ?

42013022	ye-su mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . mivb uaq zang ninb zweib muvq zweib laavd Faauj myenb .

42014001	maaib nxm tivb kov Nxi , ye-su mivb taub zruj Lo Eei faa-li-sij myenb Eei pyauq Eang Naavj . myenb yaag lovb lovj Eei mavg Jyenq ninb .
42014002	maaib taub myenb putq pcvb frub taaib lxd ye-su .

42014006	mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub maaib waag tau .

42014009	pyaub zyruq Zivq meib Bua i laanb taaib ninb zyrug xij zu'g taaib Buaj meib , ‘ xij zu'g simq Gxi pun naaiq laanb myenb zweid naaiq . ’ meib zyrug Eaiq haig a'q . xij zu'g swiq mivb zweid Diaq mcvj puv .
42014010	pia'g yinb uaq zang , meib xij zu'g zweid Diaq mcvj puv . Navq naaig pyaub zyruq xij Buaj meib , ‘ kxj aag , faauj Jiaj mcvj puv zweid og . ’ Zauj meib zruj Kc'q uaq teij zyrug Taaib meib a'q .

42014012	ye-su Buaj Zivq ninb taaib uaq taub pyaub zyruq , “ meib haiq zang Zivq Kc'q taaib Eang Naavj , maiq tuvq Zivq meib Eei lob kcv txig , muab txig , Zyenb Ze'q fai laavd zavg Eei putg zxib myenb . mRiaj ninb Bua xij Zivq meib mivb winb meib Eei enb zivb .
42014013	meib Beng Naavj Zivq Kc'q , xij zu'g Zivq myenb Jomg myenb , zauj Bai , puab zauj waaig Zauj mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei myenb .
42014014	Navq naaig meib zyrug tu'q Fyenb yrub a'q . weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq haib winb pun meib . zuaq Kuq myenb navb taaib uaq Nxi , Tinb huvb xij winb pun meib . ”
42014015	maaib laanb myenb Zauj ye-su Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug Buaj ye-su , “ haiq taub tu'q yem Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eang uaq nxm yinb Eei Naavj , uaq taub maaib Fyenb yrub a'q . ”
42014016	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ maaib laanb myenb Beng nxm yinb Lo Eei yaag Zivq Kc'q Zamq .

42014018	“ mq paag uaq teij myenb yetg zuvq Kuvj kxvq Twij zivb waag . ta'yetq taub kxvq , ‘ yia maaid Rov Deig , xij zu'g mivb mavg tavb . meib Rwrnj mivb Buaj meib Eei zyruq , yia maiq tu'q mivb mq paag lcvd zivb a'q . Beng suv lovj a'q . ’
42014019	“ cvj maaib taub kxvq , ‘ yia maaid tu'q pyaa txij vovb xij zu'g txb mivb seij mavg kaaj . meib Rwrnj mivb Buaj meib Eei zyruq , yia maiq tu'q mivb mq paag lcvd zivb a'q . Beng suv lovj a'q . ’
42014020	“ cvj maaib taub kxvq , ‘ yia Zo'q ho'g lovg Jyenq auq , maiq haib mivb a'q . ’
42014021	“ pru Rwrnj mivb zx'q naaiq teij Jaub lrug Buaj ninb Eei zyruq . pyaub zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig . ninb Buaj ninb Eei pru , ‘ kaanq mivb muvq zavg tomb Jaai fiub hxvg lxd myenb Jomg myenb , waaig favj Eei , mziv mcvb mziv Buaq Eei , Zauj zauj Bai Eei myenb . ’
42014022	“ maiq laub uaq taub pru Rwrnj taaib kxvq , ‘ tomb kxj aag , yia ei meib Eei waag zruj liud a'q . mq paag Zxg maaib txvj Kuvj Eei . ’
42014023	“ zyruq cvj Buaj uaq taub pru , ‘ xij zu'g Zwrtq mivb zweib tomb Jauq fiub Jauq lxd Jyenq mivb . pwatg haiq taub xij zu'g aapq Jyenq ninb Bua taaib , zyrug tu'q myenb pwavq yia Eei pyauq a'q .
42014024	yia Buaj meib Bua , tovb yia Zivq Daavg uaq teij myenb , maiq maaib yetg laanb haib tu'q seij yia Eei laib Naavj Eei mweij . ’ ”
42014025	myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq ye-su mivb . ye-su zyrug Win Rwrnj Buaj ninb Bua ,
42014026	“ haiq taub taaib lxd yia yaag maiq Namq yia kaub Zamq Namq ninb Eei tiaj maag , ninb Eei auq Zauj fu'Jweiq Zauj muab txig , lyemb ninb kanb Eei mcvg , uaq taub maiq haib zruj yia Eei saib kxj .
42014027	haiq taub maiq Daam Jyenq ninb kanb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj kan Jyenq mivb , uaq taub yaag zruj maiq tu'q yia Eei saib kxj .

42015001	maaib Rung maaib syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb Zauj mevb taub waaig Eei myenb taaib fatq ye-su , xij mwavj ninb Faauj leid .

42015011	ye-su cvj kxvq , “ maaib laanb myenb maaib i taub txn .

42017024	yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taaib uaq nxm Nxi xij Navq pxvd Ba'livg yem naaiq puv luvb Tauj uaq puv luvb .

42017026	“ no-yaa Eei luvb Diaq Navq haiq nx , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , taaib uaq teij Nxi yaag Navq uaq nx .

42017030	yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , hing Zwrtq uaq Nxi yaag xij Navq uaq nx .
42017031	“ uaq Nxi haiq taub yem pyaub vxb Fiag , lyemb maiq tuvq pia'g pyauq zx'q yem pyauq Eei ka'naaiq . haiq taub yem Deig yaag maiq tuvq Rwrnj mivb zx'q haiq Euvg .
42017032	Javj Jyenq lotq Eei auq !
42017033	haiq taub Namq Fruj kanb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug zu'g kwavg mcvg . haiq taub Eung kwavg ninb kanb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug tu'q ninb Eei mcvg Zwrtq .
42017034	yia Buaj meib Bua , maaib i taub myenb Jwavg Zruj pweij , xij zipq taub mivb , kwavg taub yem uaq .

42017036	maaib i taub myenb yem Deig , xij zipq taub mivb , kwavg taub yem uaq . ”
42017037	saib kxj Bua naaig kaaj , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! naaiq teij sig xij zu'g yem haaij Zwrtq ? ” ye-su tau , “ ka'naaib taig yem haaij , tomb Jaavb vovb yaag yem uaq . ”
42018001	ye-su cvj lovg naaiq tiub waab peiq Faauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua xij zu'g zanb zang tauj kauj , maiq tuvq Hruq namj .
42018002	ninb kxvq , “ maaib nxm muvq maaib taub syemq zwid Jyen . ninb maiq kamb Riaj Tinb huvb , yaag maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen .
42018003	yem uaq nxm muvq maaib taub aub kwaaq zanb zang taaib lxd uaq taub syemq zwid Jyen kxvq , ‘ maaib myenb koj yia , Toq lovg pcvb fim Eei leid Tevj yia Beng suv . ’
42018004	“ Toq laub haig a'q , syemq zwid Jyen yaag maiq Kavq Tevj . zruj kau , ninb yem Hruq Namq , ‘ yia maiq kamb Riaj Tinb huvb yaag maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen .
42018005	mq paag naaiq taub aub kwaaq pa'la'g taaib Zeub faanb yia haig . maiq haib fuvg zruj , xij zu'g Tevj ninb pcvb fim Eei Beng . maiq Tevj nx , ninb zyrug zanb zang taaib la'Eauq yia Kruq haig . ’ ”
42018006	zyruq cvj kxvq , “ mwavj kaaj , naaiq taub maiq pcvb fim Eei syemq zwid Jyen Eei waag .
42018007	Tinb huvb maiq zeid xij pcvb fim Eei Tevj ninb kinq taaib Eei yaag zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd Jrub ninb uaq teij myenb fai ? Tinb huvb xij vaib laub Zivj taaib Tevj ninb Bua fai ?
42018008	yia Buaj meib Bua , ninb zuvq xij syepg syepq Eei Tevj pcvb fim Eei Beng suv . mq paag yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , cvj taaib uaq zang , yia tu'q pwatg yem luvb Diaq maaib myenb syenj Eei fai ? ”
42018009	maaib teij myenb Zev ninb Bua kanb zruj Kuq myenb , mavg Piaj ka'Len myenb . ye-su zyrug kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq pun naaiq teij myenb mwavj .
42018010	ninb kxvq , “ maaib i laanb myenb mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq tauj kauj . maaib laanb faa-li-sij myenb , maaib laanb Tevj lo-maa huvb Jaa syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb .
42018011	faa-li-sij myenb sruq Jyenq uaq tauj kauj kxvq , ‘ Tinb huvb aa'b ! yia lcvd zivb haig meib weig zu'g yia maiq Navq ka'Eiag Eei myenb . yia maiq mauq ka'naaiq , yaag maiq zruj Hruq Pyen , yaag maiq Yenj auq . maaib teij myenb zruj naaiq teij Jauq mq paag maiq zeid yia . yia yaag lcvd zivb haig meib , yia maiq Navq naaiq taub syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb .
42018012	yetg nxm leib paaij yia zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg i Rung . yia tu'q haiq Euvg , zyepg kruq yia pun yetg kruq meib . ’

42018014	ye-su cvj kxvq , “ yia Buaj meib Bua , syru Rrub zinb Eei myenb Rwrnj Eei zyavb hog ninb tu'q Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg Hruq . mq paag uaq taub faa-li-sij myenb maiq tu'q Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg Hruq . haiq taub Taaib kanb zruj Lo , Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj faij . haiq taub Eyemg kanb zruj faij , Tinb huvb xij pun uaq taub zruj Lo . ”
42018015	maaib teij myenb yaag txb ninb Bua Eei kub vwaad taaib xij ye-su maan . saib kxj Bua pwatg myenb Navq naaiq nx zruj , saib kxj Bua zyrug kxvq ninb Bua a'q .
42018016	mq paag ye-su heug fu'Jweiq taaib . ninb kxvq , “ kunq pun fu'Jweiq taaib lxd yia , maiq tuvq laanb ninb Bua saa . weig zu'g haiq taub lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb se Navq naaiq teij fu'Jweiq nx .
42018017	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub maiq Kavq Navq taub fu'Jweiq lovg Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq ninb , uaq taub yetg liud maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”

42020003	ye-su tau , “ yia yaag xij naaig Jruj meib Bua . Buaj yia og .

42020005	ninb Bua zyrug laanb Zauj laanb Zaavb laavb , “ Bua hxpg zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq ? sij kxvq Bua kxvq , ‘ Tinb huvb pun taaib , ’ ninb xij kxvq , ‘ uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq syenj yo-han ? ’
42020006	mq paag sij kxvq Bua kxvq , ‘ myenb pun taaib , ’ zwavj myenb xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig Bua weig zu'g ninb Bua funj tivg yo-han se trug waag myenb . ”
42020007	ninb Bua zyrug tau , “ yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q haiq taub pun ninb maaib leid zruj . ”
42020008	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Navq naaig yia yaag maiq Buaj meib Bua yia maaib haiq Euvg leid zruj naaiq teij sig . ”
42020009	ye-su cvj kxvq waab peiq pun myenb mwavj . ninb kxvq , “ maaib laanb myenb zwavj Rov a'vung pyruq , yaag kruq pun myenb . ninb kanb c'q , Zwrtq teib puv mivb laub Eei .
42020010	Tauj pyruq zua'g Eei zyavb hog , ninb Paaiq taub pru mivb lxd kruq Wivj Eei myenb , weig syru ninb Eei pwrng kruq Wivj Eei pyruq . mq paag kruq Wivj myenb Bx'q uaq taub pru , zung ninb Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei Rwrnj .
42020011	Wivb zyruq zyrug cvj Paaiq taub pru mivb , mq paag kruq Wivj myenb cvj Bx'q ninb , zruj to'g pun ninb Eaiq , yaag zung ninb Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei Rwrnj .
42020012	Wivb zyruq cvj Paaiq ta'faam taub mivb . kruq Wivj Eei myenb cvj Bx'q tu'q ninb syav haig , Tx kwavg ka'Eiag zi'g Wivj mivb .

42020014	“ mq paag kruq Wivj myenb pwatg ninb , laanb Buaj laanb , ‘ Ripg naaiq nxm Wivj se tovb naaiq taub a'q . Bua zx'q ninb taij kwavg mivb . ninb Ripg Eei Jaab tivb zyrug penj Bua Eei a'q . ’

42020016	ninb xij mivb taij kwavg ninb Bua cvj pun kanb teij myenb kruq uaq nxm Wivj . ” zwavj myenb haid liud naaiq teij waag , ninb Bua kxvq , “ Zinb maang maiq tuvq pun maaib Navq naaig . ”
42020017	ye-su mavg Jyenq ninb Bua naaig kaaj , “ kivb sru fiaq Jyenq naaiq Jruj waag maaib haiq Euvg eij leid ? ‘ komq pyauq zavg Gemb Zwrtq uaq nxm la'pyeiq , zuvq penj an pyaub kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm . ’
42020018	haiq taub Dxpg , zov zu'g naaiq nxm la'pyeiq , uaq taub zyrug huq penj ziaj teij mig a'q . naaiq nxm la'pyeiq Dxtq , zov zu'g haiq taub , uaq taub zyrug mwrng Revg mig a'q . ”
42020019	Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj sai myenb pyeiq hiuq tu'q ye-su kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq zi'q zu'g ninb Bua . uaq nxm zyavb hog ninb Bua xij zx'q ye-su haig a'q , mq paag ninb Bua kamb Riaj zwavj myenb .
42020020	Faauj leid Eei finb scv Zauj sai myenb pyeiq zyrug zanb zang Zyenb mavg Jyenq ye-su . ninb Bua Paaiq myenb mivb zruj sig Navq Kuq myenb , mq paag ninb Bua xij Duaq ye-su kxvq txvg zyrug haib zx'q ninb Jiu pun yem lo-maa zuvj Eei puab Diaq .

42020022	uaq Euvg meib Buaj yia Bua og . Bua Zwrtq Rrub zinb pun lo-maa huvb se txvg Bua Eei leid fai ? ”

42022024	saib kxj Rcv Jiad taaib kxvq , yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj , xij zu'g funj ninb Bua haiq taub zruj Lo Jiaj .
42022025	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Janj Eei huvb kunq Jyenq pc'g fivj . zruj Jyenb fruq uaq teij , pc'g fivj heug , ‘ Ria myenb Eei kxb yrud . ’
42022026	mq paag meib Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Navq naaig . meib Bua haiq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj Navq kaub lunj Jiaj uaq taub . haiq taub zruj pyeiq , uaq taub xij zu'g zruj Navq pru nx .
42022027	haiq taub zruj kaub Lo ? zweid Jyenq Eang uaq taub fai liug leid uaq taub ? zweid Jyenq uaq taub zruj kaub Lo maiq zeid ? mq paag yia yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Navq fub suj Eei myenb nx .
42022028	yia pwavb zu'g Kruq meib Bua Zauj yia yem , maiq kwavg yia .
42022029	yia Eei tia Navq haiq nx zx'q nxm kua'q pun yia , yia zyrug Navq uaq nx zx'q nxm Jiu pun meib Bua .
42022030	se weig pun meib Bua yem yia Eei kua'q Zauj yia Jwavg tiab Eang Jwavg tiab hopq . meib Bua yaag tu'q zweid weig , syemq uaq teij zyepg Eeig fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb .
42022031	“ si-mon aa'b ! si-mon ! mwavj og . saa-taan tu'q Tinb huvb Gxi Rwib seij meib Bua yetg zuvq Navq myenb Eomj Zu'q nx .
42022032	mq paag yia zuvq weig meib tauj kauj Toq Tinb huvb pun meib syenj wrnq , maiq Twij . meib cvj Rwrnj taaib lxd yia , meib xij zu'g Tevj meib Eei kxb yrud henq Jiad taaib . ”
42022033	pi-te tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! maiq kunq pia'g lob , maiq kunq taig , yia zyavb yaag Zauj meib yetg Dwi . taig yaag Zauj meib yetg Kwrtq . ”
42022034	ye-su kxvq , “ pi-te aa'b ! yia Buaj meib , ib Nxi Jai maiq kcvb Gaaij , meib xij kxvq pua Rung meib maiq hiuq tu'q yia . ”
42022035	ye-su cvj naaig kaaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ yia Paaiq meib Bua mivb uaq zang , yia Buaj meib Bua maiq tuvq txb Eaanb Bua'g , yaag maiq tuvq txb Bua'g tapq ka'naaiq fai txb heb , meib Bua Zaa haiq Euvg fai ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ maiq Zaa haiq Euvg . ”
42022036	ye-su kxvq , “ mq paag ib zang haiq taub maaib Eaanb Bua'g fai tapq ka'naaiq Eei Bua'g xij zu'g txb Jyenq mivb . haiq taub maiq maaib Ru'g Daauq xij zu'g maaig ninb Eei tomb lwi maaid zuv .
42022037	kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ ninb zu'g funj Zauj zwib myenb fib Navq . ’
42022038	saib kxj Bua kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! mavg kaaj naaiq ! maaib i zuv Ru'g Daauq . ” ye-su tau , “ naaiq kauj a'q . ”
42022039	ye-su Zwrtq zivb mivb yaag Navq yetg kau nx , mivb ka'lanq Bov . saib kxj Bua kan Jyenq mivb .
42022040	Tauj uaq nxm txvj , ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua xij zu'g Toq Tinb huvb Tevj meib Bua maiq zu'g pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig . ”
42022041	kxvq liud , ninb kanb cvj mivb nxm txvj ko teij Eei , Dovg zxi yetg lau la'pyeiq ko Eei txvj , yem uaq kweig Fiag Zauj Tinb huvb kxvq waag .
42022042	ninb kxvq , “ aa tia aa'b ! sij kxvq ei tia Eei eij nx , Toq zx'q Gxi yia xij zu'g hopq naaiq nxm zaanq . mq paag maiq tuvq ei yia Eei eij . xij zu'g ei tia kanb Eei eij Navq . ”
42022043	maaib taub finb myenb yem Tinb txvb taaib hing Zwrtq Tevj Qa'q ye-su .
42022044	ye-su pa'la'g Raub tu'q Kruq haig zyrug Jaa lovg Qa'q tauj kauj . ninb Zwrtq hang yetg nxm yetg nxm Lo Eei , Navq Ryaamq nx Dyepq Fiag Dau .
42022045	ye-su tauj kauj paag , Jiad sin taaib Tauj saib kxj Bua uaq , pwatg ninb Bua laaij Raub tu'q Kruq haig , mFxmb mig a'q .
42022046	ninb kxvq Buaj saib kxj Bua , “ meib Bua fuvg Navq naaiq nx mFxmb ? Jiad sin Toq Tinb huvb Tevj meib Bua maiq zu'g pwavb seij Hruq Eei sig maa'b ! ”
42022047	ye-su kxvq waag zuvq maiq kcvb setq , maaib kwanb myenb taaib . zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub , Buaj heug yu-Daatg , yaag txb Jyenq ninb Bua taaib . yu-Daatg mivb fatq Eei xij zom ye-su .
42022048	mq paag ye-su naaig , “ yu-Daatg aag , meib zom yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , weig zx'q yia maaig fai ? ”

42022054	ninb Bua zx'q ye-su txb mivb tomb sai myenb Eei pyauq . pi-te yaag kan Jyenq mivb mq paag leib ko teij Eei .

42022056	maaib taub msia'q pru pwatg pi-te zweid trub Raug Len , trud cvq zu'g pi-te . uaq taub pru nu'g nu'q Eei mavg yaag kxvq , “ naaiq taub yaag Zauj uaq laanb myenb yem . ”

42022062	pi-te zyrug Zwrtq mivb Qa'q Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig .

42023006	pi-laatq haid ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq ninb zyrug naaig kaaj , “ naaiq taub se kaa-li-li myenb ? ”

42023040	mq paag uaq taub zwib myenb paaq ninb kxvq , “ meib maiq kamb Riaj Tinb huvb ? Bua lomb Rxib zu'g tivg zwid taig .

42023049	Zauj ye-su Jiu zua'g uaq teij myenb cvj Zauj yem kaa-li-li kan ye-su taaib uaq teij msia'q txn sruq Jyenq ko teij Eei mavg naaiq teij sig .
42023050	maaib taub yu-Dia scvq , aa-li-maa-Tia muvq Eei myenb , Buaj heug yo-sepq . ninb zruj taub Kuq myenb , kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei leid yaag zanb zang zuaq Jyenq Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq Eei Nxi Tauj . ninb yaag zruj taub kunq sig wig Eei myenb . mq paag uaq teij kunq sig myenb Zaavb laavb tivg Navq haiq nx zruj uaq zang , yo-sepq maiq Tevj ninb Bua kxvq . maaib taub yu-Dia scvq , aa-li-maa-Tia muvq Eei myenb , Buaj heug yo-sepq . ninb zruj taub Kuq myenb , kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei leid yaag zanb zang zuaq Jyenq Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq Eei Nxi Tauj . ninb yaag zruj taub kunq sig wig Eei myenb . mq paag uaq teij kunq sig myenb Zaavb laavb tivg Navq haiq nx zruj uaq zang , yo-sepq maiq Tevj ninb Bua kxvq .

42023052	yo-sepq mivb lxd pi-laatq Toq ye-su Eei sei .
42023053	Toq liud zyrug mivb zx'q sei Fiag taaib , lovg la'maab Dia peu Jyenq fuvj mivb zavj nxm zu'g taaib Eei la'pyeib zruq . naaiq nxm zruq maiq kcvb zavj Jiaj yetg taub Janb taig .
42023054	uaq Nxi se liug leid Jiaj tivb kov Eei Nxi , tivb kov Nxi xij Tauj a'q .
42023055	yem kaa-li-li kan ye-su taaib uaq teij msia'q txn kan Jyenq yo-sepq mivb mavg zruq , yaag mavg ninb Bua Navq haiq nx an ye-su Eei sei .
42023056	mavg liud ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj mivb Beng Jyenq Daav Eei Dia , Daav Eei yrub , xij txb mivb Yetq ye-su Eei sei . Tauj tivb kov Nxi , ninb Bua zyrug ei leib latg tivb kov .
42024001	Tauj uaq nxm leib paaij Eei ta'yetq Nxi luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei , luvb Byrub Byrud Fav Navq , uaq teij msia'q txn txb Jyenq ninb Bua Beng taaib Eei Diab Daav mivb ye-su Eei zruq .
42024002	Tauj uaq pwatg Bc'g zrub kcvb uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq Twi Gxi mig a'q .
42024003	ninb Bua zyrug pia'g mivb mavg , maiq pwatg zyruq ye-su Eei sei .
42024004	ninb Bua sruq Jyenq uaq Namq maiq mevb pc'g . lyemb zeib maaib i laanb myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib hruj zcvb zcvb Eei sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ka'Len .
42024005	uaq teij msia'q txn kamb Riaj haig zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau . naaiq teij i laanb myenb naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug taaib naaiq Janb taig yem Eei txvj lxd myenb navb myenb ?
42024006	ninb maiq yem naaiq lx'g . ninb navb taaib a'q . meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Tauj ninb yem kaa-li-li uaq zang kxvq Buaj meib Bua uaq teij waag .
42024007	ninb kxvq , ‘ yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij zu'g Jiu pun myenb waaig myenb txb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj . mq paag ta'faam Nxi yia cvj navb taaib ’ uaq teij waag . ”
42024008	uaq teij msia'q txn zyrug Javj zu'g ye-su Eei waag a'q .
42024009	yem zruq Rwrnj mivb , ninb Bua zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig Buaj uaq teij zyepg yetq taub kovb zob Zauj ka'Len Eei zwavj myenb .
42024010	Buaj kovb zob Bua uaq teij msia'q txn , tovb makq-Daa-laa muvq uaq taub maa-li-yaa Zauj yo-an-naa Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei maa , maa-li-yaa , cvj Zauj ninb Bua taaib uaq teij msia'q txn .
42024011	mq paag kovb zob Bua maiq syenj . laaig naaiq teij msia'q txn la'kwaib kxvq Navq .
42024012	mq paag pi-te Jiad sin Tiuj Jyenq mivb Tauj zruq , Do'q Fiag Zyepq mavg , Kuvj pwatg Diab tamb Navq . ninb zyrug taauj Gaav Rwrnj , yaag Namq maiq mevb pc'g naaiq teij sig .
42024013	tovb naaig Nxi maaib i taub ye-su Eei saib kxj mivb nxm laavd heug em-maa-utg , yem nitq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb leib maiq ko zyepg yetq ki-lo Jauq .
42024014	kan Jauq mivb uaq zang , ninb Bua kxvq Jyenq Ko'q ho'g Zwrtq liud Eei sig mivb .
42024015	txij ninb Bua kxvq Jyenq uaq zang , ye-su kanb taaib fatq Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua mivb .
42024016	ninb Bua pwatg Eei mq paag weig haiq tiug mq pei , ninb Bua zia'q maiq tu'q ninb .
42024017	ye-su naaig kaaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua kan Jyenq Jauq mivb meib Bua kxvq haiq Euvg ? ” ninb Bua zyrug tivb Jyenq , Myen Raub Raub uaq .
42024018	maaib taub , Buaj heug Ken-o-patg , naaig ye-su , “ Kuvj meib kanb Du'g taub Kc'q yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij i ziaj Nxi Zwrtq taaib Eei sig ? ”
42024019	ye-su cvj naaig , “ haiq Euvg sig ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su Eei sig . ninb zruj taub trug waag myenb . yem Tinb huvb Zauj zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen ninb kxvq Eei waag Zauj zruj Eei sig maaib tomb Qa'q .
42024020	yia Bua Eei sai myenb pyeiq Zauj Jyenb fruq zx'q ninb Jiu pun Janj tivg zwid taij ninb zyrug txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig .
42024021	yia Bua yaag Namq Jyenq tovb naaiq taub xij zua'g i-saa-laa-en myenb Rwrnj . yaag maiq taan Bua'g naaiq Navq . naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud tu'q pua Nxi a'q .
42024022	mq paag yem yia Bua uaq maaib teij msia'q txn zruj pun yia Bua Namq maiq mevb pc'g . ninb Bua a'Dxm Ryruq Eei mivb uaq zruq mavg .
42024023	maiq pwatg ninb Eei sei mig a'q . ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib kxvq ninb Bua pwatg finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib Buaj ninb Bua , ye-su zyavb Jyenq Eei .
42024024	yia Bua maaib teij mivb mavg yaag pwatg Navq naaiq teij msia'q txn kxvq nx . mq paag ninb Bua maiq pwatg ye-su . ”
42024025	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua myenb Vovj myenb aa'b ! trug waag myenb kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag meib Bua weig haiq tiug syenj Dovg naaig Danb ?
42024026	ki-tug xij zu'g syrug liud naaig teij Kruq Eei sig Zivj taaib pia'g ninb Eei Favb laavg maiq zeid ? ”
42024027	ye-su zyrug kxvq mevb kivb sru zyavq Jyenq ninb kanb kxvq Eei Jrub Jruj waag pun ninb Bua mwavj , yem mo-se Eei leib latg sru Jiad kxn cvj kxvq Revg Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru .
42024028	mivb aaq lamb Tauj ninb Bua xij mivb uaq nxm laavd , ye-su zruj Navq xij pcv za'g Eei Jiaj .
42024029	mq paag ninb Bua Qa'q lyrub ninb kxvq , “ ib zang aaq lamb Mwavj a'q . Ba'Nxi xij mwrtq a'q . Zauj yia Bua pweij mwrnd naaiq maa'b ! ” ye-su zyrug pia'g pyauq Zauj ninb Bua hitq uaq .
42024030	ye-su Zauj ninb Bua Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj uaq zang , ninb cvj zx'q Fuaq taaib lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb zyrug mc'q Gxi pun ninb Bua .
42024031	Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua i laanb lyemb zeib zia'q tu'q ye-su , zyav naaig maiq pwatg ninb mig a'q .
42024032	laanb Buaj laanb , “ Bua kan Jauq taaib uaq zang , ninb Zauj Bua kxvq waag yaag Pxq mevb kivb sru , Bua haid Jxm Hruq haig Navq maaib trud zia'g Jyenq nx x'g ? ”
42024033	ninb Bua lyemb zeib Jiad sin Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem . ninb Bua pwatg uaq teij zyepg yetq taub saib kxj Zauj teij ninb Bua Eei txig kapq zunq uaq ,
42024034	haid ninb Bua kxvq , “ zyruq za'kevb navb taaib a'q . ninb hing pun si-mon pwatg liud a'q . ”
42024035	uaq teij i laanb yaag kxvq ninb Bua yem Jauq zavg pwavb Eei sig yaag kxvq ye-su mc'q Fuaq uaq zang ninb Bua zia'q tu'q ninb a'q .
42024036	uaq teij i laanb kxvq Jyenq naaiq teij Jauq uaq zang , zyruq ye-su kanb lyemb zeib hing taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua zwavj myenb Eei Bu'Dovj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua pcvb xn a'q og . ”
42024037	ninb Bua laaig pwatg Janb taig Fxid mq pei , zyrug hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig , Hruq Waav Revg .
42024038	mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug Raub faanb ? zruj haiq Euvg maaib Hruq Buvb Byenq ?
42024039	samj mavg kaaj yia Eei puab zauj ! Lua mavg , meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q tovb yia a'q . Janb taig Fxid maiq maaib xq , maiq maaib Buvq Navq meib Bua pwatg yia maaib nx . ”
42024040	ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq yaag pun ninb Bua mavg ninb Eei puab zauj .
42024041	mavg liud ninb Bua a'Neiq haig , Bua'g hxvb haig , mq paag Zxg maiq kcvb syenj . ye-su naaig ninb Bua , “ yem naaiq maaib Eang Eei ka'naaiq Eei fai ? ”
42024042	ninb Bua zx'q teij zi'q taaib Eei Byaud pun ninb .
42024043	ninb zipq taaib zyrug txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eang .
42024044	Eang liud , ninb Buaj ninb Bua , “ naaiq teij sig se yia Zauj meib Bua yem uaq zang yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua . yem mo-se Eei leib latg sru Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Eei sru Zauj sivj Ruv zyavq Jyenq yia uaq teij waag yetg zuvq , xij zu'g Zwrtq taaib txib tiug Revg . ”
42024045	ye-su zyrug Pxq Gxi ninb Bua Eei Hruq pun ninb Bua mevb pc'g kivb sru .
42024046	ninb yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Navq naaiq nx kxvq ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq . taig mivb Tauj ta'faam Nxi cvj navb taaib .
42024047	xij zu'g tevq ninb Eei Buaj mivb zunb Buaj myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid zyrug tu'q Tinb huvb kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid . xij zu'g yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiad kxn zunb Zwrtq pwavq maang kua'q maang fivj .
42024048	meib Bua zruj naaiq teij sig Eei zxvb zevj myenb .
42024049	tovb yia Eei tia lcvd pun Eei , yia kanb xij Paaiq taaib Zauj meib Bua yem . mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g yem naaiq zivb zuaq Tauj yem kub vwaaig taaib Eei Qa'q Fiag Tauj meib Bua . ”
42024050	ye-su txb ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb Tauj Be-Taa-ni laavb Len zyrug Zau Jyenq puad pwav waag ninb Bua .
42024051	pwav kau waag , ninb zyrug leib Gxi ninb Bua , faauj Tinb txvb mig a'q .
42024052	ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq paaij ninb , Fyenb yrub a'Neiq Eei Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem ,
42024053	yaag zanb zang yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zev Tinb huvb .
43001001	tovb Zx maiq kcvb zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang , tod zuvq yem Eei . tod Zauj Tinb huvb yem yaag tovb Tinb huvb .
43001002	zinb Daavg yem kxn uaq zang , tod Zauj Tinb huvb yem .
43001003	Tinb huvb lovg ninb zeij Zwrtq maang mwrtg . maiq maaib yetg Euvg Tinb huvb maiq lovg tod zeij .
43001004	tod zruj zyavb mcvg Eei kxnb Ewrnb . naaiq Euvg mcvg txb Fav taaib ziuj paamb myenb .
43001005	Fav ziuj pia'g Mwavj Eei txvj , Mwavj yaag maiq haib hivb Fav .
43001006	Tinb huvb Paaiq taub myenb taaib , Buaj heug yo-han .
43001007	ninb taaib Tevj Fav zruj zxvb zevj pun maang myenb haib syenj .
43001008	ninb kanb maiq zeid zruj naaiq Fav . ninb Kuvj Tevj Fav zruj zxvb zevj Navq .
43001009	naaiq Fav se zyen haig Eei Fav yaag pia'g paamb ken ziuj Fav luvb Diaq myenb maanb .
43001010	naaiq tod yem paamb ken . Tinb huvb lovg ninb zeij paamb ken , mq paag paamb myenb zia'q maiq tu'q ninb .
43001011	ninb taaib Tauj ninb kanb Eei teib puv , ninb kanb Eei myenb yaag maiq zipq ninb .
43001012	mq paag zipq ninb yaag syenj Kauj ninb uaq teij , ninb pun maaib leid penj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud .
43001013	ninb Bua penj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud se maiq zeid ei paamb myenb Eei Ryaamb fei fai ei paamb myenb Eei eij yuvd . Tinb huvb kanb zruj ninb Bua Eei tia .
43001014	tod penj taub paamb myenb yem Bua Bu'Dovj . ninb maaib enb Zeij Zauj zyen leid pwavq Revg . yia Bua tu'q pwatg ninb Eei Favb laavg , se weig zu'g ninb zruj zavg tiaj Eei Do'g txn tu'q taaib Eei Favb laavg .
43001015	yo-han Tevj ninb zruj zxvb zevj . ninb heug Jyenq kxvq , “ yia kxvq Jiaj Eei uaq taub se tovb naaiq taub a'q . yia taaib Daavg , ninb Ga'haaq taaib mq paag ninb zruj kaub Lo yia , weig zu'g yia maiq kcvb Zwrtq seij ninb zuvq yem Eei . ”
43001016	ninb Eei en Lo haig zyrug zanb zang Zeij fu'q pun Bua .
43001017	Tinb huvb lovg mo-se pun Bua tu'q leib latg , mq paag lovg ye-su ki-tug pun Bua tu'q ninb Eei en Zauj zyen leid .
43001018	maiq maaib haiq taub pwatg Jiaj Tinb huvb . Kuvj maaib ninb Eei Do'g txn , tovb yem zavg tiaj Eei ka'Len uaq taub , pun Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Navq .
43001019	yo-han zruj Eei zxvb zevj se Navq naaiq . yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Paaiq teij sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb mivb naaig ninb , “ meib tovb haiq taub ? ”
43001020	yo-han maiq pivj , ninb kxvq za'g Eei . “ yia maiq zeid ki-tug . ”
43001021	ninb Bua cvj naaig , “ uaq Euvg , meib tovb haiq taub ? meib tovb e-li-yaa fai ? ” yo-han tau , “ maiq zeid . ” ninb Bua cvj naaig , “ Navq naaig , meib tovb uaq taub trug waag myenb fai ? ” yo-han tau , “ maiq zeid lx'g . ”
43001022	ninb Bua cvj kxvq , “ uaq Euvg , meib tovb haiq taub ? Buaj yia Bua maa'b ! yia Bua xij zu'g Rwrnj mivb Buaj Paaiq yia Bua taaib uaq teij . meib kanb kxvq meib zruj haiq Euvg myenb ? ”
43001023	yo-han lovg trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , Eei waag tau ninb Bua . ninb kxvq , “ yia tovb yem teib puvb Waav Qiaj Lo Eei heug Jyenq kxvq , ‘ xij zu'g Kxi Jauq za'g Eei liug leid zipq zyruq . ’ ”
43001024	faa-li-sij myenb Paaiq taaib uaq teij myenb
43001025	zyrug naaig yo-han , “ sij kxvq meib maiq zeid ki-tug , yaag maiq zeid e-li-yaa , yaag maiq zeid uaq taub trug waag myenb , meib weig haiq tiug Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid ? * ”
43001026	yo-han tau , “ yia lovg uam Tevj myenb Jiaj leid . mq paag cvj maaib taub yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj , meib Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q ninb .
43001027	yia taaib Daavg , ninb Ga'haaq taaib , mq paag yia lyemb maiq Pwij Tevj ninb Jaiq heb Laav . ”
43001028	naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei tov puv mcvj , Be-Taa-ni laavd Zwrtq , tovb yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq nxm txvj .
43001029	ta'Eeig Nxi yo-han pwatg ye-su huvj Jyenq ninb taaib zyrug kxvq , “ mavg maa'b ! Tinb huvb Eei pa'ki yuvb txn , tovb Teij paamb myenb Eei zwid uaq taub .
43001030	tovb naaiq taub yia kxvq Jiaj Buaj meib Bua , ‘ yia taaib Daavg , maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib mq paag ninb zruj kaub Lo yia , weig zu'g yia maiq kcvb Zwrtq seij , ninb zuvq yem Eei . ’
43001031	yia kanb maiq hiuq tu'q ninb tovb haiq taub , mq paag yia taaib Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid weig pun i-saa-laa-en myenb hiuq tu'q ninb . ”
43001032	yo-han cvj zruj zxvb zevj kxvq , “ yia pwatg sivj livb Navq nx'g Go yem uaq luvb Fiag taaib yem ninb Eei sin .
43001033	yia yaag maiq hiuq ninb tovb haiq taub , mq paag Paaiq yia taaib lovg uam Tevj myenb Jiaj leid uaq taub Buaj yia , ‘ meib pwatg sivj livb Fiag taaib yem haiq taub Eei sin , tovb naaiq taub xij lovg sivj livb Tevj myenb Jiaj leid . ’
43001034	yia pwatg liud a'q , zyrug zruj zxvb zevj Buaj meib Bua , naaiq taub se Tinb huvb Eei txn . ”
43001035	ta'Eeig Nxi yo-han Zauj i taub ninb Eei saib kxj cvj sruq Jyenq uaq .
43001036	pwatg ye-su Jiaj Jauq , yo-han zyrug kxvq , “ mavg maa'b ! Tinb huvb Eei pa'ki yuvb txn . ”
43001037	uaq teij i taub saib kxj haid yo-han Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ninb Bua zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb .
43001038	ye-su Win Rwrnj pwatg ninb Bua kan Jyenq taaib zyrug naaig , “ meib Bua lxd haiq Euvg ? ” ninb Bua kxvq , “ lapq-Bi aag , meib hitq haiq nxm txvj ? ” ( lapq-Bi uaq Jruj waag Eei eij leid se saib tiaj . )
43001039	ye-su tau , “ taaib mavg maa'b ! ” uaq zang Fiag aanj leib maiq ko pyei nxm zyavb hog . ninb Bua zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb Tauj ninb hitq Eei txvj yaag Zauj ninb yem uaq Tauj Mwavj .
43001040	haid yo-han kxvq zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb uaq teij i taub , maaib taub zruj si-mon pi-te Eei yrud , an-Daa-lu .
43001041	an-Daa-lu lyemb zeib mivb lxd ninb Eei kxj , si-mon pi-te , Buaj ninb , “ yia Bua pwatg me-si-yaa a'q lo'b ! ” ( me-si-yaa uaq Jruj waag Eei eij leid se ki-tug . )
43001042	an-Daa-lu zyrug txb si-mon mivb Tauj ye-su uaq . ye-su mavg Jyenq si-mon zyrug kxvq , “ meib se yo-han Eei txn , si-mon . yavb naaiq Jiaj meib Eei Buaj xij zu'g heug Ke-faatq . ” ( Ke-faatq faan taaib kxvq pi-te . )
43001043	ta'Eeig Nxi ye-su tivg Hruq mivb kaa-li-li scvq . ninb pwatg fi-lipq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ taaib kan yia og . ”
43001044	fi-lipq se Betg-sai-Daa muvq Eei myenb Navq an-Daa-lu Zauj si-mon nx .
43001045	fi-lipq lxd pwatg naa-Taa-naa-en zyrug kxvq , “ tovb mo-se fiaq Jyenq uaq leib latg sru , Zauj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb fiaq Eei sru zyavq Jyenq kxvq uaq laanb myenb , yia Bua tu'q pwatg a'q . se yo-sepq Eei txn , naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su . ”
43001046	naa-Taa-naa-en naaig kaaj , “ haib maaib haiq Euvg lovj Eei yem naa-saa-letq muvq Zwrtq fai ? ” fi-lipq kxvq , “ taaib mavg maa'b ! ”
43001047	ye-su pwatg naa-Taa-naa-en taaib lxd ninb zyrug kxvq , “ naaiq taub za'kevb zyen i-saa-laa-en myenb . ninb maiq maaib kuq kwaij Eei Hruq . ”
43001048	naa-Taa-naa-en naaig ye-su , “ meib Navq haiq nx hiuq tu'q yia ? ” ye-su tau , “ fi-lipq maiq kcvb heug meib uaq zang , meib yem uaq vovb Exj Dyavb kxn , yia pwatg liud meib a'q . ”
43001049	naa-Taa-naa-en kxvq , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn . meib zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb . ”
43001050	ye-su kxvq , “ weig zu'g yia kxvq yia pwatg meib yem vovb Exj Dyavb kxn meib Zivj taaib syenj ? meib zuvq xij tu'q pwatg sig kaub Lo Jiaj naaiq . ”
43001051	ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj naa-Taa-naa-en , “ yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , meib Bua xij pwatg luvb kcvb Gxi , yaag pwatg Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb yem yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , kub vwaaig faaub faauj Fiab Fiag . ”
43002001	ta'faam Nxi yem kaa-li-li teib puv , Kaa-naa laavd , maaib nxm Zivb Jaab yinb . ye-su Eei maa yaag yem uaq Eei .
43002002	myenb yaag Zivq ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb uaq nxm yinb .
43002003	zruj kau , a'vung tiuq Revg mig a'q . ye-su Eei maa kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ ninb Bua Eei a'vung tiuq Revg mig a'q . ”
43002004	ye-su tau , “ aa maa aa'b ! weig haiq tiug pun naaiq teij Jauq Paanj Tauj yia ? yia Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj . ”
43002005	ye-su Eei maa kxvq Buaj uaq teij pru , “ ninb Buaj meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg , xij zu'g ei Jyenq zruj og . ”
43002006	yiu-Tai myenb ei Jyenq leid Raauj puab zauj Eei wij . weig naaiq , yem uaq nxm yinb maaib Ju'q nxm la'pyeib ovj , yetg nxm tapq tu'q pyaa Ju'q Tovq uam .
43002007	ye-su Buaj uaq teij pru , “ Damq uam tapq pwavq uaq teij ovj maa'b ! ” ninb Bua zyrug Damq uam tapq pwavq Tauj pcvb ovb Rwib .
43002008	ye-su cvj Buaj ninb Bua , “ ib zang Damq teij naaiq ovj Eei uam txb mivb pun Zivb swiq og . ” ninb Bua zyrug Damq txb mivb .
43002009	Zivb swiq seij naaiq teij uam penj taaib Eei a'vung tiuq . ninb maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij tiuq yem haaij taaib , ( mq paag Damq uam uaq teij pru hiuq Eei . ) ninb zyrug heug syavb laavb taaib
43002010	kxvq Buaj ninb , “ yetg kau myenb Zivq Kc'q ninb Bua pun tiub Kuq hopq Daavg . zuaq myenb hopq Zamq Zivj pun maiq Kuq Eei tiuq . mq paag meib lyrub Kuq uaq Euvg Tauj ib zang . ”
43002011	ye-su zruj Zwrtq naaiq taaub Rung Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog , yem kaa-li-li scvq , Kaa-naa laavd zruj . ninb Navq naaiq zruj piuj mevb ninb Eei Favb laavg . ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yaag syenj Kauj ninb .
43002012	Ga'haaq ye-su Zauj ninb Eei maa , ninb Eei yrud Bua , Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq yem i ziaj Nxi uaq .
43002013	uaq zang aaq lamb Tauj siaj mcvg zipq . ye-su zyrug mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
43002014	yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ninb pwatg myenb maaig vovb , maaig yuvb , maaig pc'g kopq , yaag maaib myenb zweid Jyenq Tiuq Eaanb .
43002015	ye-su zyrug lovg Laav kitq tiub Laavb pin taaib zung yetg zuvq , lyemb vovb , lyemb yuvb , Zwrtq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq yaag puvj Kiv Tiuq Eaanb Eei tiab , toj kwavg Revg ninb Bua Eei Eaanb .
43002016	ninb yaag Buaj maaig pc'g kopq uaq teij myenb , “ pyenb meib Bua Eei nx'g Zwrtq mivb maa'b ! maiq tuvq lovg yia Eei tia Eei pyauq zruj hei . ”
43002017	saib kxj Bua zyrug Javj zu'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , “ o Tinb huvb aa'b ! yia weig meib Eei pyauq Jxm Hruq , Navq trud zia'g Jyenq yia nx . ”
43002018	zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb naaig ninb , “ meib xij zruj haiq Euvg Javb hog pun yia Bua mavg , pun Ziv meib maaib leid Navq naaiq nx zruj ? ”
43002019	ye-su tau , “ Zc'q naaiq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq maa'b ! pua Nxi ka'Euad yia cvj Zeij Jiad taaib . ”
43002020	ninb Bua naaig , “ pua Nxi meib haib zruj tu'q zyavj Eei ? naaiq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zruj feij zyepg lua'g Havj Zivj taaib zyavj . ”
43002021	ye-su kxvq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq mq paag za'kevb kxvq peiq ninb kanb Eei sin .
43002022	Ga'haaq ye-su taig mivb cvj navb taaib , ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Javj zu'g ninb kxvq naaiq Jruj waag zyrug syenj kivb sru yaag syenj ye-su kxvq Eei waag .
43002023	ye-su yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq . maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj Kauj ninb weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg ninb zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog .
43002024	mq paag ye-su maiq puvj Hruq ninb Bua weig zu'g ninb hiuq tu'q maang myenb .
43002025	ye-su maiq Qyemj zu'g haiq taub Buaj ninb paamb myenb Navq haiq nx , weig zu'g ninb kanb hiuq tu'q myenb Eei Hruq .
43003001	maaib taub faa-li-sij myenb , Buaj heug ni-Ko-De-matq . ninb se yetg taub zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb .
43003002	maaib mwrnd ninb taaib lxd ye-su kxvq , “ finb scv aa'b ! yia Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Paaiq meib taaib zruj finb scv . sij kxvq maiq zeid Tinb huvb Zauj yem , maiq maaib haiq taub haib zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Navq meib zruj . ”
43003003	ye-su tau , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib . haiq taub maiq kanb syavb yuvd Jiaj , maiq haib tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
43003004	ni-Ko-De-matq naaig kaaj , “ myenb koj Revg , Navq haiq nx haib syavb yuvd Jiaj ? maiq haib pia'g maa Eei ka'sia kanb yuvd Rung saa'b ? ”
43003005	ye-su tau , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib . haiq taub maiq yem uam Zauj sivj livb kanb syavb yuvd Jiaj , uaq taub maiq tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q .
43003006	paamb myenb yuvd Eei se paamb myenb Eei sin . sivj livb yuvd Eei se livb wrnb .
43003007	meib maiq tuvq weig yia kxvq , ‘ meib Bua xij zu'g kanb syavb yuvd Jiaj ’ naaiq Jruj waag Namq maiq mevb pc'g .
43003008	Ryaauj xij pwrng haaij , ninb zyrug pwrng uaq . meib haid Ryaauj Eei Qiaj mq paag maiq hiuq tu'q ninb yem haaij taaib , yaag maiq hiuq tu'q xij mivb Tauj haaij . sivj livb pun haiq taub kanb syavb yuvd Jiaj se Navq naaiq nx . ”
43003009	ni-Ko-De-matq naaig ninb , “ naaiq teij sig fuvg haib Navq naaiq nx ? ”
43003010	ye-su tau , “ meib se zruj taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei tomb finb scv , meib Zxg maiq mevb pc'g naaiq teij sig ?
43003011	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib , yia Bua hiuq Eei , yia Bua kxvq . yia Bua pwatg Jiaj Eei , yia Bua yaag zruj zxvb zevj . mq paag meib Bua maiq syenj yia Bua zruj Eei zxvb zevj .
43003012	sij kxvq yia kxvq paamb ken Eei Jauq meib Bua zuvq maiq syenj , yia txb Tinb txvb Eei Jauq taaib kxvq , meib Bua fuvg haib syenj ?
43003013	maiq kcvb maaib haiq taub tu'q faauj Jiaj Tinb txvb Zwrtq liud yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , tovb yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib uaq taub .
43003014	“ lob Nxi mo-se yem teib puvb Waav Navq haiq nx zx'q tovb naav an uaq tovg lyepg faauj Lav , yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , yaag xij Navq uaq nx zu'g myenb zx'q lyepg faauj Lav ,
43003015	pun haiq taub syenj Kauj yia zyrug tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
43003016	“ Tinb huvb Dovg naaig Namq luvb Diaq myenb Zivj zx'q ninb Eei Do'g txn Zeij pun ninb Bua . haiq taub syenj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei txn maiq zu'g myetg mq paag tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
43003017	Tinb huvb Paaiq ninb Eei txn Fiag Tauj paamb ken maiq zeid weig tivg paamb myenb Eei zwid . Kuvj xij pun paamb myenb tu'q Fruj Navq .
43003018	“ haiq taub syenj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei txn , uaq taub maiq zu'g tivg zwid . haiq taub maiq syenj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei txn nx , Tinb huvb zuvq tivg Jyenq uaq taub Eei zwid , laaij ninb maiq syenj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei Do'g txn .
43003019	“ syemq zwid Eei kxn se Navq naaiq . Fav taaib pia'g paamb ken . myenb maiq xij lovg Fav , Kuvj xij lovg Mwavj Navq , weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj Eei sig se waaig haig .
43003020	haiq taub zruj waaig sig , uaq taub Rxv Fav yaag maiq xij mivb lxd Fav . Raub heij ninb zruj Eei waaig sig xij piuj mevb Zwrtq taaib .
43003021	mq paag haiq taub ei Jyenq zyen leid zruj , uaq taub taaib lxd Fav . Fav zyrug pun Ziv ninb zruj Eei sig se Kauj Tinb huvb zruj . ”
43003022	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud , Ga'haaq ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb yu-Dia scvq yem Zaamj uaq yaag Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid .
43003023	uaq zang yo-han yaag Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid . ninb yem aai-non muvq , leib saaj-lim muvq maiq navg ko , weig zu'g uaq nxm txvj maaib uam Zamq . myenb yaag mivb uaq Jiaj uam Eei leid .
43003024	( uaq zang yo-han maiq kcvb zu'g wrnj lob . )
43003025	maaib teij yo-han Eei saib kxj Zauj taub yiu-Tai myenb Rcv saaj wij Eei leid .
43003026	uaq teij saib kxj zyrug mivb Buaj yo-han , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! meib Javj tu'q Eei fai ? zinb Daavg Zauj meib yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei tov puv mcvj , tovb meib zruj zxvb zevj kxvq Buaj Jiaj yia Bua uaq laanb myenb . ib zang ninb Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid . zwavj myenb Kuvj mivb lxd ninb Navq a'q . ”
43003027	yo-han tau , “ maiq zeid Tinb huvb pun nx , maiq maaib haiq taub haib tu'q haiq Euvg .
43003028	meib Bua kanb haib Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj , hiuq tu'q yia kxvq Jiaj , ‘ yia maiq zeid zruj ki-tug uaq taub . mq paag ki-tug maiq kcvb taaib , Tinb huvb Paaiq yia taaib Daavg . ’
43003029	lovg syavb Bwavd uaq taub mtaaib syavb laavb . Kc'g lxvb zuaq Jyenq mwavj syavb laavb Eei Qiaj . yetq haid syavb laavb kxvq waag ninb zyrug Fyenb yrub haig . weig naaiq yia ib zang tu'q naaiq Euvg xnb lx'g Tauj taaub a'q .
43003030	“ ninb xij zu'g zruj Lo Jyenq faauj , yia xij zu'g zruj faij Jyenq Fiag .
43003031	“ yem Tinb txvb taaib uaq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj yetg zuvq . yem paamb ken taaib uaq taub kwei paamb ken , yaag kxvq paamb ken Eei Jauq Navq . mq paag yem Tinb txvb taaib uaq taub zruj kaub Lo Jiaj yetg zuvq .
43003032	ninb zruj zxvb zevj kxvq ninb pwatg Jiaj , haid Jiaj Eei sig mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub zipq ninb Eei waag .
43003033	haiq taub zipq ninb Eei waag se Navq Gaapq Jyenq yenj nx , pun Ziv Tinb huvb se zyen Eei .
43003034	Tinb huvb Paaiq taaib uaq taub kxvq Tinb huvb Eei waag , weig zu'g Tinb huvb Zeij sivj livb pun ninb , yaag maiq maaib sruj mrug .
43003035	zavg tiaj Namq ninb Eei txn , zx'q maang mwrtg Jiu pun yem ninb Eei puab Diaq .
43003036	haiq taub syenj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei txn , uaq taub maaib yetg liud Eei mcvg . mq paag haiq taub maiq mwavj Tinb huvb Eei txn Eei waag nx , maiq haib tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg yaag zu'g Tinb huvb tivg Jyenq ninb Eei zwid . ”
43004001	faa-li-sij myenb haid kxvq ye-su tu'q saib kxj kaub Zamq yaag Tevj saib kxj Jiaj uam Eei leid kaub Zamq yo-han .
43004002	mq paag zyen sig se maiq zeid ye-su Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid . Kuvj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Tevj Navq .
43004003	ye-su hiuq tu'q myenb Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ninb zyrug Zwrtq yu-Dia scvq cvj Rwrnj kaa-li-li .
43004004	ninb haid Navq haaij xij zu'g yavb saa-maa-lia scvq Rwrnj .
43004005	kan saa-maa-lia scvq mivb kau , Tauj nxm muvq heug si-Kaa , leib yaa-Kopq pun ninb Eei txn , yo-sepq , uaq Rov Dau maiq ko .
43004006	yaa-Kopq Eei uamb Kwrtq yaag yem uaq nxm txvj . ye-su yavb kau Jauq , Kruq haig , zyrug zweid Fiag uamb Kwrtq Len . uaq zang luvb aaq lamb teij aanj a'q .
43004007	maaib taub saa-maa-lia Janb mwavd mivb uaq uamb Kwrtq zaavb uam . ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ txg aag , Toq meib pun teij uam yia hopq og . ”
43004008	( txij Jyenq uaq nxm zyavb hog saib kxj Bua pia'g muvq maaid ka'naaiq Eang . )
43004009	uaq taub saa-maa-lia mwavd kxvq , “ meib yiu-Tai myenb fuvg Toq yia saa-maa-lia msia'q txn pun uam meib hopq ? ” ( weig zu'g yiu-Tai myenb maiq Zauj saa-maa-lia Janj Jiu Tov . )
43004010	ye-su tau , “ sij kxvq meib hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb pun Eei zivb Eeig , yaag hiuq tu'q Tevj meib Toq uam hopq se tovb haiq taub , meib zyrug Toq ninb , ninb yaag xij pun yuvd mcvg Eei uam meib hopq . ”
43004011	uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! meib lyemb maiq maaib haiq Euvg Zia uam . uamb Kwrtq yaag Do Eei . yuvd mcvg Eei uam meib mivb haaij lxd taaib ?
43004012	yia Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q , yaa-Kopq , zx'q naaiq nxm uamb Kwrtq lyrub yia Bua lovg . ninb kanb Zauj ninb Eei txnb Jweiq , scvb Kuq yetg zuvq yaag hopq naaiq nxm uamb Kwrtq Eei uam . meib zruj kaub Lo Jiaj yaa-Kopq fai ? ”
43004013	ye-su tau , “ haiq taub hopq naaiq nxm uamb Kwrtq Eei uam , Ga'haaq Jaav cvj haib Gaatq Eei .
43004014	mq paag haiq taub hopq yia pun Eei uam , Jaav yetg liud maiq haib Gaatq . yia xij pun uaq Euvg uam yem ninb Eei Hruq Navq yetg zivq uam pctq Zwrtq taaib nx , pun ninb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg . ”
43004015	uaq taub msia'q txn cvj kxvq , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! Toq pun teij naaig Euvg uam yia hopq maa'b ! yia zyrug yetg liud Jaav maiq Gaatq yaag maiq zu'g taaib naaiq zaavb uam . ”
43004016	ye-su Buaj ninb , “ Rwrnj mivb heug meib Eei Goj Zauj Jyenq taaib naaiq maa'b ! ”
43004017	uaq taub Janb mwavd tau , “ yia maiq maaib Goj . ” ye-su kxvq , “ meib kxvq maiq maaib Goj kevb zeid Eei .
43004018	meib lovg Jiaj pyaa Txvj Goj mig a'q . ib zang lovg Jyenq naaiq taub yaag maiq zeid meib Eei Goj . meib Eei waag kevb zyen Eei . ”
43004019	Janb mwavd kxvq , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! yia pwatg meib zruj taub trug waag myenb .
43004020	yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem naaiq nxm Bov zavg Tinb huvb , mq paag meib Bua yiu-Tai myenb kxvq hxpg zu'g yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zavg Tinb huvb . ”
43004021	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ txg aa'b ! syenj yia Eei waag maa'b ! zyavb hog xij Tauj , meib Bua maiq yem naaiq nxm Bov yaag maiq yem ye-lu-saa-lem paaij zavg tiaj .
43004022	meib Bua saa-maa-lia myenb maiq hiuq tu'q meib Bua zavg haiq taub . mq paag yia Bua yiu-Tai myenb zavg haiq taub yia Bua hiuq Eei , weig zu'g Fruj en yem yiu-Tai myenb taaib .
43004023	uaq nxm zyavb hog xij Tauj , zuvq Tauj taaib a'q . zyenb zyen pua'g zavg zavg tiaj uaq teij , xij lovg sivj livb yaag lovg zyen leid zavg , weig zu'g zavg tiaj lxd naaiq Euvg myenb zavg ninb .
43004024	Tinb huvb se sivj livb . zavg Tinb huvb Eei myenb xij zu'g lovg sivj livb Zauj zyen leid zavg . ”
43004025	uaq taub Janb mwavd kxvq Buaj ninb , “ yia hiuq tu'q me-si-yaa , tovb Buaj heug ki-tug uaq taub , xij taaib . Tauj taaib uaq zang ninb zuvq xij Buaj Revg Euvb Euvg yia Bua . ”
43004026	ye-su kxvq , “ tovb ib zang Zauj meib kxvq Jyenq waag naaiq taub se tovb uaq taub a'q . ”
43004027	uaq zang saib kxj Bua Rwrnj taaib pwatg ye-su Zauj uaq taub Janb mwavd kxvq waag zyrug Namq maiq mevb pc'g . mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub naaig uaq taub msia'q txn , “ meib taaib lxd haiq Euvg ? ” fai naaig ye-su , “ zruj haiq Euvg Zauj ninb kxvq waag ? ”
43004028	uaq taub Janb mwavd zyrug kwavg Jyenq ninb Eei niab ha'lrub uaq , Rwrnj muvq mivb Buaj yem muvq Eei myenb ,
43004029	“ meib Bua taaib mavg kaaj , maaib taub myenb ninb kxvq Revg yia zruj Jiaj Eei Euvb Euvg sig . naaiq taub maiq zeid ki-tug fai ? ”
43004030	zwavj myenb zyrug Zwrtq muvq mivb mavg ye-su .
43004031	Janb mwavd Rwrnj mivb uaq zang , saib kxj Bua heug ye-su , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! Eang Naavj a'q . ”
43004032	mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Eang hopq yia maaib Eei . tovb yia maaib Eei uaq Euvg Eang hopq meib Bua maiq hiuq . ”
43004033	saib kxj Bua laanb naaig laanb , “ maaib myenb txb Naavj taaib pun ninb Eang fai ni ? ”
43004034	ye-su tau , “ yia Eei Eang hopq se yia ei Jyenq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei za'eij zruj , yaag zruj zyavj ninb Eei kov .
43004035	meib Bua maaib Jruj waag kxvq , ‘ cvj maaib pyei Laaj Eia'g syru kcvb zwavj Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q . ’ yia Buaj meib Bua lovb lovj Eei mavg uaq Deig . Zunb kcv zua'g , syru tu'q a'q .
43004036	ib zang syru kcvb zwavj Eei myenb tu'q ninb Bua Eei kovb zinb yaag syru kcvb zwavj weig pun tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg . zwavj Eei myenb Zauj syru Eei myenb zyrug lomb Rxib a'Neiq .
43004037	weig zu'g myenb kxvq , ‘ maaib taub zwavj , maaib taub syru , ’ uaq Jruj waag za'kevb zyen .
43004038	yia Paaiq meib Bua mivb syru tovb meib Bua maiq Dxtq Qa'q zwavj Eei . kanb taub Dxtq Qa'q zwavj mq paag meib Bua pc'g pc'g tu'q ninb Eei Qa'q . ”
43004039	uaq nxm muvq Eei saa-maa-lia myenb Zamq Eei syenj ye-su weig zu'g uaq taub saa-maa-lia Janb mwavd zruj zxvb zevj kxvq , “ ninb kxvq Zwrtq Revg yia zruj Jiaj Eei Euvb Euvg sig . ”
43004040	Navq naaig , saa-maa-lia myenb taaib lxd ye-su uaq zang , ninb Bua Toq ye-su Zauj ninb Bua yem uaq . ye-su zyrug Zauj ninb Bua yem i Nxi .
43004041	weig ye-su kxvq Eei waag cvj maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj ninb .
43004042	naaiq teij myenb kxvq Buaj uaq taub msia'q txn , “ ib zang yia Bua maiq zeid weig meib kxvq Eei waag syenj . yia Bua kanb haid ninb kxvq yaag hiuq tu'q naaiq laanb myenb za'kevb zruj paamb myenb Eei Fruj zyruq . ”
43004043	Jiaj liud uaq teij i Nxi , ye-su Zwrtq Jauq mivb kaa-li-li scvq .
43004044	ye-su kanb kxvq Jiaj , “ trug waag myenb yem kanb Eei teib puv , kanb Eei myenb maiq Taaib ninb . ”
43004045	Tauj kaa-li-li scvq , kaa-li-li myenb zipq ninb , weig zu'g ninb Bua yaag mivb ye-lu-saa-lem Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq zyrug tu'q pwatg ye-su zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig .
43004046	ye-su cvj Rwrnj kaa-li-li scvq , Kaa-naa laavd , tovb zinb Daavg ninb lovg uam zruj penj a'vung tiuq uaq nxm laavd . maaib taub huvb Eei tomb Jyen , ninb Eei txn yem Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq putq pcvg mig a'q .
43004047	tomb Jyen haid kxvq ye-su yem yu-Dia scvq taaib Tauj kaa-li-li , ninb zyrug mivb lxd , Toq ye-su mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um zxg ninb Eei txn . ninb Eei txn putq pcvg xij taig haig a'q .
43004048	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ sij kxvq meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia zruj Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig , meib Bua zuvq maiq syenj yia . ”
43004049	tomb Jyen kxvq , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! Toq meib kan yia mivb maa'b ! Raub heij yia Eei txn haib taig . ”
43004050	ye-su kxvq , “ meib kunq Rwrnj a'q . meib Eei txn lovj a'q . ” uaq taub Jyen syenj ye-su Eei waag zyrug Rwrnj mig a'q .
43004051	Rwrnj kau , pwatg ninb Eei pru Bua taaib Buaj ninb , “ ib zang meib Eei txn lovj mig a'q . ”
43004052	ninb naaig ninb Eei pru , “ yia Eei txn zyavb haaij lovj ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ a'Nxi Ga'haaq aanj yetg nxm zyavb hog sin laavb mig a'q . ”
43004053	uaq taub txn Eei tia zyrug Javj zu'g za'kevb txij ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib Eei txn lovj a'q , ” uaq nxm zyavb hog . ninb Zauj ninb Eei yetg pyauq myenb zyrug syenj ye-su Revg .
43004054	naaiq se ye-su yem yu-Dia scvq mivb kaa-li-li scvq zruj ta'Eeig Rung Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog .
43005001	Ga'haaq ye-su mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiaj yiu-Tai myenb Eei yetg nxm zipq .
43005002	yem ye-lu-saa-lem maaib taub kcvb heug pa'ki yuvb kcvb . kcvb ka'Len maaib nxm uamb tomb , hipq-lu waag heug Betg-saa-Taa . uamb tomb Len yaag maaib pyaa nxm pivj laavb Eei liub .
43005003	putg pcvg myenb Zamq Eei pweij uaq . mziv mcvb , mziv Buaq yaag maaib , zauj waaig Eei yaag maaib , putq pcvb Bai maiq haib tovd Eei yaag maaib . ninb Bua zuaq uam tovd ,
43005004	weig zu'g maaib teij zyavb hog maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb Fiag taaib mua'q uam tovd . uam tovd liud , haiq taub Fiag mivb zyemj Daavg , maiq kunq putq haiq Euvg pcvg , pcvg zyrug lovj Revg a'q .
43005005	yem uaq maaib taub myenb putq faab zyepg petq Havj pcvg .
43005006	ye-su pwatg ninb pweij uaq yaag hiuq tu'q ninb putq pcvg laub haig , zyrug naaig kaaj ninb , “ meib xij pcvg lovj Eei fai ? ”
43005007	uaq taub pcvg myenb tau , “ tomb kxj aag , uam tovd Eei zyavb hog maiq maaib haiq taub txb yia Fiag uam . yia kanb mivb maiq kcvb Tauj , myenb pia'g Daavg mig a'q . ”
43005008	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ Jiad sin taaib , txb Jyenq meib Eei Jiug yavb Jauq mivb a'q . ”
43005009	uaq taub myenb lyemb zeib lovj taaib zyrug txb Jyenq ninb Eei Jiug yavb Jauq mivb mig a'q . uaq Nxi se txij zu'g tivb kov Nxi .
43005010	yiu-Tai myenb zyrug kxvq Buaj pcvg lovj uaq taub , “ tivb kov Nxi meib txb Jyenq Jiug mivb haiq Dau se txvg Bua Eei leid . ”
43005011	ninb tau , “ zxg yia lovj uaq taub myenb heug yia txb Jyenq Jiug yavb Jauq mivb a'q . ”
43005012	uaq teij myenb cvj naaig ninb , “ heug meib txb Jyenq Jiug mivb uaq taub se haiq taub ? ”
43005013	mq paag pcvg lovj uaq taub myenb maiq hiuq tu'q zxg ninb lovj uaq taub tovb haiq taub , weig zu'g myenb Zamq haig , ye-su yaag leib Gxi mivb mig a'q .
43005014	Ga'haaq ye-su cvj pwatg ninb zxg lovj uaq taub myenb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ mavg kaaj , meib Eei pcvg zxg lovj Revg . yavb naaiq Jiaj maiq tuvq paamd zwid a'q og . Riaj meib cvj haib pwavb kaub Kruq Jiaj Eei naang zivb . ”
43005015	uaq taub myenb Rwrnj mivb kxvq Buaj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb , “ zxg yia lovj uaq taub se tovb ye-su . ”
43005016	weig zu'g ye-su lovg tivb kov Nxi zruj naaiq teij sig , yiu-Tai myenb Zivj taaib zruj to'g ninb .
43005017	mq paag ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia Eei tia zanb zang zruj kov Tauj ib zang . yia yaag zruj kov a'q . ”
43005018	ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq , zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb kaub fatq xij taij ninb , weig zu'g ninb maiq taan txvg tivb kov Nxi Eei leid Navq . ninb yaag kxvq Tinb huvb zruj ninb Eei tia , zyrug Taaib ninb kanb Zauj Tinb huvb fib Dovg Lo .
43005019	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , zavg tiaj Eei txn maiq haib sweib kanb Eei Hruq zruj haiq Euvg . txn pwatg tia zruj haiq Euvg , ninb zyrug Kuvj zruj uaq Euvg Navq . tia zruj haiq Euvg , ninb Eei txn zyrug zruj uaq Euvg .
43005020	zavg tiaj Namq ninb Eei txn , zyrug zx'q kanb zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig pun ninb Eei txn mavg . ninb zuvq xij zruj kaub Lo naaiq teij sig pun ninb Eei txn mavg , meib Bua zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig .
43005021	zavg tiaj Navq haiq nx pun taig mivb Eei myenb navb taaib zyavb Jyenq , ninb Eei txn yaag Navq uaq nx pun tovb ninb xij pun uaq teij tu'q zyavb Jyenq .
43005022	zavg tiaj kanb maiq syemq haiq taub Eei zwid . ninb zx'q livg Jiu pun ninb Eei txn syemq yetg zuvq zwid ,
43005023	weig pun myenb Taaib ninb Eei txn Navq ninb Bua Taaib zavg tiaj nx . haiq taub maiq Taaib ninb Eei txn , uaq taub maiq Taaib zavg tiaj , tovb Paaiq ninb Eei txn taaib uaq taub .
43005024	“ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub mwavj yia Eei waag yaag syenj Kauj Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub , zyrug tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg , yaag maiq zu'g tivg zwid . ninb pyauj Dutq taig Eei Jauq tu'q zyavb mcvg .
43005025	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , zyavb hog xij Tauj , zuvq Tauj a'q , taig mivb Eei myenb haid Tinb huvb Eei txn Eei Qiaj , zyrug navb taaib zyavb Jyenq .
43005026	zavg tiaj Navq haiq nx zruj zyavb mcvg Eei kxnb Ewrnb , ninb yaag Jiu pun ninb Eei txn Navq uaq nx zruj zyavb mcvg Eei kxnb Ewrnb .
43005027	zavg tiaj yaag pun ninb Eei txn maaib livg syemq zwid weig zu'g ninb Eei txn zruj paamb myenb Eei txn .
43005028	“ meib Bua maiq tuvq weig naaiq teij sig Namq maiq mevb pc'g . zyavb hog xij Tauj , yem zruq Eei yetg zuvq tu'q haid ninb Eei Qiaj
43005029	zyrug yem zruq Zwrtq taaib . zruj lovj uaq teij tu'q navb taaib zyavb Jyenq . zruj waaig uaq teij navb taaib zu'g tivg zwid .
43005030	“ yia maiq haib ei yia kanb Eei Hruq zruj haiq Euvg . Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx Buaj yia , yia zyrug Navq uaq nx syemq . yia yaag pcvb fim Eei syemq , weig zu'g yia maiq zeid xij ei yia kanb Eei eij zruj . Kuvj xij ei Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei eij Navq .
43005031	sij kxvq yia weig yia kanb zruj zxvb zevj , myenb zyrug funj maiq zyen .
43005032	mq paag cvj maaib taub Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj . yia hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zxvb zevj waag za'kevb zyen Eei .
43005033	“ meib Bua Paaiq myenb mivb yo-han uaq , ninb yaag weig zyen leid zruj zxvb zevj .
43005034	yia maiq zeid Qyemj zu'g myenb Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj . yia Kuvj Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig pun meib Bua tu'q Fruj Navq .
43005035	yo-han peiq nxm tav , tyemq zia'g Fav Eei . meib Bua yaag Fyenb yrub a'Neiq yem Zaamj ninb Eei Fav .
43005036	“ yia yaag maaib Euvg zruj zxvb zevj kaub Lo Jiaj yo-han zruj Eei . se tovb zavg tiaj Paaiq yia zruj zyavj Eei Euvb Euvg kov . se ib zang yia zruj Jyenq naaiq teij kov pun Ziv zavg tiaj kanb Paaiq yia taaib .
43005037	zavg tiaj Paaiq yia taaib , ninb kanb yaag Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj . mq paag meib Bua maiq haid Jiaj ninb Eei Qiaj yaag maiq pwatg Jiaj ninb Eei favj zeiq .
43005038	meib Bua Eei Hruq maiq zaavb ninb Eei waag , weig zu'g meib Bua maiq syenj ninb Paaiq taaib uaq taub .
43005039	meib Bua Qa'q zaab kivb sru , laaig kivb sru haib Tevj meib Bua tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg . naaiq kivb sru Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj
43005040	mq paag meib Bua maiq Kavq taaib lxd yia tu'q zyavb mcvg .
43005041	“ yia maiq zeid lxd myenb Zev yia .
43005042	yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua , yaag hiuq tu'q yem meib Bua Eei Hruq meib Bua maiq Namq Tinb huvb .
43005043	yia Daam yia Eei tia Eei mevb taaib mq paag meib Bua maiq zipq yia . sij kxvq maaib taub Daam Jyenq ninb kanb Eei mevb taaib , meib Bua xij zipq ninb Eei .
43005044	meib Bua a'Neiq tu'q myenb Zev , mq paag meib Bua maiq lxd Du'g taub uaq taub Tinb huvb Zev meib Bua . uaq Euvg meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib syenj yia ?
43005045	“ meib Bua maiq tuvq Namq yia xij yem zavg tiaj Eei Ra'Myen koj meib Bua . xij koj meib Bua uaq taub se mo-se , tovb meib Bua maaib lamb Namq uaq taub .
43005046	sij kxvq meib Bua za'kevb syenj mo-se , meib Bua zyrug syenj yia , weig zu'g ninb fiaq Eei kxvq Tauj yia .
43005047	mq paag meib Bua maiq syenj mo-se fiaq Eei nx , meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib syenj yia Eei waag ? ”
43006001	Ga'haaq ye-su Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g kaa-li-li Kxib txn ( cvj maaib kanb nxm Buaj heug Ti-Be-lyetq ) .
43006002	myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq ninb mivb weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg ninb zruj Jiaj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig zxg lovj putg pcvg myenb .
43006003	ye-su zyrug faauj Bovb aiq mivb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua zweid Jyenq uaq .
43006004	uaq zang aaq lamb teij Tauj yiu-Tai myenb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq a'q .
43006005	ye-su Zau Myen mavg , pwatg myenb Zamq Eei taaib ninb uaq zyrug naaig kaaj fi-lipq , “ Bua xij zu'g mivb haaij maaid ka'naaiq kauj pun naaiq teij zwavj myenb Eang ? ”
43006006	ye-su Kuvj Navq naaiq nx naaig weig seij fi-lipq . ninb kanb xij Navq haiq nx zruj ninb zuvq hiuq mig a'q .
43006007	fi-lipq tau , “ lovg Eig pc'q Nxi Eei kovb zinb maaid Eang Eei ka'naaiq zuvq maiq kauj yetg taub tu'q ti'q tyen . ”
43006008	maaib taub ye-su Eei saib kxj , tovb si-mon pi-te Eei yrud , an-Daa-lu , kxvq ,
43006009	“ yem naaiq maaib taub txn maaib pyaa nxm lovg Byaub Baa-li zruj taaib Eei Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud . mq paag myenb Dovg naaig Zamq Navq haiq nx haib pun tu'q Gxi ? ”
43006010	ye-su kxvq , “ Buaj zwavj myenb zweid Fiag maa'b ! ” uaq teij txvj miaq Zamq Eei . zwavj myenb zyrug zweid Fiag . taan mJavg txn maaib leib maiq ko pyaa Zin taub .
43006011	ye-su zyrug zx'q uaq teij Fuaq taaib tauj kauj , lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb , zyrug pun Gxi zweid Jyenq uaq teij zwavj myenb Eang . Byaud yaag fib Navq Eei pun Gxi , ziuj kx'g myenb xij Zamq fai zo'g .
43006012	zwavj myenb zyrug Eang peuq Revg . ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua , “ mivb syru Eang zevg uaq teij taaib , maiq tuvq kwavg yetg aaj . ”
43006013	tovb uaq teij pyaa nxm Fuaq zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg , mq paag saib kxj Bua cvj syru zevg uaq teij tapq pwavq zyepg Eeig nxm Daan .
43006014	zwavj myenb pwatg ye-su zruj naaiq Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei sig , ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq se xij taaib Tauj paamb ken uaq taub trug waag myenb a'q . ”
43006015	ye-su hiuq tu'q myenb xij taaib zx'q ninb , aapq ninb zruj huvb , ninb kanb zyrug simq Gxi cvj faauj uaq Jiaj Bov mig a'q .
43006016	luvb maanb Mwavj teij , ye-su Eei saib kxj Bua Fiag Tauj Kxib Len ,
43006017	pia'g Ravq huvj Jyenq mivb uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq , Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq . uaq zang , zuvq Mwavj a'q . ye-su yaag maiq kcvb Tauj ninb Bua uaq .
43006018	uaq zang pxvd kxv tomb Ryaauj pwrng Kxiq Jiad laavg .
43006019	saib kxj Bua Rcv Ravq mivb pyaa Ju'q ki-lo Eei txvj , pwatg ye-su yavb uamb ming taaib nitq fatq ninb Bua Eei Ravq , hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig .
43006020	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . se tovb yia a'q . ”
43006021	saib kxj Bua zyrug a'Neiq zipq ninb pia'g Ravq . Ravq lyemb zeib Tauj ninb Bua xij mivb uaq nxm txvj mig a'q .
43006022	ta'Eeig Nxi Zxg yem uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq uaq teij zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q yem uaq Kuvj maaib Du'g Pruj Ravq Navq . ye-su yaag maiq zeid Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj pia'g uaq Pruj Ravq , Kuvj saib kxj Bua kanb mivb Navq .
43006023	maaib teij Ravq yem Ti-Be-lyetq muvq taaib tivb Jyenq uaq Kxib Len , nitq zyruq zx'q Fuaq lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb zyrug pun zwavj myenb Eang uaq nxm txvj .
43006024	zwavj myenb pwatg ye-su Zauj saib kxj Bua maiq yem naaig , ninb Bua zyrug pia'g uaq teij Ravq mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq lxd ye-su .
43006025	zwavj myenb lxd pwatg ye-su yem uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq ninb Bua naaig , “ finb scv aa'b ! zyavb haaij taaib Tauj naaiq ? ”
43006026	ye-su tau , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua lxd yia maiq zeid laaij pwatg yia zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog , se weig zu'g meib Bua tu'q Fuaq Eang peuq .
43006027	meib Bua maiq tuvq Zwrtq Qa'q lxd haib waaig Eei Eang hopq . xij zu'g lxd pun myenb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg uaq Euvg Eang hopq . yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , xij pun naaiq Euvg Eang hopq meib Bua , weig zu'g yia Eei tia , Tinb huvb , Jiu hatg maad pun yia , Navq Bx'q Jyenq yenj nx , pun Ziv yia hxpg Revg ninb Eei Hruq . ”
43006028	ninb Bua zyrug naaig ye-su , “ yia Bua xij zu'g zruj haiq Euvg Zivj funj Tinb huvb Eei kov ? ”
43006029	ye-su tau , “ Tinb huvb xij meib Bua zruj Eei kov se xij zu'g syenj ninb Paaiq taaib uaq taub . ”
43006030	ninb Bua zyrug Buaj ye-su , “ uaq Euvg meib xij zruj haiq Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog pun yia Bua pwatg zyrug haib syenj meib ? meib xij Navq haiq nx zruj ?
43006031	yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem teib puvb Waav tu'q Eang maa-naa Navq kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ ninb pun yem luvb taaib Eei Eang hopq ninb Bua Eang . ’ ”
43006032	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , se maiq zeid mo-se pun yem luvb taaib uaq Euvg zyen Eang hopq . se yia Eei tia zx'q yem luvb Eei zyen Eang hopq Jiu pun meib Bua .
43006033	weig zu'g Tinb huvb Eei Eang hopq se tovb yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib pun paamb myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq uaq taub . ”
43006034	ninb Bua kxvq , “ finb scv aa'b ! Toq zanb zang pun naaiq Euvg Eang hopq yia Bua maa'b ! ”
43006035	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kanb se yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq . haiq taub taaib lxd yia , uaq taub yetg liud maiq vxg . haiq taub syenj yia , uaq taub yetg liud maiq Gaatq .
43006036	mq paag Navq yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua nx , meib Bua pwatg Jiaj yia yaag maiq syenj .
43006037	ta'faanb yia Eei tia Zeij pun yia Eei myenb yetg zuvq xij taaib lxd yia . haiq taub taaib lxd yia , yia yetg liud maiq kwavg .
43006038	weig zu'g yia yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib mq paag maiq zeid sweib yia kanb Eei eij zruj . yia taaib zruj ei Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei eij Navq .
43006039	Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei eij se Navq naaiq . tovb ninb Zeij pun yia uaq teij myenb , ninb maiq xij yia pun laaib zitg yetg taub . Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi , xij yia pun ninb Bua yetg zuvq navb taaib .
43006040	weig zu'g yia Eei tia Eei eij se Navq naaiq . haiq taub pwatg ninb Eei txn , yaag syenj Kauj ninb Eei txn , uaq taub zyrug tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg . Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia yaag xij pun ninb navb taaib . ”
43006041	yiu-Tai myenb zyrug vopq ye-su weig zu'g ninb kxvq , “ yia se yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq . ”
43006042	ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq taub se yo-sepq Eei txn , ye-su , maiq zeid ? ninb Eei tiaj maag Bua hiuq tu'q Eei . ninb Navq haiq nx haib kxvq ninb yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib ? ”
43006043	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ meib Bua maiq tuvq vib vuvj vopq Eei maa'b !
43006044	maiq maaib haiq taub haib taaib lxd yia Zwrtq liud zavg tiaj , tovb Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub , yua'g ninb taaib . haiq taub taaib lxd yia , Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia zyrug pun ninb navb taaib .
43006045	trug waag myenb Eei sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ Tinb huvb kanb xij Faauj ninb Bua yetg zuvq . ’ haiq taub haid zavg tiaj Eei waag yaag ho'g hiuq Eei , ninb Bua yetg zuvq xij taaib lxd yia .
43006046	naaiq maiq zeid kxvq maaib haiq taub tu'q pwatg Jiaj zavg tiaj . Kuvj yem Tinb huvb taaib uaq taub tu'q pwatg Jiaj zavg tiaj Navq .
43006047	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub syenj yia , uaq taub maaib yetg liud Eei mcvg .
43006048	yia zruj yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq .
43006049	meib Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q yem teib puvb Waav Eang maa-naa mq paag ninb Bua taig mig a'q .
43006050	haiq taub Eang yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq maiq zu'g taig .
43006051	yia zruj zyavb Jyenq Eei Eang hopq yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib . haiq taub Eang naaiq Euvg Eang hopq , uaq taub tu'q yetg liud zyavb Jyenq . yia pun Eei Eang hopq se tovb yia kanb Eei xq weig pun paamb myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq . ”
43006052	yiu-Tai myenb haid naaiq teij waag zyrug Rcv Jiad Jaaj taaib kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb Navq haiq nx haib pun ninb Eei xq Bua Eang ? ”
43006053	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , sij kxvq meib Bua maiq Eang paamb myenb Eei txn Eei xq , yaag maiq hopq ninb Eei Ryaamq , yem meib Bua ka'Euad maiq maaib zyavb mcvg a'q .
43006054	haiq taub Eang yia Eei xq , hopq yia Eei Ryaamq , uaq taub maaib yetg liud Eei mcvg . Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia yaag xij pun ninb navb taaib .
43006055	weig zu'g yia Eei xq Zauj yia Eei Ryaamq se zyen Eang hopq .
43006056	haiq taub Eang yia Eei xq yaag hopq yia Eei Ryaamq , uaq taub Zauj yia Jwavg mcvg zyavb . yia yaag Zauj uaq taub Jwavg mcvg zyavb .
43006057	zyavb Jyenq Eei zavg tiaj Paaiq yia taaib , yia yaag weig ninb tu'q zyavb Jyenq . Navq naaig , haiq taub Eang yia Eei xq , uaq taub yaag weig yia tu'q zyavb Jyenq .
43006058	naaiq se yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq . se maiq Navq Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eang Eei maa-naa . Eang liud Zxg haib taig Eei . mq paag haiq taub Eang yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq zyrug tu'q yetg liud zyavb Jyenq . ”
43006059	ye-su kxvq naaiq teij waag uaq zang ninb yem Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq Eei wig txvb Faauj myenb .
43006060	ye-su Eei saib kxj Zamq Eei haid liud naaiq teij waag zyrug kxvq , “ naaiq teij Faauj Eei waag za'kevb a'g tu'q haig . haiq taub haib mwavj tu'q lcb ? ”
43006061	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Eei saib kxj Navq naaiq nx vopq naaiq teij waag zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ laaij yia kxvq naaiq teij waag meib Bua haid xij Twij prug fai ?
43006062	uaq Euvg sij kxvq meib Bua pwatg yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , faauj Tauj zinb Daavg yem Eei txvj , meib Bua Navq haiq nx ?
43006063	se sivj livb pun myenb maaib zyavb mcvg . paamb myenb maiq haib pun myenb maaib zyavb mcvg . yia kxvq Eei waag haib pun meib Bua tu'q sivj livb . sivj livb yaag pun meib Bua tu'q zyavb mcvg .
43006064	mq paag meib Bua maaib teij maiq syenj . ” weig zu'g ye-su yem kxn mtaaib hiuq tu'q uaq teij myenb haiq taub maiq syenj ninb , haiq taub xij maaig ninb .
43006065	ninb zyrug kxvq , “ weig naaiq yia kxvq Jiaj Buaj meib Bua Eei , Zwrtq liud zavg tiaj pun taaib uaq teij , maiq maaib haiq taub haib taaib lxd yia . ”
43006066	yem naaig taaib ye-su Eei saib kxj Zamq Eei Twij prug , maiq kan ye-su a'q .
43006067	ye-su zyrug naaig kaaj uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj , “ meib Bua yaag xij kwavg yia fai ? ”
43006068	si-mon pi-te tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia Bua xij zu'g mivb kan haiq taub ? se tovb meib kanb Eei waag haib pun myenb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
43006069	yia Bua syenj yaag hiuq tu'q meib zruj Tinb huvb Eei Zivb Revg myenb . ”
43006070	ye-su tau , “ yia kinq meib Bua zyepg Eeig taub maiq zeid ? mq paag meib Bua maaib taub zruj Yiab kwaiq myenq . ”
43006071	ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq se kxvq zu'g si-mon i-saa-Kaa-li-otg Eei txn , yu-Daatg . maiq kunq ninb zruj uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub , Ga'haaq ninb maaig ye-su .
43007001	Ga'haaq ye-su yrub Jyenq kaa-li-li scvq mivb . ninb tivg Hruq maiq mivb yu-Dia scvq weig zu'g ninb hiuq tu'q yem uaq zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb xij lxd Qavj taij ninb .
43007002	uaq zang aaq lamb Tauj Byxq liub Eei zipq a'q .
43007003	ye-su Eei yrud Bua zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ kxj aa'b ! meib Zwrtq naaiq nxm txvj mivb yu-Dia scvq maa'b ! xij zu'g pun meib Eei saib kxj Bua pwatg meib zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig .
43007004	haiq taub xij tu'q mevb taub , ninb maiq pivj ninb zruj Eei sig . meib zruj Jyenq naaiq teij sig , xij zu'g mivb pun luvb Diaq myenb mavg meib maa'b ! ”
43007005	lyemb ye-su kanb Eei yrud Bua yaag maiq syenj ninb .
43007006	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj , mq paag meib Bua haiq nxm zyavb hog yaag mivb tu'q Eei .
43007007	paamb myenb maiq maaib txvj Rxv meib Bua mq paag ninb Bua Rxv yia , weig zu'g yia zruj zxvb zevj kxvq ninb Bua zruj Eei waaig sig .
43007008	meib Bua kunq mivb Jiaj zipq a'q . yia maiq kcvb mivb weig zu'g yia hxpg zu'g mivb Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj . ”
43007009	ye-su Zauj ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud , ninb Zxg yem kaa-li-li scvq .
43007010	ye-su Eei yrud Bua mivb Jiaj zipq mig a'q . ye-su Ga'haaq mivb mq paag ninb maiq txv zwavj mivb , Kuvj pivj Jyenq mivb Navq .
43007011	yem uaq zipq Eei yinb ka'Euad , zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb lxd ye-su yaag naaig myenb , “ uaq laanb myenb yem haaij ? ”
43007012	yem uaq Jiaj zipq Eei zwavj myenb sib suvj sapq Eei kxvq ye-su . maaib teij kxvq , “ ninb kevb zruj Kuq myenb . ” maaib teij kxvq , “ maiq zeid ! ninb Kuvj Duaq myenb Navq . ”
43007013	mq paag haiq taub yaag maiq kaamq txv zwavj kxvq Tauj ye-su , weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb .
43007014	Jiaj zipq Tauj Daamb tivb , ye-su mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb .
43007015	zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Bua'g hxvb haig yaag kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb maiq tu'q to'g sru Lav . ninb fuvg haib Dovg naaig hiuq ? ”
43007016	ye-su zyrug tau ninb Bua , “ yia Faauj Eei waag se maiq zeid yia kanb Namq Zwrtq taaib Faauj . se tovb Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei waag .

43007018	haiq taub ei ninb kanb Eei za'eij Namq Zwrtq taaib Faauj , uaq taub Kuvj xij myenb Taaib ninb Navq . mq paag haiq taub xij myenb Taaib Paaiq ninb taaib uaq taub , ninb Kuvj kxvq zyen waag Navq . maiq haib kxvb pc'g .
43007019	mo-se pun leib latg meib Bua maiq zeid ? mq paag meib Bua yaag maiq maaib yetg taub kan leib latg . meib Bua weig haiq tiug lxd Qavj taij yia ? ”
43007020	zwavj myenb kxvq , “ myenq mua'q meib maiq Rav Bx lxb ! maaib haiq taub xij taij meib lcb ? ”
43007021	ye-su kxvq , “ yia zruj Rung sig meib Bua yaag Bua'g hxvb haig .
43007022	mo-se heug meib Bua Tevj myenb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid . ( mq paag naaiq Euvg leid maiq zeid yem mo-se taaib , se yem meib Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q taaib . ) tivb kov Nxi meib Bua yaag Tevj myenb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid .
43007023	sij kxvq meib Bua txij tivb kov Nxi Tevj myenb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid weig maiq xij txvg mo-se Eei leid , uaq Euvg yia lovg tivb kov Nxi zxg taub myenb lovj Revg , meib Bua weig haiq tiug Qiaj Jiad yia ?
43007024	maiq tuvq mavg peib zavg syemq , xij zu'g pcvb fim Eei syemq . ”
43007025	weig naaiq maaib teij ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei myenb kxvq , “ ninb Bua xij taij uaq taub myenb tovb naaiq taub saa'b ?
43007026	mavg kaaj , ninb txv zwavj myenb kxvq waag mq paag ninb Bua maiq kxvq yetg Euvg pun ninb . zruj Lo Eei myenb za'kevb hiuq tivg ninb zruj ki-tug mq pei ?

43007028	ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj myenb uaq zang ninb lovg Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ meib Bua za'kevb hiuq tu'q yia yaag hiuq yia yem haaij taaib . yia maiq zeid sweib yia kanb Eei eij taaib . mq paag Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub se zyen Eei . meib Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q ninb .

43007030	ninb Bua zyrug xij zx'q ninb haig a'q , mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub Fiag puad zx'q weig zu'g ninb Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj .
43007031	yem uaq Eei zwavj myenb Zxg maaib Zamq Eei syenj ninb . ninb Bua kxvq , “ ki-tug taaib uaq zang ninb haib zruj tu'q Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog kaub Zamq naaiq taub fai ? ”
43007032	faa-li-sij myenb haid zwavj myenb sib suvj sapq Eei kxvq ye-su Eei Jauq , ninb Bua Zauj sai myenb pyeiq zyrug Paaiq kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcv mivb zx'q ye-su .

43007034	meib Bua xij lxd yia yaag lxd maiq pwatg , weig zu'g yia mivb yem Eei txvj meib Bua mivb maiq tu'q . ”
43007035	zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb , laanb naaig laanb , “ aa , naaiq laanb myenb xij mivb haaij Bua Zivj lxd maiq pwatg ? ninb xij mivb Bua yiu-Tai myenb Raanj mivb yem uaq teij Janb kikg Eei zivb Faauj Janb kikg fai ?

43007040	zwavj myenb haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq , maaib teij zyrug kxvq , “ naaiq taub za'kevb tovb Bua zuaq uaq taub trug waag myenb a'q . ”
43007041	cvj maaib teij kxvq , “ ninb zruj ki-tug a'q . ” mq paag maaib teij kxvq , “ ki-tug fuvg haib yem kaa-li-li taaib ?
43007042	kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ki-tug zruj Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun yaag yem Daa-witq huvb Eei pwrnb muvq , Betg-le-hem , taaib maiq zeid ? ”
43007043	weig naaiq myenb zyrug laaij ye-su pun Gxi .

43007053	Jiaj zipq Eei wig Raanj , kx'g myenb Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq .
43008001	mq paag ye-su mivb uaq ka'lanq Bov .

43008008	kxvq liud , ye-su cvj Do'q Fiag lovg puab Do'q fiaq Dau .

43008013	faa-li-sij myenb cvj kxvq , “ meib Tevj meib kanb zruj zxvb zevj , meib kxvq Eei waag se maiq zyen . ”

43008027	uaq teij myenb maiq mevb pc'g ye-su kxvq Tauj zavg tiaj .

43008030	myenb Zamq Eei haid ye-su kxvq naaiq teij waag zyrug syenj ninb .

43008041	meib Bua Kuvj zruj Navq meib Bua Eei tia nx zruj . ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua se maiq zeid kub vwaab Txi . yia Bua maaib Du'g taub tia Navq , se Tinb huvb . ”
43008042	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ sij kxvq Tinb huvb za'kevb zruj meib Bua Eei tia nx , meib Bua zyrug Namq yia weig zu'g yia yem ninb taaib , ib zang yia yem naaiq . yia maiq zeid ei yia kanb Eei eij taaib . ninb Paaiq yia taaib .
43008043	meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq mevb pc'g yia kxvq Eei waag ? se weig zu'g meib Bua maiq haib mwavj yia Eei tod .
43008044	meib Bua Eei tia se myenq Eei huvb . meib Bua Kuvj xij ei Jyenq meib Bua Eei tia Eei eij zruj Navq . yem kxn uaq ninb mtaaib taij myenb . ninb yetg liud maiq a'Neiq zyen leid , weig zu'g yem ninb kanb maiq maaib zyen leid . ninb kxvb pc'g weig zu'g ninb ei ninb kanb Eei fyemb fivj mtaaib kxvb pc'g . ninb Kuvj kxvb pc'g Navq yaag zruj kxvb pc'g Eei tia .
43008045	mq paag yia kxvq zyen Eei , meib Bua Zivj taaib maiq syenj yia .
43008046	meib Bua haiq taub haib zaab tu'q Zwrtq yia maaib zwid ? uaq Euvg , sij kxvq yia kxvq zyen leid , meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq syenj yia ?
43008047	haiq taub yem Tinb huvb taaib , uaq taub zuvq mwavj Tinb huvb Eei waag . meib Bua maiq zeid yem Tinb huvb taaib Zivj taaib maiq mwavj ninb Eei waag . ”
43008048	uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb tau ye-su , “ naaiq yia Bua kxvq tu'q zu'g Eei saa'b ? yia Bua kxvq meib se saa-maa-lia Janj yaag maaib myenq yem meib Eei sin . ”
43008049	ye-su tau , “ yia maiq zeid maaib myenq yem yia Eei sin . yia Taaib yia Eei tia , mq paag meib Bua mavg Piaj yia .
43008050	yia maiq zeid lxd myenb Taaib yia , mq paag maaib taub Tevj yia lxd , yaag tovb naaiq taub xij Tevj yia syemq .
43008051	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub ei Jyenq yia Faauj Eei waag zruj , uaq taub yetg liud maiq taig . ”
43008052	yiu-Tai myenb kxvq Buaj ninb , “ ib zang yia Bua za'kevb hiuq tu'q meib maaib myenq yem meib Eei sin . apg-laa-ham taig mig a'q . Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb yaag taig Revg mig a'q . mq paag meib kxvq haiq taub ei Jyenq meib Faauj Eei waag zruj , uaq taub yetg liud maiq taig .
43008053	Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q , apg-laa-ham , zuvq taig mig a'q . meib zruj kaub Lo Jiaj ninb fai ? Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb yaag taig mig a'q . meib kxvq meib kanb zruj haiq taub ? ”
43008054	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ sij kxvq yia kanb Taaib yia kanb nx , naaiq maiq maaib haiq Euvg eij leid . Taaib yia uaq taub se yia Eei tia , tovb meib Bua kxvq zruj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb uaq taub .
43008055	meib Bua yetg liud maiq hiuq tu'q ninb , mq paag yia hiuq tu'q ninb Eei . sij kxvq yia kxvq yia maiq hiuq tu'q ninb nx , yia zyrug Navq meib Bua nx kxvb pc'g . mq paag yia hiuq tu'q ninb , yaag ei Jyenq ninb Eei waag zruj .
43008056	meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij , apg-laa-ham , a'Neiq xij tu'q pwatg yia taaib Eei Nxib Eia'g . ninb tu'q pwatg liud zyrug xnb lx'g haig . ”
43008057	ninb Bua cvj kxvq ninb , “ aa , meib zuvq maiq kcvb tu'q Mmd zyepg Havj . meib pwatg Jiaj apg-laa-ham Eei ? ”
43008058	ye-su tau , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , apg-laa-ham maiq kcvb Zwrtq seij , yia zuvq yem Eei . ”
43008059	ninb Bua haid naaiq teij waag zyrug zx'q la'pyeiq xij zov ninb , mq paag ninb pivj Jyenq Zwrtq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq mig a'q .
43009001	ye-su yavb Jyenq Jauq mivb , pwatg taub yemb Txi mziv mcvb Eei myenb .
43009002	saib kxj Bua naaig ye-su , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! naaiq taub myenb Zwrtq seij taaib mziv mcvb se laaij ninb kanb Eei zwid fai laaij ninb Eei tiaj maag Eei zwid ? ”
43009003	ye-su tau , “ ninb mziv mcvb maiq zeid laaij ninb kanb Eei zwid fai ninb tiaj maag Eei zwid . ninb Eei mziv mcvb se weig pun Tinb huvb zruj Eei sig yem naaiq taub myenb Eei sin piuj mevb Zwrtq taaib .
43009004	maiq kcvb Mwavj , Bua xij zu'g zruj Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei kov . Mwavj yetq Tauj , maiq maaib haiq taub zruj tu'q kov .
43009005	yia Zxg yem Jyenq paamb ken Eei zyavb hog yia zruj Fav ziuj paamb ken . ”
43009006	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , ninb Twiq uamb Rwib uaq Dau , Zaij penj uamb pamg taaib , Raatq Jyenq uaq taub myenb Eei mziv ,
43009007	Buaj ninb , “ mivb uaq nxm sij-lo-am uamb tomb Raauj og . ” ( sij-lo-am uaq nxm Buaj Eei eij leid se “ Paaiq mivb . ” ) uaq taub myenb mivb Raauj liud , Rwrnj taaib zyrug mavg tu'q pwatg a'q .
43009008	ninb Eei laavd zavg myenb Zauj aab log pwatg ninb Toq Eaanb uaq teij , laanb naaig laanb , “ naaiq taub myenb tovb aab log zweid Jyenq Toq Eaanb uaq taub maiq zeid ? ”
43009009	maaib teij kxvq , “ zeid Eei , tovb naaiq taub a'q . ” maaib teij kxvq , “ maiq zeid . se Navq ninb Navq . ” uaq taub myenb kanb zyrug kxvq , “ zeid Eei . tovb yia a'q . ”
43009010	uaq teij myenb zyrug naaig ninb , “ aaq , uaq Euvg meib Eei mziv Navq haiq nx haib lovj , mavg tu'q pwatg ? ”
43009011	ninb tau , “ maaib taub myenb , Buaj heug ye-su , Zaij uamb pamg Raatq yia Eei mziv cvj heug yia mivb sij-lo-am uamb tomb Raauj . yia zyrug mivb . Raauj liud , mavg tu'q pwatg taaib a'q . ”
43009012	uaq teij myenb cvj naaig , “ uaq taub myenb yem haaij ? ” ninb kxvq , “ yia maiq hiuq . ”
43009013	ninb Bua zyrug txb mziv mcvb lovj taaib uaq taub myenb mivb faa-li-sij myenb uaq .
43009014	tovb ye-su Zaij uamb pamg Tevj ninb Raatq Jyenq mziv Fav taaib uaq Nxi se tivb kov Nxi .
43009015	uaq teij faa-li-sij myenb yaag naaig ninb , “ meib Eei mziv Navq haiq nx haib lovj , mavg tu'q pwatg ? ” ninb kxvq , “ ye-su zx'q uamb pamg Raatq yia Eei mziv . yia Raauj liud zyrug mavg tu'q pwatg taaib a'q . ”
43009016	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb kxvq , “ Tevj mziv mavg tu'q pwatg uaq taub myenb maiq zeid yem Tinb huvb taaib , weig zu'g ninb maiq ei tivb kov Nxi Eei leid zruj . ” mq paag maaib teij kxvq , “ paamd zwid Eei myenb Navq haiq nx haib zruj naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog ? ” Navq naaig ninb Bua zyrug pun Gxi mig a'q .
43009017	faa-li-sij myenb cvj naaig Rung uaq taub myenb , “ ninb Tevj meib Eei mziv lovj , haib mavg tu'q pwatg . uaq Euvg , meib kxvq ninb se haiq Euvg myenb ? ” uaq taub myenb tau , “ ninb zruj taub trug waag myenb . ”
43009018	zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zxg maiq syenj ninb zinb Daavg mziv mcvb , ib zang haib mavg tu'q pwatg . ninb Bua zyrug heug ninb Eei tiaj maag taaib
43009019	naaig ninb Bua , “ naaiq taub myenb meib Bua Eei txn ? meib Bua kxvq ninb yemb Txi mziv mcvb tovb naaiq taub fai ? uaq Euvg , ninb ib zang Navq haiq nx haib mavg tu'q pwatg ? ”
43009020	uaq taub myenb Eei tiaj maag tau , “ yia Bua hiuq tu'q ninb zruj yia Bua Eei txn , yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Zwrtq seij taaib mziv mcvb mig a'q .
43009021	mq paag yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Navq haiq nx haib mavg tu'q pwatg , yaag maiq hiuq tu'q haiq taub zxg ninb Eei mziv Fav . meib Bua kanb naaig kaaj ninb maa'b ! ninb Lo a'q . ninb kanb haib kxvq ninb kanb Eei Jauq . ”
43009022	ninb Eei tiaj maag Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb . zruj Lo Eei uaq teij zuvq kxvq liud , haiq taub Eyemg ye-su zruj ki-tug , ninb Bua xij zung Zwrtq wig txvb .
43009023	weig naaiq ninb Eei tiaj maag Zivj taaib kxvq , “ ninb Lo a'q . meib Bua naaig kaaj ninb kanb maa'b ! ”
43009024	faa-li-sij myenb heug mziv mcvb zxg lovj uaq taub myenb cvj taaib ta'Eeig Rung yaag Buaj ninb , “ meib xij zu'g txv Jyenq Tinb huvb lcvd meib Kuvj kxvq zyen Navq . yia Bua hiuq tu'q zxg meib Eei mziv uaq taub se zwib myenb a'q . ”
43009025	uaq taub myenb tau , “ ninb zruj zwib myenb zeid fai maiq zeid , yia maiq hiuq . yia Kuvj hiuq tu'q yetg Euvg Navq . zinb Daavg yia mziv mcvb , ib zang yia haib mavg tu'q pwatg . ”
43009026	ninb Bua cvj naaig , “ ninb zruj haiq Euvg pun meib ? ninb Navq haiq nx zxg meib Eei mziv lovj , mavg tu'q pwatg ? ”
43009027	ninb tau , “ yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua , meib Bua yaag maiq mwavj . meib Bua weig haiq tiug cvj xij mwavj Rung ? meib Bua yaag xij zruj ninb Eei saib kxj fai ? ”
43009028	ninb Bua zyrug kxvq to'g ninb . ninb Bua kxvq , “ meib zruj uaq taub loq Eei saib kxj . yia Bua zruj mo-se Eei saib kxj .
43009029	yia Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Zauj mo-se kxvq waag . mq paag uaq taub loq yia Bua lyemb maiq hiuq tu'q ninb yem haaij taaib . ”
43009030	uaq taub myenb tau , “ naaiq za'kevb Bua'g hxvg haig . meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q ninb yem haaij taaib . mq paag ninb zxg yia Eei mziv mavg tu'q pwatg .
43009031	Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb maiq mwavj paamd zwid myenb Eei waag . mq paag haiq taub Taaib Tinb huvb , ei Jyenq ninb Eei eij zruj , ninb mwavj uaq taub .
43009032	yem zeij luvb zeij Dau Zwrtq taaib Tauj ib zang , maiq maaib haiq taub haid Jiaj maaib haiq taub zxg yemb Txi mziv mcvb Eei myenb lovj , haib mavg tu'q pwatg .
43009033	sij kxvq naaiq taub myenb maiq zeid yem Tinb huvb taaib nx , ninb maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg . ”
43009034	zruj Lo Eei uaq teij tau , “ meib zwib myenb Zwrtq seij taaij Jyenq zwid Lo taaib , mq paag meib xij Faauj yia Bua ? ” ninb Bua zyrug zung ninb Zwrtq wig txvb mig a'q .
43009035	ye-su haid kxvq ninb Bua zung naaiq taub myenb Zwrtq wig txvb . ninb zyrug mivb lxd pwatg yaag naaig ninb , “ meib syenj paamb myenb Eei txn fai ? ”
