43009036	uaq taub myenb tau , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! ninb tovb haiq taub ? Toq meib Buaj yia og . yia zyrug haib syenj ninb . ”
43009037	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib pwatg Jiaj ninb Eei . tovb ib zang Zauj meib kxvq waag uaq taub . ”
43009038	uaq taub myenb kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia syenj a'q . ” ninb zyrug kweig Fiag paaij ye-su .
43009039	ye-su kxvq , “ yia Fiag paamb ken weig syemq zwid , pun mziv mcvb Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg , yaag pun mavg tu'q pwatg uaq teij mziv mcvb mivb . ”
43009040	maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb Zauj ye-su yem uaq haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug naaig , “ Navq naaig , yia Bua yaag mziv mcvb Eei fai ? ”
43009041	ye-su tau , “ sij kxvq meib Bua mziv mcvb nx , meib Bua maiq maaib zwid a'q . mq paag meib Bua kxvq , ‘ yia Bua mavg tu'q pwatg Eei . ’ Navq naaig meib Bua Zxg maaib zwid Eei . ”
43010001	ye-su kxvq , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub pia'g pa'ki yuvb laatg , maiq yavb laatg kcvb pia'g , Kuvj Exv yavb kanb nxm txvj pia'g , ninb zruj Janb za'g nimg yuvb , Zaavq yuvb Navq .
43010002	mq paag yavb kcvb pia'g uaq taub se kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb .
43010003	zuaq kcvb Eei myenb Tevj ninb Kxi kcvb . pa'ki yuvb yaag mwavj ninb Eei Qiaj . ninb ei taub taub pa'ki yuvb Eei Buaj zyaauj , zyrug txb ninb Bua Zwrtq laatg mivb .
43010004	puvj ninb kanb Eei pa'ki yuvb Zwrtq Revg taaib , ninb mivb Daavg . pa'ki yuvb yaag kan Jyenq ninb mivb weig zu'g ninb Bua zia'q tu'q ninb Eei Qiaj .
43010005	kanb taub myenb yuvb maiq kan . Kuvj xij pyauj Navq , weig zu'g zia'q maiq tu'q ninb Eei Qiaj . ”
43010006	ye-su kxvq naaiq tiub waab peiq Buaj ninb Bua mq paag ninb Bua maiq mevb pc'g eij leid .
43010007	ye-su zyrug cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yia se naaiq teij pa'ki yuvb Eei laatg kcvb .
43010008	taaib Daavg yia uaq teij yetg zuvq zruj Janb za'g nimg yuvb , Zaavq yuvb Navq . mq paag pa'ki yuvb maiq mwavj ninb Bua .
43010009	yia se laatg kcvb . haiq taub yavb yia naaiq taub kcvb pia'g xij tu'q Fruj yaag pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq lxd Eang .
43010010	Janb za'g taaib Kuvj xij nimg , xij taij , xij myetg , mq paag yia taaib weig pun paamb myenb tu'q zyavb mcvg , zuvq xij pun ninb Bua tu'q tunb yunb Eei mcvg .
43010011	“ yia se kruj pa'ki yuvb lovj Eei zyruq . kruj pa'ki yuvb lovj uaq taub Eung weig pa'ki yuvb siaq ninb Eei mcvg .
43010012	Zivq taaib Eei kovb myenb maiq zeid zyen kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei zyruq . pa'ki yuvb yaag maiq zeid ninb kanb Eei . pwatg Yiab Juq taaib zyrug kwavg Jyenq pyauj . Yiab Juq zyrug petq , hc'q pa'ki yuvb kwanb pyauj Raanj Revg .
43010013	Zivq taaib Eei kovb myenb pyauj mig a'q , weig zu'g myenb Zivq ninb Navq , ninb maiq Raub yuvb .
43010014	“ yia se kruj pa'ki yuvb lovj Eei zyruq . yia hiuq tu'q yia Eei pa'ki yuvb , yia Eei pa'ki yuvb yaag hiuq tu'q yia ,
43010015	Navq zavg tiaj hiuq tu'q yia , yia yaag hiuq tu'q zavg tiaj . yia yaag weig naaiq teij yuvb siaq yia Eei mcvg .
43010016	yia cvj kanb maaib pa'ki yuvb , se maiq zeid yem naaiq nxm laatg Eei pa'ki yuvb . yia xij zu'g txb ninb Bua taaib . ninb Bua zyrug mwavj yia Eei Qiaj , yaag Zauj naaiq teij penj yetg kwanb , maaib yetg taub zyruq kruj ninb Bua Navq .
43010017	“ zavg tiaj Namq yia weig zu'g yia siaq yia kanb Eei mcvg taig . yia siaq yia Eei mcvg weig cvj tu'q mcvg Rwrnj .
43010018	maiq maaib haiq taub zx'q yia Eei mcvg , yia kanb siaq yia Eei mcvg . yia maaib leid siaq yia Eei mcvg yaag maaib leid cvj tu'q yia Eei mcvg Rwrnj . yia Eei tia Paaiq yia Navq naaiq nx zruj . ”
43010019	laaij naaiq teij waag yiu-Tai myenb cvj pun Gxi mig a'q .
43010020	maaib Zamq Eei kxvq , “ ninb zu'g myenq mua'q . ninb putq Din mig a'q . mwavj ninb Eei waag zruj haiq Euvg lcb ! ”
43010021	mq paag maaib teij kxvq , “ haiq taub zu'g myenq mua'q maiq haib kxvq naaiq Euvg waag lx'g . myenq haib pun mziv mcvb Eei myenb mavg tu'q pwatg Eei ? ”
43010022	uaq zang yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiaj hrug zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei zipq se tovb ken Nxi .
43010023	ye-su yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq , saa-lo-mxn Eei pivj laavb txvj , Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib Eei .
43010024	yiu-Tai myenb taaib kapq zunq ninb uaq yaag naaig , “ meib xij pun yia Bua Hruq lung Tauj haiq zang ? sij kxvq meib za'kevb ki-tug , Buaj za'g yia Bua maa'b ! ”
43010025	ye-su tau , “ yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua , meib Bua yaag maiq syenj ni ! yia tevq yia Eei tia Eei Buaj zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig . uaq teij sig Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj .
43010026	mq paag meib Bua maiq syenj weig zu'g meib Bua maiq zeid yia Eei pa'ki yuvb .
43010027	yia Eei pa'ki yuvb mwavj yia Eei Qiaj . yia yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Bua , ninb Bua yaag kan Jyenq yia mivb .
43010028	yia pun ninb Bua maaib yetg liud Eei mcvg , yetg liud maiq zu'g taig . ninb Bua yem yia Eei puad , maiq maaib haiq taub haib Zaavq tu'q Zwrtq .
43010029	yia Eei tia zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yia . tia yaag kaub Lo Jiaj maang mwrtg . ninb Bua yem yia Eei tia Eei puad , maiq maaib haiq taub haib Zaavq tu'q Zwrtq .
43010030	yia Zauj yia Eei tia penj yetg taub Navq . ”
43010031	yiu-Tai myenb cvj zx'q la'pyeiq xij zov ye-su haig a'q .
43010032	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia ei yia Eei tia Paaiq yia zruj Kuq sig Zamq Eei pun meib Bua pwatg . laaij haiq Rung Kuq sig meib Bua zx'q la'pyeiq xij zov yia taig ? ”
43010033	ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua maiq zeid laaij meib zruj Eei Kuq sig xij zov meib , se laaij meib Ki Tinb huvb . meib se paamb myenb Navq mq paag Zev meib kanb zruj Tinb huvb . ”
43010034	ye-su tau , “ meib Bua kanb Eei leib latg fiaq Jyenq kxvq naaiq Jruj waag maiq zeid ? ‘ yia kxvq , meib Bua se zyenb . ’
43010035	Bua hiuq tu'q kivb sru Eei waag yetg liud maiq haib kxiq yeng . sij kxvq zipq Tinb huvb Eei waag uaq teij myenb Tinb huvb heug zyenb nx ,
43010036	uaq Euvg , zavg tiaj kinq taaib Paaiq Fiag paamb ken uaq taub ni ? yia kxvq yia zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn , meib Bua weig haiq tiug kxvq yia Ki Tinb huvb ?
43010037	sij kxvq yia maiq ei yia Eei tia Eei za'eij zruj nx , maiq tuvq syenj yia .
43010038	mq paag sij kxvq yia ei Jyenq zruj , maiq kunq meib Bua maiq syenj yia , meib Bua Zxg xij zu'g syenj yia zruj Eei sig . meib Bua zyrug haib hiuq tu'q zavg tiaj yem yia ka'Euad . yia yaag yem zavg tiaj ka'Euad . ”
43010039	uaq teij myenb cvj xij zx'q ye-su , mq paag ye-su yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq pyauj Zwrtq mig a'q .
43010040	ye-su cvj Rwrnj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib , tovb zinb Daavg yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq nxm txvj , yem Zaamj uaq .
43010041	maaib myenb Zamq Eei taaib lxd ninb . ninb Bua kxvq , “ yo-han maiq zruj Jiaj haiq Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog . mq paag yo-han kxvq haiq Euvg Tauj naaiq laanb myenb yetg zuvq se zyen Eei . ”
43010042	yem uaq maaib myenb Zamq Eei zyrug syenj ye-su .
43011001	maaib taub myenb , Buaj heug laa-saa-latq , putq pcvg mig a'q . ninb yem Be-Taa-ni laavd , tovb maa-li-yaa Zauj ninb Eei txg , maa-Taa , yem uaq nxm laavd .
43011002	( naaiq taub maa-li-yaa se tovb lovg Daav Eei yrub toj zyruq Eei zauj , yaag lovg ninb kanb Eei Ba'pyei sxtq . putq pcvg uaq taub laa-saa-latq se maa-li-yaa Eei naud . )
43011003	maa-Taa Bua i muab sia'q zyrug pun waag mivb Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! tovb meib Namq uaq taub putq pcvg mig a'q . ”
43011004	ye-su haid naaiq teij waag ninb kxvq , “ laa-saa-latq putq naaiq nxm pcvg mq paag setq mweid ninb maiq taig . ninb putq weig pun myenb Taaib Tinb huvb . naaiq nxm pcvg yaag xij pun myenb Taaib Tinb huvb Eei txn . ”
43011005	ye-su Namq haig maa-Taa Bua i muab sia'q Zauj laa-saa-latq .
43011006	ninb haid myenb kxvq laa-saa-latq putq Jyenq pcvg , ninb Zxg yem ninb yem uaq nxm txvj i Nxi liud
43011007	Zivj taaib kxvq Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj , “ Bua cvj mivb yu-Dia scvq a'q . ”
43011008	saib kxj Bua tau , “ saib tiaj aa'b ! Jiaj taaib maiq kcvb maaib Bu'ziaj Nxi , yem uaq Eei yiu-Tai myenb xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov meib nyaa . meib Zxg cvj xij mivb uaq ? ”
43011009	ye-su tau , “ yetg Nxi maaib zyepg Eeig nxm zyavb hog Eei Fav maiq zeid ? haiq taub luvb Nxi zang yavb Jauq , ninb maiq Di'q zu'g Dxpg weig zu'g ninb mavg tu'q pwatg paamb ken Eei Fav .
43011010	mq paag sij kxvq ninb luvb mwrnd zang yavb Jauq nx , ninb Di'q zu'g Dxpg weig zu'g maiq maaib Fav ziuj ninb . ”
43011011	ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud ninb cvj kxvq , “ Bua Eei txig laa-saa-latq mFxmb mig a'q , mq paag yia xij mivb heug ninb Eia taaib . ”
43011012	saib kxj Bua tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! sij kxvq ninb mFxmb nx , ninb haib lovj Eei . ”
43011013	ye-su kxvq Eei eij leid se laa-saa-latq taig mig a'q . mq paag saib kxj Bua laaig laa-saa-latq Kuvj mFxmb Navq .
43011014	ye-su zyrug kxvq za'g Buaj ninb Bua , “ laa-saa-latq taig mig a'q .
43011015	mq paag weig Tevj meib Bua syenj yia , yia a'Neiq yia maiq tu'q Zauj ninb yem . Bua mivb ninb uaq x'g ? ”
43011016	To-matq , tovb myenb heug suvb kub vwaad uaq taub , kxvq Buaj yem uaq Eei saib kxj , “ Bua lomb Rxib kan Jyenq saib tiaj mivb x'g ? Bua zyrug tu'q Zauj ninb taig . ”
43011017	ye-su mivb Tauj Be-Taa-ni laavd uaq zang , haid myenb kxvq laa-saa-latq zavj Jyenq tu'q pyei Nxi a'q .
43011018	Be-Taa-ni laavd leib ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pua ki-lo Jauq Eei txvj .
43011019	yiu-Tai myenb Zamq Eei taaib mavg maa-Taa Zauj maa-li-yaa , Tevj ninb Bua Jaiq Raub weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei naud taig .
43011020	maa-Taa haid kxvq ye-su taaib a'q , ninb zyrug Zwrtq mivb zipq . mq paag maa-li-yaa Zxg yem uaq pyauq .
43011021	maa-Taa kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! sij kxvq meib yem naaiq nx , yia Eei naud maiq taig .
43011022	mq paag , yia hiuq tu'q ib zang meib Tevj Tinb huvb Toq haiq Euvg , Tinb huvb xij pun uaq Euvg meib . ”
43011023	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib Eei naud cvj xij navb taaib . ”
43011024	maa-Taa tau , “ zeid Eei , yia hiuq tu'q Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi , zwavj myenb navb taaib uaq zang , ninb yaag cvj navb taaib . ”
43011025	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ yia se tovb pun myenb navb taaib maaib mcvg zyavb uaq taub . haiq taub syenj yia , maiq kunq ninb taig mivb , ninb cvj xij navb taaib .
43011026	haiq taub zyavb Jyenq yaag syenj yia , uaq taub yetg liud maiq taig . naaiq meib syenj Eei fai ? ”
43011027	maa-Taa tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia syenj Eei . yia syenj meib za'kevb ki-tug , Tinb huvb Eei txn , tovb xij Fiag taaib yem naaiq paamb ken uaq taub . ”
43011028	maa-Taa Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud , ninb Rwrnj mivb pivj Jyenq Buaj ninb Eei Riad , maa-li-yaa , “ saib tiaj Tauj taaib a'q . ninb yaag heug meib . ”
43011029	maa-li-yaa haid naaiq teij waag zyrug syepg syepq Eei Jiad sin mivb ye-su uaq .
43011030	uaq zang ye-su maiq kcvb pia'g laavd , Zxg yem maa-Taa pwavb ninb uaq nxm txvj .
43011031	Zauj maa-li-yaa yem pyauq Tevj ninb Jaiq Raub uaq teij myenb , pwatg maa-li-yaa Waav Jyenq Jiad sin Zwrtq , ninb Bua zyrug kan Jyenq mivb , laaig ninb mivb uaq zruq Eyemq mq pei .
43011032	maa-li-yaa mivb Tauj ye-su uaq , yetq pwatg zyrug kweig Fiag ninb Eei zauj ka'Len kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! sij kxvq meib yem naaiq , yia Eei naud maiq taig . ”
43011033	ye-su pwatg maa-li-yaa Eyemq , kan maa-li-yaa taaib uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb yaag Eyemq , ninb zyrug haid Hruq mun haig , Raub haig .
43011034	ye-su naaig , “ meib Bua txb ninb mivb zavj haaij ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! taaib mavg maa'b ! ”
43011035	ye-su Eyemq .
43011036	uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb kxvq , “ mavg kaaj , ninb Dovg naaig Namq laa-saa-latq . ”
43011037	mq paag maaib teij kxvq , “ ninb pun mziv mcvb Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg . uaq Euvg ninb maiq haib pun naaiq taub myenb maiq taig fai ? ”
43011038	ye-su cvj haid Hruq mun , Raub haig , zyrug mivb uaq zruq . uaq nxm zruq se Bcvb Kwrtq . maaib nxm la'pyeiq Lo Eei Bc'g Jyenq Kwrtg Daavg .
43011039	ye-su kxvq , “ zx'q Gxi la'pyeiq maa'b ! ” taig uaq taub laa-saa-latq Eei txg , maa-Taa , kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! zavj Jyenq tu'q pyei Nxi a'q . taaij zweij haig . ”
43011040	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ yia Buaj Jiaj meib maiq zeid ? sij kxvq meib syenj , meib xij tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg . ”
43011041	uaq teij myenb zyrug zx'q Gxi la'pyeiq . ye-su Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig luvb kxvq , “ aa tia aa'b ! yia lcvd zivb weig zu'g tia mwavj yia Eei waag .
43011042	yia hiuq tu'q tia haiq zang yaag mwavj yia , mq paag yia Navq naaiq nx kxvq se weig pun sruq ka'Len naaiq teij myenb syenj tia Paaiq yia taaib . ”
43011043	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb Qiaj Lo Eei heug Jyenq kxvq , “ laa-saa-latq aa'b ! Zwrtq taaib maa'b ! ”
43011044	taig mivb uaq taub myenb zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q . ninb Eei puab zauj Zxg maaib Dia Reng Jyenq . Myen yaag maaib Dia pwav Jyenq . ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Govb Tevj ninb Jaiq Gxi , puvj ninb maa'b ! ”
43011045	Navq naaig taaib mavg maa-li-yaa uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb Zamq pwatg ye-su zruj naaiq teij sig zyrug syenj ninb .
43011046	mq paag maaib teij Rwrnj mivb kxvq Revg ye-su zruj Eei Jaub lrug pun faa-li-sij myenb mwavj .
43011047	naaiq teij sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb zyrug heug kunq sig wig Eei myenb kapq zunq Zaavb laavb . ninb Bua kxvq , “ aa , Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj ? naaiq laanb myenb zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Zamq haig .
43011048	sij kxvq Bua sweib ninb Navq naaiq zruj Jyenq mivb , myenb zyrug syenj ninb Revg a'q . Navq naaig , lo-maa Jyen xij pavg naaiq nxm Qavj zruj waaig Bua zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq , yaag zruj waaig Bua Eei fivj . ”
43011049	naaiq kwanb myenb maaib taub , Buaj heug Kaa-yaa-faatq , tovb uaq Havj zruj tomb sai myenb . ninb kxvq , “ meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q haiq Euvg .
43011050	meib Bua maiq hiuq fai ? pun yetg taub myenb taig tiq pc'g fivj se kaub lovj yetg fivj myenb zu'g myetg Revg . ”
43011051	Kaa-yaa-faatq kxvq naaiq teij waag se maiq zeid ei ninb kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq . se weig zu'g uaq Havj ninb zruj tomb sai myenb zyrug kxvq zinb hod waag , kxvq ye-su xij zu'g weig yetg fivj yiu-Tai myenb taig .
43011052	yaag maiq zeid weig uaq fivj taig Navq . ninb yaag taig weig syru zunq Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud , se yem Raanj uaq teij , kapq zunq taaib penj yetg kwanb .
43011053	yem naaig Nxi taaib , zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Jiad kxn taaq za'eij taij ye-su .
43011054	weig naaiq ye-su maiq Navq zinb Daavg txv zwavj yrub yu-Dia scvq pun yiu-Tai myenb pwatg . ninb mivb nxm laavd heug e-faa-im , nitq teib puvb Waav fatq Eei , Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yem uaq .
43011055	aaq lamb teij Tauj yiu-Tai myenb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq , myenb Zamq yem faamb puv feij lrug mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb weig ei Jyenq leid saaj wij Zivj taaib Jiaj zipq .
43011056	ninb Bua yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyaub Len lxd ye-su . laanb naaig laanb , “ aa , meib Navq haiq nx Namq ? taaij ninb maiq taaib naaiq Jiaj zipq saa'b ? ”
43011057	uaq zang sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb Jaa zyavj waag kxvq , sij kxvq haiq taub hiuq tu'q ye-su yem haaij xij zu'g mivb Buaj ninb Bua , ninb Bua zyrug haib mivb zx'q ninb .
43012001	siaj mcvg zipq maiq kcvb Tauj , zinb Daavg Ju'q Nxi , ye-su mivb Be-Taa-ni laavd , tovb taig mivb ye-su pun navb taaib uaq taub laa-saa-latq yem Eei laavd .
43012002	yem uaq ninb Bua Beng tonj Naavj hrug ye-su . maa-Taa liug leid ninb Bua . laa-saa-latq yaag Zauj ye-su Bua Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj .
43012003	uaq zang , maa-li-yaa zx'q zyepg faam luvd zyen haig , Jaaij haig Eei naa-Daa yrub Daav toj ye-su Eei zauj , cvj lovg ninb kanb Eei Ba'pyei sxtq . yrub Eei Qiaj Daav pwavq yetg nxm pyauq .
43012004	maaib taub ye-su Eei saib kxj , yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg , tovb xij maaig ye-su uaq taub zyrug kxvq ,
43012005	“ zruj haiq Euvg maiq txb naaiq teij yrub mivb maaig tu'q Eaanb taaib pun myenb Jomg myenb ? naaiq funj taaib hxpg faamb pc'q Nxi Eei kovb zinb nyaa . ”
43012006	yu-Daatg Navq naaiq nx kxvq se maiq zeid ninb maaib Hruq Kxb lyenb myenb Jomg myenb . se weig zu'g ninb kanb zruj Janb za'g . ninb Tevj kruj ye-su Bua Eei tomb zwavj Eaanb Bua'g mq paag ninb kanb yaag Pinj Eaanb Zwrtq .
43012007	ye-su kxvq , “ maiq tuvq kxvq ninb maa'b ! ninb maaib Eei sweib ninb lyrub Tauj pyopq yia uaq nxm Nxi .
43012008	meib Bua zanb zang maaib myenb Jomg myenb Zauj meib Bua yem , mq paag meib Bua maiq tu'q yia Zauj meib Bua yetg liud yem . ”
43012009	maaib yiu-Tai myenb Zamq haid kxvq ye-su yem Be-Taa-ni laavd . ninb Bua zyrug mivb uaq maiq zeid Kuvj lxd ye-su Navq . ninb Bua yaag xij mavg taig mivb , ye-su pun navb taaib uaq taub laa-saa-latq .
43012010	sai myenb pyeiq Bua zyrug taaq za'eij xij lyemb laa-saa-latq taij ,
43012011	weig zu'g ninb Eei sig Zwrtq taaib pun myenb Zamq kwavg Jyenq sai myenb pyeiq syenj ye-su .
43012012	ta'Eeig Nxi , taaib Jiaj zipq uaq teij zwavj myenb haid kxvq ye-su taaib aaq lamb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem .
43012013	ninb Bua zyrug nanq Jyenq taaub nxmb Zwrtq mivb zipq , yaag heug Jyenq kxvq , “ ho-saa-naa ! Toq Zeij fu'q pun tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub . Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb tiaj . ”
43012014	ye-su lxd tu'q taub maa-li Zaan zyrug keb Jyenq taaib , Navq kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq nx ,
43012015	“ si-on zivb aa'b ! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . meib Eei huvb tiaj keb Jyenq maa-li Zaan taaib . ”
43012016	taaub tavb ye-su Eei saib kxj Bua maiq mevb pc'g naaiq teij Jauq . mq paag ye-su taig , Tinb huvb cvj pun ninb navb taaib Taaib ninb zruj Lo , ninb Bua Zivj Javj zu'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Navq naaiq nx kxvq Tauj ye-su , yaag Javj zu'g myenb Navq naaiq nx zruj pun ye-su .
43012017	pwatg ye-su heug laa-saa-latq yem zruq navb Zwrtq taaib uaq teij zwavj myenb zruj zxvb zevj kxvq Revg naaiq teij Jaub lrug .
43012018	weig zu'g zwavj myenb haid kxvq ye-su zruj naaiq Rung Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog , ninb Bua zyrug mivb zipq .
43012019	faa-li-sij myenb zyrug laanb Buaj laanb , “ mavg maa'b ! Bua zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg . luvb Diaq myenb kan Revg ninb mig a'q . ”
43012020	mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq uaq zang , maaib teij Janb kikg yaag kan Jyenq mivb zavg Tinb huvb .
43012021	naaiq teij Janj taaib lxd fi-lipq , tovb yem kaa-li-li scvq , Betg-sai-Daa muvq taaib uaq taub saib kxj , kxvq Buaj ninb , “ tomb kxj aag , yia Bua xij pwavb ye-su og . ”
43012022	fi-lipq zyrug mivb Buaj an-Daa-lu . ninb Bua i taub zyrug mivb Buaj ye-su .
43012023	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ ib zang yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , tu'q Favb laavg Eei zyavb hog zuvq Tauj a'q .
43012024	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , maaib yetg nxm Zu'q maiq zwavj Fiag Dau huq mivb nx , mtaaib tovb uaq Du'g nxm Zu'q Navq . mq paag sij kxvq zwavj Fiag Dau huq mivb zyrug Zwrtq taaib tu'q Zamq a'q .
43012025	haiq taub Kuvj Namq ninb kanb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug zu'g kwavg ninb Eei mcvg . mq paag haiq taub maiq Kxb fi'q ninb Eei mcvg , uaq taub zyrug kruj Jyenq ninb Eei mcvg Tauj yetg liud .
43012026	haiq taub xij Tevj yia zruj pru , xij zu'g kan Jyenq yia mivb . yia yem haaij , pru yaag Zauj yia yem uaq . haiq taub zruj yia Eei pru , yia Eei tia xij Taaib ninb .
43012027	“ ib zang yia Hruq Raub haig . yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq ni ? xij zu'g kxvq , ‘ aa tia aa'b ! Toq tia Fruj yia maiq zu'g pwavb naaiq teij Kruq Eei sig ’ fai ? maiq zeid ! yia taaib weig xij zu'g syrug naaiq Euvg Kruq .
43012028	aa tia aa'b ! Toq pun tia Eei Buaj tu'q Favb laavg . ” cvj maaib Qiaj yem uaq luvb kxvq , “ yia zuvq pun yia Eei Buaj tu'q Favb laavg . yia cvj xij pun tu'q Favb laavg . ”
43012029	sruq Jyenq uaq Eei zwavj myenb haid uaq Euvg Qiaj Bwi , maaib teij kxvq , “ Ba'ov Bwi . ” maaib teij kxvq , “ finb myenb Zauj ninb kxvq waag . ”
43012030	mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ naaiq teij Qiaj Bwi se weig meib Bua , maiq zeid weig yia .
43012031	ib zang Tauj zyavb hog Tinb huvb xij tivg luvb Diaq myenb Eei zwid . kunq paamb ken uaq taub yaag xij zu'g zung Zwrtq .
43012032	yia yem Dau zu'g myenb lyepg faauj Lav uaq zang , yia xij yua'g taub taub myenb taaib lxd yia . ”
43012033	( ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig pun Ziv ninb xij zu'g Navq haiq nx taig . )
43012034	zwavj myenb kxvq , “ leib latg Buaj yia Bua , ki-tug xij yetg liud yem . uaq Euvg meib Navq haiq nx haib kxvq paamb myenb Eei txn xij zu'g myenb lyepg faauj Lav ? naaiq taub paamb myenb Eei txn tovb haiq taub ? ”
43012035	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ Fav cvj Zauj meib Bua yem trug Navq . Zxg maaib Fav Eei zyavb hog kaanq Jyenq yavb Jauq mivb a'q . mRiaj Mwavj xij taaib om Jyenq meib Bua . haiq taub yem Mwavj yavb Jauq , uaq taub maiq hiuq tu'q ninb mivb haaij .
43012036	maaib Fav Eei zyavb hog meib Bua xij zu'g syenj Kauj Fav . meib Bua zyrug penj yem Fav Eei myenb . ” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , ye-su Zwrtq mivb pivj ninb Bua mig a'q .
43012037	maiq kunq ye-su zruj Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog Dovg naaig Zamq pun yiu-Tai myenb pwatg , ninb Bua Zxg maiq syenj ninb .
43012038	Navq naaig weig pun trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , Eei waag Zwrtq taaib txij Revg . i-saa-yaa kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! maaib haiq taub syenj yia Bua zunb Eei waag ? zyruq pun haiq taub tu'q pwatg ninb Eei Qa'q ? ”
43012039	weig naaiq ninb Bua maiq haib syenj . weig zu'g i-saa-yaa cvj kxvq ,
43012040	“ Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua Eei mziv mcvb , yaag pun ninb Bua Eei Hruq vcvg . Riaj ninb Bua Eei mziv haib mavg tu'q pwatg , ninb Bua Eei Hruq yaag haib mevb pc'g zyrug Win Rwrnj taaib pun yia zxg lovj ninb Bua . ”
43012041	i-saa-yaa Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ninb tu'q pwatg ye-su Eei Favb laavg yaag kxvq Tauj ninb .
43012042	maaib zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zamq Eei syenj ye-su . mq paag ninb Bua maiq txv zwavj Eyemg weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj faa-li-sij myenb xij zung ninb Bua Zwrtq wig txvb .
43012043	ninb Bua a'Neiq myenb Zev ninb Bua kaub Zamq tu'q Tinb huvb Zev .
43012044	ye-su lovg Qiaj Lo Eei cvj kxvq , “ haiq taub syenj yia , maiq taan syenj yia Navq . ninb yaag syenj Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub .
43012045	haiq taub pwatg yia , yaag pwatg Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub .
43012046	yia taaib pia'g paamb ken weig zruj nxm Fav . haiq taub syenj yia , maiq zu'g yem Mwavj ka'Euad .
43012047	haiq taub haid yia Eei waag yaag maiq ei Jyenq zruj , yia maiq syemq ninb Eei zwid . yia taaib maiq zeid xij syemq paamb myenb Eei zwid . yia taaib weig Fruj ninb Bua .
43012048	haiq taub Gemb yia , maiq mwavj yia Eei waag , maaib taub xij syemq ninb . Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia kxvq Eei waag xij syemq ninb Eei zwid .
43012049	weig zu'g yia Eei waag maiq zeid ei yia kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq . zavg tiaj Paaiq yia taaib Buaj yia kxvq haiq Euvg yaag xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq .
43012050	yia hiuq tu'q ninb Eei livg haib pun myenb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg . weig naaiq yia kxvq Eei waag yetg zuvq se ei yia Eei tia Buaj yia kxvq . ”
43013001	siaj mcvg zipq zinb Daavg uaq Nxi , ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb xij zu'g leib paamb ken Rwrnj zavg tiaj uaq Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q . ye-su Namq yem paamb ken syenj ninb uaq teij myenb , yaag pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Namq Tauj taaub Tauj mweid .
43013002	ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Eang luvb Mwavj uaq zang , saa-taan zuvq Duaq liud si-mon i-saa-Kaa-li-otg Eei txn , yu-Daatg , pun ninb Namq Zwrtq xij maaig ye-su .
43013003	ye-su hiuq tu'q zavg tiaj zx'q maang mwrtg Jiu pun yem ninb Eei puab Diaq , yaag hiuq tu'q ninb yem Tinb huvb taaib cvj xij Rwrnj Tauj Tinb huvb uaq .
43013004	ninb zyrug yem uaq tiab Jiad sin taaib Jaiq ka'Eiag uaq yemg lwi , zx'q si'g Jaauq sai Jyenq Jaaiq ,
43013005	yaag zx'q uam toj Jyenq punb , Fiag puad Tevj saib kxj Bua Raauj zauj . Raauj liud , ninb lovg sai Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq si'g Jaauq sxtq Gaai .
43013006	Raauj Tauj si-mon pi-te , pi-te kxvq Buaj ninb , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib xij Raauj yia Eei zauj ? ”
43013007	ye-su tau , “ yia ib zang Navq naaiq nx zruj meib maiq mevb pc'g , mq paag maaib Nxi meib zyrug hiuq tu'q a'q . ”
43013008	pi-te kxvq , “ yia yetg liud maiq pun meib Raauj yia Eei zauj . ” ye-su tau , “ sij kxvq yia maiq Raauj meib Eei zauj nx , yavb naaiq Jiaj meib Zauj yia maiq maaib meib Eei pwrng a'q . ”
43013009	si-mon pi-te tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! uaq Euvg maiq taan Raauj yia Eei zauj Navq . lyemb yia Eei puad Zauj mGxvq Raauj maa'b ! ”
43013010	ye-su kxvq , “ haiq taub Raauj liud sin , zyavb sin zyrug Zivb Revg a'q , Kuvj xij zu'g Raauj zauj Navq . meib Bua se Zivb Revg Eei , mq paag maiq zeid meib Bua taub taub . ”
43013011	ye-su hiuq tu'q haiq taub xij maaig ninb Zivj taaib kxvq , “ meib Bua maaib taub maiq Zivb Revg . ”
43013012	ye-su Raauj liud saib kxj Bua Eei zauj , ninb cvj zx'q ninb Eei lwi zu'q Jyenq mivb zweid ninb Eei txvj . ninb naaig saib kxj Bua , “ yia Navq naaiq nx zruj pun meib Bua , meib Bua mevb pc'g Eei fai ?
43013013	meib Bua heug yia zruj saib tiaj yaag zruj zyruq . meib Bua kxvq tu'q hxpg Eei weig zu'g yia za'kevb zeid a'q .
43013014	yia zruj meib Bua Eei zyruq yaag zruj meib Bua Eei saib tiaj Tevj meib Bua Raauj liud zauj . Navq naaig meib Bua xij zu'g laanb Tevj laanb Raauj zauj .
43013015	yia zruj Euvg zeiq pun meib Bua zwrtg . yia Navq haiq nx Tevj meib Bua zruj liud , meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj .
43013016	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , pru maiq kaub Lo zyruq . Paaiq mivb Eei myenb maiq kaub Lo Paaiq ninb mivb uaq taub .
43013017	ib zang meib Bua hiuq tu'q naaiq teij Jauq . sij kxvq meib Bua ei Jyenq zruj zyrug maaib Fyenb yrub a'q .
43013018	“ yia maiq zeid kxvq Tauj meib Bua yetg zuvq . yia kinq taaib uaq teij yia hiuq Eei , mq paag sig xij Zwrtq taaib txij naaiq teij kivb sru Eei waag . kivb sru kxvq , ‘ Zauj yia Jwavg Naavj Eang Eei myenb Byenq Hruq pun yia . ’
43013019	sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia Jaab Daavg Buaj meib Bua . sig Zwrtq uaq zang meib Bua zyrug syenj yia se yetg liud zyavb Jyenq uaq taub .
43013020	yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , haiq taub zipq yia Paaiq mivb uaq taub , ninb yaag zipq yia . haiq taub zipq yia , ninb yaag zipq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub a'q . ”
43013021	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb haid Hruq mun haig , Raub haig , zyrug kxvq , “ yia Buaj zyen meib Bua , meib Bua maaib taub xij maaig yia . ”
43013022	saib kxj Bua , meib mavg yia , yia mavg meib , Namq maiq hiuq ye-su kxvq zu'g haiq taub .
43013023	maaib taub saib kxj , tovb ye-su Namq uaq taub , zweid nitq ye-su .
43013024	si-mon pi-te zyrug Na'q mGxvq Buaj uaq taub saib kxj , “ naaig kaaj , ninb kxvq haiq taub ? ”
43013025	uaq taub saib kxj zyrug Dev mivb kaub fatq teij naaig ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib kxvq haiq taub ? ”
43013026	ye-su tau , “ yia kua'q aaj Fuaq pun haiq taub , se tovb uaq taub a'q . ” ye-su zyrug kua'q aaj Fuaq pun si-mon i-saa-Kaa-li-otg Eei txn , yu-Daatg .
43013027	yu-Daatg Eang liud uaq aaj Fuaq , saa-taan zyrug pia'g ninb Eei Hruq mig a'q . ye-su kxvq Buaj yu-Daatg , “ meib xij zruj haiq Euvg , kaanq mivb zruj a'q . ”
43013028	Jwavg tiab Eei myenb maiq maaib haiq taub mevb pc'g ye-su weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx kxvq .
43013029	weig zu'g yu-Daatg kruj Eaanb Bua'g , maaib teij laaig ye-su heug ninb mivb maaid Jiaj zipq Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq , fai txb Eaanb mivb pun myenb Jomg myenb .
43013030	yu-Daatg Eang liud naaiq aaj Fuaq zyrug mivb mig a'q . uaq zang yaag Mwavj a'q .
43013031	yu-Daatg Zwrtq mivb , ye-su kxvq , “ ib zang yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , tu'q Favb laavg . Tinb huvb yaag weig yia , paamb myenb Eei txn , tu'q Favb laavg .
43013032	sij kxvq Tinb huvb weig yia tu'q Favb laavg , Tinb huvb yaag xij pun yia tu'q Favb laavg yaag lyemb zeib tu'q .
43013033	“ yia Eei fu'Jweiq aag , yia cvj Zauj meib Bua yem teij tavb Navq . meib Bua xij lxd yia mq paag Navq yia Buaj Jiaj uaq teij zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb nx , ib zang yia cvj kxvq Buaj meib Bua , ‘ yia mivb Eei txvj meib Bua maiq haib mivb . ’
43013034	ib zang yia pun tiub syavb livg meib Bua , Buaj meib Bua laanb xij zu'g Namq laanb . yia Navq haiq nx Namq meib Bua , meib Bua xij zu'g Navq uaq nx laanb Namq laanb .
43013035	sij kxvq meib Bua laanb Namq laanb , zwavj myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q meib Bua zruj yia Eei saib kxj . ”
43013036	si-mon pi-te naaig ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib xij mivb haaij ? ” ye-su tau , “ yia mivb Eei txvj , ib zang meib kan yia mivb maiq tu'q . mq paag Ga'haaq meib xij kan yia mivb . ”
43013037	pi-te naaig , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia weig haiq tiug ib zang maiq haib kan meib mivb ? yia Eung weig meib siaq mcvg taig . ”
43013038	ye-su tau , “ meib za'kevb Eung weig yia siaq mcvg taig fai ? yia kxvq za'g Buaj meib , Jai zuvq maiq kcvb Gaaij , meib maiq Eyemg yia pua Rung . ”
43014001	ye-su cvj kxvq , “ maiq tuvq Hruq Waav Hruq Raub . xij zu'g syenj Kauj Tinb huvb yaag syenj Kauj yia .
43014002	yia Eei tia Eei pyauq maaib yem Eei txvj Zamq Eei . sij kxvq maiq maaib yia zuvq Buaj meib Bua mig a'q . yia yaag mivb liug leid txvj pun meib Bua yem .
43014003	yia mivb liug leid zyavj txvj pun meib Bua yem , yia cvj taaib txb meib Bua mivb Zauj yia yem uaq . yia yem haaij meib Bua zyrug Zauj yia yem uaq .
43014004	yia xij mivb Eei txvj uaq tiub Jauq , meib Bua yaag hiuq Eei . ”
43014005	To-matq kxvq Buaj ninb , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q meib mivb haaij . yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib hiuq tu'q Jauq mivb ? ”
43014006	ye-su tau , “ yia se tovb mivb zavg tiaj uaq tiub Jauq , yaag tovb zyen leid , yaag tovb zyavb mcvg . Zwrtq liud Kauj yia , maiq maaib haiq taub haib mivb tu'q Tauj zavg tiaj uaq .
43014007	sij kxvq meib Bua za'kevb hiuq tu'q yia , meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia Eei tia . yavb naaiq Jiaj meib Bua hiuq tu'q ninb , meib Bua yaag pwatg Jiaj ninb . ”
43014008	fi-lipq kxvq Buaj ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! Toq meib pun yia Bua pwatg zavg tiaj og . pwatg liud yia Bua Hruq Gaai a'q . ”
43014009	ye-su kxvq , “ fi-lipq aa'b ! yia Zauj meib Bua yem laub haig a'q . meib Zxg maiq kcvb hiuq tu'q yia fai ? haiq taub pwatg Jiaj yia se pwatg Jiaj zavg tiaj . Navq naaiq meib weig haiq tiug kxvq , ‘ Toq pun yia Bua pwatg zavg tiaj ? ’
43014010	meib maiq syenj yia yem zavg tiaj ka'Euad , zavg tiaj yem yia ka'Euad fai ? yia Zauj meib Bua kxvq naaiq teij waag maiq zeid yia kanb Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq . zavg tiaj yem yia ka'Euad zruj ninb kanb Eei kov .
43014011	meib Bua xij zu'g syenj yia yem zavg tiaj ka'Euad , zavg tiaj yaag yem yia ka'Euad . maiq zei c'q , xij zu'g weig yia zruj Eei sig syenj .
43014012	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , haiq taub syenj Kauj yia , uaq taub xij zruj Navq yia zruj nx . ninb zruj Eei sig zuvq xij zruj kaub Lo Jiaj yia Eei , weig zu'g yia mivb zavg tiaj uaq .
43014013	meib Bua tevq yia Eei Buaj Toq haiq Euvg , yia zuvq xij zruj uaq Euvg . Navq naaiq , zavg tiaj weig ninb Eei txn tu'q myenb Taaib .
43014014	sij kxvq meib Bua tevq yia Eei Buaj Toq haiq Euvg , yia zuvq xij zruj uaq Euvg .
43014015	“ sij kxvq meib Bua Namq yia , meib Bua zyrug ei Jyenq yia Eei livg zruj .
43014016	yia xij Tevj zavg tiaj Toq , ninb zyrug xij pun kanb taub taaib Tevj meib Bua , Zauj meib Bua yetg liud yem .
43014017	naaiq taub se sivj livb , tovb pun myenb hiuq tu'q zyen leid uaq taub . paamb myenb maiq haib zipq ninb , weig zu'g paamb myenb mavg maiq pwatg ninb yaag maiq hiuq tu'q ninb . mq paag meib Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Eei , weig zu'g ninb Zauj meib Bua yem yaag yem meib Bua Eei Hruq .
43014018	yia maiq kwavg meib Bua penj kub hanb txn . yia cvj xij taaib lxd meib Bua .
43014019	maiq laub paamb myenb maiq pwatg yia , mq paag meib Bua xij tu'q pwatg yia . weig zu'g yia zyavb Jyenq , meib Bua zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq .
43014020	Tauj uaq Nxi meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia yem yia Eei tia ka'Euad , meib Bua yaag yem yia ka'Euad , yia yaag yem meib Bua ka'Euad .
43014021	“ haiq taub zipq yia Eei livg yaag ei Jyenq zruj , tovb uaq taub Namq yia . haiq taub Namq yia , yia Eei tia yaag Namq ninb . yia yaag Namq ninb yaag xij pun ninb hiuq tu'q yia . ”
43014022	yu-Daatg , maiq zeid maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg , naaig ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib weig haiq tiug kxvq meib xij pun yia Bua hiuq tu'q meib mq paag maiq pun paamb myenb hiuq tu'q meib ? ”
43014023	ye-su tau ninb , “ haiq taub Namq yia zyrug ei Jyenq yia Faauj Eei waag zruj . yia Eei tia zyrug Namq ninb . yia Zauj yia Eei tia yaag xij taaib lxd ninb , Zauj ninb yem .
43014024	haiq taub maiq Namq yia zyrug maiq ei yia Faauj Eei waag . meib Bua haid yia kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , maiq zeid yia kanb Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq . se zavg tiaj , tovb Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub , Eei waag .
43014025	“ yia Zxg Zauj meib Bua yem Eei zyavb hog yia kxvq Revg naaiq teij waag Buaj meib Bua .
43014026	Tevj myenb uaq taub , tovb zavg tiaj xij tevq yia Eei Buaj Paaiq taaib Eei sivj livb , xij Faauj Euvb Euvg meib Bua , yaag xij pun meib Bua haib Javj tu'q yia Buaj Jiaj Eei yetg zuvq .
43014027	“ yia lyrub pcvb xn pun meib Bua . se yia kanb Eei pcvb xn yia Zeij pun meib Bua . yia pun Eei maiq Navq paamb myenb pun Eei . maiq tuvq Raub faanb yaag maiq tuvq kamb Riaj .
43014028	“ meib Bua haid yia kxvq Jiaj , yia xij zu'g leib Gxi meib Bua , mq paag yia cvj xij taaib lxd meib Bua . sij kxvq meib Bua Namq yia , meib Bua xij zu'g a'Neiq yia mivb zavg tiaj uaq weig zu'g zavg tiaj kaub Lo Jiaj yia .
43014029	naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia Jaab Daavg Buaj zyavj meib Bua . zuaq naaiq teij sig Zwrtq meib Bua zyrug syenj a'q .
43014030	“ yavb naaiq Jiaj yia maiq tu'q Zauj meib Bua kxvq waag Zamq weig zu'g kunq paamb ken uaq taub xij taaib . ninb maiq maaib hatg maad kunq yia .
43014031	mq paag yia ei Revg zavg tiaj Paaiq yia Eei waag weig pun luvb Diaq myenb hiuq tu'q yia Namq zavg tiaj . Jiad sin taaib . Bua mivb a'q .
43015001	“ yia se zyen a'vung Mei . yia Eei tia zruj kruj Wivj uaq taub .
43015002	haiq tiub Gwaab zyavb Jyenq yia yaag maiq zyavb pyruq nx , ninb Pitq kwavg . haiq tiub Gwaab zyavb pyruq , ninb cvj taaq Gxi tweiq pun zyavb pyruq kaub kitq .
43015003	yia Faauj Eei waag se Navq taaq Meib Gwaab tweiq nx , liug leid meib Bua Eei Hruq .
43015004	meib Bua xij zu'g zyavb Jyenq yia , yia zyrug zyavb Jyenq meib Bua . Meib Gwaab maiq zyavb Meib maag , Gwaab maiq haib zyavb pyruq . meib Bua yaag fib Navq Eei . sij kxvq maiq zyavb Jyenq yia nx , meib Bua maiq haib zyavb pyruq .
43015005	“ yia se a'vung Mei . meib Bua se a'vung Gwaab . haiq taub zyavb Jyenq yia , yia yaag zyavb Jyenq ninb , uaq taub zyrug zyavb pyruq kitq a'q . meib Bua leib Gxi yia nx , meib Bua maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg .
43015006	haiq taub maiq zyavb Jyenq yia , zyrug Navq tiub Meib Gwaab zu'g Pitq kwavg , Gaai mivb yaag zu'g Raud taaib tapq trub Raug puaq kwavg mivb .
43015007	sij kxvq meib Bua zyavb Jyenq yia , yia Eei waag yaag zyavb Jyenq meib Bua , meib Bua Toq haiq Euvg meib Bua zyrug tu'q uaq Euvg a'q .
43015008	sij kxvq meib Bua zyavb pyruq kitq , meib Bua zyrug pun myenb Taaib yia Eei tia . Navq naaig meib Bua zyrug penj yia Eei saib kxj .
43015009	“ zavg tiaj Navq haiq nx Namq yia , yia yaag Navq uaq nx Namq meib Bua . meib Bua xij zu'g Kauj wrnq yia Namq myenb Eei Hruq .
43015010	sij kxvq meib Bua ei Jyenq yia Eei livg zruj , yia zyrug zanb zang Namq meib Bua , Navq yia ei Jyenq yia Eei tia Eei livg zruj , ninb zyrug zanb zang Namq yia .
43015011	“ naaiq teij waag yia Buaj meib Bua , pun meib Bua haib tu'q yia Eei Fyenb yrub , yaag Fyenb yrub Tauj taaub .
43015012	yia Eei livg se Navq naaiq , laanb xij zu'g Namq laanb Navq yia Namq meib Bua uaq nx .
43015013	maiq maaib haiq taub haib Namq ninb Eei kxb yrud kaub Zamq Jiaj naaiq . se myenb weig ninb Eei kxb yrud siaq mcvg taig .
43015014	sij kxvq meib Bua ei Jyenq yia Buaj Eei waag zruj , meib Bua zyrug zruj yia Eei kxb yrud a'q .
43015015	yavb naaiq Jiaj , yia maiq heug meib Bua zruj pru , weig zu'g pru maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zyruq zruj haiq Euvg . ib zang yia heug meib Bua zruj yia Eei kxb yrud weig zu'g yia Eei tia Buaj haiq Euvg yia , yia Buaj Revg meib Bua mig a'q .
43015016	maiq zeid meib Bua kinq yia , se yia kinq meib Bua . yia Paaiq meib Bua Zwrtq mivb zyavb pyruq Zamq , tovb yetg liud maiq haib waaig Eei pyruq . Navq naaig meib Bua tevq yia Eei Buaj Tevj zavg tiaj Toq haiq Euvg , ninb zyrug Zeij uaq Euvg pun meib Bua .
43015017	naaiq se yia Eei livg , laanb xij zu'g Namq laanb .
43015018	“ sij kxvq paamb myenb Rxv meib Bua , meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq ninb Bua Rxv yia Daavg .
43015019	sij kxvq meib Bua kwei paamb ken , paamb myenb xij Namq meib Bua Navq Namq Zauj ninb Bua kwei paamb ken uaq teij . mq paag meib Bua maiq kwei paamb ken . yia kinq meib Bua Zwrtq taaib . weig naaiq paamb myenb Rxv meib Bua .
43015020	meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua naaiq teij waag , ‘ pru maiq kaub Lo zyruq . ’
43015021	weig meib Bua zruj yia Eei myenb , ninb Bua xij zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig pun meib Bua , laaij ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub .
43015022	“ sij kxvq yia maiq taaib Faauj Jiaj ninb Bua , ninb Bua maiq maaib zwid . mq paag ib zang , ninb Bua maiq maaib txvj Jaiq zwid a'q .
43015023	haiq taub Rxv yia , yaag Rxv yia Eei tia .
43015024	sij kxvq yia maiq taaib yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj zruj myenb maiq kcvb zruj Jiaj Eei sig nx , ninb Bua zyrug maiq maaib zwid . mq paag ib zang ninb Bua tu'q pwatg liud yia zruj Eei sig , ninb Bua Zxg Rxv yia , yaag Rxv yia Eei tia .
43015025	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txij Revg fiaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei leib latg naaiq teij waag , ‘ ninb Bua Rxv yia yaag maiq maaib kxnb pcvj . ’
43015026	“ yia xij Paaiq Tevj myenb uaq taub taaib lxd meib Bua . ninb yem zavg tiaj uaq taaib , tovb ninb pun myenb hiuq tu'q zyen leid uaq taub sivj livb . ninb taaib zyrug Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj .
43015027	meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj weig zu'g yem kxn Tauj ib zang meib Bua Zauj yia yem .
43016001	“ naaiq teij waag yia Buaj meib Bua weig pun meib Bua maiq Twij prug .
43016002	ninb Bua xij zung meib Bua Zwrtq wig txvb . zyavb hog xij Tauj , haiq taub taij meib Bua zyrug laaig zruj weig fub suj Tinb huvb .
43016003	ninb Bua xij Navq naaiq zruj weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q zavg tiaj , yaag maiq hiuq tu'q yia .
43016004	naaiq teij sig yia Buaj zyavj meib Bua . haiq zang pwavb naaiq teij sig meib Bua zyrug haib Javj tu'q yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua mig a'q . “ naaiq teij sig zinb Daavg yia maiq Buaj meib Bua , weig zu'g yia Zxg Zauj meib Bua yem .
43016005	mq paag ib zang yia xij zu'g Rwrnj Tauj Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub . meib Bua yaag maiq maaib haiq taub naaig yia , ‘ meib mivb haaij ? ’
43016006	weig zu'g yia kxvq naaiq teij sig Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua Eei Hruq za'kevb Raub haig a'q .
43016007	mq paag yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , yia Rwrnj mivb se weig pun meib Bua kaub tu'q lovj . sij kxvq yia maiq Rwrnj , Tevj myenb uaq taub maiq taaib lxd meib Bua . yia Rwrnj mivb , yia zyrug Paaiq ninb taaib lxd meib Bua .
43016008	“ Tevj myenb uaq taub taaib uaq zang , ninb xij piuj mevb pun paamb myenb hiuq tu'q ninb Bua txvg Tauj zwid Eei Jauq , Tauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq , cvj Tauj syemq zwid Eei Jauq .
43016009	Tauj zwid Eei Jauq , laaij ninb Bua maiq syenj Kauj yia .
43016010	Tauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq , weig zu'g yia mivb yia Eei tia uaq , meib Bua Ga'haaq maiq pwatg yia mig a'q .
43016011	Tauj syemq zwid Eei Jauq , weig zu'g kunq paamb ken uaq taub zuvq zu'g tivg zwid a'q .
43016012	“ yia Zxg maaib sig Zamq Eei Buaj meib Bua mq paag Raub heij meib Bua ib zang tiaq maiq tu'q .
43016013	pun myenb hiuq tu'q zyen leid uaq taub sivj livb taaib uaq zang , ninb xij pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q Revg zyen leid . ninb kxvq Eei waag maiq zeid ninb kanb Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq . ninb Kuvj xij kxvq tovb ninb tu'q haid Jiaj Eei waag Navq , yaag kxvq Ga'haaq hivq xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig Buaj meib Bua .
43016014	ninb xij pun myenb Taaib yia zyrug txb yia Eei waag taaib kxvq Buaj meib Bua .
43016015	zavg tiaj maaib Eei yetg zuvq se yia Eei . weig naaiq yia Zivj taaib kxvq sivj livb xij zx'q yia Buaj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Buaj meib Bua .
43016016	“ maiq navg laub meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia . Ga'haaq maiq navg laub meib Bua cvj tu'q pwatg yia . ”
43016017	maaib teij ninb Eei saib kxj , laanb naaig laanb , “ naaiq eij leid Navq haiq nx ? saib tiaj kxvq , ‘ maiq navg laub meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia . Ga'haaq maiq navg laub meib Bua cvj tu'q pwatg yia . ’ ninb yaag kxvq ‘ naaiq se weig zu'g yia Rwrnj zavg tiaj uaq . ’ ”
43016018	ninb Bua yaag naaig , “ ninb kxvq ‘ Ga'haaq maiq navg laub ’ uaq Jruj waag , eij leid Navq haiq nx ? yia Bua maiq hiuq tu'q ninb kxvq haiq Euvg . ”
43016019	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Bua xij naaig ninb , ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia kxvq , ‘ maiq navg laub meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia . Ga'haaq maiq navg laub meib Bua cvj tu'q pwatg yia . ’ tovb naaiq Jruj waag Eei eij leid meib Bua laanb naaig laanb maiq zeid ?
43016020	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua xij zu'g vwib vwid Eei Eyemq , mq paag paamb myenb Fyenb yrub , a'Neiq Eei . meib Bua xij Raub , mq paag meib Bua Eei yrub Raub xij Tiuq penj Fyenb yrub .
43016021	msia'q txn xij Dutq sin Eei zyavb hog Tauj , ninb Raub haig laaij xij zu'g tiaq mun . mq paag yuvd liud kub vwaad , ninb maiq Javj zu'g ninb tiaq mun , weig zu'g ninb tu'q taub kub vwaad yem luvb Diaq zyrug a'Neiq haig .
43016022	“ meib Bua yaag Navq naaiq nx . ib zang meib Bua Hruq Raub , mq paag yia cvj xij taaib lxd meib Bua , meib Bua zyrug Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g . naaiq Euvg xnb lx'g maiq maaib haiq taub haib zx'q tu'q Zwrtq .
43016023	Tauj uaq Nxi meib Bua maiq naaig haiq Euvg yia . yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua tevq yia Eei Buaj Tevj zavg tiaj Toq haiq Euvg , ninb zyrug pun uaq Euvg meib Bua .
43016024	Tauj ib zang meib Bua maiq kcvb tevq yia Eei Buaj Toq Jiaj haiq Euvg . kunq Toq maa'b ! meib Bua zuvq xij tu'q , zyrug Fyenb yrub Tauj taaub .
43016025	“ naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig yia lovg waab peiq Buaj meib Bua . zyavb hog xij Tauj , yia maiq lovg waab peiq a'q . yia Eei tia Eei Jauq yia xij kxvq mevb Buaj meib Bua .
43016026	Tauj uaq Nxi meib Bua xij tevq yia Eei Buaj Tevj zavg tiaj Toq haiq Euvg . yia maiq zeid kxvq yia Tevj meib Bua Toq . yia maiq zu'g Tevj Toq ,
43016027	weig zu'g zavg tiaj kanb Namq meib Bua . ninb Namq meib Bua weig zu'g meib Bua Namq yia yaag syenj yia yem zavg tiaj taaib .
43016028	yia yem zavg tiaj taaib pia'g paamb ken . ib zang yia xij leib paamb ken Rwrnj zavg tiaj uaq . ”
43016029	ninb Eei saib kxj Bua cvj kxvq Buaj ninb . “ ib zang saib tiaj kxvq mevb Eei Buaj yia Bua yaag maiq lovg waab peiq .
43016030	ib zang yia Bua hiuq tu'q meib hiuq Revg maang sig , zuvq maiq Qyemj zu'g haiq taub naaig haiq Euvg meib . weig naaiq yia Bua syenj meib yem Tinb huvb taaib . ”
43016031	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ meib Bua ib zang syenj a'q ?
43016032	zyavb hog xij Tauj , zuvq Tauj taaib a'q . meib Bua yetg zuvq xij pyauj Raanj Revg . kx'g myenb xij pyauj Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pyauq , Kuvj kwavg yia kanb Du'g laanb myenb yem Navq . mq paag maiq zeid za'kevb Kuvj yia kanb weig zu'g maaib zavg tiaj Zauj yia yem .
43016033	yia Navq naaiq Buaj meib Bua , xij meib Bua Zauj yia Jwavg mcvg zyavb zyrug tu'q pcvb xn . yem naaiq paamb ken meib Bua maaib Kruq naang , mq paag kunq puvj Hruq . yia hivb Jiaj paamb ken mig a'q . ”
43017001	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , ninb Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig luvb yaag kxvq ,
43017002	tia pun yia maaib hatg maad kunq maang myenb yia Zivj taaib haib pun tovb tia pun yia uaq teij tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
43017003	yetg liud Eei mcvg se tovb naaiq a'q . se ninb Bua hiuq tu'q meib , Du'g taub zyen Tinb huvb . yaag hiuq tu'q yia , ye-su ki-tug , tovb tia Paaiq taaib uaq taub .
43017004	yia yem naaiq paamb ken Taaib tia , weig zu'g yia zruj zyavj tia Paaiq yia zruj Eei kov .
43017005	aa tia aa'b ! Toq tia pun yia ib zang yem tia Eei Ra'Myen cvj Taaib yia zruj Lo , Navq zinb Daavg maiq kcvb zeij luvb zeij Dau tia Taaib yia zruj Lo uaq nx .
43017006	“ yem paamb ken , tia pun yia uaq teij myenb , yia pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q meib . ninb Bua mtaaib meib Eei myenb mq paag tia Jiu pun yia . ninb Bua yaag ei Jyenq tia Eei waag .
43017007	ib zang ninb Bua hiuq tu'q tovb tia Zeij pun yia Eei Euvb Euvg , yetg zuvq yem tia taaib .
43017008	tia Buaj yia uaq teij waag , yia yaag Buaj ninb Bua mig a'q . ninb Bua yaag lovb lovj Eei zipq . ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia za'kevb yem tia taaib yaag syenj tia kanb Paaiq yia taaib .
43017009	yia Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj . maiq zeid Tevj maang myenb tauj kauj . yia Tevj tia pun yia uaq teij myenb tauj kauj Navq , weig zu'g ninb Bua penj tia Eei .
43017010	yia maaib Eei yetg zuvq se tia Eei . tia maaib Eei yetg zuvq se yia Eei . yia yaag weig naaiq teij myenb tu'q Favb laavg .
43017011	ib zang yia xij Rwrnj tia uaq , maiq yem naaiq paamb ken a'q . mq paag naaiq teij myenb Zxg yem naaiq paamb ken . Zivb Revg Eei zavg tiaj aa'b ! Toq meib lovg meib maaib hatg maad Eei Buaj , tovb tia Zeij pun yia Eei Buaj , peu Jyenq ninb Bua , pun ninb Bua tovb tiug Hruq , Navq tia Zauj yia tovb tiug Hruq uaq nx .
43017012	yia Zxg Zauj ninb Bua yem Eei zyavb hog , yia lovg tia maaib hatg maad Eei Buaj , tovb tia pun yia uaq nxm Buaj , peu Jyenq ninb Bua . yia kruj ninb Bua , maiq pun haiq taub laaib zitg , Zwrtq liud tivg zyavj zu'g myetg uaq taub . ninb zu'g myetg weig pun sig Zwrtq taaib txij kivb sru Eei waag .
43017013	“ ib zang yia xij Rwrnj tia uaq , mq paag yia Zxg yem Jyenq naaiq paamb ken yia Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig pun naaiq teij myenb maaib yia Eei Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g .
43017014	yia zx'q tia Eei waag Jiu pun ninb Bua mig a'q . paamb myenb yaag Rxv ninb Bua weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq kwei paamb ken , Navq yia maiq kwei paamb ken nx .
43017015	yia maiq Toq tia txb ninb Bua Zwrtq paamb ken . mq paag yia Toq tia peu Jyenq ninb Bua , pun ninb Bua pyauj Dutq Ywav x'q uaq taub .
43017016	ninb Bua maiq kwei paamb ken , Navq yia maiq kwei paamb ken nx .
43017017	Toq tia lovg meib Eei zyen leid pun ninb Bua Zivb Revg taaib . meib Eei waag se zyen leid .
43017018	tia Navq haiq nx Paaiq yia taaib yem paamb ken , yia yaag Navq uaq nx Paaiq ninb Bua yem paamb ken .
43017019	yia weig ninb Bua zx'q yia kanb fuvj pun tia weig pun ninb Bua zyenb zyen penj tia Eei Zivb Revg myenb .
43017020	“ yia maiq taan Tevj naaiq teij tauj kauj Navq . yia yaag weig naaiq teij myenb xij zunb Eei tod syenj yia uaq teij yetg zuvq tauj kauj .
43017021	Toq tia pun ninb Bua tovb tiug Hruq . aa tia aa'b ! Toq pun ninb Bua Zauj Bua Jwavg mcvg zyavb , Navq tia Zauj yia Jwavg mcvg zyavb nx . paamb myenb zyrug syenj tia Paaiq yia taaib .
43017022	tia Zeij pun yia Eei Favb laavg yia Zeij pun ninb Bua mig a'q , weig pun ninb Bua tovb tiug Hruq , Navq tia Zauj yia tovb tiug Hruq nx .
43017023	yia Zauj ninb Bua Jwavg mcvg zyavb Navq tia Zauj yia Jwavg mcvg zyavb nx , weig xij pun ninb Bua yetg zuvq za'kevb tovb tiug Hruq Revg . luvb Diaq myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q tia Paaiq yia taaib , yaag hiuq tu'q tia Namq ninb Bua Navq tia Namq yia nx .
43017024	“ aa tia aa'b ! tia pun yia naaiq teij myenb , yia yem haaij yia yaag xij ninb Bua Zauj yia yem uaq , ninb Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg meib pun yia Eei Favb laavg , tovb maiq kcvb zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang meib Namq yia zyrug pun taaib Eei Favb laavg .
43017025	“ pcvb fim Eei tia aa'b ! paamb myenb maiq hiuq tu'q tia , mq paag yia hiuq Eei . syenj yia naaiq teij myenb yaag hiuq tu'q tia Paaiq yia taaib .
43017026	yia pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q meib , yaag xij pun ninb Bua hiuq Jyenq mivb weig pun ninb Bua Namq myenb Navq tia Namq yia nx , yaag pun yia Zauj ninb Bua Jwavg mcvg zyavb . ”
43018001	ye-su Navq naaiq nx tauj kauj liud , ninb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kitg-lon Do'q . yem uaq maaib nxm Wivj . ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj zyrug pia'g uaq nxm Wivj mig a'q .
43018002	xij maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg yaag hiuq tu'q uaq nxm txvj , weig zu'g ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj zanb zang kapq zunq uaq .
43018003	yu-Daatg zyrug txb teij lo-maa pcv Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb Paaiq taaib kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq teij pcv mivb uaq Wivj . naaiq teij pcv Nevj Jyenq tav , nanq Jyenq trub paaq , txb Jyenq ua'g king mivb .
43018004	ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb kanb xij zu'g pwavb Eei Euvb Euvg sig zyrug Zwrtq taaib naaig kaaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua taaib lxd haiq taub ? ”
43018005	ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua lxd naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su . ”
43018006	ye-su kxvq , “ tovb yia a'q . ” maaig ye-su uaq taub yu-Daatg yaag Zauj ninb Bua sruq Jyenq uaq . ye-su yetq kxvq , “ tovb yia a'q , ” zyrug hc'q ninb Bua laatg Raatg Bam Ga'haaq mcvj mivb .
43018007	ye-su cvj naaig Rung , “ meib Bua taaib lxd haiq taub ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua lxd naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su . ”
43018008	ye-su cvj tau , “ yia zuvq Buaj Rung meib Bua , se tovb yia a'q . Navq naaig , meib Bua lxd yia nx , xij zu'g puvj kan yia naaiq teij myenb mivb Gxi . ”
43018009	ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig pun zinb Daavg Zauj ninb Eei tia kxvq uaq teij waag Zwrtq taaib txij Revg . uaq zang ninb kxvq , “ aa tia aa'b ! meib pun yia naaiq teij myenb , yia maiq pun yetg taub laaib zitg . ”
43018010	si-mon pi-te pwij Jyenq zuv Ru'g zyrug pcv Zwrtq taaib Va'q tomb sai myenb Eei nrub , Pai zu'g nrub Eei Byaaug puv mnxmb Dutq mivb . uaq taub nrub Eei Buaj heug man-Katq .
43018011	ye-su Buaj pi-te , “ zx'q Ru'g Daauq Tapq Jyenq Paiq maa'b ! yia maiq zeid xij zu'g hopq yia Eei tia pun yia uaq nxm zaanq fai ? ”
43018012	uaq teij lo-maa pcv Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq Zauj kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcv zyrug zx'q ye-su Dob Jyenq
43018013	txb ninb mivb Tauj an-naatq Eei Ra'Myen Daavg . an-naatq zruj Kaa-yaa-faatq Eei ovb taa . uaq Havj Kaa-yaa-faatq zruj tomb sai myenb .
43018014	tovb naaiq taub Kaa-yaa-faatq zinb Daavg kxvq Buaj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb , “ pun yetg taub taig tiq yetg fivj myenb kaub lovj . ”
43018015	si-mon pi-te Zauj kanb taub saib kxj kan Jyenq ye-su mivb . naaiq taub saib kxj se tomb sai myenb zua'g Eei , ninb Zivj taaib tu'q Zauj ye-su pia'g tomb sai myenb Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad .
43018016	mq paag pi-te sruq ka'Eiag mcvj laatg kcvb . tovb tomb sai myenb zua'g uaq taub saib kxj zyrug Zwrtq mivb Tevj zuaq laatg kcvb uaq taub msia'q pru Toq pun pi-te Zauj Jyenq pia'g . uaq taub saib kxj zyrug txb pi-te pia'g .
43018017	zuaq laatg kcvb uaq taub msia'q pru kxvq Buaj pi-te , “ meib zruj taub uaq taub myenb Eei saib kxj maiq zeid ? ” pi-te tau , “ yia maiq zeid lx'g . ”
43018018	pru Bua Zauj kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq teij pcv zx'q Taanj puaq trud taaib sruq Jyenq uaq Raauj trud weig zu'g Jwavq haig . pi-te yaag Zauj ninb Bua sruq Jyenq uaq Raauj trud .
43018019	tomb sai myenb zaab naaig ye-su Tauj ninb Eei saib kxj Zauj ninb Faauj Eei leid .
43018020	ye-su tau , “ yia haiq zang kxvq waag , yia txv Jyenq maang myenb kxvq . yia haiq zang Faauj , yia zanb zang yem wig txvb fai zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq , tovb yiu-Tai myenb kapq zunq Eei txvj Faauj . yia maiq pivj Jyenq kxvq haiq Euvg .
43018021	meib weig haiq tiug naaig yia ? xij zu'g naaig haid yia kxvq Jiaj uaq teij myenb . yia kxvq haiq Euvg ninb Bua hiuq Eei . ”
43018022	ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq setq , maaib taub pcv sruq ka'Len zyrug Baij ninb yaag kxvq , “ meib Navq naaig tau tomb sai myenb ? ”
43018023	ye-su tau ninb , “ sij kxvq yia kxvq txvg haiq Euvg , meib kunq Buaj yem naaiq Eei myenb yia txvg haiq Euvg . mq paag sij kxvq yia kxvq tu'q hxpg nx , meib Baij yia zruj haiq Euvg ? ”
43018024	an-naatq cvj fuvj ninb mivb Kaa-yaa-faatq tomb sai myenb uaq . ninb Bua Zxg Dob Jyenq ninb .
43018025	si-mon pi-te Zxg sruq Jyenq uaq Raauj trud . yem uaq Raauj trud Eei myenb naaig ninb , “ meib yaag zruj uaq laanb myenb Eei saib kxj saa'b ? ” mq paag pi-te maiq Eyemg . ninb kxvq , “ yia maiq zeid lx'g . ”
43018026	maaib tomb sai myenb Eei yetg taub nrub , tovb pi-te Pai zu'g mnxmb Dutq uaq taub nrub Eei Zyenb Ze'q , zyrug kxvq , “ yia pwatg meib Zauj uaq laanb myenb yem uaq Wivj maiq zeid ? ”
43018027	pi-te cvj kxvq , “ yia kevb ! maiq zeid . ” uaq zang Jai zyrug Gaaij .
43018028	ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei , zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb txb ye-su Zwrtq Kaa-yaa-faatq Eei pyauq cvj fuvj mivb lo-maa zuvj Eei ting . uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb Riaj haib maaib wij zyrug maiq pia'g ting ka'Euad , weig pun ninb Bua haib tu'q Eang siaj mcvg zipq Eei Naavj .
43018029	weig naaiq , pi-laatq Zwrtq ka'Eiag taaib naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua txb haiq Euvg sig taaib koj naaiq laanb myenb ? ”
43018030	ninb Bua tau , “ sij kxvq ninb maiq zruj waaig sig , yia Bua maiq txb ninb taaib naaiq Jiu pun meib . ”
43018031	pi-laatq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ uaq Euvg , meib Bua ei meib Bua kanb Eei leid txb ninb mivb syemq maa'b ! ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua maiq maaib huvb livg tivg taij myenb . ”
43018032	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq weig pun zinb Daavg ye-su kxvq ninb xij zu'g Navq haiq nx taig uaq teij waag Zwrtq taaib txib tiug .
43018033	pi-laatq zyrug pia'g ka'Euad ting mivb yaag heug ye-su taaib zyrug naaig ninb , “ meib za'kevb zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb fai ? ”
43018034	ye-su tau , “ meib naaig Eei waag se meib kanb Namq Zwrtq taaib fai maaib myenb kxvq yia Eei Jaub lrug Buaj meib ? ”
43018035	pi-laatq tau , “ meib laaig yia zruj yiu-Tai myenb ? se tovb meib kanb uaq fivj myenb Zauj sai myenb pyeiq zx'q meib Jiu pun yia nyaa . uaq Euvg meib zruj txvg haiq Euvg ? ”
43018036	ye-su tau , “ yia kunq Eei kua'q maiq kwei naaiq paamb ken . sij kxvq yia Eei kua'q kwei naaiq paamb ken , yia Eei myenb zuvq xij Bx'q Jaaj , maiq pun zu'g Jiu pun yiu-Tai myenb . mq paag yia kunq Eei kua'q maiq zeid yem naaiq . ”
43018037	pi-laatq zyrug naaig ye-su , “ uaq Euvg , meib za'kevb zruj huvb ? ” ye-su tau , “ meib kanb kxvq yia zruj huvb . yia Zwrtq seij yem naaiq paamb ken se weig zyen leid zruj zxvb zevj . haiq taub kwei zyen leid zyrug mwavj yia Eei waag . ”
43018038	pi-laatq cvj naaig , “ zyen leid se haiq Euvg ? ” pi-laatq kxvq liud naaiq teij waag zyrug Zwrtq ka'Eiag Buaj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb , “ yia zaab maiq Zwrtq ninb maaib haiq Euvg zwid .
43018039	mq paag ei meib Bua Eei leib fivj , meib Bua Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq Eei zyavb hog , yia xij zu'g puvj taub zu'g wrnj lob Eei myenb pun meib Bua . meib Bua xij yia puvj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb fai ? ”
43018040	zwavj myenb cvj naub naug Eei kxvq , “ maiq tuvq puvj naaiq taub . puvj Baa-lapq-Batg Navq . ” Baa-lapq-Batg se zruj za'g pcv .
43019001	pi-laatq zyrug txb ye-su mivb pun pcv lovg pyaab pin Bx'q .
43019002	naaiq teij pcv lovg Fimq Zi'q nxm huvb nivq Tevj ninb Dovj Jyenq , cvj zx'q teij lwib Daaub lua'g Tevj ninb zu'q Jyenq .
43019003	cvj mivb fatq Eei kxvq , “ yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb aa'b ! zyavb tu'q maang fwij a'q . ” yaag Baij ninb Eei Myen .
43019004	pi-laatq cvj Zwrtq mivb Buaj zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb , “ mavg kaaj , yia txb ninb Zwrtq taaib Tauj meib Bua naaiq pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia zaab maiq Zwrtq ninb maaib haiq Euvg zwid . ”
43019005	ye-su zyrug Zwrtq taaib yaag Dovj Jyenq lovg Fimq Zi'q taaib Eei huvb nivq , zu'q Jyenq lwib Daaub lua'g . pi-laatq kxvq , “ naaig ! tovb naaiq laanb myenb a'q . ”
43019006	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcv yetq pwatg zyrug Kib Kuvj Kaatq Eei kxvq , “ txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj ! txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj maa'b ! ” pi-laatq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ uaq Euvg meib Bua kunq txb ninb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj a'q . yia zaab maiq Zwrtq ninb maaib haiq Euvg zwid . ”
43019007	yiu-Tai myenb tau , “ yia Bua maaib tiub livg . ei naaiq tiub livg ninb xij zu'g taig , weig zu'g ninb Zev ninb kanb zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn . ”
43019008	pi-laatq haid naaiq Jruj waag ninb kaub fatq kamb Riaj
43019009	zyrug cvj pia'g ting ka'Euad naaig ye-su , “ meib yem haaij taaib ? ” mq paag ye-su maiq tau .
43019010	pi-laatq zyrug kxvq , “ meib maiq Zauj yia kxvq waag fai ? meib maiq hiuq tu'q yia maaib livg puvj meib , yaag maaib livg zx'q meib tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj ? ”
43019011	ye-su tau , “ meib maaib livg tunj yia Eei sig se weig Tinb huvb pun meib Navq . weig naaiq , zx'q yia Jiu pun meib uaq taub , zwid kaub Lo Jiaj meib Eei . ”
43019012	yem naaig taaib pi-laatq yetg zei lxd Qavj puvj ye-su mq paag yiu-Tai myenb naug Jyenq kxvq , “ sij kxvq meib puvj naaiq laanb myenb meib maiq zeid lo-maa huvb , si-saa , Eei kxb yrud . haiq taub Zev ninb kanb zruj huvb , uaq taub zruj si-saa Eei winb wavq . ”
43019013	pi-laatq haid liud naaiq teij waag zyrug txb ye-su Zwrtq mivb yaag zweid Jyenq ninb syemq zwid Eei weig . uaq nxm txvj Eei Buaj heug “ la'pyeib timg . ” hipq-lu waag heug “ kapg-Baa-Taa . ”
43019014	uaq nxm Nxi se tovb Beng Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq Eei Nxi . luvb aaq lamb teij aanj a'q . pi-laatq kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb , “ mavg maa'b ! naaiq se meib Bua Eei huvb . ”
43019015	uaq teij myenb naug Jyenq kxvq , “ taij ninb kwavg a'q . taij ninb kwavg a'q . txb ninb mivb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj maa'b ! ” pi-laatq naaig , “ meib xij yia txb meib Bua Eei huvb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj ? ” sai myenb pyeiq kxvq , “ yia Bua maaib Du'g taub huvb Navq , se lo-maa huvb . ”
43019016	kxvq kau , pi-laatq zyrug zx'q ye-su Jiu pun ninb Bua txb mivb tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj mig a'q .
43019017	ninb Bua zyrug txb ye-su mivb , pun ninb Daam Jyenq ninb kanb Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj Zwrtq mivb Tauj nxm txvj , Buaj heug mGxvb Kx'q txvj . hipq-lu waag heug kon-ko-Taa .
43019018	Tauj uaq ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ye-su tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj . cvj maaib i taub myenb zu'g tiv yem uaq , yetg taub yem puv . ye-su yem Bu'Dovj .
43019019	pi-laatq yaag fiaq paaib pun myenb nctq Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj . paaib kxvq , “ naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su , yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb . ”
43019020	yiu-Tai myenb Zamq Eei to'g uaq nxm paaib Eei waag , weig zu'g ye-su zu'g tiv uaq nxm txvj leib ye-lu-saa-lem zivb maiq ko . paaib yaag fiaq Jyenq pua Euvg waag . maaib hipq-lu waag , laa-tin waag , Zauj kikg waag .
43019021	sai myenb pyeiq Toq pi-laatq , “ maiq tuvq fiaq ‘ yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb . ’ xij zu'g fiaq , ‘ naaiq taub kxvq , yia zruj yiu-Tai myenb Eei huvb . ’ ”
43019022	pi-laatq tau , “ yia Navq haiq nx fiaq , Zinb ninb Navq uaq nx a'q . ”
43019023	pcv zx'q ye-su tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj liud , ninb Bua zx'q ninb Eei lwib hruj pun Gxi zruj pyei kruq , yetg taub tu'q kruq . cvj maaib ka'Euad uaq yemg lwi , se Datq taaib penj yetg teij , maiq maaib lunb Eei vutq .
43019024	uaq teij pcv , laanb Buaj laanb , “ naaiq teij lwi , Bua maiq petq a'q x'g ? Druq mavg kaaj , haiq taub tu'q . ” naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txib tiug Revg kivb sru Eei waag . kivb sru kxvq , “ ninb Bua zx'q yia Eei lwib hruj pun Gxi , yaag zx'q yia Eei lwi Druq mavg haiq taub tu'q . ”
43019025	sruq Jyenq ye-su Eei zyepg Ravg Jaaj ka'Len maaib ye-su Eei maa , Zauj ninb Eei Riab maag , cvj maaib Ke-lo-patq Eei auq , maa-li-yaa , Zauj makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa .
43019026	ye-su pwatg ninb Eei maa yaag pwatg ninb Namq uaq taub saib kxj , i taub sruq nitq Jyenq uaq , ninb kxvq Buaj ninb Eei maa , “ aa maa aag , naaig taub se meib Eei txn . ”
43019027	ninb yaag kxvq Buaj uaq taub saib kxj , “ naaiq taub se meib Eei maa og . ” yem naaig taaib , uaq taub saib kxj zyrug txb ye-su Eei maa mivb Zauj ninb Jwavg pyauq yem .
43019028	hod taaib , ye-su hiuq tu'q Euvb Euvg zruj zyavj a'q . weig xij pun kivb sru Eei waag Zwrtq taaib txij Revg , ye-su zyrug kxvq , “ yia Jaav Gaatq haig . ”
43019029	maaib nxm pcvb zaavb pwavq a'vung tiub swi ton Jyenq uaq Dau . pcv zyrug zx'q laib Reib sxtq zyemj a'vung tiub swi taaib , cvj lovg hu-sopg pyaaq pa'q Jyenq Zunq faauj Tauj ye-su Eei Rwib .
43019030	ye-su hopq liud a'vung tiub swi ninb kxvq , “ Rxib zunb a'q lo'b ! ” kxvq setq , ye-su Eei mGxvq Naaiq Fiag zyrug tavj Qiaj mig a'q .
43019031	uaq Nxi se Beng Jiaj tivb kov Nxi Eei Nxi . zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb zyrug Toq pi-laatq pun pcv Bx'q tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj uaq teij myenb Eei zauj nauq , zx'q ninb Bua Eei sei Fiag . maiq xij lyrub sei yem zyepg Ravg Jaaj , weig zu'g ta'Eeig Nxi se yetg nxm lovg Jyenq Eei tivb kov Nxi .
43019032	pcv zyrug mivb Bx'q Zauj ye-su zu'g tiv uaq teij myenb Eei zauj nauq . Bx'q liud ta'yetq taub , cvj mivb Bx'q ta'Eeig taub Eei zauj nauq .
43019033	Tauj ye-su uaq , pwatg ninb tavj Qiaj mig a'q , zyrug maiq Bx'q ninb Eei zauj nauq a'q .
43019034	mq paag maaib taub pcv lovg Zav Ropq ye-su Eei la'Eaapq . lyemb zeib maaib Ryaamq Zauj uam lyrug Zwrtq taaib .
43019035	pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud uaq laanb myenb yaag zruj zxvb zevj . ninb Eei waag yaag za'kevb zyen Eei . ninb kanb yaag hiuq tu'q ninb kxvq tu'q zyen Eei weig pun meib Bua haib syenj .
43019036	ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj weig pun kivb sru Eei waag Zwrtq taaib txib tiug . maaib trug kivb sru kxvq , “ ninb Eei Buvq maiq zu'g nauq yetg tiub . ” “ ninb Bua xij mavg Jyenq ninb Bua Ropq uaq laanb myenb . ”
43019037	cvj maaib trug kivb sru kxvq , “ ninb Bua xij mavg Jyenq ninb Bua Ropq uaq laanb myenb . ”
43019038	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud , aa-li-maa-Tia muvq Eei yo-sepq Toq pi-laatq pun ninb zx'q ye-su Eei sei txb mivb . naaiq taub yo-sepq zruj ye-su Eei saib kxj mq paag ninb maiq txv zwavj zruj weig zu'g ninb kamb Riaj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb . pi-laatq Gxi Rwib , yo-sepq zyrug mivb zx'q ye-su Eei sei txb mivb mig a'q .
43019039	cvj maaib tovb zinb Daavg luvb mwrnd zang taaib lxd ye-su uaq taub ni-Ko-De-matq Zauj yo-sepq mivb . ninb txb Jyenq mu-yxg Zauj aa-lo Diab Daav , i Euvg kapq taaib leib maiq ko faab zyepg Mmd ki-lo Eei txvj .
43019040	ninb Bua i taub zx'q ye-su Eei sei yaag ei yiu-Tai myenb pyopq Janb taig Eei leid , zx'q la'maab Dia Zauj uaq teij Diab Daav peu Jyenq sei .
43019041	ye-su zu'g tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig uaq nxm txvj maaib nxm Wivj . Wivj ka'Euad maaib nxm syavb zruq , maiq kcvb zavj Jiaj yetg taub Janb taig .
43019042	weig zu'g uaq nxm Nxi se yiu-Tai myenb Beng Jiaj tivb kov Nxi Eei Nxi , naaiq nxm zruq yaag nitq uaq fatq Eei , ninb Bua zyrug txb ye-su Eei sei mivb zavj uaq .
43020001	uaq nxm leib paaij Eei ta'yetq Nxi Ryruq Eei , luvb zuvq maiq kcvb Fav , makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa mivb uaq zruq , pwatg Bc'g zrub kcvb uaq Kwaaiq la'pyeiq Twi Gxi mig a'q .
43020002	maa-li-yaa zyrug Tiuj mivb Buaj si-mon pi-te Zauj ye-su Namq uaq taub saib kxj , “ ninb Bua zx'q zyruq Zwrtq zruq mig a'q . yia Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Bua txb mivb an haaij . ”
43020003	pi-te Zauj uaq taub saib kxj zyrug mivb mavg .
43020004	ninb Bua i taub Tiuj mivb mq paag uaq taub saib kxj Tiuj kaub syepq , Tauj zruq Daavg .
43020005	ninb Do'q Fiag Zyepq mavg ka'Euad , pwatg la'maab Dia yem uaq mq paag ninb maiq pia'g .
43020006	si-mon pi-te Ga'haaq Tauj , pcv za'g Eei pia'g zruq ka'Euad . ninb pwatg la'maab Dia an Jyenq uaq ,
43020007	yaag pwatg peu mGxvq uaq Kwaaiq Dia Fung Jyenq kanb an nxm txvj , maiq Zauj la'maab Dia an .
43020008	Tauj Daavg uaq taub saib kxj yaag kan Jyenq pia'g . ninb pwatg liud yaag syenj .
43020009	( ninb Bua Zxg maiq mevb pc'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq ye-su xij zu'g taig mivb cvj navb taaib uaq teij waag . )
43020010	ninb Bua i taub saib kxj zyrug Rwrnj ninb Bua Eei pyauq mig a'q .
43020011	mq paag maa-li-yaa sruq Jyenq uaq zruq ka'Len Eyemq . Eyemq Jyenq cvj Do'q Fiag mavg zruq ka'Euad ,
43020012	pwatg i taub finb myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib pc'g zweid Jyenq zinb Daavg ye-su Eei sei yem uaq nxm txvj . maaib taub zweid mGxvq uaq puv , maaib taub zweid zauj uaq puv .
43020013	finb myenb naaig , “ txg aag , meib zruj haiq Euvg Eyemq ? ” ninb tau , “ ninb Bua zx'q yia Eei zyruq mivb mig a'q . txb mivb an haaij yia yaag maiq hiuq . ”
43020014	maa-li-yaa kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb Win Rwrnj pwatg ye-su sruq Jyenq uaq Dau , mq paag lyemb maiq hiuq tu'q se ye-su .
43020015	ye-su naaig , “ txg aa'b ! meib zruj haiq Euvg Eyemq ? meib lxd haiq taub ? ” maa-li-yaa laaig ye-su zruj kruj Wivj Eei myenb zyrug kxvq , “ kxj aa'b ! sij kxvq meib txb ninb mivb an haaij , Toq Buaj yia hiuq og . yia zyrug mivb zx'q ninb taaib . ”
43020016	ye-su kxvq , “ maa-li-yaa aag . ” maa-li-yaa zyrug Win mivb lovg hipq-lu waag kxvq , “ lapq-Bo-ni aa'b ! ” ( eij leid se “ saib tiaj aa'b . ” )
43020017	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ maiq tuvq nanq yia , weig zu'g yia maiq kcvb faauj zavg tiaj uaq . meib Rwrnj mivb Buaj yia Eei kxb yrud yia xij faauj yia Eei tia uaq . yia Eei tia yaag zruj meib Bua Eei tia , ninb yaag zruj yia Eei Tinb huvb yaag zruj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb . ”
43020018	makq-Daa-laa muvq Eei maa-li-yaa zyrug mivb Buaj saib kxj Bua , “ yia tu'q pwatg liud zyruq a'q . ” ninb cvj kxvq tovb ye-su Buaj ninb kxvq uaq teij waag pun saib kxj Bua mwavj .
43020019	uaq Nxi , se uaq nxm leib paaij Eei ta'yetq Nxi , Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog , saib kxj Bua kapq zunq uaq Qovj pyauq fxq Jyenq kcvb , weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb . ye-su taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Bu'Dovj Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua pcvb xn a'q og . ”
43020020	ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud , ninb pun ninb Eei puad Zauj ninb Eei la'Eaapq ninb Bua mavg . saib kxj Bua pwatg liud zyruq , ninb Bua zyrug za'kevb xnb lx'g haig a'q .
43020021	ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua pcvb xn a'q og . yia Eei tia Navq haiq nx Paaiq yia mivb , yia yaag Navq uaq nx Paaiq meib Bua mivb . ”
43020022	kxvq liud , ye-su huvj Jyenq ninb Bua pyomq Qiaj yaag kxvq , “ meib Bua zipq Jyenq sivj livb maa'b !
43020023	sij kxvq meib Bua kwavg haiq taub Eei zwid , uaq taub Eei zwid zyrug tu'q kwavg liud a'q . sij kxvq meib Bua maiq kwavg haiq taub Eei zwid , uaq taub Eei zwid zyrug maiq tu'q kwavg . ”
43020024	zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj maaib taub heug To-matq , tovb myenb heug suvb kub vwaad uaq taub . ye-su taaib uaq zang , To-matq maiq Zauj ninb Bua yem .
43020025	uaq teij saib kxj zyrug Buaj ninb , “ yia Bua tu'q pwatg liud zyruq a'q . ” To-matq tau ninb Bua , “ sij kxvq yia maiq tu'q pwatg ninb Eei puad Eei tivb hanb , yia Eei puab Do'q maiq tu'q Zo'q ninb Eei tivb Kwrtq , yia Eei puad yaag maiq tu'q Rwid la'Eaapq Eei Zavb Kwrtq , yia zuvq maiq syenj . ”
43020026	Ga'haaq yetg nxm leib paaij , saib kxj Bua cvj kapq zunq yem uaq nxm pyauq . To-matq yaag Zauj ninb Bua yem . kcvb yaag fxq Jyenq Eei . ye-su cvj taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Bu'Dovj yaag kxvq , “ meib Bua pcvb xn a'q og . ”
43020027	ye-su zyrug Buaj To-matq , “ lovg meib Eei puab Do'q Lua yia Eei puad mavg kaaj ! cvj suv meib Eei puad Rwid yia Eei la'Eaapq Eei Zavb Kwrtq maa'b ! maiq tuvq Luvb Lwrtq . kunq syenj a'q . ”
43020028	To-matq kxvq , “ yia Eei zyruq , yia Eei Tinb huvb aa'b ! ”
43020029	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ weig zu'g meib tu'q pwatg liud yia meib Zivj taaib syenj ? maiq pwatg Jiaj yia mq paag syenj yia uaq teij kevb xnb lx'g haig . ”
43020030	ye-su txv Jyenq saib kxj Bua cvj zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Zamq Eei , mq paag maiq tu'q fiaq Fiag naaiq pwrnq sru .
43020031	fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij se weig pun meib Bua syenj ye-su zruj ki-tug yaag zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn . weig zu'g meib Bua syenj ninb , meib Bua zyrug tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg .
43021001	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud , ye-su yem Ti-Be-lyetq Kxib txn Len cvj hing Rung pun ninb Eei saib kxj Bua pwatg . Jaub lrug se Navq naaiq .
43021002	maaib si-mon pi-te Zauj To-matq , tovb myenb heug suvb kub vwaad uaq taub , maaib yem kaa-li-li scvq , Kaa-naa laavd uaq taub naa-Taa-naa-en , Zauj sej-Be-Di Eei i taub txn , cvj kanb maaib i taub saib kxj Zauj Jyenq yem uaq .
43021003	si-mon pi-te kxvq Buaj uaq teij , “ yia mivb pxvd Byaud . ” uaq teij kxvq , “ yia Bua Zauj meib mivb og . ” ninb Bua zyrug pia'g Ravq mivb a'q . mq paag ninb Bua zyavb mwrnd pxvd yaag pxvd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg .
43021004	zruj kau , luvb Byrub Byrud Fav Eei zyavb hog , ye-su sruq Jyenq uaq Kxib Len mq paag saib kxj Bua zia'q maiq tu'q se ye-su .
43021005	ye-su zyrug naaig ninb Bua , “ kxb yrud aag , tu'q teij Byaud Eei fai ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ maiq tu'q og . ”
43021006	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ pxvd muvd Fiag Byaaug mcvj Ravb Len zyrug tu'q Byaud a'q . ” ninb Bua zyrug pxvd muvd Fiag , tu'q Byaud Zamq haig , syru zuvq maiq tovd faauj Ravq .
43021007	tovb ye-su Namq uaq taub saib kxj kxvq Buaj pi-te . “ oq , naaig zyruq nyaa ! ” si-mon pi-te yetq haid kxvq se zyruq , ninb zyrug zx'q ka'Eiag uaq yemg lwi pwij Jyenq , ( weig zu'g ninb Jaiq Gxi lwi mig a'q ) zyrug piu Fiag uam .
43021008	cvj maaib uaq teij saib kxj Rcv Jyenq Ravq Tx Jyenq maaib Byaud pwavq Eei muvd Zwrtq uamb Len , weig zu'g leib uaq Byenj maiq navg ko . Riaj maaib Mmd zyepg zamb Eei txvj mq pei .
43021009	Zwrtq Ravq taaib faauj Byenj pwatg maaib kwaaj Taanj Eei trud . maaib Byaud zi'q Jyenq uaq yaag maaib Fuaq .
43021010	ye-su Buaj ninb Bua , “ zx'q teij a'Jav meib Bua pxvd Eei Byaud taaib og . ”
43021011	pi-te zyrug pia'g Ravq , Tx muvd faauj Byenj taaib . tomb Byaud pwavq muvd ka'Euad , yetg zuvq maaib yetg pc'q Mmd zyepg faam taub . Byaud Dovg naaig Zamq mq paag muvd yaag maiq huq .
43021012	ye-su Buaj saib kxj Bua , “ taaib Eang luvb Dxm a'q . ” ninb Bua maiq maaib yetg taub kaamq naaig , “ meib tovb haiq taub ? ” weig zu'g ninb Bua hiuq tu'q se tovb zyruq .
43021013	ye-su zyrug zx'q Fuaq taaib pun ninb Bua , yaag fib Navq Eei zx'q Byaud taaib pun ninb Bua Eang .
43021014	naaiq Rung se tovb ye-su taig mivb cvj navb taaib hing Zwrtq pun saib kxj Bua pwatg Eei ta'faam Rung .
43021015	Eang liud luvb Dxm , ye-su kxvq Buaj si-mon pi-te , “ yo-han Eei txn , si-mon aa'b ! meib za'kevb Namq yia kaub Zamq naaiq teij fai ? ” pi-te tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! yia Namq Eei lx'g . meib hiuq tu'q yia Namq meib Eei . ” ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib yuvd yia Eei pa'ki yuvb txn og . ”
43021016	ye-su cvj naaig ta'Eeig Rung , “ yo-han Eei txn , si-mon , aa'b ! meib za'kevb Namq yia Eei fai ? ” si-mon tau , “ zyruq aa'b ! Namq Eei lx'g . meib hiuq tu'q yia Namq meib Eei . ” ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ kruj lovj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb og . ”
43021017	ye-su cvj naaig ta'faam Rung , “ yo-han Eei txn , si-mon aa'b ! meib Namq yia Eei fai ? ” ye-su naaig Tauj ta'faam Rung , “ meib Namq yia Eei fai ? ” pi-te zyrug haid Hruq mun haig . ninb kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib hiuq tu'q maang sig . meib hiuq tu'q yia Namq meib Eei . ” ye-su Buaj ninb , “ kruj lovj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb og .
43021018	yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib , meib lunj uaq zang meib kanb zxv sin sai hrub Laav sweib eij pia'g Zwrtq . Tauj meib koj taaib , meib xij zu'g suv puad pun myenb Tevj meib sai hrub Laav txb meib mivb tovb meib maiq xij mivb Eei txvj . ”
43021019	ye-su Navq naaig kxvq weig pun Ziv pi-te xij Navq haiq nx taig pun myenb Taaib Tinb huvb . ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj pi-te , “ meib kan yia og . ”
43021020	pi-te Win Rwrnj pwatg ye-su Namq uaq taub saib kxj kan Jyenq ninb Bua taaib . naaiq taub saib kxj se tovb ninb Bua Eang uaq tonj Naavj Eei zyavb hog Dev mivb fatq naaig ye-su , “ zyruq aag , xij maaig meib uaq taub se haiq taub ? ”
43021021	pi-te pwatg ninb zyrug naaig ye-su , “ zyruq aa'b ! naaiq taub ni ? xij Navq haiq nx ? ”
43021022	ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb , “ sij kxvq yia pun ninb yem Tauj yia cvj taaib uaq zang , naaiq maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g meib ? meib kunq kan yia maa'b ! ”
43021023	weig naaiq maaib waag siv pwavq kan ye-su Eei kxb muag , ninb Bua zyrug laaig naaiq taub saib kxj maiq taig , mq paag ye-su maiq zeid kxvq ninb maiq taig . ninb kxvq , “ sij kxvq yia pun ninb yem Tauj yia taaib uaq zang , naaiq maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g meib ? ”
43021024	naaiq taub saib kxj zruj zxvb zevj kxvq Tauj naaiq teij sig . yaag tovb naaiq taub saib kxj fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij sig . yia Bua yaag hiuq tu'q ninb zruj Eei zxvb zevj se zyen Eei .
43021025	ye-su zruj Eei sig Zxg maaib Zamq haig . sij kxvq Euvb Euvg fiaq tu'q Revg , yia Namq taaib paamb ken zuvq maiq maaib txvj tapq tu'q Fiag naaiq teij sru .
44001001	zyen xij Eei Te-o-fi-latq aag , yia fiaq ta'yetq pwrnq sru kxvq ye-su zruj Eei kov Zauj Faauj Eei waag yem ninb Jiad kxn zruj kov
44001002	Tauj Tinb huvb txb ninb faauj Tinb txvb . maiq kcvb faauj Tinb txvb uaq zang , ninb lovg sivj livb Eei Qa'q Paaiq zyavj waag pun ninb kinq taaib Eei kovb zob .
44001003	ye-su zu'g hxig liud mcvg , Ga'haaq feij zyepg Nxi ka'Euad ninb hing Zwrtq Zamb Rung pun ninb Eei kovb zob Bua pwatg , yaag zruj ziaj Euvg pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q tivg ninb za'kevb zyavb Jyenq . ninb yaag Zauj ninb Bua kxvq Tauj Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Jaub lrug .
44001004	ye-su Zauj kovb zob Bua yem uaq zang , ninb hatg kovb zob Bua , “ maiq tuvq Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . zuaq Jyenq zipq yia Eei tia lcvd pun Eei zivb Eeig , tovb yia Buaj meib Bua uaq .
44001005	yo-han lovg uam Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid mq paag maiq maaib Bu'ziaj Nxi Tinb huvb xij lovg sivj livb Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid . ”
44001006	kapq zunq uaq zang , kovb zob Bua naaig kaaj , “ zyruq aa'b ! ib zang Tauj zyavb hog meib xij lyepg i-saa-laa-en kua'q Jiad taaib Navq lod uaq nx fai ? ”
44001007	ye-su tau ninb Bua , “ zavg tiaj lovg ninb kanb Eei hatg maad tivg taaib Eei zyavb hog Zauj Eutg zeiq haiq zang Tauj maiq zeid meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq .
44001008	mq paag sivj livb Fiag taaib yem meib Bua Eei sin uaq zang , meib Bua zyrug tu'q sivj livb Eei Qa'q yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , mivb kxmj yu-Dia Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq , cvj mivb Jomg luvb Diaq Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj . ”
44001009	ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Myen Tinb huvb txb ninb faauj luvb mig a'q . kovb zob Bua mavg Jyenq ninb faauj uaq zang , maaib txq Bwrnj taaib Txvq Jyenq ye-su , ninb Bua zyav naaig maiq pwatg mig a'q .
44001010	kovb zob Bua Zxg yem uaq nu'g nu'q Eei mavg Jyenq luvb , lyemb zeib maaib i taub myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib pc'g sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ka'Len kxvq ,
44001011	“ kaa-li-li myenb aa'b ! meib Bua zruj haiq Euvg sruq naaiq Qa'q mavg kub vwaaig luvb ? leib Gxi meib Bua naaiq taub ye-su , Tinb huvb txb faauj luvb mig a'q . meib Bua pwatg ninb Navq haiq nx mivb , ninb cvj xij Navq uaq nx taaib . ”
44001012	kovb zob Bua yem ka'lanq Bov Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , se leib maiq ko yetg ki-lo Jauq .
44001013	Tauj zivb ninb Bua faauj kub vwaaig ninb Bua tivb uaq Ravb pyauq . taaib zunq uaq zang maaib pi-te , yo-han , yaa-kxpg , an-Daa-lu , fi-lipq , To-matq , Baa-To-lo-miu , matq-Taai , an-fe-atg Eei txn , yaa-kxpg , Namq kua'q zavg uaq taub si-mon , Zauj yaa-kxpg Eei txn , yu-Daatg .
44001014	cvj maaib teij msia'q txn Zauj ye-su Eei maa , maa-li-yaa , Zauj ye-su Eei yrud Bua . ninb Bua lomb Rxib yem uaq tovb Hruq kuq Jyenq tauj kauj .

44001018	( naaiq taub yu-Daatg lovg ninb zruj waaig sig tu'q taaib Eei Eaanb maaid Rov Dau . ninb yem uaq Rov Dau Dxpg , xpq zu'g ka'sia Baaij , Jaavb pctq Zwrtq Revg .

44001020	pi-te cvj kxvq , “ sivj Ruv sru yaag fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ Toq pun ninb yem Eei txvj penj Daub Waav , yaag maiq tuvq pun haiq taub yem uaq nxm txvj . ’ ‘ pun ta'Eeig taub Ripg ninb Eei kov . ’
44001021	Navq naaiq xij zu'g cvj kinq taub myenb taaib Zauj Bua Jwavg Jyenq zruj zyruq ye-su navb taaib Eei zxvb zevj . naaiq taub xij zu'g zruj Bua Eei kwanb Eei myenb , tovb kan zyruq ye-su pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq , yem yo-han Tevj Jiaj uam Eei leid Tauj ye-su leib Gxi Bua , Tinb huvb txb faauj Tinb txvb . ” Navq naaiq xij zu'g cvj kinq taub myenb taaib Zauj Bua Jwavg Jyenq zruj zyruq ye-su navb taaib Eei zxvb zevj . naaiq taub xij zu'g zruj Bua Eei kwanb Eei myenb , tovb kan zyruq ye-su pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq , yem yo-han Tevj Jiaj uam Eei leid Tauj ye-su leib Gxi Bua , Tinb huvb txb faauj Tinb txvb . ”

44002023	Tinb huvb ei ninb kanb Eei za'eij Jaab Daavg tivg zyavj pun ye-su zu'g zx'q Jiu pun meib Bua . meib Bua yaag pun x'q myenb zx'q ninb tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj taij ninb .

44002026	weig naaiq yia a'Neiq haig , yaag kxvq Zwrtq Fyenb yrub Eei waag . yia Eei sin xij tu'q zyavb Jyenq maaib lamb Namq txvj ,
44002027	weig zu'g meib maiq kwavg yia Eei livb wrnb yem yemb ken , yaag maiq pun meib Eei Zivb Revg pru Eei sei huq .
44002028	meib pun yia hiuq tu'q zyavb mcvg Eei Jauq . meib Zauj yia yem zyrug pun yia Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g Tauj taaub . ’
44002029	“ zwavj kxb yrud aa'b ! yia xij puvj laavg Eei kxvq Tauj Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q , Daa-witq huvb , Eei Jaub lrug . ninb kwei seij yaag pyopq Jyenq . ninb Eei zruq Zxg yem Bua naaiq Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi .
44002030	ninb zruj taub trug waag myenb yaag hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Zauj ninb lcvd vcvg waag xij pun taub ninb Eei zeib fun zruj huvb Navq Daa-witq kanb zruj huvb nx .

44002032	tovb naaiq taub ye-su taig mivb , Tinb huvb pun ninb cvj navb taaib . yia Bua yetg zuvq hiuq tu'q ninb za'kevb navb taaib zyrug weig naaiq teij sig zruj zxvb zevj .

44002034	maiq zeid Daa-witq kanb faauj Tinb txvb mq paag ninb kxvq , ‘ zyruq kxvq Buaj yia Eei zyruq , zweid Jyenq yia Eei Byaaug mcvj puv ,

44003001	maaib Nxi Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog , se txij zu'g mivb tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog , pi-te Zauj yo-han mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq .
