44003007	pi-te zyrug nanq Jyenq uaq laanb myenb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad , Ken ninb Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq . zaub penq Zauj zaub mweig lyemb zeib henq taaib maaib Qa'q .
44003008	ninb piu Jiad sin taaib Jiad kxn yavb Jauq a'q . ninb zyrug kan pi-te Zauj yo-han pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq , yavb Jyenq mivb , piu Jyenq mivb , Zev Jyenq Tinb huvb mivb .
44003009	zwavj myenb pwatg ninb yavb Jyenq Jauq Zev Tinb huvb ,
44003010	ninb Bua zia'q tu'q se tovb aab log yem kcvb Rweig Eei kcvb Daavg Toq Eaanb uaq laanb myenb . zwavj myenb za'kevb ! Bua'g hxvb haig , Namq maiq mevb pc'g naaiq laanb myenb Eei Jaub lrug .
44003011	naaiq laanb myenb Zxg nanq Jyenq pi-te Zauj yo-han uaq zang , zwavj myenb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Tiuj Jyenq mivb lxd ninb Bua yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Eiag uaq Qovj , Buaj heug “ saa-lo-mxn Eei pivj laavb txvj . ”
44003012	pi-te pwatg zwavj myenb Navq naaiq nx taaib mavg zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug Bua'g hxvb naaiq teij sig ? meib Bua Qa'q mavg yia Bua , laaig yia Bua lovg yia Bua kanb Eei Qa'q fai yia Bua kan tu'q lovj Tinb huvb Zivj taaib haib pun naaiq laanb myenb yavb Jauq fai ?
44003013	maiq zeid . se apg-laa-ham , i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb , yaag zruj Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb uaq taub , pun ninb Eei pru , ye-su , tu'q Favb laavg . meib Bua yaag zx'q ninb Jiu pun myenb taij . pi-laatq tivg Hruq puvj ye-su mq paag meib Bua yem pi-laatq Eei Ra'Myen vcvg Jyenq .
44003014	meib Bua Gemb maiq lovg Zivb Revg , pcvb fim Eei uaq taub . taauj Rwrnj Toq pi-laatq puvj taij myenb uaq taub pun meib Bua .
44003015	meib Bua taij pun myenb maaib zyavb mcvg uaq taub , mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb cvj navb taaib . yia Bua zyrug weig naaiq teij sig zruj zxvb zevj .
44003016	se ninb Eei Buaj Eei Qa'q pun naaiq laanb zauj Bai Eei myenb henq taaib . meib Bua pwatg Eei Zauj hiuq Eei yem naaiq laanb myenb Zwrtq taaib Eei sig se weig syenj ye-su Eei Buaj . weig syenj Kauj ye-su naaiq laanb myenb Zivj taaib lovj Revg , Navq meib Bua yetg zuvq pwatg Jyenq nx .
44003017	“ zwavj kxb yrud aa'b ! yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei Jyen zruj pun ye-su se laaij meib Bua maiq hiuq Zivj taaib zruj .
44003018	zinb Daavg Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb kxvq ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq . ib zang ninb lovg naaiq Euvg za'eij pun naaiq teij waag Zwrtq taaib zyen Eei .
44003019	weig naaiq , meib Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq Rwrnj taaib lxd Tinb huvb , pun ninb sxtq kwavg meib Bua Eei zwid . zyruq zyrug pun meib Bua Eei Hruq maaib zyavb hog Eyemd , fivq Jiad taaib ,
44003020	yaag xij Paaiq ye-su taaib , tovb ninb weig meib Bua kinq zyavj zruj ki-tug , uaq taub .
44003021	ki-tug zuvq xij zu'g yem Tinb txvb zuaq Tauj Tinb huvb lyepg Euvb Euvg syav Eei zyavb hog , Navq lob Nxi Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei Zivb Revg trug waag myenb trug taaib kxvq nx .
44003022	mo-se kxvq , ‘ zyruq , meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb , xij Paaiq taub trug waag myenb Navq yia nx . ninb yaag zruj taub meib Bua kanb Eei myenb . ninb Buaj haiq Euvg meib Bua , meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj Revg ninb Eei waag .
44003023	haiq taub maiq mwavj ninb Eei waag zyrug zu'g Pai kwavg , myetg Revg , maiq pun Zauj Tinb huvb Eei myenb yem a'q . ’
44003024	“ zwavj trug waag myenb yem saa-mu-en Fiag taaib , ta'faanb trug Tinb huvb Eei waag uaq teij , kxvq Tauj naaiq teij Nxib Eia'g Zwrtq taaib Eei sig .
44003025	Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei trug waag myenb trug taaib Eei waag Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij lcvd Jiaj Eei vcvg waag , meib Bua yaag tu'q Jwavg Jyenq Ripg , Navq ninb kxvq Buaj apg-laa-ham , ‘ yia xij lovg meib Eei zeib fun Zeij fu'q pun luvb Diaq maang fivj . ’
44003026	Tinb huvb pun ninb Eei pru navb taaib , ninb Paaiq taaib lxd meib Bua Daavg , Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua , pun meib Bua taub taub kxiq Hruq kwavg meib Bua zruj waaig Eei Jauq . ”
44004001	pi-te Zauj yo-han Zauj zwavj myenb kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang , maaib teij sai myenb Zauj kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj teij saa-Du-sij myenb taaib lxd ninb Bua .
44004002	ninb Bua maiq hxpg Hruq laaij kovb zob Bua Faauj zwavj myenb ye-su taig cvj navb taaib , pun Ziv myenb taig mq paag haib navb taaib .
44004003	ninb Bua zyrug zx'q naaiq teij i taub wrnj Jyenq lob Tauj ta'Eeig Nxi , weig zu'g uaq zang Mwavj a'q .
44004004	mq paag mwavj liud tod maaib myenb Jaa syenj Zamq Eei . lyemb lod Eei maaib mJavg txn leib maiq ko pyaa Zin taub .
44004005	ta'Eeig Nxi zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zauj myenb koj Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv kapq zunq yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
44004006	cvj maaib an-naatq tomb sai myenb Zauj Kaa-yaa-faatq , yo-han , aa-lekq-saan-De Zauj Jyenq tomb sai myenb Eei ziaj taub Zyenb Ze'q .
44004007	ninb Bua heug myenb txb pi-te Zauj yo-han taaib sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen naaig kaaj , “ meib Bua lovg haiq Euvg livg fai tevq haiq taub Eei Buaj zruj naaiq teij sig ? ”
44004008	pi-te tu'q sivj livb pwavq Hruq zyrug tau ninb Bua . ninb kxvq , “ yetg zwavj zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zauj myenb koj aa'b !
44004009	sij kxvq meib Bua ib Nxi naaig Tauj zruj naaiq teij Kuq sig pun naaiq taub zauj Bai Eei myenb yaag naaig Tauj ninb Navq haiq nx zxg lovj ,
44004010	meib Bua zwavj myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq myenb xij zu'g hiuq , ib zang sruq Jyenq meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen naaiq taub myenb zauj lovj Revg se weig naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj , tovb meib Bua tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig mq paag Tinb huvb pun navb taaib .
44004011	ye-su se tovb kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ meib Bua komq pyauq zavg Gemb Zwrtq uaq nxm la'pyeiq , zuvq penj an pyaub kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm . ’
44004012	“ Zwrtq liud ye-su , maiq maaib haiq taub haib pun myenb tu'q Fruj , weig zu'g yem luvb Diaq maang myenb Bu'Dovj , Tinb huvb maiq Zeij kanb nxm Buaj , pun Bua xij zu'g Kauj tu'q Fruj . ”
44004013	uaq teij zruj Lo Eei myenb Zauj myenb koj pwatg pi-te Zauj yo-han puvj tu'q laavg haig , tau ninb Bua , yaag hiuq tu'q naaiq teij i laanb myenb maiq tu'q Kauq Jiaj srub Ravg , Kuvj zruj Prub Tov myenb Navq , ninb Bua Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug Javj zu'g naaiq teij i laanb myenb kan Jiaj ye-su .
44004014	ninb Bua yaag pwatg zxg lovj uaq laanb myenb sruq Jyenq pi-te Zauj yo-han Eei ka'Len , zyav naaig maiq maaib waag kxvq a'q .
44004015	ninb Bua heug pi-te Bua Zwrtq kunq sig wig . ninb Bua kanb yem uaq Zaavb laavb
44004016	kxvq , “ Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj pun naaiq teij myenb ni ? yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taub taub hiuq tu'q tovb naaiq teij i laanb zruj naaiq teij Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog . Bua kanb maiq haib vcvg kxvq maiq zeid .
44004017	Bua xij zu'g hatg Jyenq maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua tevq ye-su Eei Buaj Zauj haiq taub kxvq haiq Euvg , weig pun naaiq teij sig maiq haib zunb Javq mivb . ”
44004018	Zaavb laavb paag , ninb Bua cvj heug pi-te Zauj yo-han pia'g taaib , hatg ninb Bua Zinb maang maiq tuvq tevq ye-su Eei Buaj kxvq fai Faauj haiq Euvg .
44004019	mq paag pi-te Zauj yo-han tau ninb Bua , “ meib Bua Namq mavg kaaj , ei Tinb huvb mavg , yia Bua mwavj meib Bua kaub hxpg mwavj Tinb huvb fai ?
44004020	yia Bua pwatg Jiaj , haid Jiaj Eei sig , yia Bua maiq haib kwavg maiq kxvq . ”
44004021	kunq sig myenb Namq maiq Tov Navq haiq nx haib tivg pi-te Bua Eei zwid , weig zu'g pwatg zwavj myenb weig naaiq Kav sig Zev Tinb huvb . Navq naaig , kunq sig myenb Jaa hatg Niaq Eei liud , zyrug puvj ninb Bua a'q .
44004022	tovb tu'q Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog zxg lovj uaq laanb myenb Eei Havb Jeiq tu'q feij zyepg levb Havj .
44004023	kunq sig myenb puvj pi-te Zauj yo-han Zwrtq uaq zang , pi-te Bua pcv za'g Eei Rwrnj ninb Bua kanb uaq kwanb myenb , zx'q sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Bua kxvq Eei waag Buaj Revg ninb Bua .
44004024	haid liud naaiq teij waag , uaq teij myenb lomb Rxib hxpg fim tovb eij Zwrtq Qiaj tauj kauj Buaj Tinb huvb , “ zyruq aa'b ! meib zeij luvb zeij Dau zeij Kxiq , yaag zeij yem naaiq teij ka'Euad Eei maang mwrtg .
44004025	meib lovg sivj livb pun yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij , meib Eei pru , Daa-witq , trug waag kxvq , ‘ maang fivj Janj weig haiq tiug Qiaj Jiad ? ninb Bua weig haiq tiug taaq Zwrtq maiq lamb lovg Eei za'eij ?
44004026	paamb ken Eei huvb Beng zyavj , tomb Jyen yaag kapq zunq tovb Hruq Zauj zyruq
44004027	“ za'kevb maaib he-lotq huvb Zauj pxn-Ti-atg pi-laatq yem naaiq nxm zivb Zauj Jyenq Janj , Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb kapq zunq taaib tovb Hruq vcvg Jyenq meib Eei Zivb Revg pru , ye-su , tovb meib Paaiq zruj ki-tug uaq taub .
44004028	ninb Bua zruj Euvb Euvg ei meib kanb Eei hatg maad Zauj ei meib Eei eij Jaab Daavg tivg zyavj xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig .
44004029	zyruq aa'b ! Toq meib ib zang Javj Jyenq ninb Bua kxvq hc'q yia Bua uaq teij waag , yaag pun yia Bua , meib Eei pru , puvj laavg Eei kxvq meib Eei tod .
44004030	“ Toq zyruq suv puad Zwrtq taaib zxg pcvg cvj pun yia Bua Kauj meib Eei Zivb Revg pru , ye-su , Eei Buaj zruj Zwrtq Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Zauj Namq maiq mevb pc'g Eei sig . ”
44004031	tauj kauj paag , tovb ninb Bua kapq zunq uaq nxm txvj tovd Revg . taub taub tu'q sivj livb pwavq Hruq zyrug puvj laavg Eei kxvq Zwrtq Tinb huvb Eei waag .
44004032	zwavj syenj ye-su Eei myenb hxpg fim tovb eij . maiq maaib haiq taub kxvq haiq Euvg penj ninb kanb Eei si'g Jeiq ka'naaiq . yetg zuvq penj tomb zwavj Eei , Jwavg Jyenq lovg .
44004033	kovb zob Bua maaib tomb Qa'q zruj zxvb zevj kxvq zyruq ye-su navb taaib Eei Jaub lrug . Tinb huvb yaag Zamb Zamq Eei Zeij fu'q pun ninb Bua mrud laanb myenb .
44004034	yem naaiq kwanb myenb maiq maaib haiq taub Zaa haiq Euvg weig zu'g haiq taub maaib livb teig , maaib pyauq , zyrug maaig mivb txb Eaanb taaib Jiu pun kovb zob Bua .
44004035	kovb zob Bua zyrug ei kx'g myenb Qyemj lovg Eei pun Gxi kx'g myenb .
44004036	maaib taub le-wi myenb , Buaj heug yo-sepq , yem sai-patg Kxib Rru Zwrtq seij . kovb zob Bua cvj Zwrtq nxm Buaj heug Baa-naa-Batg . eij leid se “ xn Hruq Eei txn . ”
44004037	ninb maaig Rov ninb Eei Deig , txb Eaanb taaib Jiu pun kovb zob Bua .
44005001	cvj maaib taub myenb , Buaj heug aa-naa-nia , Zauj ninb Eei auq , sapg-fi-laa , maaig Rov ninb Bua Eei Dau .
44005002	aa-naa-nia Repq Zwrtq teij maaig Dau Eei Eaanb lyrub ninb kanb lovg . ninb Eei auq yaag hiuq Eei . ninb cvj txb teij mivb Jiu pun kovb zob Bua .
44005003	pi-te kxvq , “ aa-naa-nia aa'b ! meib zruj haiq Euvg pun saa-taan kunq meib , pun meib maaib Hruq kxvb pc'g Duaq sivj livb zyrug Repq Zwrtq teij maaig Dau Eei Eaanb ?
44005004	maiq kcvb maaig se meib Eei Dau maiq zeid ? naaiq teij Dau maaig liud se meib kanb Eei Eaanb maiq zeid ? haiq Euvg pun meib Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq Navq naaiq nx zruj ? meib maiq zeid kxvb pc'g Duaq myenb , meib kxvb pc'g Duaq Tinb huvb . ”
44005005	aa-naa-nia haid naaiq teij waag , ninb lyemb zeib Kiv Fiag Dau taig mig a'q . haiq taub haid naaiq teij sig za'kevb ! kamb Riaj haig .
44005006	yem uaq Eei myenb lunj myenb tovd sin zx'q Diab tamb , tamb Jyenq aa-naa-nia Eei sei , kcv mivb pyopq .
44005007	cvj Gc'q aaq lamb teij pua nxm zyavb hog , ninb Eei auq yaag pia'g taaib . ninb lyemb maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Zwrtq .
44005008	pi-te naaig ninb , “ Buaj yia maa'b ! meib Bua maaig Dau Eei Eaanb tu'q Bua'g naaiq Navq ? ” ninb tau , “ zeid Eei , tu'q Bua'g naaiq Navq . ”
44005009	pi-te zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib Bua i Mwavq weig haiq tiug tovb Hruq seij zyruq Eei sivj livb ? mavg kaaj ! pyopq meib Eei Goj uaq teij myenb Rwrnj Tauj kcvb Daavg a'q lo'b ! ninb Bua yaag xij zu'g kcv meib Zwrtq a'q . ”
44005010	uaq taub auq lyemb zeib Kiv Fiag pi-te Eei zaub Len taig mig a'q . uaq teij myenb lunj myenb pia'g taaib pwatg ninb taig mig a'q , zyrug kcv ninb Zwrtq mivb pyopq ninb Eei Goj Eei ka'Len .
44005011	zwavj Jiub paav Zauj haid naaiq teij Jaub lrug Eei myenb za'kevb ! kamb Riaj haig a'q .
44005012	kovb zob Bua yem zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj zruj Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Zamq Eei . syenj ye-su Eei zwavj myenb haiq zang yaag kapq zunq yem saa-lo-mxn Eei pivj laavb txvj .
44005013	ka'Eiag Eei myenb maiq kaamq Zauj ninb Bua kapq zunq mq paag zwavj myenb Taaib ninb Bua .
44005014	syenj zyruq Eei myenb mJavg msia'q kunq zruj kunq Tim pia'g Zamq .
44005015	weig kovb zob Bua zruj Eei Javb hog , myenb txb putg pcvg myenb Zwrtq Jaub Len pun ninb Bua pweij Jiug pweij zi'g , yem uaq zuaq pi-te Jiaj Jauq uaq zang , haib tu'q ninb Eei tovb linb lamb zu'g ninb Bua .
44005016	yem nitq ye-lu-saa-lem uaq teij muvq Eei myenb , txb putg pcvg myenb Zauj maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq Kwrnj mxb ninb Bua uaq teij . yetg zuvq yaag zxg lovj Revg .
44005017	zruj kau , tomb sai myenb Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq txig , tovb saa-Du-sij uaq Jauq myenb , hang haig kovb zob Bua .
44005018	ninb Bua zyrug zx'q kovb zob Bua txb mivb wrnj Jyenq tomb zwavj lob .
44005019	mq paag naaig mwrnd maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib Kxi lob kcvb txb ninb Bua Zwrtq mig a'q ,
44005020	Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua mivb uaq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zx'q naaiq syavb mcvg Eei Jaub lrug yetg zuvq kxvq pun zwavj myenb mwavj og . ”
44005021	luvb Byrub Byrud Fav Navq , ninb Bua zyrug ei Jyenq naaiq teij waag pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Faauj zwavj myenb a'q . tomb sai myenb cvj Zauj ninb yem uaq Eei myenb txig taaib zunq . ninb Bua heug kunq sig wig Eei myenb , se i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb koj , taaib Rxib yaag Paaiq pcv mivb uaq lob txb kovb zob Bua taaib .
44005022	mq paag mivb Tauj uaq , pcv lxd maiq pwatg kovb zob Bua . ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj kunq sig myenb uaq kxvq ,
44005023	“ yia Bua Tauj uaq lob yaag pwatg fxq Jyenq lovj Eei . pcv yaag zuaq Jyenq kcvb Daavg Eei , mq paag yia Bua Kxi kcvb pia'g mivb , maiq pwatg yetg taub mig a'q . ”
44005024	kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj sai myenb pyeiq Bua haid naaiq teij waag , ninb Bua Namq maiq Tov , maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Ga'haaq xij Navq haiq nx .
44005025	uaq zang maaib laanb myenb taaib kxvq , “ mwavj kaaj ! meib Bua zx'q wrnj Jyenq lob uaq teij myenb , ib zang yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq uaq Faauj myenb cj . ”
44005026	pcvb pyeiq Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei pcv zyrug mivb txb kovb zob Bua taaib , mq paag maiq zruj Zyruq pun kovb zob Bua . pcv kamb Riaj zwavj myenb haib zx'q la'pyeiq zov ninb Bua mq pei .
44005027	pcv txb kovb zob taaib sruq Jyenq kunq sig myenb Eei Ra'Myen . tomb sai myenb zyrug zaab naaig ninb Bua .
44005028	ninb kxvq , “ yia Bua hatg meib Bua Zinb maang maiq tuvq lovg naaiq nxm Buaj Faauj myenb ni ! mavg kaaj ! meib Bua Faauj Eei leid zunb pwavq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb a'q nyaa . lyemb uaq laanb myenb taig Eei sig meib Bua xij hxig yia Bua Daamb txv . ”
44005029	pi-te Zauj uaq teij kovb zob Bua tau , “ yia Bua xij zu'g mwavj Tinb huvb , maiq zeid mwavj myenb .
44005030	meib Bua zx'q ye-su tiv Jyenq zyepg Ravg Jaaj taij ninb , mq paag yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb pun ninb cvj navb taaib .
44005031	Tinb huvb Taaib ninb faauj Lav , pun ninb zweid Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj zruj pyeiq zeiq yaag zruj Fruj zyruq , pun i-saa-laa-en myenb kxiq Hruq tu'q Tinb huvb kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid .
44005032	yia Bua weig naaiq teij sig zruj zxvb zevj . Tinb huvb Zeij sivj livb pun mwavj ninb Eei waag Eei myenb . sivj livb yaag Zauj yia Bua zruj zxvb zevj . ”
44005033	kunq sig wig Eei myenb haid naaiq teij waag , ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad ! haig . Navq haaij yaag xij taij kovb zob Bua a'q .
44005034	mq paag maaib taub faa-li-sij myenb , Buaj heug kaa-maa-li-en , zruj Faauj leid Eei finb scv . zwavj myenb yaag Taaib ninb . ninb yem kunq sig wig sruq Jiad taaib Buaj myenb txb kovb zob Bua Zwrtq tavb ka'Eiag .
44005035	ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb , “ i-saa-laa-en kxb yrud aa'b ! meib Bua xij zruj haiq Euvg pun naaiq teij myenb mq paag xij zu'g lovb lovj Eei Namq Daavg .
44005036	zinb Daavg maaib taub , Buaj heug Tu-Daatg , Zev ninb kanb zruj Lo . cvj maaib leib maiq ko feij pc'q taub myenb kan ninb . mq paag Ga'haaq ninb zu'g myenb taij taig . kan ninb Eei myenb Raanj Revg , zyav naaig paag Revg mig a'q .
44005037	“ Ga'haaq faauj myenb hrud uaq zang , maaib taub kaa-li-li myenb , Buaj heug yu-Daatg , yua'g myenb Zamq kan ninb . mq paag ninb fib Navq Eei zu'g myenb taij taig . kan ninb uaq teij myenb zyav naaig Raanj Revg mig a'q .
44005038	Navq naaig , ib zang Zwrtq taaib Eei sig yia Kwinj meib Bua maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg pun naaiq teij myenb . puvj ninb Bua mivb a'q . sij kxvq ninb Bua zruj Eei Zauj Namq Eei yem paamb myenb Zwrtq nx , zyrug paaig Revg mig a'q .
44005039	mq paag sij kxvq yem Tinb huvb taaib nx , meib Bua za'kevb maiq haib hivb ninb Bua . Riaj meib Bua kanb Zauj Tinb huvb Bx'q Jaaj Navq . ”
44005040	kunq sig Eei myenb zyrug ei kaa-maa-li-en Eei waag zruj a'q . ninb Bua heug kovb zob Bua pia'g taaib pun myenb lovg pyaab pin Bx'q , cvj hatg ninb Bua maiq tuvq lovg ye-su Eei Buaj kxvq haiq Euvg . hatg liud zyrug puvj ninb Bua mivb a'q .
44005041	kovb zob Bua Zwrtq wig mivb ninb Bua Fyenb yrub haig , weig zu'g Tinb huvb funj ninb Bua Pwij tu'q weig ye-su Eei Buaj tiaq Eaiq .
44005042	ninb Bua Nxib Nxi yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq yaag zweib myenb Eei pyauq , maiq tivb lyrub Eei Faauj Jyenq mivb yaag zunb Kuq fyenj kxvq ye-su zruj ki-tug .
44006001	uaq teij Zaamj , zanb zang maaib myenb Tim pia'g taaib zruj saib kxj Jaa Zamq Jyenq faauj . zruj kau , kxvq kikg waag uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb vopq kxvq hipq-lu waag Eei yiu-Tai myenb weig zu'g Nxib Nxi Jwav ka'naaiq , Kwei zu'g kxvq kikg waag uaq teij Eei aub kwaaq .
44006002	zyepg Eeig taub kovb zob zyrug heug saib kxj Bua taaib zunq , Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia Bua kwavg Jyenq maiq zunb Tinb huvb Eei tod , mivb liug leid Jwav aub kwaaq se maiq hxpg .
44006003	kxb yrud aa'b ! yem meib Bua naaiq ka'Euad xij zu'g kinq siag laanb myenb , tovb maaib mevb taub lovj , maaib sivj livb pwavq Hruq , yaag maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb . yia Bua xij Paaiq ninb Bua liug leid naaiq teij kov .
44006004	yia Bua zyrug haib lovg Revg Hruq tauj kauj , zunb Tinb huvb Eei tod . ”
44006005	zwavj myenb haid naaiq teij waag ninb Bua hxpg Hruq Eei , zyrug kinq saa-Te-fen . saa-Te-fen syenj tu'q lovj haig yaag maaib sivj livb pwavq Hruq . ninb Bua cvj kinq fi-lipq , po-Ko-latq , ni-Kaa-no , Ti-mon , paan-me-natq Zauj yem an-Ti-okg zivb taaib Eei Janj , tovb kan yiu-Tai myenb syenj Tinb huvb uaq taub ni-Ko-lau .
44006006	zwavj myenb txb naaiq teij saib kxj mivb kovb zob Bua uaq . kovb zob Bua zyrug maan Jyenq ninb Bua tauj kauj .
44006007	Ga'haaq Tinb huvb Eei tod Yaavj Jyenq mivb . yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , saib kxj Eei sruj mrug kunq zruj kunq Zamq Jyenq faauj . cvj maaib sai myenb Zamq Eei taaib syenj .
44006008	saa-Te-fen tu'q Tinb huvb Eei en Zauj tomb Qa'q yem zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj zruj tomb Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig .
44006009	mq paag maaib teij myenb taaib Zauj ninb txib tekg Rcv . taaib Rcv naaiq teij myenb yem sai-lin muvq , aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb , si-li-sia scvq Zauj e-sia scvq taaib Eei yiu-Tai myenb . ninb Bua se Jwavg wig Eei myenb , tovb myenb heug , “ puvj Gxi Eei myenb Eei wig . ”
44006010	mq paag ninb Bua Rcv maiq hivb weig zu'g sivj livb pun saa-Te-fen maaib Zovb mevb kxvq waag .
44006011	ninb Bua zyrug peig Diaq Zivq myenb kxvq , “ yia Bua haid naaiq laanb myenb Ki mo-se yaag Ki Tinb huvb . ”
44006012	ninb Bua zyrug Zo'q zwavj myenb Zauj myenb koj Zauj Faauj leid Eei finb scv mivb zx'q saa-Te-fen txb mivb yiu-Tai myenb Eei kunq sig wig uaq .
44006013	ninb Bua cvj lxd myenb zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb maiq tivb lyrub Eei kxvq Ki zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj leib latg ,
44006014	weig zu'g yia Bua haid ninb kxvq naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su xij zruj waaig naaiq nxm txvj yaag kxiq Revg lob Nxi mo-se Jiu pun Bua Eei leib fivj . ”
44006015	zweid Jyenq kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb nu'g nu'q Eei mavg Jyenq saa-Te-fen Eei Myen , pwatg Navq finb myenb Eei Myen nx .
44007001	tomb sai myenb naaig kaaj saa-Te-fen , “ naaiq teij sig za'kevb maaib Eei fai ? ”
44007002	saa-Te-fen tau , “ zwavj myenb koj Zauj zwavj kxb yrud aag , mwavj yia kxvq og . Bua Eei ovb Taaij , apg-laa-ham , yem me-soj-po-te-mia maiq kcvb mivb haa-laan uaq zang , Favb laavg Eei Tinb huvb hing Zwrtq taaib
44007003	kxvq Buaj ninb , ‘ xij zu'g kwavg Jyenq meib Eei teib puv Zauj meib Eei Zyenb Ze'q mivb yem tovb yia xij pun meib hiuq uaq nxm teib puv . ’
44007004	“ apg-laa-ham zyrug Zwrtq Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv mivb yem haa-laan teib puv . ninb Eei tia taig mivb , Tinb huvb Paaiq apg-laa-ham taaib yem ib zang meib Bua yem naaiq nxm teib puv .
44007005	uaq zang Tinb huvb lyemb yetg nxm zaub penq Zaaiq Eei Dau yaag maiq pun zruj ninb Eei pwrng . mq paag apg-laa-ham maiq kcvb maaib fu'Jweiq uaq zang Tinb huvb lcvd pun naaiq nxm teib puv ninb Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun .
44007006	Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj ninb , ‘ meib Eei zeib fun xij zu'g yem kanb nxm kua'q , zu'g uaq nxm kua'q Eei myenb hxig ninb Bua zruj nrub , zeij ninb Bua feij pc'q Havj .
44007007	mq paag yia xij tivg hxig ninb Bua zruj nrub uaq teij myenb Eei zwid . Ga'haaq ninb Bua xij Zwrtq uaq nxm teib puv taaib yem naaiq nxm txvj zavg yia . ’
44007008	Tinb huvb zyrug pun Jiaj kaatq Eei leid zruj lcvd vcvg waag Eei Javb hog . Navq naaig apg-laa-ham Eei txn , i-sakg , Zwrtq seij pwavq Yetg Nxi , apg-laa-ham Tevj ninb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid . i-sakg zruj yaa-Kopq Eei tia , yaa-Kopq yaag zruj Bua Eei zyepg Eeig taub ovb Taaij Eei tia .
44007009	“ naaiq teij ovb Taaij mweig Jia'q ninb Bua Eei yrud , yo-sepq , zyrug maaig ninb mivb i-yipq teib puv zruj nrub . mq paag Tinb huvb Zauj ninb yem ,
44007010	Fruj ninb pyauj Dutq naang zivb . Tinb huvb pun yo-sepq maaib Zovb mevb yaag zruj tu'q hxpg i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb . faa-lo huvb zyrug pun ninb zruj zuvj kunq i-yipq teib puv yaag kunq Revg huvb ting .
44007011	“ Ga'haaq i-yipq teib puv Zauj Kaa-naa-an teib puv pwavb zu'g tomb vxg hxig ninb Bua Kruq . Bua Eei ovb Taaij lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eang a'q .
44007012	mq paag yaa-Kopq haid kxvq i-yipq teib puv maaib laavb zi'g , ninb zyrug Paaiq Bua Eei ovb Taaij mivb ta'yetq Rung .
44007013	ta'Eeig Rung yo-sepq pun ninb Eei kxj Zauj yrud hiuq tu'q ninb . faa-lo huvb zyrug hiuq tu'q yo-sepq Eei Mwavq txig Eei Jaub lrug .
44007014	yo-sepq zyrug pun waag mivb Buaj ninb Eei tia , yaa-Kopq , Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Mwavq txig taaib . ( yetg zuvq maaib Zyetq zyepg Mmd laanb myenb . )
44007015	yaa-Kopq Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij zyrug swiq mivb i-yipq teib puv yaag yem uaq kwei seij .
44007016	ninb Bua Eei sei txb Rwrnj se-Kem , zavj Jyenq apg-laa-ham lovg Eaanb Tevj haa-mo Eei txn maaid uaq nxm zruq .
44007017	“ aaq lamb teij Tauj Tinb huvb xij zruj ei ninb lcvd pun apg-laa-ham Eei waag , i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv Yaavj tu'q Zamq haig .
44007018	zruj kau , cvj maaib taub syavb huvb kunq i-yipq teib puv . ninb yaag maiq hiuq tu'q yetg teij yo-sepq .
44007019	ninb Duaq Bua naaiq fivj myenb yaag zruj to'g pun Bua Eei ovb Taaij , aapq ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua Eei kub vwaad kwavg , pun kub vwaad maiq maaib mcvg zyavb .
44007020	“ txij zu'g uaq zang mo-se Zwrtq seij taaib , yaag ei Tinb huvb pwatg , ninb zyavb tu'q Rweig haig . ninb Eei tiaj maag zyrug txb ninb yem pyauq pwavq pua Laaj Eia'g .
44007021	Tauj zu'g kwavg ka'Eiag uaq zang , huvb Eei sia'q zyrug Lxpq taaib txb Lo zruj ninb kanb Eei txn .
44007022	mo-se tu'q ho'g Revg i-yipq myenb Eei Zovb mevb Eei Jauq . ninb kxvq Eei waag , zruj Eei sig , za'kevb zruj tu'q kwai haig .
44007023	“ mo-se tu'q feij zyepg Havj uaq zang , ninb Jiad Hruq mivb mavg Zauj ninb Jwavg fivj uaq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb .
44007024	mivb kau , pwatg taub i-yipq myenb hxig taub i-saa-laa-en myenb . mo-se mivb Tevj zu'g hxig uaq taub Jaauq syrub zyrug taij uaq taub i-yipq myenb .
44007025	( mo-se laaig Zauj ninb Jwavg fivj Eei myenb haib hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb xij lovg ninb Fruj ninb Bua , mq paag ninb Bua maiq pia'g Hruq . )
44007026	ta'Eeig Nxi ninb cvj pwatg i taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q Jaaj , ninb zyrug mivb paaq ninb Bua . ninb kxvq , ‘ kxb yrud aa'b ! meib Bua lomb Rxib i-saa-laa-en myenb , weig haiq tiug laanb xij hxig laanb ? ’
44007027	“ mq paag tovb txvg uaq taub fovq mo-se pyauj Gxi . ninb kxvq , ‘ haiq taub xn meib taaib kunq yia Bua , Tevj yia Bua tunj sig ?
44007028	meib xij taij yia Navq a'Nxi meib taij uaq taub i-yipq myenb nxb ? ’
44007029	mo-se haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug pyauj Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv mivb yem mi-Dyen teib puv . yem uaq ninb tu'q i taub txn taaib a'q .
44007030	“ Jiaj liud feij zyepg Havj , mo-se yem uaq teib puvb Waav , leib si-naai Bov maiq navg ko , maaib taub finb myenb yem zia'g Jyenq Dyavb txnb fomq Eei trub Byetg ka'Euad hing pun mo-se pwatg .
44007031	mo-se pwatg zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig . mivb fatq teij mavg zyrug haid zyruq Eei Qiaj kxvq ,
44007032	‘ yia se meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb , apg-laa-ham , i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb . ’ mo-se kamb Riaj haig , sin zinj , lyemb maiq kaamq mavg .
44007033	“ zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj ninb , ‘ Tutq Gxi heb maa'b ! meib ib zang sruq Jyenq naaiq nxm txvj se Zivb Revg Eei Dau .
44007034	yia pwatg yia Eei myenb yem i-yipq teib puv syrug Kruq , yaag haid ninb Bua Funb Jyenq yem . yia zyrug Fiag taaib xij Fruj ninb Bua . taaib maa'b ! yia xij Paaiq meib mivb i-yipq teib puv . ’
44007035	“ naaiq taub mo-se tovb zinb Daavg i-saa-laa-en myenb Gemb uaq taub . ninb Bua kxvq , ‘ haiq taub xn meib taaib kunq yia Bua , Tevj yia Bua tunj sig ? ’ Tinb huvb kanb lovg yem Dyavb txnb fomq hing Zwrtq uaq taub finb myenb Paaiq mo-se kunq ninb Bua yaag Fruj ninb Bua .
44007036	ninb txb pc'g fivj Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv yaag yem i-yipq teib puv , yem Kxib si'q , yaag yem feij zyepg Havj teib puvb Waav zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Zauj Javb hog .
44007037	“ tovb naaiq taub mo-se kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb , ‘ Tinb huvb xij weig meib Bua Paaiq taub trug waag myenb Navq yia nx , yem meib Bua Eei kxb yrud Bu'Dovj Zwrtq taaib . ’
44007038	tovb naaiq taub Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb kapq zunq yem teib puvb Waav . ninb Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij yaag Zauj yem si-naai Bov Zauj ninb kxvq waag uaq taub finb myenb yem , yaag zipq zyavb Jyenq Eei tod Jiu pun Bua .
44007039	“ mq paag Bua Eei ovb Taaij Gemb mo-se , maiq Kavq mwavj ninb Eei waag . Hruq Kuvj Namq taauj sin Rwrnj uaq i-yipq teib puv Navq .
44007040	ninb Bua zyrug Buaj aa-lon , ‘ Toq meib zeij teij zyenb Eei favj yend yia Bua Eei Jauq maa'b ! txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub mo-se ov Jiaj haaij mig a'q , yia Bua yaag maiq hiuq . ’
44007041	tovb uaq Rung ninb Bua zruj taub vovb kruq txn Eei favj , txb ka'naaiq mivb ziag , yaag Beng Eang hopq hrug ninb Bua kanb Eei puad zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq .
44007042	Tinb huvb zyrug maiq mavg ninb Bua a'q . sweib ninb Bua zavg kub vwaaig luvb Eei Leij , Navq fiaq Jyenq trug waag myenb Eei sru nx . sru kxvq , ‘ i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b ! meib Bua yem feij zyepg Havj teib puvb Waav , meib Bua maiq zeid taij scvb Kuq ziag yia .
44007043	meib Bua kcv mo-lekq zyenb Eei Dopg liub , yaag kcv le-faan zyenb Eei Leij , se meib Bua kanb zeij taaib zavg Eei miub favj . weig naaiq yia xij kwaatq meib Bua mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei uaq Daavg mcvj . ’
44007044	“ Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem teib puvb Waav uaq zang , ninb Bua maaib uaq nxm lcvd vcvg waag Eei Dopg liub . naaiq nxm Dopg liub ninb Bua ei Tinb huvb Paaiq mo-se yaag pun mo-se pwatg Jiaj Eei Euvg zeiq zruj taaib .
44007045	Ga'haaq Bua Eei ovb Taaij tu'q Ripg uaq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei Dopg liub yaag pyenb kan Jyenq yo-su-waa mivb . Tauj ninb Bua taaib Rcv teib puv , tovb Tinb huvb zung yem Daavg uaq teij myenb Twij Zwrtq naaiq nxm teib puv , ninb Bua pyenb Jyenq uaq nxm Dopg liub pia'g . Dopg liub yaag yem naaig Tauj Daa-witq huvb Eei luvb Diaq .
44007046	Daa-witq huvb tu'q Tinb huvb a'Neiq ninb , zyrug Toq Tinb huvb pun ninb liud leid nxm txvj pun yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb yem .
44007047	mq paag tovb saa-lo-mxn weig Tinb huvb tu'q zruj uaq nxm pyauq .
44007048	“ mq paag yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb maiq zeid yem myenb zruj taaib Eei pyauq . Navq trug waag myenb kxvq ,
44007049	“ luvb se yia Eei weig , Dau se yia lxvj zauj Eei txvj . meib Bua weig yia Zeij Eei ting xij Navq haiq nx ? yia tu'q hitq Kwrnj Eei txvj xij yem haaij ?
44007050	naaiq teij ka'naaiq yetg zuvq se yia kanb Eei puad zeij taaib maiq zeid ? ” ’
44007051	“ meib Bua Hruq vcvg Eei myenb aa'b ! meib Bua mnxmb hod , maiq mwavj Tinb huvb . meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij fib Navq Eei , haiq zang yaag vcvg Jyenq sivj livb .
44007052	maaib haiq taub trug waag myenb maiq zu'g meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj to'g Jiaj ? lyemb taaib trug waag kxvq pcvb fim uaq taub xij taaib , Bua Eei ovb Taaij zuvq taij ninb Bua kwavg mig a'q . ib zang pcvb fim uaq taub meib Bua maaig yaag taij ninb kwavg .
44007053	finb myenb Jiu Tinb huvb Eei leib latg pun meib Bua , meib Bua yaag tu'q zipq mig a'q , mq paag maiq ei Jyenq zruj . ”
44007054	kunq sig uaq kwanb myenb haid saa-Te-fen kxvq naaiq teij waag , ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad ! haig , zyrug tapg Eaab tapg Zeiq Eei .
44007055	mq paag saa-Te-fen maaib sivj livb yem pwavq Hruq . ninb mavg kub vwaaig luvb , pwatg Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg yaag pwatg ye-su sruq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj puv .
44007056	ninb kxvq , “ meib Bua mavg kaaj maa'b ! yia pwatg luvb kcvb Gxi , yaag pwatg paamb myenb Eei txn sruq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Byaaug mcvj puv . ”
44007057	zwavj myenb cvj haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ninb Bua zyrug Fib Fuvj Futg Eei heug , yaag lovg puad zotq Jyenq mnxmb Kwrtq Tiuj mivb Zaa saa-Te-fen ,
44007058	lang ninb Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb , zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig ninb . txij zevj uaq teij myenb Jaiq ninb Bua Eei tomb lwi an Jyenq taub myenb lunj myenb , Buaj heug sau-lo , Eei zaub Len .
44007059	myenb lovg la'pyeiq zov kau saa-Te-fen , saa-Te-fen heug Jyenq Tinb huvb kxvq , “ zyruq ye-su aa'b ! Toq meib zipq yia Eei livb wrnb ! ”
44007060	ninb kweig Fiag Dau heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ zyruq aa'b ! Toq meib kwavg Gxi maiq tuvq lovg ninb Bua zruj naaiq teij zwid . ” kxvq setq waag ninb zyrug tavj Qiaj mig a'q .
44008001	naaiq teij myenb taij saa-Te-fen , sau-lo yaag a'Neiq Eei . tovb uaq Nxi myenb Jiad kxn zruj to'g hxig ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei Jiub paav myenb Kruq haig . Zwrtq liud kovb zob Bua , syenj ye-su Eei myenb yetg zuvq pyauj Raanj , mivb yem yu-Dia scvq Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq .
44008002	maaib teij kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei myenb txb saa-Te-fen Eei sei mivb zavj , Hruq Raub haig , Fiag Qa'q Eyemq Byrub Byrub Eei .
44008003	mq paag sau-lo xij myetg Jiub paav , ninb zyrug zweib pyauq lxd syenj ye-su Eei myenb mJavg msia'q zx'q Tx mivb wrnj Jyenq lob .
44008004	pyauj Raanj uaq teij syenj ye-su Eei myenb mivb Tauj haaij , ninb Bua zunb Jyenq Kuq fyenj mivb .
44008005	fi-lipq mivb Tauj saa-maa-lia scvq Eei yetg nxm zivb zunb Buaj myenb ki-tug se tovb ye-su .
44008006	zwavj myenb haid fi-lipq kxvq Eei waag yaag pwatg ninb zruj Zwrtq Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig , ninb Bua zyrug lovb lovj Eei mwavj .
44008007	Yiab kwaiq myenq yem myenb Eei sin vaaub vaauq Eei heug Jyenq Zwrtq . zauj Bai zauj waaig Eei myenb tu'q zxg lovj Zamq haig .
44008008	uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb zyrug Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g haig a'q .
44008009	maaib taub myenb , Buaj heug si-mon , yem uaq nxm zivb zruj faatq laub teij a'q , pun saa-maa-lia myenb Bua'g hxvb haig ninb . ninb Zev ninb kanb se yetg taub zruj Lo Eei myenb .
44008010	maiq kunq haaij hxvb myenb , yetg zuvq xij mwavj ninb Eei waag . ninb Bua kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb maaib yem Tinb huvb taaib Eei Qa'q . se tovb myenb heug , ‘ tomb Qa'q ’ uaq taub . ”
44008011	si-mon zruj faatq pun myenb Bua'g hxvb haig , ninb Bua zyrug kan ninb laub a'q .
44008012	mq paag fi-lipq zunb Kuq fyenj kxvq Tinb huvb taaib zruj zyruq kunq myenb yaag kxvq ye-su ki-tug Eei Jaub lrug . zwavj myenb syenj ninb Eei waag , lyemb mJavg msia'q Jiaj uam Eei leid Revg .
44008013	si-mon kanb yaag syenj . ninb Jiaj liud uam Eei leid . ninb zanb zang kan Jyenq fi-lipq mivb yaag Bua'g hxvb haig fi-lipq zruj Eei tomb Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig .
44008014	kovb zob Bua yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb haid kxvq saa-maa-lia myenb zipq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei tod mig a'q . ninb Bua zyrug Paaiq pi-te Zauj yo-han mivb ninb Bua uaq .
44008015	pi-te Zauj yo-han mivb Tauj , zyrug Tevj syenj Eei myenb tauj kauj , Toq Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua zipq sivj livb ,

44008017	pi-te Zauj yo-han lovg puad maan Jyenq ninb Bua , taub taub zyrug tu'q zipq sivj livb mig a'q .

44008019	ninb kxvq , “ Toq meib Bua pun naaiq Euvg Qa'q yia , pun yia haib lovg puad maan haiq taub , uaq taub zyrug tu'q zipq sivj livb . ”
44008020	pi-te tau ninb , “ laaij meib Namq taaib haib lovg zinb Eaanb maaid tu'q Tinb huvb Eei zivb Eeig , meib Zauj meib Eei zinb Eaanb yetg zuvq zu'g myetg maa'b !
44008021	meib yem yia Bua Eei kov maiq maaib meib Eei pwrng , weig zu'g Tinb huvb pwatg meib Eei Hruq maiq zivj .
44008022	meib xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg Revg naaiq Euvg waaig haig Eei za'eij . meib yem Hruq Namq Zwrtq naaiq teij waaig sig mq paag meib xij zu'g tauj kauj Toq , Riaj zyruq haib kwavg Gxi pun meib mq pei .
44008023	yia pwatg meib Eei Hruq pa'la'g mweig Jia'q haig , zu'g zwid Dob Jyenq a'q . ”
44008024	si-mon kxvq Buaj pi-te Zauj yo-han , “ Toq meib Bua Tevj yia tauj kauj Toq zyruq maiq tuvq pun yia zu'g Navq meib Bua kxvq uaq nx og . ”
44008025	pi-te Zauj yo-han zruj liud zxvb zevj yaag zunb liud zyruq Eei tod , ninb Bua Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . Rwrnj uaq zang ninb Bua yavb saa-maa-lia scvq Eei Zamb nxm laavd zunb Jyenq Kuq fyenj Rwrnj .
44008026	maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb taaib Buaj fi-lipq , “ xij zu'g mivb naamb puv mcvj , yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mivb kaa-saa zivb uaq tiub Jauq . ” ( naaiq tiub Jauq Jiaj teib puvb Waav . )
44008027	fi-lipq zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q . maaib taub e-Ti-o-pia kua'q Eei tomb Jyen Tevj e-Ti-o-pia huvb maag , Kaan-Daa-sij , kruj ninb Eei yetg zuvq zinb Eaanb . naaiq taub tomb Jyen mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb paaij Tinb huvb Rwrnj , zweid Jyenq maab Zia to'g Jyenq trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , Eei sru Rwrnj . fi-lipq zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q . maaib taub e-Ti-o-pia kua'q Eei tomb Jyen Tevj e-Ti-o-pia huvb maag , Kaan-Daa-sij , kruj ninb Eei yetg zuvq zinb Eaanb . naaiq taub tomb Jyen mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb paaij Tinb huvb Rwrnj , zweid Jyenq maab Zia to'g Jyenq trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , Eei sru Rwrnj .

44008030	fi-lipq zyrug Tiuj Jyenq mivb Tauj ninb Eei ka'Len , haid tomb Jyen to'g Jyenq trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , Eei sru . fi-lipq zyrug naaig kaaj , “ meib to'g Jyenq naaig nxm txvj , meib mevb pc'g Eei saa'b ? ”
44008031	tomb Jyen tau , “ maiq maaib haiq taub Pxq mevb Buaj yia , yia fuvg haib hiuq tu'q ? ” ninb zyrug heug fi-lipq faauj taaib zweid Jyenq ninb Eei maab Zia .
44008032	tomb Jyen to'g uaq trug kivb sru Eei waag Navq naaiq nx kxvq , “ ninb Navq taub pa'ki yuvb nx , zu'g txb mivb taij , yaag Navq taub pa'ki yuvb txn zu'g myenb Japq pyei ,
44008033	ninb zu'g myenb paaig ninb Eei Myen , lovg maanb leid hxig ninb . maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q kxvq Tauj ninb Eei funb fa'q weig zu'g ninb yem paamb ken Eei mcvg Jiaj Revg mig a'q . ”
44008034	uaq taub tomb Jyen naaig fi-lipq , “ Toq meib Buaj yia og . naaiq taub trug waag myenb kxvq zu'g haiq taub ? kxvq zu'g ninb kanb fai kxvq zu'g kanb taub ? ”
44008035	fi-lipq zyrug Jiad kxn lovg naaiq trug kivb sru kxvq ye-su Eei Kuq fyenj pun tomb Jyen mwavj .

44008037	fi-lipq tau , “ sij kxvq meib lyepg tivg Hruq syenj , Jiaj tu'q Eei lx'g . ” uaq taub Jyen kxvq , “ yia syenj a'q . yia syenj ye-su ki-tug se Tinb huvb Eei txn . ”
44008038	kxvq liud , ninb heug maab Zia tivb Jyenq . ninb Bua i taub zyrug pia'g uam . fi-lipq yaag Tevj tomb Jyen Jiaj uam Eei leid .
44008039	ninb Bua Zwrtq uam taaib , zyruq Eei sivj livb lyemb zeib txb fi-lipq mivb mig a'q . tomb Jyen zyav naaig cvj maiq tu'q pwatg ninb a'q . mq paag tomb Jyen Fyenb yrub Eei kan Jyenq Jauq Rwrnj .

44009029	ninb yaag Zauj kxvq kikg waag uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb kxvq leid lwrnj leid , mq paag ninb Bua xij taaq za'eij taij ninb .
44009030	kxb yrud Bua hiuq tu'q myenb xij taij ninb , ninb Bua zyrug txb sau-lo mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb , cvj fuvj ninb Zwrtq Jauq mivb Taa-satq zivb .
44009031	naaiq teij Jauq Jiaj liud , yem yu-Dia , kaa-li-li Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq nxmb nxm txvj Eei Jiub paav tu'q trug pcvb xn Eei yem yaag tu'q Zeij Jiad taaib . ninb Bua Taaib zyruq . sivj livb yaag xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq yaag pun myenb Jaa Zamq Jyenq faauj .

44009034	pi-te kxvq Buaj ninb , “ ai-ne-atg aa'b ! ye-su ki-tug zxg lovj meib a'q . Jiad sin taaib syru Jiad meib Eei zi'g maa'b ! ” ai-ne-atg lyemb zeib Jiad sin taaib a'q .
44009035	yetg zuvq yem litq-Daa Zauj saa-lon muvq Eei myenb pwatg naaiq laanb myenb lovj , ninb Bua zyrug kxiq Hruq syenj zyruq .
44009036	yem yapq-faa muvq maaib taub syenj ye-su Eei msia'q txn , Buaj heug Taa-Bi-Taa . ( kxvq penj kikg waag se Do-Katq . ) ninb zanb zang zruj Kuq sig yaag Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb .

44010008	Ko-ne-li-atg zx'q finb myenb Buaj Eei waag kxvq pun ninb Bua mwavj , zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb yapq-faa muvq .

44010017	pi-te pwatg liud naaiq teij hing yaavb Eei sig , ninb Zxg Namq maiq Tov naaiq teij sig maaib haiq Euvg eij leid mq pei . txij uaq nxm zyavb hog , Ko-ne-li-atg Paaiq taaib Eei myenb naaig Jyenq taaib lxd pwatg si-mon Eei pyauq , zuvq sruq Jyenq uaq laatg kcvb Daavg .

44010020	meib Jiad sin taaib Fiag a'q . maiq tuvq samb so'q . kunq kan ninb Bua mivb a'q , weig zu'g yia Paaiq ninb Bua taaib . ”
44010021	pi-te zyrug Fiag mivb Buaj uaq teij myenb , “ yia se tovb meib Bua lxd uaq laanb myenb . meib Bua taaib lxd yia maaib teij haiq Euvg Jauq fai ? ”
44010022	ninb Bua tau , “ Ko-ne-li-atg pcvb pyeiq heug yia Bua taaib . ninb zruj taub Kuq myenb yaag kan lovj Tinb huvb . yetg fivj yiu-Tai myenb Taaib ninb . maaib taub Zivb Revg finb myenb taaib Buaj ninb xij zu'g Toq meib mivb ninb Eei pyauq weig pun ninb mwavj meib kxvq Eei waag . ”
44010023	pi-te zyrug heug uaq teij myenb pia'g pyauq Zauj ninb hitq uaq . ta'Eeig Nxi pi-te Beng taaib Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua mivb a'q . cvj maaib teij yapq-faa muvq Eei kxb yrud yaag Zauj ninb mivb .
44010024	cvj Jiaj taaib yetg Nxi , pi-te Bua mivb Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb mig a'q . Tauj uaq pwatg Ko-ne-li-atg Zauj Jyenq Mwavq txig Zyenb Ze'q cvj Zauj ninb heug taaib uaq teij lob kcv txig yem uaq zuaq Jyenq ninb .
44010025	pi-te pia'g pyauq uaq zang , Ko-ne-li-atg mivb zipq , zyrug Pua'q Fiag ninb Eei zaub Len paaij .
44010026	mq paag pi-te Ken ninb Jiad sin yaag kxvq , “ Jiad sin taaib maa'b ! yia mq paag paamb myenb Navq lx'g . ”
44010027	pi-te Zauj Ko-ne-li-atg kxvq Jyenq waag pia'g pyauq mivb zyrug pwatg myenb Zamq Eei kapq zunq yem uaq .
44010028	ninb kxvq , “ meib Bua hiuq tu'q , ei yia Bua Eei leid , yiu-Tai myenb maiq haib pia'g Janj Eei txvj , maiq haib Zauj Janj Jiu Tov . mq paag Tinb huvb pun yia hiuq tu'q maiq hxpg zu'g funj haiq taub maiq Zivb Revg , fai maaib wij .
44010029	Navq naaig , meib Bua Paaiq myenb mivb heug yia taaib , yia maiq naaig haiq Euvg zyrug taaib a'q . ib zang yia naaig kaaj meib Bua , meib Bua weig haiq tiug heug yia taaib ? ”
44010030	Ko-ne-li-atg kxvq , “ zinb Daavg pyei Nxi , leib maiq ko naaiq nxm zyavb hog , se txij Fiag aanj pua nxm zyavb hog Eei txvj , yia yem yia Eei pyauq tauj kauj . lyemb zeib maaib taub myenb zu'q Jyenq lwib hruj Fav Eei , yrug ! yrug uaq , taaib sruq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen .
44010031	ninb kxvq , ‘ Ko-ne-li-atg aa'b ! tovb meib Toq Tinb huvb uaq teij waag , Tinb huvb haid mig a'q , yaag pwatg meib Zwrtq fim Tevj myenb Jomg myenb .
44010032	meib xij zu'g Paaiq myenb mivb yapq-faa muvq lxd laanb myenb , Buaj heug si-mon pi-te , taaib . ib zang ninb yem uaq Kxib Len , si-mon Dopg zavg Eei pyauq . ’
44010033	yia zyrug lyemb zeib Paaiq myenb mivb lxd meib , meib zyrug taaib a'q . za'kevb ! lovj haig . ib zang yia Bua yetg zuvq yem naaiq Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen , xij mwavj zyruq Paaiq meib kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag . ”
44010034	pi-te zyrug kxvq , “ ib zang yia hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen .
44010035	maiq kunq haiq fivj myenb , haiq taub kamb Riaj ninb , yaag zruj hxpg Eei Jauq , Tinb huvb zyrug zipq uaq taub a'q .
44010036	“ meib Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Jiu pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei tod , tovb myenb Kauj ye-su ki-tug haib tu'q pcvb xn uaq Euvg Kuq fyenj . ye-su ki-tug zruj maang mwrtg Eei zyruq .
44010037	“ meib Bua yaag hiuq tu'q yem yo-han zunb Buaj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid , Ga'haaq yem kaa-li-li Jiad kxn Zwrtq taaib kxmj yu-Dia scvq Eei sig .
44010038	“ meib Bua yaag hiuq tu'q naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su Eei Jaub lrug , yaag hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Zeij sivj livb Zauj tomb Qa'q pun ninb . Tinb huvb Zauj ninb yem , ninb zyrug mivb nxmb nxm txvj zruj Kuq sig yaag zxg lovj yetg zuvq zu'g myenq Eei huvb hxig Eei myenb .
44010039	“ ninb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb yaag yem yiu-Tai myenb Eei teib puv zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig , yia Bua pwatg yaag Tevj ninb zruj zxvb zevj . “ myenb yaag zx'q ye-su tiv yem zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig .
44010040	mq paag Ga'haaq pua Nxi Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib zyrug hing pun myenb pwatg .
44010041	maiq zeid hing pun taub taub myenb tu'q pwatg . Kuvj tovb zinb Daavg Tinb huvb kinq yia Bua taaib Tevj zruj zxvb zevj Eei myenb tu'q pwatg Navq , se ninb taig mivb cvj navb taaib , yia Bua tu'q Zauj ninb Jwavg Eang Jwavg hopq Eei myenb .
44010042	ninb Buaj yia Bua xij zu'g zunb ninb Eei Kuq fyenj pun myenb hiuq tu'q ninb se Tinb huvb Paaiq taaib zruj syemq zwid Jyen , syemq zyavb Jyenq Eei myenb Zauj taig mivb Eei myenb Eei zwid .
44010043	“ yetg zuvq trug waag myenb yaag Tevj ninb zruj zxvb zevj . ninb Bua kxvq , haiq taub syenj ye-su , yaag Kauj ninb Eei Buaj zyrug tu'q Tinb huvb kwavg zwid . ”
44010044	pi-te Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang , sivj livb lyemb zeib Fiag taaib yem ninb Bua taub taub mwavj leid Eei myenb Eei sin .
44010045	yem yapq-faa muvq kan pi-te taaib uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb , tovb syenj ye-su uaq teij myenb , za'kevb Bua'g hxvb haig Tinb huvb pun sivj livb Janj .
44010046	ninb Bua haid Janj kxvq kanb Euvg waag , yaag Zev Tinb huvb weib Lo .
44010047	pi-te kxvq , “ naaiq teij myenb zipq sivj livb Navq yia Bua nx . uaq Euvg maaib haiq taub haib laanb Jyenq maiq pun ninb Bua Jiaj uam Eei leid fai ? ”
44010048	ninb zyrug hatg ninb Bua xij zu'g tevq ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj Jiaj leid . uaq teij myenb cvj Toq pi-te Zauj ninb Bua yem i ziaj Nxi .
44011001	kovb zob Bua Zauj yem yu-Dia scvq Eei kxb yrud haid kxvq Janj yaag zipq Tinb huvb Eei tod .
44011002	pi-te mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq zang , maaib teij syenj ye-su Eei yiu-Tai myenb , tovb xij pun syenj ye-su Eei Janj Jiaj kaatq Eei leid uaq teij , kxvq pi-te .
44011003	ninb Bua kxvq , “ meib pia'g Janj Eei pyauq , ninb Bua yaag maiq kcvb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid . meib zuvq Zauj ninb Bua Eang Naavj . ”
44011004	pi-te zyrug yem kxn zweib yetq zweib Eeig kxvq Revg naaiq teij Jaub lrug pun ninb Bua mwavj .
44011005	ninb kxvq , “ yia yem yapq-faa muvq tauj kauj uaq zang , pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Zwrtq . yia pwatg maaib Euvg ka'naaiq Navq yetg Kwaaiq Dia Javq Eei , yaag Navq nanq Jyenq pyei nxm kx'q yem kub vwaaig luvb puvj Fiag taaib tivb Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen .
44011006	yia mavg lovj uaq Kwaaiq Dia ka'Euad pwatg maaib scvb Kuq , maaib Yiab zxib , maaib Exv Dau Eei ka'naaiq , yaag maaib Daij Daamb luvb Eei nx'g .
44011007	yia yaag haid maaib Qiaj kxvq , ‘ pi-te aa'b ! Jiad sin taij naaiq teij ka'naaiq Eang a'q . ’
44011008	“ mq paag yia tau kxvq , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! maiq hxpg Eang saa'b ? xij zu'g keg Eei Zauj maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq zuvq maiq pia'g Jiaj yia Eei Rwib . ’
44011009	“ mq paag maaib Qiaj yem luvb kxvq ta'Eeig Rung , ‘ Tinb huvb pun haiq Euvg Zivb Revg , maiq tuvq funj maaib wij . ’
44011010	Navq naaiq nx kxvq pua Rung liud , uaq Kwaaiq ka'naaiq zyrug syru faauj luvb mig a'q .
44011011	“ txij uaq nxm zyavb hog , yem si-saa-li-yaa zivb myenb Paaiq taaib lxd yia uaq teij pua laanb myenb taaib Tauj yia hitq uaq nxm pyauq taaib a'q .
44011012	sivj livb Buaj yia kan ninb Bua mivb yaag maiq tuvq samb so'q . naaiq teij Ju'q taub kxb yrud yaag Zauj yia mivb pia'g Ko-ne-li-atg Eei pyauq .
44011013	Ko-ne-li-atg zyrug Buaj yia Bua ninb Navq haiq nx pwatg taub finb myenb sruq Jyenq ninb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Buaj ninb , ‘ meib xij zu'g Paaiq myenb mivb yapq-faa muvq lxd laanb myenb , Buaj heug si-mon pi-te , heug ninb taaib meib naaiq .
44011014	ninb xij kxvq teij waag Buaj meib . meib Zauj meib Eei yetg pyauq myenb zyrug weig naaiq teij waag tu'q Fruj . ’
44011015	“ yia Jiad kxn kxvq waag uaq zang , sivj livb zyrug Fiag taaib yem ninb Bua Eei sin , Navq zinb Daavg Fiag taaib yem Bua uaq nx .
44011016	yia zyrug Javj zu'g zinb Daavg zyruq kxvq Eei waag , ‘ yo-han lovg uam Tevj myenb Jiaj leid , mq paag Tinb huvb xij lovg sivj livb Tevj meib Bua Jiaj leid . ’
44011017	Navq naaig , sij kxvq Tinb huvb Zeij zivb Eeig pun uaq teij Janj Navq Bua syenj zyruq ye-su ki-tug uaq zang ninb pun Bua nx , yia fuvg haib laanb Tinb huvb ? ”
44011018	zwavj myenb haid ninb kxvq naaiq teij waag , ninb Bua zyrug maiq maaib waag kxvq a'q . Kuvj Zev Tinb huvb Navq . ninb Bua kxvq , “ Navq naaiq , Tinb huvb yaag pun Janj haib kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid tu'q zyavb Jyenq . ”
44011019	myenb taij liud saa-Te-fen , Ga'haaq laaij myenb zruj to'g hxig , syenj ye-su Eei myenb zyrug pyauj Raanj Revg . maaib teij pyauj Tauj fi-ni-sia teib puv , sai-patg Kxib Rru , Zauj an-Ti-okg zivb . ninb Bua zunb Tinb huvb Eei Kuq fyenj mq paag Kuvj kxvq pun yiu-Tai myenb mwavj Navq .
44011020	mq paag maaib teij yem sai-patg Kxib Rru Zauj sai-lin muvq Eei yiu-Tai myenb mivb an-Ti-okg zivb kxvq zyruq ye-su Eei Kuq fyenj pun Janb kikg mwavj .
44011021	Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q Tevj ninb Bua kxvq zyrug maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj zyrug Win taaib lxd zyruq ye-su .
44011022	ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei Jiub paav haid naaiq teij fyenj Tauj ninb Bua uaq , ninb Bua zyrug Paaiq Baa-naa-Batg mivb an-Ti-okg zivb .
44011023	mivb Tauj , pwatg Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx Zeij en pun naaiq teij myenb , ninb zyrug a'Neiq haig yaag Kwinj ninb Bua lyepg tivg Hruq zanb zang kan lovj zyruq .
44011024	Baa-naa-Batg zruj taub Kuq myenb , syenj tu'q lovj , yaag maaib sivj livb pwavq Hruq , zyrug Jaa maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj zyruq .
44011025	Baa-naa-Batg zyrug mivb Taa-satq zivb lxd sau-lo .
44011026	lxd pwatg , sau-lo Zauj Jyenq Rwrnj an-Ti-okg zivb . ninb Bua i taub yem uaq yetg Havj , zanb zang Zauj Jiub paav kapq zunq Faauj myenb Zamq . myenb heug syenj ye-su Eei myenb zruj “ ki-tug myenb ” se yem an-Ti-okg zivb Jiad kxn heug taaib .
44011027	uaq teij Zaamj maaib teij trug waag myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb mivb Tauj an-Ti-okg .
44011028	maaib taub naaiq teij myenb , Buaj heug aa-kaa-Batg , sruq Jiad taaib . sivj livb lovg ninb trug waag kxvq luvb Diaq myenb xij zu'g pwavb tomb Waav tomb vxg . ( Kaa-laau-Di-atg zruj tomb ziub huvb uaq zang za'kevb pwavb naaiq Rung tomb vxg . )
44011029	Navq naaig , saib kxj Bua Zaavb laavb tivg ziuj kx'g myenb Eei panb zeig Zwrtq fim Tevj yu-Dia scvq Eei kxb yrud .
44011030	ninb Bua zyrug kapq Eaanb taaib Jiu pun Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo txb mivb pun Jiub paav Eei myenb koj .
44012001	uaq zang he-lotq huvb Jiad kxn zruj to'g hxig ziaj laanb Jiub paav myenb .
44012002	ninb lovg Ru'g Daauq taij yo-han Eei kxj , yaa-kxpg .
44012003	pwatg yiu-Tai myenb a'Neiq ninb Navq naaiq zruj , ninb cvj mivb zx'q pi-te . uaq zang txij Jiaj maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq .
44012004	he-lotq zx'q pi-te taaib wrnj Jyenq lob , Jiu pun pyei kwanb pcv zuaq Jyenq . yetg kwanb maaib pyei laanb . ninb taaq zyavj za'eij zuaq Jiaj liud siaj mcvg zipq , xij txv Jyenq zwavj myenb syemq pi-te Eei zwid .
44012005	pi-te zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob mq paag Jiub paav myenb lovg Hruq Fiag Qa'q weig ninb tauj kauj .
44012006	Tauj he-lotq huvb xij txb pi-te Zwrtq zinb Daavg uaq mwrnd , pi-te pweij i taub pcv Eei Bu'Dovj mFxmb , yaag maaib i tiub Lia'g limg Dob Jyenq . cvj maaib i taub pcv zuaq Jyenq lob kcvb .
44012007	lyemb zeib maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb hing Zwrtq taaib yaag maaib Fav ziuj Jyenq uaq Qovj lob . finb myenb Baij pi-te Eei la'Eaapq Buaj ninb , “ pi-te aa'b ! pi-te ! Govb Jiad sin taaib maa'b ! ” Dob pi-te Eei puad uaq teij i tiub limg lyemb zeib tavj Dutq Revg mig a'q .
44012008	finb myenb kxvq Buaj ninb , “ sai Jyenq hrub Laav cvj taapg Jyenq meib Eei heb . ” pi-te zyrug ei Jyenq zruj . finb myenb cvj kxvq , “ zx'q meib Eei tomb lwi pwij Jyenq kan Jyenq yia mivb a'q . ”
44012009	pi-te kan Jyenq finb myenb Zwrtq lob . ninb maiq hiuq tu'q finb myenb zruj Eei se zyen sig . laaig tu'q pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Navq .
44012010	ninb Bua Jiaj zuaq lob Eei pcv ta'yetq Kav , cvj Jiaj ta'Eeig Kav , cvj Jiaj Tauj tomb Lia'g kcvb , tovb Zwrtq mivb pia'g zivb uaq Kav kcvb . Tauj uaq , kcvb kanb Gxi , ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q . kan Jauq mivb tavb , finb myenb zyav naaig leib Gxi pi-te mig a'q .
44012011	uaq zang pi-te zyrug mevb pc'g naaiq teij sig se zyen Eei . ninb kxvq , “ ib zang yia za'kevb hiuq tivg zyruq Paaiq ninb Eei finb myenb taaib txb yia pyauj Dutq he-lotq Eei puab Diaq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb xij zruj hxig yia uaq teij yetg zuvq sig . ”
44012012	pi-te hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Ziv Eei , ninb zyrug mivb yo-han maa-Ko Eei maa , maa-li-yaa , Eei pyauq . maaib myenb Zamq Eei kapq zunq yem uaq tauj kauj .
44012013	pi-te mivb vcvq ka'Eiag uaq taub kcvb . maaib taub msia'q pru , Buaj heug lo-Daa , mivb mavg kaaj haiq taub taaib .
44012014	ninb zia'q tu'q pi-te Eei Qiaj zyrug a'Neiq haig cvj Tiuj pia'g pyauq , maiq Javj Kxi kcvb . ninb kxvq Buaj yem pyauq Eei myenb , “ pi-te zuvq Tauj uaq Dau kcvb Daavg taaib a'q lo'b ! ”
44012015	ninb Bua kxvq , “ meib maiq Rav Bx lxb . ” mq paag uaq taub sia'q Qa'q kxvq pi-te za'kevb Tauj a'q . ninb Bua kxvq , “ uaq Euvg mRiaj pi-te Eei finb myenb mq pei . ”
44012016	pi-te Zxg yem uaq vcvq kcvb . ninb Bua zyrug mivb Kxi kcvb pwatg pi-te sruq Jyenq uaq . ninb Bua za'kevb ! Bua'g hxvb haig .
44012017	pi-te Wavj puad Buaj ninb Bua maiq tuvq Ko lo . ninb zyrug kxvq zyruq Navq haiq nx Tevj ninb Zwrtq lob taaib . ninb cvj kxvq , “ naaiq teij Jauq meib Bua xij zu'g Buaj yaa-kxpg cvj Zauj yetg zuvq syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud . ” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , ninb zyrug mivb kanb nxm txvj mig a'q .
44012018	ta'Eeig Dxm zuaq lob Eei pcv lung Revg . maiq hiuq tu'q pi-te Jiaj haaij mig a'q .
44012019	he-lotq heug pcv kaanq lxd , ninb Bua zyrug haiq Dau lxd Revg yaag lxd maiq pwatg . he-lotq zyrug zaab naaig uaq teij pcv . zaab liud , txb mivb taij kwavg mig a'q . Ga'haaq he-lotq Zwrtq yu-Dia scvq mivb yem trug si-saa-li-yaa zivb .
44012020	he-lotq Qiaj Jiad haig Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn zivb Eei myenb . naaiq teij i nxm zivb Eei myenb zyrug tovb Hruq mivb lxd he-lotq . maiq kcvb lxd uaq zang , ninb Bua peig Diaq mivb Toq kruj huvb ting uaq taub tomb Jyen , Baa-laa-saa-Tatq , Tevj ninb Bua Zauj huvb tiaj Toq kxvq hxpg , weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei teib puv pavg he-lotq kunq uaq nxm teib puv Eei laavb zi'g yuvd pc'g fivj .
44012021	tunj Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj , he-lotq zxv Jyenq ninb Eei huvb lwib hruj faauj ting zweid Jyenq kxvq pun zwavj myenb mwavj .
44012022	zwavj myenb naub naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq , “ naaiq se yetg taub zyenb Eei Qiaj , maiq zeid paamb myenb kxvq Eei waag . ”
44012023	maaib taub zyruq Eei finb myenb lyemb zeib pun he-lotq putq kcv . kcv zyrug Eang ninb taig mig a'q , laaij ninb maiq Taaib Tinb huvb .
44012024	mq paag Tinb huvb Eei tod yetg zei zunb Javq Jyenq mivb .
44012025	Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Beng suv ninb Bua Eei kov , ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj yaag txb yo-han maa-Ko Zauj Jyenq Rwrnj .
44013001	yem an-Ti-okg Jiub paav maaib teij trug waag myenb Zauj teij Faauj leid Eei finb scv . maaib Baa-naa-Batg , maaib si-me-on , si-me-on cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug ni-ke , maaib sai-lin myenb , lu-si-atg , maaib maa-naa-en , ( maa-naa-en Zauj he-lotq huvb Jwavg pyauq Lo taaib ) , cvj maaib sau-lo .
44013002	ninb Bua paaij zyruq yaag zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg uaq zang , sivj livb Buaj ninb Bua , “ Paaiq Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo Zwrtq mivb weig zruj yia xij heug ninb Bua zruj Eei kov . ”
44013003	ninb Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag tauj kauj , cvj lovg puad maan liud Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo , zyrug Paaiq ninb Bua mivb mig a'q .
44013004	Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo zyrug ei sivj livb Paaiq mivb Tauj se-lu-Kia , yem uaq pia'g Ravq mivb sai-patg Kxib Rru .
44013005	ninb Bua mivb Tauj saa-laa-mitq muvq zyrug yem yiu-Tai myenb Eei nxmb nxm wig txvb zunb Tinb huvb Eei tod . yo-han maa-Ko yaag Zauj ninb Bua yem , Tevj ninb Bua .
44013006	Jiaj Jomg Kxib Rru , Tauj paa-fotq tomb zivb pwavb zu'g taub yiu-Tai myenb , Buaj heug Baa-ye-su . ninb zruj faatq yaag zruj Jaaq trug waag myenb .
44013007	Baa-ye-su Zauj kunq Kxib Rru uaq taub tomb Jyen , sej-Ji-atg pau-lo , yem . naaiq taub sej-Ji-atg pau-lo se kwai haig . ninb xij mwavj Tinb huvb Eei tod zyrug heug Baa-naa-Batg Zauj sau-lo taaib zunb pun ninb mwavj .
44013008	mq paag zruj faatq uaq taub e-li-maatq , laanb Jyenq , maiq xij pun scvb zyruq syenj . e-li-maatq uaq nxm Buaj kxvq penj kikg waag se zruj faatq Eei myenb .
44013009	sau-lo , tovb myenb yaag heug pau-lo uaq taub , tu'q sivj livb pwavq Hruq zyrug nu'g nu'q Eei mavg e-li-maatq .
44013010	ninb kxvq , “ myenq Eei txnb Jweiq aa'b ! haiq Euvg lovj Eei , meib txij uaq Euvg zruj winb wavq . Kuvj kxvb pc'g Duaq myenb Navq . meib maiq tivb Fiag zanb zang zruj pun zyruq Eei Jaub za'g penj Jaub Fwrtq fai ?
44013011	ib zang zyruq Eei puad Fiag Tauj meib , xij pun meib Eei mziv Buaq yetg Zaamj , mavg maiq pwatg luvb Nxi Eei Fav . ” e-li-maatq lyemb zeib haid Navq maaib mrug xmj Jyenq ninb Eei mziv mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei . ninb Lua naaiq Lua uaq lxd myenb Ken .
44013012	tomb Jyen pwatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq , ninb zyrug syenj a'q . ninb Bua'g hxvb haig zyruq Eei tod .
44013013	pau-lo Zauj ninb Eei txig yem paa-fotq pia'g Ravq mivb pam-fi-lia teib puv , pe-kaa zivb . yem uaq ninb Bua pun Gxi txig , yo-han maa-Ko Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
44013014	pau-lo Bua cvj yavb Jauq mivb Tauj pi-si-Dia teib puv Eei an-Ti-okg zivb . Tauj tivb kov Nxi ninb Bua pia'g wig txvb zweid Jyenq .
44013015	txb leib paaij Eei myenb to'g leib latg sru Zauj Tinb huvb Eei trug waag myenb Eei sru . to'g liud , wig txvb Eei kunq sig myenb Paaiq myenb mivb Buaj pau-lo Bua , “ kxb yrud aag , sij kxvq meib Bua maaib haiq Euvg waag xij Kwinj yia Bua , kunq kxvq og . ”
44013016	pau-lo zyrug sruq Jiad taaib Wavj puad kxvq , “ i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yetg zuvq zavg Tinb huvb Eei myenb aa'b ! mwavj maa'b !
44013017	i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb kinq Bua Eei ovb Taaij . ninb Bua yem Jyenq i-yipq teib puv uaq zang , Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua Yaavj , yaag lovg tomb Qa'q txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv ,
44013018	zyrug yem teib puv Waav Eyend Jyenq ninb Bua zruj Eei sig leib maiq ko feij zyepg Havj .
44013019	Tinb huvb myetg Revg yem Kaa-naa-an teib puv Eei siag fivj Janj , yaag zx'q uaq nxm teib puv pun ninb Eei pc'g fivj , i-saa-laa-en myenb Ripg .
44013020	naaiq teij Jaub lrug lovg zyavb hog leib maiq ko feij pc'q Mmd zyepg Havj . “ Ga'haaq Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua maaib Beng sig myenb kunq ninb Bua Tauj trug waag myenb , saa-mu-en , Eei seij zeiq .
44013021	naaiq teij myenb Toq saa-mu-en pun ninb Bua maaib huvb kunq ninb Bua . Tinb huvb zyrug pun Ben-yaa-min fivj , Kitq Eei txn , sau-lo , zruj huvb kunq feij zyepg Havj .
44013022	Tinb huvb Twij sau-lo Zwrtq mivb , Ga'haaq xn Daa-witq zruj ninb Bua Eei huvb . Tinb huvb kxvq Tauj Daa-witq . ninb kxvq , ‘ yia pwatg Jyetg-si Eei txn , Daa-witq , hxpg yia Eei Hruq haig . ninb yaag xij yem maang sig ei Jyenq yia Eei za'eij zruj . ’
44013023	“ Tinb huvb ei lcvd Eei waag pun taub Daa-witq Eei zeib fun , Buaj heug ye-su , Zwrtq taaib zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Fruj zyruq .
44013024	ye-su maiq kcvb Zwrtq taaib zunb tod uaq zang , yo-han zunb Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb ninb Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid , Jiaj uam Eei leid .
44013025	yo-han zruj ninb Eei kov aaq lamb zyavj , ninb Buaj zwavj myenb , ‘ meib Bua laaig yia tovb haiq taub ? yia maiq zeid meib Bua zuaq uaq taub og . yia taaib Daavg , ninb Ga'haaq taaib , yia lyemb maiq Pwij Tevj ninb Jaiq heb Laav . ’
44013026	“ zwavj kxb yrud , apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun Zauj yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj paaij Tinb huvb Eei myenb aa'b ! naaiq Fruj en Eei tod se zunb taaib pun Bua a'q .
44013027	yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj myenb Zauj zruj Lo Eei uaq teij maiq hiuq tu'q ye-su zruj Fruj zyruq . nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi ninb Bua mwavj myenb to'g zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru yaag maiq pia'g Hruq . mq paag ninb Bua tivg ye-su Eei zwid uaq zang , ninb Bua zruj zyavj txij Revg uaq teij trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag .
44013028	ninb Bua zaab maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg kxn zig tu'q taij ninb , mq paag ninb Bua Toq pi-laatq pun ninb zu'g taig .
44013029	ninb Bua ei kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq ye-su Eei yetg zuvq Jaub lrug zruj zyavj , zyrug zx'q ye-su Eei sei Fiag zyepg Ravg Jaaj taaib , zavj Jyenq zruq .
44013030	mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib .
44013031	ninb hing Zwrtq pun yem kaa-li-li kan ninb mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq teij myenb pwatg Zamb Nxi Eei . naaiq teij myenb ib zang zruj zxvb zevj pun i-saa-laa-en myenb mwavj .
44013032	“ yia Bua txb naaiq Kuq fyenj taaib Buaj meib Bua . zinb Daavg Tinb huvb lcvd pun Bua Eei ovb Taaij uaq teij waag ,
44013033	ib zang ninb weig Bua , ovb Taaij Eei zeib fun zruj zyavj , se tovb ninb pun ye-su cvj navb taaib . Navq fiaq Jyenq ta'Eeig tiub sivj Ruv kxvq nx , ‘ meib zruj yia Eei txn , ib Nxi yia penj meib Eei tia . ’ ‘ yia lcvd pun Daa-witq uaq teij Zivb Revg , Kauj tu'q wrnq Eei en , ‘ meib maiq pun meib Eei Zivb Revg pru Eei sei huq . ’
44013034	cvj maaib waag kxvq Tauj ye-su taig mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib , yetg liud maiq pun ninb Eei sei huq . Tinb huvb kxvq , ‘ yia lcvd pun Daa-witq uaq teij Zivb Revg , Kauj tu'q wrnq Eei en , yia xij Zeij pun meib Bua . ’
44013035	cvj maaib kanb nxm txvj kxvq , ‘ meib maiq pun meib Eei Zivb Revg pru Eei sei huq . ’
44013036	“ Daa-witq huvb Eei seij zeiq ei Tinb huvb Eei za'eij zruj zyavj , zyrug kwei seij mig a'q , yaag Zauj ninb Eei ovb Taaij zavj Jyenq . ninb Eei sei yaag huq mig a'q .
44013037	mq paag Tinb huvb pun navb taaib uaq taub Eei sei maiq huq .
44013038	“ yia Eei kxb yrud aa'b ! meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq tu'q , weig naaiq taub ye-su yia Bua Zivj tu'q zunb Buaj meib Bua , Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx kwavg myenb Eei zwid .
44013039	meib Bua yaag xij zu'g hiuq tu'q kan mo-se Eei leib latg maiq haib pun myenb leib Dutq zwid . mq paag haiq taub syenj Kauj ye-su , uaq taub leib Dutq yetg zuvq zwid .
44013040	faij fim og . Raub heij meib Bua haib zu'g trug waag myenb kxvq Eei waag . ninb Bua kxvq ,
44013041	‘ mavg maa'b ! meib Bua mavg Piaj myenb Eei myenb aa'b ! xij zu'g Bua'g hxvb yaag zu'g myetg , weig zu'g yem meib Bua Eei Nxib Eia'g yia zruj Zwrtq yetg Euvg sig . maiq kunq myenb kxvq Buaj meib Bua , meib Bua zuvq maiq syenj . ’ ”
44013042	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zwrtq wig txvb uaq zang , zwavj myenb Toq ninb Bua Tauj ta'Eeig nxm tivb kov Nxi cvj taaib kxvq naaiq teij waag pun ninb Bua mwavj .
44013043	zwavj myenb pun Raanj uaq zang , maaib yiu-Tai myenb Zauj kan yiu-Tai myenb syenj Eei Janj Zamq Eei kan pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg mivb . kovb zob Bua Zauj ninb Bua kxvq yaag Kwinj ninb Bua xij zu'g zanb zang Kauj wrnq Tinb huvb Eei en .
44013044	Tauj ta'Eeig nxm tivb kov Nxi zyavb muvq Eei myenb aaq lamb taub taub mivb kapq zunq mwavj Tinb huvb Eei tod .
44013045	mq paag yiu-Tai myenb pwatg myenb taaib tu'q Dovg naaig Zamq , ninb Bua zyrug hang haig , mivb Rcv pau-lo kxvq Eei waag , yaag kxvq to'g ninb .
44013046	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg zyrug puvj laavg Eei kxvq , “ yia Bua Dovg haaij xij zu'g taaib zunb Tinb huvb Eei waag pun meib Bua mwavj Daavg . mq paag meib Bua Gemb , maiq funj meib Bua kanb Pwij tu'q zipq yetg liud Eei mcvg , yia Bua zyrug kwavg meib Bua mivb zunb pun Janj mwavj .
44013047	weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq nx Paaiq yia Bua , ‘ yia pun meib zruj nxm Fav ziuj pun Janj , weig pun meib txb Fruj en mivb Tauj Jomg luvb Diaq . ’ ”
44013048	Janj haid naaiq teij waag zyrug a'Neiq haig , Zev zyruq Eei tod . Tinb huvb kinq taaib weig tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg uaq teij zyrug syenj ye-su a'q .
44013049	zyruq Eei tod zyrug siv pwavq uaq nxm teib puv .
44013050	mq paag yiu-Tai myenb Zo'g huq uaq nxm muvq zruj Lo Eei mJavg txn Zauj kan lovj Tinb huvb zavg tavq Eei msia'q txn zruj to'g pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg , yaag zung ninb Bua Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei teib Jaaij .
44013051	kovb zob Bua zyrug fevj kua'q zauj Eei niab Buv weig zruj Javb hog kwaij ninb Bua , Ga'haaq cvj mivb i-Ko-ni-yum zivb .
44013052	yem an-Ti-okg zivb Eei syenj ye-su Eei myenb Fyenb yrub haig yaag maaib sivj livb pwavq Revg ninb Bua Eei Hruq .
44014001	Tauj i-Ko-ni-yum zivb , pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Navq yetg kau nx , mivb yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb . ninb Bua zunb tod maaib eij leid haig zyrug maaib yiu-Tai myenb Zauj Janj syenj Zamq Eei .
44014002	mq paag maiq syenj uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb Zo'q Janj pun ninb Bua maaib Hruq xij zruj to'g uaq teij kxb yrud .
44014003	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg yem uaq laub Eei , puvj laavg Eei kxvq zyruq Eei tod . zyruq yaag pun ninb Bua zruj Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig Zamq Eei , pun Ziv ninb Bua zunb zyruq Zeij en Eei tod se zyen Eei .
44014004	zivb Eei zwavj myenb zyrug pun Gxi Revg . maaib teij kan yiu-Tai myenb , maaib teij kan kovb zob Bua .
44014005	uaq zang , maaib teij Janj Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Zauj ninb Bua zruj Lo Eei myenb Zaavb laavb zruj to'g pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg , xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov ninb Bua .
44014006	mq paag kovb zob Bua hiuq tu'q zyrug pyauj mivb li-Kaa-o-nia teig Eei li-saa-taa muvq Zauj De-Bi zivb Zauj Wiv Rwrnj uaq teij txvj ,
44014007	yem uaq zunb Kuq fyenj .
44014008	yem li-saa-taa muvq maaib laanb yemb Txi zauj waaig Eei myenb zweid Jyenq uaq , maiq yavb Jiaj Jauq .
44014009	ninb zweid Jyenq uaq mwavj pau-lo kxvq . pau-lo nu'g nu'q Eei mavg , pwatg ninb maaib syenj fim haib zxg tu'q zauj lovj ,
44014010	zyrug lovg Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq za'g Eei maa'b ! ” uaq laanb myenb zyrug lyemb zeib Gwa'q Jiad sin taaib yavb Jauq .
44014011	zwavj myenb pwatg , ninb Bua lovg li-Kaa-o-nia waag naub naug Eei heug , “ maaib zyenb Waaj penj myenb Eei sin Fiag Bua naaiq taaib a'q lo'b ! ”
44014012	Baa-naa-Batg ninb Bua Zwrtq Buaj heug sutq . pau-lo ninb Bua heug he-metq , weig zu'g ninb zunb tod kaub Zamq .
44014013	sutq zyenb Eei miub pyauq yem zivb ka'Eiag . sutq Eei sai myenb txb vovb kruq , txb pyavb taaib Tauj zivb kcvb xij Zauj zwavj myenb ziag pun pau-lo Bua .
44014014	Baa-naa-Batg Zauj pau-lo haid myenb kxvq ninb Bua xij Navq naaiq nx zruj , ninb Bua zyrug petq kanb Eei lwi , Tiuj pia'g zwavj myenb ka'Euad mivb , naub naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq ,
44014015	“ meib Bua weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq zruj lcb ? yia Bua yaag paamb myenb Navq meib Bua nx . yia Bua taaib zunb Kuq fyenj Buaj meib Bua kwavg Gxi naaiq teij henb sig cvj lxd zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb , tovb zeij luvb zeij Dau zeij Kxiq yaag zeij yem naaiq teij ka'Euad Eei maang mwrtg ka'naaiq uaq taub .
44014016	lob Nxi Tinb huvb pun maang fivj sweib ninb Bua kanb Eei Hruq zruj .
44014017	mq paag ninb haiq zang zruj lovj pun Bua , zruj zxvb zevj piuj mevb ninb zyavb Jyenq Eei . ninb pun luvb twib Byuvg , pun kcvb zwavj ei Zunb Zyru Zwrtq tu'q hxpg . ninb yaag pun meib Bua Eang peuq , Fyenb yrub haig . ”
44014018	kovb zob Bua kxvq naaiq teij waag tonq ninb Bua mq paag Kaaq teij kxvq maiq hivb . zwavj myenb Zxg xij txb ka'naaiq taaib ziag pun ninb Bua .
44014019	maaib teij yiu-Tai myenb yem an-Ti-okg Zauj i-Ko-ni-yum taaib Duaq zwavj myenb Zauj ninb Bua tovb Hruq lovg la'pyeiq zov pau-lo . zov liud , Tx Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb , laaig ninb taig mig a'q .
44014020	mq paag syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud taaib weib Jyenq ninb , ninb zyrug Jiad sin taaib cvj pia'g muvq . ta'Eeig Nxi ninb Zauj Baa-naa-Batg cvj mivb De-Bi zivb .
44014021	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg yem De-Bi zivb zunb Kuq fyenj zyrug tu'q myenb Zamq Eei taaib zruj saib kxj . Ga'haaq pau-lo Bua Rwrnj li-saa-taa muvq , i-Ko-ni-yum zivb Zauj pi-si-Dia teig Eei an-Ti-okg zivb ,
44014022	yem uaq teij txvj Tevj saib kxj Bua syenj wrnq yaag Kwinj ninb Bua haiq zang xij zu'g kan lovj syenj ye-su Eei Jauq , yaag Buaj ninb Bua , “ Bua xij zu'g tiaq Zamb Euvg Kruq naang Zivj taaib haib tu'q pia'g Tinb huvb Eei kua'q . ”
44014023	yem nxmb nxm Jiub paav ninb Bua xn myenb zruj myenb koj . ninb Bua tauj kauj , zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg zyrug zx'q naaiq teij myenb koj fuvj pun ninb Bua syenj Kauj uaq taub zyruq .
44014024	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg cvj Jiaj pi-si-Dia teib puv mivb Tauj pam-fi-lia .
44014025	yem uaq pe-kaa zivb zunb liud tod , ninb Bua zyrug Fiag Tauj atg-Taa-li-yaa muvq .
44014026	yem naaig pia'g Ravq Rwrnj si-lia teib puv , an-Ti-okg zivb mig a'q . naaiq nxm zivb se tovb zinb Daavg saib kxj Bua zx'q pau-lo Bua fuvj pun Tinb huvb ei ninb Eei en kruj , Tevj ninb Bua haib zruj Zwrtq ib zang zruj zyavj naaiq teij kov .
44014027	Rwrnj Tauj an-Ti-okg , pau-lo Bua heug zwavj Jiub paav kapq zunq . ninb Bua zyrug kxvq Tinb huvb Tevj ninb Bua zruj Eei Jaub lrug , yaag kxvq Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx Kxi Jauq pun Janj syenj ye-su .
44014028	ninb Bua yaag Zauj saib kxj Bua yem laub Eei .
44015001	maaib teij myenb yem yu-Dia scvq mivb Tauj an-Ti-okg zivb Faauj syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud . ninb Bua kxvq , “ sij kxvq meib Bua maiq ei Jyenq mo-se Eei leid Jiaj kaatq Eei leid nx , meib Bua maiq haib tu'q Fruj . ”
44015002	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zauj ninb Bua Fiag Qa'q Rcvb vcvg lwrnj leid . Jiub paav zyrug tivg Paaiq pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zauj teij kxb yrud mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb lxd kovb zob Zauj myenb koj Bua Zaavb laavb naaiq teij sig .
44015003	Jiub paav zyrug fuvj ninb Bua Zwrtq Jauq mivb . ninb Bua Jiaj fi-ni-sia Zauj saa-maa-lia scvq , Tauj haaij kxvq Buaj myenb Janj Navq haiq nx kxiq Hruq syenj ye-su . zwavj kxb yrud haid naaiq teij fyenj ninb Bua za'kevb a'Neiq haig .
44015004	mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb uaq zang , Jiub paav myenb , kovb zob Bua , Zauj myenb koj Bua a'Neiq zipq . pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg yaag kxvq Revg Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx lovg ninb Bua zruj ninb Eei kov .
44015005	mq paag maaib teij faa-li-sij uaq Jauq syenj ye-su Eei myenb sruq Jiad taaib kxvq , “ Dovg haaij xij zu'g heug Janj Jiaj kaatq Eei leid yaag hatg ninb Bua ei Revg mo-se Eei leib latg . ”
44015006	kovb zob Zauj myenb koj yetg zuvq kapq zunq Zaavb laavb naaiq teij sig .
44015007	ninb Bua lwrnj leid laub Eei , pi-te zyrug sruq Jiad taaib kxvq , “ kxb yrud aa'b ! meib Bua hiuq tu'q zinb Daavg Tinb huvb yem meib Bua ka'Euad kinq yia Zwrtq mivb zunb Kuq fyenj pun Janj mwavj yaag syenj .
44015008	Tinb huvb hiuq tu'q maang myenb Eei Hruq yaag pun Ziv ninb a'Neiq Janj , weig zu'g ninb Zeij sivj livb pun ninb Bua Navq Zeij pun Bua nx .
44015009	yiu-Tai myenb fai Janj Tinb huvb maiq funj kanb Euvg . weig ninb Bua syenj , Tinb huvb Raauj ninb Bua Eei Hruq Zivb Revg .
44015010	uaq Euvg , meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij seij Tinb huvb ? xij zx'q Niaq Eei ka'naaiq pun naaiq teij saib kxj Eiaj , tovb Bua kanb Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij zuvq Eiaj maiq tovd Eei ka'naaiq .
44015011	maiq zeid Navq naaig lx'g . Bua syenj Bua tu'q Fruj se weig zyruq ye-su Eei en Navq ninb Bua nx . ”
44015012	zwavj myenb sekg sekq Eei mwavj Baa-naa-Batg Zauj pau-lo kxvq Tinb huvb lovg ninb Bua yem Janj ka'Euad zruj Eei Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig .
44015013	kxvq setq , yaa-kxpg cvj kxvq , “ kxb yrud aag , mwavj yia kxvq og .
44015014	si-mon Zo'q ho'g kxvq liud Tinb huvb lxd Janj taaub Rung , kinq Zwrtq teij taaib zruj ninb Eei myenb .
44015015	naaiq za'kevb txij zu'g trug waag myenb Eei waag Navq fiaq Jyenq kxvq nx ,
44015016	‘ Ga'haaq yia xij Rwrnj taaib , xij lyepg Jiad Daa-witq Eei pyaub Baav , cvj lovg lob pyauq Eei ka'naaiq kanb syavb Zeij Jiad .
44015017	Navq naaig se weig pun Eiag Eei myenb xij taaib lxd zyruq , tovb yia heug taaib zruj yia Eei myenb uaq teij maang fivj Janj .
44015018	lob Nxi pun myenb hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig xij Zwrtq taaib uaq taub zyruq kxvq naaiq teij waag . ’ ”
44015019	yaa-kxpg cvj kxvq , “ ziuj yia mavg , Bua maiq hxpg zu'g zruj haiq Euvg pun Win taaib lxd Tinb huvb uaq teij Janj haid a'g haig .
44015020	mq paag Bua xij zu'g fiaq fyenj Buaj ninb Bua keg , maiq tuvq Eang ziag Jiaj miub favj zyrug maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq , maiq tuvq zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg Eei sig , maiq tuvq Eang nc'g Jaav taig Eei scvb Kuq xq , yaag maiq tuvq Eang Ryaamq .
44015021	weig zu'g lob Nxi Tauj ib zang yem nxmb nxm zivb maaib myenb zunb mo-se Eei leid . nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi maaib myenb yem wig txvb to'g ninb Eei leib latg sru . ”
44015022	uaq zang kovb zob Zauj myenb koj Zauj zwavj Jiub paav myenb Zaavb laavb hxpg kinq teij myenb Paaiq kan pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg mivb an-Ti-okg zivb . ninb Bua kinq Eei myenb maaib laanb heug yu-Daatg , cvj maaib nxm Buaj heug Baa-sapq-Baatg . maaib laanb heug si-laa . naaiq teij i laanb yem kxb yrud Bu'Dovj zruj pyeiq zeiq Eei myenb .
44015023	kovb zob Zauj myenb koj zyrug fiaq fyenj pun ninb Bua txb Jyenq mivb . fyenj kxvq ,
44015024	yia Bua haid myenb kxvq maaib teij yem yia Bua naaiq Eei myenb mivb meib Bua naaig zunb tod Zo'q meib Bua Eei Hruq lung Revg . mq paag maiq zeid yia Bua Paaiq ninb Bua mivb og .
44015025	yia Bua zyrug tovb Hruq kinq teij myenb taaib Paaiq ninb Bua mivb meib Bua naaig Zauj Jyenq yia Bua Namq Eei txig , Baa-naa-Batg Zauj pau-lo .
44015026	naaiq teij i laanb weig zyruq ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj maiq funj mcvg Eei zruj .
44015027	Navq naaig , yia Bua Paaiq yu-Daatg Zauj si-laa mivb Zauj meib Bua txij Myen kxvq mevb naaiq zeiq fyenj Eei sig .
44015028	sivj livb Zauj yia Bua fib Navq Eei maiq xij Tipq haiq Euvg Jaa pun meib Bua Niaq , Zwrtq liud ib zang fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij Navq .
44015029	meib Bua xij zu'g keg maiq tuvq Eang ziag Jiaj miub favj Eei ka'naaiq . maiq tuvq Eang Ryaamq , maiq tuvq Eang nc'g Jaav taig Eei scvb Kuq xq , yaag maiq tuvq zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg Eei sig . sij kxvq meib Bua keg Jyenq naaiq pua'q ka'naaiq zyrug lovj a'q . pcvb xn Eei yem og . ”
44015030	syenj ye-su Eei kxb yrud zyrug fuvj naaiq teij myenb Zwrtq Jauq mivb an-Ti-okg zivb . Tauj uaq ninb Bua heug Jiub paav myenb kapq zunq zyrug zx'q uaq zeiq fyenj pun ninb Bua .
44015031	to'g txv naaiq zeiq fyenj , haid fyenj xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq , taub taub zyrug a'Neiq haig a'q .
44015032	yu-Daatg Zauj si-laa zruj trug waag myenb yaag kxvq Zamq Eei Kwinj kxb yrud Bua , xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq , Tevj ninb Bua kaub syenj tu'q henq .
44015033	yem yetg Zaamj uaq , kxb yrud Bua zyrug fuvj ninb Bua pcvb xn Eei Zwrtq Jauq Rwrnj Tauj Paaiq ninb Bua taaib uaq teij .
44015034	mq paag si-laa tivg Hruq yem uaq .
44015035	pau-lo Zauj Baa-naa-Batg Zxg yem an-Ti-okg zivb . ninb Bua Zauj myenb Zamq Eei Faauj yaag zunb zyruq Eei tod .
44015036	Ga'haaq Zamb Nxi teij Eei , pau-lo kxvq Buaj Baa-naa-Batg , “ Bua xij zu'g Rwrnj mivb mavg kaaj , tovb Bua mivb zunb Jiaj zyruq Eei tod Eei nxmb nxm muvq uaq teij kxb yrud Navq haiq nx x'g ? ”
44015037	Baa-naa-Batg yaag xij txb yo-han maa-Ko Zauj Jyenq mivb .
44015038	mq paag pau-lo haid maiq hxpg zu'g txb , weig zu'g zinb Daavg uaq Rung , Tauj pam-fi-lia , yo-han maa-Ko kwavg ninb Bua , maiq Zauj ninb Bua zruj kov .
44015039	ninb Bua i taub fiub Zovj liud , zyrug pun Gxi txig mig a'q . Baa-naa-Batg txb Jyenq maa-Ko pia'g Ravq mivb sai-patg Kxib Rru .
44015040	mq paag pau-lo kinq si-laa Zauj ninb mivb . syenj ye-su Eei zwavj myenb zyrug zx'q ninb Bua i laanb fuvj pun zyruq ei ninb Eei en kruj .
44015041	Zwrtq Jauq mivb , ninb Jiaj si-lia Zauj si-li-sia scvq Tevj zwavj Jiub paav kaub syenj tu'q wrnq .
44016001	pau-lo cvj mivb De-Bi zivb Zauj li-saa-taa muvq . li-saa-taa muvq maaib taub saib kxj , Buaj heug Ti-mo-Tai . ninb Eei maa se yiu-Tai myenb yaag syenj ye-su Eei . mq paag ninb Eei tia penj Janb kikg .
44016002	li-saa-taa Zauj i-Ko-ni-yum Eei kxb yrud yaag Zev Ti-mo-Tai .
44016003	pau-lo xij txb Ti-mo-Tai kan ninb mivb zyrug Tevj ninb Jiaj kaatq Eei leid , weig zu'g uaq nxm teib puv Eei zwavj yiu-Tai myenb hiuq tu'q Ti-mo-Tai Eei tia zruj Janb kikg .
44016004	pau-lo Bua zweib muvq yrub Jyenq mivb . mivb Tauj haaij yaag zx'q kovb zob Zauj myenb koj yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb tivg taaib Eei leid Jiu pun myenb ei Jyenq zruj .
44016005	weig naaiq zwavj Jiub paav zyrug kaub syenj tu'q henq . Nxib Nxi maaib myenb Tim pia'g Zamq Jyenq faauj .
44016006	sivj livb maiq pun pau-lo yem e-sia scvq zunb tod . ninb Bua zyrug Jiaj faa-li-Jia Zauj kaa-laa-Tia teib puv .
44016007	Tauj mi-sia teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij ka'Len ninb Bua xij pia'g Bi-Ti-nia , mq paag ye-su Eei sivj livb maiq pun ninb Bua pia'g .
44016008	ninb Bua zyrug Jiaj mi-sia teib puv mivb Tauj to-atg .
44016009	mivb Tauj uaq mwrnd , pau-lo pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig . ninb pwatg taub maa-si-Do-nia myenb sruq Jyenq Qa'q Toq , “ Toq Jiaj Tauj naaiq maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Tevj yia Bua maa'b ! ”
44016010	pau-lo pwatg liud hing yaavb Eei sig , yia Bua zyrug lyemb zeib liug leid mivb maa-si-Do-nia , weig zu'g yia Bua funj tivg Tinb huvb za'kevb heug yia Bua mivb zunb Kuq fyenj pun uaq teij myenb mwavj .
44016011	yia Bua zyrug yem to-atg pia'g Ravq , pcv za'g mivb Tauj saaj-mo-Tatq Kxib Rru . ta'Eeig Nxi mivb Tauj ne-aa-Bu-li muvq .
44016012	yem naaig yia Bua Zwrtq Ravq yavb Jauq mivb fi-lipq-Pxi zivb . fi-lipq-Pxi se maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Eei yetg nxm tomb zivb , se lo-maa kua'q lyepg taaib Eei zivb . yia Bua zyrug yem ziaj Nxi uaq .
44016013	Tauj tivb kov Nxi yia Bua Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb mivb uaq Daaib Len , Namq taaib maaib nxm txvj kapq zunq tauj kauj . yia Bua lxd pwatg zyrug zweid Fiag Zauj kapq zunq taaib uaq teij msia'q txn kxvq waag .
44016014	maaib taub Ti-yaa-Ti-laa zivb Eei msia'q txn , Buaj heug li-Dia . ninb Eei kov se maaig setq lua'g Eei Diab zu'q . li-Dia se zavg Tinb huvb Eei myenb . zyruq yaag pun ninb Eei Hruq Gxi , Namq tu'q Tov pau-lo kxvq Eei waag .
44016015	ninb Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov Mwavq txig yetg zuvq zyrug Jiaj uam Eei leid . Ga'haaq ninb heug yia Bua mivb hitq ninb Eei pyauq . ninb kxvq , “ sij kxvq meib Bua funj yia za'kevb syenj zyruq nx , Toq meib Bua taaib hitq yia Eei pyauq og . ” ninb Qa'q lyrub yia Bua , yia Bua Namq maiq Jiaj eij , zyrug mivb hitq ninb Eei pyauq .
44016016	maaib Nxi yia Bua mivb myenb kapq zunq tauj kauj Eei txvj . mivb kau , maaib taub nrub peid taaib pwavb zu'g yia Bua . naaiq taub nrub peid maaib myenq yem ninb Eei sin , pun ninb haib kxvq zinb hod Eei sig zyrug Tevj myenb mavg mcvg , pun ninb Eei zyruq tu'q Eaanb Zamq .
44016017	naaiq taub nrub peid kan Jyenq pau-lo Zauj yia Bua mivb heug Jyenq kxvq , “ naaiq teij myenb se yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei pru . ninb Bua zunb tu'q Fruj Eei Jauq pun meib Bua mwavj . ”
44016018	ninb Navq naaiq nx zruj Zamb Nxi a'q . zruj kau , pau-lo haid Hruq maiq lovj yetg teij zyrug Win Rwrnj kxvq Buaj uaq taub myenq , “ yia tevq ye-su ki-tug Eei Buaj hatg meib yem naaiq taub myenb Eei sin Zwrtq mivb maa'b ! ” myenq zyrug lyemb zeib Zwrtq mig a'q .
44016019	naaiq taub nrub peid Eei zyruq zia'q tu'q ninb Bua tu'q Eaanb Eei Jauq maiq lamb Namq a'q , ninb Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq pau-lo Zauj si-laa , Tx mivb tomb zwavj zaamg , zruj Lo uaq teij Eei Ra'Myen .
44016020	yem lo-maa Jyen Eei Ra'Myen ninb Bua koj kxvq , “ naaiq teij myenb se yiu-Tai myenb . ninb Bua zruj pun yia Bua Eei zivb lung Revg .
44016021	ninb Bua Faauj Eei leid se txvg yia Bua lo-maa myenb Eei leid . yia Bua maiq haib lovg , maiq haib kan ninb Bua Eei leid . ”
44016022	zwavj myenb Tevj Jyenq zruj to'g pun pau-lo Zauj si-laa . uaq teij Jyen zyrug heug pcv Ziaq pau-lo Bua Eei lwib hruj kwavg , lovg pyaaq Bx'q ninb Bua .
44016023	pcv zyrug Bx'q tu'q ninb Bua syav haig , Ga'haaq cvj txb ninb Bua mivb wrnj Jyenq lob , yaag Buaj kunq lob Eei Jyen lovb lovj zuaq Jyenq ninb Bua .
44016024	kunq lob Jyen tu'q tomb Jyen Eei waag zyrug zx'q pau-lo Bua wrnj Jyenq ka'Euad uaq Qovj lob , cvj zx'q Dyavj kapg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei zauj .
44016025	Daamq mwrnd Eei zyavb hog , pau-lo Zauj si-laa tauj kauj yaag paauj Ruv Zev Tinb huvb . yem lob Eei zwib myenb yetg zuvq yaag mwavj ninb Bua .
44016026	lyemb zeib Dau tovd tu'q seij haig , Dang Tauj lob Eei kxnb Do'q . taub taub lob kcvb Gxi Revg . zwavj zwib myenb Eei limg yaag Dutq Revg mig a'q .
44016027	kunq lob Jyen Eia taaib pwatg lob kcvb Gxi Revg , laaig tu'q zwib myenb pyauj Revg a'q mq pei . ninb zyrug pcv Zwrtq ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq xij taij ninb kanb a'q .
44016028	mq paag pau-lo Wrn nxm Kaatq , “ Weiq ! maiq tuvq hxig meib kanb . yia Bua yetg zuvq yem naaiq Eei . ”
44016029	kunq lob Jyen heug myenb lxd tav taaib ziuj Jyenq Tiuj pia'g pau-lo Bua uaq , Baapq Fiag pau-lo Zauj si-laa Eei Ra'Myen , sin zinj Eanb Eanb Eei .
44016030	ninb txb pau-lo Bua Zwrtq taaib naaig kaaj ninb Bua , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj Zivj haib tu'q Fruj ? ”
44016031	pau-lo Bua tau , “ xij zu'g syenj Kauj zyruq ye-su , meib Zauj meib Eei yetg pyauq myenb zyrug tu'q Fruj . ”
44016032	pau-lo Bua zyrug kxvq zyruq Eei tod pun ninb Zauj ninb Eei yetg pyauq myenb mwavj .
44016033	tovb naaig mwrnd , uaq nxm zyavb hog , kunq lob Jyen txb pau-lo Bua mivb Raauj Revg zu'g Bx'q mun Eei txvj . Raauj liud , kunq lob Jyen Zauj yetg pyauq myenb lyemb zeib Jiaj uam Eei leid a'q .
44016034	Jiaj liud leid , kunq lob Jyen cvj txb pau-lo Zauj si-laa pia'g ninb Eei pyauq Beng Naavj pun ninb Bua Eang . kunq lob Jyen Zauj ninb Eei Mwavq txig za'kevb Fyenb yrub haig , weig zu'g ninb Bua ib zang syenj Tinb huvb mig a'q .
44016035	luvb Fav , lo-maa tomb Jyen Paaiq sinb Len pcv mivb kunq lob Jyen uaq Buaj ninb , “ puvj uaq teij i laanb myenb a'q . ”
44016036	kunq lob Jyen zyrug Buaj pau-lo , “ tomb Jyen heug yia puvj meib Zauj si-laa Zwrtq lob . meib Bua ib zang kunq pcvb xn Eei mivb a'q . ”
44016037	mq paag pau-lo kxvq Buaj uaq teij sinb Len pcv , “ yia Bua yaag lo-maa Eei pc'g fivj . ninb Bua zuvq maiq tivg yia Bua Eei zwid Daavg , la'kwaib txv zwavj Bx'q yia Bua . Zxg cvj txb yia Bua mivb wrnj Jyenq lob . ib zang ninb Bua xij pivj Jyenq puvj yia Bua . Navq naaig se maiq hxpg . uaq teij tomb Jyen kanb xij zu'g taaib puvj yia Bua Zwrtq . ”
44016038	pcv zyrug zyav naaiq teij waag mivb kxvq pun tomb Jyen mwavj . tomb Jyen hiuq tu'q pau-lo Zauj si-laa se lo-maa myenb , ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj haig .
44016039	tomb Jyen zyrug mivb Toq zwid pau-lo Bua , cvj fuvj ninb Bua Zwrtq lob yaag Toq ninb Bua Zwrtq zivb a'q .
44016040	pau-lo Zauj si-laa Zwrtq lob taaib mivb li-Dia Eei pyauq . yem uaq ninb Bua pwavb kxb yrud , kxvq waag nund liud ninb Bua Eei Hruq , zyrug mivb mig a'q .
44017001	pau-lo Zauj si-laa Jiaj am-fi-Bu-li muvq Zauj aa-px-lo-nia muvq taaib Tauj Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa zivb . yem uaq maaib nxm yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb .
44017002	pau-lo Navq yetg kau nx , mivb uaq nxm wig txvb . ninb linb Jyenq pua nxm tivb kov Nxi lovg kivb sru Zauj myenb lwrnj leid .
44017003	pau-lo kxvq mevb kivb sru pun ninb Bua hiuq tivg ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq Tauj taig cvj navb taaib . pau-lo yaag kxvq , “ tovb yia zunb Buaj meib Bua naaiq taub ye-su se tovb ki-tug . ”
44017004	maaib teij uaq teij myenb mwavj liud yaag syenj zyrug Zauj pau-lo Zauj si-laa Jwavg Jauq . cvj maaib zavg Tinb huvb Eei Janb kikg Zamq Zauj maaib mevb hog Eei msia'q txn Zamq Eei yaag kan ninb Bua .
44017005	mq paag yiu-Tai myenb hang pau-lo Bua . ninb Bua zyrug mivb uaq heib hxvg lxd mevb taub waaig , Hruq maiq penj Eei myenb , kapq zunq txig zruj yetg kwanb Zeuj yetg zivb myenb lung Revg . ninb Bua yaag pxvd pia'g yaa-sonj Eei pyauq , xij zx'q pau-lo Zauj si-laa txb Zwrtq pun zwavj myenb .
44017006	lxd kau pau-lo Bua maiq pwatg , ninb Bua zyrug zx'q yaa-sonj cvj Zauj i ziaj laanb syenj ye-su Eei myenb Tx mivb uaq nxm zivb Eei kunq sig Jyen , yaag heug Jyenq kxvq , “ faanq luvb Diaq naaiq teij myenb ib zang faanq Tauj naaiq taaib a'q .
44017007	yaa-sonj yaag zipq ninb Bua yem ninb Eei pyauq . ninb Bua yetg zuvq yaag vcvg Jyenq si-saa huvb Eei livg . ninb Bua kxvq cvj maaib kanb taub huvb , Buaj heug ye-su . ”
44017008	zwavj pc'g fivj Zauj kunq zivb Eei Jyen haid naaiq teij waag , yetg zuvq zyrug lung Revg .
44017009	uaq teij Jyen aapq yaa-sonj Bua an Jyenq Dapg xnj Eaanb zyrug puvj ninb Bua Rwrnj .
44017010	tovb naaig Nxi Mwavj , kxb yrud Bua fuvj pau-lo Zauj si-laa Zwrtq Jauq mivb Be-lo-aa zivb . Tauj uaq nxm zivb , pau-lo Bua mivb yiu-Tai myenb Eei wig txvb .
44017011	naaiq teij yiu-Tai myenb kaub Namq tu'q Gxi uaq teij Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa myenb , weig zu'g ninb Bua Jxm Hruq Eei mwavj tod , Nxib Nxi zaab kivb sru mavg kaaj pau-lo Eei waag txij fai maiq txij .
44017012	maaib myenb Zamq Eei syenj ye-su . maaib mevb hog Eei Janb kikg msia'q txn syenj Zamq . cvj maaib Janb kikg mJavg txn yaag syenj Zamq .
44017013	mq paag yem Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa Eei yiu-Tai myenb hiuq tu'q pau-lo yem Be-lo-aa zivb zunb tod , ninb Bua cvj kan Gaav mivb Zo'q uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb lung Revg .
