44017014	syenj ye-su Eei myenb lyemb zeib fuvj pau-lo mivb uaq Kxib Len , mq paag si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai Zxg yem uaq Be-lo-aa zivb .
44017015	fuvj pau-lo uaq teij myenb fuvj ninb mivb Tauj aa-Ten zivb zyrug taauj Gaav Rwrnj . pau-lo Jaa waag Buaj si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai kaanq taaib Zauj ninb kapq txig .
44017016	pau-lo yem aa-Ten zivb zuaq si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai uaq zang , pwatg uaq nxm zivb maaib miub favj pwavq Revg , haid Hruq mun haig , Raub haig .
44017017	ninb zyrug yem uaq wig txvb Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Zauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei Janb kikg lwrnj leid . ninb Bua yaag Nxib Nxi yem tomb zwavj zaamg Zauj mivb uaq Ryaaug Eei myenb lwrnj leid .
44017018	maaib kwanb e-pi-Ku-lyen finb scv Zauj kwanb saa-to-ikg finb scv taaib Zauj pau-lo puvj leid . maaib teij kxvq , “ eq ! naaiq laanb myenb la'kwaib kxvq naaiq teij henb waag zruj haiq Euvg lcb ? ” cvj maaib teij kxvq , “ haid Navq ninb txb kanb fivj myenb Eei zyenb taaib kxvq Navq . ” ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g pau-lo zunb kxvq Tauj ye-su yaag kxvq ninb navb taaib Eei Kuq fyenj .
44017019	ninb Bua zyrug txb pau-lo mivb aa-le-o-paa-katg , tovb uaq nxm zivb Eei kunq sig wig , kxvq Buaj ninb , “ yia Bua xij hiuq tu'q meib kxvq naaiq teij syavb Faauj Eei waag .
44017020	meib kxvq Eei sig maaib teij yia Bua haid kanb Euvg haig , xij hiuq tu'q eij leid Navq haiq nx . ”
44017021	ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g aa-Ten pwrnb zivb Eei myenb Zauj taaib yem Jyenq uaq teij kanb fivj myenb maiq lovg ninb Bua Eei zyavb hog zruj haiq Euvg . Kuvj xij kxvq , xij mwavj syavb leid Navq .
44017022	pau-lo zyrug yem aa-le-o-paa-katg Eei wig Bu'Dovj sruq Jiad taaib kxvq , “ aa-Ten Eei zwavj myenb aa'b ! ei yia pwatg , meib Bua yem maang sig se fyru zyenb kevj sivj Eei myenb .
44017023	yia mivb saau , samj mavg meib Bua zavg Eei ka'naaiq , zyrug pwatg nxm ziab txvb Divb Jyenq Ravg kxvq , ‘ weig maiq hiuq tu'q uaq taub zyenb Eei ziab txvb . ’ tovb meib Bua zavg Jyenq mq paag maiq hiuq uaq taub zyenb , yia ib zang zunb Buaj meib Bua .
44017024	“ Tinb huvb , tovb zeij paamb ken Zauj yem paamb ken Eei maang mwrtg uaq taub , zruj luvb Zauj Dau Eei zyruq . ninb maiq yem paamb myenb zruj taaib Eei ting .
44017025	ninb yaag maiq lovg paamb myenb Eei puad fub suj ninb Navq ninb Qyemj zu'g haiq Euvg nx . taauj Rwrnj ninb kanb pun Bua maaib mcvg , maaib Qiaj Tauq , yaag Zeij maang mwrtg pun maang myenb .
44017026	Tinb huvb lovg yetg laanb myenb zruj pwrnq zeij Zwrtq maang fivj pun yem pwavq luvb Diaq . ninb Jaab Daavg tivg zyavj zyavb hog Zauj ninb Bua yem Eei kapg Jaaij .
44017027	Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx zruj weig pun paamb myenb lxd ninb , Riaj haib Lua tu'q zu'g ninb mq pei . mq paag Tinb huvb za'kevb leib Bua taub taub maiq ko .
44017028	maaib taub myenb kxvq , ‘ Bua yem ninb zyavb Jyenq , haib navb , haib mivb mivb taaib taaib . ’ yaag Navq maaib teij meib Bua Eei myenb Tib fei kxvq , ‘ Bua yaag zruj ninb Eei naamb Erud . ’
44017029	“ Navq naaig Bua zruj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud , Bua maiq hxpg zu'g Namq Tinb huvb Eei fyemb fivj se Navq za'eij lovj , maaib puab taub Eei myenb lovg Jyem , lovg Eaanb fai lovg la'pyeiq zruj taaib Eei miub favj .
44017030	zinb Daavg myenb maiq hiuq Eei zyavb hog , Tinb huvb maiq zx'q ninb Bua Eei zwid . mq paag ib zang Tinb huvb hatg yetg zuvq luvb Diaq nxmb nxm txvj Eei myenb xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid .
44017031	weig zu'g Tinb huvb tivg zyavj Nxi syemq luvb Diaq myenb Eei zwid . ninb yaag lovg ninb kinq taaib Eei myenb pcvb fim Eei syemq . naaiq taub myenb taig mivb mq paag Tinb huvb pun ninb navb taaib pun zwavj myenb hiuq tivg naaiq teij sig . ”
44017032	yetq haid pau-lo kxvq Tauj myenb taig cvj navb taaib Eei sig , maaib teij myenb Jyetq ninb mq paag maaib teij kxvq , “ yia Bua cvj xij mwavj meib kxvq Rung naaiq teij sig . ”
44017033	pau-lo zyrug Zwrtq wig mig a'q .
44017034	maaib teij myenb kan pau-lo mivb yaag syenj ye-su . maaib taub se aa-le-o-paa-katg kunq sig wig Eei myenb , Buaj heug Di-o-ni-si-atg . cvj maaib taub msia'q txn , Buaj heug Daa-maa-litq , Zauj Jyenq Zamb laanb myenb syenj .
44018001	Ga'haaq pau-lo Zwrtq aa-Ten zivb cvj mivb Ko-lin-To zivb .
44018002	yem uaq ninb pwavb zu'g taub yiu-Tai myenb , Buaj heug aa-Kwin-laa , yem pxn-Tatq teib puv Zwrtq seij Eei myenb . ninb Zauj ninb Eei auq , pitg-sinj-laa , yem i-taa-li kua'q Ko'q ho'g pyauj taaib yem Ko-lin-To zivb , weig zu'g Kaa-laau-Di-atg huvb hatg yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb Zwrtq lo-maa zivb . pau-lo mivb lxd ninb Bua
44018003	cvj Zauj ninb Bua yem Jwavg kov zruj weig zu'g pau-lo Navq uaq teij i Mwavq nx , zruj Dopg liub Eei zavg .
44018004	nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi , pau-lo mivb uaq wig txvb Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Zauj Janb kikg lwrnj leid Kwinj ninb Bua syenj .
44018005	si-laa Zauj Ti-mo-Tai yem maa-si-Do-nia teib puv taaib Tauj , pau-lo kuq Jyenq lovg ninb Eei zyavb hog zunb tod Navq , kxvq mevb Buaj yiu-Tai myenb ye-su se tovb ki-tug .
44018006	yiu-Tai myenb Zauj ninb txib tekg , kxvq to'g ninb uaq zang , pau-lo zyrug sru ninb Eei lwib hruj Eei niab Buv yaag kxvq , “ meib Bua zu'g taig Eei zwid meib Bua kanb xij zu'g Daamb txv . zwid maiq Dxtq zu'g yia a'q . yavb naaiq Jiaj yia mivb lxd Janj . ”
44018007	pau-lo Zwrtq uaq nxm wig txvb mivb , yem taub zavg Tinb huvb Eei Janj Eei pyauq . naaiq taub Janj Eei Buaj heug Ti-Ti-atg-yu-saa-Tatq . ninb yem wig txvb Eei ka'Len .
44018008	kruj wig txvb Eei myenb koj uaq taub Kaa-litq-patg Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb syenj zyruq Revg . cvj maaib Ko-lin-To zivb Eei myenb Zamq Eei haid liud tod zyrug syenj cvj Jiaj uam Eei leid .
44018009	maaib mwrnd nx , pau-lo pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig . zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb , “ meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj og . kunq kxvq Jyenq mivb , maiq tuvq tivb ,
44018010	weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem . zuvq maiq maaib haiq taub zruj haiq Euvg hxig meib , weig zu'g yem naaiq nxm zivb maaib yia Eei myenb Zamq Eei . ”
44018011	pau-lo zyrug yem Havb pyenj uaq , zx'q Tinb huvb Eei tod Faauj ninb Bua .
44018012	kan-li-o zruj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq Eei zuvj uaq zang , yiu-Tai myenb tovb Hruq mivb zx'q pau-lo txb mivb uaq sig txvb .
44018013	ninb Bua koj ninb kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb Faauj myenb zavg Tinb huvb mq paag Faauj ninb Bua zavg txvg leid . ”
44018014	pau-lo xij kxvq waag uaq zang , kan-li-o zyrug kxvq Daavg Buaj yiu-Tai myenb , “ sij kxvq ninb zruj waaig fai zruj haiq Euvg x'q Eei sig , yia hxpg zu'g lovg nxig mwavj .
44018015	mq paag meib Bua Rcv Einb tauj Erud , Rcv Buaj , Rcv meib Bua kanb Eei leid . sweib meib Bua kanb Beng a'q . yia maiq xij Tevj meib Bua Paaiq naaiq teij sig . ”
44018016	kxvq liud , kan-li-o zyrug zung ninb Bua Zwrtq sig txvb mig a'q .
44018017	Zwrtq mivb ninb Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq kruj wig txvb Eei myenb koj , soj-saa-Te-netq , yem uaq sig txvb Eei kcvb Daavg Bx'q . mq paag kan-li-o maiq kunq ninb Bua a'q .
44018018	pau-lo cvj yem Ko-lin-To zivb Zamb Nxi teij Eei . Ga'haaq ninb Zauj syenj ye-su Eei kxb muag kxvq liud leib Yaav waag , pau-lo Zauj Jyenq pitg-sinj-laa Zauj aa-Kwin-laa pia'g Ravq mivb si-lia teib puv . yem Ken-Ke-lia uaq zang , pau-lo Teij Revg Ba'pyei weig zu'g ninb Zauj Tinb huvb lcvd vcvg waag .
44018019	Tauj e-fe-so zivb , pau-lo Zauj pitg-sinj-laa , aa-Kwin-laa Bua i Mwavq pun Gxi txig . pau-lo pia'g wig txvb mivb Zauj yiu-Tai myenb lwrnj leid .
44018020	zwavj myenb lyrub ninb yem uaq kaub laub teij mq paag ninb maiq lcvd .
44018021	ninb mivb uaq zang , ninb kxvq , “ sij kxvq ei Tinb huvb Eei za'eij yia cvj taaib Rung meib Bua naaiq . ” ninb zyrug pia'g Ravq Zwrtq e-fe-so zivb a'q .
44018022	Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb , ninb Zwrtq Ravq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem . pwavb liud Jiub paav txig ninb cvj mivb an-Ti-okg zivb .
44018023	yem Zaamj uaq , ninb cvj mivb yrub kaa-laa-Tia Zauj faa-li-Jia teib puv Tevj syenj ye-su Eei myenb syenj henq Jyenq faauj .
44018024	maaib taub yiu-Tai myenb , Buaj heug aa-px-lo , taaib Tauj e-fe-so zivb . ninb se yem aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb Zwrtq seij Eei myenb . ninb zunb tod kxvq waag Byaavg yaag hiuq tu'q kivb sru Truj .
44018025	ninb tu'q ho'g Jiaj zyruq Eei Jauq zyrug Jxm Hruq Faauj pun myenb hiuq tu'q ye-su , yaag Faauj tu'q zyen Eei . mq paag ninb Kuvj hiuq tu'q maaib yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uaq Euvg leid Navq .
44018026	aa-px-lo yem wig txvb puvj laavg Eei zunb tod Faauj myenb . pitg-sinj-laa Zauj aa-Kwin-laa haid ninb kxvq zyrug zipq ninb mivb ninb Bua Eei pyauq cvj kxvq Tinb huvb Eei Jauq pun ninb kaub hiuq tu'q Rxib .
44018027	aa-px-lo xij Jiaj Tauj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq , e-fe-so Eei Jiub paav myenb Tevj Jyenq yaag fiaq fyenj Buaj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq Eei syenj ye-su Eei myenb zipq ninb . aa-px-lo mivb Tauj uaq , ninb Tevj Kauj Tinb huvb Eei en syenj liud uaq teij myenb Zamq ,
44018028	weig zu'g ninb txv zwavj Rcv hivb yiu-Tai myenb . ninb lovg kivb sru pun Ziv ye-su se tovb ki-tug .
44019001	aa-px-lo yem Ko-lin-To zivb uaq zang , pau-lo yavb uaq Jiaj uaq tiub Jauq mivb Tauj e-fe-so zivb . yem naaig ninb pwatg teij syenj ye-su Eei myenb .
44019002	pau-lo naaig ninb Bua , “ meib Bua syenj ye-su uaq zang , meib Bua tu'q zipq sivj livb Eei fai ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua lyemb maiq haid Jiaj maaib taub sivj livb . ”
44019003	pau-lo cvj naaig , “ uaq Euvg meib Bua Jiaj haiq Euvg leid ? ” ninb Bua tau , “ yia Bua Jiaj yo-han Eei leid . ”
44019004	pau-lo kxvq , “ yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uaq Euvg uam Eei leid se pun Ziv myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid . mq paag yo-han zunb Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb ninb taaib Daavg , cvj maaib taub Ga'haaq taaib . myenb xij zu'g syenj uaq taub , se tovb ye-su a'q . ”
44019005	haid pau-lo Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud , ninb Bua tevq zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Jiaj uam Eei leid .
44019006	pau-lo maan Jyenq ninb Bua , sivj livb zyrug Fiag Tauj ninb Bua . ninb Bua kxvq Zwrtq kanb Euvg waag yaag trug Tinb huvb Eei waag .
44019007	naaiq teij myenb Riaj maaib zyepg Eeig taub .
44019008	pau-lo lovg pua Laaj Eia'g mivb uaq wig txvb kxvq tob leid . ninb lwrnj leid kxvq Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei sig Kwinj myenb syenj .
44019009	mq paag yem uaq maaib teij myenb Hruq vcvg , maiq Kavq syenj , cvj txv zwavj taanb ye-su Eei Jauq . pau-lo zyrug maiq Zauj ninb Bua yem uaq a'q . ninb txb Jyenq saib kxj Zauj ninb mivb Ti-lan-natq Eei hx'g txvb , Nxib Nxi yem uaq lwrnj leid .
44019010	ninb Navq naaiq nx zruj tu'q i Havj , Tauj e-sia scvq Eei myenb , maiq kunq yiu-Tai myenb fai fivb fivj Janj , yetg zuvq tu'q haid zyruq Eei tod .
44019011	Tinb huvb lovg pau-lo Eei puad zruj Zwrtq levg Jeiq Bua'g hxvb Eei sig .
44019012	pau-lo lovg Jiaj Eei si'g Jaauq Zauj ninb Txvq lwib hruj uaq Kwaaiq Dia , myenb txb mivb an pcvg myenb Eei sin , pcvg zyrug lovj . lyemb myenq yaag zu'g zung Zwrtq mig a'q .
44019013	maaib teij yiu-Tai myenb yrub Jyenq zweib laavd zweib muvq mivb Tevj zung Yiab kwaiq myenq Zwrtq myenb Eei sin . ninb Bua seij mavg kaaj ninb Bua lovg zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj haib zung tu'q myenq Zwrtq fai maiq Zwrtq . ninb Bua Buaj myenq , “ yia tevq pau-lo zunb uaq taub ye-su zung meib Bua Zwrtq mivb . ”
44019014	maaib yiu-Tai myenb Eei yetg taub sai myenb pyeiq , Buaj heug sej-waa , maaib siag taub txn Navq naaiq nx zruj .
44019015	uaq taub myenq tau ninb Bua , “ ye-su yia hiuq Eei , pau-lo yia zia'q tu'q Eei . mq paag meib Bua ni ? tovb haiq taub ? ”
44019016	maaib Yiab kwaiq myenq yem sin uaq laanb myenb zyrug piu mivb Eau Jyenq pxvd hivb ninb Bua yetg zuvq . ninb Bua lcvb kcvq Eei pyauj Zwrtq uaq nxm pyauq , yetg zuvq mun Revg .
44019017	yem e-fe-so zivb , maiq kunq yiu-Tai myenb fai fivb fivj Janj haid naaiq teij sig , ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig . myenb zyrug cvj Jaa Taaib zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Zamq .
44019018	e-fe-so zivb syenj ye-su Eei myenb Zamq Eei taaib txv zwavj Eyemg zwid kxvq ninb Bua zruj Jiaj Eei sig .
44019019	zruj faatq Eei myenb Zamq Eei txb ninb Bua Eei faatg sru taaib Dwi Jyenq txv zwavj myenb puaq kwavg Revg mig a'q . naaiq teij sru Eei Jaab zinb funj taaib zig tu'q pyaa waang lob Nxi Eei zinb .
44019020	naaiq Kav sig Zwrtq liud , zyruq Eei tod zunb Javq Jyenq mivb yaag kunq zruj kunq henq .
44019021	naaiq teij sig Zwrtq liud , pau-lo tivg Hruq Jiaj maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Zauj aa-Kaa-yaa scvq cvj mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . ninb kxvq , “ mivb liud ye-lu-saa-lem , yia yaag xij zu'g mivb mavg lo-maa zivb . ”
44019022	ninb Paaiq i taub ninb Eei pxvb puad myenb , Ti-mo-Tai Zauj e-latq-Tatq , mivb maa-si-Do-nia teib puv Daavg . ninb kanb cvj yem Nxi paaq e-sia scvq uaq .
44019023	uaq zang laaij ye-su Eei Jauq , e-fe-so zivb Zwrtq tomb sig .
44019024	maaib taub Eaanb zavg , Buaj heug De-metq-li-atg . ninb lovg Eaanb taaq aan-Te-mitq miub pyauq txn . Navq naaiq zruj pun yetg zuvq Eaanb zavg zxng tu'q Daaub taaub Zamq .
44019025	De-metq-li-atg heug yetg zuvq Eaanb zavg Zauj pavg naaiq Euvg scvb eij tu'q Eaanb Eei myenb taaib zunq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ kxb yrud aa'b ! meib Bua hiuq tu'q Bua Kub yem Kub Eang se weig naaiq Euvg kov .
44019026	meib Bua tu'q pwatg yaag tu'q haid uaq taub loq , pau-lo , Navq haiq nx zruj . ninb maiq taan yem e-fe-so zivb zruj Navq . ninb mivb aaq lamb kxmj e-sia scvq Duaq myenb Zamq haig kwavg lob Jauq mig a'q . ninb kxvq myenb Eei puad zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq se maiq zeid zyenb .
44019027	Navq naaiq , maiq taan Kuvj Bua Eei scvb eij Dxtq Navq . kamb Riaj myenb mavg Piaj aan-Te-mitq zyenb Eeid Eei pyauq . e-sia scvq Zauj luvb Diaq myenb zavg naaiq taub aan-Te-mitq zyenb Eeid Eei Favb laavg yaag zu'g Dxtq Revg a'q . ”
44019028	zwavj myenb haid naaiq teij waag ninb Bua kevb ! Qiaj Jiad haig , naug Jyenq kxvq , “ e-fe-so myenb Eei aan-Te-mitq zyenb zruj Lo . ”
44019029	maiq laub yetg nxm zivb lung Revg . ninb Bua zyrug Eau Jyenq Byend pau-lo taaib uaq teij maa-si-Do-nia myenb , kaai-atg Zauj aa-litq-Taa-Katq , zyavb kwanb Eei lomb lomd Eei Tiuj pia'g ninb Bua Eei a'Ryaaug Zyavq .
44019030	pau-lo kanb yaag xij mivb zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen uaq mq paag syenj ye-su Eei myenb maiq pun ninb mivb .
44019031	maaib teij e-sia scvq Eei tomb Jyen zruj pau-lo Eei txig , pun waag mivb Toq ninb maiq tuvq pia'g a'Ryaaug Zyavq .
44019032	kapq zunq Eei myenb Zeub Zeuq naub naug Eei . maaib teij heug naaiq , maaib teij heug uaq . myenb kaub Zamq Jiaj zuvq maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Bua weig haiq tiug kapq zunq yem naaig .
44019033	yiu-Tai myenb fovq aa-lekq-saan-De Zwrtq uaq Daavg mcvj . cvj maaib teij Buaj ninb Navq haiq nx kxvq . aa-lekq-saan-De zyrug Wavj puad xij Jaiq sin Buaj zwavj myenb .
44019034	mq paag myenb zia'q tu'q ninb se yiu-Tai myenb zyrug tovb tavb naub naug Eei heug leib maiq ko i nxm zyavb hog . ninb Bua heug Jyenq kxvq , “ e-fe-so myenb Eei aan-Te-mitq zyenb zruj Lo . ”
44019035	zruj kau , maaib taub e-fe-so zivb Eei Jyen Zwrtq taaib paaq ninb Bua sekq mivb cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ e-fe-so zivb Eei myenb aa'b ! haiq taub yaag hiuq tu'q Bua e-fe-so myenb kruj aan-Te-mitq zyenb Eeid Zauj yem luvb Dxtq taaib Eei la'pyeib favj maiq zeid ?
44019036	maiq maaib haiq taub haib kxvq maiq zeid . Navq naaiq , meib Bua kunq puvj Hruq , maiq tuvq Zeuj a'q .
44019037	meib Bua txb naaiq teij myenb taaib naaiq . ninb Bua maiq nimg miub pyauq Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq , yaag maiq kxvq to'g Bua Eei zyenb Eeid .
44019038	sij kxvq De-metq-li-atg Zauj ninb Jwavg kov Eei zavg myenb maaib sig xij koj haiq taub , Bua maaib Beng sig Eei Nxi yaag maaib tunj sig Jyen Tevj tunj . ninb Bua haib mivb uaq koj tu'q Eei .
44019039	sij kxvq meib Bua cvj maaib haiq Euvg sig , xij zu'g zuaq Tauj Kxi tomb zwavj Eei Beng sig wig zyrug haib mivb uaq kxvq .
44019040	kamb Riaj ib Nxi Zwrtq Eei sig huvb Jaa zuvq xij koj mq pei , weig zu'g Bua lyemb maiq maaib txvj Jaiq ib Nxi Zeuj lung zivb naaiq teij sig . ”
44019041	kxvq paag ninb zyrug heug zwavj myenb Rwrnj Revg .
44020001	zivb Eei myenb lung paag , Ga'haaq pau-lo heug syenj ye-su Eei zwavj myenb taaib zunq . ninb Kwinj liud yaag kxvq liud leib Yaav waag zyrug Zwrtq Jauq mivb maa-si-Do-nia teib puv .
44020002	Jiaj naaiq nxm teib puv mivb Tauj haaij , ninb Kwinj syenj ye-su Eei myenb yaag zunb tod Zamq Eei . Navq naaiq nx zruj Jyenq mivb Tauj kikg teib puv ,
44020003	yem uaq pua Laaj Eia'g . xij pia'g Ravq mivb si-lia teib puv uaq zang , ninb hiuq tu'q yiu-Tai myenb taaq za'eij hxig ninb . ninb zyrug tivg Hruq taauj sin Rwrnj maa-si-Do-nia .
44020004	Zauj ninb mivb Eei myenb maaib yem Be-lo-aa zivb taaib uaq taub pi-latq Eei txn , soj-paa-Te , Zauj yem Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa zivb uaq teij i taub aa-litq-Taa-Katq Zauj sej-Kun-Datg , Zauj yem De-Bi zivb uaq taub kaai-atg , cvj maaib Ti-mo-Tai yaag maaib e-sia scvq uaq teij i taub Ti-Ki-katg Zauj to-fi-matq .
44020005	naaiq teij mivb Daavg yem uaq to-atg zuaq yia Bua .
44020006	Jiaj liud maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq Eei zipq , yia Bua yem fi-lipq-Pxi pia'g Ravq mivb pyaa Nxi Tauj to-atg , kapq Jyenq txig yem yetg nxm leib paaij uaq .
44020007	uaq nxm leib paaij Eei taaub Nxi uaq mwrnd , tovb yia Bua kapq zunq mc'q Fuaq uaq zang , pau-lo kxvq waag Faauj zwavj myenb . ninb hiuq tu'q ta'Eeig Nxi ninb xij zu'g Zwrtq Jauq zyrug kxvq waag Daauq Eei , Tauj Daamq mwrnd .
44020008	yia Bua kapq zunq uaq Ravb pyauq puaq Jyenq tav Zamq Eei .
44020009	maaib laanb myenb lunj myenb , Buaj heug yu-Ti-katg , zweid Jyenq fov mwrnb mwavj pau-lo kxvq waag laub haig , zyrug mFxmb ta'Vatq . pau-lo kxvq Jyenq waag mivb , yu-Ti-katg zyav naaig mFxmb Do Eei , yem pua Ravb pyauq Dxtq Fiag Tauj Dau . myenb mivb Lxpq Jiad taaib pwatg taig mig a'q .
44020010	pau-lo Fiag mivb Baapq Fiag Qam Jyenq uaq taub txn yaag kxvq , “ maiq tuvq kamb Riaj , ninb Zxg maaib mcvg Eei . ”
44020011	pau-lo cvj faauj kub vwaaig mivb zx'q Fuaq taaib mc'q pun Gxi Eang cvj kxvq waag laub Eei , Tauj luvb Fav , zyrug mivb mig a'q .
44020012	zwavj myenb txb uaq taub maaib mcvg zyavb Jyenq Eei txn Rwrnj pyauq , haid Hruq fov Revg a'q .
44020013	yia Bua pia'g Ravq mivb atg-sotg zivb Daavg , xij yem naaig zipq pau-lo Zauj yia Bua pia'g Ravq . naaiq se pau-lo kanb tivg zyavj , weig zu'g ninb xij yavb Jauq kan Byenj mivb .
44020014	yem atg-sotg zivb , pau-lo taaib pwavb yia Bua , yia Bua zyrug zipq ninb pia'g Ravq mivb mi-Ti-le-ni .
44020015	yavb Ravq mivb , ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua Tauj Ki-otg Kxib Rru . cvj ta'faam Nxi Jiaj mivb Tauj saaj-mxtq Kxib Rru , cvj ta'feij Nxi yia Bua mivb Tauj mi-le-Tatq zivb .
44020016	pau-lo tivg Hruq maiq hitq e-fe-so zivb , maiq xij yem e-sia scvq laub . haib kaanq tu'q hivb nx , ninb xij mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Daavg syru syavb Byaub Eei zipq .
44020017	yem mi-le-Tatq zivb , pau-lo Paaiq myenb mivb e-fe-so zivb Buaj Jiub paav Eei myenb koj taaib pwavb ninb .
44020018	ninb Bua taaib Tauj Rxib , pau-lo Buaj ninb Bua , “ yem yia pia'g e-sia taaub Nxi Zauj meib Bua yem Eei zyavb hog , yia Navq haiq nx yem , Navq haiq nx zruj , meib Bua hiuq Eei .
44020019	yia Eyemg kanb zruj faij , yaag maaib uamb mweig lyrug Jyenq fub suj zyruq yaag zu'g ziaj Euvg Kruq weig zu'g yiu-Tai myenb taaq za'eij hxig yia .
44020020	meib Bua yaag hiuq tu'q maaib haiq Euvg haib Tevj meib Bua yia zunb Buaj meib Bua , maiq lyrub . yem tomb zwavj Eei txvj yaag yem kx'g myenb Eei pyauq yia Faauj Revg meib Bua .
44020021	maiq kunq yiu-Tai myenb fai Janj , yia lovb lovj Eei Kwinj ninb Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid Rwrnj taaib lxd Tinb huvb yaag syenj Bua Eei zyruq ye-su ki-tug .
44020022	“ ib zang weig sivj livb aapq yia , yia zyrug mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , mq paag Tauj uaq xij pwavb zu'g haiq Euvg sig yaag maiq hiuq .
44020023	Kuvj hiuq tu'q yem nxmb nxm zivb sivj livb poj pun yia hiuq tu'q xij zu'g wrnj lob yaag xij zu'g syrug ziaj Euvg Kruq .
44020024	yia yaag maiq funj yia Eei mcvg weig yia maaib haiq Euvg Jaab zinb . yia Kuvj xij zruj zyavj zyruq ye-su Paaiq yia zruj Eei kov . naaiq se zruj zxvb zevj kxvq Tinb huvb Eei en Eei Kuq fyenj .
44020025	“ yia mivb mivb taaib taaib yem meib Bua naaiq zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei Kuq fyenj pun meib Bua mwavj . ib zang yia hiuq tu'q Ga'haaq hivq meib Bua maiq tu'q pwatg yia Eei Myen a'q .
44020026	weig naaiq yia lovb lovj Eei kxvq , sij kxvq meib Bua haiq taub zu'g myetg , zwid maiq Dxtq zu'g yia .
44020027	weig zu'g yia zx'q Tinb huvb Eei za'eij yetg zuvq zunb Buaj meib Bua Revg mig a'q , maiq lyrub yetg Euvg .
44020028	meib Bua xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq og . xij zu'g kruj lovj meib Bua kanb yaag kruj lovj sivj livb pun meib Bua kruj uaq teij myenb . xij zu'g kruj Tinb huvb Eei Jiub paav , tovb ninb lovg ninb Eei txn Eei Ryaamq maaid Eei Jiub paav , Navq yuvd yuvb Eei myenb kruj ninb Bua Eei yuvb nx .
44020029	yia hiuq tu'q yia leib Gxi meib Bua liud , Ga'haaq maaib Zyruq haig Eei Yiab Juq xij pia'g meib Bua ka'Euad . ninb Bua yaag maiq Eaavg naaiq teij yuvb .
44020030	yem meib Bua ka'Euad zuvq xij maaib myenb zx'q zyen leid Tiuq penj Jaaq leid Duaq syenj ye-su Eei myenb mivb kan .
44020031	xij zu'g kiv Hruq Javj Jyenq . pua Havj ka'Euad yia zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd maaib uamb mweig lyrug Jyenq Kwinj meib Bua taub taub .
44020032	“ ib zang yia zx'q meib Bua Jiu pun Tinb huvb Zauj ninb Zeij en Eei tod . naaiq tod haib Zeij meib Bua Jiad taaib yaag pun meib Bua Zauj ninb Eei Zivb Revg myenb tu'q Ripg meib Bua Eei pwrng .
44020033	yia yaag maiq mauq Jiaj haiq taub Eei Jyem Eaanb fai lwib hruj .
44020034	meib Bua kanb hiuq tu'q yia lovg yia kanb Eei puad lxd tu'q yia cvj Zauj yia yem Eei myenb Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq .
44020035	yia zruj Eei Euvb Euvg se zruj Euvg zeiq pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj kov Kruq weig Tevj mau Eei myenb . Javj Jyenq zyruq ye-su kxvq Eei waag . ninb kxvq , ‘ pun Eei kaub maaib xnb lx'g tu'q zipq Eei . ’ ”
44020036	pau-lo kxvq setq naaiq teij waag ninb Zauj uaq teij zwavj myenb kweig Fiag Dau tauj kauj .
44020037	zwavj myenb Eyemq Revg , Qam Jyenq pau-lo Eei Jaav zom .
44020038	ninb Bua kaub Raub Jiaj se weig ninb kxvq Ga'haaq hivq maiq tu'q cvj pwatg ninb Eei Myen uaq Jruj waag . ninb Bua zyrug lomb Rxib fuvj pau-lo mivb pia'g Ravq a'q .
44021001	Zauj zwavj myenb kxvq liud leib Yaav waag , Ravq pcv za'g Eei mivb Tauj Kotg Kxib Rru . ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua mivb Tauj lo-De Kxib Rru cvj mivb paa-Taa-laa muvq .
44021002	yem uaq pwatg maaib Pruj Ravq xij mivb fi-ni-sia teib puv , yia Bua zyrug pia'g Ravq mivb a'q .
44021003	mivb kau , mavg pwatg sai-patg Kxib Rru zyrug Jiaj ninb Eei naamb puv mivb si-lia teib puv . Tauj Tai-la'q zivb , Ravq xij puvj huaj Fiag , yia Bua zyrug Zwrtq uaq a'q .
44021004	yem uaq yia Bua lxd pwatg syenj ye-su Eei myenb zyrug Zauj ninb Bua yem yetg nxm leib paaij . sivj livb lovg ninb Bua Buaj pau-lo maiq tuvq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
44021005	mq paag yem yetg nxm leib paaij liud , yia Bua Zwrtq Jauq mivb a'q . yetg zuvq syenj ye-su Eei myenb , lyemb ninb Bua Eei aub Jweiq , Zauj Jyenq fuvj yia Bua Zwrtq zi'g zivb mivb Kxib Len , yem uaq Byenj kweig Fiag tauj kauj . tauj kauj liud , kxvq liud leib Yaav waag ,
44021006	yia Bua pia'g Ravq . uaq teij yaag Rwrnj pyauq mig a'q .
44021007	yia Bua yem Tai-la'q yavb Ravq mivb Tauj Tx-le-mi Zauj yem uaq Eei kxb yrud kxvq wig pwavb waag cvj Zauj ninb Bua yem Nxi uaq .
44021008	ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua cvj mivb si-saa-li-yaa muvq . Tauj uaq yia Bua hitq zunb Kuq fyenj uaq taub fi-lipq Eei pyauq . naaiq taub fi-lipq tovb zinb Daavg yem ye-lu-saa-lem Jiub paav kinq taaib Eei uaq teij siag taub Eei yetg taub .
44021009	ninb maaib pyei taub sia'q maiq kcvb lovg Goj . ninb Bua yaag tu'q zivb Eeig trug Tinb huvb Eei waag .
44021010	yem ziaj Nxi uaq , maaib taub trug waag myenb , Buaj heug aa-kaa-Batg , yem yu-Dia scvq taaib .
44021011	ninb taaib lxd yia Bua , zx'q pau-lo Eei hrub Laav Dob Jyenq ninb kanb Eei puab zauj yaag kxvq , “ sivj livb Navq naaiq nx kxvq , ‘ yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei yiu-Tai myenb xij Navq naaiq nx Dob Jyenq naaiq tiub hrub Laav Eei zyruq yaag Jiu pun yem Janj Eei puab Diaq . ’ ”
44021012	haid liud naaiq teij waag yia Bua Zauj yem uaq Eei myenb Qa'q Toq pau-lo maiq tuvq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
44021013	pau-lo tau , “ meib Bua weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx Eyemq pun yia Eei Ba'Riu yu'g Revg ? yia zunq tivg Hruq maiq taan Eung pun myenb Dob Navq , mq paag weig zyruq ye-su Eei Buaj Eung yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pun myenb taij . ”
44021014	Dovg haaij kxvq pau-lo yaag maiq mwavj . yia Bua zyrug maiq kxvq a'q . Kuvj kxvq , “ Toq zyruq ei Jyenq ninb Eei za'eij zruj . ”
44021015	Ga'haaq yia Bua Beng zyavj ka'naaiq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem .
44021016	maaib teij yem si-saa-li-yaa Eei saib kxj kan Jyenq yia Bua mivb yaag txb yia Bua mivb yia Bua xij zu'g hitq uaq taub maa-naa-sanj Eei pyauq . maa-naa-sanj se yem sai-patg Kxib Rru taaib Eei myenb yaag zruj taub syenj Daavg Jiaj uaq paan saib kxj .
44021017	mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem , syenj ye-su Eei myenb a'Neiq zipq yia Bua .
44021018	ta'Eeig Nxi pau-lo Zauj yia Bua mivb yaa-kxpg uaq . Jiub paav Eei myenb koj yetg zuvq yaag yem uaq Eei .
44021019	pau-lo kxvq liud wig pwavb waag , ninb zweib yetq zweib Eeig Eei kxvq Revg Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx lovg ninb yem Janj Eei txvj zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig .
44021020	yem uaq Eei myenb haid ninb kxvq liud naaiq teij sig zyrug Zev Tinb huvb , cvj Buaj pau-lo , “ tomb kxj aag , meib hiuq Eei . maaib ziaj waang yiu-Tai myenb syenj ye-su . yetg zuvq yaag Jxm Hruq kan leib latg .
44021021	ninb Bua haid kxvq meib yem Janj Eei teib puv Faauj zwavj yiu-Tai myenb kwavg mo-se Eei leib latg . meib yaag Buaj ninb Bua maiq zu'g Tevj fu'Jweiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid yaag maiq zu'g ei Bua yiu-Tai myenb Eei leib fivj .
44021022	uaq Euvg , Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj ? ninb Bua zuvq haid kxvq meib taaib Tauj naaiq taaib a'q .
44021023	meib xij zu'g ei yia Bua Eei waag zruj . yem yia Bua naaiq maaib pyei laanb myenb Zauj Tinb huvb lcvd Jiaj vcvg waag .
44021024	meib xij zu'g kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua saaj wij , Tevj ninb Bua Zwrtq saaj wij Eaanb , ninb Bua zyrug haib Teij Ba'pyei a'q . Navq naaiq zruj , zwavj myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb Bua haid uaq teij waag se maiq zyen . meib kanb yaag ei Jyenq leib latg zruj .
44021025	mq paag syenj ye-su Eei Janj c'q , zinb Daavg Bua fiaq fyenj ei Bua tivg taaib Eei waag Buaj ninb Bua , ‘ xij zu'g keg maiq tuvq Eang ziag Jiaj miub favj Eei haiq Euvg ka'naaiq , maiq tuvq Eang Ryaamq , maiq tuvq Eang nc'g Jaav taig Eei scvb Kuq xq , yaag maiq tuvq zruj maiq lwrnj hxvg Eei sig . ’ ”
44021026	ta'Eeig Nxi pau-lo zyrug txb uaq teij myenb yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua saaj wij . ninb cvj pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Buaj sai myenb cvj maaib Bu'ziaj Nxi Zivj pwavq saaj wij Eei Nxi . Tauj uaq Nxi sai myenb xij zu'g weig ninb Bua taub taub lovg ka'naaiq ziag pun Tinb huvb .
44021027	uaq teij siag Nxi aaq lamb pwavq , maaib teij e-sia scvq taaib Eei yiu-Tai myenb pwatg pau-lo yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq . ninb Bua Zo'q zwavj myenb yaag zx'q pau-lo ,
44021028	naub naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq , “ i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b ! Tevj yia Bua maa'b ! tovb naaiq laanb myenb mivb nxmb nxm txvj Faauj myenb mavg Piaj Bua yiu-Tai myenb Zauj Bua Eei leib latg Zauj naaiq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq . maiq taan uaq Euvg Navq , ninb yaag txb Janb kikg pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad , pun naaiq nxm Zivb Revg txvj maaib wij . ”
44021029	( ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg yem e-fe-so zivb taaib uaq taub to-fi-matq Zauj pau-lo yem zivb ka'Euad zyrug laaig pau-lo txb ninb pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq . )
44021030	zyavb nxm zivb Eei myenb zyrug lung Revg , Dutg Dutg Eei Tiuj taaib zx'q pau-lo Tx Zwrtq zi'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq . zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb zyrug lyemb zeib kwrn Jyenq a'q .
44021031	zyavb kwanb myenb xij taij pau-lo uaq zang , lo-maa tomb pcvb pyeiq haid fyenj kxvq ye-lu-saa-lem myenb lung Revg .
44021032	ninb zyrug txb teij pcvb pyeiq Zauj pcv , Tiuj Jyenq mivb ninb Bua uaq . zwavj myenb pwatg tomb pcvb pyeiq Zauj pcv , ninb Bua zyrug tivb , maiq Bx'q pau-lo a'q .
44021033	tomb pcvb pyeiq mivb Tauj zyrug zx'q pau-lo cvj heug pcv lovg i tiub Lia'g limg Dob Jyenq . ninb naaig kaaj , “ naaiq haiq taub ? ninb zruj haiq Euvg ? ”
44021034	zwavj myenb maaib teij Navq naaiq kxvq , maaib teij Navq uaq kxvq . tomb pcvb pyeiq zx'q maiq zu'g zyen kxnb pcvj weig zu'g myenb lung haig . ninb zyrug heug pcv txb pau-lo mivb pcv yem Eei txvj uaq .
44021035	Tauj uaq Teib kxn zwavj myenb Zyruq haig , pcv zyrug Lxpq pau-lo faauj kub vwaaig .
44021036	zwavj myenb kan Jyenq Ga'haaq mivb Kib Kuvj Kaatq Eei kxvq , “ taij ninb kwavg a'q . ”
44021037	pcv xij txb pau-lo pia'g ninb Bua yem Eei txvj ka'Euad uaq zang ninb kxvq Buaj taub pcvb pyeiq , “ Toq pun yia Zauj meib kxvq Jruj waag , tu'q Eei fai ? ” tomb pcvb pyeiq kxvq , “ meib haib kxvq kikg waag Eei ?
44021038	uaq Euvg meib maiq zeid zinb Daavg Zeuj lung txb pyei Zin za'g pcv mivb teib puvb Waav uaq taub i-yipq myenb fai ? ”
44021039	pau-lo tau , “ yia se yiu-Tai myenb , Zwrtq seij yem si-li-sia scvq , Taa-satq zivb , tovb maaib mevb hog uaq nxm tomb zivb Eei pc'g fivj . Toq pun yia Zauj naaiq teij zwavj myenb kxvq waag og . ”
44021040	tomb pcvb pyeiq Gxi Rwib pun ninb kxvq . pau-lo sruq Jyenq Teib taaub Wavj puad Buaj myenb sekq . zwavj myenb sekq mivb , pau-lo zyrug lovg hipq-lu waag Zauj ninb Bua kxvq .
44022001	ninb kxvq , “ yetg zwavj kxb yrud Zauj myenb koj myenb aa'b ! Toq meib Bua mwavj yia kxvq teij yia Eei Jaub lrug . ”
44022002	myenb haid ninb kxvq hipq-lu waag ninb Bua zyrug cvj kaub sekq . pau-lo kxvq Jyenq mivb .
44022003	“ yia se yiu-Tai myenb , yem si-li-sia scvq , Taa-satq zivb Zwrtq seij . mq paag yia yem naaiq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Lo taaib . kaa-maa-li-en zruj yia Eei saib tiaj yaag Faauj yia ho'g tu'q Revg Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei leid . yia yaag Jxm Hruq kan Tinb huvb Navq meib Bua ib Nxi yem naaiq Eei taub taub myenb nx .
44022004	yia zruj to'g kan naaiq tiub Jauq Eei myenb , hxig ninb Bua Tauj taig . maiq kunq mJavg msia'q yia zx'q taaib Dob Jyenq wrnj lob .
44022005	tomb sai myenb Zauj kunq sig wig Eei zwavj myenb koj haib zruj zxvb zevj weig zu'g yia mivb ninb Bua uaq zx'q sru txb mivb pun Daa-matq-katg zivb Eei kxb yrud . yia zyrug mivb Daa-matq-katg xij zx'q kan naaiq tiub Jauq Eei myenb Dob Jyenq limg txb ninb Bua Rwrnj naaiq ye-lu-saa-lem tivg zwid .
44022006	“ yia mivb kau , leib Daa-matq-katg zivb maiq navg ko . uaq nxm zyavb hog aaq lamb teij luvb aanj a'q . lyemb zeib yem uaq luvb Zwrtq nxm tomb Fav ziuj Fiag kxmj yia Eei sin .
44022007	yia Kiv Fiag Dau mivb , haid maaib Qiaj kxvq , ‘ sau-lo aa'b ! sau-lo ! meib weig haiq tiug zruj to'g yia ? ’
44022008	“ yia zyrug naaig , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! meib tovb haiq taub ? ’ “ ninb tau , ‘ yia se naa-saa-letq muvq uaq taub ye-su , tovb meib zruj to'g uaq taub . ’
44022009	Zauj yia mivb uaq teij myenb Kuvj pwatg Fav Navq , maiq haid Zauj yia kxvq waag uaq taub Eei Qiaj .
44022010	“ yia cvj naaig , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj ? ’ “ zyruq kxvq , ‘ meib xij zu'g Jiad sin mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb . Tauj uaq maaib myenb Buaj meib Tinb huvb tivg zyavj pun meib zruj Eei Euvb Euvg sig . ’
44022011	laaij naaiq henq haig Eei Fav cvq yia Eei mziv yia mavg maiq pwatg . kan yia mivb Eei myenb zyrug Ken yia pia'g Daa-matq-katg zivb .
44022012	“ yem Daa-matq-katg zivb maaib laanb myenb , Buaj heug aa-naa-nia . ninb Jxm Hruq zavg Tinb huvb , kan lovj leib latg . yem uaq Eei yiu-Tai myenb haiq taub yaag Taaib ninb .
44022013	aa-naa-nia taaib lxd yia . ninb sruq Jyenq yia Eei ka'Len kxvq , ‘ sau-lo yrud aa'b ! cvj mavg tu'q pwatg a'q . ’ uaq zang yia zyrug mavg tu'q pwatg ninb a'q .
44022014	“ ninb yaag kxvq , ‘ Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb kinq meib taaib pun meib hiuq tu'q ninb Eei za'eij , pun meib pwatg pcvb fim uaq taub yaag haid ninb kanb Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag .
44022015	weig zu'g ninb xij meib kan ninb zruj zxvb zevj Buaj zwavj myenb meib pwatg Jiaj Zauj haid Jiaj Eei sig .
44022016	ib zang meib zruj haiq Euvg vaib ? Jiad sin taaib tevq ye-su Eei Buaj Jiaj uam Eei leid , Raauj kwavg meib Eei zwid . ’
44022017	“ Ga'haaq yia Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem , yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq tauj kauj , pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig .
44022018	uaq zang zyruq kxvq Buaj yia , ‘ meib xij zu'g kaanq pyauj Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . meib Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj mq paag yem naaiq Eei myenb maiq xij mwavj . ’
44022019	“ yia tau , ‘ zyruq aag , naaiq teij myenb hiuq tu'q yia mivb nxmb nxm wig txvb zx'q syenj ye-su Eei myenb . maaib teij wrnj lob , maaib teij yaag Bx'q .
44022020	Tevj meib zruj zxvb zevj uaq taub saa-Te-fen zu'g myenb taij uaq zang , yia sruq Jyenq uaq yaag a'Neiq Eei . zuvq Tevj mavg taij ninb uaq teij myenb Eei lwi . ’
44022021	“ zyruq cvj Buaj yia , ‘ mivb a'q . yia xij Paaiq meib mivb ko Eei txvj lxd maang fivj Janj . ’ ”
44022022	zwavj myenb mwavj Tauj pau-lo kxvq naaiq Jruj waag zyrug nib nuvj naug Eei heug Jyenq kxvq , “ naaiq taub ka'naaiq yem waaig huvb tiaj Eei Daub peib Navq . maiq tuvq pun ninb zyavb luvb Diaq a'q . ”
44022023	myenb naug Jyenq mivb , Jaiq lwi fevj Tin teig Eei , Eau niab Buv faatq faauj luvb .
44022024	tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug Buaj pcv txb pau-lo pia'g pcv yem Eei txvj ka'Euad , yaag heug ninb Bua lovg pyaab pin Bx'q zaab naaig , mavg kaaj ninb zruj haiq Euvg zwavj myenb Zivj taaib Navq naaiq nx heug .
44022025	pcv lovg Dopg Laav Dob Jyenq xij Bx'q uaq zang , pau-lo naaig sruq ka'Len uaq taub pcvb pyeiq , “ maiq kcvb syemq zwid mq paag lovg pyaab pin Bx'q lo-maa myenb se hxpg leid Eei fai ? ”
44022026	pcvb pyeiq haid pau-lo Navq naaiq kxvq , ninb mivb naaig uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq , “ meib xij Navq haiq nx zruj ? uaq laanb myenb mq paag lo-maa myenb . ”
44022027	tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug mivb naaig kaaj pau-lo , “ meib za'kevb lo-maa myenb fai ? Buaj yia maa'b ! ” pau-lo tau , “ zeid Eei . ”
44022028	tomb pcvb pyeiq cvj kxvq , “ yia lovg Eaanb Zamq Eei maaid zruj lo-maa myenb . ” pau-lo kxvq , “ yia Zwrtq seij taaib penj lo-maa myenb . ”
44022029	xij zaab naaig pau-lo uaq teij myenb lyemb zeib simq Gxi . tomb pcvb pyeiq hiuq tu'q pau-lo se lo-maa myenb ninb zyrug kamb Riaj haig weig zu'g lovg Lia'g limg Dob Jyenq .
44022030	ta'Eeig Nxi , tomb pcvb pyeiq xij hiuq tu'q yiu-Tai myenb weig haiq tiug koj pau-lo . ninb zyrug heug pcv Jaiq Gxi limg yaag heug sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei kunq sig wig Eei myenb kapq zunq . ninb zyrug txb pau-lo mivb sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen .
44023001	pau-lo nu'g nu'q Eei mavg kunq sig wig Eei myenb yaag kxvq , “ yia Eei kxb yrud aag , yia yem naaiq seij zavg Tauj ib Nxi , Tinb huvb pwatg yia Navq haiq nx yem , ei yia Eei Kuq laavb fim yia zruj tu'q hxpg . ”
44023002	aa-naa-nia tomb sai myenb heug sruq Jyenq pau-lo Eei ka'Len uaq teij myenb Baij pau-lo Eei Rwib .
44023003	pau-lo kxvq , “ Myen Rweig Hruq Zyruq Eei myenb aa'b ! Tinb huvb yaag xij Baij meib a'q . meib zweid naaig lovg leib latg tunj yia Eei sig , mq paag meib kanb yaag zruj txvg leib latg Buaj myenb Baij yia . ”
44023004	sruq pau-lo Eei ka'Len uaq teij myenb kxvq , “ meib Navq naaiq nx kxvq to'g Tinb huvb Eei tomb sai myenb ? ”
44023005	pau-lo cvj kxvq , “ kxb yrud aa'b ! yia maiq hiuq tu'q ninb zruj tomb sai myenb . kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq , ‘ maiq tuvq kxvq to'g kunq pc'g fivj Eei Jyen . ’ ”
44023006	pau-lo pwatg yem uaq Eei zwavj myenb maaib teij se saa-Du-sij myenb , maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb . ninb zyrug heug Bwi Eei Buaj kunq sig wig Eei myenb , “ kxb yrud aa'b ! yia yaag faa-li-sij myenb , yaag zruj faa-li-sij myenb Eei txn . yia yem naaiq zu'g syemq se weig zu'g yia maaib lamb Namq . yia syenj myenb taig mivb cvj haib navb taaib . ”
44023007	pau-lo Navq naaiq nx kxvq , faa-li-sij myenb Zauj saa-Du-sij myenb Rcv Jiad Jaaj taaib . wig Eei zwavj myenb zyrug pun Gxi zruj i kwanb mig a'q .
44023008	weig zu'g saa-Du-sij myenb maiq syenj myenb taig mivb cvj haib navb taaib , maiq syenj maaib finb myenb , yaag maiq syenj maaib myenq , mq paag faa-li-sij myenb syenj naaiq teij pua Euvg zuvq maaib Eei .
44023009	zwavj myenb zyrug Rcv Jiad tomb Jaaj . maaib teij faa-li-sij myenb yaag zruj Faauj leid Eei finb scv sruq Jiad taaib Zovb Qiaj kxvq , “ yia Bua maiq pwatg naaiq laanb myenb zruj txvg haiq Euvg . sij kxvq myenq fai finb myenb taaib Zauj ninb kxvq waag Navq haiq nx ? ”
44023010	kunq Rcv kau Qiaj Jiad , tomb pcvb pyeiq kamb Riaj ninb Bua haib petq Revg pau-lo . ninb zyrug Paaiq pcv Fiag zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj mivb zx'q pau-lo Zwrtq taaib cvj txb mivb pcv yem Eei txvj .
44023011	uaq mwrnd zyruq taaib sruq Jyenq pau-lo Eei ka'Len kxvq , “ kunq puvj Hruq og . meib yem naaiq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj , meib yaag xij zu'g fib Navq Eei mivb lo-maa zivb zruj zxvb zevj . ”
44023012	ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei , maaib teij yiu-Tai myenb peig Diaq Zaavb laavb . ninb Bua lomb Rxib Druq Jiad zyruj kxvq ninb Bua maiq Eang haiq Euvg maiq hopq haiq Euvg Tauj tu'q taij liud pau-lo .
44023013	tovb Hruq zruj Eei myenb maaib feij zyepg levb laanb .
44023014	ninb Bua mivb sai myenb pyeiq Zauj myenb koj Bua uaq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ yia Bua lomb Rxib Druq Jiad zyruj Lo Eei . yia Bua maiq Eang haiq Euvg Tauj tu'q taij kwavg pau-lo .
44023015	Navq naaig , meib Bua Zauj kunq sig wig Eei myenb xij zu'g Toq tomb pcvb pyeiq txb pau-lo taaib meib Bua naaiq zruj Navq meib Bua za'kevb xij hiuq mwrng ninb Eei Jaub lrug . mq paag ninb maiq kcvb Tauj meib Bua naaiq , yia Bua xij tavq Jyenq Daamb Jauq taij ninb . ”
44023016	mq paag pau-lo Eei muag Eei txn haid kxvq naaiq teij myenb Navq naaiq nx zruj , ninb zyrug mivb pcv yem Eei txvj uaq Buaj pau-lo .
44023017	pau-lo zyrug heug taub pcvb pyeiq taaib Buaj ninb , “ Toq meib txb naaiq taub hrub scv mivb tomb pcvb pyeiq uaq . naaiq taub txn maaib Jruj waag xij kxvq Buaj ninb . ”
44023018	pcvb pyeiq zyrug txb ninb mivb pwavb tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug kxvq , “ wrnj lob uaq taub pau-lo Toq yia txb naaiq taub hrub scv taaib . ninb maaib Jruj waag xij taaib Buaj meib . ”
44023019	tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug Ken uaq taub hrub scv mivb levb teij naaig ninb , “ meib maaib haiq Euvg xij Buaj yia ? ”
44023020	uaq taub hrub scv kxvq , “ zruj Lo uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb tovb Hruq Toq meib Fav Nxi txb yia Eei tomb naud pau-lo mivb ninb Bua Eei kunq sig wig uaq . ninb Bua xij zruj Navq xij hiuq ninb Eei Jauq kaub mwrng teij .
44023021	mq paag Toq meib maiq tuvq mwavj ninb Bua Eei waag weig zu'g maaib feij zyepg levb taub zuaq Jyenq Daamb Jauq . ninb Bua Druq Jiad zyruj kxvq ninb Bua maiq Eang yaag maiq hopq haiq Euvg Tauj tu'q taij pau-lo kwavg . ninb Bua Beng zyavj a'q , Kuvj zuaq Jyenq meib Gxi Rwib pun pau-lo mivb Eei waag Navq . ”
44023022	tomb pcvb pyeiq Buaj uaq taub txn Rwrnj a'q . cvj Jaa waag kxvq , “ Zinb maang maiq tuvq pun haiq taub hiuq meib taaib Buaj naaiq Jruj waag yia . ”
44023023	tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug heug i taub pcvb pyeiq taaib Buaj ninb Bua , “ meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid zyavj Eig pc'q taub yavb Jauq Eei pcv , Zyetq zyepg taub keb maad Eei pcv , Zauj Eig pc'q taub Daam Zav Eei pcv . ib mwrnd Duab nxm zyavb hog xij zu'g Zwrtq Jauq mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb .
44023024	yaag xij zu'g liug leid maad pun pau-lo keb , kruj Jyenq ninb Jauq zavg pcvb xn Eei mivb fe-likq zuvj uaq . ”
44023025	tomb pcvb pyeiq yaag fiaq zeiq fyenj . fyenj Navq naaiq kxvq .
44023026	“ zyen xij Eei fe-likq zuvj aa'b ! yia Kaa-laau-Di-atg li-syetq fiaq fyenj pun meib . yia Javj Tauj meib .
44023027	yiu-Tai myenb zx'q naaiq laanb myenb yaag Kaaq teij taij ninb mig a'q . mq paag yia haid kxvq ninb zruj lo-maa myenb , yia Zauj pcv zyrug mivb Zaavq ninb Zwrtq taaib .
44023028	yia xij hiuq tu'q ninb Bua weig haiq tiug koj ninb zyrug txb ninb mivb Tauj ninb Bua Eei kunq sig wig uaq .

44023030	yia hiuq tu'q maaib teij myenb taaq za'eij xij zx'q ninb Eei mcvg , yia zyrug lyemb zeib fuvj ninb mivb meib naaig . yia yaag heug koj ninb uaq teij myenb mivb meib uaq koj . ”
44023031	pcv zyrug ei Jyenq tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei waag zruj . uaq mwrnd ninb Bua fuvj mivb an-Ti-paa-ti muvq uaq .
44023032	ta'Eeig Nxi yavb Jauq Eei pcv taauj sin Rwrnj . Kuvj keb maad Eei pcv kanb fuvj ninb mivb Navq .
44023033	mivb Tauj si-saa-li-yaa zivb , ninb Bua zx'q fyenj pun zuvj yaag Jiu pau-lo pun ninb mig a'q .
44023034	zuvj to'g liud fyenj , ninb naaig kaaj pau-lo ninb yem haiq nxm scvq taaib Eei myenb . hiuq tu'q pau-lo yem si-li-sia taaib ninb zyrug Buaj pau-lo ,
44023035	“ zuaq koj meib uaq teij myenb taaib Tauj , yia zyrug mwavj meib Eei kxnb pcvj . ” kxvq liud , zuvj zyrug Paaiq pcv txb mivb yem he-lotq Eei huvb ting kruj Jyenq .
44024001	Ga'haaq pyaa Nxi , aa-naa-nia tomb sai myenb Zauj teij myenb koj Zauj taub Zcvj sig myenb , Buaj heug Te-Tu-latq , mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb yem zuvj Eei Ra'Myen koj pau-lo .
44024002	txb pau-lo pia'g taaib , Te-Tu-latq zyrug Jiad kxn koj pau-lo a'q . ninb kxvq , “ fe-likq tomb zuvj aa'b ! weig meib zruj zuvj yia Bua Eei teib puv tu'q Taaib pcvb laub Eei . kua'q zavg maaib haiq Euvg maiq penj , meib yaag zxg lovj Jyenq faauj .
44024003	yia Bua haiq taub yem haiq nxm txvj a'Neiq haig yaag za'kevb maaib Hruq lcvd zivb meib .
44024004	mq paag ib zang yia Bua maiq xij zxq meib Eei zyavb hog laub . Toq meib lovg nxig mwavj yia Bua kxvq i ziaj Jruj waag og .
44024005	“ yia Bua pwatg naaiq laanb myenb Kuvj Zua'q sig Navq , Duaq luvb Diaq yiu-Tai myenb lung Revg . ninb yaag zruj taub naa-saa-letq uaq Jauq myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq .
44024006	maiq taan Zua'q sig Navq , ninb lyemb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq xij pun maaib wij , yia Bua Zivj taaib zx'q ninb , xij ei yia Bua Eei leid syemq zwid .
44024007	mq paag uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq , li-syetq , taaib Qavq maanb Zaavq ninb yem yia Bua Eei puab Diaq Zwrtq taaib ,
44024008	yaag kxvq koj pau-lo uaq teij myenb xij zu'g taaib meib naaiq koj . sij kxvq meib kanb zaab naaig ninb , meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia Bua koj ninb naaiq teij sig se za'kevb zyen Eei . ”
44024009	yiu-Tai myenb yaag fib Navq Eei kxvq koj pau-lo uaq teij sig yetg zuvq zyen Eei .
44024010	fe-likq zuvj uq Buaj pau-lo kxvq , pau-lo zyrug kxvq a'q . ninb kxvq , “ yia hiuq tu'q meib yem naaiq nxm kua'q tunj sig tu'q Zamb Havj a'q . yia zyrug a'Neiq taaib meib naaiq kxvq yia Eei sig pun meib mwavj .
44024011	yia mivb ye-lu-saa-lem paaij Tinb huvb se maiq kcvb Jiaj zyepg Eeig Nxi . naaiq meib kanb naaig tu'q Zwrtq Eei .
44024012	koj yia naaiq teij myenb maiq pwatg yia yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Rcv haiq Euvg Jaaj , yaag maiq pwatg yia yem haiq nxm wig txvb fai zivb ka'Euad haiq Dau Zeuj lung zwavj myenb .
44024013	ninb Bua koj yia naaiq teij sig ninb Bua lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg zruj zxvb zevj pun Ziv za'kevb Navq naaig .
44024014	“ mq paag yia Eyemg pun meib , yia kan tovb ninb Bua heug Jaaq uaq tiub Jauq , zavg yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Tinb huvb . mq paag yia yaag syenj Revg mo-se Eei leib latg Zauj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru .
44024015	yia yaag Navq ninb Bua nx , Kauj Tinb huvb maaib lamb Namq , weig zu'g yia yaag syenj maiq kunq Kuq myenb fai x'q myenb , taig mivb mq paag cvj xij navb taaib .
44024016	weig naaiq yia lovg Revg Qa'q yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen Zauj zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen zanb zang lovg zyepg zua'q Eei laavb fim .
44024017	“ yia leib ye-lu-saa-lem zivb ziaj Havj a'q . Ga'haaq cvj Rwrnj mivb weig txb teij Eaanb Tevj Zauj yia Jwavg fivj Eei myenb , yaag txb ka'naaiq mivb fovg hxg pun Tinb huvb .
44024018	ninb Bua pwatg yia yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ei leid saaj liud wij a'q . uaq zang maiq maaib myenb Zamq Zauj yia kapq zunq yem , yia yaag maiq Zeuj lung .
44024019	mq paag maaib teij yem e-sia scvq taaib Eei yiu-Tai myenb . sij kxvq naaiq teij myenb maaib haiq Euvg sig xij koj yia , ninb Bua zuvq hxpg zu'g taaib meib naaiq koj a'q .
44024020	maiq zei nx , ib zang yem naaiq Eei myenb pwatg yia yem kunq sig wig uaq zang txvg haiq Euvg , ninb Bua xij zu'g kxvq a'q .
44024021	sij kxvq txvg tovb naaiq Du'g Euvg Navq , yia yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen uaq zang yia heug Jyenq kxvq , ‘ yia ib Nxi yem naaiq zu'g syemq zwid se weig zu'g yia syenj myenb taig mivb mq paag cvj haib navb taaib . ’ ”
44024022	fe-likq zuvj hiuq tu'q uaq tiub Jauq mwrng teij Eei , zyrug hitq Fiag naaiq teij sig cvj kxvq , “ zuaq tomb pcvb pyeiq , li-syetq , taaib Tauj , yia zyrug tunj meib Eei sig . ”
44024023	ninb yaag Buaj pcvb pyeiq kruj lovj pau-lo , pun ninb mivb mivb taaib taaib teij , yaag maiq tuvq laanb ninb Eei haiq taub myenb . sweib ninb Bua taaib liug leid teij ninb .
44024024	Jiaj taaib Zamb Nxi teij , fe-likq Zauj ninb Eei auq , Du-sinj-laa , taaib . ninb Eei auq se yiu-Tai myenb . fe-likq heug pau-lo taaib zyrug mwavj ninb kxvq syenj ki-tug ye-su Eei Jaub lrug .
44024025	pau-lo kxvq Tauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq , kunq tu'q kanb , yaag kxvq Tauj xij taaib Eei syemq zwid Nxi . fe-likq kamb Riaj haig , Buaj pau-lo , “ Bua'g naaiq kauj a'q . ib zang meib kunq mivb a'q . haiq zang maaib zyavb hog yia cvj heug meib taaib . ”
44024026	cvj maaib tiug , fe-likq yem Hruq Namq mRiaj pau-lo xij Rwid teij Eaanb mq pei , Zivj taaib zanb zang heug pau-lo taaib Zauj ninb kxvq waag .
44024027	i Havj Jiaj liud , px-si-atg fe-saa-Tatq taaib zruj zuvj tiq fe-likq . fe-likq xij yiu-Tai myenb a'Neiq ninb zyrug maiq puvj pau-lo , Zxg Kwrnj Jyenq uaq lob .
44025001	fe-saa-Tatq taaib Tauj ninb Eei scvq , zruj Jyenq zuvj tu'q pua Nxi , ninb Zwrtq si-saa-li-yaa mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
44025002	sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei pyeiq zyrug mivb fe-saa-Tatq uaq koj pau-lo ,
44025003	Toq ninb Tevj teij ninb Bua , fuvj pau-lo mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb . ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx Toq weig zu'g ninb Bua taaq za'eij tavq Jyenq Daamb Jauq taij pau-lo .
44025004	fe-saa-Tatq tau , “ pau-lo Kwrnj Jyenq yem si-saa-li-yaa zivb . maiq navg laub yia yaag xij Rwrnj a'q .
44025005	sij kxvq pau-lo zruj txvg haiq tiug , xij zu'g pun teij meib Bua zruj Lo Eei myenb kan Jyenq yia mivb koj ninb . ”
44025006	fe-saa-Tatq yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb maiq kaub laub Yetg Nxi fai zyepg Nxi Zivj taaib Rwrnj si-saa-li-yaa zivb . ta'Eeig Nxi ninb zweid Jyenq sig txvb heug myenb txb pau-lo taaib .
44025007	pau-lo pia'g taaib , yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb taaib koj ninb uaq teij myenb sruq Wiv kxmj lxd zwid Niaq Eei koj pau-lo mq paag maiq maaib yetg yemg maaib zxvb zevj zyen .
44025008	pau-lo zyrug kxvq Jaiq sin Eei waag . ninb kxvq , “ yia maiq zruj txvg yiu-Tai myenb Eei haiq Euvg leid fai zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fai lo-maa tomb ziub huvb . ”
44025009	fe-saa-Tatq xij yiu-Tai myenb a'Neiq ninb zyrug naaig pau-lo , “ meib Eung mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pun yia tunj meib Eei sig fai ? ”
44025010	pau-lo kxvq , “ ib zang yia sruq Jyenq lo-maa huvb Eei sig txvb , hxpg zu'g yem naaiq tunj yia Eei sig . yia maiq zruj haiq Euvg txvg yiu-Tai myenb , meib kanb yaag za'kevb hiuq Eei .
44025011	sij kxvq yia zruj txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taig , yia yaag maiq vcvg . mq paag sij kxvq naaiq teij yiu-Tai myenb taaib koj yia naaiq teij sig maiq zyen nx , maiq maaib haiq taub maaib leid zx'q yia Jiu pun ninb Bua . yia Toq pun lo-maa tomb ziub huvb syemq zwid . ”
44025012	fe-saa-Tatq Zauj ninb Eei kunq sig myenb Zaavb laavb liud ninb zyrug kxvq , “ meib Toq lo-maa huvb syemq zwid , uaq Euvg meib zuvq xij zu'g mivb lo-maa huvb uaq a'q . ”
44025013	Ga'haaq laub teij , aa-Gi-Paa huvb Zauj Be-nitq mivb si-saa-li-yaa zivb wig pwavb fe-saa-Tatq , Zauj ninb Ryaaug .
44025014	yem uaq Zamb Nxi teij Eei , fe-saa-Tatq zx'q pau-lo Eei Jauq kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj . ninb kxvq , “ maaib laanb myenb , fe-likq Zwrtq uaq zang zx'q ninb Kwrnj Jyenq naaiq .
44025015	yia mivb ye-lu-saa-lem uaq zang , sai myenb pyeiq Zauj yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj taaib koj ninb yaag Toq yia tivg ninb Eei zwid .
44025016	mq paag yia tau ninb Bua , Navq naaig zruj se maiq hxpg lo-maa myenb Eei leid . maiq kunq haiq taub maaib sig , xij zu'g pun ninb Zauj koj ninb uaq teij txij zevj Zivj taaib zx'q ninb Jiu pun haiq taub .
44025017	koj ninb uaq teij myenb taaib Tauj naaiq yia maiq vaib . ta'Eeig Nxi Navq yia mivb zweid sig txvb heug myenb txb pau-lo pia'g taaib .
44025018	koj ninb uaq teij sruq Jiad sin taaib kxvq mq paag maiq koj Navq yia laaig ninb Bua xij koj Eei x'q sig nx .
44025019	ninb Bua Kuvj Rcv Tauj ninb Bua yiu-Tai myenb Eei leid Navq , yaag Rcv Tauj laanb myenb , Buaj heug ye-su . ninb taig mivb mq paag pau-lo kxvq ninb Zxg zyavb Jyenq Eei .
44025020	yia maiq hiuq tu'q xij zu'g Navq haiq nx Beng naaiq teij sig zyrug naaig pau-lo ninb Eung mivb ye-lu-saa-lem tunj naaiq teij sig fai ?
44025021	mq paag pau-lo Toq mivb tomb ziub huvb uaq syemq , yia zyrug heug pcv txb mivb Kwrnj Jyenq zuaq Tauj yia maaib zyavb hog Zivj pun ninb mivb lo-maa huvb uaq . ”
44025022	aa-Gi-Paa kxvq Buaj fe-saa-Tatq , “ yia kanb yaag xij mwavj ninb kxvq . ” fe-saa-Tatq kxvq , “ uaq Euvg , Fav Nxi meib tu'q mwavj ninb kxvq a'q . ”
44025023	ta'Eeig Nxi aa-Gi-Paa Zauj Be-nitq zxv Rxib , Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq Bua Zauj uaq nxm zivb zruj Lo Eei , maaib mevb taub Eei myenb , hrug Jyenq pia'g huvb Jaa Eei tomb wig txvb . taaib Rxib , fe-saa-Tatq heug myenb txb pau-lo pia'g taaib .
44025024	fe-saa-Tatq kxvq , “ aa-Gi-Paa huvb Zauj yem naaiq Eei zwavj myenb aa'b ! meib Bua pwatg naaiq laanb myenb . yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj yem naaiq Eei yetg zwavj yiu-Tai myenb naug Jyenq kxvq ninb maiq hxpg zu'g maaib mcvg zyavb a'q .
44025025	mq paag yia zaab naaig ninb , maiq pwatg ninb txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij ninb . ninb kanb Toq pun lo-maa tomb ziub huvb tunj sig yia zyrug tivg Hruq fuvj ninb mivb .
44025026	mq paag yia lxd maiq tu'q haiq Euvg sig fiaq pun lo-maa huvb . yia zyrug txb ninb taaib naaiq , meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen , yaag levg Jeiq Eei yem meib , aa-Gi-Paa huvb , Eei Ra'Myen , weig zaab naaig ninb , yia Zivj taaib maaib waag fiaq .
44025027	weig zu'g ei yia Namq , fuvj zwib myenb mivb yaag maiq maaib koj ninb Eei waag se maiq hxpg . ”
44026001	aa-Gi-Paa huvb kxvq Buaj pau-lo , “ ib zang yia iq Zovb meib kxvq meib kanb Eei Jauq a'q . ” pau-lo zyrug suv puad Zwrtq kxvq Jaiq sin Eei waag .
44026002	ninb kxvq , “ aa-Gi-Paa huvb aa'b ! yia ib Nxi maaib tomb wrng Qiaj tu'q yem meib Eei Ra'Myen kxvq yiu-Tai myenb koj yia Eei yetg zuvq sig ,
44026003	weig zu'g meib hiuq yiu-Tai myenb Eei leib fivj yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Rcv Eei Jauq Zamq Eei . Navq naaig , yia Toq meib lovg nxig mwavj yia kxvq og .
44026004	“ zwavj yiu-Tai myenb hiuq tu'q yia Eei seij Navq haiq nx . yem yia lunj Eei zyavb hog yia yem yia kanb Eei pwrnb kua'q Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb .
44026005	ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia laub haig a'q . sij kxvq ninb Bua Eung Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj nx , ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia zruj faa-li-sij myenb , tovb kan leid kaub mwrng Jiaj uaq Jauq .
44026006	ib zang yia sruq Jyenq naaiq zu'g syemq se weig yia maaib lamb Namq Tinb huvb xij zruj ei ninb Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij lcvd Jiad Eei vcvg waag .
44026007	yia Bua zyepg Eeig fivj yiu-Tai myenb yaag fib Navq Eei maaib naaiq Euvg maaib lamb Namq Zivj taaib Dxm zinb Ryruq Mwavj zavg Tinb huvb zuaq Jyenq . huvb tiaj aa'b ! se weig naaiq Euvg maaib lamb Namq yiu-Tai myenb Zivj taaib koj yia .
44026008	meib Bua yiu-Tai myenb weig haiq tiug maiq haib syenj myenb taig mivb mq paag Tinb huvb haib pun navb taaib ?
44026009	“ zinb Daavg yia yaag Namq yia xij zu'g lovg Revg za'eij zruj to'g naa-saa-letq muvq uaq taub ye-su Eei Buaj .
44026010	yia yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Navq naaig zruj . sai myenb pyeiq pun yia maaib livg zx'q syenj ye-su Eei myenb Zamq Eei taaib wrnj Jyenq lob . ninb Bua zu'g tivg taij uaq zang yia yaag a'Neiq Eei .
44026011	yia mivb nxmb nxm wig txvb hxig ninb Bua Zamb Rung a'q . xij aapq ninb Bua kxvq Ki ye-su . yia Qiaj Jiad haig ninb Bua , zuvq mivb Tauj Eiag kua'q Eei zivb zruj to'g ninb Bua .
44026012	“ maaib Rung yia tu'q sai myenb pyeiq Eei hatg maad Zauj livg mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb .
44026013	huvb tiaj aa'b ! yia kan Jauq mivb kau , luvb aanj a'q . yia pwatg yem kub vwaaig luvb maaib Fav , kaub Fav Jiaj Ba'Nxi , ziuj kxmj yia Zauj kan Jyenq yia uaq teij myenb .
44026014	yia Bua yetg zuvq Kiv Fiag Dau mig a'q . yia yaag haid maaib Qiaj kxvq penj hipq-lu waag Buaj yia , ‘ sau-lo aa'b ! sau-lo ! meib weig haiq tiug zruj to'g yia ? meib Navq vovb Di'q zung vovb pyaaq hxig kanb zu'g mun . ’
44026015	“ yia zyrug naaig kaaj , ‘ zyruq aa'b ! meib tovb haiq taub ? ’ “ zyruq tau , ‘ yia se ye-su , tovb meib zruj to'g uaq taub .
44026016	ib zang Jiad sin sruq Jyenq maa'b ! yia hing pun meib pwatg weig Paaiq meib zruj yia Eei pru . yia xij meib kan yia zruj zxvb zevj kxvq ib Nxi meib pwatg yia naaiq teij sig cvj Zauj Ga'haaq yia xij pun meib pwatg Eei sig .
44026017	yia xij Fruj meib Zwrtq yiu-Tai myenb Eei puab Diaq cvj Zauj yia Paaiq meib mivb uaq teij Janj Eei puab Diaq .
44026018	yia Paaiq meib mivb pun ninb Bua haib mavg tu'q pwatg , pun yem Mwavj Eei myenb haib Zwrtq taaib yem Fav , yaag yem saa-taan Eei puab Diaq Zwrtq taaib lxd Tinb huvb . ninb Bua zyrug tu'q zwid kwavg liud , yaag tu'q Zauj weig syenj yia penj Zivb Revg myenb uaq teij , maaib ninb Bua Eei pwrng . ’
44026019	“ aa-Gi-Paa huvb aa'b ! yia maiq vcvg yetg teij yem luvb hing yaavb Eei sig .
44026020	yia zyrug yem Daa-matq-katg zivb zunb tod Daavg , Ga'haaq mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb , cvj mivb kxmj i-saa-laa-en teib puv , cvj Zwrtq mivb Janj Eei txvj zunb tod pun zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q ninb Bua xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid Rwrnj taaib lxd Tinb huvb yaag zruj sig pun Ziv ninb Bua za'kevb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid mig a'q .
44026021	weig naaiq , yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq , yiu-Tai myenb zx'q yia , xij taij yia .
44026022	mq paag maaib Tinb huvb Tevj yia Tauj ib Nxi , yia zyrug sruq Jyenq naaiq zwavj myenb Eei Ra'Myen zruj zxvb zevj pun zruj Lo zruj faij Eei mwavj . yia kxvq Eei se fib Navq trug waag myenb Zauj mo-se kxvq xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig Navq .
44026023	ninb Bua kxvq ki-tug xij zu'g syrug Kruq , yaag kxvq ninb zruj taig mivb cvj navb taaib Eei taaub taub , ninb zyrug ziuj Fav pun yiu-Tai myenb Zauj maang fivj Janj . ”
44026024	pau-lo Navq naaiq nx kxvq Jaiq sin Eei waag , fe-saa-Tatq zyrug heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ pau-lo aa'b ! meib maiq Rav Bx lxb . to'g tu'q sru Lav haig , pun meib maiq Rav a'q . ”
44026025	pau-lo tau , “ fe-saa-Tatq tomb zyruq aa'b ! yia maiq zeid maiq Rav lx'g . yia kxvq Eei se maiq zeid maiq Rav Eei waag . se za'kevb zyen Eei , Zivb Zoq Eei .
44026026	huvb tiaj hiuq Revg naaiq teij Euvb Euvg sig , yia zyrug puvj laavg Eei kxvq Revg pun meib mwavj . yia syenj maiq maaib yetg Euvg meib maiq hiuq , weig zu'g maiq zeid pivj Jyenq zruj Eei sig .
44026027	aa-Gi-Paa huvb aa'b ! meib syenj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei waag fai ? yia hiuq tu'q meib syenj Eei . ”
44026028	aa-Gi-Paa huvb Buaj pau-lo , “ zyavb hog Dovg naaiq navq meib Namq taaib meib haib pun yia xij penj ki-tug myenb fai ? ”
44026029	pau-lo tau , “ maiq kunq zyavb hog Daauq fai navq , yia Toq Tinb huvb pun meib Zauj yem naaiq Eei zwavj myenb yetg zuvq penj Revg Navq yia nx , Zwrtq liud maiq maaib Lia'g limg Dob Navq . ”
44026030	kxvq liud , aa-Gi-Paa huvb Zauj zuvj Zauj Be-nitq Zauj yem uaq Eei zwavj myenb Jiad sin
44026031	Zwrtq mivb . laanb Zauj laanb kxvq , “ maiq pwatg naaiq laanb myenb txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij fai wrnj lob . ”
44026032	aa-Gi-Paa yaag kxvq Buaj fe-saa-Tatq , “ sij kxvq naaiq laanb myenb maiq kcvb Toq pun lo-maa huvb tunj sig , puvj tu'q Eei . ”
44027001	lo-maa Jyen tivg Hruq pun yia Bua pia'g Ravq mivb i-taa-li teib puv . ninb Bua zyrug zx'q pau-lo Zauj teij zwib myenb Jiu pun taub x-katg-tatg huvb uaq kwanb pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq , tovb kunq yetg pc'q taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq , Buaj heug yu-lyetq .
44027002	yia Bua zyrug pia'g Pruj atg-laa-mitq-Ti-yum muvq Eei Ravq . naaiq Pruj Ravq xij kan Kxib Len , e-sia scvq Eei Ravb prug Jiaj . Ravq zyrug mivb a'q . maaib taub maa-si-Do-nia teib puv , Te-saa-lo-ni-kaa zivb Eei myenb , Buaj heug aa-litq-Taa-Katq , yaag Zauj Jyenq yia Bua mivb .
44027003	ta'Eeig Nxi yia Bua Tauj sai-Dxn muvq , yu-lyetq pcvb pyeiq Kxb lyenb pau-lo , pun ninb mivb lxd ninb Eei kxb yrud weig pun ninb Eei kxb yrud liug leid teij ninb .
44027004	cvj yem naaig Rcv Ravq mivb , Ryaauj yetg aaj maiq sunj , yia Bua zyrug Jiaj Ryaauj maiq pwrng Lo uaq puv sai-patg Kxib Rru ,
44027005	cvj Jiaj Kxiq , Jiaj zu'g si-li-sia Zauj pam-fi-lia mivb Tauj li-sia teib puv , mi-laa muvq .
44027006	yem uaq pcvb pyeiq cvj lxd tu'q Pruj Ravq yem aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb taaib , xij mivb i-taa-li teib puv . ninb zyrug txb yia Bua pia'g uaq Pruj Ravq .
44027007	naaiq teij ziaj Nxi , Ravq mivb tu'q tong haig . a'g tu'q mivb haig , laub Eei Zivj taaib Tauj Kaa-ni-Datg muvq . laaij Ryaauj maiq sunj , maiq haib pcv za'g mivb . yia Bua zyrug pcvb paaid sanj-mo-ne cvj Jiaj Ryaauj maiq pwrng Lo uaq puv Ke-litq Kxib Rru .
44027008	Ravq kevb ! a'g tu'q mivb haig , mq paag yia Bua nitq Jyenq Kxib Rru manb mang mivb zyrug Tauj nxm txvj Buaj heug , “ Ravb prug Rweig , ” leib laa-sia muvq maiq navg ko .
44027009	mivb kau , kwavg zyavb hog Zamq haig a'q . zuvq Jiaj liud zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Eei zipq a'q . sij kxvq kan Ravq mivb nx , haib pwavb zu'g sig mq pei . pau-lo zyrug Kwinj zwavj myenb . ninb kxvq ,
44027010	“ zwavj kxb yrud aa'b ! yia pwatg Bua Zwrtq naaiq Rung Jauq za'kevb xij pwavb sig a'q . maiq taan Ravq Zauj huaj haib laaib zitg Navq . lyemb Bua Eei mcvg zuvq xij zu'g kwavg mq pei . ”
44027011	mq paag pcvb pyeiq syenj Ravb Jyen Zauj Ravb zyruq Eei waag , maiq syenj pau-lo Eei waag .
44027012	weig zu'g uaq nxm Ravb prug maiq navg penj Jiaj tovb ken Nxi , yem Ravq xij mivb Eei myenb yaag kaub Zamq , ninb Bua zyrug tivg Hruq haib kaanq tu'q hivb nx , xij mivb fi-nikq uaq nxm Ravb prug zuaq tovb ken Nxi Jiaj . fi-nikq se yem uaq Ke-litq Kxib Rru Eei yetg nxm Ravb prug , Win mivb fai puv Zauj pa'q puv Bu'Dovj yaag Win mivb fai puv Zauj naamb puv Bu'Dovj .
44027013	yem kau uaq nxm txvj , Ryaauj yem naamb puv pwrng taaib syeng Eei , zwavj myenb zyrug laaig mivb tu'q Eei . Ravb nrub zyrug syru zwig Ravq Eei ka'naaiq faauj taaib zyrug Rcv nitq Jyenq Ke-litq Kxib Rru mivb .
44027014	mivb maiq laub pwavb kxv tomb Ryaaub Jia'q , ( tovb myenb heug pa'q puv Zauj tov puv Bu'Dovj Eei Ryaauj ) , pwrng yavb Kxib Rru uaq puv taaib .
44027015	Ryaauj zyrug taaib nyruq Ravq , Ravq pxvd maiq hivb Ryaauj . yia Bua zyrug puvj Ravq sweib Ryaauj pwrng mivb .
44027016	Ryaauj pwrng Jyenq mivb kau , nitq zu'g nxm Kxib Rru txn , Buaj heug Kaau-Daa , Kxib Rru zyrug Txvq Jyenq teij Ryaauj . yia Bua zyrug zx'q Ravb txn prub faauj pavg tomb Ravq Dob Jyenq , zruj tu'q Kruq haig .
44027017	Dob liud Ravb txn , ninb Bua cvj Dob tomb Ravq , zx'q Laav Zunj Fiag ka'Diaq pcv faauj taaib Dob Jyenq . kamb Riaj Ravq haib Ryavg zu'g se-Titq uaq nxm txvj Eei saab zyru Dwi , ninb Bua zyrug puvj Diab Bwavb Fiag sweib Ryaauj pwrng mivb .
44027018	Ryaaub Jia'q Zxg nyruq Jyenq Ravq . ta'Eeig Nxi ninb Bua zyrug zx'q huaj kwavg uaq Kxiq ,
44027019	cvj ta'faam Nxi ninb Bua cvj zx'q teij Ravq Eei ua'g king kwcvj kwavg Kxiq a'q .
44027020	tu'q ziaj Nxi yia Bua maiq pwatg Ba'Nxi , maiq pwatg Leij Zwrtq . tomb Ryaauj Zxg pwrng Jyenq seij Eei . yia Bua maaib lamb Namq Fruj tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Eei Jauq paag mig a'q .
44027021	tu'q ziaj Nxi zwavj myenb maiq Eang haiq Euvg . pau-lo zyrug sruq Jyenq ninb Bua Bu'Dovj kxvq , “ zwavj kxb yrud aag , sij kxvq meib Bua mwavj yia Eei waag , maiq Zwrtq Ke-litq uaq nxm Kxib Rru nx , Bua maiq zu'g pwavb naaiq teij sig hxig Bua kwavg ka'naaiq Zamq .
44027022	Navq haaij yaag paag , kunq puvj tivg Hruq , meib Bua maiq maaib yetg taub haib zu'g kwavg mcvg . Kuvj kwavg naaiq Pruj Ravq Navq ,
44027023	weig zu'g tovb yia penj ninb Eei yaag pua'g zavg Eei Tinb huvb , maaib taub ninb Eei finb myenb a'Mwavj taaib sruq Jyenq yia Eei ka'Len .
44027024	ninb kxvq , ‘ pau-lo aa'b ! meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj . meib Navq haaij xij zu'g mivb sruq Jyenq lo-maa tomb ziub huvb Eei Ra'Myen . Tinb huvb xij weig meib pun yetg zuvq Jwavg Ravq Eei myenb tu'q mcvg Zwrtq . ’
44027025	zwavj kxb yrud aa'b ! kunq puvj Hruq maa'b ! yia syenj Tinb huvb . ninb Navq haiq nx kxvq za'kevb xij Navq uaq nx zruj .
44027026	mq paag Bua Eei Ravq zuvq xij zu'g Piu mivb toj Bua kwavg yetg nxm Kxib Rru . ”
44027027	Tauj zyepg feij Nxi uaq mwrnd yia Bua Eei Ravq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Byrub mivb Byrub taaib Eei yem uaq me-Di-te-le-nyen Kxiq . Daamq mwrnd Eei txvj , Ravb nrub haid Navq nitq Byenj fatq teij a'q nx .
44027028	ninb Bua zyrug lovg tiub Laav Dob Jyenq ka'naaiq Niaq Eei puvj Fiag Dx'g mavg kaaj Dovg haaij Do , pwatg maaib Eig zyepg zamb Do . yetg zang Jiaj ninb Bua cvj Dx'g Rung pwatg zyepg Mmd zamb Do .
44027029	ninb Bua kamb Riaj Ravq haib Ryavg zu'g la'pyeiq , Ravb nrub zyrug puvj pyei nxm zwig Ravq Eei ka'naaiq yem uaq Ravb tweiq . zwig Jyenq , mavg maiq tu'q luvb kaanq Fav a'q .
44027030	Ravb nrub Namq xij pyauj , zyrug zx'q Ravb txn puvj Fiag Kxiq zruj Navq xij puvj Ravb mGxvq Eei ka'naaib zwig Fiag nx .
44027031	mq paag pau-lo kxvq Buaj pcvb pyeiq Zauj pcv , “ sij kxvq Ravb nrub maiq yem naaiq Ravq nx , meib Bua maiq haib tu'q Fruj . ”
44027032	pcv zyrug Va'q tavj Dob Ravb txn Eei Laav puvj kwavg mig a'q .
44027033	luvb aaq lamb teij Fav a'q , pau-lo Kwinj zwavj myenb Eang teij ka'naaiq . ninb kxvq , “ tu'q zyepg feij Nxi a'q , meib Bua Raub maiq Eang haiq Euvg .
44027034	Navq naaiq yia Kwinj meib Bua xij zu'g Eang teij ka'naaiq Zivj taaib haib tu'q mcvg Zwrtq . meib Bua kx'g myenb Eei Ba'pyei lyemb yetg tiub maiq zu'g myetg . ”
44027035	kxvq setq , pau-lo zyrug zx'q Fuaq taaib txv Jyenq zwavj myenb lcvd zivb Tinb huvb zyrug mc'q taaib Eang .
44027036	zwavj myenb zyrug haid Hruq lovj teij , yetg zuvq zyrug Eang a'q .
44027037	yia Bua yem Ravq Eei myenb yetg zuvq maaib Eig pc'q Zyetq zyepg lua'g laanb .
44027038	taub taub Eang peuq zyrug pyenb Byaub kwavg uaq Kxiq , xij pun Ravq hev teij .
44027039	luvb Fav taaib , maiq maaib haiq taub zia'q tu'q uaq nxm txvj , mq paag ninb Bua pwatg maaib nxm uamb kx'q maaib saab zyru ywrnb Eei , Kub Zwrtq Eei , zyrug tivg xij txb Ravq Zwrtq uaq nxm txvj .
44027040	ninb Bua zyrug Va'q tavj zwig Ravq Eei ka'naaiq kwavg , cvj Jaiq Gxi Ravb Byetg Eei Laav . ninb Bua cvj Zxv Jyenq Ravb mGxvq Eei Diab Bwavb pun Ryaauj pwrng huvj Jyenq mivb Zwrtq uaq Byenj .
44027041	mq paag mivb kau , Ravq pwavb zu'g uamb kapq , Ravb mGxvq Ryavg zu'g saab zyru Dwi kx'q Jyenq , maiq haib mivb . Ravb tweiq zyrug zu'g uam nyruq huq mig a'q .
44027042	pcv Namq xij taij kwavg zwib myenb , Riaj ninb Bua haib zyrub uam pyauj mq pei .
44027043	mq paag pcvb pyeiq xij lyrub pau-lo zyrug maiq pun ninb Bua taij yetg taub . ninb heug haiq taub haib zyrub uam kunq Tiuj Fiag uam zyrub Zwrtq uaq Byenj a'q .
44027044	haiq taub maiq haib zyrub uam xij zu'g Qam Dyavb penq fai yem Ravq haib Byrub Eei ka'naaiq zyrub Zwrtq Byenj . Navq naaiq yetg zuvq zyrug Zwrtq Byenj , maiq zu'g kwavg mcvg .
44028001	zwavj myenb yetg zuvq tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Revg , faauj Byenj mivb , yia Bua Zivj taaib hiuq tu'q naaiq nxm Kxib Rru Eei Buaj heug mxn-taa .
44028002	yem uaq Eei pwrnb teig myenb zipq yia Bua lovj haig . twib Byuvg , Jwavq haig , ninb Bua zyrug puaq trud pun yia Bua Raauj .
44028003	pau-lo mivb lxd tu'q yetg paaq zaavb taaib puaq trud . an uaq trub Raug trud Jaamb zu'g Jxm , maaib tiub naavb to'g yem uaq zaavb Zwrtq taaib Ex'q Jyenq puad , maiq puvj kwavg .
44028004	pwrnb teig myenb pwatg naav vaatg Jyenq pau-lo Eei puad saaib saaib uaq , ninb Bua zyrug kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb kevb ! taij Jiaj myenb a'q . yem Kxiq Fruj Zwrtq mcvg taaib mq paag luvb Dau maiq prug sevb ninb . ”
44028005	mq paag pau-lo fevj Dutq naav pia'g trub Raug . ninb yaag maiq penj haiq Euvg .
44028006	yem uaq Eei myenb laaig ninb haib omj fai Kiv uaq Dau taig mq paag mavg laub tavb Eei maiq pwatg fuvg . ninb Bua zyrug kxiq waag kxvq , “ naaiq laanb myenb kevb ! zruj taub zyenb a'q . ”
44028007	leib uaq nxm txvj maiq navg ko maaib uaq nxm Kxib Rru Eei taaub myenb , Buaj heug pupg-li-atg , Eei Deig . ninb zipq yia Bua mivb yem pyauq pua Nxi yaag Jwav tu'q lovj haig .
44028008	pupg-li-atg Eei tia putq pcvg sin Jxm , ka'sia yaag fiaj Kruq Eei , pweij Jyenq Zruj . pau-lo pia'g mivb mavg , Tevj ninb tauj kauj liud , txb puad maan ninb Eei sin , pcvg zyrug lovj mig a'q .
44028009	Navq naaiq nx zruj liud , yem Kxib Rru Eei putg pcvg myenb yetg zuvq taaib lxd pau-lo , taub taub zyrug zxg lovj Revg .
44028010	ninb Bua yaag Taaib yia Bua , pun Zamb Euvg ka'naaiq zruj zivb Eeig . yia Bua xij pia'g Ravq Zwrtq uaq zang , yia Bua Qyemj zu'g Eei ka'naaiq ninb Bua yaag fuvj taaib an Jyenq Ravq .
44028011	yia Bua yem mxn-taa Kxib Rru pua Laaj Eia'g cvj pia'g Ravq mivb a'q . uaq Pruj Ravq se yem aa-lekq-saan-De-lia zivb taaib yaag yem naaiq nxm Kxib Rru Jiaj tovb ken Nxi . Ravb mGxvq tiu Jyenq i taub zyenb Eei favj penj suvb kub vwaab txn , zruj Javb hog .
44028012	pia'g Ravq mivb Tauj sai-laa-Kiu hitq pua Nxi uaq .
44028013	yem naaig cvj mivb Tauj le-yi-um muvq . ta'Eeig Nxi maaib Ryaauj yem naamb puv mcvj taaib , Ga'haaq yetg Nxi zyrug Tauj pu-Ti-o-li muvq .
44028014	Tauj uaq yia Bua pwavb zu'g teij syenj ye-su Eei myenb . ninb Bua Toq yia Bua yem yetg nxm leib paaij uaq . Navq naaig yia Bua zyrug mivb Tauj lo-maa zivb .
44028015	yem uaq Eei kxb yrud haid fyenj kxvq yia Bua taaib , ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mivb Tauj apg-pi-atg hei Zauj pua nxm Kc'g pyauq uaq teij i nxm laavd zipq yia Bua . pau-lo yetq pwatg naaiq teij myenb zyrug lcvd zivb Tinb huvb yaag haid Hruq lovj haig a'q .
44028016	yia Bua Tauj lo-maa zivb , huvb Jaa sweib pau-lo yem ninb kanb Eei txvj , mq paag maaib taub pcv kruj Jyenq .
44028017	Ga'haaq pua Nxi , pau-lo Toq yiu-Tai myenb Eei myenb koj taaib . taaib Rxib , pau-lo kxvq Buaj ninb Bua , “ zwavj kxb yrud aag , yia maiq zruj haiq Euvg txvg Bua Eei myenb yaag maiq zruj txvg Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei leid , mq paag yia yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zu'g zx'q zruj zwib myenb yaag zu'g Jiu pun lo-maa Jyen .
44028018	ninb Bua syemq liud yaag maiq pwatg yia txvg haiq Euvg zig tu'q taij zyrug xij puvj yia .
44028019	mq paag yiu-Tai myenb Rcv Jyenq , yia zyrug maiq haib fuvg zruj . yia xij zu'g Toq pun lo-maa huvb tunj yia Eei sig . mq paag maiq zeid yia maaib haiq Euvg sig koj Zauj yia Jwavg fivj Eei myenb .
44028020	weig naaiq yia heug meib Bua taaib txij Myen kxvq . i-saa-laa-en myenb maaib lamb Namq weig zu'g ninb Bua zuaq Jyenq maaib taub taaib . se weig ninb Bua zuaq uaq taub yia Zivj zu'g naaiq Lia'g limg Dob . ”
44028021	mwavj Eei myenb tau , “ yia Bua maiq tu'q zipq yu-Dia scvq Eei fyenj kxvq Tauj meib Eei sig , yaag maiq maaib haiq taub kxb yrud yem uaq taaib kxvq meib zruj txvg haiq Euvg .
44028022	mq paag yia Bua xij mwavj meib kanb Namq Zwrtq Eei Jauq , weig zu'g meib syenj uaq Euvg leid maiq kunq mivb Tauj haaij yia Bua yaag haid myenb taanb . ”
44028023	Navq naaig kxvq liud , ninb Bua zyrug tunj Nxi . Tauj ninb Bua tunj zyavj uaq Nxi maaib myenb kaub Zamq kapq zunq taaib yem pau-lo hitq Eei txvj . pau-lo zyavb Nxi zunb tod Tauj Mwavj , lovg mo-se Eei leib latg Zauj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb Eei sru kxvq mevb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei tod yaag Kwinj ninb Bua syenj ye-su .
44028024	pau-lo kxvq naaiq teij waag maaib teij zyrug syenj , maaib teij maiq syenj .
44028025	ninb Bua zyrug fiub Zovj Jyenq Zwrtq . maiq kcvb Zwrtq uaq zang pau-lo cvj Tipq waag . ninb kxvq , “ sivj livb lovg trug waag myenb , i-saa-yaa , Zauj Bua Eei ovb Taaij kxvq tu'q hxpg haig .
44028026	i-saa-yaa kxvq , ‘ meib xij zu'g mivb Buaj naaiq teij pc'g fivj , maiq kunq Dovg haaij mwavj , meib Bua yaag maiq pia'g Hruq , Dovg haaij mavg , yaag maiq pwatg .
44028027	weig zu'g naaiq teij myenb Eei Hruq Rotq . ninb Bua zotq Jyenq mnxmb Kwrtq , yaag Fipq Jyenq mziv . maiq zei c'q , ninb Bua Eei mziv haib mavg tu'q pwatg , mnxmb haib mwavj tu'q haid . Hruq yaag haib mevb pc'g . Navq naaig ninb Bua zyrug Win Rwrnj taaib lxd yia , yia yaag xij zxg lovj ninb Bua . ’ ”
44028028	pau-lo cvj kxvq , “ Navq naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq a'q . Tinb huvb Eei Fruj en ib zang zunb Tauj fivb fivj Janj , Janj yaag xij mwavj . ”
44028029	pau-lo kxvq liud naaiq teij waag , yiu-Tai myenb zyrug Rcv Jyenq Jaaj Zwrtq .
44028030	pau-lo yem ninb kanb kruq taaib Eei pyauq pwavq i Havj . haiq taub taaib lxd ninb , ninb a'Neiq zipq .
44028031	ninb puvj laavg Eei zunb Tinb huvb zruj zyruq kunq myenb Eei tod , yaag zx'q zyruq ye-su ki-tug Eei Jaub lrug Faauj ninb Bua , yaag maiq maaib haiq taub laanb Jyenq a'q .
45001001	yia , pau-lo , zruj ye-su ki-tug Eei pru . Tinb huvb kinq yia taaib zruj kovb zob yaag Paaiq yia zunb ninb Eei Kuq fyenj .
45001002	naaiq Kuq fyenj zinb Daavg Tinb huvb lcvd liud a'q , yaag lovg ninb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb fiaq Jyenq uaq kivb sru .
45001003	Kuq fyenj kxvq ninb Eei txn , Bua Eei zyruq ye-su ki-tug , Zwrtq seij taaib penj taub paamb myenb , zruj Daa-witq Eei zeib fun .
45001004	Zivb Revg Eei sivj livb yaag pun Ziv ninb zruj Tinb huvb Eei txn , weig zu'g ninb taig mivb , Tinb huvb lovg tomb Qa'q pun ninb cvj navb taaib .
45001005	Tinb huvb lovg ninb Zeij en pun yia Bua zruj kovb zob , weig ninb Eei mevb txb maang fivj myenb syenj yaag mwavj ninb Eei waag .
45001006	lyemb meib Bua lo-maa zivb Eei myenb , Tinb huvb yaag heug taaib penj ye-su ki-tug Eei myenb mig a'q .
45001007	yia zyrug fiaq fyenj pun meib Bua yem lo-maa zivb Eei zwavj myenb , tovb Tinb huvb Namq yaag heug taaib penj ninb kanb Eei myenb uaq teij . Toq Bua Eei zavg tiaj Tinb huvb Zauj zyruq ye-su ki-tug Zeij en Zeij pcvb xn pun meib Bua .
45001008	ta'yetq , ye-su ki-tug pun yia weig meib Bua zwavj myenb lcvd zivb yia Eei Tinb huvb , weig zu'g luvb Diaq myenb haid kxvq meib Bua syenj tu'q lovj .
45001009	Tinb huvb , tovb yia pwavq Hruq Tevj zruj kov zunb ninb Eei txn Eei Kuq fyenj uaq taub , haib Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj . ninb hiuq tu'q yia haiq zang tauj kauj yia Tib Tauj meib Bua .
45001010	yia xij mivb meib Bua naaig laub haig a'q , mq paag mivb maiq zyavb . yia Toq Tinb huvb , sij kxvq ei ninb Eei za'eij , Kxi Jauq pun yia ib zang maaib Qavj tu'q mivb meib Bua naaig .
45001011	yia za'kevb ! xij pwatg haig meib Bua , weig pun meib Bua tu'q sivj livb Eei zivb Eeig zyrug Tevj meib Bua syenj kaub henq .
45001012	yia kxvq Eei se , meib Bua tu'q pwatg yia Eei syenj fim , yia yaag tu'q pwatg meib Bua Eei syenj fim , laanb zyrug haib Tevj laanb syenj kaub henq .
45001013	zwavj kxb yrud aag , yia xij meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia Jiad ziaj Rung Hruq xij mivb meib Bua naaig mq paag maaib sig zxq Jyenq , mivb maiq zyavb . yia xij mivb meib Bua naaig , yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj txb myenb syenj zyruq Navq yia yem Zamb fivj Janj Bu'Dovj txb nx .
45001014	maiq kunq haiq Euvg myenb , yem muvq fai yem lomg Eei , to'g Jiaj sru fai maiq to'g Jiaj sru Eei , yia Dovg haaij zuvq Qyemj zu'g Tevj .
45001015	weig naaiq yia za'kevb xij zunb Kuq fyenj pun meib Bua lo-maa zivb Eei myenb .
45001016	yia zuvq maiq Eaiq Kuq fyenj weig zu'g naaiq Kuq fyenj se Tinb huvb Eei tomb Qa'q haib Fruj yetg zuvq syenj Eei myenb , Fruj yiu-Tai myenb Daavg , Ga'haaq Zivj Tauj fivb fivj Janj .
45001017	naaiq Kuq fyenj piuj mevb Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx pun myenb Zauj ninb hxpg Hruq , se yem kxn xij zu'g syenj yaag syenj Tauj setq mweid . Navq kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq nx , “ haiq taub syenj Kauj Tinb huvb zyrug Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg Hruq ,
45001018	Tinb huvb yem uaq Tinb txvb piuj mevb ninb nrud haig myenb mavg Piaj ninb , yaag nrud haig myenb zruj Eei yetg zuvq waaig sig . ninb Bua zruj Eei waaig sig mwavb Jyenq zyen leid , maiq pun myenb hiuq .
45001019	Tinb huvb zyrug tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid , weig zu'g ninb Bua haib hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb . se Tinb huvb kanb piuj mevb pun ninb Bua hiuq .
45001020	yem zeij luvb zeij Dau taaib uaq zang , Tinb huvb yetg liud yem Eei tomb Qa'q Zauj ninb Eei fyemb fivj , maiq kunq mziv mavg maiq pwatg mq paag Tinb huvb pun myenb mevb mevb hiuq tu'q Eei . pwatg Tinb huvb zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq zyrug pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb a'q . ninb Bua zyrug maiq maaib txvj Jaiq sin .
45001021	ninb Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb mq paag maiq Taaib ninb zruj Tinb huvb yaag maiq lcvd zivb ninb . ninb Bua Namq Eei Jauq zyrug maiq lamb lovg a'q . Hruq Vovj yaag Mwavj mig a'q .
45001022	ninb Bua Zev kanb Zovb mevb mq paag ninb Bua Vovj haig .
45001023	ninb Bua hxpg zu'g zavg yetg liud zyavb , Favb laavg Eei Tinb huvb . taauj Rwrnj ninb Bua zavg miub favj , tovb haib taig Eei myenb Eei favj zeiq Zauj nx'g Zauj scvb Kuq Zauj Exv Dau Eei ka'naaiq Eei favj .
45001024	weig naaiq , Tinb huvb sweib ninb Bua ei kanb Eei Hruq hang zruj laib Lopq Eei sig , lovg ninb Bua Eei sin , laanb Zauj laanb zruj Eaiq haig Eei sig .
45001025	ninb Bua txb Tinb huvb Eei zyen leid kxiq penj Jaaq leid taaib lovg . ninb Bua pua'g zavg zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq tiq zeij maang mwrtg uaq taub , tovb myenb yetg liud xij zu'g Zev uaq taub . aa-men .
45001026	laaij myenb Navq naaiq nx zruj , Tinb huvb sweib ninb Bua ei kanb Eei Hruq hang zruj Eaiq haig Eei sig . msia'q txn hxpg zu'g lovg mJavg txn , taauj Rwrnj msia'q lovg msia'q .
45001027	mJavg txn yaag fib Navq Eei kwavg msia'q txn maiq lovg . mJavg txn hang xij lovg mJavg Navq trud zia'g Jyenq Hruq nx Jxm , laanb Zauj laanb zruj Eaiq haig Eei sig . ninb Bua zruj Eei waaig sig zyrug winb pun ninb Bua kanb a'q .
45001028	laaij myenb Hruq vcvg , maiq xij hiuq Tinb huvb , Tinb huvb Zivj taaib maiq kunq ninb Bua . sweib ninb Bua kan ninb Bua kanb waaig haig Eei Hruq zruj maiq hxpg zu'g zruj Eei sig .
45001029	ninb Bua Kuvj zruj Euvb Euvg waaig haig , x'q haig Eei sig , mauq ka'naaiq , laanb Zauj laanb zruj maiq penj Eei Jauq . ninb Bua mweig Jia'q , taij myenb , Rcv Jaaj , Duaq myenb , Namq xij hxig myenb , kxvq waab huq ,
45001030	Pyen pwij taanb myenb , Rxv Tinb huvb , kxvq to'g myenb , zruj mauj , Zevb Lo , taaq za'eij zruj waaig sig , maiq mwavj tiaj maag .
45001031	ninb Bua Vovj , maiq ei lcvd Eei waag zruj , maiq Namq myenb yaag maiq Kxb lyenb myenb .
45001032	ninb Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei leid kxvq zruj naaiq Euvg sig Eei myenb xij zu'g taig . maiq taan ninb Bua kanb zruj Navq , myenb zruj , ninb Bua yaag a'Neiq Eei .
45002001	myenb muad aag , Navq naaig , maiq kunq meib tovb haiq taub , meib tivg zruj naaiq Euvg sig Eei myenb Eei zwid , meib maiq lamb Jaiq sin a'q . meib Navq haiq nx tivg myenb Eei zwid , meib zyrug tivg kanb Eei zwid , weig zu'g meib zruj Eei Zauj ninb Bua zruj Eei se fib Navq Eei .
45002002	Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb tivg zruj uaq Euvg sig Eei myenb maaib zwid se hxpg Eei .
45002003	myenb muad aag , meib tivg myenb Eei zwid mq paag meib yaag Navq ninb Bua nx zruj txvg . meib Namq meib haib pyauj tu'q Dutq , maiq zu'g Tinb huvb tivg meib Eei zwid fai ?
45002004	Tinb huvb Eei en Jaaij haig , ninb yaag Hruq Daauq , maaib nxig , mq paag meib mavg Piaj fai ? meib maiq hiuq tu'q se Tinb huvb Eei en xij txb meib kxiq Hruq fai ?
45002005	mq paag meib Eei Hruq vcvg , maiq Kavq kxiq . zuaq Tauj Tinb huvb piuj mevb ninb nrud myenb Eei zwid , tovb ninb pcvb fim Eei syemq zwid uaq Nxi , meib zyrug zu'g tivg kaub Niaq .
45002006	weig zu'g Tinb huvb xij ziuj mrud laanb myenb zruj Eei sig winb pun ninb Bua .
45002007	maaib teij myenb zanb zang lovg Hruq zruj Kuq sig , lxd yem Tinb huvb taaib Eei Favb laavg , xij ninb Taaib yaag pun maiq haib zitg Eei mcvg . tovb naaiq Euvg myenb Tinb huvb xij Zeij yetg liud Eei mcvg pun ninb Bua .
45002008	mq paag Kuvj trub kanb tu'q lovj , vcvg zyen leid , zruj waaig sig uaq teij , Tinb huvb zyrug Qiaj Jiad , nrud haig ninb Bua .
45002009	taub taub zruj x'q Eei paamb myenb zuvq xij zu'g pwavb Kruq Eei naang zivb . yiu-Tai myenb zu'g Daavg , Janj zu'g Ga'haaq .
45002010	mq paag tovb zruj lovj Eei myenb , Tinb huvb xij pun Favb laavg , xij Taaib , yaag xij pun pcvb xn ninb Bua . pun yiu-Tai myenb Daavg , Ga'haaq pun Janj ,
45002011	weig zu'g Tinb huvb maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen .
45002012	Janj maiq maaib mo-se Eei leib latg . ninb Bua paamd zwid ninb Bua zu'g myetg mq paag maiq zeid leib latg tivg . yiu-Tai myenb maaib mo-se Eei leib latg . ninb Bua paamd zwid , zyrug ziuj leib latg zu'g tivg zwid .
45002013	maiq zeid myenb haid liud leib latg zyrug haib tu'q Zauj Tinb huvb hxpg Hruq . Kuvj tovb ei Jyenq leib latg zruj uaq teij Navq tu'q Zauj ninb hxpg Hruq .
45002014	Janj maiq maaib mo-se Eei leib latg . mq paag sij kxvq ninb Bua ei kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib zruj hxpg leib latg , maiq kunq ninb Bua maiq maaib leib latg , ninb Bua kanb se zruj ninb Bua kanb Eei leib latg .
45002015	ninb Bua zruj Eei sig pun Ziv leib latg fiaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Hruq a'q . ninb Bua Eei Hruq pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj hxpg fai maiq hxpg . maaib zyavb hog Hruq koj ninb Bua , maaib zyavb hog pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q zruj tu'q hxpg .
45002016	ziuj yia zunb Eei Kuq fyenj , Tauj syemq Eei Nxi , Tinb huvb xij lovg ki-tug ye-su Navq naaiq nx syemq myenb kem Jyenq Eei sig .
45002017	meib kanb ni ? meib kxvq meib zruj yiu-Tai myenb yaag Kauj leib latg . meib puvj waab mauj kxvq kanb kaub hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb ,
45002018	yaag hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb xij meib Navq haiq nx zruj . meib yaag kxvq meib ho'g Jiaj leib latg Zivj taaib hiuq tu'q zruj haiq Euvg kaub hxpg Jiaj .
