66004008	naaiq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq taub taub maaib Ju'q Kwaaiq Daatq . yaag maaib mziv pwavq Revg sin , lyemb ka'Euad ka'Eiag . ninb Bua zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd maiq tivb lyrub Eei paauj Ruv kxvq , “ Zivb Revg , Zivb Revg , Zivb Revg , nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Tinb huvb , tovb zinb Daavg yem , ib zang yem ,
66004009	haiq zang naaiq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Zev , Taaib , lcvd zivb zweid Jyenq huvb weig , tovb yetg liud zyavb Jyenq Tauj maang kruq maang txig uaq taub ,
66004010	uaq teij Eig zyepg feij taub myenb koj zyrug kweig Fiag paaij zweid Jyenq huvb weig , tovb yetg liud zyavb Tauj maang kruq maang txig uaq taub . ninb Bua mwrnj kanb Eei nivq Yetq Jyenq uaq nxm weig Eei Ra'Myen yaag paauj Ruv kxvq ,
66004011	“ yia Bua Eei zyruq , yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aa'b ! meib Pwij tu'q yia Bua Zev , Pwij tu'q yia Bua Taaib , Pwij tu'q zipq livg , weig zu'g meib zeij maang mwrtg Zwrtq taaib . maang mwrtg ei meib Eei eij tu'q zeij Zwrtq taaib , yaag tu'q zyavb Jyenq . ”
66005001	yia pwatg zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad maaib Fung sru . naaiq Fung sru i puv zuvq fiaq Jyenq Ravg , yaag maaib siag nxm yenj nctq Dipg .
66005002	yia yaag pwatg taub henq haig Eei finb myenb heug Qiaj Lo Eei , “ haiq taub Pwij tu'q mc'q Gxi naaiq teij yenj , Kxi Gxi naaiq Fung sru ? ”
66005003	mq paag yem Tinb txvb , yem paamb ken , fai yem Daub Diaq , zuvq maiq maaib yetg taub haib mc'q Gxi naaiq Fung sru taaib mavg ka'Euad .
66005004	yia zyrug Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig , weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq taub Pwij tu'q Kxi Gxi , Pwij tu'q mavg naaiq Fung sru ka'Euad .
66005005	uaq teij myenb koj maaib taub Buaj yia , “ maiq tuvq Eyemq . mavg kaaj ! yu-Daa fivj Eei syenb , Daa-witq huvb Eei zeib fun , tu'q hivb zyrug haib mc'q Gxi uaq teij siag nxm yenj , Kxi Gxi uaq Fung sru . ”
66005006	yia zyrug pwatg maaib taub pa'ki yuvb txn sruq Jyenq huvb weig Bu'Dovj , cvj maaib uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Zauj uaq teij myenb koj weib Jyenq ninb . pwatg naaiq taub pa'ki yuvb txn Navq zu'g taij Jiaj nx . ninb yaag maaib siag nxm Jxv , siag nxm mziv , se Tinb huvb Eei siag nxm livb wrnb , tovb Tinb huvb Paaiq mivb Tauj paamb ken Eei nxmb nxm txvj .
66005007	pa'ki yuvb txn zyrug mivb zx'q yem zweid weig uaq taub Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad uaq Fung sru taaib .
66005008	ninb zx'q uaq zang , uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Zauj uaq teij Eig zyepg feij taub myenb koj kweig Fiag pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Ra'Myen . ninb Bua taub taub nanq Jyenq taanb paab Zauj Jyemb punb . Jyemb punb yaag maaib huv pwavq Revg , se Tinb huvb Eei myenb tauj kauj Eei waag .
66005009	ninb Bua yaag paauj tiub syavb Ruv . Ruv kxvq , “ meib Pwij tu'q zx'q naaiq Fung sru , Pwij tu'q mc'q Gxi srub Fung Eei yenj , weig zu'g meib zu'g taij taig , lovg kanb Eei Ryaamq maaid myenb , se maaid yem maang fivj , maang Euvg waag , maang Euvg myenb ,
66005010	meib pun ninb Bua zruj Tinb huvb Eei kua'q Eei pc'g fivj , yaag zruj sai myenb fub suj yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb . ninb Bua yaag xij kunq paamb ken . ”
66005011	yia cvj mavg yaag haid maaib Zinb Zin waanb waang taub finb myenb Eei Qiaj . finb myenb weib Jyenq huvb weig Zauj uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Zauj uaq teij myenb koj
66005012	yaag lovg Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , ‘ zu'g taij Eei pa'ki yuvb txn Pwij tu'q zipq livg Zauj zinb zxib , Zauj Zovb mevb Zauj Qa'q , Zauj mevb hog Zauj Favb laavg Zauj Zev Eei waag . ’ ‘ Zev zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub , yaag Zev pa'ki yuvb txn , weig zu'g ninb Bua maaib mevb hog , maaib Favb laavg yaag maaib Qa'q Tauj maang kruq maang txig . ’
66005013	yia yaag haid yem Tinb txvb , yem paamb ken , yem Daub Diaq , yem Kxiq ka'Euad , Tinb huvb zeij taaib maaib Qiaj Eei maang mwrtg ka'naaiq lomb Rxib kxvq , ‘ Zev zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub , yaag Zev pa'ki yuvb txn , weig zu'g ninb Bua maaib mevb hog , maaib Favb laavg yaag maaib Qa'q Tauj maang kruq maang txig . ’
66005014	uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq kxvq , “ aa-men . ” zwavj myenb koj yaag kweig Fiag paaij .
66006001	yia mavg pwatg pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi uaq teij siag nxm yenj Eei taaub nxm uaq zang , zyrug haid uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq maaib taub heug Qiaj Lo Eei Navq Ba'ov Bwi nx kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ”
66006002	yia mavg zyrug pwatg maaib taub maab pc'g . keb maad uaq taub nanq Jyenq Jwavb zinj yaag tu'q zipq nxm Zeij pun ninb Eei nivq . ninb keb maad Zwrtq mivb hivb Jiaj , cvj xij hivb Jiaj .
66006003	pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi ta'Eeig nxm yenj uaq zang , yia haid ta'Eeig taub navb Eei ka'naaiq kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ”
66006004	cvj maaib taub maad Zwrtq taaib , se maab si'q . keb maad uaq taub tu'q zipq livg pun paamb ke maiq maaib Taaib pcvb weig pun paamb myenb laanb taij laanb . uaq taub yaag tu'q zipq zuv tomb Ru'g Daauq .
66006005	pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi ta'faam nxm yenj uaq zang , yia haid ta'faam taub navb Eei ka'naaiq kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ” yia mavg zyrug pwatg taub maab Jia'q . keb maad uaq taub Eei puad nanq pcvj Ryavj .
66006006	yia zyrug haid Navq kxvq waag Eei Qiaj yem uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Bu'Dovj kxvq , “ yetg Nxi Eei kovb zinb Kuvj maaid tu'q yetg Jaan Byaub witq Meiq fai pua Jaan Byaub Baa-li Eei Meiq Navq . yaag maiq tuvq zruj waaig ka'lanq yrub Zauj a'vung tiuq . ”
66006007	pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi ta'feij nxm yenj uaq zang , yia zyrug haid ta'feij taub navb Eei ka'naaiq kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ”
66006008	yia mavg zyrug pwatg taub maad , setq mcvb lunj . keb maad uaq taub Eei Buaj heug , “ zu'g taig . ” yemb ken yaag kan Jyenq ninb taaib . ninb Bua zipq livg lovg Ru'g Daauq , lovg vxg Naavj Eei sig , lovg wrnb pcvg , lovg luvb Diaq Eei Yiab zxib myetg paamb ken pyei kruq Eei yetg kruq .
66006009	pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi ta'Mmd nxm yenj uaq zang , yia pwatg yem ziab txvb ka'Diaq maaib myenb Eei wrnb , se tovb weig zunb Tinb huvb Eei tod yaag zyepg zua'q Eei zruj zxvb zevj zu'g taij taig uaq teij myenb Eei wrnb .
66006010	ninb Bua heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ Zivb Revg Eei , zyen Eei , nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq aa'b ! meib Tauj haiq zang Zivj syemq paamb ken myenb , Jaauq win taij yia Bua uaq teij myenb ? ”
66006011	ninb Bua kx'g myenb tu'q zipq teij tomb lwib Daauq pc'g Eei . yaag maaib waag Buaj ninb Bua cvj hitq trug paaq , zuaq Tauj Zauj ninb Bua Jwavg zruj pru Eei Zauj ninb Bua Eei kxb yrud yaag Navq ninb Bua nx zu'g taij taig pwavq sruj mrug .
66006012	pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi ta'lua'g nxm yenj uaq zang , yia mavg zyrug pwatg Dau tovd tu'q seij haig . Ba'Nxi Jia'q mivb Navq yuvb Jia'q pyei Datq taaib Eei Diab Zru uaq nx . Laaj zyrug si'q Revg Navq Ryaamq nx .
66006013	luvb zavg Eei Leij yaag Dxtq Fiag Dau Navq tomb Ryaauj pwrng vovb Exj Dyavj maiq kcvb zua'g Eei pyruq Dxtq uaq nx .
66006014	luvb yaag Navq srub Fung nx , Fung Jyenq , zyav naaig mitg Revg mig a'q . nxmb nxm Bov , nxmb nxm Kxib Rru zu'g swiq Pyen Revg .
66006015	luvb Diaq Eei zwavj huvb tiaj , Zauj zruj Lo Eei , zruj pcvb pyeiq Eei , putq zxib Eei , maaib livg Eei , zruj nrub Eei Zauj maiq zeid zruj nrub Eei , yetg zuvq mivb pivj uaq Bcvb Kwrtq Zauj Bov Eei Bcvb vaamb .
66006016	ninb Bua heug Jyenq kxvq Buaj Bov Zauj la'pyeiq , “ Baav Dapq yia Bua maa'b ! Tevj yia Bua pivj zweid huvb weig uaq taub Eei Myen , Tevj yia Bua maiq zu'g pwavb pa'ki yuvb txn nrud yia Bua .
66006017	weig zu'g Tinb huvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn nrud haig zwid Eei tomb Nxi Tauj a'q . haiq taub haib tiaq tu'q ? ”
66007001	Ga'haaq yia pwatg pyei taub finb myenb sruq Jyenq Daub peib Eei pyei puv kx'q , hatg Jyenq pyei puv Eei Ryaauj , weig maiq pun Ryaauj pwrng Daub peib fai Kxiq fai haiq tiub Dyavj .
66007002	yia cvj pwatg kanb maaib taub finb myenb yem tov puv Zwrtq taaib yaag txb Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb Eei yenj . ninb lovg Qiaj Lo Eei heug tovb Tinb huvb pun livg zruj waaig Daub peib Zauj Kxiq uaq teij pyei taub finb myenb .
66007003	ninb kxvq , “ maiq tuvq kcvb zruj waaig Daub peib Zauj Kxiq Zauj Dyavj . zuaq yia Bua Gaapq Jyenq yenj yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei pru Eei pyxvb . ”
66007004	yia yaag haid kxvq tu'q Gaapq Jyenq yenj uaq teij myenb Eei sruj mrug . fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg zuvq maaib yetg sinj pyei waang pyei Zin taub tu'q Gaapq yenj .
66007005	yu-Daa fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , lu-Ben fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , kaatg fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj
66007006	aa-se fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , napq-Taa-li fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , maa-natq-sej fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj
66007007	si-me-on fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , le-wi fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , itg-saaj-Kaa fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj
66007008	sej-Bu-lun fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , yo-sepq fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj , Ben-yaa-min fivj maaib 12,000 taub tu'q Gaapq yenj
66007009	naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud , yia mavg zyrug pwatg myenb Zamq ! haig , maiq maaib haiq taub haib saauq tu'q zyend . ninb Bua yem maang kua'q , maang fivj , maang Euvg myenb , maang Euvg waag taaib sruq Jyenq huvb weig Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Ra'Myen . ninb Bua zu'q Jyenq lwib Daaub pc'g , puad nanq Jyenq taaub nxmb ,
66007010	yaag heug Qiaj Bwi Eei kxvq , “ Fruj en yem yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb , tovb zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub , “ aa-men . Zev Tinb huvb , lcvd zivb Tinb huvb . yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb yetg liud maaib Favb laavg , maaib Zovb mevb , maaib mevb hog , maaib livg , maaib Qa'q Tauj maang kruq maang txig . aa-men . ”
66007011	yetg zwavj finb myenb sruq weib kxmj huvb weig Zauj myenb koj Zauj uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq , yaag Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij Tinb huvb .
66007012	ninb Bua kxvq , “ aa-men . Zev Tinb huvb , lcvd zivb Tinb huvb . yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb yetg liud maaib Favb laavg , maaib Zovb mevb , maaib mevb hog , maaib livg , maaib Qa'q Tauj maang kruq maang txig . aa-men . ”
66007013	uaq teij myenb koj maaib taub naaig yia , “ zu'q Jyenq lwib Daaub pc'g Eei naaiq teij myenb se haiq taub ? ninb Bua yem haaij taaib ? ”
66007014	yia tau , “ tomb kxj aa'b ! meib hiuq Eei . ” ninb zyrug Buaj yia , “ naaiq teij myenb se yem uaq Rung Eei tomb naang zivb Zwrtq taaib . ninb Bua lovg uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Ryaamq Roj ninb Bua Eei tomb lwib Daauq pc'g taaib .
66007015	weig naaiq , ninb Bua yem Tinb huvb Eei huvb weig Ra'Myen , zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fub suj ninb . zweid Jyenq huvb weig uaq taub xij Zauj ninb Bua yem , peu Jyenq ninb Bua .
66007016	yem naaiq mivb ninb Bua yetg liud maiq vxg , yetg liud yaag maiq Gaatq a'q . Ba'Nxi fai Eutg trud yaag Pwi maiq zu'g ninb Bua .
66007017	weig zu'g yem huvb weig Bu'Dovj uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn xij kruj ninb Bua , ninb yaag xij txb ninb Bua mivb Tauj yuvd mcvg Eei uamb zivq . Tinb huvb yaag xij sxtq Gaai ninb Bua Eei tyemb tyemq uamb mweig . ”
66008001	pa'ki yuvb txn mc'q Gxi ta'Zyetq nxm yenj uaq zang , Tinb txvb sekq Ria'g Eei leib maiq ko Daamb nxm zyavb hog .
66008002	yia zyrug pwatg sruq Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen uaq teij siag taub finb myenb . ninb Bua yaag tu'q zipq siag nxm Ratg .
66008003	cvj kanb maaib taub finb myenb prub Jyenq Jyemb huvb lrub taaib sruq Jyenq puaq huv tiab . ninb yaag tu'q zipq huv Zamq Eei weig zxpg Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei zwavj myenb tauj kauj Eei waag zyrug yem huvb weig Ra'Myen uaq nxm puaq huv Eei Jyemb tiab puaq .
66008004	huvb syruj Zauj Tinb huvb Eei myenb tauj kauj Eei waag zyrug yem finb myenb Eei puad faauj Tauj Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen .
66008005	naaiq taub finb myenb cvj txb huvb lrub mivb zx'q ziab txvb Eei trud tapq pwavq zyrug zxi Fiag paamb ken . lyemb zeib pxvd Ba'ov Pcvb Pcvd Eei , maaib ziaj Euvg Qiaj Bwi , pxvd Ba'livg Fapg Fapg Eei , Dau yaag tovd .
66008006	uaq teij siag taub finb myenb nanq Jyenq uaq teij siag nxm Ratg Beng zyavj pyomq .
66008007	ta'yetq taub finb myenb yetq pyomq Ratg , maaib px'g Zauj trud zxpg Jyenq Ryaamq zu'g zxi Fiag paamb ken . Daub peib Zauj Dyavj pua kruq Eei yetg kruq puaq Qwi Revg . tiub tiub miab Eyemd yaag puaq Qwi Revg .
66008008	ta'Eeig taub finb myenb yetq pyomq Ratg , maaib Euvg ka'naaiq pwatg Navq tomb Bov zia'g Jyenq trud nx , zu'g zxi Fiag Kxiq . Kxiq Eei pua kruq Eei yetg kruq penj Ryaamq .
66008009	yem Kxiq maaib mcvg Eei ka'naaiq pua kruq Eei yetg kruq zu'g taig . Ravq pua kruq Eei yetg kruq yaag zu'g myetg .
66008010	ta'faam taub finb myenb yetq pyomq ninb Eei Ratg , maaib nxm tomb Leij zia'g Jyenq Navq trub paaq nx , yem luvb Dxtq Fiag taaib , Dxtq zu'g Daaib pua kruq Eei yetg kruq Zauj yetg zuvq uamb zivq .
66008011	uaq nxm Leij Eei Buaj heug “ yavb meud . ” uam pua kruq Eei yetg kruq zyrug im mig a'q . myenb Zamq Eei hopq zu'g uaq teij uam zyrug taig mig a'q , weig zu'g uam im .
66008012	ta'feij taub finb myenb yetq pyomq ninb Eei Ratg , Ba'Nxi pua kruq Eei yetg kruq zu'g Bx'q . Laaj Zauj Leij pua kruq Eei yetg kruq yaag zu'g Bx'q . Ba'Nxi Zauj Laaj Zauj Leij Eei Fav pua kruq Eei yetg kruq Mwavj mivb . luvb Nxi zang pua kruq Eei yetg kruq zyrug maiq Fav . luvb mwrnd zang pua kruq Eei yetg kruq yaag maiq Fav .
66008013	yia mavg Jyenq uaq zang , yia cvj haid nxm tomb Jaavq yem kub vwaaig luvb Daij Jyenq mivb , heug Jyenq Bwi Eei kxvq , “ zu'g Kruq a'q ! zu'g Kruq a'q ! yem paamb ken Eei zwavj myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q ! weig zu'g uaq teij pua taub finb myenb xij pyomq zevg Fiag uaq teij pua nxm Ratg . ”
66009001	ta'Mmd taub finb myenb yetq pyomq ninb Eei Ratg , yia pwatg nxm Leij yem uaq luvb Dxtq Fiag Dau . naaiq nxm Leij tu'q zipq nxm fxb zeib , tovb Kxi uaq nxm Do haig Eei Kwrtq Eei fxb zeib .
66009002	uaq nxm Leij Kxi Gxi Kwrtq zyrug maaib trub syruj Zutg Zutq Eei Zwrtq Navq puaq tomb ! trud Zwrtq syruj nx . Ba'Nxi Zauj luvb zyrug Mwavj mivb laaij Kwrtq Zwrtq Eei syruj om Jyenq .
66009003	cvj maaib Jopg Eeig yem trub syruj Zwrtq taaib cvj Fiag Tauj Dau . Jopg Eeig tu'q zipq Qa'q hxig myenb Navq zyepg Eeig Daavb Eei Qa'q nx .
66009004	maaib waag hatg ninb Bua maiq pun hxig miaq fai haiq Euvg ka'naaib zwavj fai Dyavj . Kuvj haib hxig maiq maaib Tinb huvb Eei yenj Gaapq Jyenq pyxvb uaq teij myenb Navq .
66009005	Jopg Eeig yaag maiq tu'q hxig naaiq teij myenb taig , Kuvj tu'q zeij ninb Bua pyaa Laaj Eia'g Navq . myenb zu'g Jopg Eeig zeij se Navq zu'g zyepg Eeig Daavb tanj uaq nx mun .
66009006	uaq teij pyaa Laaj Eia'g ka'Euad , myenb xij lxd Jauq taig yaag lxd maiq tu'q , maiq nxig tu'q taig . ninb Bua xij taig haig a'q , mq paag maiq haib taig .
66009007	naaiq teij Jopg Eeig pwatg Navq zxv Jyenq mivb Bx'q Jaaj Eei maad nx . ninb Bua Eei mGxvq Dovj Jyenq ka'naaiq pwatg Navq Jyemb nivq nx . ninb Bua Eei Myen yaag Navq myenb Eei Myen ,
66009008	Ba'pyei Navq msia'q txn Eei Ba'pyei . Eaab yaag Navq syenb Eei Eaab nx .
66009009	ninb Bua Eei la'Kwrtq maaib Euvg ka'naaiq pwav Jyenq Navq Lia'g Jaapq nx . Daatq yaag Bwi Navq maab Zia Zamq Eei Tiuj mivb Bx'q Jaaj uaq nx Bwi .
66009010	ninb Bua maaib tweiq Navq zyepg Eeig Daavb Eei tweiq nx , yaag haib tanj myenb . se tovb Jopg Eeig Eei tweiq maaib Qa'q hxig myenb pyaa Laaj Eia'g ka'Euad .
66009011	cvj maaib taub huvb kunq Jyenq ninb Bua , se tovb kunq Do haig uaq nxm Kwrtq Eei finb myenb . ninb Eei Buaj , hipq-lu waag kxvq , aa-Batg-Don . kikg waag kxvq , aa-px-li-yon .
66009012	ta'yetq Euvg zu'g Kruq Eei sig Jiaj mig a'q . Ga'haaq cvj maaib i Euvg zu'g Kruq Eei sig xij Zwrtq .
66009013	ta'lua'g taub finb myenb yetq pyomq ninb Eei Ratg , yia zyrug haid maaib Qiaj yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen uaq nxm puaq huv Eei Jyemb tiab pyei nxm kx'q Eei Jxv Zwrtq .
66009014	naaiq Euvg Qiaj kxvq Buaj ta'lua'g taub finb myenb , “ xij zu'g puvj Gxi yem tomb yu-fe-titg Daaib zu'g Dob Jyenq uaq teij pyei taub finb myenb . ”
66009015	naaiq teij pyei taub finb myenb zyrug tu'q puvj Gxi a'q . ninb Bua se liug leid zyavj lyrub Jyenq Tauj naaiq nxm zyavb hog , naaiq nxm Nxi , naaiq nxm Laaj , naaiq nxm Havj , weig taij paamb myenb pua kruq Eei yetg kruq .
66009016	yia haid kxvq keb maad Eei pcv maaib Bu'ziaj taub . yetg zuvq maaib i waanb waang taub .
66009017	yem naaiq teij hing yaavb Eei sig yia pwatg naaiq teij maad Zauj keb maad Eei pcv Navq naaiq nx . pcv Eei la'Kwrtq maaib Lia'g Jaapq si'q Eei Navq trud nx , Buaq Eei Navq Buaq Eei la'pyeib Jaaij , yaag yavb Eei Navq huvb nx . maad Eei mGxvq Navq syenb Eei mGxvq yaag maaib trud , maaib trub syruj , maaib huvb yem maad Eei Rwib pcvj Zwrtq .
66009018	Rwib pcvj Zwrtq taaib Eei trud Zauj trub syruj Zauj huvb zruj pua Euvg ze'g naang pun paamb myenb zu'g taig pua kruq Eei yetg kruq .
66009019	naaiq teij maad Eei Qa'q yem maad Eei Rwib pcvj Zauj tweiq . tweiq se Navq naav nx , yaag maaib mGxvq zyrug lovg hxig myenb .
66009020	zevg Fiag Eei paamb myenb , tovb maiq zu'g uaq teij ze'g naang taij Eei myenb , maiq kxiq Hruq kwavg kanb Eei puad zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq . ninb Bua Zxg zavg myenq fai paaij lovg Jyem , lovg Eaanb , lovg tovb , lovg la'pyeiq , lovg Dyavj zruj taaib Eei miub favj , tovb maiq haib mavg tu'q pwatg , maiq haib mwavj tu'q haid yaag maiq haib yavb Jauq Eei miub favj .
66009021	ninb Bua maiq kxiq Hruq kwavg taij myenb Eei sig , zruj faatq , zruj pwavb lyrub Eei sig , fai zruj za'g .
66010001	yia cvj pwatg taub henq haig Eei finb myenb yem uaq luvb Fiag taaib . maaib txq Bwrnj peu Jyenq ninb Navq tomb lwib Daauq nx . ninb Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig maaib tiub Juv . ninb Eei Myen Navq Ba'Nxi nx . ninb Eei zauj yaag Navq trub Dyrub .
66010002	ninb Eei puad nanq Jyenq srub Fung txn , se Kxi Gxi Eei . ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q zauj Zaaiq Kxiq , zaaij Jia'q Zaaiq Byenj .
66010003	ninb heug Qiaj Bwi Navq syenb heug nx , Funb Funb Eei Bwi . heug uaq zang , siag nxm Ba'ov zyrug Bwi a'q .
66010004	siag nxm Ba'ov yetq Bwi uaq zang , yia xij Fiag puad fiaq mq paag maaib Qiaj yem uaq Tinb txvb kxvq , “ maiq tuvq fiaq maa'b ! xij zu'g kem Jyenq naaiq teij siag nxm Ba'ov kxvq Eei waag . ”
66010005	yia zyrug pwatg Zaaiq Jyenq Kxiq , Zaaiq Jyenq Byenj uaq taub finb myenb suv ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad zyavq luvb ,
66010006	yaag zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Jyenq Tauj maang kruq maang txig Eei Tinb huvb , tovb zeij luvb Zauj yem luvb Eei maang mwrtg , zeij Dau Zauj yem Dau Eei maang mwrtg , yaag zeij Kxiq Zauj yem Kxiq Eei maang mwrtg uaq taub , hruq waag . finb myenb kxvq , “ maiq tuvq cvj vaib a'q !
66010007	Tauj ta'Zyetq taub finb myenb pyomq Ratg uaq zang , Tinb huvb zyrug zruj zyavj ninb maiq kcvb pun Byaavj yaavb Eei sig , Navq ninb Buaj Jiaj ninb Eei pru uaq teij trug waag myenb nx . ”
66010008	yia haid zinb Daavg yem Tinb txvb kxvq waag uaq Euvg Qiaj cvj Zauj yia kxvq , “ mivb zx'q Zaaiq Jyenq Kxiq , Zaaiq Jyenq Byenj uaq taub finb myenb Eei puad nanq Jyenq Kxi Gxi uaq Fung sru taaib maa'b ! ”
66010009	yia zyrug mivb Tauj finb myenb Toq ninb pun uaq Fung srub txn yia . finb myenb Buaj yia , “ zx'q mivb Eang maa'b ! Eang Fiag , meib Eei ka'sia zyrug im . mq paag yem meib Eei Rwib se Navq mweib txvb nx kaam . ”
66010010	yia zyrug zx'q yem finb myenb Eei puad srub Fung txn taaib Eang . yem yia Eei Rwib haid Navq mweib txvb nx kaam , mq paag Eang Fiag Tauj ka'sia , ka'sia haid im Eei .
66010011	cvj maaib waag Buaj yia , “ meib xij zu'g trug Tinb huvb Eei waag kxvq Tauj Zamb nxm kua'q , Zamb fivj myenb , Zamb Euvg waag Zauj Zamb taub huvb tiaj . ”
66011001	yia cvj tu'q zipq tiub lua'g ti'g kwcvq , pwatg Navq pyaab Dx'g nx . cvj maaib waag Buaj yia , “ mivb Dx'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj ziab txvb , cvj saauq yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad paaij Tinb huvb Eei myenb .
66011002	mq paag yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Eiag , laatg ka'Euad uaq teij txvj , maiq tuvq Dx'g , weig zu'g naaiq teij txvj Jiu pun maiq syenj Tinb huvb Eei Janj mig a'q . ninb Bua xij Zaaiq Jyenq Zivb Revg zivb feij zyepg Eeig Laaj Eia'g .
66011003	yia xij Paaiq i taub yia Eei zxvb zevj myenb zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru trug Tinb huvb Eei waag uaq teij yetg Zin Eig pc'q lua'g zyepg Nxi ka'Euad . ”
66011004	naaiq teij i taub zxvb zevj myenb se zruj sruq Jyenq paamb ken Eei zyruq Ra'Myen uaq teij i tiub ka'lanq Dyavj Zauj i nxm ton tav Eei Jaaj .
66011005	sij kxvq maaib haiq taub xij hxig ninb Bua , ninb Bua Eei Rwib pcvj zyrug Zwrtq trud myetg ninb Bua Eei winb wavq . haiq taub xij hxig ninb Bua zyrug Navq uaq nx zu'g taij .
66011006	naaiq teij zxvb zevj myenb maaib livg hatg Jyenq luvb yem ninb Bua trug Tinb huvb Eei waag Eei Nxib Eia'g maiq pun luvb twib Byuvg . ninb Bua yaag maaib livg zruj pun uam penj Ryaamq , yaag maaib livg sweib eij haiq zang xij pun paamb ken pwavb zu'g Euvb Euvg ze'g naang zyrug zruj a'q .
66011007	ninb Bua zruj liud zxvb zevj , yem uaq nxm Do haig Eei Kwrtq Zwrtq taaib uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq zyrug Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj . uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq zyrug Bx'q hivb ninb Bua , yaag taij ninb Bua .
66011008	ninb Bua Eei sei zyrug zu'g kwavg yem tomb zivb Eei Jaaib hxvg , tovb ninb Bua Eei zyruq zu'g tiv zyepg Ravg Jaaj taig uaq nxm tomb zivb . uaq nxm zivb yaag tu'q Buaj peiq soj-Dom zivb yaag peiq i-yipq teib puv .
66011009	maaib myenb yem maang kua'q , maang fivj , maang Euvg myenb , maang Euvg waag taaib mavg naaiq teij i taub Eei sei pua Nxi aanj ka'Euad yaag maiq pun pyopq .
66011010	luvb Diaq maang myenb Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g weig zu'g naaiq teij i taub taig mig a'q . ninb Bua zyrug zruj Jxm , laanb fuvj zivb Eeig pun laanb , weig zu'g naaiq teij i taub trug waag myenb zeij tu'q maang myenb Kruq haig .
66011011	Jiaj liud uaq teij pua Nxi aanj , maaib zyavb mcvg Eei Qiaj yem Tinb huvb taaib pia'g ninb Bua i taub Eei sei . ninb Bua zyrug Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq a'q . pwatg Eei myenb za'kevb ! kamb Riaj haig .
66011012	uaq teij i taub trug waag myenb zyrug haid Qiaj Bwi Eei yem uaq Tinb txvb Buaj ninb Bua , “ faauj naaiq taaib maa'b ! ” ninb Bua Eei winb wavq mavg Jyenq uaq zang , ninb Bua i taub zyrug yem txq Bwrnj faauj Tinb txvb mig a'q .
66011013	tovb uaq nxm zyavb hog Dau tovd tu'q seij haig . uaq nxm zivb zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq zyrug Baav , yaag maaib siag Zin taub myenb laaij Dau tovd zu'g taig . zevg Fiag uaq teij za'kevb ! kamb Riaj haig , zyrug Zev yem Tinb txvb Eei Tinb huvb .
66011014	ta'Eeig Euvg zu'g Kruq Eei sig Jiaj liud a'q . ta'faam Euvg xij Tauj syepq a'q .
66011015	ta'Zyetq taub finb myenb pyomq ninb Eei Ratg , zyrug maaib Qiaj Zamq Eei yem uaq Tinb txvb kxvq Bwi Eei , “ ib zang paamb ken penj Bua Eei zyruq , yaag penj ninb Eei ki-tug Eei kua'q . ninb xij yetg liud kunq Tauj maang kruq maang txig . ” “ zinb Daavg yem , ib zang yem , nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b ! yia Bua lcvd zivb zyruq weig zu'g ib zang meib lovg meib Eei tomb Qa'q Jiad kxn kunq paamb ken .
66011016	yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen zweid Jyenq ninb Bua Eei weig uaq teij Eig zyepg feij taub myenb koj zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij Tinb huvb .
66011017	ninb Bua kxvq , “ zinb Daavg yem , ib zang yem , nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b ! yia Bua lcvd zivb zyruq weig zu'g ib zang meib lovg meib Eei tomb Qa'q Jiad kxn kunq paamb ken .
66011018	maang kua'q myenb Qiaj Jiad haig , mq paag meib nrud myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q , yaag Tauj zyavb hog syemq taig mivb uaq teij myenb Eei zwid , cvj Zeij zivb Eeig pun meib Eei pru uaq teij trug waag myenb , Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj , tovb Taaib meib Eei Buaj Eei myenb , ib zang yaag Tauj zyavb hog myetg Revg tovb myetg paamb ken uaq teij . ”
66011019	uaq zang yem uaq Tinb txvb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq zyrug Kxi Gxi mig a'q . yaag mavg tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad . uaq zang pxvd Ba'livg Fapg Fapg Eei , maaib ziaj Euvg Qiaj Bwi , pxvd Ba'ov Pcvb Pcvd Eei , Dau tovd , yaag twib tomb px'g Fiag .
66012001	cvj maaib Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei tomb Javb hog yem uaq luvb hing Zwrtq taaib . maaib taub msia'q txn , ninb Eei zxvb zu'q se Ba'Nxi , Laaj yem ninb Eei zaub Diaq , mGxvq yaag Dovj Jyenq zyepg Eeig nxm Leij zruj nivq .
66012002	uaq taub msia'q txn maaib Jyenq sin . Dutq sin Eei zyavb hog Tauj , ninb mun tu'q Kruq haig zyrug heug .
66012003	yem uaq luvb cvj maaib Euvg Javb hog Zwrtq . maaib tiub tomb Juvb huvb si'q , maaib siag nxm mGxvq , zyepg nxm Jxv . nxmb nxm mGxvq Dovj Jyenq nivq .
66012004	Juvb huvb Eei tweiq Pwrtq yem luvb Eei Leij pua kruq Eei yetg kruq Dxtq Fiag Dau . ninb sruq Jyenq uaq taub msia'q txn Eei Ra'Myen zuaq kub vwaad yetq Dxtq Dau zyrug xij Eang kub vwaad .
66012005	uaq taub msia'q txn zyrug yuvd tu'q taub txn , tovb xij lovg Lia'g pyaaq kunq maang kua'q uaq taub . mq paag maaib taub taaib Zaavq naaiq taub txn txb mivb Tauj Tinb huvb yaag Tauj Tinb huvb Eei weig mig a'q .
66012006	uaq taub msia'q txn zyrug pyauj mivb uaq teib puvb Waav , Tauj Tinb huvb liug leid zyavj pun ninb yem Eei txvj . Tinb huvb zyrug kruj ninb yetg Zin Eig pc'q lua'g zyepg Nxi .
66012007	uaq zang yem uaq Tinb txvb maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig Zwrtq . mi-Kaa-en Zauj ninb Eei finb myenb Zauj uaq tiub Juvb huvb Bx'q Jaaj . Juvb huvb Zauj ninb Eei finb myenb Bx'q Jaaj
66012008	mq paag zu'g swei mig a'q . Tinb txvb zyrug maiq maaib ninb Bua yem Eei txvj a'q .
66012009	naaiq tiub tomb Juvb huvb zu'g zxi Fiag . ninb se tovb lob Nxi uaq tiub naav , Buaj heug myenq Eei huvb yaag heug saa-taan , tovb Duaq luvb Diaq maang myenb uaq tiub naav . ninb Zauj ninb Eei zwavj finb myenb zu'g zxi Fiag Tauj Dau .
66012010	yia cvj haid Qiaj Bwi yem uaq Tinb txvb kxvq , “ ib zang Tinb huvb Fruj ninb Eei myenb mig a'q . ib zang Tinb huvb lovg ninb Eei livg zruj huvb kunq paamb ken . ninb Eei ki-tug yaag tu'q lovg ninb Eei livg kunq luvb Diaq . weig zu'g yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd koj Bua Eei kxb yrud uaq taub ,
66012011	Bua Eei kxb yrud lovg uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Ryaamq yaag lovg ninb Bua zruj zxvb zevj Eei waag ninb Bua maiq Kxb fi'q ninb Bua Eei mcvg , zuvq Eung siaq ninb Bua Eei mcvg taig .
66012012	luvb Zauj meib Bua yem luvb Eei yetg zuvq xij zu'g Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g . mq paag Dau Zauj Kxiq xij zu'g Kruq a'q , weig zu'g myenq Eei huvb Fiag Tauj meib Bua naaig . ninb kevb ! Qiaj Jiad Jyenq weig zu'g hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zyavb hog maiq Daauq a'q . ”
66012013	Juvb huvb pwatg ninb zu'g zxi Fiag Tauj paamb ken mig a'q . ninb zyrug zung yuvd kub vwaab txn uaq taub msia'q txn .
66012014	mq paag uaq taub msia'q txn tu'q zipq i Kwaaiq Lo haig Eei tomb Jaavq Eei Daatq weig Daij mivb teib puvb Waav , Tauj ninb Eei txvj . yem uaq Tinb huvb xij kruj Jyenq pua Havb pyenj , maiq pun uaq tiub naav hxig ninb .
66012015	naav zyrug Pyuq uam Zwrtq ninb Eei Rwib pcvj , Navq tiub Daaib nx , zung Jyenq uaq taub msia'q txn , xij kwaatq ninb mivb mig a'q .
66012016	mq paag Dau Tevj uaq taub msia'q txn . Dau zyrug mxvj Gxi Rwib na'q Revg yem Juvb huvb Eei Rwib pcvj Zwrtq Eei uam .
66012017	Juvb huvb Qiaj Jiad ! haig uaq taub msia'q txn , zyrug mivb Zauj msia'q txn zevg Fiag Eei zeib fun Bx'q Jaaj . naaiq teij zeib fun se ei Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei livg zruj , yaag syenj wrnq ye-su zruj Eei zxvb zevj .
66013001	naaiq tiub Juvb huvb zyrug sruq Jyenq Kxib Len Eei saab zyru Dau . yia zyrug pwatg taub Yiab ka'naaiq yem uaq Kxiq Zwrtq taaib . uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq maaib siag nxm mGxvq , zyepg nxm Jxv . nxmb nxm Jxv Dovj Jyenq nivq . nxmb nxm mGxvq fiaq Jyenq Ki Tinb huvb Eei Buaj .
66013002	yia pwatg Eei Yiab ka'naaiq favj zeiq Navq Da'maaub Beuj , zauj Navq Jyepq Eei zauj nx , Rwib pcvj Navq syenb Eei Rwib pcvj . uaq tiub Juvb huvb zyrug Jiu ninb kanb Eei livg Zauj ninb Eei weig Zauj tomb hatg maad pun uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq .
66013003	Yiab ka'naaiq Eei siag nxm mGxvq maaib nxm pwatg Navq zu'g Jiaj syav , haib taig Eei , mq paag zu'g mun Eei txvj lovj mig a'q . luvb Diaq myenb Bua'g hxvb haig zyrug kan naaig taub Yiab ka'naaiq .
66013004	zwavj myenb paaij uaq tiub Juvb huvb weig zu'g Juvb huvb Jiu ninb Eei livg pun naaig taub Yiab ka'naaiq . ninb Bua yaag paaij Yiab ka'naaiq zyrug kxvq , “ haiq taub haib Navq naaiq taub Yiab ka'naaiq ? haiq taub haib Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj ? ”
66013005	uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq tu'q zipq Rwib puvj waab mauj yaag kxvq Ki Tinb huvb . ninb yaag tu'q livg sweib eij zruj feij zyepg Eeig Laaj Eia'g .
66013006	Yiab ka'naaiq zyrug Gxi Rwib kxvq to'g Ki Tinb huvb , Ki Tinb huvb Eei Buaj , Ki Tinb huvb yem Eei txvj , yaag Ki yetg zuvq yem Tinb txvb uaq teij .
66013007	Yiab ka'naaiq yaag tu'q sweib eij Zauj Tinb huvb Eei pc'g fivj Bx'q Jaaj yaag hivb Jiaj ninb Bua . ninb yaag tu'q livg kunq maang kua'q , maang fivj , maang Euvg waag Zauj maang Euvg myenb .
66013008	luvb Diaq maang myenb zyrug zavg uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq , Zwrtq liud maaib Buaj fiaq Jyenq zyavb mcvg taan uaq teij , tovb yem zeij luvb zeij Dau uaq zang zu'g taij taig uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn Eei taan .
66013009	“ haiq taub maaib mnxmb xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj .
66013010	haiq taub mcvg taaij zu'g zx'q wrnj lob , uaq taub za'kevb zu'g zx'q wrnj lob . haiq taub mcvg taaij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig , uaq taub za'kevb zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig . weig naaiq Tinb huvb Eei myenb xij zu'g maaib nxig tiaq yaag lovb lovj Eei syenj Tinb huvb . ”
66013011	yia cvj pwatg taub Yiab ka'naaiq yem Daub Diaq Zwrtq taaib . maaib i nxm Jxv Navq pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Jxv yaag kxvq waag Navq Juvb huvb nx .
66013012	naaiq taub Yiab ka'naaiq tu'q txv Jyenq ta'yetq taub Yiab ka'naaiq Eei Ra'Myen lovg Revg ta'yetq taub Eei livg . ninb aapq paamb ken Zauj yem paamb ken Eei myenb paaij ta'yetq taub Yiab ka'naaiq , tovb zu'g Jiaj syav mq paag lovj taaib uaq taub .
66013013	ta'Eeig taub Yiab ka'naaiq zruj tomb Javb hog , zuvq zruj pun trud yem luvb Dxtq Fiag Dau pun maang myenb pwatg .
66013014	ninb tu'q yem ta'yetq taub Yiab ka'naaiq Eei Ra'Myen zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog zyrug lovg naaiq teij Javb hog Duaq luvb Diaq myenb . ninb yaag hatg zwavj myenb zeij nxm favj weig Taaib zu'g Ru'g Daauq Va'q Jiaj syav Eei mq paag maiq taig uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq .
66013015	ta'Eeig taub Yiab ka'naaiq yaag tu'q livg haib pyomq Qiaj pia'g ta'yetq taub Yiab ka'naaiq Eei favj . favj zyrug haib kxvq waag yaag haib pun yetg zuvq maiq paaij ninb uaq teij myenb zu'g taij taig .
66013016	ninb yaag aapq myenb , maiq kunq Lo fai faij , putq zxib fai Jomg , zruj nrub fai maiq zruj nrub Eei , yetg zuvq xij zu'g Gaapq Jyenq yenj yem Byaaug Jia'q puad fai pyxvb .
66013017	Navq naaig , haiq taub maiq tu'q Gaapq Jyenq Yiab ka'naaiq Eei Buaj Eei yenj fai tiq Yiab ka'naaiq Eei Buaj uaq teij Ravg , uaq taub zyrug maiq haib maaid maaig .
66013018	naaiq teij sig xij zu'g lovg Zovb mevb . haiq taub kwai , uaq taub haib funj tu'q Zwrtq Yiab ka'naaiq Eei Buaj Eei Ravg , weig zu'g penj yetg taub myenb Eei Buaj Eei Ravg . naaiq taub myenb Eei Buaj Eei Ravg se lua'g pc'q lua'g zyepg lua'g .
66014001	yia cvj mavg , zyrug pwatg uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn sruq Jyenq si-on Bov . Zauj ninb yem uaq maaib yetg sinj pyei waang pyei Zin taub myenb , tovb maaib ninb Eei Buaj Zauj ninb Eei tia Eei Buaj fiaq uaq pyxvb Eei myenb .
66014002	yia yaag haid maaib Qiaj Bwi yem uaq luvb taaib Navq uam pwavq mrub Bwi , yaag Navq pxvd Ba'ov Bwi nx . yia yaag haid uaq Euvg Qiaj Bwi Navq Patq taanb paab Eei myenb Patq ninb Bua Eei taanb paab Bwi nx .
66014003	ninb Bua yem huvb weig Eei Ra'Myen , yem uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Zauj uaq teij zwavj myenb koj Eei Ra'Myen , paauj tiub syavb Ruv . Zwrtq liud yem paamb ken tu'q zua'g Rwrnj uaq teij yetg sinj pyei waang pyei Zin taub , maiq maaib haiq taub haib ho'g tu'q naaiq tiub Ruv .
66014004	naaiq teij mJavg txn maiq nitq Jiaj msia'q txn , ninb Bua Zivb Revg Eei . pa'ki yuvb txn mivb haaij , ninb Bua yaag kan Jyenq ninb mivb . ninb Bua yem maang myenb Bu'Dovj zua'g Zwrtq taaib weig zruj fuvj pun Tinb huvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn Eei taaub paan myenb .
66014005	ninb Bua Eei Rwib maiq kxvb pc'g . ninb Bua yaag maiq maaib txvg Eei txvj .
66014006	yia cvj pwatg kanb maaib taub finb myenb yem Daamb luvb Daij Jyenq mivb . ninb yaag maaib yetg liud yem Eei Kuq fyenj zunb pun luvb Diaq maang myenb , zunb pun maang kua'q , maang fivj , maang Euvg waag Zauj maang Euvg myenb .
66014007	naaiq taub finb myenb Qiaj Lo Eei zunb Jyenq kxvq , “ xij zu'g kamb Riaj Tinb huvb yaag Zev ninb weig zu'g ninb syemq maang myenb Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q . xij zu'g zavg zeij luvb zeij Dau zeij Kxiq zeij uamb zivq uaq taub . ”
66014008	cvj kanb maaib ta'Eeig taub finb myenb kan Jyenq ta'yetq taub mivb yaag kxvq , “ Baav mig a'q . Baa-Bi-lon tomb zivb Baav mig a'q . naaiq nxm tomb zivb aapq maang kua'q Eei myenb hopq ninb Eei tiuq . naaiq tiuq se scv Yenj Goj Eei tiub Kuq . ”
66014009	cvj kanb maaib ta'faam taub finb myenb kan Jyenq uaq teij i taub finb myenb mivb , Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq , “ haiq taub zavg uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq Zauj Yiab ka'naaiq Eei favj yaag Gaapq Jyenq Yiab ka'naaiq Eei yenj ninb Eei pyxvb fai puad nx ,
66014010	uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g hopq Tinb huvb nrud zwid Eei tiuq . naaiq tiuq Tinb huvb toj Fiag nrud zwid Eei zaanq yaag maiq Peuj haiq Euvg . haiq taub Navq naaiq nx zruj zuvq xij zu'g yem Zivb Revg Eei finb myenb Zauj uaq taub pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Ra'Myen zu'g huvb Eei trud zeij .
66014011	zeij ninb Bua uaq kwaaj trud Eei syruj yetg liud Zutg Zutq Eei faauj Tauj maang kruq maang txig . zavg uaq taub Yiab ka'naaiq Zauj Yiab ka'naaiq Eei favj , Zauj Gaapq Jyenq Yiab ka'naaiq Eei Buaj Eei yenj Eei myenb zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd maiq tu'q Kub yem yetg tavb . ”
66014012	Navq naaig , Tinb huvb Eei myenb , tovb ei Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei livg yaag lovb lovj Eei syenj ye-su uaq teij , xij zu'g maaib nxig tiaq .
66014013	yia cvj haid Qiaj yem uaq luvb kxvq , “ xij zu'g fiaq Jyenq , ‘ yavb naaiq Jiaj weig zyruq taig Eei myenb tu'q xnb lx'g . ’ ” sivj livb tau , “ za'kevb Navq naaig . ninb Bua tu'q tivb ninb Bua zruj Eei kov hitq Kwrnj weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj Eei sig kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb . ”

66014015	cvj kanb maaib taub finb myenb yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zwrtq taaib heug Qiaj Lo Eei kxvq Buaj zweid Jyenq Bwrnj uaq taub , “ lovg meib Eei limb vau kaatq a'q , weig zu'g yem paamb ken Eei ka'naaiq zua'g lovj a'q . kaatq Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q . ”

66015001	yia cvj pwatg yem uaq luvb kanb maaib Lo haig , Bua'g hxvb haig Eei tomb Javb hog . maaib siag taub finb myenb txb Jyenq siag Euvg ze'g naang . naaiq se Ga'haaq laai Eei ze'g naang weig zu'g Tinb huvb lovg naaiq teij zruj zyavj ninb nrud zwid Eei sig .

66018015	maaig naaiq teij huaj Eei scvb eij myenb , tovb Kauj Baa-Bi-lon zivb tu'q putq zxib uaq teij , kamb Riaj haig uaq nxm zivb syrug Eei Kruq naang zyrug sruq Jyenq ko Eei . ninb Bua puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq
66018016	yaag kxvq , “ ‘ Raub haig a'q . za'kevb ! Raub haig naaiq nxm tomb zivb a'q . zinb Daavg ninb zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab mwrng Zauj Diab lua'g , Diab si'g hovg , yaag lovg Jyem , lovg la'pyeib Jaaij Zauj zyenb zru zxv .
66018017	yetg sib ken Navq , ninb Eei yetg zuvq zinb zxib paaig Revg mig a'q . ’ “ zwavj Ravb Jyen Ravb nrub Zauj pia'g Ravq Eei myenb Zauj yetg zuvq Kauj Kxiq lxd Eang Eei myenb , zyrug sruq Jyenq ko Eei mavg .
66018018	ninb Bua pwatg trud zia'g Baa-Bi-lon zivb Eei trub syruj faauj zyrug heug Jyenq kxvq , ‘ maaib Jiaj haiq nxm zivb Dovg naaiq nxm tomb zivb ? ’
66018019	ninb Bua zyrug Eau niab Buv haad kanb Eei mGxvq , pun Ziv ninb Bua Raub haig , zyrug Eyemq Jyenq kxvq , “ ‘ Raub haig a'q . za'kevb ! Raub haig naaiq nxm tomb zivb a'q . ta'faanb maaib Ravq yavb Kxiq Eei myenb Kauj naaiq nxm zivb Jaaij haig Eei huaj putq zxib . yetg sib ken Navq , ninb penj Daub Waav mig a'q .
66018020	Tinb txvb aa'b ! xij zu'g Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g uaq nxm zivb zu'g myetg Revg mig a'q . Tinb huvb Eei myenb Zauj kovb zob Zauj trug waag myenb aa'b ! xij zu'g Fyenb yrub a'q , weig zu'g Tinb huvb tivg naaiq nxm zivb Eei zwid Tevj meib Bua Jaauq win . ’ ”
66018021	maaib taub henq haig Eei finb myenb zyrug prub nxm tomb la'pyeiq lomb tomb mxg zov Fiag Kxiq , yaag kxvq , “ Baa-Bi-lon tomb zivb xij Navq naaiq nx zu'g lovg Qa'q zov Fiag . yetg liud maiq maaib haiq taub cvj tu'q pwatg .
66018022	Baa-Bi-lon zivb aa'b ! yavb naaiq Jiaj , yem meib naaig ka'Euad maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q haid Patq taanb paab Eei Qiaj fai myenb paauj Ruv , yavb naaiq Jiaj yem meib naaig yaag maiq maaib zavg myenb zruj haiq Euvg kov .
66018023	yavb naaiq Jiaj yem meib ka'Euad yetg liud yaag maiq maaib tav ziuj Fav , yaag maiq maaib syavb laavb syavb Bwavd Eei Qiaj Bwi . zinb Daavg meib Eei scvb eij myenb zruj paamb ken kaub Lo Jiaj Eei scvb eij myenb . meib yaag zruj faatq Duaq maang kua'q Eei myenb .
66018024	Baa-Bi-lon zivb zu'g tivg zwid weig zu'g yem zivb ka'Euad pwatg maaib Ryaamq , se trug waag myenb , Zauj Tinb huvb Eei myenb , Zauj yetg zuvq yem paamb ken zu'g taij taig uaq teij myenb Eei Ryaamq . ”
66019001	Ga'haaq yia haid yem Tinb txvb maaib Qiaj Bwi Navq myenb Zamq ! haig kapq zunq Eei Qiaj Bwi nx . ninb Bua heug Jyenq kxvq , “ aa-le-lu-yaa ! Fruj en , Favb laavg Zauj Qa'q se Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei .
66019002	ninb tivg myenb Eei zwid se tivg tu'q zyen Eei , pcvb fim Eei . ninb tivg zruj Lo uaq taub maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn Eei zwid , zruj pun paamb ken waaig Revg mig a'q . Tinb huvb yaag Jaauq win laaij uaq taub msia'q txn taij Tinb huvb Eei pru pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei zwid . ”
66019003	ninb Bua cvj heug Rung kxvq , “ aa-le-lu-yaa ! zia'g Jyenq naaiq nxm tomb zivb Eei trub syruj xij yetg liud Zutg Zutq Eei faauj Tauj maang kruq maang txig . ”
66019004	uaq teij Eig zyepg feij taub myenb koj Zauj uaq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq zyrug Pua'q Fiag paaij zweid Jyenq huvb weig Eei Tinb huvb , yaag kxvq , “ aa-men ! aa-le-lu-yaa ! ”
66019005	cvj maaib Qiaj yem huvb weig taaib kxvq , “ Tinb huvb Eei zwavj pru Zauj yetg zuvq Taaib ninb Eei myenb maiq kunq zruj Lo zruj faij , xij zu'g Zev Bua Eei Tinb huvb . ”
66019006	yia cvj haid Qiaj Navq myenb Zamq ! Eei kapq zunq nx , se Navq uam pwavq mrub nx Bwi , yaag Navq pxvd tomb Ba'ov nx Bwi . Qiaj kxvq , “ aa-le-lu-yaa ! weig zu'g Bua Eei zyruq , nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb , tu'q zruj huvb kunq Jyenq a'q .
66019007	Bua xij zu'g Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g , Taaib ninb zruj Lo , weig zu'g pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Zivb Jaab yinb Tauj a'q . ninb Eei syavb Bwavd Beng zyavj Revg a'q .
66019008	Tinb huvb pun ninb zu'q Zivb Revg Eei , Bopq pc'g Eei , la'maab Diab mwrng . ”
66019009	uaq taub finb myenb zyrug kxvq Buaj yia , “ xij zu'g fiaq Jyenq naaiq teij waag og . ‘ Tinb huvb heug taaib Eang pa'ki yuvb txn Eei Zivb Jaa Naavj uaq teij za'kevb xnb lx'g haig . ’ ” finb myenb cvj kxvq , “ naaiq teij waag za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei zyen waag . ”
66019010	yia zyrug Pua'q Fiag finb myenb Eei zaub Len xij paaij ninb mq paag ninb kxvq , “ maiq tuvq Navq naaiq nx zruj maa'b ! yia Zauj meib cvj Zauj meib Eei kxb yrud , tovb syenj wrnq ye-su zruj zxvb zevj kxvq Eei zyen leid uaq teij , lomb Rxib zruj pru . xij zu'g paaij Tinb huvb Navq . weig zu'g Tevj ye-su zruj zxvb zevj se zruj trug Tinb huvb Eei waag Eei fim . ”
66019011	Jiaj taaib yia pwatg Tinb txvb Gxi , cvj maaib taub maab pc'g yem uaq . keb maad uaq taub Eei Buaj heug , “ zyepg zua'q Eei , zyen Eei uaq taub . ” ninb pcvb fim Eei syemq zwid yaag pcvb fim Eei Bx'q Jaaj .
66019012	ninb Eei mziv Navq trub Byetg nx . mGxvq yaag Dovj Jyenq Zamb nxm nivq . ninb yaag maaib nxm Buaj fiaq Jyenq ninb Eei sin . Zwrtq liud ninb kanb maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq tu'q naaiq nxm Buaj .
66019013	ninb zu'q Jyenq zyemj Jiaj Ryaamq Eei tomb lwib Daauq . ninb Eei Buaj heug , “ Tinb huvb Eei tod . ”

66021025	zivb kcvb zyavb Nxi Kxi Gxi , yetg liud maiq kwrn , weig zu'g yem uaq maiq maaib luvb mwrnd zang .

66022001	finb myenb cvj pun yia mavg yuvd mcvg uaq tiub Daaib , pwatg Rav haig Navq kivb zaanq nx , yem Tinb huvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn Eei weig Zwrtq taaib ,

66022003	yem uaq nxm zivb maiq maaib zu'g Tinb huvb zyruj Eei haiq Euvg . Tinb huvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn Eei weig xij yem zivb ka'Euad . Tinb huvb Eei pru Bua yaag xij paaij ninb .
66022004	ninb Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg ninb Eei Myen , yaag maaib ninb Eei Buaj fiaq Jyenq yem ninb Bua Eei pyxvb .
66022005	yavb naaiq Jiaj maiq maaib luvb mwrnd zang . ninb Bua yaag maiq Qyemj zu'g lovg tav fai Ba'Nxi ziuj Fav , weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb xij zruj ninb Bua Eei Fav . ninb Bua yetg liud tu'q zruj huvb kunq Tauj maang kruq maang txig .
66022006	uaq taub finb myenb cvj kxvq Buaj yia , “ naaiq teij waag zyen Eei , Kauj tu'q wrnq Eei . zyruq Tinb huvb , tovb Zeij ninb Eei sivj livb pun zwavj trug waag myenb uaq taub , Paaiq ninb Eei finb myenb mivb pun ninb Eei pru Bua hiuq tu'q maiq laub xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig . ”
66022007	ye-su kxvq , “ mavg maa'b ! yia xij taaib syepq a'q . ” haiq taub mwavj lovj yem naaiq pwrnq sru trug taaib Eei waag , uaq taub tu'q xnb lx'g .
66022008	yia , yo-han , tu'q haid yaag tu'q pwatg naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig . yia haid liud pwatg liud yia zyrug Pua'q Fiag pun yia mavg naaiq teij sig uaq taub finb myenb Eei zaub Len xij paaij ninb .
66022009	mq paag ninb Buaj yia , “ Zinb maang maiq tuvq Navq naaig maa'b ! yia Zauj meib cvj Zauj meib Eei kxb yrud uaq teij trug waag myenb , cvj Zauj yetg zuvq ei Jyenq naaiq pwrnq sru Eei waag Eei myenb , lomb Rxib zruj pru . meib xij zu'g paaij Tinb huvb . ”
66022010	finb myenb cvj Buaj yia , “ maiq tuvq Gaapq yenj kwrn naaiq Fung sru kxvq Eei zinb hod waag , weig zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig aaq lamb Tauj zyavb hog Zwrtq a'q .
66022011	haiq taub zruj waaig sig , pun ninb zruj Jyenq waaig sig mivb . haiq taub zruj laib Lopq Eei sig , pun ninb zruj Jyenq laib Lopq Eei sig mivb . haiq taub zruj hxpg , pun ninb zruj Jyenq hxpg Eei sig mivb . haiq taub Zivb Revg , pun ninb Zxg Zivb Revg . ”
66022012	ye-su kxvq , “ mavg maa'b ! yia xij taaib syepq a'q . yia xij txb Jyenq yia Eei zivb Eeig taaib ei kx'g myenb zruj Eei sig winb pun ninb Bua .
66022013	yia zruj an-faa yaag zruj o-me-kaa , taaub taub Zauj Ga'haaq laai uaq taub , zruj kxn yaag zruj setq mweid .
66022014	“ Roj kanb Eei lwib hruj Zivb Revg Eei myenb maaib xnb lx'g . ninb Bua maaib leid Eang yuvd mcvg Dyavj Eei pyruq yaag tu'q yavb laatg kcvb pia'g uaq nxm zivb ka'Euad .
66022015	mq paag yem ka'Eiag zi'g zivb maaib zruj maiq penj Eei sig Navq Juq nx uaq teij , Zauj zruj faatq Eei myenb , Ryaaug sia'q Ryaaug txn , taij myenb uaq teij , paaij miub favj Eei , cvj Zauj yetg zuvq a'Neiq kxvb pc'g Zauj zruj kxvb pc'g Eei sig uaq teij .
66022016	“ yia , ye-su , Paaiq yia Eei finb myenb txb naaiq teij zxvb zevj waag mivb Buaj meib weig Buaj zwavj Jiub paav . yia zruj Daa-witq Eei trub zov Zauj zeib fun , yaag zruj Fav haig Eei Taaib pc'g fiv . ”
66022017	sivj livb Zauj syavb Bwavd lomb Rxib kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ” haiq taub haid naaiq teij waag yaag xij zu'g kxvq , “ taaib maa'b ! ” haiq taub Jaav Gaatq , kunq pun ninb taaib . haiq taub xij hopq , kunq pun ninb taaib pc'g pc'g hopq naaiq yuvd mcvg Eei uam .
66022018	yia , yo-han , lovb lovj Eei Kwinj meib Bua taub taub haid liud naaiq Fung sru Eei zinb hod waag Eei myenb . sij kxvq haiq taub Tipq teij waag pia'g naaiq Fung sru , Tinb huvb xij Tipq fiaq Jyenq naaiq Fung sru uaq teij ze'g naang pun uaq taub .
66022019	sij kxvq haiq taub zx'q teij naaiq Fung sru zinb hod Eei waag Zwrtq , Tinb huvb xij zx'q Zwrtq uaq taub Eei yuvd mcvg pyruq Eei pwrng , Zauj yem uaq nxm Zivb Revg zivb Eei pwrng , tovb naaiq Fung sru kxvq mevb Eei pwrng .
66022020	weig naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig zruj zxvb zevj uaq taub kxvq , aa-men . zyruq ye-su aa'b ! Toq meib taaib a'q maa'b !
66022021	Toq zyruq ye-su Zeij en pun Tinb huvb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj . aa-men .
